Definition: In this task, we are given a Dataset having english language product reviews generated from CTRL and then those reviews are given value from 1 to 5 based on the reviews of the product. Now, here we are going to classify task based on the review_rating for generated reviews. So here we have 5 classes with values ranging from 1 to 5 and we will consider a value to be good review if its review rating value is greater than 3 else bad review

The colors are really pretty and it works just as well as, if not better than the otterbox. Hopefully there will be more available by next Xmas season. Overall, very cute case. I love cheetah's. :)

The story was not bad. However, the typos made it difficult and painful to read. Not sure what an editor looks for. I found myself going back just one sentence after a paragraph only because of missing words. This makes you wonder if English is Mr. Jones' second language with all that editing. And since this appears in Kindle version, it does detract from enjoyment or at least make me more aware of that.

This product is completely useless. It cannot be used with any of the 3 cell batteries listed on the page. The charger itself appears to heat up, so I can see if it could take a charge. Not sure how they would work in another product, but these don't allow you use them in an NP-E4U Battery Grip or any other brand that uses those batteries. Don't waste your money! And make absolutely sure yours won't damage your charger.

I ordered this for my 2 year old daughter. She loved it. The only down side to it was the handle that you push when you turn back and forth. It broke off within 10 minutes of her giving the scooter a good push. Otherwise it's a great little scooter. I would recommend it! My daughter is already asking me where she can get another one so we won't be switching between them as much. I highly suggest buying this. It's very cute too.

My children love Jake and the Neverland Pirates and as soon as I heard about this one on Pandora, they had to have it. So instead of getting it for Christmas, we waited until New Years Eve. When opening it, the back broke in 2 seconds, before my son could even put any cards into it, so he couldn't use it! We bought another just like mine, but he was still disappointed that didn't work either.

For the first time in my life I felt like reading a children's book. The characters were not fully formed, and it was hard to believe there had been any romance between them. It seemed very juvenile without much depth.

The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
The cable looks and works great. This will make life so much easier next time I need a new cable. And for the price it can't be beat.

This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.

My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.

I've only had the TV for two weeks, and so far I'm impressed. It's lighter than I expected, which was a good thing. Everything looks great. The built-in Netflix app is very basic, but you can't expect too much from it. But don't discount Samsung's ability to integrate with other services. One of my favorite features is its internet browser. It responds to keypresses on just about every site imaginable, including Yahoo search pages.

This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product. :D

I have used this product for a month now with no changes noted. It has however improved my appetite while it lasted. My stomach still rumbles when I'm taking them and the fiber is so fine you really seem to be swallowing pieces of your food. If they would come up with some new packaging that didn't make me gag, I'd buy them. However, they are not cheap but then again all sugar supplements are. And I don't eat a lot anyway. Just add water as needed and you're good.

They gave up on trying to hold a charge when they were too old. My mom got them at Best Buy around the time we did. She said even that Best buy would not take care of these anymore. I was thinking with all their extra profits why didn't they just get a more durable set or something. The last thing she cares about is how many batteries do they need and doesn't think it will make sense to waste money replacing them. A lot cheaper ones on Amazon? I'll pass.

Bought this about a year ago, but just opened today. It was packed in a box almost too small, the lid of that small box, fell off and I am not an engineer. Upon taking it out - there are three huge dents inside one corner. In addition, both hinges that hold the filter top cover down (the plastic part on top) were cracked. The handle has been bent inward so that no longer holds water. No way to return it. Just junk.

After reading the book description for The Devil and David I was excited to read it. Sadly it fell a little short. There are some good moments, but overall not too bad. A fairly predictable plot, lots of action at times that had me skimming through certain passages, no real big surprises here. On the other hand, there were many very well done moments where you will find yourself thinking about them long after you've finished reading. Like any book, this has its pros and cons...

I've enjoyed the TV series since it's original airing, and this season did not disappoint! I'm still waiting to see if I do in my lifetime for the show go off the air! This product was shipped extremely quickly so you will really enjoy your purchase! The only thing is that when you've seen one episode, it doesn't wrap up like most of all other shows do. Like how Buffy & Angel or Lost ended, where you were left feeling good but wanting more more.
You know, like some of these things do but there are two problems: they can't produce heat, and it's too flimsy for anything other than really light weight.
Not worth the money. I thought it was too short and poorly written. The characters were not developed. It felt like a good idea but fell short.

I bought the product to try and help with my cat's itchiness on her tail. It was an expensive bottle that you only get about 3 uses before it expires. Waste of money. Maybe good for a dog that doesn't have long hair but not at all helpful in helping out cat skin problem. Wish there would be a return policy. Save your money, don't waste it.

These headphones looked nice and seemed comfortable at first. Once they started sweating, the rubber pieces ripped off. Very inexpensive product for what it's worth. Avoid them. 
 Rating: 1.

This album was a lot of fun to listen to but the song that kept playing in my mind after listening to it quite frequently ("The Sound Of Music" by Johnny Mercer) reminded me why. For me, for an album, you have to be able to connect with all these songs and this recording failed at that. But if you're looking for another collection showcasing Sinatra as we know him, this is it.

The first time I purchased an iPhone was in November of 2007 after seeing how inexpensive it had become (remember the iPhone/iPod war??), and to be honest they seemed quite expensive at $20-$40 a pop. In addition to being relatively hard on my phone, though, these cases add significant weight (and size) to it. Since then, I've bought a few more cases, primarily because they're cheaper than what came originally with the phone.

I purchased this item to replace an older version of the same device from the previous owner. The product arrived promptly and it works very well so far. There are slight glitch sometimes though but that may be because its getting hard for my PC to connect up with it. All in all, it is a good unit and am happy with mine. It's a great way to share music or watch HD movies while working anywhere. You won't go wrong purchasing one if you don't have one now like me.

Just got my copy in the mail this morning and am going to return it as soon as possible. The song quality is very poor compared with past albums of his by far. I know he put a lot into the recording process on these cd's but its definitely not worth the cost. There are many other artists out there who can produce real country music that you would think we all listen to. This release does NOT belong in any country.

This book was not what I thought it would be at all. It's a story for kids, with poor illustrations. There wasn't even enough text to read my son through one book. Not really happy about it. Also purchased the book, and after reading it, don't like either one... sorry. Would have rather paid $5 more. Definitely not worth $40.00 that they're charging. Sorry Amazon. You must try harder.

I purchased this a couple weeks ago and used it only about 5 times before the plastic handle broke off. What really suprised me was how poorly constructed it, especially for its price. It is definitely not worth $100. Go with something else. You'll be better off spending that money on pizza or hot wings. That should get you an oven at least! :(

I love this album and have been enjoying it very much. It has some of my favorite songs. The sound quality is excellent on the album. Very happy with purchase. :) The lyrics are a little strange sometimes... but its not really too bad. :-D Great purchase!!!

I love the cd and loved the song at first so much.. Then as time went on it started feeling a little repetitive.. I'm sure everyone has their own opinion about what happens after you die...but to me all i can do is..

I saw the other reviewers said this thing sucks and they're obviously happy with it but mine has been a nightmare. It works for two days then stops working, we tried everything from reinstalling to troubleshooting, even buying another brand of wireless card, nothing works. The wifi in our house is excellent, it's about 200 ft away upstairs through 2 walls, so there's not much interference around, yet it's still slow on start-up.

The plot is great, the cast great too, but in my opinion it's been overdone. My husband has seen this twice, I only saw it at the theatre. It was nice to be able to see it a second time. It's not nearly as good on DVD. On TV you don't appreciate how beautiful Nicole Kidman and Robert Carlyle really are. With HD TVs it's like watching movies via someone else's home movie camera with bad lighting or the contrast turned up and colors mudded.
Great tasting. Hard as rocks, though.

We received this book and gave it to my son for his fourth birthday. The page numbers are on one side with the content of a story on the other side. He quickly learned how to read off of that, but I worry that he's not absorbing all of it. It seems like it's just pictures - very low level books.
I just wish the book was a bit more detailed and thorough. Good beginning for people who are starting out in juicing. Would also be helpful if they discussed different sizes of fruit/veggies.

This is actually a 3 minute song. It sounds like the singer just randomly grabbed the music from Youtube and mashed it together by scratching instruments. I bought it solely for that one track, but it's not even worth it. A few more stars would be better spent on free downloads, because at least those people will have something meaningful to listen to.

I bought a set of these from Target. Two broke in less than 5 days. These are cheap plastic. I'm thinking about using them as a hammer or some other blunt object to break things. Save your $, dont buy. They won't last.

I've read this series out of sequence. As a big fan of the books I thought this was going to be another great book. But it wasn't. The first half is boring and has no action. And then comes part two. It's okay. Just ok. To much focus on love triangle between Eric, Sookie, Bill, and Eric. That gets old fast. If I don't finish it, I'm done. There could have been more plot development leading up until now. Not really my kind of thing.
As other reviewers have noted, this memoir does not present Mr.
One of the most overpriced toys I've ever bought. The paint job is terrible. You would be better off buying a piece from Michaels and using their craft paint.

I didn't have any problems with this printer for the first few years of ownership, until a week or so ago when nothing prints at all. No matter what you do, it will not print anything. I've tried cleaning it, no dice. The only thing that still works is the scanner. It used to get clogged if more than one sheet fed in, now it's totally stuck up.

After 3 days the black part of my screen cracked completely off and now it wont stay on the phone. I feel like it's not doing me any good by cracking when i haven't dropped it, but this case was really cheap so its no surprise that it broke

I bought these to replace the broken rear struts on a 1997 Subaru Legacy Outback. The front was easy with only one bolt and torqued to spec. For me, it didn't matter which way they were mounted, just had them bolted at 90 degrees. Once you get past that process, this has given our back half more ride comfort than before when we owned it new. It comes complete with new shocks, rotors, struts, wheel spacers, brake pads, mounts, nuts to secure hoses, etc.

The book provides very few concrete examples from his practice. He offers anecdotes about experiences but not enough details in relation to those anecdotes, which made reading him somewhat frustrating at times.
I really enjoyed this book, but as some have noted, it was too short. When is the next one coming out?? I'll read it.

Our 3 year old cat enjoys the cat tree, but the instructions are very vague. We almost bought a wooden post for him to play on, I wish we could have found one that had wider posts. The product is good quality. It took about two hours of reading and tinkering until it was done. Overall it's not too much trouble, maybe an hour if you lay out all the parts first. Also, be careful with how high you install those supports. If they don't support correctly you'll damage something so check them.

I bought these as a replacement for the stock knobs on my '98 Honda Accord Sedan. When you pull them loose they seem like they're not going to get off. But once it takes some brute force and two people working together, the old ones just slip right back on. They feel kind of cheap, but all in all, they were cheap enough. So far, about 2 months later, both have started leaving rust streaks along their edges. It's very noticeable in certain areas.

What an awesome way to take your kid fishing, as easy or better than just tying a few knots. I have used this in the river with my 11 year old granddaughter and it works great for her. Well worth getting. So far two kids are using it. Just keep you fishing buddies at bay. :)

I was a little nervous when I ordered this after reading some reviews not the highest but it did what it said to do. The price wasn't too great either. It fit really well and for some reason my dog didn't seem bothered by it. Good product at a good price. Thanks amazon again! My pet peede in less than 4 days. Great product. Love it!

Bought these as a replacement to the first one I bought from this manufacturer but had problems with it and then eventually gave out. So when I need more of those, we will go back to buying them directly. These arrived in very timely matter. However, they do NOT have "lips," meaning that they don't fit together tightly. Not enough pressure is needed to make connection or break connection, if you are not too rough where you're attaching/unattaching them.

I had great hopes for this book - we went to the author's house and did our daily meditation exercises together. I'm not religious, but my husband thought it was an insightful way of getting a new perspective on life as he grew older. However, after one day of having meditated by candlelight with her book, his mood changed and he found himself wishing that they would make these things mandatory.

What it is, is a book of ideas I read at the last minute. But if you are familiar with these ideas, they will not be new, as Mr Wilson has been repeating them for yearsThis book in no way stands on its own, and lacks any depth to it. It might have one or two good points but overall does not, in my opinion, add up when taken out after you've gone through every page or 2 in it.

Our two labs love the food and they always eat it in a matter of minutes, not chewing. It is very good for them too! I would definitely reorder. However, shipping wasn't so great, but the product itself was fantastic...much better than some others we've tried. I'll stick with this brand. The quality isn't cheap, since it's all meat based, but worth it. Would buy again. :)
Enjoyable movie to sit back with friends at home for some laughs. Definitely worth watching. Would recommend it as one of those movies.
After only five weeks of use, the bottom came off both pots now leaking boiling water through it's seams which will ruin my counter top when I'm finished cooking.

You will be hard pressed to find someone who doesn't want to read this book, for all the reasons stated by other reviewers here. In a nutshell, it is an account of one woman's journey through life using techniques that can only really be described as "off his rocker." The author's approach seems to have been based on seeing himself everywhere he goes and taking pictures in every conceivable situation.

This is absolutely useless. I tried different settings, used multiple settings on the camera. Nothing worked except for some very bright light in front of a window. It didn't make any sense to me and it was really difficult to read text using it. Even with this much light, words weren't so sharp as to be readable. The only thing that made them readable were a bunch of blobs where each character had its own little dot but no solid white color at all.

I was disappointed that these had no padding inside at all. Just a piece of foam and not much protection there. But, they seem to work fine for what we need. So far, they've been great and we've had them for about 2 weeks. We use then as kitchen chairs now because my daughter likes to lean forward in her high chair. That has turned out good too. They're holding up very well so far. I'm also glad they're adjustable.

These short pieces help bring it all together. An easy read with great characters - even if your never been there or have very limited knowledge about it. This is not high literature, but just fun entertainment. Thanks for sharing them Mr. Cook. And keep up the good work...

I am not sure there was anywhere in the listing saying "for PC's, this only works with Windows 7 and 8.1Not good enough. Also did not get a receipt or package so it's no good. Can't tell if it is legit, or not........don't know, but I'm out $ 5.00. Will be more careful before ordering next time. It sounds good though, my computer has everything now. Oh well.
This vacuum bag cleaner works great on my carpet - light weight suction holds dirt well without having to empty more often due to larger capacity bag.

Love this product! Works with any USB type device that has a microphone input as it can be used to plug in an MP3 player or phone! Has great sound with no static and good enough volume range. Would highly recommend it!

As a longtime fan of this film, I will start by saying that if you have never seen it you should avoid the original and watch Star Wars instead, but for people who, like me, enjoy both of them? Well, you're in good company. This one, while quite different from it's source, is still one of my favorite trilogies.
i liked it...but not as good as"One Day at a Time... Book 1 The Perfect Game 2....." still worth reading after watching all three books on TV.   Rating: 4.

I wanted to like this story. The book is well laid out, if a little choppy, and the author has obviously done very careful research. But its just not entertaining. Its hard work reading such dense prose. And when you finally get there, it feels more like an essay. You are left wondering, "So what? It's all right there in print somewhere? Where's the revelation?" Maybe it's great for people who already believe we don't need technology, but my expectations were quite high.
As another reviewer noted, this does seem to be an extremely slim book.
Bought this because everyone loves their pet food but i needed more protein.

I bought this book as a gift for my husband who loves to read any book with historical content. However, he did not have much luck reading most of it. The grammar is terrible and while there are some interesting, or at least very interesting details, it lacks in every respect. So, the story might be entertaining, but I probably would recommend a different author. If you like historical fiction, especially ones about England then, try Anne McCaffrey's books such as, Dragonquest series, or even better Bujold's Eragon.
I'm on my third one - I've used them to open most everything. As long as the handles are properly attached, that's what matters.
First time I used it was only once. So first thing went into trash. Second one stopped working after 2nd use. You get what you pay for. I'm going back with good ol fashion threads.

I got the game really fast.when i went to play some of it started freezing my xbox,so i unplugged it,and put back to a better part that was working.it worked real nice for about 3 days,the next time i tried playing it froze my entire console!!!and now i'm stuck with this piece of crap thing!!!
Purchased these hoping to replace some older ones which had gotten lost or scratched. They were advertised as a set however only received one...

I love the movie but i was disapointed this dvd does not play as good sound is low and sometimes it skips you tube videos are great on both my pcs works awesome blueray will watch better with a surround system like in blue ray movies so its back to store bought dvds.

It is a wonderful book. I wanted to give this five stars because the content and subject matter was wonderful. However, you really can't read it in Kindle because there are no images. The cover isn't even attractive. If they had an images version, I'd totally buy it!Update 12/7/2013- Amazon has now changed how the book opens causing me to wonder for ever that I've actually purchased it.

This product is a rip-off. Save your money. I have had the worst headache and stomach ache ever since taking this product. I am in so much pain. You will go right to your health club if you want that feeling of having just went on an acid trip. Please save yourself the agony - don't buy any products from Pure Bliss Nutritions! They are scammers who would sell poison even though there was no evidence it has harmed humans. The ingredients are completely untested. Do not buy.

It is exactly as described; it has a simple design. However, the size of this pot is NOT 2 QT. Mine measures 1 1/4 qt to about 1.5 quart which means you have just barely time in boiling water. You would be better off buying an electric kettle or one that boils faster.

I have been a fan for many years but the last few has left me very disappointed. This album really does not hold up. The music is good, good old fashioned hard rock like they are supposed to be. But this album does nothing. Don't expect anything at all. It took way too long and still nothing happened. If you want something that rocks then buy their debut album. They were true musicians back then. You can't do much better than this.
This is not quite as good in my opinion as the other two I have read by this author but it was still an entertaining story. Enjoyed it. Will probably try other books from her.

I am not an advocate for legalizing marijuana, but there seems to be enough research backing it up that I believe its use may bring about some benefits which would outweigh those potential health risks. There are legitimate uses beyond recreational use.

I wanted some inexpensive earbuds that wouldn't break the bank. These fit my needs perfectly. The silicone tips are comfortable and make a good seal in your ears. Sound quality is excellent. When I received them, they seemed to have been repackaged or stored for years, but I'm glad I bought them.

This was my first iPad case but I love it! It fits snuggly into place, is easy on and off when needed, has protected my ipad, it's easy on/off, stays well secured within place when using, stands easily while using screen without sliding down or moving up.

The first one delivered was broken. I decided to send it back and get a replacement, thinking maybe the customer representative had done something wrong and sent the broken unit again. Instead, I got yet another broken one, and no longer have any faith in Amazon for these things. It's nice they are refunding my money since the product isn't worth it. Do not buy this if you want one. It has been a frustrating experience, and it's really quite sad that such an otherwise wonderful brand sells this.
I bought 2 DVDs each season one worked but no other one.

It is always fun to see classic westerns, especially westerns that are not based on an existing genre. My wife would appreciate it if there could be some improvement in the video quality when watching these films. As it is, they look more like old 16mm film. Still glad we own it! I give four stars because of this picture quality.

I just received this CD in the mail. Like some other reviewers have mentioned, it doesn't play on my portable player, which is what it's intended to do. I'm very disappointed that Amazon would send me a damaged CD. When I put the CD into another CD, it plays perfectly. This wasn't mentioned prior to choosing it, apparently. It sounds like an excellent product, and was excited about getting it. But right now, I've got one of two discs with faulty features.

For anyone interested in this issue, there is a recent book called "Slaughterhouse and the Great Depression (Hispanics Unveiled)" written by Peter Morwood. The title gives you an idea as to what the content will contain. It was originally published in 2001 but it has been updated several times. The newer editions add material from both American Experience (PBS) documentaries which discuss how much more dangerous certain types of firearms were compared with other guns available during that same time period.

The description of the product states you can cook up a ton of popcorn in this thing and be done with it, but it can't handle much. I filled half way with unpopped kernels, then put that stuff back in. When looking for an exact replacement for my old unit, there doesn't seem to be any good ones. I've had three since they were new so it's not like I'm super hard on them. They just don't work as well when used too often.
Bought 4 of these, 2 are fine. The others have no sound and the charge lights flash as it should. If you don't care that they won't work buy them, otherwise, find another option.

Very cool little thing. The way the cord unplugs from the body makes for an easy storage, even while in use. The magnet holds quite well. So with a couple twists you have your cable ready when you need all that extra slack you can throw around on a long run. Good price point too. Bought 2 so that I'll always have one available.

This unit had to be returned due the inability of all buttons to operate. Other than that it appears well made. I found it not loud enough for my needs. The other thing was after connecting via bluetooth, it would only play music on one speakerphone. So we put our old phone back in service with an answerer and now everyone can hear who they are talking too at home. Very disappointing since we bought this specifically because it sounded so good when we purchased it.

As an avid reader, I've had my fair share of thrillers. I can count them on one hand. The last time I was shocked out the front door by an action packed thriller that kept me awake for hours, while sleeping late, wasThe Girl with the Dragon Tattoo: 3-Disc Set (50th Anniversary Ultimate Collector's Edition).That novel has held up and is still a very good read. Sure, it suffers from having too much going on. So does this book.

My daughter loves this book and it was a Christmas gift for her. She just got back from the doctor and told me she never uses it. The writing is very small so I can't even read what she wrote without my glasses. I'm not sure if that will be an issue when school starts again. Other then that, I feel it's great to find some fun kid books on Kindle, but please fix their writing!!!! Great ideas in there though :) Thank you...

Very cute book! If your child has a serious illness, it's not really for them. I purchased this book to help my 5 and 3 year old kids be able to know they're sick, when they hear their name instead of just telling everyone that's sick. There are very few words on the pages, no pictures...except where the little girl gets her meds.... The pictures inside don't show well once she's been covered and then put back. My older daughter doesn't play with it.

I am a fan of the series. My first book was The White Pearl, and from there it's been great. This book, however, just didn't do it for me and unfortunately I'm not going to get any more. It read more like an episode of Criminal Minds, which is too bad--it does nothing but repeat itself as most books do. If you want something good by this author try one before this, or maybe even watch an episode.

This is a good story about three girls and their families. The only problem I have with the book are some of the descriptive passages. They don't flow very well from one event to another. There needs to be more description in between these incidents so that it will read like a novel. All too often we just get told what happened. One thing other than description, has any author ever mentioned how much her characters weigh before they go on a trip.

So many other reviews mentioned that these aren't real and are fake. I made sure to get REAL ones. It turns out they ARE FAKE. Don't waste your money. They didn't have tracking number though, which isn't how you know it's authentic. It's junk. Definitely not worth $10+. I'm returning them at first chance.
First off let me say you need to be on top of what you're doing.
Good book but it was a bit confusing...this is the second time that I have read this authors books with some different characters.
Don't think you'll get quality service if you order one of these.

I only received one book when we ordered a complete set with an additional book. When the picture was changed did not match what I received. A bit disappointed for something my son wanted so bad.. The kids loved it anyway though.

I have owned various versions of the IPOD since they first came out. This is by far the worst version yet. The device freezes all the time, often after I've completed 1 song. If you hit pause, it does not let go until the song has been played 5 times. Often when I'm sitting in my car listening to music and I stop because it's time out, or whatever reason- there are times that the screen says "error" and continues the track.

This is the second battery charger I bought as a Christmas present, that came from Amazon, after one purchased before for my son. His was still working. The first charger, received in July, broke apart and wouldn't charge anymore. Just found out two days ago they discontinued it without warning. It took quite some time to find the exact replacement charger. Too bad, really liked it. One of these days, will purchase an actual Nikon product, or go back to buying batteries.

I loved the idea of having a portable computer to share pictures with family and friends on my big screen. It worked really well for about 3 days, then when i opened it one evening there was water inside where all the wires came out. I cleaned that up and put some tape over that, so far, no leaks. My husband just told me yesterday, however, that this thing is trash.
There are some cables that just don't do the job.

If you are thinking about switching your old mouse to this wireless one, DON'T. I have a wired Logitech mouse, and the new cordless is very inconsistent on its signal quality. It will either freeze every 10-30 seconds, or just stop doing anything, so what good is it? After 2 months of buying this, I've decided it's better to use my older one than this.

The material was very stiff and had little give to it. I gave it some stretches in the wash & got them on but with no give. My husband loves these kind of socks so we have been trying many brands lately. These are not our favorite. He has worn a black pair almost daily for probably 10 years now so I'm assuming that we just got two bad pairs or something. I'll find more comfortable ones. Disappointed. Good shipping though :-/ Amazon rocks!
This product does a good job on cleaning my carpet. It doesn't dry it out too bad.

I purchased this product expecting something great for the price I paid, but instead got to disappoint,was unable use it even once. After connecting a headset,everything sounds fuzzy. If you are looking just go and spend few bucks on a real product.

My husband and I are starting to make our own beef jerky. We did the research on several websites including Amazon. The price per pound was great for quality products. They all came packaged well by Amazon--which most places will not pack these products so carefully. There were quite a few that had only one or two worms in each bag. Not good. Some of them have been resealed with tape over the worms. Others we haven't seen since they left the factory, if ever.

These are really pretty and were a little expensive for plastic, but they ended up working. I had to put the glass back on, because when my daughter removed one of the glasses from her purse she broke it in 1 second... So yes, worth it, you get what u pay for. But i do recommend getting replacement pieces if these break.
Best way I've found to hold my pots on my granite counter. Sticks well by itself. Does have just two adhesive circles in one section.
Bought for my daughter at college. She tried a couple times, but did not care enough about her tea drinking process to continue using these.
This CD could be called anything in music. It does very well with dance music but even that is overrated.
Good product. Exactly what we needed for our new digital TV. Will order again when needed.

I bought these for my wife and she found they are really comfortable. The sound quality is also very good. One major problem though.... the bluetooth disconnects every once in a while. You need to reset your audio devices by holding down both buttons at the same time during pairing. This shouldn't happen. After one year of use, this still happens... but it always happens on re-set everytime. Not sure if it's an issue with our phones or not. A bit expensive as well.

I think its safe to say that with any of the books written by Stephen King you will get a piece of magic and horror at your fingertips as well as some great writing that can be hard to put down. But this book, not so much. This is one book where it was easy for me just to skip chapters. It did keep my attention... but there were more chapters in this read than actual story lines.
Very good product, easy to install, works great, I was able to get up high with no problem. Great product, thanks amazon for a great price and free shipping as well.

This is a good looking coffee maker but the lid did not seat properly and always tipped over when placed on top. It kept overflowing making one of many trips to clean up. There was no way that I could pour with out spilling coffee. Not recommended. Very messy. Bought a stainless steel pot at Walmart. Much better! Even though Mr. Coffee's coffee machine looks great it leaves much to be desired. The company should stick to marketing their own products.

I bought two of those for backups in the event that my phone ran out or would be dead and not charge it if they work good. If you are like me you want to make sure your backup batteries work, so when u don't have time or don't feel like carrying an extra charger around these cases will work. In other words they really come in handy! :) also just remember one case isn't guaranteed to fit all batteries. It can only go on back up battery.

I received the product on time but found it didn't really taste good to me. I wanted a substitute for my morning coffee so went thru two packages quickly trying different flavors and wasn't impressed. You might want try one box first as it's quite addictive. They also come in little pouches-not what I'd call pouches per say, just like instant coffee. If you're looking for something hot this probably won't do it, although it makes an okay afternoon drink if you put cream in it.

I really thought i was going to read a lot about the process and ideas of these "masters," but nothing is said about what they did. There must be another book on this subject or there are many details left out. So far, after two weeks following these suggestions i'm still waiting for results..... No help here.

I was told about this product by a nurse and have ordered it from Amazon. I've gotten tired of lugging home cases of water. This is so great! No carrying aroundthe entire case in your hands or having to lift heavy jugs or cases,plus you get hot water....what more could one ask for? :):) A very good invention that everyone needs on their shelf.

I was very disappointed because this book does not talk about the true spiritual truth of Christianity and Islam. It is a way forward to make money. And yes, it gives you an online code for getting $$ from Amazon. Do NOT, let me tell you: do NOT bother reading about Islam or religion in any book. This one takes up all pages with nothing good in them. One thing this author knows how to do, is: write long passages on subjects that will sell lots but have no value at all.
i do alot of outdoor stuff around the house and it works great for my needs and price its a good deal!!
I just had a baby. This book is very helpful and informative! The book was in great condition when i got it. Very pleased with my purchase! :)
If you are studying with Dr. Peterson, please take his classes.
I really liked the color. The construction was good, so i would suggest it, if you need a carrying case. Thank you.

The perfect solution for those who like to have an upright without the hassle of a bagless unit. Its very easy to use, and so simple it probably wont even occur your brain is doing anything but cleaning up after yourself. And if you are looking into a lot more than that, perhaps this should be next on yor list. It also works great! I was afraid that due to having just purchased such yet another hand-held vacuum, i would never be able do my stairs, no problem.

I bought this item two years ago when it was first released based on all the good reviews here but now that it's in 2011 and having already gotten tired of it. Don't buy it!There are several things about the product which make me regret getting rid of my original copy. The most fundamental one is how slow this turntable turns: you have to wait 20 seconds between songs, after a song even though your timer says 15 seconds, still nothing happens.

I have been really pleased with the Black & Decker Dustbuster since my mother purchased it several years ago because it's light enough for me to carry up and down flights of stairs without tiring out, but powerful enough that it goes a long distance until you need more power. The little dustpan nozzle is so flimsy that if you don't hold it just right it'll break off from underneath when using it. I've owned three of these over time. All started to fall apart within 2-3 months.

I wanted a cover to protect my Kindle HD from scratches and damage. The cover arrived quickly, snapped together just as the description indicated, & fits perfectly. This is not cheap junk, this looks like it will hold up for quite some time. After reading all of these negative reviews about how difficult putting everything back together, that's so annoying! It was easy when you realized there's 2 pieces, it's called RESET or "ON/OFF.
My family are fans of Johnny Depp, Tim Burton, Danny Elfman & Co.

A good story told badly, which is too bad because this could have been great. I felt the main character spent too much time complaining how hard her life is; she complains incessantly, and gets off on the fact that other people think she's whiny, insecure, bitchy, etc. But for me, that's not an appealing attribute to a young adult. As others have mentioned, this was published before the days of Kindle. The lack of maps made it all even worse.

Very handy for moving boxes or light weight. Be careful of the plastic tabs it has to hold its shape when in use. It may not be very strong that you may crack them if your too forceful. Easy assembly though. I just wish the handle was a little longer so you didn't have to bend as much at all. The only problem with the handles is where they attach into their holder. They seem like they'll come out at any time.

I have been using this case for the past couple of months and absolutely love it!! The fact that it has belt loops is a huge plus. There are two very important things you must be mindful while shopping through Amazon.com as part ofpurchasing things. One is, to make sure there will not be any imperfections; and, if so, please let me know by email (asaplee@netzero.com) immediately. Second, beware all third-party vendors who sell items on Amazon.com.
After reading this, you may wonder why anyone would read it.
This is a great machine but they do NOT recommend using only Epson's cartidges, unless you like paying big bucks down the street every time it stops working.

I am not sure why this case is rated so highly when it does not fit at all. It was very snug on my Macbook Pro Retina. The bottom part stuck up a bit. There were no issues for the top part. But the back of mine would slide forward and fall off. Maybe if you have one that fits without problem there wont be any problems. Just not mine. :( If you're looking for an actual case, don't buy this product, but do get another one.

As another reviewer mentioned, these are very nice looking glasses. They look fantastic in my cabinet. However, I don't think I'll be purchasing more of them. The glasses feel like they would easily shatter. I've dropped them, but that wasn't the reason for me to get rid of them -- someone was throwing out a plate and got glass all over it. If you're an office worker or have kids that will probably throw away your dishes, then this set might work great.

it was not quite what i expected when I bought it. But since it's inexpensive, it is good enough for our needs. If we were to buy this again, it might be worth getting, but probably wouldn't. It works okay, although the water spigot does not go down far enough. Not sure if others had issues with this, or have their well drilled, etc. so that may cause problems? For me - no big deal.

I liked the idea of a good looking and functional headset to use when listening to music or making calls. The sound quality is really great, but it doesn't fit comfortably -- the ear "stems" are too large for me (and my smaller size ears don't necessarily make these things fit better). And, this particular model, which should work on all standard bluetooth devices, won't reliably pair with them. After about two days use, some keys stopped working after being reprogrammed multiple times.
Bought it to replace our old comforter set. Nice quality and color. Just the right size for us. We love it!
My puppy loves these and they keep her busy for a long time. She is so much better than the bully sticks with all of that stuff!! :)

Great product...worked very well for my intended purpose in mounting a digital camera. It was easy to mount and I liked the ability to secure it securely by inserting an Allen wrench into the hole on top of each stud. In addition to using this product, we also used several of these under the deck at our vacation home. We could put both up with no issue whatsoever without any issue.
These are perfect.

I'm extremely satisfied with how much power this dual charger supplies. I have had multiple devices plugged in simultaneously on several occasions without any problems, including iPad chargers, cell phone batteries, Kindles, USB external disk drives, digital camera batteries etc. Great product. No complaints. Highly recommended.

I ordered these in 2 colors....blue and purple, both of which arrived defective. The right ear piece only functioned sporadically without any input from my phone at all. Amazon is sending me a replacement pair but the same problem with second pair. Very disappointed in this product for quality control, however they were pretty great when working right. Will give it one more shot before resubmitting review. Don't buy unless you want to waste time trying out multiple pairs.
While these looked good in picture, they were just too small for my purpose. They would work if I don't know what size glass I was making.

So the first of these that I received from Amazon was defective. When pressed down all four edges of the screen were slightly bowed. That meant it wouldn't lay flat at all. To replace it, they charged me $4.98 plus the cost to ship them back. The second one looks perfect now. But you do have to get your finger just right on a tiny point and press down... It's not like those cheap $3 ones you can buy in bulk at Wal-Mart.

I have an old model which was getting rusty to touch, and it worked good but i wanted a new one that works even better because of the grates going in both directions-no more hot spots and my food is cooked perfectly. Thanks so much Kitchen Aid for finally making this awesome improvement on this great product. Amazon did its usual outstanding service too with delivery at regular times also. This product does exactly what every other review on it says about it.

Good product. Doesn't slide around on the dash, even with road salt and other stuff building up in it. Only gripe is that it can easily be folded flat, but doesn't seem to fold flat very well. However, this only results when I don't use suction cups, so it's really not much of a problem. It still works for me regardless. Also worth noting that since all suction cups have some friction to them, any time you press down to put it away, you'll get more friction.

I love this product--it works much better than the liquid detergent we were using. Our clothes are clean, and they smell clean. The package also arrived in good condition--less than a week from ordering.
Not sure why everyone is so impressed by Breaking Dawn. I'm halfway thru it, don't know if I'll ever finish it.

There is no reason to recommend this. Its the same old crap that was in The Power and Light for so many years, there is a new and improved version called Beyond The Power. This is not worth it unless you are into recycled information, which I am. My son had this one as well. When he got it, the CD inside was missing all of its pages. You would think if someone put out such an outdated book they wouldn't have made a few mistakes with it.
Very nice product. Comes in two parts. One part fit like charm. So far holding up well. Only 2 of us will have these installed.

This coffee pot is really nice to look at but when you pour a first brew, the lid spills all over your kitchen counter and floor. The top opens up on it's own but never comes fully off. It also gets hard in there for some reason. I'm waiting for my third one to break already. They were great while they lasted, wish we'd been able to get more life out of them.

I like many of the other pieces in this collection. There are two major flaws here. First, The book is badly designed, with a photo on page 26 that appears to be cropped and printed out too wide, and then there are pages 7 & 8 where all photographs from either picture section appear sideways. Second, despite what the product description states, none of these pictures show you how to actually work out the exercises. Instead, they refer you back for more information.

We purchased this unit to use with an HDMI splitter and optical audio converter on the TV. Unfortunately, the sound kept cutting out for about a second after pausing or skipping during DVDs. It also wouldn't turn back on after being off-switch due to faulty battery. So we sent it back. Unfortunately Amazon is not refunding my shipping charges. A shame too as it's really one of the best choices available. We're going shopping today. :-(

I love this product. It was perfect and the price is right. My wife bought it for me because her old one broke. She loved my present. So we ordered another one. First of all they lost it. In half a day from order. Not sure if some UPS person misplaced it, or who shipped it over here. They send another. When she opened it up to put in her purse it already had something stuck inside the battery area. Well you get what you pay for.

I was very disappointed with these shoes. I only wore them one time and found it uncomfortable to walk in such a flimsy shoe. The material is quite thin too the point that my ankles were sore after wearing them for almost an hour. Very disappointing. No support. Looks cheap, but that's what you get when you buy shoes over amazon. You are wasting your money. But if you're looking for a cheap pair of sandals or flats like i was, then this may be a good buy.

My wife wanted a small size rice cooker that wouldn't make too much noise. This one is okay, she would say "OK," so can't complain about it. Cooks white or brown rice, but not for long periods of time. No timer to let you know when it's done. The inner pot with the lid doesn't get hot enough and my guess from reading other reviews on this site are it will over time rust out. If they include that, then it'd be perfect.
These are made with all plastic materials, including wiring.

A waste of time. There is no depth here whatsoever. Just two people talking about some guy who makes them rich. Save your money. Listen on youtube for free. This dude cannot play. His "book" might also be an old article in Guitar magazine.

There is no real meat or substance in these 2 books. It seemed like some people had taken bits from other books and cobbled them together in an attempt for a novel. At first it looked good, but as u progress there seems to be more fluff.

One can argue it's probably just as well-intentioned, that the characters in this movie are so unrealistic and cartoonish you won't even care. That's certainly true if you're a young teen whose parents can't take him for granted, but with my wife, who is close to 20 years older than me she wasn't bothered by that aspect at all. She thought it was ridiculous but we were laughing anyway. Overall, worth watching, maybe more entertaining if you've watched enough sports talk shows recently.

I could not get it set up because the printer did NOT recognize my computer. I got an email telling me how to fix it. That solution is beyond me. Since I just got this today, can't really say right now if it's a good product or not. But since I've spent so much time installing and troubleshooting software in the past, I'm pretty angry that no one took care of me. If you buy this, be sure your computer will let you use this. Good luck with that.

I really wanted this case and received it as a gift. After 2 months of light use, the stitching is already fraying. The "leather" look is just for show. There are two problems with it. First off, if you have ANY credit cards, business cards or any other kind of hard material in your pocket, those don't go anywhere unless they put them in first.

Took as prescribed for 3 months followed instructions exactly but felt zero results. Don't waste your money. Save up money you need to spend it. Did not lose any of the pounds that were intended after taking the pills.

These towels are fine but I was expecting something a bit thicker, like terry cloth. They also shed A LOT, which isn't ideal for the bathroom. I'd only use these in my bathroom and not really ever put them on someone's face. In general, however, they do an excellent job protecting your skin while drying yourself off. The absorbency is good - if you can get over that issue.

This is a very low quality product. The first time I turned it on the back of the door popped off, and then broke completely off! That doesn't affect its function, but it's poor quality. Very disappointing. :(
This stuff makes you hair feel and look great even after one day. Definitely recommend this for men who still have beards! Also recommended other Gillette products as well.
This movie is a good action movie. I didn't like it as much as the first two. But if you liked all of the other ones, you'll probably love this one too.

This case is sturdy, well made, and has been very effective protection for my Kindle. As others have said, it adds noticeable weight, but that was to be expected in a protective case. The added thickness makes it easier to hold, which I think means more security. I love how the front cover folds completely back if you aren't using the keyboard - this really prevents smudges or scratches. Would highly recommend it! Also, can't beat the price.

The book did not cover the items that I wanted to find out. Only used it to read of many others. Did you expect a complete history in one book? A little disappointed. Will take some more time to research other books. Also only rated two star just because had to use it. Not looking for anything at this time.

The author writes very well and the story keeps you reading to find out what happens next. But there is a lot of graphic violence including blood splattered on cars bodies in a scene that I won't spoil for you! A decent mystery but not my favorite Koontz novel. It's like he had some great ideas about a sequel but couldn't think how it all was going to workout. Would have really liked one where everything worked out, i.e.
Great little rc helicopter.

Just wanted to give other cat haters like I do a piece of mind. My cats are all very active and play rough; but they don't leave the house much- just wander up to be petted. Well, this little thing broke after only 2 weeks when my 10 week old kitten got a bite in it. Don't bother with it! It looks so cute, but apparently those days aren't long for kittens. :( I was surprised because it looked pretty sturdy.

I got this so my girls could brush their own teeth when the mom wasn't home. It fits nicely in a standard kitchen sink, which I put it in. Their 2 year old mouth was clean after one use, and since then we've used just water in there instead. Easy to clean, simple design, well made. They can easily hold the toothbrushes in front of them while brushing. My kids don't mind not getting dirty teeth because they are "pretty cool." Well worth it.

This is a beautiful cover. Very elegant. Goes great with my Vera Bradley purse I purchased at the same time. Nice quality. Fast shipment. Well packaged. Just what I wanted. Thank you. Amazon was good to buy from.

If you're in the market to buy a new tablet then I definitely recommend this case. It is light weight and offers good protection for your pad. It's slim profile means you can easily place it anywhere without worrying about scratching or marring it. The material provides grip so it's easier when using as a stand but will slide off flat surfaces. You don't have many options when it comes to cases although that could depend on what you've got to keep secure.
I really wanted to love these but after a month I'm pretty sure they are going back and just get the plastic ones.
It charges my phone in a short time! It works just like it's supposed to! Great quality product, thank you guys! :)
Do NOT waste your money on these speakers. They break all too easily while trying to disassemble them without breaking off components. No sound quality at all.

When you get this case they send 3 pieces of the front & back together..so when i put them on...one was always coming out and had a gap on top. So no matter how hard I tried to place it, 1 piece would fall off or just slide off. NOT VERY HAPPY with it...

It was really helpful with the history about the people of England and their beliefs but it should be longer. I had to work hard just finishing a single chapter not several! Thanks for writing this book though!

This is a cute case. It's well put together and I've had no problems yet in regards to durability. The material of this case seems very durable since I'd rather get on my bed every night than deal with an ugly otterbox. It looks great too.

As the picture on Amazon shows and as this product description describes it is a case with 2 hard shell pieces - one black piece that covers both the back (white) and also a rubber cover with opening in it.. Well it came complete with no openings for those pieces. I called Tech Armor on 11/23 to return it. After many email exchanges, two calls from their reps, they still had none of what was shown in the picture. This is deceptive advertising. Now I'm going after them.

A friend of mine gave me a used Sony RDR-GX7 after years and she really enjoyed it. However when I got it home from her, the player worked perfectly out of the box. It then began to have problems with skipping. After talking to her about it, we decided that the problem was in her player. Then another friend, also an authorized dealer, came over to make sure everything on my end was working.

This book was a good read,I didn't like that it started off slow. The way the author introduced all the characters, each had their own personalities but together they seemed to just blend together. All in all, not one of her best. It does have some funny moments.

I read somewhere that this book is best used with a magnifying glass and was able to do so much better! Waste of money now if it can be returned. Never got through the entire thing!!! Glad nothing happened in my life.....thanks AMAZON!

I purchased the Cuisinart DCC-1100-watt food processor in June 2006 to replace my older Braun with 7 cup capacity. For a long time now I've been looking at Kitchen Aid and other brands. What caught your interest is this model's ability to "mulch" vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, etc., using blades that turn on when you put them on, then automatically shut down after five seconds of continuous running.
It was so bad I got bored reading it.
I bought it as a gift to my cousin and she loved it. Good quality material too. It does make the ipad bigger than before. Overall, I'm pleased with purchase! =)

This was a Christmas gift from my son for my wife - I had used it some with good results. However, on the first use, it started smoking and smelled bad in short order. We have always taken adequate precautions since using an all ceramic cooktop before, but we did follow directions exactly until each time we opened it. After this time, it will not work at all. It is not worth sending back to Amazon, even though they gave us credit (thanks, Amazon!).

I have a dog who is not very smart, but she has been trained well. She's also an older dog. This collar works great to train her. I've actually tried it on myself & was able to do just what they said to do. After about 15 minutes training my dog, we would turn around and go away again. So if you think you're going out in the woods with your dog without them knowing that there is someone right beside them, this will probably work.

Don't know if we got a bad batch or what, but it barely worked and didn't even last 30 minutes. We bought one from Target for $20, which is far better - that thing works great! Too bad, the price on Amazon just isn't very competitive anymore! If anyone knows of similar quality toys with more than 6 months life expectancy I'd love to hear about them!

Great little machine, does the job. Had an issue where it died a few months after purchase; seller promptly sent out replacement part and was very courteous. Very quiet when working with no heat. Perfect size for my small apartment. I would definitely recommend this to those who want one that works.

We are very pleased with this new toaster oven. It looks great on our counter and works exactly as a good standard oven should. We were not disappointed, it toasts evenly across the bread, bagels, muffin etc. It's big enough to hold lots of food or bread for two people so we don't have to get up every time we want toast again. This is an all stainless steel construction which makes clean up easy and fast.

I bought this machine for a family member and she absolutely loves it! The only negative is that we ordered two sets of coffee pods so that the coffee would last longer. It has been over two weeks since our order arrived and it was not here yet! That little bit of extra time does make such a difference.! Thank you Amazon Prime! They are definitely a staple now but if they come fast - keep your mouth shut!Update. We got our machine.

I had to purchase these for my son's birthday. The only disappointing part is that after a couple washings, they all started falling apart and getting fuzzy. They are still in good shape, it was just the material not holding up. For $10 per pair, I'd say this set of sheets will have you through one season minimum.
I bought this for a friend and was not able to connect it using my laptop so I'm going with out this. :( It sucks
This is a nice looking case and I like the extra battery charging slot for one battery. It has enough space inside to hold one battery with two cards in the zippered compartment.

I am happy with this product after receiving it. It is nice to have all the essentials in one place without spending a bundle on some overpriced kit. The price for such a quality kit makes it more than worth it, and you won't even be able to put many of these accessories back into your purse or pocket because they will quickly get lost if used too often. It's also hard not to take pictures while doing something else so using an extra battery and/or memory card isn't necessary for me.
i dont recoment at all, its horrible the color or the quality of this product it doesn't even deserve a star!!!!
After receiving the product, it was only able to download a few songs (didn't see any where on site that said I couldn't share downloads), so really it isn't worth it.

This was a great idea that needed to be fleshed out more. I hope the concept goes on further. A little slow and somewhat predictable. No fault of the book as it is good but some better character development would help. Too fast too. Glad I didn't pay for it. Thank Amazon Prime lending library :-)

This book is full of errors and outdated information. For example, on page 45 the word "puffle" refers to a specific fabric but in all caps, whereas "purl" should be used instead. The instructions for making baby blankets are completely out of date, having been published by Goodwill, not Eeyore. Some suggestions include using your fingers as a blanket, which was never accepted when I got married over twenty years ago.
They look nice but they actually hurt my ears. I'm hoping that they soften up so I can use them. It's been 4 months, nothing has improved.

I received the product today and couldn't wait to try it out. The installation CD didn't work. But that was OK, because using a USB flash drive gave me an option of putting another disc in instead! When you put another disc, however, nothing happens. It just says "cannot read disk". This happened on two different PCs. And no, my discs are not damaged or scratched. So I'm afraid mine is defective.
Love my otter for all the tough jobs I need a sturdy product that is not cheap and it was very pretty when on my phone! :) love the colors too!!! fast shipment! would order again!!!!

The case looks good and is well made. However the phone fits in tight at first but eventually becomes loose fitting. I've decided it's worth it for the look. I haven't dropped my phone yet hopefully never will. It's just too much protection and weight. Would recommend this over cases with more built in. And I may buy another colors later. But maybe not as soon. Not sure yet.

We bought two of these for our new cat and kitten in the house. They fit neatly into a closet we have built out on wheels, are very sturdy, they do their job, they're inexpensive, and, though I was concerned about what might happen to our cats' feet, it seems that that's not been an issue at all. Our cats did get tangled once, but with gentle play around my house, she's fine now. Highly recommended.

This works perfectly since I have two large dogs that share the same bathroom. We used to clean our dog's paws daily until we found this product. My only issue is with how you are supposed to use and clean. There should be a hook in front of your toilet so instead it's on top just like some other products are. Would work great for small bathrooms because if a dog isn't there it doesn't waste as much.

I purchased a black case for my new white iPhone 5c, and was very disappointed to discover that once it is in it, there are little openings that allow any dust or particles trapped inside the case, so you have this constant need to wipe down your phone several times. The top part of the opening also becomes stretched out somewhat after time and, therefore, slips off, leaving gaps around both ends which don't quite snap closed.

After one month of use, it stopped working....Do not waste your money on this poorly made product, the customer service is aweful and the product sucks also. The seller even refused to refund my money, which was an insult they should have at least given me a credit for the unused product. DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF WEIGHTLESS. I would give it zero stars if i could. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!! YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED! 
 Rating: 1.

The book is written well and covers the basics well. Most of this guide can be used to find info online or in many other places that will give you more information than what you'll get from this book. It does however tend towards being less detailed on some things. I've been doing alot of research lately with my family genealogy, so I do have access most of these things, but for someone like me who just wants basic history about people they know very well it's not quite enough.

I agree with many of the other reviews on this book. What a pity - there was quite an original plot. And I had heard about it from friends whose work I've read. Unfortunately, none of my three girls enjoyed it. One has no experience in writing, neither for TV nor novels. But I have written several books myself, and while some would say that just shows I'm talented, it's also not very interesting. If you enjoy writing by yourself or with friends, try something else. This is too simplistic.
We love sci fi thrillers. But why would anyone write a script like this.
These are not good ear protectors I have used foam ones that cost half as much and were better then these waste of money.

This product is cheaply made. I don't expect it to last long. But for the price I'll not worry about it. I bought a cheaper one at walmart that has lasted me 3 years with no problems. You get what you pay for. Save your money. :)
We love the "little people" stuff for when we have people over. These figures are great and they make a nice addition to our collection.

We used this for years until it broke. I don't know about the other reviewers, but my original didn't last much less than 6 years. So when that one broke we decided to buy a new one. It worked ok except they have made things so cheap these days with plastic parts (the cover and power cable got torn up in two months).Then after 4 months of very light use it died. And now I'm stuck trying to figure out how to dispose of it.

The product is not as pictured at all. I would never have purchased this unless it had been described accurately for me. Please change the picture so people know exactly what they are buying. If anyone does contact me with a better photo of the product, i will be happy to give them mine.

Although the writing style is enjoyable, and for those who appreciate classic literature. The characters were unloving/mean people with no redeeming qualities. this movie was horrible and i would not recommend it. dont waste your money on it, the sex and violence wasnt even funny at all it just made you want to kill yourself, because it makes no sense with how things are put together, if a guy can have 3 girls and sleep around them what kind of woman falls for that same old thing?! he wouldve been better off killing her before she turned him over to his other women.

You can definitely tell a difference in the taste of your drinks. If you put something that has no flavor, like water or coffee, into this tumbler it will taste terrible. To me that's not an issue since I'm so used to drinking plain water. It's just amazing how much dirt and other junk is sucked out into my water. After two weeks I also started making sure every day was full before filling up my tumbler, but even then there's really less debris getting lost when taking care for the container.

The book is not what I expected. You have to think outside the box with these recipes and then some of them are very unusual. If you want authentic New England comfort cuisine this will be great for you. For a cook that wants more challenging fare, try another book. I'm going to find her next. She has excellent credentials. Try this one before buying it. There are plenty out there much better. Also, if the photos of most dishes had captions about how they came about, it would make reading easier.
My husband uses this when he is feeling homesick, and helps him get on with his life again.

If you don't own the soundtrack this is a very good buy. I would definitly suggest to get that album first though. This only just touches upon certain parts of teh film and can be kind boring. It didn't catch my attention enough though.~The Kid

I'm sure you can find more accurate books out there but for someone who already knows how to calculate these things it may be too basic. Not bad though if you're just trying to get ready in college math courses. I wouldn't recommend spending the amount of money on this book. You will do better buying a used copy somewhere else. If it were less expensive and had fewer pages it'd b okay. My husband paid over $40 from another book store so he figured I'd at least enjoy it.

The product description clearly says these will work with an RX680 or a 550EX II flash for the Canon 5d3, but there is no way that they will. They are not correct. You don't attach them and slide on their little retaining clips, you stick 'em on!It's like putting stickers on something then slapping it down. I was so disappointed in this. Now to start over from square one I have to find another adapter, which will also cost more money.

This book is a terrible rip-off and completely unauthorized. The cover shows a lot of cool old photos - it should have been changed to one that has some images in there. Also, the quality of writing isn't very good. I'm surprised Penguin didn't ask for more money from this poor knock-off author.

This item fits easily inside a small lunch box - just not able to put larger accessories in it. My granddaughter loves it, now having more things to do outside after school. We got this during winter so the items stayed cool long enough.
Love this for my yorkie and she loves to sleep in it. A must have for any small dog. It's like having her own little room.

I was very happy to find this at Amazon, but the quality is unacceptable. When received, one of the lights did not work. But even worse, no longer works after two weeks and light on second set only lasted 1 week. Very disappointing! Should have gone with another brand; don't waste your money buying from a vendor who advertises as "Duracell High Performance." Buy name brand replacements instead!

This was a great book. Enjoyed having so many characters in this one too. There were twist after turn but well written enough that you wanted to keep reading until the end. Would definitely recommend, would recommend again in a hearbeat! Enjoy   Rating: 4.

My biggest complaint about this product is that the cover is actually too small for our Kindle. The leather doesn't reach all of the edges by a little bit. Also, the interior pocket zippered part sticks up when you try to place anything in there -- it keeps hanging back from the inside cover. It's definitely not worth $100. This one works fine. I just wish Amazon would make more choices with their covers, as far as what size they make.

This book was more like an article in the local paper than a book. I have always been intrigued about how the Nazis came up with some of their horrible ideas and this is just that...an article. It wasn't well written or researched. The author simply repeated common information over and over...I would not recommend it.

I don't know if this is common with adapters or not, but here you are talking about a brand new adapter, plugging it in and all of a sudden NOTHING WORKS. The light flashes, the laptop gives an error message, nothing. And since it's not worth spending shipping charges just to ship back (and at that point, what refund do they offer since your card wasn't charged correctly?) so instead I lost a couple bucks, now what? A better adapter would cost more on ebay than these did.

I have 2 cats and they both love this.. I bought the large since they are both around 11 years old. They take turns using the scratch pad but they aren't big on it..so if you do buy one definitely get a larger one. :) The little pads can be emptied easily too. It's still working well. Still like new after 3 months. Very worth it!

My wife had used an identical set from a local store for years to keep her tea warm. So she said it would be great if we found them again as they were not made anymore. However, she does like these cups.

This product was very low quality, and the " I love it...I'll never return it - we have to use these for school work..they were falling apart as soon as you took them out of the package. There had been no packing materials around them. Save your money on these! You're better off going through a classroom supply store for quality pencils. You can get at least ten times more bang FOR THE BUCK this way! We ended up buying pencils elsewhere.

These are probably the best tasting of all the jerky treats I have tried. My cats go absolutely crazy for them. They have one a day and love them! If you ever want to get your cat addicted these will keep her happy even when not eating them. Thanks Amazon and Thanks!!! Great product thank you.
Very good concept, bad execution. The top is held onto by metal rods on all sides, so it's extremely hard to twist off when you're done.

Do not buy this cd. The only good thing about it is the price. I am a fan of old 80's rock and roll, but these songs make me cringe. They have no soul or heart, they suck all you think are great lyrics in to "songs" for easy listening only.

We bought two of this brand 2 years ago and both stopped working in less than a year. This was a disappointment. I am very surprised that it worked well for only 6 months which is the warranty period. The others still work. Our experience with their customer service is another matter. They did not care much about my experience. A waste of $$ to purchase these types of products. It seems after all the bad reviews, they had few unhappy customers.
Very easy on your eyes, reduces glare from overhead lights, protects your IPAD, keeps finger prints off as well with no residue, comes in variety of sizes to fit any device.
This phone case has broken twice now and you can tell from just looking at it. Plus after trying to take off the back (which is very flimsy) once more my phone snapped in two.

You are an artist, a great artist who has inspired many other artists over the last 30 years. This book is nothing more than pictures with little text.
