The case works well on my iPhone 5. However when trying to use screen protector from Zagg which gives protection around home button, the phone pushes down making all buttons unusable. I tried for a few days and finally gave up. May return it.
I love these portable speakers.

This product is amazing. The best I have ever purchased. My hair is very thick and curly with a lot of layers so shampoo can really strip my hair. Not this product. It leaves your curls soft without the feeling like its weighed down or that you need to wash a lot. Makes my hair feel clean not stripped by conditioner which I also use but it did make me break out in pimples while using it. Good product!!

Pros: The price was right and it arrived on time. Cons: Some small scratches but hardly noticeable given it's very low priceAlso, I had high hopes that this would protect my screen from all the little pieces of stuff flying into it, i.e. dust, hair stuff, etc. What did not happen, however, was protection. Yes, at least mine wasn't scratched up.

This is not the very first time I've ordered these. They are an OEM cartridge with no obvious difference from store bought versions except for packaging. The copies seem close enough when printing out documents.

I'm no good at describing things, but one can't go wrong here! Easy set up (just plug in!), easy instructions (printed in plain English), worked on the first try. I didn't have any troubles with my printer recognizing them, either. They appear well made. Great deal! Oh, also -- they arrived very quickly.

I am a big fan of Anne Rice's but this is my least favorite book by her. It didn't seem real. If you are looking for vampires that sparkle, dance, and fight then read Twilight. I'm more interested in vampiric things like the night hunters, The Night Watch, or even vampire books about people with superpowers. This was too real to me. Vampires who walk around acting all cool with their piercings & tattoos would never be on TV or on magazine covers.

This thing gets so hot you can't even use it. It melts plastic on top that holds it together. I've never seen something like this before being sold at any store. I'm disappointed. It's pretty though. Wish I'd bought the stainless steel version. At least those will not melt off or break.

The battery was much bigger than the old one which caused problems. It would not snap in. My husband went to Radio Shack and purchased a cheaper replacement that did. We paid $80.00 for it. So, we returned it because of what I think is poor service.

I bought this to replace another brand of wireless router that did not have range. This model is much better than the previous one. It set up easily and has had no problem since. Great buy for a good price.

Bought two of these to complete a set we already had. These do keep wine cooler longer in standard glass containers, however, condensation builds up inside and gets very unpleasant before you drink from them. They will fit under an open cabinet door if that's all that is available within reach, but it's best suited for outdoor use.

This product is a joke! The quality of this product, even with all the extra features and software, looks like it was created in someone's basement. I sent it back right away. What makes me suspicious though is that I'm not the only one who has received defective products from Amazon. When you consider how much these players cost, they should work correctly. My wife purchased the player for me, so we could see movies on trips. From what I've seen, everything works great, as long as you're lucky.

This book was a disappointment. In my opinion, the author did not make you feel any emotion whatsoever. If I didn't care about this family at all, then why should I?! It seems to me it may have gotten more interesting and suspenseful when we learned how much the father & son had in common. Even then, I think there's still too many questions left unanswered. After finishing it, I'm just disappointed. :o(
This is my first iTouch case, and compared to some I've looked at, it's pretty good.
The peppermint flavor is pretty strong, while the rose smells really soapy. This stuff made me cringe the few times I've used it.

This movie is a great example of how much work has gone into making a good sci-fi picture. It's well acted and directed, has interesting story lines, and an ending that comes out very differently from the original novel. Unfortunately there's nothing special about this DVD; it seems to have been copied rather than transferred onto DVD. The visual quality and audio seem like copies made on someone's computer which then were edited down so they could fit more footage.
This battery works for about 1 hour max. I guess you get what you pay for. Will continue my hunt for another battery. You will not replace this dead one until you find another.

I've been an avid fan of the John Rain series ever since I first read the introduction in 1984. Since then they have become a mainstay of genre novels from my favorite author to one that might be considered better than all but one. The story was weak at best.. The characters were dull and predictable and had minimal depth. And though it took us back through time, we didn't really get close enough for me with just a single character to "feel" their emotions.
This device is very hard to use.
It was easy to install and works fine. However, it doesn't really get very hot. For the price, I don't think there's any better option.

I bought this to make home made pizzelles. It makes the best ones i have ever made. And they come out of the machine very easily with a nice crust. This is no small task. The dough doesn't stick. You just wipe off the bowl after making your pizzelles and you don't even need oil. It's so easy. Also, once you've used it maybe once, it's easy enough that you'll forget about it. For me, this item has really saved me from constantly shelling my dough.
This is such an easy game and you can still compete despite it taking place on your iPad, which makes everyone more entertained.

I love the concept of this book! It's great to have one place for everything about your dog. It is really pretty but it doesn't include pictures or any info on every animal. this is a really cute little thing if you want to spice up your kitchen. it will turn any basic knife sharper than ever. i'm using mine for opening packages of dog treats. the other reviewers are right about being able squeeze it, but I don't find that it's difficult at all. i prefer cutting veggies or fruits with a larger slicing board over this. my only issue here is that some of them tend to tear after the blade doesn't quite go through all parts when cutting.

This does not support my ipad as stated. The angle is very narrow and a little unstable to work at, I cannot use it at all. And the price doesn't make up for how much this table costs me in aggravation. I'm really disappointed with it.

I could not even come close to enjoying this book. The characters were all undeveloped and uninteresting. If you are into a good mystery, or just don't care about plot development then perhaps the book will be okay. It was not. There only two things that kept me reading it for at most 150 pages each. 1. How can one guy write so many words in such a short time. 2. Why didn't he leave his wife alone by himself. Even on holidays she is always home with him.

I love my new Kindle. It works great. I'm in the military and it just fits in a purse. The picture is great. However, you have to be carefull putting your Kindle in. My kindle went up on it's own from inside of it, not sure why.... But now when i want this case to close all that i do is pull hard enough for them both to go inside. This won't happen again.....

If you enjoy watching actors try a different voice to speak in an entirely new character role, then this is the book for you. The main character, who I could only guess was supposed to be 13 or 14, had all kinds of "problems" and at least one suicide attempt - not exactly my idea of being able "to fit in." Very immature for any young adult reader. I know many people like reading romance novels, but I'm not sure if I'd call it YA because there wasn't much romance.
So far we love this item. My lab loves being outside more.

The title is misleading. I expected a book about the life and times of King Richard III, and instead was disappointed. It is basically about how he lived his adult years with his wife and son. If this had been in the public domain from its original publication, it would have garnered another star. For me, though, while there were some valuable nuggets to be found throughout, when describing Richard's relationship with Edward III that added much more detail than what I'd expected, they weren't enough to make any kind of lasting impression.

I do have to state - My wife loves the way this thing looks, however it does get really hot and gets rather heavy when using it. The other issue is that, as others mentioned, there are plastic guides that hold down both of the metal halves together. Mine snapped during it's second use. One more annoying thing. There appear not be a lot of replacement parts available from Amazon at all. It would seem for about $30, all I'd need in case was an electric screwdriver and some nuts etc.

I bought it because it's one of the things that comes up when someone says "you don't have to pay an exorbitant amount for pet shampoo, especially on Amazon!" Well, I wish I'd paid more. I got this book to give me some insight as far back to the past the early time frame and where some of these people came from. These were purchased to replace a broken power adapter. When plugged in they don't even blink an LED. Completely useless. If this happened once, wouldn't be worth returning, but more than one time seems to mean something isn't right. Will never go through CyberGuys again.

It's a very good product and I would love to replace it with this one in the future. I use my Kindle every day so why waste an ink cartridge when there is another option out there. It holds more prints than the OEM cartridge. Just don't drop it, make sure that it's firmly clamped down after inserting it. Be careful of the paper coming out. When you get about half way through, just click on your lock button for a solid fit. Great Product!

I bought this item for my husband who is a big Yankee fan. He loved it, but 2 months later the emblem fell off. We tried to glue it back on, and never got around to trying that. It has since fallen off again. The one on his other car lasted over 18 months. So unless you are willing to wait until maybe another year, save your money.

I bought this album after it came out expecting that I was going to fall in love with it. And for the most part I did. However then something seemed different. But you gotta admit this is a very good band so its only fair that they try new things. This however doesn't mean that all of their music must sound exactly alike if they're trying different things such as that.

I've been an Amazon shopper for years. Have always paid the higher price of products in order to avoid their competitors. Recently I have noticed that there are not many sellers on Amazon. My previous purchase was a similar product from Amazon. They no longer carry it. It worked so well, I immediately ordered another. I'm very pleased with this item. The product arrived when promised, and seems well made. Now my cat has more room than before. He is enjoying his litter box now. Thanks, Amazon, for carrying such quality items.

I ordered these on 11/22/12 and received them within two days of placing my order. Upon opening the bottles they looked like oil had spilled everywhere. This was not disclosed in the product description or as an indication that the bottle contents may be somewhat contaminated. We placed a simple order to test out some new items for her family but once received, we found several very poor quality. There were one type which smelled funny ( like kerosene ) others seemed unrecognizable.

This set was a good bargain. Not the best quality, but you paid for what I think were really cheap ones in the past. They work well on all things from grilling to veggie stir-fry cooking. The spatuls might be small, so just keep that in mind.

Nice book, the only thing I didn't like about it was that each time a new topic came up throughout the first 30 pages or so we learned more than needed and it wasn't very interesting. It also gets a little boring around page 100 but does pick up. If you think you're going to take pictures of every bird in a local neighborhood, buy several books on your own first, this book is an okay one for that.

They were all just so much bull. It made no sense. I felt sorry for those kids because i could relate. I think that this DVD would probably interest kids and older people who are interested in UFOs. This is the best soap ever for my baby's skin. It cleans his skin and leaves it moisturized, even when he gets dried out. It's not expensive compared to many stores so I don't have to buy as often. Also, being an organic product, there are no harmful ingredients in this soap. Highly recommended. In fact, it's been a very good purchase - great price (cheaper than Walmart), large size, and fast shipment.

The book itself was a good read. A very compelling story...but I expected more about the actual bombing and why. It kind of just ended there. Not that it shouldn't have been told. No more words needed. Well, that sums everything we know already.
Well, I was really excited about this, especially after trying the ones that are only $15 bucks. But they charge $8.

I like the style just wish there was a bigger selection. There wasn't any large enough for my needs but it worked okay. The size would have been perfect if they offered.

This was a very informative book. I learned things about this person that i did not know. the only problem is it got boring. The book goes at great lengths to keep you reading. Other than that, I enjoyed it.
They are very comfortable. My feet don't hurt wearing them. I got them for the beach and hiking too. Love them!

This product works better for bigger seeds which is exactly what I need it for; my cat needs smaller ones like baby peppers. It seems almost useless with small seeds because the suction cup just wont hold. If it's supposed to be that great, I'd think they would have come up with a better idea. I'll try putting a bit of soap inside and see how that goes, but so far, not impressive.

Bought this as a replacement to an aging OEM lamp in my Mitsubishi DLP TV. After installing the new one with no problems and turning it on, I was disappointed by how much light was reflected back into my eyes. Maybe there would have been enough light on the screen - but instead what I saw looked like sunlight reflecting off of dusty streetlights (yes, I live in San Francisco).Anyway, Amazon exchanged it. Hopefully, next time I'll get what should be included in most units from now on.

Although I am still getting the hang of this game, it has become addicting, especially if you like playing online multiplayer games. This game is fun to play alone, without being involved with others, because there are no complicated moves, just get into position and wait for a perfect strike. It was worth buying since some friends can join in on the fun. Just be aware that only two players can play.

My son received this toy for a gift, from his grandpa as he was getting married in February. I would say it will work on any kid 4 and up with no trouble. If you have a little help, they are just fine. This gun is great, my nephew loved it. It requires a lot of batteries, which isn't too bad, but the big thing is, these batteries tend to leak out. You should keep them out of reach when not using it. It shoots pretty far too.

I recently purchased the book to understand what an Internet website is all about. In a couple weeks, i will be getting started on learning how to make money with the internet. The book seemed very interesting and gave me some good information. A few things were missing, ie. why would anybody pay $8 dollars for 15 minutes worth of information? What if i'm just buying it because they want to?? I'm glad i didn't spend much money, but now have more than enough information to start making money.

One of the batteries would not hold a charge. At all. Would make a loud whirring noise and then shut off. Could be something I did, but I'm pretty sure it's just crappy quality control. I've since ordered another brand from amazon that actually charges in my Sony camera. These aren't all that great anyway, unless you have super high standards for battery life. Not worth bothering with.

I love the way this movie came out but am disappointed it does not play on my dvd player. It will however play through a PS3. This sucks because that's one reason i ordered it. What do you guys have to say about this? When will they bring up these issues with their releases? Or even send an email regarding this. The package contains three of these as shown in the picture and one is not included (which can be easily remedied). Very useful for keeping your items fresh. I store dry food pellets (canned or fresh tuna) that are a little over 1/4 cup to prevent getting them stale from time to time. They also work great if you fill it with rice cereal.
This was really not worth my time and money. It made for a good coaster though! I wouldn't waste your time. Just wasn't what I'd expect from such an acclaimed author.

What I really like about this unit is that it has individual buttons for each item under power. My husband was annoyed when he could not just turn on everything or only one light switch without going through 3 levels of the control panel. This remote allows him to do all in one. this lock does not offer you an option how many coins are inside. It keeps telling me there are 3 coins. What do i do now? Thanks for nothing. The item description should be more helpful. A 0 * rating.
Worked great until about six weeks ago.
Loved it. Very good quality. Arrived quickly. Only complaint is its hard to put on comforter. Must be careful when pulling at edges.

Got this phone for my mother and it worked fine for about a month. My mom called her brother with the old phone from AT&T; and then put in an order to replace their wireless router. Since he doesn't have internet I was forced to go through the hassle of retrieving his phone book. When I got on line there were still no numbers anywhere on the phone.

For what this was worth I was not blown away by this. My kids liked playing with them, and the case is nice. But for a little more money, in my opinion, you can get something that will last longer! The first one they got lasted less than two hours. Both of mine are now broken and only work when wiggled just right. They were not dropped, stepped on, dropped all over, or left unsupervised. You would need better quality control on these.

I have had my camera for a year and half now, but only used it twice in the first 5 months. If we take pictures right after shooting video with it, it's like they're still on video. The picture quality is great when taken outdoors. However, indoor photos often turn out blurry or are grainy. It's also very hard to use underwater. This would be fine if this were an exception, but it's not. I'd advise you pay more money next time before getting this.

I bought this book after hearing several good reviews from friends and the local library. I'm glad that they decided on a title at all. The only reason that it received 3 stars was because of my interest in how to get rich doing what the authors suggest. It is nice to have such advice so I didn't regret buying and reading it. They are correct when saying "no matter where you live, you'll find an abundance of things to do." However, there were some major downsides with me.

I had bought these for my husband this past Christmas since he eats a lot of them. There are plenty to last him well into next year. It's nice that they're individually wrapped so they stay fresh. He loves being able to just buy them without having to think about it, and the fact it is 100 calories each makes it even more exciting. He's not exactly sure how much else you can put in a bag like that, it seems kind of..well...wasteful.

I picked up a box of these to get started with baking chocolate for my husbands Christmas dinner. They turned out great! Easy and fun. The only downside is that they are individually wrapped rather than all in a roll. This makes them harder to use when you can't just rip open the top wrapper but if it doesn't bother you, then go buy them! 
 Rating: 4.0 
 We bought this based on reviews from other buyers.

I really can't believe this album is getting 4/5 stars. This album could have easily been a 5 star release. All it needs now is more attention from both music and mainstream America. As someone else said, it's as good if not better than their first album. The only problem with that statement is that The Used was an extremely talented band of the past decade. They were incredibly original and innovative even in 2001. And by all means please do pick up any one of their earlier albums.
Enjoyed the series. Can't wait for my next adventure with Robert Duvall.

This stuff is pure snake oil. Not only should we really stop drinking it, but we'd be fools to even take this crap. It was discovered in Australia not that long ago, and they're so afraid of the Chinese there they can't bring it on back. There's just one problem: The drug companies control both countries now.

My friend showed me a new one of these and said it was great so I purchased it. It's not very strong for an FM transmitter. The other transmitter in the car doesn't have this, but works great. I'd avoid this one.

A better effort at creating the setting of an Amish community would have been to place a portion of it closer so the reader can easily get lost in another culture. The characters are not well developed, and I had trouble seeing what drew them together.
I've always found books about dogs that are based on facts and statistics interesting because they can help people understand why pets do the things that they do, or in this case, don't do.
Don't be fooled by these reviews. They obviously work for this company who seems to have no clue as far as security or reliability goes.

I bought this with great anticipation based upon favorable reviews. However, when it arrived, the battery pack does not fit properly in my Canon 40D. The plastic end cap fits very tightly, and the two halves don't line up, meaning that there is a gap of an inch either side on one side. To add insult to injury, it doesn't work. It was charged at least five times before using, so I'm positive it's fully charging correctly.
It's a pretty cute family movie! Definitely a great watch! Can't wait until part II come out! Fun fun fun!! Hope they keep making movies like this. :)

My first complaint is that the description of this product states "a lifetime limited warranty" but when I contacted Otterbox for more information on this, they sent me to their website. When you click on support you'll find links to pages with many words that read like "we are happy with your item.

I am in love with these earphones!!! They can get really loud! The bass is fantastic!! It doesn't sound like a cheap headphone. I'm only giving four stars because the rubber came off part of the black part. That's not that big deal.
Good for carrying a large number of small items, like camera, and its enough to put on my belt when needed. But, it is not durable at all.
i love it. its great. it's not a bad price ether.

I received this book in good order; however, it was marked up. It did not seem new at all, more like someone's who already had the book. There were a few highlights, but very few. I would have returned it, however, since it's not worth my time, or money, to go through all the hassle of returning any small item, especially after paying money for it. Hopefully there will be next years edition, because I'm sure with these problems, that would most likely happen again. Not very happy.
It broke within 3 days. A plastic piece has broken off so it doesn't securely attach to our Kindle Fire. Waste of money or shipping cost to send back.

The best option is to start with a larger size that seems comfortable for them and add an extra large dog bed topper for the other dogs. My dogs are all small breed which means they have not outgrown being crated so I bought a medium size. This works well since it gives room in each crate when laying down and still gives some height if you want taller than your dog.

I wanted this to work. It doesn't work at all. The remote seems like it would work, if all the lights went on. We followed directions and were still unable get it to. A waste of my money for me. Wish we could have gotten a working one. Very disappointed that there isn't any better review on it. Just read other reviews, which are really bad. Guess it's an off brand product. Won't be trying another one. If you want something for looks and just as decoration only. Go ahead.

I loved the first two. This one is a huge disappointment. Everything was predictable so no surprise. The characters have changed from where they were. Even Sam seems less than she used to. It seemed that Ms. Day had some great ideas for story lines but didnt quite know how to use them effectively. And now it seems like there going for more of her "christian philosophy" so its not really an inspirational book. Sorry......... very disappointing. Very disappointed.
I love this movie, but the disk would not play at all in my dvd player. So sad that it was a used dvd.

This is my third set of the OXO Good Grips tongs, I use them all the time. They are sturdy, strong, easy to hold and look very attractive. Just keep in mind that they never come apart. Other than that, great product, would definitely purchase more like this one. One note: The tongs can be used together - so make sure you have the right size. It also comes with a small plastic holder for your kitchen counter.

I love the case. Perfect for me. This is my first case that isn't a belt clip case. Wish there was one with just clip. However, it definitely protects from everyday wear and tear. It only falls down if you're constantly removing or putting in the case, but other than that, it's great. The phone has been dropped twice since purchasing this, when taking out of this case, the screen didn't shatter. Also, some people have complained about how hard to open it, but you can easily do it.
I purchased a large case for my husband for his birthday to hold lots of CDs in and put them on top of. The CD holders are very flimsy. We will see if it holds up with regular use.

I gave this DVD a try. It's not much different from most of the other ballet companies on PBS. It will interest young children in ballet, but otherwise there is nothing new or special here. The best parts are the performances by Anna Tonkin. Her artistry alone makes it worth purchasing. She is one of her father's favorite ballerinas. I've watched many videos, and I'm familiar with Anna's technique, which she shares mostly throughout.

Perfect for the price - not a lot of features. It just looks cool. The case itself is made out of plastic, which I like since it doesn't seem as fragile (my last camera broke after falling off my hand), but if you're dropping it, you could break it. And you'll probably want to protect that, too. But overall, happy with this purchase.

Nice addition to the kitchen. It's a little large for my cabinet, but still very nice. Great product. No complaints. We use it almost every day. And it's nice enough you don't feel like we're cheapens your good dishes. You would have to look pretty hard to find another better deal out there. Plus - MADE IN THE USA!! I think that's why they got this so highly reviewed.
This item works well in my Olympus camera. Good purchase. I use it regularly as an add-on card reader. Works well. Recommended.

This may be the worst excuse of a book I have ever tried. The author has zero understanding about physics and engineering. One example from the second paragraph."We can only get enough oxygen in our brain to keep us alive if we produce it fast enough"--a man whose father worked with gas masks would not say so!If you read this without being required to, do yourself a favor and turn away from it. You will regret not doing that after this.

The story is a bit slow at first but picks up as the narrative progresses. I found it interesting that there was no mention of this or that. The main character is a woman so you have to understand she has certain personal baggage and life choices which might be hard for her other than not being in love. As we see more of her, with their friendship growing out of, he becomes very close to her.

I only bought this book because it cost me almost nothing and my Kindle says its for "free." It has very limited substance -- it's a bunch of short stories. Most are from other writers such as Michael J. Sullivan or John Grisham which is nice if you're looking to read something on the beach. However, it seems more like a collection of stories written by authors who had little talent themselves but just wanted a decent payday.

Don't waste your money. This will not work for more than 10 minutes even if you have brand new batteries. Then it stops. Just like that. Do yourself a favor. Look elsewhere. The cost is worth saving some time. It doesn't seem to be possible that Amazon can sell this junk. So what kind of rating system? Would I put four or more? Zero stars seems much too high.

Not real comfortable to handle. I would probably go for an expensive model next time rather than deal with this particular model. However, it did a pretty good job cutting through my medium hair. The battery didn't last more than 1 1/2 times. Would not recommend.

Got this for my mom because of her physical limitations. She liked how quickly she could pick things up off the floor. The pole collapses, however there is no latch or anything that holds it. When she's working on a project all that's holding in place are the three rubber pieces. She's lost one already. Will replace when replacements come available.

I'm afraid I have nothing good to say: The author presents the premise that we are attracted to someone solely in terms of their physical appearance or because they're attractive and has suggested several methods by which men can control sexual attraction.

After reading the reviews on this product I was looking for an alternative to drinking sugary soft drinks. The problem that others have pointed out is valid. However I noticed there were many people who claimed their bottles leaked when they put ice in. That does happen. But it turned those few times into one thing after another. A couple of weeks ago my fiancee, husband and brother-in-law enjoyed a long weekend at our house enjoying our daily iced tea as well.
These make holding items handy from time to time.

A collection of short stories, and in some cases you can easily read them, but sometimes it is the story itself that I struggle with. It does give me much food for thought if nothing else - not all stories are worth reading on it's own. Well written, entertaining read, overall. If you get a chance to check this out, pick up a copy!

If you need to go into the BIOS and reconfigure a USB drive or CD/DVD drive, this cable is absolutely required for any purpose. It comes with both standard plugs like all USBs do, but when that is not available it was much appreciated having an extra cord in case I needed it. However, if your computer doesn't have a plug close by, don't bother getting this, as it's nothing more than three cables strung together on one line.

This book started out fine but about midway through the story turned to a totally unbelievable scenario and I really don't care how it ends or what happens in it. There are just many other books on Kindle with much more interesting content. It does not have any depth at all. No real characters were developed enough for me to be interested if there was one. The writing is OK. You almost feel like you need an editor to read over sentence structure. So it's OK but no Great.

This is my second bottle of this and I have been using it for about three years. It really helps keep your skin clear and moist. You can feel it working the first time you apply it. And it does take away some blemishes that you've already got. It hasn't done anything to improve my overall complexion but so far none in which I've used other products. Just be patient when applying it, taking care not to use too much. It's worth every penny.
My son hated this seat.
Not very good - cheap plastic-like feel to it. The whole thing feels so cheap. I would spend a little more and get something worth while. And I know you'll only pay me once though. ;-)
This is supposed to be a good product but it didn't work out of the box. I did not attempt any further attempts after initial troubleshooting.

Great story, and very well written for the most part. One aspect which bothered me is that almost every character except our hero has a nickname - like John Doe, or Bill Jones. This really breaks up any flow in reading it. The names did not fit together, either. If you can put them all in your head, it will be fine but otherwise might cause annoyance. It took longer than usual to read this book because once I got into it, it was hard to stop.

I bought this thinking that it would be good for a small space, but the suction doesn't really work as promised. It also runs up quite some space. Its more of a hassle to clean than just keeping up. There are so many other options out there. Save your money and get something that's better quality.
This is an easy read, especially if you are looking to use some basic math concepts with kids.

The idea of an individual book on my favorite tv show was really exciting! So when the calendar arrived it came in a timely fashion, and though there is nothing wrong with it, I did anticipate that there would be more than one episode in each month.

Great little radio. Perfect for out on the water. I love how its easy to use and has a wide range. I've always been a fan of Bose. Never bought one before but this is great quality sound at an affordable price. The kids can take it anyware with them as well. Definitely worth it! Would recommend this! Buy it! You won't be disappointed. Very good deal too!
I love the case. i have to take it off a lot because my phone is in the army and this seems like its going to be really durable. great price too. thank you.

This case is very nice and does the job, but I feel like it's a little flimsy for my taste. Also don't expect to pull out your phone every time you open it because if you put anything in there from either side it'll pop right out. The magnet closure still works great except sometimes, after you've opened it, you'll be able to barely hear that click.
Fits perfectly. Very easy installation.
Was excited when i found this, and thought for the price there is nothing wrong with it. Put together very fast, only thing holding down the sides was some self stick velcor stuff.
This product did what as expected. My cats love it! However the price was just too much.

I am writing a review because i see there are not enough people who give this CD a review. These guys get the credit and recognition they deserve. The songs that rock the most ("Take My Hand"), have some of the best guitar playing ive heard. Other tracks like the title track (a good song) and my Own Summer Day sound so overproduced. Just listen to them on a real cd or youtube before buying this, then decide if you don't believe me.

As an owner of a Samsung Galaxy s3 I can't help but to notice the difference in quality. This case is great and fits my phone snugly. My last "clearly" cases were hard plastic that broke easily on me so this should be better. The seller also shipped pretty darn quickly. I'm going for another one soon.

I should have been more wary of the one star reviews because they were so accurate. This book contains too many references to another movie by that "author" and all his other books which don't make it easy for a person without reading an awful lot of movies or know very little about film. After making my way through it, I've decided maybe this was meant as part of a larger project - just like The Dark Knight, with which it's also similar in parts.

This is not my normal read. And I'm always happy to try new authors. But for some reason, when I started reading this, it went no where and seemed disjointed - even though there were really only two characters involved.
What happened to Linkin Park? At first listen, it's an okay CD.

This is the most irritating book I've read in a long time. I kept reading, hoping to find something about some deep religious feeling or thought but nothing. It's not even all that well written and not interesting. The writing style was odd with its lack of punctuation, run-on sentences (a lot!) and, worst of all, complete disregard for proper tense usage. Very sloppy writing, although it appears like an amateur. If there were no plot, this novel would be pretty darn bad.
I'm using this little guy with my new Canon 7d. For the couple of bucks you're not losing anything like buying one at any camera store.
This did not last as long as an item should be expected to.
I got about a month and half out of this battery which was disappointing because it does not hold charge much at all. Don't buy!

Having read the first novel, I wasn't sure if I'd enjoy this second one since it seems to be written for preteens. The main characters in previous novels have done things that no normal 14 y.o. would do. They get over them, accept who they are, and move on. But these two kids just seemed so wishy-washy. This book did not do justice or offer any real growth from them.
The item worked great.
Great concept in the story that kept your interest. The love between Kate and Chase is obvious, they just fight against it at every turn. Very sexy, sexy read.

This has to be the worst recording ever made. The sound is so horrible and awful its barely listenable -- you can just feel through their performance there was absolutely NO effort put into it. If all they did here was play a bunch of guitar parts that were arranged at random in different variations it would have been an interesting listen. As it is, it's nothing more than someone trying to pass off their own cushy arrangements as real jazz. Very disappointing.

One has to wonder what would have happened if the director of this TV series had decided he was going too far with trying NOT to cast gay people as characters in its show. Yes, many reviewers complained about that and so did a lot of folks at GLAAD. But it's still something I think is worth discussing here.
This is a great product with fast shipping. It was the exact one that we had orginally gotten from Radio Shack, but now don't get anymore.
I have been eating these bars in the past on the go and would recommend them for people as they are a good protein source. Good taste and high quality.

I have one of these in the living room for TV watching & it's perfect. In fact just went to buy another at a local store where they are usually more than twice what you get thru Amazon. The picture quality is outstanding with my HDMI cable. For me, not all DVDs that look great on standard TV's look as good when played off this player, or even better when viewed over an HD TV.
I was happy to find the correct adapter cord at Amazon - although pricey. The description says "Power cord/Adapter,DC / AC Car Charger w/Detachable Cable" but there is nothing detachable about it.

When I first got this item the price was a lot cheaper than at my local store, and also when I bought it there had not been any reviews so we were very excited to use it. However, upon trying to set up the product for either of us, using both remotes, is next to impossible.
Great price on these, they fit nice too. If your just looking for everyday shoes at a decent price, buy these.

This is a great book for new dog breeders. But it does not teach how to train dogs or even how to deal with dogs in the wild. I found this out on my own. Save your money. There are much better books about dogs, from owners who have actually gone training dogs.

While on vacation in England, a guy asked my wife for two bottles of wine (we are now married). She brought them and he took a swish. This was then reported to the police. I wonder if they can get these guys arrested so this could never happen again. It is really too bad that some people can't even buy something without being charged with crimes that would be much easier to deal with.

I bought the same brand but in blue and they are great for when you need to listen quickly and keep getting stuff done while driving. The sound is amazing on these. They come with 3 interchangeable ear pieces if those don't work for you. It's easy enough to switch them around. Great product so far no problems. So worth what it's selling for, these are good quality and do last long. Plus who cares about all that other crap. I'll never spend big money buying crap again.

While the book is a good read and easy to understand, I was not expecting something with so much profanity in it. There were parts about drinking alcohol that I really did have to skip over. It does get you going though. Once it gets interesting it moves really fast. If this story doesn't sound to your style then move on but don't quit reading at any part of the storyline.

I am very disappointed in this CD. One of the songs on each CD skips several times then finally does not play at all. When you pay over 50 clams for something like this, it should be perfect,but that is clearly not what we got.

This was very much the same book as "The Last Man on Earth." It's not to my taste but it did provide entertainment. I've read lots of books over the years by this guy and have always found him entertaining. His wife seems a bit crazy though. At least I got some new reading material for when she makes an appearance. Maybe I'll find out who she is down the road before it's too late (LOL!) I'm afraid I'd better leave now.

I've never tried anything other than straight cold pressed and organic vegetable glycerine, so when my wife came home with this, she wasn't very sure how to use it. Turns out, once we had an easy introduction of using it, our first impressions were accurate.

Product is working great. Very well made. It arrived with 3 small dents. One in each corner and on the handle edge. These are not visible from outside or inside where they didn't show up before. It could have easily been damaged during shipping as all packaging was in tact, so I'm guessing UPS did it.

It was okay, I just don't have a cat and had hoped it would be more practical than the Cat Dancer on my old cat. The way it attaches to her collar doesn't seem secure at all - she keeps getting tangled up in it. She did learn how quickly she can jump from this thing into the old cat dancer but it's not really good for her.
It's really bad, the machine never work when you add water.. The best solution is to buy another model. This one.... very bad product, but there are others works good.
The light is really bright but its not very durable. It does work pretty well considering I have a few things on in my kitchen because it's kind of dark here during the day.

This is the first time I have purchased an item on Amazon and am so disappointed at what a low quality product it is. It came fully assembled. However there was no cover plate that goes behind each shelf in one of my two units. Even though there were supposed to be two, they just didn't fit. After speaking with customer service, which wasn't really helpful whatsoever, I returned everything and got my money back.

I have never been able to use this adapter. When it first came in, we plugged and unplugged the cord but could not make any contact at all. We tried 2 different outlets with multiple outlets. My son was frustrated that he couldn't watch his dvd's on long road trips so I gave him my old adapter which works great. If you don't need anything else for your trip this would be a great product, just wish it worked.
The TP-Link 8 port usb hub is nice looking with just the right number ports (8, though others have complained about it being too few).

I was looking for an inexpensive scanner to do my own photos. This would be a good product if you were scanning multiple photos at one time. The pictures are really dark even under reasonable lighting conditions. You can manually adjust the settings of contrast, brightness etc. but nothing seems to help. Also every time I try to scan more than one, it will freeze up and not let me get another photo. So I'm back on manual setting until all is scanned.

The story is interesting but unfortunately I found the writing terrible. It was full of run-on sentences and phrases that were so over-used they just became irritating. Maybe Ms. Day writes better than this in her other titles. I'm not sure. I've read a few books from Amazon recently with bad reviews and none are nearly as poor or repetitive as this one. Hopefully she improves over time--at least by editing out most if not all her grammatical mistakes. Good job, Mike! Thanks. 
 Rating: 1.

I own 2 of these and neither works consistently. Every once in awhile it will work but for the most part a computer isn't capable enough to read it. On both units, I've used a USB hub that gets power from more than 1 outlet. I tried them with 3 different computers running OSX, Windows 2000 and Mac OS 9x. The device is light weight by this point but appears sturdy enough. It lacks good documentation on how best to use it, doesn't include instructions or any kind of tech support.

I like the concept of these but as soon as I put a couple in my ears, they are loose and not much noise isolation. They do sound good though so if your looking for high quality then go for it but don't expect them to isolate noise. I use earbuds mostly while working out at the gym with weights since those have been causing ear soreness from rubbing on cords etc. Overall I wouldn't recommend these. It is cheaper than Beats though, hence why they're worth it.

I wasn't totally blown away with this. It is definitely not the best way to practice guitar. Not very inspirational. The music is fine but lacks variety. There's just enough of a difference in styles between what he does and some of my favorites.
I purchased this product before having my first baby about 3 years ago now. That was almost 8 yrs ago.

So sorry to say I hated this book and only finished it because of the sheer number of good reviews. But my problem was that there were so many characters without any sort of back story or development whatsoever. No one had a meaningful role in helping out other than their romantic interest (or being pushed around). Even though I did like most of them very much, none felt "real" enough for me to even care what happened to them.
A waste of time. There was nothing in it that you didn't already know. Very disappointed. Not my favorite authors writing. I always enjoy her books.

I was looking forward to trying these but when they arrived one had been broken so it doesn't work and the other is very cheaply made. Wouldn't buy them again. Disappointing... I'm not sure how they're supposed to look with the balls in them, though.

Bought it as my primary system for a pontoon boat and have been extremely pleased with the purchase. Installation was easy, sound quality is good but could be better, and remote control does work well. Would recommend this product highly based on cost verses performance in marine applications.
I found some errors in the book but overall it is still an interesting read. If you are an aviation enthusiast this books for you.

I loved this when it was fresh out of the tube, but not even a week later, it's flat and dull. This product is NOT worth the price. I'm definitely going to try another brand next time, as most reviews were positive. Not only do they smell like coconut, they're also great for massages. My search continues.

You get what you pay for. It came in great time and was well packaged. That being said, it is not an amazing product. I have found that the paint has chipped after using it about 10 times. I'm sure some of this could be related to my use but for me as a first timer it's okay. For someone who knows how to make good quality masks like other expensive masks, this would work perfectly. But all together, spend your money elsewhere.

This book was given to me in the hopes that I would be able to help a co-worker whose husband is a devout Christian. He asked me, "Do you think religion might have something to do with sexual immorality?," without ever asking if she had any religious convictions. I'm still waiting for her answer.

The story begins quite well then quickly turns into a "who dunnit?" with characters not really likeable. I was expecting a book about the author's marriage to the lead actress. Instead, all we have is an author on why she gave up writing and what it felt like for her at that time. The best bits were when the actress talked about being pregnant with their first child. If something of interest doesn't come along, she'll soon get back in action.

I've been using these blades in my Ryobi string trimmer for the past year and a half. They're great at cutting grass but as another reviewer mentioned, they're more difficult to cut thru roots when it comes time toreplace blades. The first couple of times I went through about 5 pairs before they needed sharpening. But once you get the hang of it, it's not too bad; just keep doing it! It's easy enough with the right sharpening tool. They are relatively inexpensive also.

Do NOT buy this book, as there is not even ONE photo in the whole book. There are no color photos. A few black and white but nothing more. Just blank pages. The contents of the entire book should be used for an example to see how much waste there actually is. But since one cannot do simple research on Amazon without finding such a useless item here, it has to be my fault that I bought it. So here they are, with only 5 minutes of research.

The item is ok, I like the color a lot. It does not close all the way and therefore can slip out of your hand because it doesn't grip like regular cases do. Also feels a little slippery, but gets better with use. Otherwise love it. Does make phone bulkier, as well. But so do most cases. A lot slimmer. Color matches picture.

This vacuum is much lighter than my previous vacuum. The one complaint I would have about it - the head could be better. Doesn't pick up as well on bare floors but better for carpet. Does a great job in cleaning out my car. It's very easy to use and empty. A bit bulky but that's ok because you get used to it. Highly recommend this product. Good value also.

I used to use this every night for my hair but lately I've found that it kind of makes my hair look a little oily. So I've had to find something else. It's good for everyday and as body wash, though, so maybe it's just me. The product itself is still great though. It isn't harsh on my sensitive skin like some liquid soaps out there. Very gentle too.
First there was the fact the audio kept changing in both English and Russian.

The device works but after two months of use it broke and I ended up spending $30.10 for a new one from somewhere else. Not too satisfied since the first one didn't last that long. The only problem is I have to buy another.
For the price this is a good set up but if you have room I'd say go with something bigger. If these beds weren't offered as prime I would not order them nor recommend them.
I own two of these and one stopped working after 4 months. We only use them on weekends. The other still runs fine (i assume its just the battery).

This product was bought for my husbands new work truck. He has used it several times & says he could do his job quicker with this unit. I would recommend it. Just make sure you buy the correct size battery.
Was okay   Rating: 2.

I bought these boots because the reviews said they fit true to size. However, my foot slides around inside and when I do that there is no cushion anywhere on the boot. So it might be better if you buy a half size down. If anyone has ever tried slipping shoes on, please share your experience with this product. It was disappointing to have to ship them back so quickly. Otherwise, the color looks good also.

It looks as if someone didn't bother to proofread it before publishing it. I would recommend checking out an electronic copy rather than actually buying one. As far as content, I've been working with Excel 2010 since 2009 so I'm familiar with this product. It's great to have something like this, but it's frustrating that you can't do your work in its intended way.

Love it. I bought this in July 2012 - installed it 3 weeks later. It's not a hot running or extremely noisy/light duty air conditioner (I live on the second floor and run central heat all day).It did however blow strong for about 12 hours, when a very weak thunderstorm came through. It cools me nicely at night, I'm happy with it. Would have been nice if it cooled up really fast, but what do you expect from a unit of that size.

This was another book to add to my collection and it is always great when a novel has good characters that you can't help but fall in love with. I think the author did an excellent job creating the characters. There were some grammatical errors in it, but not enough so you'd have trouble finishing it. All in all, if you're looking for something different, enjoyable, with realistic characters, this fits your bill. I'm very intrigued as to where will she take Brianna next.

This item did not work. I wanted to return it but the time had pass and I tried connecting a new computer. It kept giving me problems trying to install it. I ended up just using my old USB 1 hub. Don't waste your money. If you have an IOGear product they are great. But this is a very cheap made product. I don't recommend buying any of their products. Spend another $20 for something decent. In fact if there were no negative reviews I'd give Amazon 10 stars in reviews.

this is a very easy to use and clean litter box. so much better then the other cat boxes that we tried at least every 2 yrs or even more often....would recommend to anyone! Very worth it...just don't put anything in it but litter!!!
I had this book for a little while and then donated it to the local library....what else can you say about a book....

This book wasn't even readable - I had to go back and re-read some of the previous ones as a refresher or an idea for new plot lines not found in this one (like, how does he manage these people when every couple hundred pages his girlfriend cheats on him). It was so bad that I'm done with him. But I can't be mad at him all because I've enjoyed most other books. At least it doesn't cost much.
My daughter likes it and the color is exactly what we were looking for. We used these as part of some craft projects so her "craftity" friends can add them in. They will work fine for that.

The whole book was only an outline of information about the topic. More like someone just took a bunch of information, put it together, and wrote it. And not even edited it, as it's really short. Basically is a big waste of time if you would be buying this for more than half your money to read a synopsis of what can already been found on any internet search. It's mostly general info that most people who love cars could figure out with 10 minutes.

This is a fantastic product considering it has only one fan. It can also be used as an external fan, but I am not sure why someone would need to. It's pretty quiet, too. I'm just disappointed that the unit did not come with its own power cord. Maybe most people already have batteries and chargers for their phones, so no big deal, really. The fan could always charge from other USB ports on your computer. The stand itself does seem flimsy when using this product.
This whole "story" took 2 minutes to get through.

This is my new best friend. I like to call it an "armpit-shredder," because if you get a paper jam you'll need that extra strength of the stapler -- not often enough given its modest size - but when it's needed, this little machine has it. And, despite what some say about how loud it is, I've never heard or been bothered by it. When I'm ready for another, I'll be looking at another one just exactly like this.

I am in love with this album. All the songs are great! I'm not even a person that enjoys country, but once you hear one song on their album, they'll keep playing it over and over. Can't wait for more music from these guys!! ;)

I bought this book at a garage sale recently and, well, it was an interesting read. Some of the advice in the book, however, is rather dated and outdated. For instance, you should go to see a therapist if your child doesn't feel like going to school or spending time with you. I've never known anyone, no matter how long they've been married, to do that. She advises keeping kids out of trouble as young as they can because one bad example makes them that much more likely to.

After reading what I've heard, and knowing of Mr. Martin's background, I'm astonished that there would still seem to be people like him in New York. He seemed utterly inept. There was no way any man from his upbringing could have been so devoid of humanity as to live there.
The second battery I received, after fully charging and discharging the first time, would not hold a connection at all, it wouldn't even detect when you plugged in. What a waste of money.

We have a German Shepherd. He needs two harnesses for some of our hikes. This works out great because we can take off the buckle hook instead of having a whole chest harness on. However, this doesn't work well when he starts pulling.

This headset is a waste of money - don't buy it. Don't say I didn't warn you. You will regret spending your money! Get the Samsung ear piece. It works great. Sound quality you only expect from an expensive wired head phone.

I just got this book yesterday and have already spent more time than was worth on it. First off, the table of contents is very difficult to navigate and, at times, inaccurate. Secondly, one should not give money for information that simply contains words like "fact" or a reference list rather than giving you something concrete. The material is written in an interesting way, but it does not do justice for either its intended audience or, perhaps, itself. On top of that, there are errors within both text formatting and actual text.

They were too long, so when worn, the bottom left hand side of my foot hit and rubbed against a metal plate on my shoe. I was extremely disappointed! Will never buy them again. Going to try getting rid of it. Would not recommend unless you have tall feet.

As other reviewers mentioned, this item is a great idea that doesn't work. It just plain does not work, and Amazon wouldn't take it back because it's in China. I would have given it zero stars, but you can't do that. If you're looking for anything to fix your iPad's charging problem, buy this. Otherwise, steer clear like the plague.

I like some of her other books, but this one was not good. It wasn't written with the same feeling as her others. Didn't grab my attention. Read a few chapters and then put it down. Glad that Amazon has Prime so books can be downloaded in 2 days instead reading them for $3.99 at Best Buy. The first book came out almost three years ago on Kindle, and is still a best seller.

What most of us can really enjoy are the many recipes contained in THE DIARY: A Fettuccine-Based Vegan Diet by Jenny Clark. These may be your favorite dishes from this book. The quality is great, BUT the sizing of these slippers does not fit a normal sized male. I have had another sheepskin slipper of very high quality, with some wool padding, since they first came out twenty or so years ago, and now there are no small men who want such slippers. A guy over 6' tall, and weighing about 150 pounds would need to order at least ONE size larger than usual, for this slipper.

I loved the beginning which was very different from books I've read before. The main character, Emma, is a spunky and likeable character but her boyfriend leaves shortly after they meet. She moves to another town where there are ghosts who try to talk to her. This story could have been great if it wasn't for some glaring issues like this. The book switches between first person alternating chapters. Emma speaks in third person.

For the price, these work fine and are pretty good quality. I can't really say there is nothing wrong with them because of the low price but, you can expect all kinds of breakage as mine did. You have no idea if it's still closed or not after you're done.

The first one I received would not allow the iPad to wake from sleep. It could sense that it was on but wouldn't turn on. But Amazon quickly sent out a replacement. After about 4 months, with light use, my 3rd Targus failed. I'm done. I've switched brands now - Anker has worked for several weeks and is working well.
This came as advertised.

This cable is awesome! It looks and feels expensive with a high quality sheath. I'm using it to connect my Sony HDMI TV output on receiver to two different Panasonic Viera Viera-TH-50PZ850U 50-Inch 1080p 240 Hz LCD TV's. I also use this for the internet connection of my Samsung Blu-Ray player when we are watching Netflix. You really cannot do better than Monster Cable's cables especially if you watch HD movies!

I'm an avid cook and have used a few different electric pressure cookers including some high end models from Hamilton Beach. The reviews I've read about this product were mixed. Some praised the product. I can't help but agree with them. While it does take practice to get perfect results in cooking meats etc, it's far better than other brands that are not as dependable. The best part of having your own is when you can put away all those small appliances like crock pots, water boilers, etc.
For the price it's more than worth it. I've needed one like this, so glad I bought a new one. Thanks amazon!!

The plot starts out okay, but from there on out, it is pretty bad. I cannot see how this book was published. It would have to be some sort of joke. Please don't spend the money for this. You will only wish you could.

Not only do this things look great and sound great, the bass is amazing!!! they are very comfortable to wear, but after about 30 days I got a short in them where they connect into your iphone or ipod. Don't waste you money on these

I am very dissapointed in this product especially since my kids are so excited when we pulled out their new earbuds. I'm returning mine, even though there isn't any kind of warranty on it. Not very good compared to the previous books. I know that book was much better. This one is just ok. Sorry Bob.

I got this hoping to use it in my car but there is no way to adjust the volume of both speakers together. The sub woofer puts out a low hum on any sound except bass and when listening to music its even worse. As soon as you power down or switch inputs, the audio goes completely dead. If you're going to create a novel based off of this great story, do it right. My daughter and I have seen the animated movies several times. They're fantastic. This is very well constructed. The only drawback was the top cover for a cover. It keeps popping off - I think it would be better if you could use an outer cover. Otherwise great product. Just don't take up too much room because it's heavy. I'm happy with it.

I am writing to advise that my order of a book titled `The New American Century', with Robert Kaplan as its primary author, is still pending for shipment and is probably coming in the mail before this date.

Great product great customer service.

This is an absolutely beautiful watch that seems to have been designed well for all types of activities. Not sure the quality if this sort of watch, but it looks a lot more expensive than it is. There product was easy to use and the packaging a good idea in case you lose parts or it gets dropped....LOOKED EXACTLY LIKE THE PICTURE!! I had been looking at this item all over stores for weeks! The price was great as well and i got free shipping too...
I purchased this book as we are currently on a trip to Rome. It is beautiful and well written.

I wanted to like this book, but the only reason I finished it was because, in order not to waste too much time, I started skipping over paragraphs which could have been summarized with a few words. The characters don't actually talk and instead use repetitive word choice. Their actions do make sense. A few sentences of more descriptive writing would really explain why they act as they do.

I am a big fan of the first book in this series, and was looking forward to reading the next one. My only complaint is that it ends very suddenly. You don't get answers to almost too many questions. And then there are some things we never find out....like what happened to Jesse?The story starts with him moving out into an apartment complex, but you can feel his sadness at not knowing his wife and kids.
This has been our go-to Santoku knife. Great balance with perfect cutting surface. Easy clean up too. Only wish they had red handles instead of black handles. Highly recommended.

I bought this book back in 2005 after finding it used and new at a secondhand store. The author is to be commended for doing research into the history of music from its creation to the present day. But that's where the compliment ends.

I was a little skeptical as it has never been advertised that these are made in the USA, but hey, they are. The material is not the highest quality leather or anything, and could be better made, especially if you compare prices from different companies, however for $10 to $20, I'm quite satisfied.

I had the same experience when we first bought it. It only plays about an hour before having to be restarted. The remote was fine but it's not much fun if it freezes like that. For a $140 player you do expect more. If any other reviews are good then they must have been written by people who work for Sony. Very disappointing sony! Buy something else.

I needed something for a low cost and this was it. It is not the best nor does it make super smooth ice but works well enough to satisfy me on those cold days. Very good with frozen fruit drinks too which I also use so it's easy to use. I've had it only about 2 weeks now so no comments as far as longevity or performance. Just remember when making fresh juice, you have to let juice drain at least 10 minutes after juicing before freezing otherwise you'll mess up your motor.
The price is high for such a thin cheap piece of aluminum. And it won't hold any weight. You get what you pay for.

I love this case. It fits the iPod Touch 4g great. Its great for going anywhere. Great quality at an affordable price. If you need something that provides good protection get this! Not to mention its cute. ^* Oh also it ships out fast. So worth it. & lt;3

I liked the book but my biggest complaint was that each chapter left you hanging in a way and it never stated how things ended...the ending seems to just jump into another story, what happens next? I agree with another reviewer's concerns regarding the use of this product. These gloves are listed as 'non-toxic,' yet they contain a heavy amount of formaldehyde, which is carcinogenic to children.
