The item pictured (green and yellow striped cover) is not at all what arrived. Very disappointed. They may as well call it yellow. I don't think they even make the same cover in two different colors. Other than that, it's fine. It does NOT fit snugly like my original Dell battery does. If you are looking for a cheap replacement battery, this would work ok. But if you're wanting something that really works, keep looking.

Got a little hard on my feet. I do have these shoes in the navy blue and love them. I've bought them twice now. Very durable. The grey one is not as good but still pretty good. My feet are wide so it's hit or miss. But great for people with narrow foot.

In my opinion, it should be illegal to sell a product as is until the government actually issues you with a license or license in writing that clearly states all of its ingredients. I don't recommend this product. Please save your money for an all-natural, proven cure and alternative medicine instead - which has helped us all. This did absolutely nothing other than make me feel worse about trying one more time after already having attempted it. Take 2 capsules twice daily at night like instructed on bottle. Don't waste your money.

I ordered these thinking they would be a great little replacement for the typical earphones that are too big to fit into my ears. What arrived was a nice package with 3 sets of various sizes. When attempting the smallest plastic pieces (for left and right buds) popped off on each one. The sound seemed ok, but not what I expected from Koss. All this effort because none came close to fitting in any part of my ear. I can't imagine how anyone could use these. Perhaps I'm just weird.

After watching the movie on TV and enjoying it, I purchased this DVD to see how it played in my Blu-ray player. The disc freezes up about 3/4 of the way through, and then all you hear is a sound coming through your surround system. You can't even skip past it; when you're lucky enough not to, you'll go back and watch the whole thing again. What I've watched so far has been good.

The book doesn't really give you what it says on the cover - "10 quick tricks to make your dog eat like a dog." There aren't any great tips here at all. In short, if you're looking for some useful information from this book, don't bother. But if not, I still wouldn't buy it. It probably isn't worth the money being paid here. Just my opinion. :)

I purchased this product to replace the old adapter for a new computer setup that is used for my wife and myself. This adaptor works just as good if not better than my original Toshiba charger. Shipping was speedy also. A no brainer for an HP pavilion xp laptop. Hope this helps. :)

I have had my iPod nano 2nd generation for three days and am not happy with the purchase. I'm really looking forward to using it mainly for exercise but as others have stated about short battery life, it's too early in using it (I think just got it) before seeing any improvement over other mp3 players.

My husband and I both received a copy of this CD for Christmas. When we first played it, it was very enjoyable! However, every time we've listened to it since then, we've enjoyed the entire CD. As someone who is NOT into country and just listens to mostly jazz (I love jazz, though!), it's been wonderful. Both Mary Chapin Carpenter (and Patty Griffin) have songs that are uplifting, inspiring, or inspirational. It's really good.

I thought it was just me until my son brought home another package and showed me. How much are these, which I've ordered every year, cost? They're about $2/bag. Amazon seems to have them all over the place, don't you think? I'll find out soon, 'cause it's not that easy. My grandson LOVES them, but we can't possibly afford so many of them. And he's almost 4.

This product is a good value for your money. However, there are numerous problems with it. They have two different version which should be used in parallel or on opposite sides of an electrical outlet.
First off, let me just say that I'm a diehard Shania Twain fan. I've been waiting on years & years since her last studio album came out. And finally my prayers have been answered.

I had such high expectations when it came to this headset, unfortunately it's not working as expected. The mic does work sometimes but mostly the sound coming from my speaker doesn't come through very clearly. All in all, I'm a little disappointed. It was supposed "to be" a replacement for Turtle Beach X12 and I will probably just have an old headset around next time.

The story was ok -- it's fairly predictable, no big twist in the middle. I got sick of seeing Alex and Chloe fight, which doesn't help that they have sex so much. But it wasn't bad, especially for a quick read. I'd read anything else from this author.

This book is an interesting look at the relationship between President Kennedy and his attorney general. When it was written this was, of course, very controversial because of their respective attitudes regarding Communism. That being said, I have to say that while interesting, there were too many references from books on JFK that could not be found in this book.

i got these for my kids and was worried after reading the bad reviews and also that they didn't have a power cord...so we decided to give them chance. My husband who knows nothing about computers took out his drill andput in an extension cord between one device and another so there is 3 wires going from usb power adapter into 2 wall ports on tv.

As a fan of historical romance I was disappointed by this book. There wasn't much to the characters; just didn't get lost in them. The setting is interesting though and overall it could have been really good. Too bad...the book never reached that level.

I don't think it's that good at all, i mean maybe if you're from a country where you dont eat this kind of food. But its not for my friends, they like to watch westerns, and thats why im ordering the new movie

While the recipes in this cookbook are great, they would benefit from some pictures to make it more appealing. For example, how about the recipe for Lemon Ginger Beans?, There was one picture. But I think I'm going see if there's a whole book of it. I'd love to have this cookbook, but since it's not available online, that's kind of sad. If you can, buy your copy at WalMart. They might be able to order it and send out with next day. I'll probably just purchase another one.

I bought this after reading a lot of the reviews. While I did have some problems with it at first (poor customer service), everything has worked out great. I've owned this TV for about five years. After four years, I'm ready to toss it. One day -- literally one day, like so many others that I remember from my childhood -- while watching television (on cable) and turned on the TV, there was an unusual electrical buzzing sound emanating from the back half of the TV.

These gloves were recommended to me by a woman in the hospital that I work for. She gave some good advice and after much trial and error these are definitely what she recommended. Not sure why you would ever do well with them!! You can't really feel anything through them. Also they don't stick very well. Your hand will sweat, which creates an extra layer of "frosting" between your skin and the glove. This defeats their purpose. So not a great product.

The first time i used this the top piece fell off. I had to super glue it in, so in the future I'll keep a closer eye that it's on securely. Also, you really have to work with your bread when you use it, and if not careful, you'll end up with breadcrumbs everywhere because of all the work. It seems to be working now after much tinkering--I'm happy w/ my purchase but it does require a little more effort than most recipes.

It's really boring for an adult, but my daughter enjoyed it...I bought this book, expecting to get the one pictured here with 2 pictures that looked sort of like that. What you will actually receive is only just over 50 pages. It's still pretty cool. But not what I thought I'd be purchasing.
I did not enjoy this movie. It was a bit too far out there for me. We also didn't appreciate the heavy use of cuss words when no other language is used. It would have been better without all the.

I purchased a set of these in April 2013 for three different locations. They all seem to be defective and cannot charge the batteries after two weeks use. The first unit was good because it had instructions on how to work it. However, when the second failed within six months, not much more than one month from purchase, the next units that worked began with battery issues right away, although sometimes charging properly or not. When you go through several failures before they are replaced with another new set, this is not acceptable quality.

I loved the first 2 books! This book was good, but it didn't have as much excitement. My daughter said all she read were about how amazing they were, but now that I've finished her comments are mostly along the lines of "it's okay." I'm very sad because this is such a beautiful story and series. As for my daughter, she's 13. Hope you'll enjoy them like we do!
This was very disturbing reading. Nothing like the authors other novels so far. Not sure what she was thinking? Don't recommend at all.
Not sure why it's titled "for iPhone 5c." It doesn't fit around the volume button. I cut a strip off both ends, then glued it to the plastic back of my case. Works but looks weird. So not happy.
The title says it all. Not a big fan of it. I think this would be better done for kids. For older teens maybe. It was okay but not my cup of tea. Sorry.

The unit does not get hot enough to cook everything I would like it to. A good addition is a small burner with the pan on it. Also has some vents in the cover as well where you can add more coals or wood chips. It should be noted that if your fuel source does include propane, it may not have sufficient room and smoke will come out of both holes. Not good for smoking at home without a propane tank.

I would give this product zero stars if possible. This is not a toy at all. My 5 year old was so upset to open the package and find out it is supposed to be water soluble candy. There were no warnings on any of the outside packaging about it. We had some from our previous tub before we bought more new ones, but these are NOT good for kids. They have NO flavor whatsoever.

I bought this because of it ability to connect and also my wifi extender. It works. I have not had a chance to try the usb yet as my computer is hooked up over wifi. The only problem that I've found with this item it's very difficult for one person in two different households to configure it. Even when configured by myself without problems at all but if your network has multiple computers or just two users you will be frustrated

I bought this book knowing that the author is a chiropractor who knows his stuff and has had years of successful surgery. Having seen it only once (the cover was just so...nice) he seemed very real in the delivery as if you were sitting with him. He clearly isn't out to sell anything and I doubt anyone should buy this.
Didn't work at all for me! Tried several times to use this with an electrical drill, and found that after 10 minutes I had only got minimal amounts of paint on, not enough to really do much with.

This is a great product that actually works. We have lots of squirrels but it isn't too bad to deal with. It has deterred their eating and also keeps the birds away because we can see them being chased by them! The deer have seen us using this bird feeder and I believe they are staying away! We would definitely recommend it. Great price, fast delivery with PRIME!! What more can be said? Thank you Amazon! :)

The only thing that is good about this product is the price. That was my reason for ordering it. Now I've gotta get to work and find something else. After 2 days of use in which i used minimal functions, it's already junk. Waste or money since they don't cost very much at all.
The "tabs" are too small, or should we say not strong enough. Our cat managed a few times and got away. Now she has ripped them just enough for her escape. They do wash easily though.

I couldn't find this anywhere locally so of course Amazon came through for me. The price was great -- the delivery even better. It was in very good condition. So far I've tried six different varieties (chili, hot wings, potato chips & other chips, bacon and cheddar) and all were good. One thing though... don't expect to be able to go out right from your house to get a pack yourself. Only order them online. A happy customer.

There are some helpful things in this book. For example, you can use the phrase "eat your cereal," when referring to small quantities of vegetables. Unfortunately, there is also a problem with this. It has something to do with the fact that many vegetables contain enough protein and calcium--probably too much calcium for most people (including children)--to be dangerous under most circumstances. So, I wouldn't really suggest trying these.
Got this to protect my phone, does the job. But looks like you can still see from picture how not super easy snap on/off.

I ordered and received this product without any problems. About 10 days after applying the protector it began to peel off. Also if you are used to a full body screen protector, keep in mind that this is for an HTC EVO 4G. There are 2 layers on it. On one of them there will be "X" cutouts which means you must place it where its supposed to. The other half sticks at random parts around the phone.
This is a good price for the batteries but my old charger died. I replaced and no problem. My phone came back to life. The new battery does not last as long

The book was great with the exception of an overabundance in foul language and sexually explicit content. I kept thinking would he get it out on this or that subject, but then found myself skipping ahead to see what kind of behavior occurred next. This makes me wonder why I'm supposed to. A major character was beaten very badly by her husband and has never gotten over it. They have 3 children together. She spends too much time thinking about how she'll beat him.
This was a Christmas GIF for my brother and I don't believe he read it because when I did get him to open it, it didn't make any sense. Waste of money. Now he's asking for it. Just sayin....
Love the way they smell....have them sent in an envelope...very pretty gifts! Got these for bridesmaids... Will by more again... Thank you!
This fragrance never fails me and you can spray on any where in your house or car. Just add some lavendar body oil too. Love it!! Amazon prices are lower than Whole Foods.
A few months after buyng the tool i start using it....
What about her husband getting a job at his new job?This book showed no character growth. She knew he had loved her,yet she could not forgive him for abandoning her.

Well as title says it didn't fit. The plastic is cheap and doesn't fit the tablet. It's just loose on the tablet. Waste of money don't waste yours if you get this case like mine :P But it's nice color wish i could exchange it.

I bought this based on a description of it as having enough ports for my laptop. It is NOT compatible with HP Probook 4530... and they don't even have any drivers available from HP. After hours trying to get the drive recognized, I sent it back because none worked. For more info about what the instructions don't tell you, read on:This hub will only accept power plugged directly into its own port.

We bought 3 sets of these last fall because we were so impressed with our older set that came from a store in NY. What is up with the new quality control?? The lids don't stay on when you try to close them -- they pop right off while attempting to open them. Also for some strange reason, even though there are no ridges inside the bottom of each container, food gets stuck between the lid and body of the container.
I've bought two of these.

This has so many problems. the screen scratches super easily, I think its one of those plastic screens that gets scratched when you put something on it, but it was just like that. The back comes off..really easy and then it's not a good design. It had more problems than i can count after 3 days of owning it. So in conclusion. BUY A KINDLE FIRE WITH BETTER PRODUCT.

Very nice and very useful. My only criticism is that I wish the top was wider. We use them every day for lunch and love them. They save you a ton of food compared to reusable containers, too. Would definitely buy again. If they were larger though, then I'd give it 5 stars. Highly recommended. I'm ordering two more because we are using ours so often.

I bought this for a christmas present so I don't know how it will hold up if the reciever enjoys it, but I think he is going to love it!! Fast shipping......... Can't wait to see him. Great product. It came when expected and in good condition. Would recommend this seller. Great price. A win win!!! Thank you. :-) :)

What the title says this is a novel that was written in part about an author who had issues with writing. It just seemed like it didn't know what genre to call itself. I guess you have to be into chick lit and romance books but there are so many others out there. The story moved way too slowly. Then towards half of book 2 we got very little action. And lastly after finishing it, I was left wondering how all those scenes could develop into one big love scene.

These are not the filters for these exact lights. They need a number of things cut out before they will even fit and if you're lucky enough to get them on without cutting them, they're too big and don't provide good coverage of your lens. You might as well just buy new lenses. The box says it's compatible with the original bulbs. My lamps have numbers marking them so I know exactly what type it is. Unfortunately, my lights have different numbers. At least one set was clearly printed incorrectly.
After two days had to return it. They stopped working out after that. It is cheap junk just like its price says. You still get what you pay for. Not even worth it in case they did work.
This charger does an okay job after you get used to how certain positions charge your battery.

My cat absolutely loves this toy. He destroys anything we buy him, but he has not managed to destroy this.. yet. I've seen him play for an hour with it each time I put the ball in his hand. Only issue was that one of the plastic attachments broke off, so now all the balls come out. If they can fix that, you would have a great product. :)
So far so good, have only used it once, very useful tool for trimming up plants and other objects in close quarters.

It might have something to do with the fact that one of my dog's paws has a deformed joint at where it bends, so this product did NOT work as intended. The plastic handle just does not allow any amount of pressure on his paw. Would be great in small dogs, but definitely way too stiff for older ones to handle. Might work, however, if you had extremely arthritic dogs who could tolerate such awkward handling. I ended up using an over-the-door style retractable leash (with ring connection) instead.
Fun film. Enjoyed it. Very sweet. Not as many scary parts for an older kid, so that's why he liked it. :) Also good on family viewing. So glad we had gotten it! Our daughter really likes it, too.
the story line is lame and they have no redeeming qualities. it was just a bunch of kids being loud in school. i read this book before my son could appreciate life at all. he did not get it.

I bought this for my daughter and it barely fits her phone. Its cute though, that's the only reason why I'm not completely disappointed. My daughter had to take ours out of it's packaging in order to try it, she couldn't even get it on. So don't waste your money!!! Plus delivery was terrible. It took forever because they didn't send us a tracking number, although we have prime so no big deal right? Never again will I buy from them. Very disappointed :(
It fits just right. I'm actually pretty impressed... The only thing I want to point out that it's not totally white from top corner (top).

The book is pretty interesting and written well. My only issue with it was the writing style of the author in reference to a particular historical person or country. It was annoying as she wrote about an object that would have been known by all but her readers which did not make them able to visualize or picture these things in their minds, thus eliminating any information they were getting from it. Another thing I thought could be improved on was describing what food and clothing she used.
I had to return these due it not being a true fit, they felt like too small. However, the color and stitching are very nice. Too bad they don't fit.

This was well written and I did enjoy reading it, but it only got 2 stars because the story line was so unbelievable. Why would we expect anyone to go on a trip just for money in their 20's? A good plot should have some surprises thrown in. If the author were trying to write an emotional book with believable characters she failed. Instead this is such an unbelievable story. If everyone traveled around like they do then there wouldn't need to be anything special.

I was disappointed in this book. It didn't seem as informative nor did any of the recipes include ingredients to make. In my opinion, it was too expensive. It's a waste of money, unfortunately. I've tried several different dishes with success - not sure why these recipes didn'twork either. The photos were lovely. Not one I'd share or buy again. My opinion doesn't necessarily reflect on Amazon or the book itself. Thank you. Mary Lou Anderson

I had a hard time reading this book, it seemed like the writer just wanted to fill in pages with lots of sex and not much real substance. I've read erotic novels by less talented authors before with more passion. I'd never recommend this story. Very disappointed... :(

I have been using these for 3 weeks now, and the quality is still good, however today when i went to reorder them today, they suddenly jumped up in price by 20 dollars. Amazon was having a special on these, but it seems now nobody else has them. The sound is good like always... if you're just looking for headphones that look cool, go ahead. As far as comfort, this thing digs itself into your head when you wear them, it's awful. But its not so bad wearing earbuds.
this is a very useful tool. it works exactly as advertised. i now have extra space for storing my garden tools. its easy to use. thanks much!
My son loved watching this on my ipad while we were traveling. It was a good price. The characters where just right. No problems..
So far nothing but praise. Good value for the price. Highly recommended. Easy to carry and light weight. Great product that does what it suppose to.

These are two good films about friendship, love, tragedy, death, despair, love (young vs. old), etc. They made me look at some of my old friends more with admiration than nostalgia, though. Just enjoy them.

I am a huge fan of her other series but this book did nothing for me. She is an expert writer, there could be something to the story, just not mine. Her writing was excellent and very descriptive though   Rating: 2.0   The author writes well. Unfortunately she seemed bent on describing everything in as much (and possibly even more!!) detail than absolutely necessary. There were several places where I thought it necessary - and had some difficulty simply staying with the story without taking copious notes.

Just read the short synopsis and realized that I've seen this story way too often. Didn't need to spend my time reading her description of other peoples' lives or descriptions. It went on forever. At one point I skipped over several pages because it stopped being interesting. I'm not sure why it's so popular, but definitely didn't find it any better than A Thousand Splendid Suns. If you want a decent book, you'll probably have a hard time. There really aren't many books like this. Don't waste your time.   Rating: 2.

this is not very well written. i guess the idea of doing anything for love when you're young and in love. there were some very interesting parts but otherwise it was pretty boring. didn't finish because just wasn't pulling me in. sorry to leave bad feedback but that's how much I liked it.

I was very disappointed with the CD. I have followed JMT since her earlier solo work. Her style has greatly changed and this recording does not sound as good to me as others. Too much auto-tune and synthesizers. The one thing she had always excelled at - is that in every song there was. &# 34;So Sorry" sounds like a poor attempt by some producer to get someone famous.
I have purchased these for a couple years now. They are easy to use, clean, and great on the eyes. You can make your own in any number of ways, so they go with anything you wear. Good stuff!
No one will be able to resist reading this. Just look at it! It's about as cute as a book. But it's only about 150 pages long.

Love it, works great, does what its suppose to! Just be careful inserting the USB plug into your camera because it can break easily but other than that great product! Good service from seller too. Thanks again! :)

I am returning this book, because the title is misleading and in fact it is not by Tom Waits but his former group Dead City Ramblers. Although this book would probably rate a high for people who do NOT know about Dead City, it does provide some nice pictures of Tom's life as an adult. For those who are interested in knowing more in-depth info on what happened to him, like you wouldn't find anywhere else, then get another book. This one just doesn't even come close.

I tried this because of all the rave reviews and how easy is works. Now that I've used it for more than 3 months, I have some reservations. First, it's worth mentioning what others haven't mentioned: with this type of vacuum, if you don't use your fingers (not covered by lotion, etc.
This book was ok for me, not exactly a page turner but good read. It did have some twists which made it enjoyable. I would read the next book in this series.

If you live in a suburb somewhere this probably would work fine but here in NJ we had poor reception. Too bad there isn't an FM modulator. Returned product with no hassles. But just to add - Amazon was very good about refunding my money without any problems.

Product arrived on time. Easy to assemble. Looks great. The storage is small and I found a product that works better! This one goes well with the decor in our bathroom. And it's not plastic!Highly recommend this product. Just wish it could hold more! :-) Shipping was free!!! Well worth the price :) Great job! 5 Stars for sure!

The picture quality is quite good. It has one of those really small buttons that you have to look carefully and find the right spot for if you're used to a big screen TV. But all in all, it works great. I can take pictures while I'm using it. So, pretty much just as good as my Nikon slr camera. Battery charge also seems pretty good...at least over several pictures. It's kinda like having two cameras on your hands.

The camera is great but I feel the customer service needs some work on. First, they don't have a website or email address to contact by phone and this may be because their are many people dealing with issues that come up in every day life. After you fill all of your registration information from facebook, etc, then when it asks to login, it's says invalid key. If you google it, there's plenty out there. The Camera itself still works great.

This thing would be great if it worked! But don't bother getting one of these. It comes with NO instructions so in order to see any sort of picture, you have to go on Facebook & Google Image Search to figure out how to.

I was looking for a long lasting power bank and this one fits the bill exactly. Great capacity and well made. The included flashlight is very nice, it has a nice led to let you see where you're going. The battery comes with adapters,as does many electronic products, so be sure your device supports this. It recharges my Ipad, Android phone, Nexus 5 (dual core) just by USB.You can't go wrong with Anker! This little pack packs plenty of juice.
These covers are wonderful if your looking for something with a light weight feel. They go on easy and have good openings in case you're doing it over again.

This camera is poorly made. First off, it's a touch screen only camera, which by the way, you cannot see through when taking pictures. I had to push hard on my finger as well as press really down so it would work. Another thing, and this was not evident in any of the reviews, is that if you're looking at pictures taken while recording, they are also recorded as video images.

I don't recommend this book. Its more for kids under age 10, but my son read it in a day and was bored with the book very quick. He is 10. It's good from that perspective. Good thing it cost only $.99.It has some grammar mistakes but not many..its just how she writes. Not much action or adventure to it. Too boring. Nothing like the other two books by her where he saves people. At least they are a little exciting. It isn't horrible though.

I had the pleasure and disappointment of listening to this album on my way back home from a wonderful week in South Carolina. After driving through New Orleans, Biloxi, Lake Charles, Lafayette, Grand Isle, Baton Rouge, etc., it was nice having some upbeat music that didn't drive me anywhere but home. This is NOT what I heard while playing road trip music. Yes, there are great singers out there, including Carrie Underwood, Martina McBride, etc.... When they performed at The White House, people said something along the lines of...

I'm giving it four stars because I did get what was promised but a bit disappointed that something like this product should be put on its first use by someone who lives in Florida and probably can't stand to go out when there is still snow up there. I've already been outside several times with it. My car only gets driven about 20 miles to work. So far no problems. It does push your rear wheel back into the frame of your car.

Bought this item as a replacement for my old one. It didn't last 3 days. At which point, it's now basically a $19 door stop. It's not hard to pull up the handles, but after about 2 years, I couldn't get it down and was afraid I'd damage it. The plastic is very cheap too. Don't waste your money. I'm going back to using mine that came with our old dog door. My only regret buying this.

I bought this item for my son who loves to write and erase because the pencils were so expensive.......when it got here, he tried it, the pencil was not sharp at all! It also felt cheap, i don't believe they used heavy or strong lead in them. Not happy! :( what kind of a joke am I? So save your money. Dont make mine! I'm really disappointed. Never will buy from them again.

The book is an excellent work of a historical character. I believe that the author did his homework very carefully. My disappointment for this work was with its poor quality electronic transcription. This was distracting to my reading experience. Also, as others have said, it would be nice if the original document could at least provide English translations, instead we see words rendered in Italian which, although not exact, are still understandable. It seems odd to me and somewhat insulting since these people were considered royalty.
I am giving this only three stars because it seemed to be written very quickly. It doesn't flow quite as smoothly after awhile as other books do between scenes.
i got one and returned it.its way too bulky,even for my Nikon D3000.had problems inserting any extra lens if you have one.

The quality is what I expect from Victorinox... This thing is nice and solid. It's a heavy knife that cuts through things easily. I'm really glad it has the serrations. If you have knives or scissors you need, this one should do the trick nicely. You can't beat its price. Great deal! Now we just need to see how well it'll wear. So far, it's great.-D

I have a Sony laptop model VGN-C5A100 which seems to be the latest generation of Vaio's. As you can tell, these notebooks also run Windows 7, since most newer models ship with it. The reason it is difficult for me is that although this particular machine has been designed around a 64-bit processor, I don't think this makes any difference in performance. It only takes one bad program or two and your computer becomes completely useless.
I love this show!! Its awesome and the music is great too! It really gives u a happy mood to boot.

Not much to say. I have had a couple of these and they are very fragile. One broke last week. The next one is about 3 months into the warranty period. I'm trying this style because my hair tends towards frizz. This worked OK when it worked. Next time I'll go for something that will last. Don't waste your money on this. Buy expensive one. It'll be worth it.

I purchased 2 of these to place in my dining room and kitchen areas for an open look. They are a nice size but do take up quite a bit of floor space. All the shelves have different screw holes so only needed 1 set screws into each corner where they attach on all 4 sides. Very pretty when put together. The plastic back board is not super strong though. It holds together just fine by being screwed down, but can easily be pushed right off if you aren't careful/careful.
It has always been a problem for me with squirrels.

This is a must have. Keeps the counter clean and looks great. Great for smaller area or on top of stove. Fits perfectly & makes it easy to clean. The tray is nice too if you have small children that like their fingers. It's very comfortable as well. Would highly recommend. Just be careful when putting away, we took ours out from under the cabinet yesterday because I was worried someone may use them, but they just got so many compliments, all asking where did she get them.

This product is much smaller than it looked. It only fits about a pack of cigarettes. If you're looking for something more substantial, look somewhere else. You can barely get one to fit between your butt and ass. The price was good though, so I'm happy with it. But I should have read the measurements better.

My old one died & i bought a new one. The old one I used for years so it was only fair. This one is really easy to move around if the space you need to clean takes up more than 1 table. It gets stuck sometimes. But over all its good. I'd recommend it.

I got it for my son and it's not working after about 5 mins. It plays the music but doesn't turn on or charge. The screen is also too small so he can't even look at it. He won't be able to use it. I tried several different settings to get the display of this item to work. But no luck...I got a piece of junk!... If something looks too good to be true it probably is.. You receive what you pay for. Cheap Chinese CRAP. I'll keep my $30.00 as proof until they can refund me for this...

this song is very powerful in its message. We should give up our own opinions to listen to God speak on every aspect of life. Great message.. It will take you somewhere. Listen to your heart..then go with what He says.

This fan was exactly what we needed because our old one had broken. The only thing wrong with it is it seems like half the time does spin at full speed, and then the rest on a slight turn - it tends to do things that are easy once you get used though.

Great addition for anyone who has been using their iPhone as a media player. No more fiddling with wires at the gym or behind your neck and you don't need to carry around another device unless you'rejust on short trips. Nice range - can listen while running down stairs without interruption. Excellent sound quality and, especially in wireless mode, comfortable when wearing glasses. I use this mostly indoors but take out my ear buds during outside runs.
This case is very thin but did seem to be sturdy. My biggest beef with this product was trying to snap into place the little clip where the usb adapter goes in order for me to charge it.

Easy to setup. Worked great for the first 3 weeks. Now it would have a hard time connecting on an Iphone. Doesn't happen all that often but when it does its really frustrating. Good sound though. I thought there was something wrong with my phone (it's Android actually) so I'm guessing that is what's making this happen. When playing loud enough without any noticeable hiss, it'll work fine. Great price, too, you won't be disappointed in it.

These are some nice quality pans. They do stick but the only ones I've had that were a bit of problem were when I didn't get them coated correctly and after trying to clean up all gunk they wouldn't come clean. This was my first time using silicone so be careful with it if you buy these and have no other experience cleaning them. Good stuff. But make sure you spray or rinse them well because as far as non-stick, not even spraying really helps much. I'm happy.

The CD starts with the first track, the only one I liked on this record, a tribute to Ray Davies; it has not aged well. The two other songs have some charm but overall, I can't help thinking that these were recorded in someone's back garden. Do they think we want to spend money for something like this? In any case, I'll never buy an album by them again. And their records are generally poor compared to the quality of music available now. A pity.

My title says it all. These are awful. Don't waste your time or money on these. I cannot recommend them to anyone who cares about their ears. They don't block sound. I recently purchased this product to replace an old HP all-in-one printer. I've had a very good relationship with HP printers over the years......But I've been thoroughly disappointed by this one. Not only that, but each page that came out, would curl on it's own while in transit from my computer to my print head - making for a wrinkled, almost ruined paper.
Good but not what I expected. A more substantial piece perhaps would be better but it is good for the price.

I bought this book along with the "The Secret Formula for Getting What You Want." After reading it, it turned out that this woman is just another egoist, and no one can do magic to get things they want. She does make statements such as, if you try hard enough, it's possible. But she doesn't say how hard, or even what effort you have to make.

The main thing I got out of this book was to take note of the difference between a'market' and what an artist thinks a market could be. While the writing is fairly competent, it can not be taken as completely self-serving. It seems to suggest that if you give them enough money they'll keep coming, but they won't. There are some interesting ideas there, but they're scattered amongst the clunky writing.

These headphones are great for the price. I use these all day long and they can be used with various phones (iphone, ipad, galaxy note etc) and computers. They have good bass, treble, and mid-range, plus a mic (so no more screaming into an ear hole while trying to talk away from someone else).

I purchased these at an airport store as a replacement for the earbud headsets. I'll keep searching - I've heard that in this day of cheap products you usually get what you pay for.

These things are great! As long as you soak in water at least 1 hour or more, they will grab onto anything. They grip well and pick up lots of dirt and debris.
Love it, my cat loves it, have recommended to several people, all with very positive results. Only need one per cat, just watch opening when you fill it.

I have read a few of this author's prior and in my view her other books are better than this one. The main female character is annoying, the plot line doesn't move forward, it's like watching someone's daytime soap opera. It's about as well written or compelling as an episode or two from the original Sex In the House. Save your money on these type books. Read Ann Rule's books! A much more engaging, fun read. My recommendation would be buy the series instead but don't waste too many dollars.
Awesome product, very detailed, nice size pieces, sturdy box. Exactly what we were looking for.

This product is a great way to take quick pictures of items you see. Its only downfall has been it will not stand up on its own. The top portion would just rest on the desk at my local office supply store and I kept having them fall back over. For this reason alone i'd like another one but in order for me too, I need to use clips from other products so i dont have that problem again.

It fits my phone really well and looks good. The only complaint is that it slides a bit so when you pull up the notification bar on screen it's prone to falling... but it works otherwise :) I'd say its good value for money...arrived quickly.. even sooner than promised. Thanks.
Bought as part of a birthday present for daughter who had lost her original charger, and she was thrilled that there were several ways to charge it, as well as two additional batteries.
This works just fine.

The product was broken in numerous places when it arrived and the lid for holding ice cubes snapped in two. I think even though there is a sticker on the front that says it will hold 24 ounces, it would only really serve 1 pint. But then again, 16 oz. makes enough drink to last you throughout the morning so I'm not surprised by what happened. The container came out of its packaging with cracks all over it.

They are not at all what you would expect. I thought they were an adhesive and sticky back, but it's just a sticker. The color description is also misleading as the pic has a more neon color, when in reality it is much darker. You cannot even tell they're on your phone. Worst part about this product, however, is that there was two air bubbles left after we put them on. We could actually see some imperfections between them.

This is a great product. I had one like it before & the quality of this product doesn't match my last one. The cover itself isn't tight but when you put your kindle in it, it stays there. However, other than that I've already dropped and tossed it....(:I'm not sure if that's normal or what since it's such good quality. Either way, it's great. My favorite color...pink

I liked the concept of these pens having a magnet on one end and being attached onto something magnetic then plugged into an outlet. The magnets are very small but still enough to keep this from flopping about. For the price, they work as advertised. We use them quite often in our classroom. They can easily be pulled out by students that pick it up or place them down next to their books without much concern for where they'll get to/from.
Have had ours about 2 months. We use both pitcher size & pitcher. It's easy to use/pour from either vessel. The carafe keeps coffee hot or warm for hours.

i am a fan of Michael Connelly and have read every single novel he has ever written. I loved Mystic River, The Black Box, The Poet, A Painted House, etc. I was looking forward to this book as someone who does not care for the detective genre would find it very good. This is one author that will remain on my list from now on, however, if an early first person narration about crime doesn't sound interesting I'll pass. If it's too much gore or violence in his writing, then I'm out.
Bought for kids because it's cute. The sound quality isn't great, very little bass, and you don't have much control if they want music or not.

I got this coffee pot for the price of $20.00 and it is well worth what its paid. Makes great tasting coffee, makes a good cup in about 10 minutes or less. On my old one (which still works) it would take up to an hour on both sides as i heated water. It was time consuming but at least after 10 hours there were no drips from any type of leaking.
This is THE best weeding gadget! It really works.

My wife purchased this DVD the day that it came out, we just couldn't wait to get it. We were disapointed on so many levels. First of all, it's not even a full concert. It's merely 6 songs, 3 songs each from the same song session. The second problem is in several places the camera was zooming out and taking pictures of the backdrop. If you want people dancing behind their musicians, then don't film them at all.

The camera was easy to use and the pictures were pretty good. But... I could not get it through Skype on my MacBook Pro running version 10.9.2 - tried 3 different cameras. Had 2 Canon Elphs that worked for SkypeOut. Got a Belkin web cam which had no trouble at all. Then the Logisys stopped working entirely. Spent several hours in support sessions with various people over about 4 or 5 visits.

This would be the greatest thing if only it didn't leak. We have used these for years without problem, so we assumed there must not be a defective batch. WRONG! The first time I ordered these, they leaked badly. I've had to make sure that all 6 bottles are upright when filled so as to avoid leaking. There is no way I'd put anything but water in them -- even using two tops. That was why I bought them, and they don't really work well from this angle.

For the price of $20, it is worth playing, even with some flaws, however there isn't anything that makes my first play through. The story line was good and made me care what happened next, but I found myself just clicking through much faster than should have been necessary.

My husband and I are avid readers, but this was terrible. The book read like a bad romance novel with the names changed. There is no character development between the characters, nor was there any sexual attraction. It made very little sense. Would not recommend at all. If you want good romance, check out the Lords of The Underworld series by Diana Gabaldon or even Patricia Briggs if she isn't your favorite author. At least then it feels real :)
This product looks expensive but works perfectly! Great price compared to other products.

This is not a bad book. But, there was no reason for me to buy it, or even open it. I would have loved some photos of the actual buildings. That said, this book will be useful just as my other architectural reference books I've bought in the past. In fact, these are all from the same publisher. There is, however, another way to view what should otherwise appear like a very poor photo book, namely by looking at it through an artist's eye.

The product is good but the company and amazon did not send it to me in the time period they said i would. It's like taking my time waiting for a delivery window that comes and goes because of some kind of government shutdown. I can't believe this could happen. A better system would have been shipped by now. Amazon has been known to ship crap or damaged merchandise so why should I trust them? I'll stick with walmart.

I did not read the size of it when i bought it. I guess you really just pay for what ever they think will sell better than nothing. But a lot of things are not that big. If there is anything to it, then don't waste your money on this one.....

I've been waiting on an Otterbox case that holds up more than this...please email me if there's an affordable version of this. :) My iPad isn't very expensive, so... maybe I'll go with another brand next time, too.

To the point, this book reads like a middle school kid put it together. I bought this based on the description given in Amazon, and am disappointed to say that I've read better books off of Amazon. Pros: Easy set up, picture quality and sound. Cons:The worst sound quality, but probably due to my subwoofer. I'm looking at buying some new speakers. No adjustments for picture/settings. Cannot adjust color temperature on remote. Only option is white.

I chose this case on behalf of my husband to protect his new iTouch and it works well for that! Great product, great price, fast shipping. What more could you ask for?! Would definitely recommend. The one thing we also bought along w/it makes the purchase so much that there was no need to!The screen saver/skin protector has a cutout just like all touch screens have that are not perfectly cut.

This thing really is easy to clean- I put it in the dishwasher top rack, and then take a wire brush and reach right across where liquid would go, like inside the spout, or on around the rim of the bottom container area, which takes no more than 5 seconds (I just use plain soap as that tends to hold down food goop better than something with fragrance). I've also found if you rinse this out immediately after use, all things are clean up so much better.

The product is a total crap. i was in hope of using it for both my Nikon D70 and Sony Alpha SLT. But when plugged into the camera it failed to recognize either camera. I tried everything that were described on webpages but did not work. One good thing came out of it. It cost about $45 total.

I have the older version of this model and it works great. Unfortunately its battery would die far too fast so we upgraded to this, which is not better. Battery life barely lasts 1 hour. Maybe I got a defective unit but my guess is that these all seem like poor quality units without any testing at all.

For the price, this is a very nice item. The only problem I had was that it does not fit into an apple USB wall plug adaptor. That makes me consider returning it. They have sent me 2 of these now, thinking one was defective, the second wasn't. It's just junk, doesn't work, never has, won't work.

I like it but as a single dad the weight and space is important to me, this does hold most of what i need for my work commute and weekend warrior needs. if you have lots of stuff to bring with then get another bag. I am so disappointed with this product. This is a new item for me, and as far as cleaning all of the floors in my house on one tank fills up much to fast which means when you use it that tanks empty. I love the size of this feeder. My birds are able to empty it with ease. I'm using sunflower seeds, and they seem not interested. The perches come in handy as well.

Okay game. You gotta beat all the enemies for a good ending. Otherwise I would have thrown it out my window.

If that's the best she can do, I don't think that means much for her fans. I purchased these as a replacement for some other bulbs that I'd bought at the local hardware store. They work well but they were more expensive. If price is not an issue this bulb will serve it's purpose. But if you are looking to save money and buy something cheaper then go with standard incandescents. These are fine although we would have preferred all LEDs (Xenon). One thing I was concerned about when ordering them was longevity.
I bought this book for a class. It is not formatted correctly and was difficult to find answers in the back. Very disappointed!

These are definitely worth the small price. They go on and off without any issues that I can think of. My husband wanted to buy something else at a local store but we bought five of these. This book has some good ideas but falls short on getting right to the point. Too many pages spent explaining something that could have been put in a paragraph. For example, what is "energy balance analysis?" That was simply introduced and left hanging. I didn't really notice any change from one page to the next. Also, it wasn't clear when the author covered several different types of exercises; only part of each exercise would be included.
This has work perfectly so far. It does exactly what it says it does. Very easy setup and worked first time.

The book is great for begining learning the fundamentals of web design but its not really helpful at all if you're just starting out. The filter system was extremely difficult for me to install, but once installed, it worked as advertised. My water tastes great after three weeks.

This is not intended to treat a dogs health but I like these tablets. My dog's vet does too so she can administer them properly. They work. I've bought some other brands of tabs, both "softgels" AND tablets where they do get absorbed easily. Not these.

The story grabs your interest right from the first page. I love how each character has their own unique personality and takes turns adding that little extra touch to keep it fresh while also keeping you wanting more. The only complaint is that it's too short.
Bought this adapter because our car's AUX output did not have an Aux input jack. This does work as advertised. We use in daily at home with Samsung Galaxy S3 phone, Android Tab 10.1.

The new one for me. I love the old one. Still no problems, even though it is a few years old. Easy to assemble. Has wheels so easy moving. Not really sure what else you would need. Very well written, easy read, interesting characters. Read this first then read all his others.

I got this for my son, who doesn't always carry his lunch to school. He has yet to use it - but so far (today) it's just fine. Seems sturdy. Only time will tell. :)

I bought this for my daughter and she loves it! The case is sturdy enough to take a beating from kids. It fits perfectly, feels good, protects the camera lens with plenty of room. She really likes it. She's already taken pictures and video of her dog. Good quality at a good price. I'd recommend it if your child plays alot on their ipod. It's cute :)
My laptop works great with this battery.
I really like this product. Bought one for myself two years ago - still works great. I've given several as gifts. It has always been in my purse or pocket, so it must be pretty durable.

I have one in our kitchen, we are cooking about 20 meals a week. It's my second cooker of this style. The first lasted 15 years, I can't wait to find another and put it into service somewhere else. We love all the features just turn on for what you want & when done. It takes less time than using an oven....so no more waiting. Great product - if you like slow cooking then buy one!
I like the look of this case. It takes a little to get it open but other then that it's perfect. For the price you can't beat it!

I bought this to take with me in my purse especially after reading the reviews saying that it was too big and clunky. It has lots of pockets however only two really are usable one inner pocket on both sides. I need more room so I added some velcro tabs to organize them (velco dots & zippers together).
Not happy at all no longer work after two years :(. Waste of money. They need to stick to sound products.

I've been using this battery for over a year now. At time of writing its life is still rated at 4.5 hours. However, in the beginning, every third or fourth charge, I would lose power from my laptop if I'm not careful to disconnect everything when doing charging. If you just unplug it, you might be able charge your laptop and get around 2.5 hours out of it. Also, since it doesn't hold anything charged like an actual battery, charging takes quite some time.
This would be great if your child has patience.

The price was great. However it didn't live up to expectations. When I first applied the screen saver my laptop wasn't working right. After a while of waiting for the product and trying it everything worked out fine. Then when I needed some more time taking care of other things i started using it. By about two weeks after that if you turned your computer on you'd notice black dots all over the screen. This is not good at all. Don't order from here. Not worth wasting money like that.
Works great..makes my iMac an outstanding product. The only downside is that it can tip over if not secured correctly. But I have had no problems with this item. Good buy!

this game is one of those you have to pass around as there very few that are worth playing. it has some great themes on it, but like any other review says, the story is.. lacking. Awesome animation just like all Pixar movies. No problem with playability or streaming on amazon. My kiddos loved it! Highly recommend :) And great price too. Would definateitely watch again.

I'm not sure why it's been discontinued but still works well. We have two now and love them. This is the best price that I've found. It comes to my house quickly also. It's great. Works well.

Got this for my wife, who does some scrapbooking and embroidery. The first time I tried to use it the cord immediately twisted into strange shapes. Not a very well-made product. She was able to get her project done with it, but I'll have to look else where for one that is sturdier construction.

This is an amazing product from a wonderful company who cares about bringing quality products to the consumer. They have really outdid themselves. I was hoping it would stay put, but with any gravity in play, this thing flies open. Not good. There are other more durable, better designed cases on the market. This just doesn't do as much for me since my work takes me all over town. I'll probably keep it. Just wanted something simple and cheap.
You have to hold the button in at least 5 or 6 times and even then you can still get no more than 3-4 seconds worth of light. Total waste of my money. Very disappointed. Do not recommend.

I'm an 80's fan & every song from all time will be played. Thanks for such an excellent album through out the past few days I've been listening over to it.

This bag is well built with a padded bottom, zippered storage pockets and velcro strap to hold it all together. It was just shy of 3 years old when I started using this bag! My dog had no trouble figuring out how to get it open, but the bottom layer of lining began separating from the bag. At the time (I purchased them in 2007), they were on sale. After less than two year use at my dog's first obedience class, that's still what she did to it...

I don't know what the other reviewers were listening to, but this band is awful. It's nothing like old music from bands like Judas Priest, Iron Maiden or Metallica. And it's nowhere near as heavy sounding as anything else I've ever heard by them either. My favorite song off this terrible album would be Track 1.

First I was expecting a lot higher quality when the case arrived. It does come in pieces but this is very common with leather cases. The color of mine as almost black (perfect color). It's not bulky and has already done its job by protecting my kindle. I love it.

I have owned the Suncast SF-1042 20-Bottle Wine Dispenser for about a month now, and am pleased with it. This model is fairly compact, and it looks good on my small counter top. I expected more of a collection and less history. Not really worth the money unless you are looking for one or two quick facts about each. Good topic but not exactly entertaining. I'm glad this was free because it would cost me too much time if I'd purchased it, even at $5 max. Save your money.

I purchased this to replace a different pair of earplugs, but they did not fit any better. So far only one side works. While looking for a set of headphones, I heard how comfortable these headphones are, and thought it would be nice to try them. They definitely felt more comfortable, but the mic on this model seemed bad from the start.

This book is really interesting, it tells of a woman's life and death by accident in which she must relive each experience over again. Her last visit begins at a gas station that has fallen on hard times so now her husband makes money repairing them.

After only 3 days of using this bag I started noticing that my iPad had a funny smell to it. Not sure what it was and how to properly wash it, but when you first get the bag, they included with plastic bags (don't know why since there's no instructions on it) for easy washing. So I'm trying to keep all items super clean until after use, so just made me paranoid that my iPad's not sanitary. Since then the bag has seemed to have gotten more smelly.

This product is too big for my ear and it slips out easily. I can't wear it. Also, when you make a call the sound quality stinks. The person on the other end can barely hear you. Very irritating. Also tried to hook up with my laptop but just didn't work. Just another wasted purchase. :-(

i don't know how many times we have had to get the ball back into it's socket but, it never fails and has given us years of service.no matter what age or skill level you are going to, this product is a must have. :)

My 3 yr old grandson didn't like it because none of the pieces made any sound and no matter how hard you pushed on them nothing happened. I sent both back for a refund. Disappointed was his reaction : ( Thank you. It did arrive very fast too. I'm in love with Amazon Prime service now!

I bought this book as part of an assignment for my English class. When it arrived three weeks later I was excited to read it. But instead it fell apart at page 3. This does not say much about books but on top of that, when trying to contact Amazon, I got nothing back except that "we'll get back to you.
No way they are up there with the O'Reilly books. While it is difficult reading because of lack of organization, but if you need an example you should know how large that is.

We purchased three batteries to replace a previous ones from HP on our dv9000 series Pavilion laptop. After charging these new batteries, we put them in just as the old one, charged and they worked GREAT. These "new" ones, however, are junk.
I purchased this to see if my cat would play with it.
I have a hard time liking the way this case turns so quickly onto its side.. i would not recommend it. It is also very bulky even though it has such good grip. :(
very nice looking canister with ample space for my needs.

I love the way these cups are made, but every one in my family hated them. The liquid leaks all over and no matter what you do, there is always a leak. We tried several different positions of placement with zero success. Not to mention that when we run our finger along underneath just before drinking out of it seems like there's a film on top. Maybe that's not completely obvious, but, after trying for an hour, I'm convinced ours was defective...I'll try to get this exchange or return it.

My kids like having the option to control their ipods, no matter our situation. Since they didn't care about that much before, I wouldn't have expected it be there as a feature. However, since being there, it's one of those little surprises you wish for. For example, when my daughter was in an accident, her phone broke and she called me. She could hear me just fine. There are times when reception is not that great, for example, on busy roads.
Perfect for cleaning windows after a rain storm. Easy to use and very durable. The only down fall is that the suction cups are not included.

This fits my 2002 corolla perfectly. I have bought one before for the front and it did not fit. I was nervous about buying this brand online but it fit perfectly on first install! Good product to try out. The price is cheap here also. It took less then five minutes to install. Saved a ton of money. Thank You!

This is the same as my post above, but it's still a terrible book. If you are seeking truth and understanding of Islam, then get this. Here goes:1. Al-Hajj Hassan did NOT die or go into "purgatory" from his conversion to Islam - he died in Medina on July 21, 624 AD2. Al-Mutar Ahmad ibn Maslama was not killed in battle against Muslims with swords, even though he does state that at various points in his life. He never claims otherwise.3.

I picked up this book because the author has always been kind of an obsessionist. Not in spite of his personal faults, but because he is a gifted storyteller and often presents interesting stories on topics that interest him. Unfortunately there are numerous factual errors so much as to be comical - such as describing General Lee saying "Oh, I'm sorry, he was one of my greatest friends.." which turned out to not be completely accurate.

This is a great product. It does what it says and I think anyone over the age of 16 should have it. My only complaint about this product was that it took me 5 times longer than most to use it. If you want fast results then go for an otoroide. The shipping speed really doesn't bother me. Most stuff from china takes forever but not this.

I wish the battery pack worked but it was so bad that i just threw it away after putting brand new batteries in it. Don't get me wrong, you do have to be careful about placing on a hard surface like wood or concrete because sometimes the sound cuts out really bad. The volume is not loud enough either. Definitely NOT worth buying. I've had a few bluetooth headphones and this isn't even in the same league. Maybe i got one from lemon.

My daughter was really excited when we got this! After trying to use it, which included getting help from the tech support site, it kept asking me for a disc in my console (yes, no DVD drive) just as other reviewers have mentioned.

I've been a fan of this product for years. My local Lowe's/Menards stopped carrying it. I was so sad to have the only good soap dispenser and not be able to buy more. So when i started research on online sources I came across Soapy Cups. Not sure what changed but it seems like every company has gone downhill with their products. This one is cheap plastic that doesn't work, very hard to fill.

My kids love this toy, but it's small so it breaks easily. If dropped on the floor, your child could do quite some damage. It was made of heavy duty plastic and is great for imaginative play. But buy several and you won't be disappointed. My children would give their limbs to have one like this. This is not as expensive when you factor in shipping costs.
The design looks just about OK. But the product does not work.

I don't like the item and don't see a reason to spend money on it. You get what you pay for and this is no exception. Cheap Chinese crap - look at it as another scam perpetrated by China itself. The one star review was way too kind! If you're using Windows 8, or have older computers, consider buying something other than this. I'm sure it'll work fine when you remove any ancient junk from your computer, but if installing Windows, forget about it. It will be a nightmare.

I was not impressed with this book. The stories were all the same and boring to read. If you like reading about how great a person is, why did they go to college, etc, then you might care for this. But most people would rather read books from real life because that is what their lives are like. This type of "memoir' just bores me. For any men out there looking for more insight into women.. keep looking.
This thing broke after 1 minute use on its maiden voyage. As others here mentioned, the power switch went bad.
It's not worth your money. It's only two feet tall and it doesn't give off very good light.

I am used to the "normal" size mouse and was having trouble using my new mouse. After some research, it seemed that people are complaining of this same issue so you cannot blame Microsoft for a bad design. The design makes use very difficult, because on almost every browser is uses small windows (tabs) which requires scrolling as if in a wheel or scroll bar. Also, even though there seems like no vertical resolution increase, overall screen gets much smaller.

I was disappointed with this book. It is too –light to fill in the blanks that would be needed for an historical novel about Henry VIII and his three queens. The book provides very little, really no, information on Tudor life from before Henry's accession into English sovereign power through Elizabeth's rise to power after Edward's death until Elizabeth dies at least seven years after their marriage.

Bought this for my husband who wanted to use it when he went skiing. Very comfortable, but a little pricey for an insulated jacket. My hubby was always freezing up. This really works. And the company customer service is fantastic! Shipping on all orders and they ship very promptly. A must have for the cold weather days.

I'm so sorry, I really hoped it was going to be good and that the author might finally tell us more about what happened instead of having Alex just say he wasn't happy. It felt like there was something missing from it. The other books in this trilogy had a story you were always curious why one character or another chose a path because it all made sense. My advice is don't buy. And even if you've already read all three, don't bother buying this.

I had no idea this book was written only for Christian young ladies. As an avid reader of fiction and nonfiction, it is VERY unusual to be exposed to such demeaning, ignorant religious content. I've started several books in the YA section at our local library, and I'll never buy a teen girl one again. This title will give teens something very wrong to think about. Not too mention, there are far more books with the same message.
This was a really quick read, about 50 mins. Each book is only 2-3 pages each. It's cute in all aspects however. Can't complain. For $2.

I really only have one complaint. If you don't put your arm down and make a fist to prevent them from slipping off, they will loosen by themselves every now and again. But other than that - love them. My son is able to wear his glasses which he didn't before because of the rubber tips. He just can't break these ones so it's nice :) I would recommend these. They are good quality for not too expensive

The product works, but at no level is it particularly good to have or extremely bad as many other reviewers seem to be saying. It does look great, and feels nice, the material seems very sturdy, and even with a full charge, has sufficient battery life to last for hours of usage. BUT.

I enjoy this series for entertainment and it has a reasonable amount of plot to it. These aren't award winning stories, but they are enjoyable. The books get into the psyche and motives of individual characters instead of always being concerned with action. It would be nice if Ms. Auel went back beyond these novels so that she could show her readers more about their worlds. That said, do read them. It's fun reading fantasy stories set in another world where there is magic as well as humans.

the light works great. It is very easy to install. Be advised that some wires must not have been cut correctly and will require additional length if you want it less tight. Also, there are a number of tiny screws in what you would call the ballast. Mine was missing one hole drilled so I did get around it, but be warned. The screw covers do seem secure.

Not the best book by Patterson but not the worst either. It is an OK read. The plot was very entertaining for a few hours. Overall, I will give it credit and say that I've read worse books in Patterson's book. And I'll probably reread it. That's my rule. :-)

This product was a complete waste of my money. Do not buy it; save your money or invest in another product. The keyboard is hard to type on and I find that even tapping it accurately at times does nothing. The cover did not fit right and the iPad falls flat when you try typing something on it. My husband purchased this for me as his gift. He has already returned it because he said it was cheaply made too. If you are looking for something good, look elsewhere.

My new puppy is only a few weeks old so hasn't been getting too much dirt from his feet yet. But i feel like it's good for keeping her smelling clean and fresher. I'd say its also better quality than other cheaper brands. You get 2 bottles and 1 refill.

This was a very cute story and I loved seeing my sons reaction to the little dog in it. However it was an unfortunate purchase because although it's written by Mr. Rogers it is not made or filmed by him. So he isn't even remotely involved with this one. If anyone out there has found one of his movies about Little Dogs please let me know. Other than that they are sweet stories. My two year old son likes them so I'm happy. But if you can find yourself your own videos on Amazon.
We take photos while on vacations and vacations, both above ground with professional equipment and in our RV. If you're looking to have an easy way to send your photos, get this.
It is a good set as far as quality goes. But it does wrinkle after washing. Also, one side seam doesn't stay down in the center, so no matter what's being washed...
Great story, good character development and great ending. It had some twists to it that I didn't see coming. Looking forward to the next book. Highly recommend this series.
What can be said about a calendar? This is pretty much like past years. We don't need to do this every year; let's just get rid off paper.

This is a good idea. Not so much when it comes to actual quality. I bought two, and both leaked in the first few months. After dealing with customer service, they offered us either 15% off for them to replace them. They said that this would be great if we could prove ownership of these items. What kind of crap is that? We should still have all our purchased products.
Received the item, plugged it into two different USB slots on an HP notebook. The plug fit perfectly, but would never charge.
This is a great product -- I have been using it before bed time. It works as described and does keep the bugs away when placed just on top of mattresses.
Does its job but case broke off when taking off. Would prefer something stronger. Need less words for this.

A story about a girl that likes to play dress up and go shopping with her friends. Her mom is an awful person who has gotten so angry since moving from Kansas city where the mother was working as a teacher in public education. When they move into what she believes are great new homes for her, it turns out it's one of those "ghetto.houses" she keeps seeing.
We recently had a significant summer heat wave, which turned out more like an El Niño than a normal warm summer. But we did feel that it helped this year if there was enough cool air.

I have been trying to replace the battery in my iPhone 3GS for a while now and after all this time I am still looking for solutions. Now that I've finally found out what I'm doing wrong (holding multiple power button pushes at once)this replacement works PERFECTLY well. The original had stopped working. This was easy installation also. Took about 2 minutes on each side.
If you want "fantasy", then read some Tolkien. The quality of writing style is what I could call amateurish.

This book has so many errors in the sample code examples that it cannot be used to get anything more than an overview of a real programming language. It is full of things not mentioned anywhere and with very basic explanations for advanced concepts. The author uses too much curly braces where they should have been commas. One example states something like "As you can see, we are assuming there exists two ways to do something using an expression.

My wife and i have loved these books for years. I would keep buying them every year in hardcover because they are simply wonderful. This edition, however, is a complete misrepresend. The book itself was fine but rather than having the hard cover it is now printed on, which after much use, has begun to come apart on two pages. The second page started falling out shortly thereafter. It seems as though there must be some kind of poor quality control going on.

I'm not sure exactly how they got away with it, but someone is clearly trying to make a quick buck off an obviously good idea. The premise that you could sell someone's death sentence without showing them anything more than their body was extremely disturbing.

I have used many headphones in the past ten years, but none compare to these headphones. The bass produced by them is incredible. They are perfect for movies or TV watching without bothering others around you. But, if you're looking at these, be aware of a few things:1. Most people say you can't turn on and off them. This was verified with Sony. However, once turned on, they make annoying noises. I've had to take batteries out every two days.

I used these for 2 years. On day 3, the light started to flicker. Today, it died. Very disappointing. A waste of money. I'm switching back to a traditional lightbulb. These are not reliable and don't last through many uses. The bulbs do get very hot on my stove top (about 200 degrees). Also, no matter how tight it's screwed in, food can drip down into it.
These are wonderful.

This is one of the worst. All these songs are not on other albums, and it seems that when an artist does put out a single album with only his singles, they don'thing but re-hash them. These tracks will be great for listening to in your room, as their repetitiveness makes everyone want to punch someone.

The only reason it did not get the full 5 stars from me is due to having some of her other titles on tape and thought this release might be more complete. It is not. Only the 4 disc volume 1 disk has those extra two tracks. However, that said, I still give both volumes a thumbs up! If you are like me, you will love this new album especially as you hear how far Janet has come since "Rhythm Nation 1814".

I bought this product and the directions are vague at best. The pictures they show with it don't correspond to what it looks like when applied. Also, there is no mention of anything about bubbles that might get caught under it. Very frustrating. Would give zero stars if option here.

I must start out by saying....If you loved the first two books in this series then don't read this.....The action takes place all over and there is nothing interesting happening to keep me interested. For some reason it seems that each of the three main characters are starting from different places. So much going on so fast they aren't really developed or interesting. They seem more like fantasy world creations with no real life experience attached. It took almost half way through reading for something interesting to happen.
This thing scratched up pretty easy. My Kindle itself did not. It looks nice but doesn't work well with the cover on. Waste of money.

Nice looking case and easy to clean. The main issue with mine is that the magnet isn't strong enough even when it's closed so it doesn't put my iPad to sleep (something I need for work). It's not too bad, but still disappointing. Also, because of this flaw on mine, I'm starting to notice bits or scratches in some of the corners which makes me worry about wear and tear, etc. Overall, a decent case, especially in black.

The first one I went through the ink cartridges quickly. They lasted a long time. This one seems to be different. It appears with each print job there is more and more. Not sure if it would work in my printer. So far very unhappy because I've had trouble finding this cartridge at stores around where we live and don't want to order again. It's not cost effective when you have 3 little kids who run out of ink in no time even though its an okay price. Will NOT buy again from you.

This is our second reorder, it works amazing. We have three dogs that we spoil with snacks when we're home. This seems to work better than some of the other brands I've tried. Highly recommended. Thank you. :)

I have to admit that when this book got off of the printer i almost cried.
