This is the worst album i've EVER heard in my entire life. When I first listened to this CD, and how could i not? it sounded like every other punk band out there. So when I bought this and popped it into my CD player, right away I was disappointed. It seemed to me that they were just trying too hard. If you're a fan of Good Charlotte, blink 182, or any similar bands, don't waste your time with this. This group should probably stick with music.
Does not work, I bought 2, and they both does work but one doesn't work! Save your money and don't bother buying it!!!!! Do Not Buy!!
My dad says he is very pleased!

This item is really cheap. I had to drill my own holes to install this. The only thing its good for as a cheap and plastic stand with little metal screws. The design of the wire holders are just horrible, they aren't even centered so you will have wires sticking out right in front of you. It looks nice but it's made kinda cheap. But I'll keep it until someone needs it... You pay for what you get :)

I bought this as used to replace one that the strap broke. The new design does not work well at all and is harder to use. For example, it is impossible to set the timer/date with buttons unless you take out some of your clothing. Also, when trying to use the stop button, if you are too slow, the watch stops before being able finish setting or stops. Other watches have a button push on either side so you can see how far into chrono mode you have.

I don't have a lot of good things to say about this item except that it is worth the price. It looks really cool on my macbook pro with the carbon fiber/brushed aluminum design. The legs are made out of aluminum. These parts do come in two pieces though. You will need to take apart your old keyboard and put these on. If you can't see the little metal "clips" or whatever they call them, that's fine, it's still very easy.

Good product, but it is not what I need. Did not read the description well enough, thought I would be able to use some of these in different applications. Still will have to search around for others. This particular package might hold a few more uses. Just didn't realize that, especially since you cannot reuse them, and they are small too. The price was good though! Thanks anyway.

My son loves this product, however the top part fell off and it's no longer holding any water. All that happened was he dropped it in a puddle from his room onto my carpet. No idea how this happened. However he still plays with it. I don't know what to tell you for durability. As long as it keeps him entertained then we all are happy. Thanks Fisher-Price. The other issues I have had with this, is one of the fish mouths didn't work properly.

I use the case as a holder for my phone so that it won't get scratched on car dashboard. The clip is good too, holds well and doesn't scratch phone. Easy to remove after cleaning screen. Overall an excellent value for money. One comment would be that it scratches easily from scratches. But not a problem when used with protector film like Armor. It does collect pocket lints. Great case, love it. Only complain is too much friction between case screen and clip.

I got this as replacement for my old charger. It worked great the first several times but then just stopped working. Very dissapointed. The price is too good to be true. I'll try one more time and go on here. That way if there are issues, at least it'll get a review. Hope it doesn't break or cause any damage since I'm getting ready to throw away all of these and have another set sent out.
It looked fun when we read about it, but from time of opening of package everything went wrong. Games play too easy, kids bored fast.

For some reason these earphones produce an almost constant buzzing when I have them on or turn the volume up. Even at max volume. Very annoying. I've gotten two sets of those cheap chinese junk ones. They're worth it to spend just a few bucks more. You get what you pay for. Spend your money wisely folks. These are a total waste. I'm very unhappy with this purchase. Don't waste time and money. Get something good. That's where I've ended up now.

This book had very little to do with the original series. I expected more than 5 pages of nothing new. Very disappointed considering what came before. It read as if it was written for a child and put on paper. No sense reading something from someone who wants to get attention.

The plastic base cracked down the center after first use. I took it on vacation and upon returning home discovered that they wouldn't replace it. They quoted me $175 for a new base. I'm not happy about having to buy another blender when my old one cost under $50 in 2006. This was our Christmas present this year we can't even get what money it's worth. Really disappointed! :(

I needed a few extra chargers around the house for work. This product is pretty decent though its not great. My only complaint would be that all of them broke off on me within 10 days of receiving them.

This is a great way to clean up small areas in the kitchen and bathroom. You can use water or vinegar with this item which makes it safer for kids use. I have used them frequently to sanitize my house every couple of months since i got these so they get lots of use. The main reason why i'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 though is that only 2 squirt devices came inside mine with one being broken inside.

Did not fit my 2001 toyota sienna. Do not buy it if you own a civic. If i was told to return and get another one than id never go through this again. Very unhappy because I need this now. Never again will I purchase from online shopping sites. Its hard enough trying find stuff when you're just out of your mind. This is ridiculous. They sent me the wrong one. Really frustrated that amazon doesn't do anything about this. Oh well its back in there inventory.

I purchased it and never got around to using it. Waste of money, now on Amazon looking for a better one. It didn't help me at all. It's not the best as shown in the picture. I'd recommend sticking with regular ice packs. Not this one! It's okay, but you should get more bang for your buck or higher end.

This book was recommended to me by a good friend. It read like an early draft of a great novel, and I had much the same feeling afterwards. For instance," The first year after graduation brings many new problems which we must face. Some people think they have it all."or "All right, if everything is free, why would you need to work?". There are also many, many questions unanswered. How did Dr.

This book may appeal to readers 12 years old and up, but I'm not interested in reading a story about spoiled brats, as I am one myself. The only characters that actually make an impression are the main character's younger sister, her best friend, and their mother. In fact, there is never much dialogue between any of them. For such an in-depth biography, some details could have been left out, if that's what it takes for someone so young to talk to those who were around him his entire life. Very boring.

I was skeptical after reading the reviews of this product, but they were wrong! My two cats, who normally would not drink anything unless its warm or in some sort of treat, both like these treats. They must know what flavor chicken strips are and that one is just as tasty once your cat realizes it. We have had them for months now with no problems what-so-ever whatsoever.

They work fine with the computer and mouse but would not communicate wirelessly when in my living room 50 feet from router using same router. Sent it back. Amazon made return painless as always. Maybe a different company make this product. It seems to be quality control problems at Logitech? I wanted them for use with our entertainment center/tv setup. Too bad. Now going back without them. As always, Amazon is super.

This is a good case, not bad. The silicone casing holds the phone in place very well, and comes off easily but still does its job... But my main complaint is that it's advertised to fit an iPhone 4S, when it actually DOES NOT Fit an iPhone 3G AT ALL!!!!! I really have no idea how they screwed up so badly, because this case fits like a glove on any other phone! So disappointed in this, cause now I'm getting ready to put new scratches directly onto it.
Not what I expected to be. I guess it is worth the read if someone has never done this before. Just did not see how it could help with weight loss. Very light reading. Was hoping for a little deeper.

I was really excited to see that this book came out. i bought it and the first half actually looked great. However, when she had time to write about the women on top of their game, or her friends in sports who were the "elites" at school, that's when things went down hill. The stories felt all forced by a lack of real writing skills. There are some good tips and exercises for self-development scattered throughout that add value, but i'm not sure if anyone can sell themselves these secrets.

This book was an absolute disappointment. A waste of money. Don't believe me? Read what the top reviewer says in her review section. She basically sums up my experience. There wasn't a single thing that I found interesting or useful. The author would have been better off not including any pictures. I'm glad this one is free with Prime shipping- I'll be deleting it from my kindle fire and getting some good reading for free: "The Complete Idiot's Guide to Creating a Healthy Emotion-Free Life." 
 Rating: 1.

i am really shocked that this book made it to print. there is not one thing in here worth taking the time to read. save your money and get something by a real scientist. most of what she writes about are just wrong or misleading. her writing style leaves so much to be desired. I was forced to give this at least 1 star because amazon would not, which says alot more than i can say. if you were thinking bout buying this, don't. buy any other science book.

This item replaces a broken key that was on my Jeep Cherokee. The keys are hard to find! But they came quick and the price can't be beat. You will always find what you want. Thanks Amazon for saving me money. I didn't have many options or choices. Thank you... Sincerely, Karen Johnson
After a friend put my old one on their key chain that was lost I bought another. Now it always has its own place.
This is an excellent product for anyone with a cat or dog. No more cleaning up the litter all over. The only problem I had was finding good clumping sand to put in it. Just not as common anymore.

My grandson is 7 and loves the movie The Lion King. So when I saw it on Amazon for such a good price, he could not wait until Christmas to get it. It was a great purchase. Thanks! Will buy more in the near future.

Not quite what I expected. It does seem to take a while just because it is so big, it's not real easy to maneuver with the long arms on things. My other brush works much better. And there's way too many bristles and little chunks that should be ground off as the brush wears down. I'd go back to my old brush. Too expensive to do that. So don't be fooled by its name, but if you are looking for something very nice, get this. But there has got to be better out there.

I bought this for my son who is a football fanatic. He still loves it but some of the paint on the handles has started to come off. When i called them they said that they had no idea what happened... and i was told by someone from their design department " you need to wash it, or else there will be more paint". The product overall isn't bad, especially since it's an inexpensive, cheap gift.

I think the product is great and exactly what i wanted but when you pay for a "guarantee" they shouldn't lie about their product. One of my lights worked as advertised but after an almost 45 minute call to tech support (super helpful) we had nothing to do with that. They are just making money off this product! Buyer beware!

This is an easy to use, well designed product that does what it says and works well. I like having two battery packs so if one wears out (which happens often) you already have another good one. The extra plugs are a nice feature for the price too. Would buy again!

I had purchased another brand first and had trouble following directions. Thought about returning but decided on purchase from Amazon instead. The install couldn't have been easier. Great product. Very happy with performance. Would recommend over other brands. Price was excellent for unit as well. No more heat or cold in room which can be a problem here. It's very quiet. Good purchase.

As an owner of a Weber Genesis Silver and Black grill I had heard the hype on this cover so much that when buying my own small BBQ stand for use around the house, decided it was time to shop out one from MSR. It doesn't fit quite right but I'll get over it. However what turned me off is how heavy he weight seems to be making it. Maybe I'm in Australia but this cover weighs 50 lbs or maybe twice that.

My son love this toy he play with it all the time I'm glad I got it for him and you couldn't even find this one in my local stores they said there were none that go along with it it's like Christmas morning to little ones!!!

I bought one of these before they were all gone and only used it about a dozen times until the belt snapped. The new one looks identical - but didn't last any more than that. It got clogged, was stuck at some point or other with what seemed like hair in it from my cat trying to groom himself. So much for grooming him now that we're on an annual schedule. I've tried fixing it, unplugging & cleaning it.

the first time I watched this film, I was extremely disappointed.. so for about 2 years, every Halloween after that one and after, they still released this movie as if people thought nobody had bought it to see it. This is probably their lowest rated film of all time. It just doesn't do anything right. It makes zero sense, the dialogue is, at best, terrible, and there's an absolutely no plot, nothing even remotely interesting, it's a complete waste of time, you'll be wasting your money.

I thought it would be a light but comfortable and cozy blanket. This is not it. It was very stiff when i first got in bed. So we still don't know if its going to soften up. Otherwise the quality seems good. I'm hoping after some more wash that will happen..

the design is great but once you put a battery in and screw it to get a clear pic u can see all your pics, bad buy. i dont recommend not worth $2. spend that on 1 good case. im sure theres lots better ones around. this one sucked.

I have played all the other SimCity games extensively. And though this one keeps you busy and there is a great deal to do, it really doesn't seem as open ended or flexible in its design like previous titles. The biggest disappointment to me, was that it felt very scripted, almost scripted so everything seemed scripted such as how important your next action sequence is. I think with this game they took advantage of having their hand held through out so if you're into that, than fine.
I was disappointed with this series after finishing A Game For Heiress.

The game is a good way to enjoy some of the classics like Monopoly. It's fun and allows for better strategic planning which results in longer lasting play. I love it but wish there were more than three houses per round instead of only two. Also, would work well with up to 8-players. I'd recommend it.

This is a poor quality product. It broke the second time I used it and I'm not sure if that's because I had it too tight or not. The metal part detached and one of the handles busted off. Save your money.

I expected more, as this game was very hard to play, on normal or hard. It is a shame they didn't have more control in the games. Some of the ones we've played were great and others terrible. I'd say that we got about 80% correct. We just wanted something else. This wasn't it. Sorry.

The quality of this item was just not up to the price it is being sold for. While on vacation in another country I found one with an all metal handle, a better size fork for our needs and less expensive than these two pieces. Don't waste your money if you have multiple places that would be good for storage. Also check out other reviews before purchasing these.

Just about every other book in the world on this subject is better than this piece of trash. I bought it because I'm interested but it goes into a lot of things that have happened before and there's nothing new or interesting here. If you want good books out there, I suggest reading anything by Michael Persinger instead which tells how real UFO investigations began.

I would read this book again. It was entertaining and easy to read. Some of the information was incorrect such as he referred to two different types of horses when referring his son who owned a Quarter Horse.
I have been a fan of the series for years, however there seems to be no conclusion with this one at all.

The color was right on, it went on smoothly & with little effort. I am getting a lot of positive comments from my friends. It is still holding up. Only have had about 3-months, but so far soo good. Very happy with product - easy to apply -- no problems. Fast shipping too!

I'm amazed and have no words for this fantastic product. Just love it a lot. Good price as compared to others of its type on amazon.com. We took about 5 years off our carpet with three dogs. It's like having your puppy now without the carpet! It is so easy to handle even when you don't do it very much, just use it. Love it! This should be in everyone's household.

I was disappointed by the short period of time that this battery held a charge. It also only worked well about 5 - 6 months, after which it began to lose its charge very fast. I'm surprised how good a run Amazon has been running, but what ever they are doing, they're doing it! This is my last on-line purchase from them! Not going through them again!

I bought the TV mainly because of its price and it was delivered at my door in 2 days! It's a perfect little entertainment center for small spaces. The only thing missing from this unit is an on off switch instead of having to unplug. Other than that great purchase so far... will update if things start going down hill. Will recommend to friends & family :)
I am giving this fan 2 stars only because my previous fan--another brand with no "swivel"--lasted about 5 yrs.

While I liked the book and concept regarding the life of a boy in India, unfortunately there is too much violence. It was as though something bad happened all to often for my taste. Some things just never change. I'm not giving up on this book. There are plenty more good books that need writing or rereading.
it worked great for years but did not last as long. The price is better than the regular ones on tv and with prime.

In this second book, which is supposed to be about three years after the first one, I did not really like the main character. She whined too much and was in denial most of the time. The story held my interest, though. And yes, people do get their comeuppance eventually. It isn't that hard to figure it out from several hints throughout the book. There were a couple parts where we meet the hero's father, who shows up again later on... and some characters reappear at least 3 times total.

I have read all of James Patterson's novels and this series was one that gave me the opportunity to keep up with the characters and enjoy their interactions. This book is good for a light summer reading without breaking your heart. Some other authors get bogged down in details relating their love lives or are overly violent towards women. When the author allows you a step back into another world, it can be refreshing.

This is not a CD you can use to listen to as it does NOT have the original recordings. It was poorly mastered and sounds like an old AM radio. One of these days I should just send them back but they are so cheap there probably wouldn't cost much at all. Just my opinion. Would somebody please re-issue this with the ORIGINAL recordings? Please do it! The music has been remastered from vinyl records that sound even better now! Thanks! If anyone knows why this doesn't happen, let me know.

After reading so many 5-star reviews I finally decided to purchase the book but it was very difficult for me just to get through. Many grammatical and spelling errors, plus a character who is not that interesting. Don't waste your time or money. Just my honest opinion.

It was the wrong item! The one I ordered is much more expensive, but it works and they are very good at shipping things on time.... My suggestion would be to make a change in your descriptions as soon aspossible..... This did not fit my camera...:-/. And had cost me allot of money to get here.. Very disappointing. They should probably say these items have different styles for other kinds of camers....

This is a small book but it contains a lot of information such as the chemical names and some of their applications used in agriculture. The chapters are divided into many topics. I enjoyed reading about them, however, they were quite dry because you needed to have an understanding of, or interest in, this type of thing. Having read over a hundred books on farming, horticulture and other topics i found very little new information here. However, this didn't hold me back from enjoying it.

I purchased this for my husband because we love to grill. However, the cooking surface is so small that it can't hold enough food for a normal meal. It can hardly put even 2 steaks on there. The whole thing just seems a little too small. We had hoped we'd be able to use it, too, but it's not what we were looking for. Now we'll stick with our old grill and grill pan set. It's easy to clean. As long as you don't leave anything out when washing it.

I got this as a gift for someone who likes to cook... so maybe she enjoyed it, but what we actually got was the newer version with little pieces of bread on them, which is a much smaller size. Too small & not all that nice looking for an office or even the kitchen. To make it work at our house (I need about 15 slices each time I bake), I had to cut down on how many slices...

I bought this for my husband, he does like it. Fits well and really protects his phone. The only thing that would make it better is if the holster was detachable. And maybe a color other than black so we could tell who's phone or whom it's on without having to search in our purse. Other wise happy with product.
these didnt like in ears at all...

I recently bought a new iPad and wanted something inexpensive to protect it. These are fantastic in terms of quality, look good, feel great and get the job done. They go on easy, take off, apply again well, no scratches. All you need is about 10 minutes if you have never applied one before but they seem to hold up for a long time. Good product! Highly recommend? A little spendy compared to other similar products but well worth it! Would buy again!
Works great and looks great. No problems so far. Very satisfied with service as well. Would recommend for anyone.

This was a really fun book. It is the second book written by this author that I have read and both were good reads, if you are looking for erotica, it does not disappoint. You will know right away who the killer is. If you want to go on quite an enjoyable ride, enjoy this read.
A great movie, my son enjoys all the Disney movies. This one is no exception. I would highly recommend it.
I've read all three books published by Susan Isaacs and have enjoyed them.

I have to get one of these books for every child coming down the isle. It is really educational and fun if you can find it! My kids love it and want it on their beds! One more thing! Why do they put ads before it, other than to make someone feel that there are many children buying this book? Just not cool. It's a great book with lots of information. Please fix that problem before we all purchase it. Thank you.

Well I received my battery today...only to find out the terminals were in backwards??? So for me that means I'm unable to charge it. It was disappointing but still usable. Be careful when ordering as this seems to be an issue with some sellers of this battery! Otherwise its a great replacement for your HP Pavilion dv5. :) And now I have it so Im not depending on my laptop unless we're both home or my husband decides he needs one.
Too thin to do the job. Would not recomend. My husband found another way to use it. Not as functional and would have returned it.
Good product. The delivery went extremely fast as well! My husband liked these supplements very much! He would recommend them if you want some new protein supplements. Thank you! :)

What happened to the old days when women had pride and self worth of their own? Now we are just an object for his pleasure. I believe the man should have left in the first place, but she kept asking him to. She did say that he could have found something else. The idea about making love was not bad, it is always a good thought too. But this lady needs help. How can someone be so selfish without realizing what they doing. All men need that. Men don't take care of anything.

Bought this in January and put it on my phone the same day. It seemed okay at first & fit fine. I liked the case. Today was the last day that would have covered an Amazon return policy so i ordered one from elago (http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004M0U5KU/ref=oh_details_o00_s01_i00). Its not nearly as good.

I have had my eye on this for quite a while as I am an avid espresso and latte(coffee drinker) fan, but didn't want to shell out over $100 dollars in the past....then they offer this at less than $40. Seriously?! Great purchase, you won't regret it! You can buy 2 machines together with the frother that runs around $25 dollars.

There is so much garbage being put on dvd these days it's not even worth buying. This set would have gotten two stars from me had the movie been OK. My question was if anyone has listened to this and what it says about the other three films?

This book is a great read, the storyline keep you interested and had you feeling sorry for characters then turn around an bring them to justice. Very good reading. I was amazed by this books ending.. Great read!!!

The premise is good - and it keeps you wondering. It was a nice light read in the middle of cold winter nights. And after finishing it, I realized that this might be my summer vacation book, for sure. But it's too short. Just as the story ends, it suddenly ends. Don't care for that. There are some grammatical errors but not terrible. Nothing major. However, like other reviewers, I've noticed there were just so many "fillers" between all these characters.
My son received this item for Christmas. It was fun for the first minute and then it broke. Nothing will fix it. Waste of money. Do not buy! I should have read the reviews before purchase.

This thing is crap! I could have put together a better product. After one week of use the plastic housing for where you plug it into your car fell apart. The entire product feels very weak. My iPod also started to get really hot after an hour or so on my car. Do not buy!!! Waste of money.

I am not sure if it was the product or just me, but this thing is useless. It does make good coffee, and I've had better coffeemakers than this, however, coffee on grounds would be my preference, that being aside from the lack of any carafe. I'm going to continue searching for something useful. As a small bonus, there are no "filter baskets" in which you can put grounds. Not very eco-friendly! You won't regret buying one though as they do break pretty easily.

This book gives all the essential information that you need to develop and grow an organic garden, but if you're not using a garden sprayer you'd better learn how in order for this guide to be useful.

Great little charger. I like it so very much, I'm buying another one for my other vehicle. You can't miss this product. It's a perfect sizeand weight. Very fast to charge an iPod. No more waiting 5 + hours plus in the hot car while you've been doing something else. Highly recommend this!! This charger is worth every penny!!!!! Thanks!

This item was very small and hard for it to even look up what we wanted. For those who did know the answer i would like them thank you, but not us. It is ok though... maybe I will try again sometime next year or so. Thank you.

I bought this and after charging one of my batteries, it will no longer take a charge so it is useless now. It was working great until then. Also, when you have multiple batteries on board, their weight forces them to touch each other and thus make contact with that battery for power transfer. For me, all four batteries are touching at every connect. As far as the light goes, it's okay without being blinding. It provides several useful settings.

I have had this for 6 months now. No problems works perfectly. I use a variety of media and it plays them all with no problems. Easy setup. This is not my first bluray play so I also updated the firmware to include Hulu plus, Plex server which I've heard are great. There seem to be very few internet access issues. It loads just fine from both USB flash drive or hard disk. Would recommend. Only complaint would be if you leave movies on.
I'm sorry but if you are going to end your book with no ending you need something to take place within it. This didn't provide that.
Exactly what I was looking for. My 2 daughters really liked the variety of colors as well at a reasonable price. Thanks for providing these.
Very fun and easy to learn. Fast paced but not complicated. All ages will enjoy.

This book is the worst one I have ever read, I've read every one. What a waste of time, there was some good history in it, but that was about it. My advise don't waste your money get something else more worthy. But if it's free download it and see for yourself..... my opinion you will be glad that at least you've not paid for. So here are the reasons why:1. Author uses too many words only to say he's using them right.2.

I did like the idea of this book, but as a reader, who is generally interested in all things British and Irish, it was hard work. The dialogue often seemed contrived. I didn't care enough about any one particular character, despite their varied roles (i.e. servant, servant/mistress, mistress/mistresses) for me to care. In addition, as other reviewers have noted, there were many editing mistakes - missing words, incorrect spelling, or odd punctuation marks, which, while distracting, added little substance.
I have used this same one for years and when my last two were stolen, I bought another. The plastic is cheap and breaks easily. They need to make a better one.
This is an awesome little machine! It beats my old machine a long ways and does a nice job for home use! It's also very attractive on the counter too!

This is a cheap product. The little tabs that hold the pages closed broke within days of getting it in my drawer. Not nearly strong enough to really protect your records. Spend the money and get something more rugged.

This item arrived in a timely manner however the quality is abysmal. The finish was scratched and there are rust stains all over it. I don't expect this to hold up more than two years. For that reason alone I'll return it, save enough for my next order of another item.

Just had to get on the Amazon web site and find this CD. I have it in an imported version from France, but I wanted a replacement for one that is nearly impossible to track down. I like it. It goes along with my collection perfectly. As usual with this group, the music has a good beat, lyrics are strong but not overt, and, while somewhat different, not "cheesy" at all. Good stuff. Check out other albums they made.

They are smaller than I thought and the handles stick out too far for me to be able to really grip things with them when cooking. The silicone is thick yet not enough so my wrist becomes fatigued after cooking in these mitts. Also they slide around a lot during use.

I really am a fan of the works by this author because they are full if humor and action, but this novel is not worth one penny. It seems like you are reading something about an animal show that just rambles on for 500 pages. The characters are completely over done. To much description given in my opinion. This book never actually got to where it was supposed to. About 80% through. You would think it started moving then there is another 100 pages thrown in.

The quality of this case is fine, and it looks cute when you view the front. But if I drop my phone, it's not protected at all. My iPhone broke while in it. Not even worth sending back because shipping just doubled what i paid to buy it. So all together spend your money on something else. This one will serve as a temporary case, but don't plan it for long term protection. It's cute though. Just be careful how much space between the screen protector.

I bought this as an addition to my Kindle Fire and it works great. The added size is worth the price, which you get a case that allows you great handling with your hands on device. Very sturdy. Great quality item. The other features work very well. Would buy again. Highly recommend.

These bowls are of nice size and design. Not a whole lot there for the price, kind of cheaply made but works well enough,. The lids dont stay on when washing by hand, or if you put in dishwasher. But overall good bowls. Nice design. Great size.

The product itself is what I expected. It's quite sturdy and doesn't rattle or move around. It was easy to install in the wall. Looks great too! Definitely a good buy! Also you can find it at Lowes for just $40.

I have used these gloves with my work for 4 years and they are the best. My hands don't look any worse after using them than just plain old gloves. Plus it's easier since there aren't two or three types of gel on each finger. These last awhile before getting holes in them, too. In fact, when mine finally developed tears (which you CANNOT spot unless you're looking very carefully), I had to go back online for more.

This has it's moments. The animation is crisp and well done- as one would imagine from Pixar with great voice actors. I feel this was quite a bit more violent than the previous movie Brave but there are some good fight scenes that may appeal to younger viewers. I'm not thrilled that they changed their classic Disney characters of Nemo in appearance so much, especially since Peter Pan didn't have the slightest change throughout all three movies. My biggest complaint is how the plot went.

This unit does what it says very well. The sound level cannot be adjusted so it's really too loud for our cats. We've had cheaper ones where we didn't have as much success, but if they won't eat when there's noise we might try.

This set is really beautiful, but it was not packaged very securely, as one of the corners on it's cake were slightly crushed. It could have been so much worse if it had come directly from Amazon, because I would return it. My daughter loves it, and that's what's important. She wanted a tea party themed kitchen for her 6th birthday, and this seemed like just what we needed after looking at quite a few. The only downside of our search has yet to be discovered in terms of quality.

Great quality and excellent price. I was tired of spending $10 or $15 every few months for new filters. These have been working very well so far. They are slightly smaller than the original, but as long as you have them in your canister it's not a problem. This is one expensive cat litter, but it really does do a great job. Highly recommend. Be sure to replace it once the bag gets full though. If not, there will be litter dust everywhere. My box still looks brand new.

My girls love this book. However, I felt the quality could have been better. The cover was worn and some of pages were not cut all teh way through. A good book for kids, but I'd like a little better quality.

I know this was a free download, and because of that, i'm not complaining too much, but this book had little information about it at all... only for the people who plan to work as part time!! Don't waist time reading it!!!!

When I first read the synopsis on this book that it was about 2 best friends - a girl and guy who had crushes on each other - It was okay. I kept reading. There were no big surprises to it. Girl falls asleep in class at school then wakes up one night not knowing which friend she is with or even why she's awake.

The book is okay. A little too much info and not enough pictures. I was getting a lot of help in making my own crock pot from the Internet but it would have helped to see something more detailed before we got into it.
It doesn't taste a very good either, but it does give you energy for about 8 hrs, so that's good. But what don't like is, there aren't any carbs at all. And its kind of hard getting used to.
The tips are way too sharp, causing much discomfort around eyes or eyes. Not a comfortable look for people who work.

This is the first litter scoop I've used, and I love it. It cleans out easily enough if it clumps at bottom, but still holds onto litter, so it's not a problem with my cat being over weight. Definitely worth it! And when I do move to another, hopefully larger box/pan I'll buy one again. :D

Although the author is an impressive and gifted writer -- it's not worth reading much more of his work. He writes with too many cliches, including a "macho cowboy" story line. I know he's trying to write about how women should be -- but it comes across as silly. The constant references are tiresome and the sex scenes laughable. A good editor could have made this into something interesting, and make some changes from what seems like Mr. Weber's first effort. Read any other romance novels by Ms.

The phone is a good basic phone. I use it for answering the voice mail and not to make calls. My only complaint about this phone, since its so cheap, was that every time you answer it, it resets back into standby mode from where you left it. Not very convenient, especially when there's no need to keep your hand on it long enough to press talk.

The book was not what I thought it would be at all. It did not explain the different methods on how to get your cat adjusted and go in a positive direction, you have to go all out. So if something goes wrong, it's all about you, right? Well that was my point of view, until they actually tell you..but that's just one example. If this sounds like someone who really wants to make more money with their pet books, then by all means...buy it. Otherwise don't waste your money.

this is ok. it has its pros and cons1. the screen protection does what it's suppose to do. which at least for me was keep dust out of my keyboard.2. It fits pretty well3. not bad overall. there are a couple minor problems but nothing that would make you buy another one4. The backlit keyboard itself really only works when there low light in your room.
Great series.. Each one just as exciting as each other..I'm enjoying every minute of it...

I bought it for my husband and he is not very happy with it. The keyboard does NOT work properly. Some keys don't work. You can tell there are several places (smidgen) of water on the board because they all have oily spots on them, even though you wiped them off before putting them in. They also come as pictured but this set doesn't include cleaning tools. We ended up buying a separate kit that included those tools.

I was so pleased to finally get a battery for my Samsung Galaxy and it worked great just like the factory one did, but after having this replacement one less than 2 months (about 2-3 charge/discharge cycles, which is about what a new OEM battery does on their own), I'm ready to replace it. This battery's "memory" has completely died. It works perfectly now, if you have to reboot your phone, otherwise it'll be dead in no time - even under light use.

I was just about to give this movie 4 stars until i remembered they did the same thing with LOTR's soundtrack. For someone who bought these three CDs,you would think that Warner Bros could at least include some sound effects and music from the movie,like The Fellowship Begins theme.....or maybe even Jodorowsky's score. Well guess what!?! You know what else WB did? They just ignored those two songs. All other music is missing.

This book is an absolute waste of time. It took me twenty minutes to read it, and I'm a voracious reader. I found it predictable with little plot. The characters were shallow and one-dimensional, except for the two main girls. As far as I'm concerned, the whole story was nothing more than a trite excuse which would have been fine had this be a short story, but as its not, it's tedious. Not worth it. Try something else.

I have been looking for a good and inexpensive DVD recorder with TV tuner capabilities. This is it. Easy to use. It copies directly from VHS tape. I'm very pleased so far. There are not as many bells and whistles as some of the higher end ones out there. It's easy enough & simple enough. Can't beat it at this price. A couple complaints/suggestions. If you want to change settings without rebooting, when starting up an activity, press 'play' all over again.
The case was very nice but when i got it the glue or tape wasnt done on one side half of case. I have to return it.

This thing is so terrible my cats wont go near it. It takes up like half the table and they are fighting over it all the time. Oh well..... I had to throw a few of them away! :( if anyone knows of something that works let me know.. or any cat food ideas just tell me!!
This is a Great price and product as I had purchased it from an auto parts store that didn't carry this filter. Shipping was also very quick so no surprises there.

This is the first book I've read on this subject. I found it to be really helpful in dealing with an anxious dog. It provided a lot of insight and helped me learn more about anxiety disorders as well as coping strategies. A good read!

The box is nice, its heavy, but the hinges are too short, and it's a little crooked in some places where you can see it could possibly break. Maybe if they would make them better quality, then I'd have given it 2 stars. I don't think the hinge problems affect all cases, though. Even so, when the lid closes properly, this thing will get your glasses scratched up or dented on the back. It looks nice now, but there's nothing that says "you get what you pay for". It's cheap, cheap plastic.

I bought this and after about a month of use it stopped working. The problem is when you try to change channels on the radio, every time i hit one of them it flips the radio off. Its not just if im changing channels, Im hitting anything for half an extra second as well. Not worth it! Save your money and buy something else! Very disappointed in this. Will be returning mine! :(
While there is certainly good information in the book, you can find everything on any random blog or wiki.

I've seen some complaints about the cover on this book. So far, it appears I have to agree. It seems like after a certain point, pages were missing and/or had writing in it. The quality appeared fine and it was shipped very fast. Thank you. But, for me, that wasn't worth it. I'll just be using my original edition instead. Too bad.
What can I say, it's exactly what you want for your garden shed lighting.
My 2 year old daughter is a huge fan of the TV show and loves her new blanket. It's not too heavy or thick. It keeps us super warm at night too. Love it. Highly recommend this product! :)

I used to read this author's books as a kid, and enjoyed them very much at that time. As an adult, they lost some luster for me, perhaps because the first part of this book is about a boy who has to go through many horrible things. This makes it interesting but not exactly engaging. The last quarter or so was somewhat better, although still quite depressing. It does have a happy ending, though.

For anyone who is thinking about playing the game, don't get this version and wait for 1.2. They changed all of the basic control mechanics in an attempt to fix what was broken. A total disappointment. It had too many bugs that could cause you frustration. If you're still holding out hope on purchasing this, save your cash until they release a complete game with more polished mechanics. I'd also like to know where my money went.

I was totally disappointed by this cd. It sounds nothing like the orginal or it's cover versions. It's more of a karaoke cd that you should buy for your kids. Save yourself from getting swindled out of money. If you're going to try and put it in an actual format so people can hear it, why not use my credit card, thank you! The only exception being that I did get free shipping :).

I'm not sure if the product is as good or worse than a lot of others. I did get this free with an order so I have no complaints. It's kind of weird though. The package doesn't say who makes it and there are no reviews anywhere. If you look at some other stuff like this, it's usually either on Amazon selling for $30-50 depending on how old they are. I will keep taking it. Like most things, when results do come, I'll update this. For now...three stars.
The rubber grip helps prevent dropping my iPhone 5, especially without having any added grip. Good quality product overall.

A good way to bring the characters into your heart and mind. I found it very hard for me to put down my Kindle. Looking forward to an extra book. Hope it follows as well. Enjoyed all of her books, hope they are in sequence. Thank you. God bless her, her family and those who loved them too soon. You brought a smile on everyones face when she passed away. Such joy will always be with us if we seek Him.

I love this product! It's great on the dogs and cats too! Its smell isn't too strong or overwhelming. My only complaint is that I'd really like to find it in a bigger container, but other than that its great! :)

The book was fine, although predictable. Had a few good laughs, but the story line did not seem very realistic. I could imagine no man acting like that. And this does not mean that there are absolutely no men out their who act in such ways. They just have more luck with women than most women. Maybe it's part of being young and single. A "real man's" heart is too big to give up so easily.

The product looks nice and is just as described. However I only used it to replace a blown headlight because there was no other option when using the rear bumper on our car. It works but has come loose from time to time. Overall good product. Easy fix. Price wise could have been better for my budget.
My son is learning to cook, so we began looking at cutlery/knife sets which could be used for everyday use. We had never heard of Victorinox as a brand before so thought that we'd give them a try.

This thing is nothing more than a cheaply made waste of money. No way around it. The software doesn't even work with this adapter unless you run the program on CD or something like that. It comes straight from China and will not install if you don't have Windows 2000. I tried to contact customer service for help getting it to work, got no response.

Bought this in the summer of 2011. Used it all summer. The other review is so far off. I think you have to be about 3 feet away or more and there shouldn't be any problems. My son takes these with him to play soccer around town. Never had a problem, no dead batteries, long battery life. If your looking for really good headphones that don't cost alot...These are it. And they come with two different styles of earbuds and three attachments if needed.
it was not what I thought or ordered but ok for the money.........
This is my first digital camera. It really does take very nice pictures. Easy to use. I just haven't had enough time to try all settings.
We bought the Cannon A540 about 6 years ago to replace our old Kodak camera, that we loved. This is easy to use in every way! Highly recommend it.

I've had 5 different fuel injection pumps in 40 years including one made here where I live & all of them failed. So far using this model the quality is outstanding, it handles well I'm happy they seem confident at this point.
Great tool to have in glove box. Just what I needed. Very happy with product and use on all my vehicles.

It is exactly as described and at a great price too. I bought this to hold my daughters laptop in her backpack. She loves it!! The item came quickly and was nicely packaged. Thank you so much for your wonderful products! We are very happy customers!!!

This thing rocks. Rice cooks evenly. Easy to clean. No sticking. Cleans up in seconds. Can cook an abundance of rice. Great machine. Highly recommended for small apartment use. We have 5 or 6. Have one at home, we travel with them, my mom has one...
Great filter system... I don't know it the pump is louder than many pool filters...this model came witha little hose that holds up to 300 cubic feet.
I purchased two of these kits one for myself and one for my husband.

This vacuum is so big it almost hurt my wrist to use. It does a great job when you have not tried many other vacuums, but if I had had an opportunity to try any others, or maybe read the reviews before buying, I would NOT HAVE ORDERED IT! It's too much work for something that is such high maintenance. The cord rewind is especially hard because of all the weight.
Works ok but can use better suction than mine provided. Used other adhesive and it held just fine. Not too happy with lack of power over the long run.

I have always loved this movie since it came out and to learn that a special edition was being released is great. However, I've been waiting for months for the first two discs in my set (the third disc contains the "Director's Cut" of the movie). Now I'm wondering if they will ever be released. The film has been unavailable here in Australia while there are copies available at our local video stores. But apparently Warner Bros thinks we Americans don't care about what we're missing, so no need to worry Americans.

The product did not seem to perform as described. I used it once and am still unable to get my screen clean. There is always something stuck in the corners of it from being removed so many times. All this after a very long time. It was difficult trying to clean out all the junk that gets trapped up there. If you have more than one computer use different products. For me there were better options with cleaning cloth included. These were only about $2 each. Do not buy! 
 Rating: 1.

I've been using this for a couple weeks now and it works well with high quality video. It has done exactly what I expected out of it. Only criticism is no remote included. It's definitely worth the cost. If your looking for an easy way connect to the tv then get this. Don't buy into the HDMI/VGA/ A/V nonsense. You can spend more money on products than you actually need to just so people will see them.

This is junk. You get what you pay for. The metal base with the rubber bottom has fallen apart within first 5 min i had it!!!! Will return as this thing cost me more than original price. Dont buy!!! Waste of money.... :(
Love it. Used it in my garage at nite since winter has been on. Had lots of compliments. Can't wait until spring!

While this is not the best series I have read, it was an entertaining read. The plot did need more depth, and there were a lot of holes in logic. But, hey, I bought it, so I read it. It served that purpose. And I'm glad I did. It's free - how can you go wrong.

I have spent weeks reading about this product and getting ready to order it, but now cannot wait because there are many references by others who have had issues with the machine being inoperable. The company has NOT made good on their warranty. To date they know several people who have failed within 5 months of purchase. When you call for assistance, if you're looking at buying anything from them, keep in mind it's just a matter of time before it dies.
this is the same as a few others. nothing wrong with it, but its still cheap. not much out there like that anymore. thanks
Excellent product at a much better price then from the Harley dealer's. Easy to install and great quality. Much cheaper than buying whole new set of pipes which cost $200.00 or more. Amazon ROCKS!!!

This game sucks! It has very little to do in the first playthrough, which is about 20 hours. After getting through a few chapters, it becomes quite monotonous and boring. Not worth buying. There have been hundreds of better Zelda games out there such as, A Link Between Worlds, The Wind Waker HD, Skyward Sword, Twilight Princess, Link's Awakening, Ocarina Of Time, Majora's Mask.....But only one of those are really worth it.

This book really didn't help me in the least since you have to go through a whole series of questions first. It would be fine if it were all one question, but unfortunately that is NOT it. I felt extremely confused and frustrated trying to answer this question correctly. It's a very easy book. The only way for someone with even some experience or basic computer knowledge at all could do well on this. I think it's quite an awful book, don't waste your money unless you're getting it free.

This poster would have been great had it looked as good on a computer screen as my monitor does. It's kind of ugly to look at but if you display it somewhere where they won't see it, then it's fine. However, for a poster, I'm disappointed by how small this one is.
Although our cats love the food, it is not a very good value when you have to buy 6 cans at once.

Easy to understand recipes. Recipes are fairly quick. Would have liked a couple more photos, but that may be my own fault for not looking at them closely enough. I would recommend it. Very convenient.

This is the worst book on personal finance that I have ever read. I would recommend this book to those with no economics background! Nothing new here. Buy Michael Lewis' books instead. The advice given by Mr. Kiyosaki are similar in nature but much superior.
The product did not do anything for me. Would not recommend this product to anyone who is interested. Did Not do or help.
Nice looking and works great. It was a gift for my wife, not mine, so I dont know how it works. The only problem is that is made in china. We have nothing good to say about China!!
Very basic.
I purchased for a gift, she loves it, and it does its job. It fit the tablet perfectly. Good purchase overall. would recommend it.

The product came as described. However the first time I used it and tried to cut some glass for a project we have this didn't really hold well. Maybe it's my technique, but in order for me to get an edge of glass, the blade had to be held at an awkward angle so that wasn't smooth like I would expect from something that was "sharp!" I'll keep using it, maybe it'll become easier with time. At least there are no sharp edges.

The batteries are not good as Sony brand. They don't hold charge long enough to even use them after fully charging. If you just want cheap replacements then they may work for you. Just know there were times when I had to use the regular OEM batteries.

The book does a nice summary of the history and development of modern nuclear science. However, I bought it thinking that it was an introductory text, but is actually geared to advanced undergraduates. As such, I'm sorry to say it's not really practical for me. Also, its title - "Introduction Nuclear Physics, Theory and Practice (2nd Edition)" appears deceptively, as this book also contains many short chapters.
The song itself really expresses how wonderful life is. It's been such an amazing thing watching these kids grow up with incredible talents. They will go far!!!

This book is just a list of random examples taken from real life situations that you have probably run into before. Don't waste your money on this! You can find the same information and actual tips in one chapter online for free. The only thing that's valuable here is the cover picture :D Not recommended!
The book is a bit on the juvenile side, especially for my 12 year old. But it does make an okay quick read. My child has since recommended this author to me. She says her sister loves it.
Movie takes you on an exciting ride where little girls are trying to save her life during zombie apocalypse! Definitely was entertaining.
It is hard at times to tell if there was much research done on which characters we are being presented with. They didn't come alive well enough for their roles.
My son wanted this game.
I found these fables just plain awful - none of them were particularly frightening or scary.

This has to be the worst printer I have ever owned. If you print color there is no way of getting it right. The cartridges are so expensive that I'm out all my ink. You can not use other paper with this printer. It won't allow it. It prints very well when new but if one cartridge runs low it's useless for anything or just says wrong part number. This is by far the worse investment I've made on Amazon.

I purchased the DVD based upon all of the positive reviews...unfortunately it is not "instruction" but rather a rehashing of yoga poses. The poses are in no particular order and most seem to be very ordinary. This would probably be an excellent video for someone who has never taken time to learn or practiced Yoga before at all. If you have had more education than any beginner would, do your self a favor (yes, even yourself) save yourself some money on this purchase.

Having read and enjoyed much of Murakami's other work, I was really excited to find another book by him that would live up to his wonderful style. Unfortunately this is probably the first Murakami novel I've tried that wasn't very good. Yes, it has some beautifully descriptive passages, especially in describing Tokyo (which he obviously had visited or else this wouldn't have been an apparent story).

While this book is well written, and the story will stick with you, I wouldn't recommend it to someone who doesn't like strong characters or sex scenes. The other main problem in my opinion was that while there are a few really strong moments, most of it felt completely out of character from both hero and heroine. For example: After their first sexual encounter, they're supposed to be in heaven. At least they say that. They don't actually have sex, or even kiss.

I had a bunch of these on the back of my house for last winter. The weather hasn't been nice here lately, and they're rusting badly. These are an inexpensive remedy, because they don't have any kind of heating element. That's all that's needed. They look ok, but not as good as new. Still, at least they'll be usable next year. Not great, just good. They're light, which makes them very easy to install, if you follow directions.
Well It did not fit our phone very well. The charger will fall out if bumped or dropped. The case was too thin for an adult. Would do good to protect a kid but don't drop your phone.

The cover came right away. The color was not as vibrant purple in person than on the computer screen, which I'm okay with because purple looked better that black online. Looks great and also protects well. You can't beat this for 6 dollars.
So thin that they break VERY easily.

Bought this as something decorative around our fireplace. It's nice but really doesn't bring any sparkle to the place. Very dull. Nothing particularly special about it. But the price is right! Also, arrived very quickly. If you like your fireplace all bright yellow, buy it!

This was fun to play with when I first bought it. The lights get pretty annoying after about two minutes though. Then it stopped working. I thought the batteries had died so we replaced them. Nope. It wouldn't work. Still works though a month later. Very disappointed. Hopefully my son won't notice now that the toys are unlit since he really likes them anyway. He's one and doesn't care much for these but at least it's an alternative way before bedtime.

I have tried to use this but it has not worked. If the product is connected to power there are lines on screen no matter what resolution we get through an adapter. The only way I can keep a signal and see any detail is if you don't connect or disconnect your HDMI cable from the source every couple minutes. This happened at first until I figured out the problem was with this product. Not impressed and sending back. Bought another brand for same price that works. 
 Rating: 1.
love the leather look to it. fits perfect.

This is THE most amazing food I've ever consumed. Seriously, there's nothing even close to a comparison. I bought it thinking we would just be able to cook something on it, but in reality, it's incredibly versatile. The first time you use it...you're probably going eat several of them before you'll realize that there is hardly any fat and barely no sodium. You can almost fry anything with this, including eggs & bacon. The second or third time..maybe one more...and not bad again. Don't miss out.

I am glad that they changed the color of this box to white. Looks way too white next to my decor. These are great canisters. However, be careful when you get them, as one side has been a little warped so it will sometimes not close tight. This seems like minor manufacturing and quality control. The other side, which is facing you, closed perfectly. They also included tongs with it, but now instead have just two wire mesh ones. Not exactly what I was looking for, but oh well.

I just received the cover in today and was initially quite satisfied with how it looked. The case appears to be of decent quality. After my first attempt at putting my kindle into it, however, things went south. First off, it's supposed to come as part of a package deal. However, this comes without any instructions, or even instructions pertaining to what you need to do for installation. So I did some research, discovered that there are 3 layers you have to remove (including back and front cover), then slide open top cover.

The product description did not state that the device is manufactured in Mexico. It's okay for me because I'm a machinist and my primary reason to look into this item was its build quality. That said, it came defective with two faulty LED's on one of the channels. Also, I purchased several different brands at $29.99 each so this looked better than some of them.
Scale worked well but must have had some dirt inside. But I think it could not work correctly without dirt. It does what its supposed to.

I have a couple of dozen CDs and several thousands songs in my music library. Since getting this player, I've had it for about 5 months. The FM tuner is great, but the MP3 player has become very hard to listen to. It skips tracks every second, even when playing at lower volume. The first few times that happened were from turning random on or off. The screen works fine except you can't watch videos off it. This problem also happens with some songs, so that's annoying.

This is a pretty nice cover for my phone. I do wish the bottom was made of rubber, instead it slides right out. It's not like some covers I've seen where you have to put this and that, but it's easy enough that I'm okay with it. For less than five dollars, why not? It does make me happy though. :) My son LOVES it! Very colorful too! And he's 4 years old. If you're wondering, you can take all the pieces off and wash them or just throw them.

I saw a review on here about you can use these as mouse pads and it does not even work. The texture is too rough for the mice feet to rest on, so that would be pointless unless you want them at least temporarily removed from your computer before using them. So you're just wasting your money here. If you have very soft or slick plastic feet, perhaps these will work well enough. But if not, beware. Very disappointed!
When this case opens you see black plastic on two sides with Velcro closure at top and bottom. There are slots inside that accept small pieces of card/media like memory cards.

Worked great for about 6 months, then stopped reading any disc that was connected to it. Now its sitting in the garbage can.. The one good thing is, I called LG and their tech support team has been pretty good.
This was an excellent value on this item! Great buy, well made, and shipped very fast. I will definitely buy from this seller again.
The charger stopped working after about one week.

I've suffered from severe heel pain; I'm 32 years old. As much as they tried to promote this product, it didn't work. Save your money...there's really no point in spending $350 on something that doesn't do anything.

The book was well written and it kept me reading until I got all the way to the end. But I did not particularly like it. First of all, the author used some very heavy words. Also, sometimes she went off on tangents, for instance about "one thing,or another's character thought. It seemed as if her characters lived their lives in a vacuum with no thought at all. It felt more fake than real.

I'm very disappointed. I had bought the first book in this series and was captivated by it because of it. But to know there is no fourth book. After reading other reviews about how sad people are. Really??? The author should have waited until she finished writing this series.........This one just didn't make it!
This charger doesn't work with older iPhone models with power switching. Too bad because it looks super cool. I need to send back and will order another one.

I don't recommend it at all. Its quality is only one of a kind and when my camera broke because the case would stick in it. I can't believe that this product cost more than $10. If you're ready to put more money into good protection, choose something else, even if you have to spend more. Just don't buy this. Even though I'm talking about Nikon cameras, there are lots and tons similar cases. It's worth your time.

If you haven't heard of Tom Petty, this is a great CD to start with, or after if you've got all his catalog. Although some feel Petty's music can be overproduced, I have always felt that was missing the essence of, say, Springsteen. Maybe it is, but when it's in your head, with such beautiful songs, as on most Petty albums, I'm not complaining.

I bought this camera as an upgrade from my old Kodak 4MP...not too bad. The pictures are ok but do have noticeable red-eye. So much so that in many cases, you can see blue spots on the picture. But for most of these situations it won't matter. A word to all photographers - DON'T get mad if your camera's red eye isn't 100% correct! You probably want correct flash pictures.

I ordered this table to use in our church nursery so we could get the little ones ready for Sunday school. This is a small and cute table. Although the price was right, one of the legs came bent and it would not sit level. It has been very hard to straighten out again. All in all I'm happy with it. The shipping package looked terrible upon delivery, but did arrive completely intact.

This is a review of the Audio Fidelity CD that Amazon sent me. They are not really known as very good audio engineers - so I guess they were too lazy to find and listen carefully enough between track #2 and #3 for their mistake. What they have done here is, in effect, changed track #3. Now you may think that tracks 3 & 4 are identical or the same song. It's not. They're two different songs; one has been shortened by an entire measure while the other appears unchanged.
Love her songs, they r all very catchy, some have meaning, others are just silly. Love it!!! Keep up the good work! &# 128512;
It's not that it's anything wrong with an entire collection featuring nothing but old pulp fiction, as one can expect from the price. But this isn't pulp.

Great product. Fits perfectly in Honda Pilot. Used it on a long drive from California to Florida. The only downside is that the passenger foot rests aren't adjustable. If your passenger's feet are off center then you won't be as comfortable of them. I had 3 people sit behind me and we all were comfortable. It's almost impossible for someone with any weight over 160 lbs though.

I have been a fan of Anne Rice for many years. However, this series lacks the passion that is her great gift. You may notice by my rating that I'm not giving it five stars -- well, they get one anyway. I do wish she would return to more creative and original writing. This wasn't bad, but it didn't rise above two stars, either. It's just lacking soul. The characters are shallow stereotypes. No real insight into who or what these people are, nor do any of them seem likeable at all.

The quality of music is outstanding, but it doesn't start playing the next track until it's half way through a track. There must be some type of glitch with that. It's not like I'm missing something or my computer can handle it. It just won't finish what it started doing, and I had to restart every time for it. I've listened to dozens if not hundreds of CD's in 2 months, and this one was certainly the worst. I'd recommend passing on this:(
These did not fit. They kept poking up. I gave them to my daughter who loves them. She was very disappointed.
The story is good and the writing holds your attention. I would have like to see a little more depth at times with regard the two main characters not so much with each other.
These have helped me tremendously with my circulation problems. It also helps when you need more air around you. Love it!! It has really help out :)

There is an older version of this same product available on their web site and it seems to work OK. But if I had known about the one being sold on Amazon, which has a larger storage capacity AND costs considerably more then my first unit would have bought. And that was not enough space for me. So I'm now left waiting until at least after Christmas or New Years Eve before I can order what I need, which will be twice as expensive without shipping charges.

We needed this as the price went to $160 for a regular replacement. This was an easy choice and works perfectly. The install is easy. Took about 5 minutes tops including unplugging my old one. No problems in one week. Very happy with it.

I have not finished reading this. All it is, is a book rehash of everything found all along at the Internet. It tells you how to build your own website but does not tell what that means. You can look up tons and more web sites on line free of charge. Save yourself some money and time, dont buy it, borrow if from someone like the library. If she wrote it in 15 pages or even less it would be much better material for you to read.

This is a great, quick fix for anyone with an oil or fuel filter that needs to be replaced. The only recommendation I have would be if it came in larger bags. It goes by so slowly, and you could easily use twice this amount just getting the whole process started. But, as long as you plan ahead, it's easy at home replacement. It's not too hard either when there are no special tools. Just don't leave your work bench unattended.

The light is too bright for use on small animals unless you want them in trouble which they will not be. In short, it's just an okay flashlight but only about average. It's got decent build quality and looks good. But if your looking for one of those tiny flashlights this isn't it. I'd buy something smaller or better.

After reading the reviews I was aware that it may not work for me, but still bought it. Bad idea. They advertise how this works with your laptop making you think it's a cool product in which case, then after receiving it, if doesn't really work. It makes clicking noise. I'm giving two stars only because is actually can protect my laptop. If you're looking for something to protect any electronics from scratches or damage, go another route.

I don't understand why all the 5 star reviews for this book. The characters were underdeveloped and most of them seemed to have no character at all. For example, the supposed hero, a half angel, kept referring to an angel in his own blood as "that old boy down there..." He would seem to know nothing about angels, let alone their mission in life.
Love love my case. Looks great! The only issue is that when I put the charger into place and take off, some of my chargers don't fit. Still worth it!

This was a bit of an entertaining book, to be honest. A bunch of guys have been hired by the government to help keep order in New York, and one team takes on crime syndicates with the express purpose of killing them. Only they don't kill people. They get killed instead.
This is my second Wii. I wish they would not take sooooo long putting games out because these things are really fun (and cheap).

No need to spend $20, $40 or $20 more if you have this cheap wire that gets everything it says it's going too. If your looking for cables, buy these. They're cheap, durable, reliable & affordable. 5 stars. A+ rating.
Did he have a problem with the fact that his wife went first and then me? And no thanks Mr. Gough. I just thought your writing style wasn't for me.

I am a professional hairstylist and have been using the Babyliss pro nano titanium for about 7 months. At first it didn't cut through my fine, shoulder length hair very well, but after 4 months of use (just twice per week) it's still cutting pretty well. Since I'm in between styles I will occasionally pull out this clipper and give one side more work than another. For quick fixes it works beautifully, but take time to get used to it.

Although it looks like a nice little product, I could do without the loud motor noise that is emitted. The unit would work fine if you didn't need to listen for it. It also is not very loud. I did test the suction power though by using my hand vacuum cleaner with which I got good results. All in all, I'd say its worth $17 as long as you don't mind being aware of sound when vacuuming.

For a book that got tons of star review from Amazon, I'm surprised? This one is pretty disappointing for me. I've read through enough books about parenting my two children over many years to understand what makes them who they are.

I've used 3 other stylus pens for my iPad and this one works better than any other. The rubber grip is just right with a good tackiness while not getting dragged along the surface. After I started using it, I stopped looking at others. It's comfortable in your hand but small enough to use without taking up any significant table space. Works well on various surfaces so don't throw it away because of its appearance.

I purchased this item for my son and its not the right charger for his computer because it uses two prongs, instead of one prong. I have to return it. Now that I am writing this, i will be out a lot in shipping, so why bother. Amazon should review their vendors better. This was either false advertising or incorrect product description. The cost vs. value isn't worth spending the extra money, especially when you buy something through mail order anyway.

This is a very interesting book. The author's story about being involved in many different facets of high stakes poker makes for an intrigueing story. But it's really nothing new. The other reviewers have done justice to this work. If you want more facts and figures, get another Poker Strategy Book.

This movie is slow and boring to a point, not bad acting, though. Not really worth buying or even renting. One good scene towards the end. Worth saving for last. Definitely my least favorite of them all. No special features either. Not worth what I paid at Best Buy after seeing it there first. If you enjoy long slow, drawn out movies, maybe you'll like this one. Me, not so much. Too much blood and guts and way too many unnessary details. Also some weird thing going on.

This product was not the one I ordered. It did fit into my camera, but it will not activate either in sleep or on off. As soon as you put a battery in, none of these functioned. I bought this as a replacement for our old Oster blender. This one is much smoother, better mixing, and it has many more speeds. This case does an adequate job of protecting my Kindle 2, but it is too bulky. Unless I want to carry 2 things and this thing around, I'm not going for that option. Don't know how this product can be rated 5 stars..it doesn't work! We are so disappointed in Amazon. Our daughter was very excited to play her new games for Christmas. Guess what....none of them were playable! Tried downloading again today - still didn't work.

I bought this to use for my new iMac 15", which has a DVD drive (usb) but no card slot. When the product arrived, it was smaller than expected, about half of its size. It's not fast, nor is it quiet; It operates much more quietly (and less noisily) then my USB optical drive. If you just want something that's portable and cheap, try this.

I bought this book thinking it would fill a niche between the great scholarly works of Dr. David Bentley Hart on Christianity and other writers who like to tell stories for the sake of telling stories, but with little attention given to making any point and certainly not attempting to be anything more than an entertaining, sometimes funny story teller. That is exactly what Mr. James has done in this short, light read that is more concerned about engaging your mind then convincing you.

The only thing that is really worth reading in this book are the three cases of actual stories with which it begins. I also like his chapter on family and marriage problems as well but they were not particularly good to read. It was a quick read when all is said about it. Perhaps he could have included them as short chapters. This book would be a great one if he had published these separately.

Just exactly what I wanted: A simple and easy-to-read analog scale for the kitchen. With a digital readout you can see results of your weighing in increments if something changes too much over time (e.g. add more water). And it's affordable. The best part is that, when I step on it, it remembers my weight even to one tenth degree accuracy. So I don't have to worry about getting off or stepping back on.

This book goes against every principle of sound finance and economic theory. The author does not even attempt to provide sound statistical information. Her "corrects" are based on a highly questionable statistical analysis from her own previous work with the IRS. If you want basic financial history, there might be something in this book. Otherwise, pass it up. It's a shame that many people will buy into this. I'm an attorney practicing real estate law, but I would rather use my time studying the principles she outlines.

I did not buy these at Amazon, as they do NOT come with the rubber foot pads. What happened to those? They need them, because when you stand these, they shift if you're on a slippery surface.
