I was looking very forward to reading this book. Although it started off rather promising, the lack of proof reading, grammar, and punctuation quickly led me not only to a book that is less than satisfying but one which leaves much room for improvement before its publication. With so many errors in grammar and spelling, as well as numerous typos throughout, I gave up after several chapters. This book, according to various reviews posted on Amazon by other readers, may be even more poorly edited than my own writing.

this is probably the worst game i've been playing for the ps3...it lacks so many good things about a great game. there are only 14 levels (i feel you should be allowed to build larger buildings and more places to run around in such as skyline) and no bosses except a couple tiny enemies. most of all they cut out some of my favorite features that made up my last video games for me including being able to switch between your characters through any menu screen.

It didn't work. Won't download on Windows 7 Ultimate. It's also really slow at getting graphics and sound running (it's supposed to).This is an older game, so I'm guessing something else has changed with them. It looks as though other people have used other versions of this, but for me it's garbage.

These lasted all of two days. One one ear fell off, after less than half an hour we had lost both. My daughter was very disappointed in these. Cheap plastic, poor quality, not well made. Would never purchase from this seller again.

I wish books had a bit more variety of writing styles so people can know what to expect.this one is just a little too cliché for my tastes. Not bad but not well written. And as others have said there were few good lines in the whole series.

This isn't worth the money.. The plastic screen doesn't adhere to either of my iPads... I would be very embarrassed to give these as gifts. They're not even good enough for a kid. Not worth it at all!!!! DO NOT BUY!

This case seems as though it should work for my needs based on the fact that it's a nice looking and rugged hard shell cover with an interior zipper case. The inside isn't suede, nor is any exterior fabric material or lining. No zippers. When I open up the back cover, there are two soft side pockets that will serve to protect one of the batteries in this camera.
This product does exactly what it's supposed to, however, I'd like an angled applicator. Other than that this is fantastic.

I first heard this album as a kid,listened to it when i was 13 and 20 years later am still enjoying it. The best songs/melodies on the album.1. Get On Your Boots: Probably my favorite Beatles song. Its very melodic,its about a teenage boy trying too hard not go out with that crush of his. Great Song2. Lucy in the Sky With Diamonds(love it): This is probably McCartney's best.

I don't like the shape of it. It is not comfortable to hold it, as well I hate it that you have to charge battery for every time that need a recharge. So now I got another phone, which was in good condition and also came with charger, so everything will be fine.

This product did not last long at all. Not what I expected for the price. It worked fine but then in less than a year no longer charged batteries. Only works with rechargeable battery. If anyone wants to try this and can get it for under $10,I have two of them on hand. They are great!! Hope you do too. By Ray B

This book had some good tips on how to get more people involved with the church and less money spent at a time of hard times for families but I agree strongly that there is no hope unless we change our thinking.

I have a very active little dog (Havanese/German Shepard mix) whose favorite thing is to destroy anything that comes his way. He destroyed this in less than half an hour. The seams tore within the hour so he was able to get at whatever it was. Very disappointed and cannot recommend purchasing it. It might interest kids who are destructive or dogs with strong teeth but not for aggressive chewers. :(
This piece will kill you.

The product is fine the picture was misleading. After looking at it myself and comparing them I returned them. So now I'll have to try again on my next order. Also a warning from one of reviewer these don't fit like your old ones. They are larger around (front height)then stock which should be okay but in return you loose some headroom. Don't know if this was an error or a conscious change so I will try again...
I bought this product about 6 months ago off amazon.
This tripod has held my weight of 4 lenses and 2 camera plus still more gear without giving me any problem. Also love that it can be easily broken down into sections for transportation. Very handy!

I was really excited for this book. At the end of Book Three, things were getting pretty intense. We were finally finding out some answers. There are a few more interesting points to make in these books. For instance, we learned that Rose had some kind of... mental illness, I'm not sure if that's meant literally. She wasn't just acting crazy; she seemed like her whole personality changed. All in all, it was an improvement over. But then came book four...Now it's so much better. So much.
This was ok. It's kind long and tedious. There are some interesting stories, which add to an understanding of one man's life experience, but really there's no new information.

Not the book I was looking for but there wasn't one to help me with my project. Guess I'm not sure what you want unless you're a serious woodworker. As someone who wants to learn more about wood working - this isn't it. If you'd like help in getting your project done, check out Doug and Mel Bay's book. You'll enjoy these guys even better.
It did not live up to its promise.

The color is nice and matches my decor, but there was a split down the middle/end of it. I would not recommend this product. Not worth even the cheap price. It should have cost less. Very disappointed.

It says it fits the Kindle 3g but when we got it, there was no hole for any part of our Kindle. This thing will be sent back. Very disappointed, I guess that's what happens when you don't listen to reviews....ugh!
My kids love this movie. This is the perfect thing to watch when you have a snowy winter in your house. Definitely recommend.

The screen protector was just a cheap piece of plastic; not even worth $1. I would buy from another company and pay more! In addition, it was creased on the side so there is no way to smooth out the crease as your smoothing bubbles out. Just awful!! Don't waste money on this item, or I'll have you arrested for wasting my taxes!!!!! Not happy! They can't get worse than this!!! Thank goodness it's only $2. What a waste! :-( 
 Rating: 1.

After a year of this machine, the steam button stopped working. I've also replaced my tank with another one and it still doesn't work. I used distilled water when cleaning as some revies suggested. A lot better product out there.

I have to be honest, this is not the type of book for everyone. If you are interested in a look into an unusual subculture and love learning about, well, anything, then check out this book! It starts off so interestingly with some great tales from around the world. Then it moves on to more personal interviews and stories that may make the reader squirm. Don't think you will find something revolutionary about reading this, there were no revelations there.

I was initially disappointed in this game, because the sound quality is horrible on my computer and it doesn't seem like it's anywhere near a hi-def experience. As soon as EA learned that people were looking to buy this, they lowered it, but didn't take too much away from it. The game itself seems fun once you get used to. There will be players who have little experience with other sports games (like me), so don't try playing against them unless you've played hockey before.

Pro's-Cheap-Good sound-Does have a decent range. Cons-The buttons on remote rattle if you touch something that is plugged into the aux input, like your phone. This will also cause some interference, especially in older cars. When I press the volume control it goes from maximum to medium. That's not really even how it works. You have to click through settings and when there are no options then just turn up a little higher than what you're already at, which causes the music to cut out.

This is nothing you need unless you're doing light duty to start with. It's all cheap plastic and I don't even know if it's strong enough for that. The key chain is also pretty cheap. It won't make me happy when it breaks just getting in it. I'll be buying a bigger one, something that's better made this time, at some point.

This is way over priced. The paper it's printed on seems like good paper, but if you use it without an ink jet, the quality isn't good. The inks bleed through onto any other paper except for printer paper. I haven't used this as much as some may say, with one exception. A friend of mine tried to print a book and was only able to make copies out of that one. He had no problem making copies, from printing them out, and then printing another.

Bought for my son, he LOVES it. Its really a nice looking bag and works well with his camera equipment. The price was very reasonable. Definitely would be good for travel or as carry on bag. It does not look like it is a cheap product, all zippers work properly including the strap when you tighten up to make it secure which has been an issue in some of my previous bags. I can't wait until I fill this out! Very happy with it!

the book was great and gave very useful information that I needed to learn things about chickens and care them better. It also made me realize there are so many types of chickens some more well known than others when it comes to care, feed etc. This is the second one in my house being read which tells us they all vary a bit as far if it's worth getting another book.

This works as advertised. I was somewhat skeptical about the small size, but this turned out to be quite helpful. The suction part is very good, and even in low light situation, it provides a usable picture. However, there are two aspects that have disappointed me from time to time, namely (1)(1) It gets foggy, no matter how clean or dry you make it, despite my use of fog solution. ( It's especially difficult if there's a lot around you.

So much for the good idea of a stainless steel can with no plastic! I was disappointed to learn that after being in use less than ten times, this plastic had begun showing and chipping on every can. It wasn't an issue before, but now it's getting worse at the seams between top handle and lid handle. Looks very bad under use. A friend told me about rubber bands used as handles. I'm glad Amazon has them because replacing it is cost prohibitive.
These were a replacement for the same brand I use to have but these break easily when they are new. They will work great if you handle them carefully though. Very inexpensive and durable.

I just finished listening to this whole album. All you have left is to sit back and say what an outstanding album it is, and feel better about yourself in the process. At two hours long (which for me, means one heck of alot), you're going to forget very quickly that every song on here could easily fit onto a single cd. And no, I don't want any more music from these guys but all their other albums.

This was actually a gift for my husband. He really likes it. I am so glad it came quick and in such great shape! Thanks again Amazon. It is well packaged too. We will be buying more products very soon. Keep up the good work! Thank you again! Karen P
This item worked exactly as described and I think it will help greatly with the storage of all my garden supplies. Very good product. Easy to use.

I really can't rave about this book due to its shortcomings. It's true that it does have some helpful tips and advice, so there will be something in the book worth taking into account, even if you don't buy it right away. However, much of it is rather superficial information on several different types of birds. There are a lot of references throughout regarding other books for specific species, but most likely those would also include an exhaustive list of color names with descriptions from each bird.

I bought this DVD thinking it would be like all the others where there was a live concert/interview in between each song. It is NOT!!! Only one camera and you can barely make out what she or he says!!!Waste of money DO NOT BUY until they get rid if that stupid feature. Very Disappointed!!

This camera was fine for the first couple of months, but then it started doing this. Once you turn off a camera, and before turning back on, if one is plugged in, after only 10-20 seconds or less that computer will disconnect (and go silent since USB-3 port isn't working, like usb ports on computers) - sometimes it'll stay this way until it's unplugged. That's not good when I'm working late at night and need to switch between cameras.

We purchased this camera and the matching camcorder for our family trip to San Juan Island last year, and while it took a little tweaking of settings until we were in a good location, we love how crisp and clear all three videos turned out. There is one small downside to these cameras, however: you can't view them straight on your computer. You either have to hook the camera's USB cable up to the computer or use their included software download tool.
This is a poorly written book. The author repeats the same ideas over and over, which are all common sense. I feel bad that people have really wasted their money reading so many pages of this drivel.
Did not do what it said it would do, even when followed instructions. This is probably one of the dumbest ways to make a great cup of coffee. Do NOT buy this:-(

I bought a brand new unit of this drive in late October 2012. The latest software version was 6.0.4, and it would only mount some files as partitions. Some partitions were actually recognized but not shown on the system. In addition, most users reports that copying large data takes so long (around 30 - 60 seconds) to copy from the SSD to their SATA controller (desktop), which means you'll have read time equal (or sometimes longer) than write time, making these drives pretty useless.

The first time I charged this battery, it worked great. It doesn't hold a charge long at all. Only about 2 hours. But what the heck, you get 3 of them. One for me. And two more as back ups if need be. All things considered not bad because you can't beat the price. I would buy them again. 
 Rating: 4.0 
 I've had my Dell Studio 1558 laptop for seven months now. During that time, it's been mostly used by me on occasion to surf and write papers.
I picked this up for my dad as a replacement while his case wore out. He really liked it, it was the same color and worked great. This phone works just like it's supposed to.

There are so many great reviews for this product here. It probably won't make you happy in the long run. But it certainly does not hurt in the short term! And at $6 a month, it's easy to see why I would be able to afford it. We have two indoor cats and one outdoor cat. This little device seems to calm both of them down -- especially when we put their favorite treats into it.

So I read a review of this book prior to buying it and as my father has suffered from cancer twice, having died each on different days, I thought that since cancer is not going away it's just another one more thing he can do. I'm currently trying hard enough for him to come back but he's doing very well with chemo at home and will be back in September or so.

This was everything I expected! The only thing is that the first one came broken (which didn't surprise me as much since it seemed very fragile but amazon quickly sent out a replacement for it.) My daughter loves it! Definitely worth it- highly reccomend!! We got her this for Christmas and she LOVES it. If you're debating whether or not to get it, don't let any reviews scare you off. They're usually wrong anyway. :) Good luck.

This product is good when it works, but has many problems with the software needed to connect it properly and for any device that needs to be used to receive data. At my current price of $80, you would think I could buy another one since they work so well at first. But alas, none were available, or likely have been in production, after some months now, even though this item says there are plenty on Amazon.

It looks nice but after using it a few times, I find that my phone falls out of the case. The case stretches and keeps falling off. Even with no cards in it, this is pretty annoying. But on top of that, the pockets inside are barely enough room to fit your money or credit cards. If i had known this, then i'd have just bought another phone case.. :/ I'm gonna go get something else now. Waste of time & money.. :)

The overall length of this book is quite short, but it gives you a detailed understanding as to how the different companies are using Webforms. If you're looking for help in implementing what you're going to implement, I would recommend investing your time onto another text. I have used other online source documentation through out my career and this one was by far not worth its price. There seems to be more information just on websites than anywhere I've seen.

It works great but after 8 months there is a little bit of white on the bottom to let you know when its full. The thing that sucks about it was in July and August I thought I'd have this for several years and now it could work longer. I bought 5 bottles total. If they make one with less bleach then I won't get rid if it. But all in all, does the job.

I just got my iPad and this case has been great, though only because there were some scratches on it upon arrival. Unfortunately the corner corners have a huge hole in them. As much as you would like to think that your screen will not be damaged if you're carrying around something sharp like scissors or keys, but these things shouldn't even fall out and they do after reading many reviews.
This shoe runs somewhat wide, and does run narrow.

I find the information here very helpful. The author gives a good summary of how you should prepare for an exam. However, he lacks one thing. It is completely lacking in detail. For instance,he describes two scenarios on different exams with no particular detail or discussion. If you go back and review each exam question after reviewing this book it looks like you were doing most of them. But then when all was said and done, many parts didn't even apply to my test.

This was not an 'upgrade' but just what I would have gotten from the phone box without any of these features. Very disappointed since it is supposed to be the most advanced phone. It has poor volume and no good speakerphone. I returned mine.
Really nice sheets! They're very smooth and have great quality material. I've only slept on them once but they're pretty comfy.

The price of this item was very good, but when I received it, it's just a cheap case. I had to cut all the opening so that it fits my phone better. At least, that's what it looks like in photo. But other cases which are really good don't have cuts for some buttons. It is kind of bulky and made cheaply. When I ordered this, thought if everything works out okay, I'll keep it.
For what you get it's worth it. If the other side doesn't fit correctly then return them.
Bought for son 10 yrs old to watch cartoons. Only problem is can't hook up HD channel after hours on hold.

After my Dell computer was damaged recently, I decided to invest in a netbook for travel. This is exactly what I needed. When you first turn it on there are no programs preloaded, but once you've got your internet information and email set up it's very easy to use. It has lots of storage space so that I've been able to keep most everything stored locally. The only thing I'm disappointed with is that the screen resolution isn't as sharp as I'd like or hope for....
The screen protectors feel like they are going to rip you with all the force required. There was some damage when it arrived with two cracks on both sides (fortunately at different angles).

I can't believe people like this stuff. What a waste of plastic, time and money. It's not even funny--its pathetic. This is a classic example of what passes for comedy today. All the good stuff that's still left on tv will probably come out eventually, but until then this...This just isn't funny. It's insulting. It reminds me now how bad my childhood was compared to most young people's nowadays. Not funny, stupid, pathetic, and so obviously fake. Even at $3.99 it's not worth it.

This is the second one of these that I purchased. First time it was a lemon and then this one. On both, there have been major issues with either connection or functionality. For starters - both units are slow on start up when in their cradle so you can't plug them in. It took nearly 8 hours for it to "boot up." If you don't want an alarm clock plugged into your desktop at all times, don't buy this.
These are great bags but they take a while to fill up. The price is good for the product. Great service.
There is no need to buy this product. If you live in NYC or New England, go for it if not...just move on and buy an air purifier. At least, you'll save money
Item took long time with standard shipping but price was right. Works perfectly and no problems even after 3 months. Hope it stays like that. Good product! Thanks Amazon!

The product was shipped and received timely. However, after three weeks of use, the back light completely stopped working. It is almost impossible to see in lower light. While driving at night it can be difficult for me with my failing eyesight. I will not purchase another one as this was priced very high. So I don't know if others have had luck or not. If you do then it would depend on how much time you expected them last before replacement.

This book has everything you need to know about managing your time and work space. While it is great that her approach works for most people, I didn't care for the book. I expected more from her as she was the one who recommended it. It's only been a few days so maybe things are changing and my feelings would change after enough days. But I couldn't get beyond page 10. As other reviewers mentioned, it's written in lots of bullet points.

I purchased this as a gift for my husband, but he says the battery wears down pretty quickly and has to wait on it for its charge in order then be able to use it. It is good quality though since we bought 2, one for home and another which goes with him everywhere.

I will never buy anything from this vendor. They sent me a product that was not even the correct item. The item came with two different pieces of software and neither work right for my laptop model. There is an entire CD about nothing to do about it. So as a matter if fact it did NOT fix my computer. It only gave my computer problems. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!

They have the look and feel of a good sturdy shoe. I bought them for work because they are casual enough to wear around town. However, if you want them for a dressy outfit, don't bother, these shoes are not worth it. The black leather is very hard looking up close but looks nice by my side. But after wearing them, everyone asked me how much $ i payed cause were so pretty. It was kind of weird because all other loafers in this price range really looked like leather.

This is one of the worst books I have read. It started out ok however it quickly got weird. The heroine turns into Mary Sue. She does whatever he wants to her and even gets him drunk. Her sister starts talking like she has sphynx. And all they think about in sex scenes is how much they want it. So no romance what so ever. They don't know that any other brother came or went before him. What were the authors thinking putting them together this way.
Great deal for all three! Love these so useful and pretty easy to clean, just wipe down and place back. No scrubbing needed!!!

I gave a three star rating because after many years of use, my older model finally gave up.....although it did last 12 years. The new replacement was not as easy to use or clean compared to my old one but works just fine. Overall pleased with the way this system operates......wish they had come out with this before digital TVs became popular. It takes up no room on kitchen counter.......
This story started out promising but quickly fizzled in typical romance novel fashion.
The product was cheap and did what it said except that the paint started to chip after less than one month. Not a good buy. Will stay with other options for cases.
This camera is ok,however not very great.

I'm not sure if this is supposed to happen with these little speakers but I find that when the iPod is plugged in it starts sounding distorted. The same sound quality and volume as when you connect headphones or directly using your ipod. Also, my friend tells me she's always getting static noise from her device for no apparent reason. It's been doing so since she received it. EDIT: So, I've had this product for a while now & it's terrible.
Interesting premise, fast reading thriller. Lots of unanswered questions. Does anyone really solve puzzles by putting their fingers on some card? Is that possible? Well written story, fun premise.

I read somewhere else that this was good for "people with allergies....no sneezing and runny nose." Not so much. This product seems to be a waste of money. In my case, not one minute after applying it, there were white flakes coming out from underneath.

I have used this product many times before and the results are always outstanding. I was surprised when we opened a can that it wasn't like that. The sauce on top had leaked into the cans of tuna. This is one thing where I'll find out later. In summary, buyer beware, maybe we'll get lucky but I'd bet my last dollar it's been compromised.

I really needed a new charger. When my old, worn charger cord died, this seems like an ideal replacement. It arrived on Wednesday, the next day, so shipping was fast, but then when I opened it, it didn't work. My phone (Samsung Galaxy S4) is not able to detect that it's hooked up, the screen goes blank, and won't even charge at all unless plugged into another wall.

After reading several good reviews on this, we selected one of them. We have found that this works well if you use a remote extender (we purchased a Panasonic model) about 1/2 mile from the repeater. That's the place where reception is most affected by interference.
You really need to spend money on something so your cats can do fun things with it. It's very cheap.

This is an absolute waste of money. I received a free sample after buying this so it was never used. One bottle looked like it had been opened, and the liquid wasn't that great. The smell did not last longer than 2 hours. If you can afford to pay for something better at least buy a new one instead of saving money on this. It will take only 10 minutes tops before all of these wonderful lotions just start looking cheap.

This is the only coffee maker I trust in my house. My old one would start tasting funny at 2 years to 1 year. You do need a good grinder for this machine (can't beat Lavazza's). But you really won't care if it starts smelling funny by then. It will be gone anyway. Love it. The only thing that could make it better are all of the controls and how fast they go. It's just too fast, especially when changing coffees.

I guess I'm not the only one who read this book and liked it at all. It's like people in love with each other are allowed to fall into a deep sleep for years without speaking or even seeing eachother. You just KNOW when they wake up that they're making out which made me really mad as every night I was looking forward to falling asleep because you know things take forever to get back on track.

I ordered these headphones because of the great reviews. They do provide good sound for talk shows and they are comfortable to wear. What kept me from giving them 5 stars was ease of use. The mic works fine but trying to turn it on sometimes becomes almost impossible. You have a tendency pull back slightly instead of pushing the button all the way. Then your ear pops open in pain so you end up having to hold down the button. That gets tiring.
My father was having more trouble breathing after cancer surgery so I purchased these as to help stimulate circulation.

Why is this still in print?? There are many much better books out there on Zen and Buddhism to choose from. For some reason this one has won over too many people at Amazon with bogus reviews. Maybe they are trying to milk it? I'm just sorry I spent the money because not even worth it.

I tried this book as an online freebie. This first novel from Scott Nicholson left me thinking it was going to get better, but eventually became predictable and redundant. The story moved fast and easy with interesting concepts that were not overly developed. It's good for a rainy day read.
A series of short disjointed tales. No character development at all. Boring. Poorly written. Did no thing but ramble on. Would never recommend this book.
great price and just right size. very nice for a variety in flavor of candy. Will continue order when need more..

When I saw that this was made of real rubber and had some nice features for holding an iPod, the only thing i need right now is a case to keep it in, so went with what seemed like something I'd enjoyed.

The idea of a book about how to change your habits is an appealing one. However, because people don't tend to implement the ideas in this book immediately, I guess that they didn't do it before reading it, because their lifestyle hasn't changed. Some might argue that's good, but when it's been years and you've still have the same habits, you really can't get something out of this.

Very disappointed with this product. This was advertised as new and it did not turn on at all. Would never buy again from these people. The camera is pretty good but the camera case will not hold my Nikon d3000 because the lens just falls down within seconds of putting in in, I can hardly move it. Will have to return it. I'm very disappointed. Don't waste your money like i did.

I started with the original one and then realized that i needed two more to protect my new phone when it is dropped. This was about $30 less priced, arrived sooner than we hoped, and works just like the first one. Thanks for making this available. We are very satisfied customers. No more buying at a Verizon store. Thank you.

Not so much. All it contained was a bunch of ideas and the actual recipes were really hard to get into because they weren't all in English! If these words can be used as slang, then you should not sell cookbooks with such basic English. It makes me feel bad when I buy things knowing that there is no English available. Good luck. My first time using amazon.com

So far it is working great. Easy to install and works as advertised. It keeps the grill out of our yard by a small area so no neighbors complain. The only complaint I have is that when we get up in the morning there were some rust spots after two days outside. Since then though the water has cleared them up. Overall great product, seems like it will last. Just had 2 people installing it. They did not seem very experienced. If you are handy it should be fine.
The people on the other end of me are saying that they can barely hear me, also its not working very well on speakerphone, but i guess for the price you get what u pay for. Its defiantly just ok

Great replacement as far an my needs. As with most things I've gotten via Amazon, they are cheap and don't work very well. This was no exception. I ordered 2 so I could have backups when one gets lost. The first had some loose solder (obviously) that created a short in it.

For those who have looked at this case, I am assuming that the item you may be looking for is, "The Premium Genuine Leather Horizontal Clip Case with a Holster, Carrying strap, Stylus Pen Wallet, and Pouches. See my Customer Image and Product Description - " as it clearly says in my images above. After receiving it, it turns out to not include anything like "the pouch or stylus pen as the description states but only if these items are included in our price list.

I purchased these for when we go camping. We got them out but found that one failed to come on after being installed. What kind of junk is it? There should be some testing before packaging. The other ones work, so there's something wrong. Stay away from them.

I purchased this product after getting tired of always having to unplug my charger and plugging it back in because the one that comes with your PS3 is so short-lived. For the first few weeks I was impressed by it's build quality although only time will tell how well it'll hold up.

The first one we bought didn't last longer than two days, and the second started giving trouble within a few weeks. Very low quality for $70. I'm returning it to Amazon and will try another brand - perhaps Vizio. They should stick with TV's & sound equipment. Do not buy this set.

This thing is a little smaller than the picture, but not by much. I would describe it as being about 1/4 inch thick. It does work well, however, and seems to hold its charge longer than my last one. My phone battery had no problems going from 100% until ~40% usage before recharging. The extra weight doesn't make any difference in how well this works.

This is great for people with small dogs, it's heavy duty, made well. My yorkie weighs 14 pounds and was too big to use this bed by himself, he did get on it a few times but I had him in the other half of it. So my two little dogs used them together just fine. Also if you have a large dog that likes toys or has lots o chew toys then you might not want this, because they are so heavy. All said, good product, especially for smaller dogs.
The item arrived sooner than expected and in good shape. I'm completely satisfied with this purchase. I'll be ordering new seeds from them very soon.
Book wasn't what i thought it would be, but overall good book! I really like this guy so I'm happy! & lt;3 :)
Does this product work as described, yes.....but it's nearly impossible to see into the middle of this device since there is no view panel for you.

This is a very cheap piece of equipment that will probably break within several months. The first one broke from the base and wouldn't charge after 1 year. For $40 I ordered 3 thinking it would be much better. You get what you pay for so I'll try another one. It does do ok but not great. It's easy to use, though it gets hot/warm pretty quickly but has good suction. Overall it's OK - no more expensive ones have ever gotten 5 stars anyway.

I tried this product on both of my Kindle Fire Tablets and Ipad Air. It was very difficult to place the film over a screen protector. The first few times around it worked great. However, as with all things in life, the more one uses it, eventually dirt gets attached to it. The film began to lose its adhesive ability to reattach itself after several uses even though there were no lint particles or bubbles when finished. Then yesterday while trying again, it pulled up making application difficult.
This is an ok toy if your child doesn't care that it's not a new lego. There are other more interesting toys for the same price online.

I have been using this for almost 7 months now and it works great on my Dell Inspiron. It arrived a couple of days after ordering, which is good. The fan is pretty quiet at just under 50% speed. This does everything as advertised, including cooling the laptop to below room temp. Highly recommend. It's much quieter than most portable fans. Would buy again.

If I'm a guy with a strong body odor what is in this stuff? It doesn't go away--as one reviewer said, you can still smell it. You can't just wash it off after you're done like deodorant can, it's made specifically for men. I'll stick to Degree's products which don't contain aluminum and parabens or whatever makes men smell.

The Good:This charger has a good design and its quite compact. it fits well in all of our cup holders. It charges with the same speed as when plugged into an electrical outlet which is great for my children. It also seems pretty durable. I am not worried about the kids putting too much pressure on it. The Not So Bad:The red LED light indicates that the device isgetting power. You cannot see this, as far as seeing any light at all.

This is a great light set for the price!! The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because one of my lights does not work at all and I'm so bummed out that after having it for such a short period oftime! Other then that, these are very bright as well and really love them!!!! Very bright! Would definitely recommend purchasing this product! :)

These towels are great. They breathe easy through the fabric as they dry fast. The weight is light enough that your hands aren't left damp afterwards. I own 3 of these towels, two in XL size and one small size.
This lasted 4 years of hard play.

I have a 2002 Camry V6, the description says this part will fit my car but when it arrived it was just about an inch too short and even with that gap there is nothing on top of the hood to cover it. It could be described as "air fresheners" which I guess maybe what they were supposed to be. Very disappointed!!!! Not sure if I'll order again because I'm not willing to take that chance again.

I got this thinking i was geting the best deal and instead i've found out why. the item shipped quickly but when it arrived there were no bulbs included. very disappointing. Also while installing it, one of the light fittings broke off with ease. So if you buy this, just be careful screwing them into place because that screw might not go far enough cause their cheap. all in all, a ripoff purchase.
Bought this after reading reviews of others who are disappointed in it. Screen does not work correctly.

I had the same problem others are having with this product. The picture of this monitor is incorrect. All of these Asus monitors have the exact model number that Amazon posts on their site, and it appears for a long time before you see any reviews. These companies pay someone somewhere to review products they send out so if anyone else buys one after mine goes bad than Amazon's page will still be correct as far as I'm concerned.
This tablet works really well so far.

I chose this book because it was free, read the first chapter then skipped ahead a couple of chapters. If you are into stories about sex, and men chasing women for their money, as long as they get their HEA, than give this story a try. I'm not sure why people would be like that or find it enjoyable, but I do feel bad for anyone who did go through it.

I don't think this is a good choice. It did not do anything for me, and when it came time to get rid the bottle, my skin had turned red. It's expensive too, over $4 per use...that doesn't really make sense. You end up having two bottles of lotion... And what about the smell? The perfume smell isn't strong enough or long enough. Maybe there are some people like this. For me? No.
The author gives an excellent introduction in his book, "How To Start College Calculators.

I have been using two of these over the past year and am very satisfied with their performance and utility. I primarily use them to clean my car after a wax job or for washing off greasy grime/dirt from other items in my car. They work well as both but also can be used to scrub and remove wax. The scraper on this set is really great, especially good for large areas where there's only one angle at which you may want to apply pressure (like cars).

It took my husband and I about three hours to put this together; with each piece going in separately. Now that it's up it looks great at our new house!! Looks like a million bucks since we're so far behind on the remodeling, but what did you expect? Great product.

We got this for our daughter (2 years old) and she is not interested in using it so far. It seems kinda flimsy or too complicated. I am hoping that she'll like it more as I give her a bit of instruction on how to do it..
The material is quite thin even through it has spandex weave.

Like many others, I was expecting a great CD once again. A little disappointed at times but overall good CD. Definitely more Rock and Roll music than the past. What else could you ask for from Bruce on this CD? His voice just seems to get better with age. My favorites are "The Way" and others. There is an alternate mix version of some songs that is pretty cool too. Overall very enjoyable listen as always. This is Bruce's most diverse CD since Bad Leroy Red.

Got this as a gift last Christmas. Worked fine until I started watching movies on my iPad Mini. Now it won't play any disks, makes that loud sound all the time and the USB cable for charging has stopped working. It's still under warranty, but if you're buying an iPod dock, spend more money and get something sturdier. This model doesn't even deserve 1 star.
Good product, not much else to say. I used this product in a class and have been using the same one for over 4 years now.

I really hope the people who read these reviews and think this isn't going to work at all are wrong. I've been taking them as directed for almost six months, with no change in weight lost whatsoever. It's a huge waste of money because you have nothing but your expensive words. Don't wast yours. Wish there was something better out there, but, unfortunately, that's not what they make anymore... :-(
The plot seems contrived, at best.

The picture is misleading as it shows a cover to match the original that came with our phone which broke several years ago. It did not fit and was totally misleading. We ordered 3 covers only one fit. So much for quality control. They are cheap and flimsy. Don't waste your money.

I had no problems with the seller, and we received this product quickly..however, it is not worth it...as other reviewers have said its hard to clean, and the design does wear off. Our son was very disappointed in this, especially given how much these go for, you get what you pay for!

This was a pretty good film. When the movie starts you start to see where they are headed;. How all of them are just people that don't really have any real power over anybody. Also there is Kevin Spacey. Great actor he's done a good job in anything he has.

this product should have been my last experience buying a refurbished product. After only 2 weeks of use, we noticed that our mouse will randomly stop working and take two or three taps on the mouse, then work perfectly again.
I really love this cd. It's beautiful and soothing at the same time. This is a great cd and I'm glad to have it in my collection.

This is not a true story. I am amazed that it was ever published. I would steer clear of this author and all his other works. Disgusting. Should never have been published as fiction. You will be sorry.

In my opinion, the worst book I've ever read. I usually love John Grisham.... but not this time. Bad bad bad. Borring read all around. Won't buy any more of his books unless it gets better reviews. Sorry, John! Sorry for ruining your book career. And good Luck in the future!

I like it. It is what i was looking for. Only problem I've had so far. The USB cord is cheap and broke already. Other than the cord, it works good with my new iPad mini. Fast shipping, which is nice. I'd buy again if I break this cord. Thanks alot. &# 60;3
Product received was all plastic and did not contain the small package of seeds as pictured. Would be nice if we were able to return it due to false advertising.

I bought a few of these mugs as gifts. The best part is that you cannot tell they are plastic. It comes with a removable plastic cover on the inside and so there really isn't any way to identify them. Perfect for parties or everyday use. Be careful not to drop it - you'll break it. Mine cracked fairly easily. Great product!
This is exactly what we wanted after having been unable to find one locally at all.

This is more a cookbook with some cooking tips; for the same price get The Happy Herbivore on Kindle instead -- it's not great either, but it has pictures and actual recipes. If this one didn't have "diets" or healthy eating I wouldn't recommend it. I'm new to paleo diets - too many variables in life already.

I enjoyed the second volume in this series as much if not more than its predecessor. The plot gets darker and deeper at times with many twists and turns. I didn't love every twist and turned, but they are executed well enough. Most importantly, there were never any huge holes left open to be filled that seemed impossible. If there is one complaint I'd have... well, it's that, for some reason, the authors seem intent on making an argument about people being selfish instead of focusing on telling a compelling story.

I love the color and it was exactly what i expected! However as soon as you put cover on your phone, it's a real pain to take off again. The case wont snap onto my phone! And when u pry it off, pieces of plastic fall from both sides so there are parts that you couldnt actually use. Its not only annoying but looks cheap. If this phone had more than one case then i'd just be happy with any other case.

It was okay. I did think it wrapped up to quick but for what the movie was, it hit it on the head pretty good. So if your looking at this and thinking, "How can a book made into films be bad?!" Then don't go see it. Just watch it! This really showed you that the movies and tv, no matter how good they are, can't capture everything. But the books are so much more better.
The cover works as advertised. My Kindle Fire snapped right in, no assembly needed.
Terrible product. Was already coming apart before we put them on, and then they fell apart. If you are into super cheap quality, go ahead with these.

I thought the book was too long. Not enough action and character development. Very little suspense and nothing exciting happened. It has a great beginning, but seemed to drag on for quite awhile. I read this last weekend before going out of town so my mind could relax. The books were pretty good. They are in order. Don't know if they will keep coming on line.

We have been dealing with tech support for almost 2 weeks now and they haven't gotten back to us, after the phone lines are down, we cannot get a hold of them. I would not recommend this product! If you don't believe me then see how many problems others had. I will never buy another Sony again. Now we've had it about 3 months, maybe two if you're lucky! The quality has really decreased since then. They still suck, but no one cares by now.

When I opened the package, there was a piece chipped off of it. The description said it came with three pieces. That did not happen. On one side of the case, the cover just fell off. And when I tried to put a second cover, like you see in the picture, on it, it didn't fit. So that's two covers that I'm unable to use. Also, this company gives an address outside Amazon so don't buy it from there. Even if they gave me free return shipping and were only charging $7.

This is for the original version of this book. The cover design was changed and it looks weird now. There are a few recipes worth trying, but most seem repetitious. For $5, you get what you're paying for. In my opinion, don't waste your money. A better buy would be the cookbooks written by Sandra Lee.

I think this may very well be the worst book ever, the writing is so bad and juvenille, they should put him on a suicide watch! My father gave this to me thinking it was good. He didn't say anything before giving this to me.

After only one usage I feel my hair is already lighter but it's still very soft. Hopefully there isn't as much damage happening to the scalp since it hasn't been long. Will keep using it. I'll update this after at least a month so let you see how damaged her are getting from use. Hope I'm not too late... :(

I got this book because the title made it seem interesting. In fact after reading several pages of it i just could not find any interest in it. I'm sure many will like it, but for me nothing happened. Perhaps if you love sports as much as I do you'll love this. It left me cold. One good thing about this is that it came quickly...

I was disappointed with this product. For the money it costs and if all you need to plug into is a single power source (transformer, laptop. If your computer requires two or more plugs then maybe you'll get some use out of this. It doesn't charge laptop when its connected - only trickle charge. So that's pretty much it. Not what I thought it'd be.

Love the size and design of these boxes. They're very sturdy/strong so they can even take abuse with minimal damage. They also come in other colors/designs. These will hold enough stuff for most things from laundry detergent, paper, etc. Highly recommend.

I purchased this book specifically for a recipe called "chicken bouillon" in the title, but there is actually no chicken included whatsoever. Instead, what you get are 7 different recipes. One of them, called "Chicken and dumplings" consists entirely of...well...a CHICKEN AND A DOUGHNUPP!To make matters more interesting, several of them have NO FONTANT at all. They just add vegetables to soup. Some require chopping vegetables, some don't.

After trying several other models for our home, this microwave has been the best so far. I had a problem with my original one, and Panasonic replaced it promptly. No problems since then. We have experienced trouble getting dishes to fit properly in the microwave; they come out all over and there is one spot that was warped when it came. It isn't too big of an issue, though.

This CD is a live recording of an old radio show from the 1950's. The sound quality for music and narration was excellent. In addition, the shows ran around 2 hours, so at least 60 minutes worth of program time. I'm not sure if these transcriptions can be found anywhere else but I would think it only fair to include such information prior to purchase. Although this cd contains four tracks which run longer than 30 minutes, all numbers are well done with good sound.

I had high hopes for this book. Not only is it incredibly small and thin, but every single time you flip through the book, two sheets fall off each other. You can't use any of those pages without losing them. If I'd known how crummy the quality would be, I'm really not sure that I would've purchased it. But it's basically a waste of $20.

If you like to bake your own breads, this is a must have! Very easy set up! I do tend to add the dough for the first 3 cups, but works great after that. It does take up space in my pantry. You just have be willing to devote time to making and cleaning! And the bread is well worth it! Love that it makes large loaves, not only small ones. Also love how much flour comes out at one time. Just wonderful! Also, clean quite easily.   Rating: 5.

I guess this is good if you're a fan of some really slow dance music but if you want upbeat and uptempo songs check out DJ Tiesto or Paul Van Dyk's albums, their styles are much more varied than this. On the brighter side though, it's great background music for something relaxing -- just not to dance, in my opinion.

I've used this camera since Christmas 2013 and really loved it. I took it everywhere for the first couple of months then recently a problem has developed: all images are blurry. The shutter often freezes up when I'm in focus shooting pics but cannot tell if it's even trying to focus. Sometimes you can get away with just snapping pictures right before taking another one because they turn out, almost always they're great.

My first experience with this brand of coffee. It really hits the spot! So glad I tried it as my husband and me will for a long time. Will continue to order. You get enough pods in each bag unlike other brands. Enjoy!

I wanted to like this book and was looking forward to a good time spent reading it. To my surprise, it got much better as the story developed. I found it tedious at times though I did manage to plow through. There is very little romance throughout most of the book; only two scenes between characters. The first half has her sister teaching high school history in New York, visiting Europe on vacation. Her friend comes along, meets another man (let's call him Jason) who becomes something more.

I have this light attached to the side of my house. It works great. With it on high, you can see everything that is going on. If that's what you're looking for, get it. For me, just a night time light, it's perfect. Update... This thing sucks. One of its motors burnt out, and now if i turn it, it'll beep like crazy. I'm guessing that doesn't need to be done as often, so maybe they used cheap parts....

This one is almost all about his love life and a little bit about religion. It's got some of the typical'man on mission' stuff in it but mostly it's just an attempt to make money when he hasn't got anything better to do. I can respect him trying for God by being a missionary or whatever, it's a noble endeavor.
I am soooo disappointed in this C.D. It seems like she sold out but her soul was still inside of her. Now its all about being a star and not listening to what God has had to say instead.
This is the best brand of pepper and my kids loved it. I will be buying more real soon. Thank you so much.

While working on the installation of this unit and trying to contact their help line, I heard a buzz from within my computer. That is not what you expect when installing a fan. Since then, I've had two more fans that have developed exactly the same problem. These units would be great for something if they didn't overheat so quickly! So before buying, just realize these are going to become hot in your USB ports over time. Other than that, everything goes well with them. They do move quite well.

This is a great product for any dog with the potential to develop joint problems. My 14 yr old cat was having problems picking up after himself and my 5 & 8 year olds have had issues of their own as well. The vet recommended this product. I started them on it several weeks ago when they were 11 and 12 months old. They both look forward every time we give them each dose now.

This book was very disappointing. I expected a few photos in an album for the first half and much more information about the process of making photographs. He has some pretty cool looking art techniques but if you are interested in photography, don't look here. You will understand what kind of photo he is trying to make by skimming his pages. What a disappointment. If someone like Scott Kelby's book, which covers much better this subject, doesn't exist, buy that. The photography inside however is...
I bought this for a friend. He loves it and says that everything works well. Great price too. Highly recommend!

The product did NOT work properly, I even had a professional from Comcast come out to check it out, but when he came back after 30 minutes for me to verify that everything was connected OK, the modem actually lost speed and wouldn't reconnect wirelessly or on any computer with an internet connection. After spending over 2 hours installing all kinds of updates nothing worked and we were not able to use it. It is ridiculous as our previous modem works perfectly fine.

This was a total waste of money. There is barely any story and not all that much action. The pictures are nice though. I didn't like the fact there were so many animals in this one, it just confused me, because most kids read to have one simple story. In my opinion it's okay for them but maybe not, I'd say. Maybe older teens who don't need such long stories would enjoy it; but as an adult I find it boring.

I just finished reading this book and have never been more unhappy with a book. As an aside, the author also seems to be completely confused about what was going on when certain events took place. For example many reviews here and elsewhere state that "The Battle of Guilford Courthouse between General [Nathanael Monk] Greene and Lord Rawdon is almost exactly as it happened in Oliver North's books" or some other such nonsense. Please read up on North before you write these reviews.

Bought as Christmas gift for my daughter and her husband. They loved the design but I found it too big in size. A small child would love it. Also very cute material is soft to touch. Overall good value

This product had such great potential, I really wish there was at least one chapter written about the negative effects of having a child with dyslexia or any other learning disorder. I've enjoyed several books and some documentaries that address this subject, including "The Dyslexic Child", by Diane Fanning. You can find it in most used bookstores.
Very poor quality! Had to return because all of the plastic pieces broke in less than a month. Will not buy again! I tried taping them back together but they snapped again after just one week!

As a writer I read this book on my lunch hour. It was terrible. The characters, especially the main character, were one demension, and that is because they came off as so stereotype. So if your looking for something to pass time with try this book, otherwise don't go near it. What happened here, I have no idea. And since it wasn't edited by me, I'll never know... But trust me you wouldn't miss much just flipping through these pages. Very dull.

I really wanted to like this product and so did my cat. However, one or more of the four cats just wouldn't eat these treats. It was surprising since he is a very picky eater but not as much at other treats, too. So, I'm giving it two stars. You may have luck if your cat likes all kinds of flavors.

I read book two and three of this series, but am currently out for the fourth and believe to have just found that a good portion is missing - what happened to some key characters? Is there any additional information on them or is it all still up in the air regarding them?A bit disappointed by the way this story seems disjointed so far from where it left off after reading Book two. Hoping the last one will be more enjoyable. Still love my Kindle! 
 Rating: 3.

This has been a wonderful addition to my kitchen appliances! My wife loves it! Very simple to use, good design for small counters or counter top space. I bought this adapter about a month ago and I'm having issues with it. When i plug it in my computer, it's not powering up the USB ports at all. It's very annoying. This product is just awful. This product is ok. I was going to return it if for some reason i couldn't keep it. Don't know how long the elastic will last but that is only a risk. It looks cute and stylish. Overall not bad at all. For me good enough :-) Would buy again. Wish they had more colors in this brand.

This book has a lot of nice pictures, but it's useless for the beginner or anyone who hasn't had an "introduction" course in how to draw manga.
