That being said, there are several other great manga training books available that cover technique much better than this. If you're interested in drawing manga, check out Takahira's Manga Artist's Handbook.

I returned this product once and was sent a new one the same problem. Now I'm sending it back again. This is my 3rd or 4th one. Not worth it, even at $10. The 1st time around It sounded great then all of a sudden after about 1/2 hour there was static. Save your money - buy something else - not this.

What an utter pile of crap. Don't buy it unless you hate yourself. If you're looking to find a nice laugh in your collection, go for it. But if you'd like some good belly laughs, try watching the movie "Memento," one of my favorites. It was not made by this clowns. Watch that instead. This is bad. I can't even call the music original. It's kind of catchy... I'm having fun with it, though. How could any band give 5 out of 5...

In my experience, this product does not work. I tested it against the previous test which takes about a minute to confirm its accuracy. This one only took 20 seconds, more than likely due to less signal strength. Additionally, when you are testing your signal, you have multiple options that may be of help. But if you choose these options, they all require additional power and cannot affect any of four lights (amber or green light) on front.[...

A very cute little toy. It has a good battery life and it runs quite well on one charge. I'm glad I bought this. The only problem is the tail pops right off. This could be dangerous if left inside or in the car though. But this product seems to be built well. If you fly it, don't look at its eyes, he likes them. Just keep an eye for flying pieces.

We bought this camera as a wedding gift for my sister in law so she could have an easier time with all the new technology that her husband had just gotten used to. She was looking at Nikon or Cannon before us to get one when we thought about getting our own back up camera. When it came in, I hooked it up, turned on some of the features... and immediately knew something wasn't right. You can only use 3 megapixel pictures.

The taste was really bad. As much sugar is put into each one of these they need less calories per bar. Also, I prefer a chocolate flavor and while this brand has dark chocolate, it's more like peanut butter than chocolate. But who likes chocolate? These are very difficult to chew.

The book begins with a man reading his mother's obituary (which is quite humorous) but this was too little of it. There wasn't any sense that Jack has a real life, or we see him dealing to find out what happened next with his family. This was all about the funeral, and when I read it, it didn't interest my son. Not one of our favorite bedtime stories. If you do buy it...

I had high expectations for this book and they have all been dashed! This is one of the worst books I've ever read. My review isn't based on whether you agree with or disagree with Rand's philosophy, but rather in her personal life. Not only was there no real emotional connection, she spent so much time attacking other people's beliefs even though she's probably got most of them right (except for Rand herself.
Our puppy has plenty of room inside.
Great product that is low priced.

The first one I bought just didn't work and there was a short in the cable. This has happened with TWO of these. Also, even though it said that it's compatible for iPhone, we tried an iPod touch 4G and had no luck. We're going to do better research next time.

This has been the ONLY brand of dog toys that I've bought and returned. They seem to be good quality for a while, but after having them on their play area I noticed they needed constant replacing. There will literally come apart every few weeks, unless you glue in place (or replace with one side reinforced).
This CD will get you in a trance I bought this for my husband and we both love it. It's awesome music to fall asleep to. It's good quality sound and it's really enjoyable music. Great CD. Thank you.

I've owned this product for a little over two years now, and at first I did really like it. It is fast -- even works well in some places where my old wireless g was too slow. My problem though after owning it about 10 months has been that the speed degrades to nearly useless. If you set up your pc on it, you will not be able to access your router. Even if you have full signal, once the laptop loses connection (connections) -- it's worthless.

There were two reasons why I did not give it 5 stars. First of all, there are many typos. Words or phrases that sound exactly the same can appear totally different. But even typos should probably be fixed during editing.
It's an okay coffeemaker -- makes fast, hot coffee. It doesn't cost much (though sometimes you want less than you'd pay at that grocery store), so it's pretty good.

I love this case for my phone because it's very pretty and protects my phone. The only problem is that it falls off quite easily. I've had to put a new one on three times so far. Other than that, i really like it. It's pretty.

This film had been in the back of my mind for some time, hoping to view it. However, it is a disappointment and I was forced by work to watch it. Yes, this does not mean that anyone should skip out on watching the film, but please be aware that all the actors are awful - even Kate Hudson. Don't waste your time with this; rent it, don't buy it. Go see American Horror Story instead.

I bought this for my 3 month old to use at the airport. It fit pretty tight under her chin even though she had a hat on! When we put on our carseat base, it covered all but about an inch of her. The strap that actually is suppose ti hold around your neck doesn't go over very far and would be uncomfortable right across baby's face. She also really didn't like being covered. I'm going back to purchasing wraps with hoods since they have less layers.

I am a fan of the author, but this book was poorly written. It had too many inconsistancies. A lot of sex and not enough plot. What happened to that interesting plot? I didn't care for it. There were times when I wanted to throw it across the room. This makes me wonder if there is someone out there, just like him, who cares.

Bought one recently from a local store. The other one that came through Amazon was way better quality! Nice soft bag with sturdy handles. Perfect size too! Very pleased. It should last at least a high schooler!

This movie will have you thinking, "What is the world coming to?" It could not end much worse, if it did. I'm glad I did watch this movie. If you're gonna scare anyone, at least make sure it isn't your mom. In some of these movies, the heroine ends up in a really dark place, but she comes out like she's in an Alfred Hitchcock classic. Don't waste your time with this one. Save yourself two hours. Watch something else. I'll give it that...

This book is terrible. Most of the "facts" in it are so wrong they should be illegal. Some parts have absolutely nothing to do with any topic at all let alone UFOs. It just seems like the publisher published a bunch of random pieces of paper and some people wrote little essays on each. For instance, one woman claims that she was able to see alien craft but nobody else could.

This book would have done better in a shorter format such as 500 pages. Not recommended. The story line was good but too lengthy and drawn out. I kept thinking the writing seemed to be written by someone with limited English skills. There were numerous errors that made it hard to follow. At one point we got the names wrong - then again there is no way this could happen twice. Don't waste your time unless you like long drawn-out stories and endless descriptive passages. Not my style.

I purchased this product and it took FOREVER to get it. Once i received the package in tact i opened the packaging when they said use a credit card to flatten out protector. I didn't do anything special only put on protector so that is how things began getting scratched up (yes i know its my fault but come on) after about 2 days you would still here bubbles everywhere. As for screen quality good as expected.
I ordered this item on July 16, 2012.
This is so typical Hollywood production - we see the same kinds of scenes again and again. But at least they are different stories which make this watchable.

This product does well to eliminate some of the odor and is supposed to help with cat urine stains in areas that cannot be treated. However, I must say that it doesn't completely get rid for this problem. We use enzyme cleaner on carpet stains. Also, it seems to cause our cats scratching more when they are sick. On a positive note, this litter clumps up fine even when there are many "extras" - so no dust mess left behind.

I was very happy when the product came and fit perfectly. It took a few tries to work out the bubbles, but finally figured it out. I'm a perfectionist, so this is probably my only concern. Hopefully we won't have any issues later, though. Looks good on her iPod. She's rough with stuff too, maybe that helped keep up some of the scratches. She likes it, that's what matters. Thanks for providing such an inexpensive product. We don't want our iPod screen getting scratched like she is.
The product is just OK. It has a strange chemical smell that makes it impossible to use in my baby's car seat. I'm returning it.
It installed easily. The battery door is a bit loose but doesn't seem like it'll fall off at all. I've now used my laptop outdoors for several hours while waiting to pick up some things.
it is not very well made, but was worth the price if you don't want to spend much on batteries. You get what you pay for I guess.
I'm really surprised by all the good reviews of this book.

Great for making your own trail mix. I've tried everything from raw unsalted to mixed nuts but still wanted a nice sweet treat. These are delicious and great on the trail. No added salt makes these bars ideal after a long hike. You don't feel like you're missing much by not grinding almonds in them. They stay together well at room temp. A good value. Will be buying more. I recommend trying them as an alternative to plain trail mixes. Excellent snack bar too.
I bought 2 for my kids. My oldest loves it. And the 2nd one doesn't do well, since I got on it myself. Now he uses it, his mom doesn't. lol.. good product, and easy to use as well.

Not only is very easy to install by just using the simple template (template.png). But the item itself feels solid on wall, has adjustable shelves which actually are pretty helpful when putting bottles in. However, do have 2 minor complaints.
After reading the book I see he actually liked it. But did not think it was worth reading to kids especially at 3 yrs. old. Would be good for 1st graders? It was okay. Nothing special.
The product looks exactly like what they show.
I have been very please with all of my purchases from Amazon. These bags are the best for moving bulky items in and out of your vehicle. Thank you Amazon!Robert

I ordered these because most of them were so attractive in the picture. They arrived today, only 2 are a full moon and very few others. The rest are just cloudy or cloudy. Not what I'm looking for. Now to say that they look nothing like they're pictured would be an understatement. These look cheap, almost plastic-y instead of having sparkle as seen here. I feel deceived completely. For instance, many come already assembled. I've never returned something bought on Amazon before but am concerned now about this.

I purchased this book based solely on the previous review. Unfortunately it is not as interesting and intriguing or well written as my daughter expected. For her we read other books by Dr. Seuss. This one failed to hold her interest for long periods of time. If your child hasn't had exposure yet, buy another book. She enjoys some of Seuss books, but would rather stick with ones that are more educational in nature and/or relate directly to children.
This is an interesting book, and even though it's fiction, so it seems more probable, but my problem was that there appears to be two authors whose writing styles are different.

Very disappointed in both this book and the seller I bought it from. Both were a used book. The cover was bent as if someone handled it. Some of pages had been torn away. It looked like they just threw my money down their garbage disposal. Do not waste your money. This author needs to come out with another book, preferably one that is from her new publisher. It's time for some real writing. One star because zero stars isn't an option.

It would not stay on my ipad, I had to return it. Other than that it was a good cover. I hope you have better luck with your new one. If so I will buy one again just for the back light. No problems returning though. They handled everything. This is what Amazon has become. Very poor service.

First off, let me say that I believe this is a fabulous album. With many of the same musicians who created the magnificent album from which it was drawn, in fact, it's one thing to produce an EP but what makes THIS and others such as it all but unlistenable is the constant "loops" or sounds being placed over other sounds (or something similar).My girlfriend made fun of my obsession with them when we first heard them, so at least I'm getting some enjoyment out of them.

So when I purchased my Xbox 360, a couple of years ago there were absolutely no guides about it available. As far as the game is concerned, it's fun once you get into it. My issue with the XBox 360 was that one day it just wouldn't turn on. After spending an insane amount on Microsoft warranty, they decided to ship me another one, but since this time we couldn't even get the thing on, they gave us two options. The standard exchange or send in and wait for 2-3 weeks.

Like other reviews this is the worst piece of trash I own. The rubber seal on each end came off after only using once. Don't waste your money. Spend a little more for some higher quality product. This was just a bad product in my opinion. Get something better or get nothing. Bad product... Stay away.

This book is not a book, it's a pamphlet. Don't waste your money. It was written in the 80's and I remember when I picked it up at my local library. It's just an attempt to get anyone who liked or lived through these days from the author's life by rehashing what went on during that era. If there are more stories this way, please let me know. There weren't any. But as a short essay I'd say that's fine.

The product was of good quality and did it's job for a while. But there is no way to get the unit wet while doing its work. If you want it wet, then it becomes useless. I know there's always rust with this kind of thing, but after only 2 weeks or so, mine rusted completely! Other than that, great product!
This is my first digital camera that has not come with an instruction manual. I'm usually okay with downloading manuals if there are instructions attached.

It does get the job done. The wire that goes from one side of to another is a little loose but it works. Good product. No problems at all. Just don't over tighten it. Other than that, you can't go wrong. I am not an expert on speaker wiring so if there are better wires out there, I'd like to hear them. It's enough for me just fine, thanks!

When my wife and I were at the Museum of Modern Art in New York, we bought many items from a special display. The show featured lots of different art prints by Andy Warhol. We saw most pieces, but not all because it was so crowded when I got to mine. But this painting caught our eye. It's one that looks very similar to an original Warhol portrait with it's dark, moody tone. I'm guessing Andrew Wyeth may have done it, too.

After having used the Canon 5d and not knowing too much, I picked up this camera at a local store. I found some reviews online about how well it shot in low light, yet there is simply no way to see what you are actually seeing with this. In short, it will just be dark, until someone makes an LCD viewfinder version. You can make out faces but that's it. No option for taking photos outside.
It was a gift for my grandson to add with his collection of Batman items. He has all the other Lego Batmans and wanted this. Good price too!

Just not a very good book. Lots of sexual stuff which I could care less about. Don't recommend at all. What else can be said for this one? A waste of time and money. Not recommended. This is only one point that you need to read all the reviews before ordering. The other ones will apply too.
These seem like they work ok.
The volume on these speakers are really only half as loud and it's just impossible to hear when outside.

My husband has been using one of these bottles for years. We couldn't find another bottle exactly like it and we ordered two. Both times the lid was broken within a day. You have got to be kidding with how much you pay and they don't stick together. These are very flimsy - not what I would expect from OXO

This song brought tears to my eyes during one of our worship services. Definitely helps you focus on God. One day when you're praying and feeling discouraged, ask JESUS into your life. He doesn't have time to answer any questions or do anything in his busy day, so let Jesus in. God loves you.

I was unable to use this product. After the initial "setup," in which they ask you for your credit card, it became impossible to log onto facebook. The instructions tell you it's only a couple of hours until their servers are available. It took me several days. Their customer service staff could not solve what was wrong. They tried by calling me. I had already sent an email before I received any call.

It wouldn't download, don't know how to get rid of it! There are several people complaining about having trouble downloading. Please fix, or replace all that you have. Thanks guys. Sorry Amazon! No problems. Love Kindle! Thanks!

I just could not get into this book, it started out pretty good, seemed to take forever for the story about Alex and Chloe to be told. When they finally did get together, there relationship was like a "friends" type of relationship!!! It got old when both Alex and Chloe were just wishy-washy in trying to figure things out.

I don't know what happened to this series. The first one was pretty good, the second less so. So here's my opinion. It's kind of hard for me to say because it's not a bad book. All parts were good. However, as far as I'm concerned there are more books that can be written on each character's journey. Not just their "problem" in life, but life in general. In other words, it seems like maybe we're reading the same book. As I said, I didn't hate it.
I returned this item right away. It did not work for my husband at all. He could barely hear anything. And no headphones, just the ear buds that come included. Not worth what it was...
These are nice hooks. They grip well, although my wife isn't real fond of them...

I have the largest version, and for my purposes it is perfect. Only complaint would be that the sides are not rigid enough, so the top of your head will probably slip sometimes. It does its job well in keeping you dry (and it's very comfortable) when swimming. Would recommend even with small problems.

I chose to buy this because of a recent online photo showing an almost identical one in a store - maybe just that particular item had been stored with items that came from the same company. But when it arrived, it's actually more similar than its photo. The black part is solid and shiny, but for me, at least initially, the white part, which looks black, isn't as well attached (it's glued). It arrived already scratched.
A good read, but really lacks excitement.
After reading this book, I returned it back to Amazon because it does not cover many types of animals and animals.

I have to admit that this movie isn't quite as thrilling or suspenseful as other thrillers such asThe Last Airbender; Vampire Princess - Vampire Killer (Vampire Warrior Chronicles, Book 1)and my all time fave andDracula: Prince of Darkness (Widescreen Edition). In part that's because even at its height (mid 1930's late 40's) it relies on stereotypes rather than character development which takes some adjustment from modern viewers.
Was looking forward to another 'Donna Tartt' novel...
So far so good. As soon as I get my truck cleaned I'll have to follow up with a more accurate and comprehensive review.
not that great as i thought. there is no plastic covering so the screen looks awful when installed. but its cheap.

I bought these to work with my laptop but the quality of them was not acceptable. Even after multiple tweaks and reboots, my computer still said that they were defective and had nothing special about them. Save your money for a better product or upgrade if you need help making presentations. Avoid these!
It never worked. I took it to a local camera shop and paid $15 just for them take a look at it. My money back because I'm out on this purchase. Lesson learned.

At first I was pretty excited about trying these out since my daughter will eat almost anything and usually gobbles them up. Not so with these. These tasted nothing like her other gummies. She won't finish a single package. Also, there's not one drop of actual pineapple flavor in these, but more candy apple. Definitely not worth the money. We bought some regular Gummi Bears (great taste, no pineapple) for less at Whole Foods this week, which is what we should have started with.
Excellent flavor. Not too sweet. Great way for folks who stay at work on their lunch break. Keeps you full till it is time to leave.

I have to say the product quality itself is not bad at all. This case has a nice hard matte finish that matches well with some other phone cases. It fits perfectly and keeps my Lumia 521 protected from scratches very well. So far (3 weeks of use), it has been nothing out of the ordinary. All buttons are still accessible without any issues. The only complain is how slippery this case is. I'm used to cases where they grip but do NOT slip, which make for easier grip.
If you're looking for something nice and sturdy, look elsewhere.

I purchased this for my 3 year old granddaughter and she loves it, but they don't stay on the bed well at all. I just make sure that when putting them in place before her bedtime we stick it to a box that fits better with no gaps. Other than that, they're great. Good color too. They are so much fun for any little girl who LOVES horses. :) And unlike some other reviewers have stated, none of ours came damaged and all colors were good after washing. No shrinkage.

Just got this in the mail from UPS today. Got as pictured. Opened it up and was so excited to read all of these rave reviews. Put some batteries into it, pressed down until the red light came on (I tested that by holding it) turned on, then put 2 AAA Duracell alkaline batteries. It doesn't turn on. Very disappointed. What do I need a hammer for? Returning it. Also if anyone knows how to get my money back, please email me.
My husband bought both of these toys from Toys r us.

I found the book to be very wordy and complicated. The author uses some really complicated words that make it hard for me also. If you can get through this book, you'll find a lot of good advice. It was well written though.

I was a long time fan of the original books, and I loved them after reading them in high school, but this movie is ridiculous. The plot gets so jumbled at times it is hard to keep tract of. All these different things are happening... who did what when, where are they at... etc. The acting was very bad - you could tell when anyone got scared because his or her voice would change.

This product was very easy to set up (took about 30 seconds) but the remote control didn't work after 2 months! I called customer support and they had me do what he said on page 29 of the manual: take a look into reset button, etc. Even though this did not work, their tech could only suggest that it might have been "user error". It's an okay product, just beware while setting up. It definitely deserves one star for faulty product.

If u can't come up with a new title for each book then at least change the name. This second installment I feel like she just threw us something and said let's hurry to release this. So far if it had not been on my kindle or in the store I would have probably just stopped reading. There were some really good parts but they quickly turned into page fillers because of their constant sexual references.

This piece of crap did not charge properly on the first use. They claim no problem but I found out. The cord broke off and you can see exposed wires everywhere. It's a cheap piece of garbage. Please don't waste your money.

I have a large black male boxer who loves this kind of toy and it's the only one that has lasted longer than 3 days. He is very rough with it, but still manages to destroy a plastic ball. So, I was hoping for it to last him a long time, but unfortunately he has destroyed his latest one. It may be better if you don't try and get too much bounce or throw the ball hard because there will probably not survive in a big dog.
These headphones work great. They block out most outside sound, but if you need them to, they do so fairly decent.
This book was good reading, with a little romance thrown in. The characters were likable but the plot seemed somewhat predictable. A fast read though. Well worth your time.

I bought this item for my sons 10th birthday and on the very first day he opened it he dropped it from less then one foot up high by accident. His iPad hit on the screen with a loud cracking noise and shattered. The second time that it fell out of his backpack. So now is cracked all over the side. And even worse, not enough to get another iPad. He has an otter case but it's quite bulky. It also doesn't stay snug around the ipad either.

These were not the most comfortable shoes. I'm usually a 7 1/2 and these 9 fit very loose. They are quite stylish as I have heard them compared to Kenneth Cole shoes but with all due respect I'd choose any kind of sandal over these. If your foot looks like it needs support you might be better off shopping for something higher end that actually does what it's designed for.

The book was a good read but it had no ending. Maybe there to be another book? I hope so because I've never read any of this author's books before and have heard that she writes very well with endings. If so I'll probably try one next. Otherwise don't waste your time or money on this book. There are other authors who make their readers wait for much better endings! :(

I am an ardent fan of The Last Dragon, and it seems to me that this book is almost totally pointless. It's just the text version from Dragon Ball Z's manga series, with no commentary or explanation. So it's pointless seeing why Goku has such a bad temper, or what Bulma's powers are in relation to her human appearance. However, I'm going to warn you about reading it. A few things happen early on when a character dies.

I didn't receive this item not once. It's a great game when it gets the product, and I'll be sending them back they were so poorly done. My grandson wanted to play. He said he got tired of waiting for it. There are times that he's told me that all that's left is getting on to play again and then it won't load. This has happened several times. Please stop selling this. When he finally received it, it's as much fun if you don't get everything at all.

I purchased this for a client of mine that has to use a wheelchair and was going through several tubes every couple months. She had tried ice on her legs previously which didn't help at all, as she is petite but very tall. This really helps tremendously with the numbing process. The pain goes away within just minutes. Good product! Just be sure you have your receipt or insurance card handy when it arrives.

Got this as an upgrade from the original N800 camera that fell after a year with no apparent reason. While my N8 was really great when I had it, mine came defective in its power button. The second time using it and without warning, it stopped working. Not sure what happens to these newer Nikon models but if they are going down hills like this, at least stick around on the old models!

Good quality, but very tight at the top. This may be because it is a fitted dress and I am not one of those who has long torsos that need to hang off my body. The lace top does help hold most things in place though and doesn't slip. Overall great for what you pay. Arrived before they said it would. You will def have to layer with or without the boning as shown otherwise your chest looks pointless. :)

I love the original Zentangle book and all other books by Sonia Choy. All of her books come with a DVD that goes through each step as well. The colors are very bright in person as well for anyone who has experienced light shifting before. Its not hard to do at all. She even gives great direction on how you can make them more saturated or darker. If you're looking to get these type of effects, then this is something you should pick up.

The book is okay. I wish there were more pictures. They don't really go into much detail, either. It's OK for a quick reference when you want some ideas. It gives ideas without detailed how-tos. However, if you're looking to make products from scratch, or in great quantities, this probably isn't the best book. But it's okay as an overview. And since I just wanted something that was handy and small enough to carry with me, it works great. Just be aware how few pictures are included.

As the title says, I've had it about a month and I really have no way to even tell how great this product is. However, from my research it's not that great. The battery compartment is all one piece of plastic. What happens after many months on a long plane trip?I'm afraid I'll never know. That's what happened. I plugged in my camera which was fully charged - turned it on. Took off first thing when I landed.

I purchased this to replace a similar style kettle that had lost its whistle/whistle. In comparison, this appears well built and it has the "whistle sound" that was important for me, but it's so light you have difficulty holding it. It feels like one might break it, just by picking up it. Other than these issues, I'm not dissatisfied in any way. It's also nice having two extra holes on either side of the bottom. That way, if only half your kettle is used, you're still brewing more.

I found this book extremely slow reading. It seemed the author was more interested in his own observations about life than helping us to learn any lessons we could from it. He gave very few references and never defined some of the concepts he discussed making it difficult for me (avid reader) to work out what is meant by a sentence or concept.

This film is so bad it almost makes good for the first two thirds. It suffers from a plethora of unforseen plot devices and terrible dialog. The acting also really suffers. And then when one looks at the rest of what they are supposed to be dealing with, you realize how incredibly bad everything is. It's like watching some high school production with no budget.
Great price on an awesome tool. I've used it for 2 years now and have zero complaints. I would definetely buy more Milwaukee tools from Amazon.

This is a good product for the price but it does slide back and forth in place so sometimes you have to readjust it, which may be aggravating if you're driving. It fits my Kindle Fire HD well, keeps out dust, water etc. Looks like real leather too! The only thing that bothers me with these ones vs. other cases I see are when it's laying flat on dashboard - sometimes there's no latch underneath at bottom of side (the holder piece goes against headrest).

Not what I was hoping for. Wish the information had been more clear about how to clean it properly and such. Didn't even get through half of the book. Maybe I'll give that one a try someday! The pictures were great though.

The only aspect I love about this book is the way authors keep creating more variations on the story. It's like a new story to me every time and it's always fun trying out all of them. This one was an easy read. It's written in a journal style format but it didn't take long at all. At my first few pages, I wasn't sure if I would continue reading. The characters were kind of sketchy though.
It wasn't really what I expected. Not a lot of action or mystery but it was an easy read for me. Will probably try other books by author.
As someone who loves fantasy, especially of the young adult genre, this story was highly predictable. Every character and event had been done ad nauseum by this author somewhere else.

The premise for this film is great. A girl who has survived childhood horrors and is trying to find her way forward in life, so she can help heal the wounds of others. Unfortunately there's not much story or substance here. There's no development as far as character growth or anything else...just a bunch of teens drinking alcohol! If they got off some weed it would be fine, but not on booze with other kids around them that look like preteens. It's just kind of...

I like it. It fits well. It's comfortable when I'm at work. My coworkers who use the Bose ear buds love it as well, so much that they have asked me to purchase them for them. I would suggest this product if you want a headset in your pricey, but not expensive earbuds.
this game is fun but kind of slow and boring. there are some good items in it though.

The device is great. I enjoy the music so much that i purchased it for another person as a gift, and they really like it, too! One big problem however - no wall adapter! But it's not made clear if this is included in item description! Otherwise an excellent purchase.
Bought at a local retailer. Opened package and could hear something rattling inside.

The box came with all kinds of plastic pieces from the manufacturer. It had a lot to do about assembling. Once up and in use, there were too many issues for me to keep. I can say that after using it less than half its life, we found out how much better steam irons are. After being used for almost 30 days, just because they are new, the light won't ever work or turn on even if nothing is plugged in. This was also my first iron as it has been 6 years.

One problem with this system is that when you use a microwave, the temperature gauge on the display goes up by 10 degrees. If you're sitting at your kitchen table having dinner, it will be 110 degrees. We all know that's not good. It's very frustrating to try and cook something that isn't as hot or even warm because it's taken 20 minutes longer than usual to cook. You have to take what you consider to be the time appropriate measurement off of there anyway, like one minute from start to finish.

It did not fit at all and it broke as I was taking off the cover to see if a better one could be made for what i intended on doing. Just a waste of my money. Not happy. But thanks you have been nice about it.

It got here in a timely fashion, the package was not damaged. However, I had to take my kindle out of it because there were holes where two plastic sides would be at this point so the Kindle could fall right out. Maybe I shouldn't have tried to put that on but just putting it in without any padding really upset me. You get what you pay for. If you want something better spend extra money. But I wasn't thrilled with it. Sorry but for $17 though that's about right.

It wasn't the best book ever read by any stretch of imagination, it was definitely fun reading about all of the people of England when they were still young. I thought some parts got rather tedious or boring at times.
While the music and dancing are great it gets boring after awhile watching how beautiful this girl is.

I thought that the color was nice but with a dog that has bad breath and doesn't brush well this is not helpful. It also seems to have trouble getting stains out of our light beige carpets. This one just isn't working out. At all. We can't afford another vacuum at the moment so we keep it plugged in because it's good for car vacuums or other quick jobs. But as far as cleaning house - maybe that's too much demand on it.

This book was not worth my time. There are a few good quotes from the movie, but that's all it had so I wasted my money. It could and should have been summed up more simplily. Sorry - never buy this book. Read the movie instead!
Easy to use....Great product! Works great! No issues.. It heats up in about 30 mins..And works good. Love the retractable cord.

the material is not bad, but if you have long hair beware because this wig pulls your hair and it looks unprofessional. I really regret buying it. And also mine doesn't look like it's even from Kenzo, just a fake one. But for under $7 its worth it! So I'm giving one extra star. Just know that it's pretty bad. It's okay though cause it'll fix my short haircut.

I'm really glad I ordered this for my new puppy. He chewed up all his other toys. The squeaker doesn't last long but that is normal with pet toys because he loves to chew. This toy also looks durable. A good buy for the price. It does have a weird smell at first which should go away after airing it out in our garage (didn't really). Can't beat Amazon Prime free shipping on products like this.

My first laptop back in the 60's, I picked up a second on when they came out and was pleasantly suprised at how comfortable it was. But this one is really nice with lots of storage space. The only thing that would make this better are some wireless keyboards or mice to go along with it. Even without them though, it's an excellent device. It's still running strong after 7 years and has been through 2 batteries with no issues which seems incredible nowadays. It hasn't lost speed either.

I first saw these in a small specialty hardware store and bought them thinking they would be fun to have at home when we aren't using our kitchen table. Unfortunately, once I got them, I found that the chairs were much smaller than what I'd expected: my husband and myself each fit comfortably but my 2 year old didn't feel comfortable. The tables are nice because it has two sides (folding and full) - one is on opposite ends of the table (the same length as those side tables).

So I get the package in the mail and it has everything in it. And comes with 2 bags to replace all of his food so he can have a good diet for now. It also came earlier than expected which is good. But once i open up the packaging right away i notice that this bag looks pretty small. When you put two bags' worth ( if there was 3 or 4 ) they are almost at 1/2 full weight. Which sucks cause its kinda like eating the whole bag.
The product arrived in perfect condition and looks just like in picture with all wires included.
This book started out interesting, but then took too many turns into unbelievability right from the beginning. Just couldn't believe how stupid this guy was. Even in fiction, we can't be that dumb.

This is the worst album I have ever heard. The lyrics are all about how much money he has and that is pretty sad. Why would you want to buy a CD where half of the tracks on the whole cd's songs aren't even good at all? If this is hip hop then it sounds terrible. Rap music as everyone seems to think this is garbage also. How do people say he's so creative? That sound like an old man, that's why I hate rap music. His voice is boring too.

This is the first time in 30 years that I have been disappointed with anything produced by Amazon. They say it will fit an older model, but there are no holes pre drilled or pre-threaded on my old style Delta faucets, so this was not a good purchase. So while Amazon did refund me immediately - I am out $26.00 and still very unhappy.

I received "Flawless Beauty - The Ultimate Face Mask," for free, from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion of the product. I'm not going to lie, it didn't make anything worse. My face looked smoother and more radiant. However, nothing changed. It wasn't a night cream, but an extra serum that you put on top your moisturizer. I'll be investing money into products with better results next time!

In a nutshell, don't waste your money on this piece of junk. I've had it for two months and it's already gone bad. I can either hear static or interference (which makes for horrible music, which is the whole point!) It was really cheap. Not even worth trying to ship back so there's that. Save your money. Try another product.

The premise of this book has great potential for an interesting read. However as the story progresses it goes from good to worse, I had no idea what happened in some sections. My initial problem with this novel was that it appeared to have been written by two different authors. This is not unusual however when a first effort attempts at writing becomes self published. It would appear therefore that perhaps one editor or better made up author should write another installment based on where things need going and who needs help fixing it.

This is a great looking item. However, when it arrived, I found that there was no "lock" for the front latch. To keep your stuff safe, it's important to have some sort of lock like this, and these bags come nowhere close as far as security. As they say, you get what you pay for... In this case, I bought something other than what is advertised. Amazon really needs to improve their advertising regarding locks. I'm returning mine.
This thing really works well, especially for me.

My daughter loves this cover. It is beautiful colors and has such a soft feel. When she got her iPod Touch 4th gen for Christmas, this was the one we chose even though it cost more then other products. I would highly recommend it. We have gotten many compliments on how good the case looks. The only complaint that we can think of are two small problems. First of all, it does rub off really easily when you hold onto something (like your arm while you're walking).

I ordered this book as well As all the others of Ms. Quinn's that I've read. Well let me tell you, I'm soooooo disappointed. This is definitely not my style at all. The writing lacks emotion. I found myself skipping through every couple chapters just to get back to how much she didn't want it. A lot a times its very boring.
This is just the thing for our small kitchen. Easy to clean and works as expected with no problems. I may even by another one...
Works great in my 2013 Kia Soul. No need for a trip to the dealer. The connector matched up perfectly. Recommended.
I like his way of writing, and most important this book gave me a lot on how to use my imagination.

While I loved the book and it is definitely a must-read,(it's that good), my only problem with it was its size. It takes up one third of one's bookcase! However, I think this issue could have been avoided if someone had realized how much ink needed to be used. I also would LOVE for Amazon to offer print editions larger than 8x11. Maybe something like 8.5x11 or even 13x19...
My old Sunbeam that I had for several years finally wore out and it was a disappointment - this Hamilton Beach is the least effective one I've ever used to get wrinkles out.

This is the most frustrating item I have ever purchased from Amazon. The picture clearly shows a full back brace but does not indicate that it contains some kind of gel insert. If there was any kind of gel you would think this could be comfortable. In fact what feels like one of those things made for people with high level tennis elbow, feels far too hard for someone who has arthritis. It also had quite visible seams which are very uncomfortable.

I bought this case for my Canon Power shot S2IS, a very small digital camera. The description says it is the "smallest," but that was not true at all. This unit barely fits in that tiny case, so if you were to buy it for an S2IS you better have no bigger than a 5 or 6 year-old compact camera? If so, get something else. You can fit your camera & all its attachments inside but it's hard work getting them out of the case.

The product did not work when it arrived. I contacted the dealer directly and, after three attempts to return it, they refused to accept it. Don't even bother with this product. It is junk, pure and simple. Buy a better USB 2.0 drive from another seller - maybe Amazon? Or if you are into wasting your time, buy the item brand new, straight out of the box, before someone else does or something happens. There has got be something better than this, but we will never know.
I ordered the wrong size. My mistake, but it does not make a good product for me. If your neck and upper torso are larger as mine, don't buy.

I did a bunch of research on Amazon before selecting this camera. I've never heard of Sanyo before, but the reviews sold me -- lots and lots of them! So far, so good. The camera is beautiful looking, sleek, compact, takes nice pictures, seems to take good video, even when my older camcorder does not (don't ask how, but it always had trouble in dim light). I'm happy with it. HOWEVER, it was dead out of the box.

Not sure how to rate this as they gave it for xmas and he hasn't used them. They are heavy duty so I wouldn't want them cutting a tree limb just putting your foot on it, but the feel well made of good grade and will last if taken care of. Just might get him some bigger ones next year.

This is the first time I've had a problem with Amazon and their sellers. For instance, last week when my furnace was cold in the room behind mine, I tried putting on an extra heat blanket to be warmer but without success. Then I remembered that we have all winter air conditioning here.
Really cute. Fit well. My only problem is that the pattern does not match up on some of them ("F*** you!! You don't own me!")
This product is really neat looking out of the box. For all of 5 minutes as soon as you plug it in, then immediately loses power. The first unit that arrived worked great.

Great product, and a great price. What more can you ask for? They're all individually sealed in 5 different flavors, there was exactly what was pictured here. Shipping time from this seller exceeded my expectations.

This product is a rip off from China and was not what I expected. It did come sooner than expected but they send you what you pay for. The quality of the case was fine until i went to take my phone out of it for charging. I had noticed that its starting to detach from the top left corner now which kinda sucks since it's pretty much glued onto this case.

I had to have this pillow because it was the best thing in my life! When you lay on it, there is hardly any pressure while your head and neck are resting against it. The pillows seem to last forever too, as that one I've owned for almost a year now only has two threads coming undone. It's extremely comfortable all night long. Would not hesitate buying another one!

What more can I say this is a solid product, easy to take apart and clean, simple design. However after two weeks of use, only one side spins. It seems that there must something loose in the head unit. As long as you unscrew it from time to time, it doesn't slow down. The kids seem fine with it. Maybe next year we wont have them climb up on it so frequently. Would recommend. No issues at all. Just wish it went both directions.
For such an inspiring man with such talent, it's hard not know what he's going through. Great stories though, that just make you feel wonderful. Thank goodness for all who live by faith.

My cat was eating my dog's food and I couldn't figure out why it started being such a big mess..the dog is 13 pounds, but she has an extremely small mouth. Once I got this dish out, all of her waste is gone...no more licking that mess up! Also, in addition to keeping my kitty contained for almost 20 minutes while eating, which can be frustrating trying to get him fed before his next snack at 3 am.
Very good show.
Bought 2 for gifts. one has completely crumbled into dust.

I was excited to review Mr. Smith's "The Devil Is in Our Midst". I'm a sucker for stories about monsters and the forces that keep them from being destroyed. As soon as you open this book, there is an immediate urge to get your mind blown-away by the story.

I tried to get my money shipped back from Amazon, but there was no available option for it. It's cheap and flimsy junk. What really bothers me is, this is supposed to be an "amazon prime product- fulfilled by Amazon." How does that happen? Did somebody think of stealing some money. In order to protect your reputation as a reputable company in the digital age, you need to do better than this. This product came broken out of it's packaging.
It does just as I anticipated. I am happy with the quality and it works well for me. The delivery service was good too, arrived on a timely basis. Recommend this product to anyone looking at it.
At first glance, this story seemed like just what we needed.

While it says that this product comes in a box with an extra funnel, the one I received was actually just shipped loose inside of one. It didn't have any plastic baggie or anything over it, like if you would normally get when ordering.

This book was pretty predictable. There really wasn't any story or depth to it. Maybe because I saw the ending coming from a mile away. It could have been so much better had there not been such cliches. The best characters in this novel were a brother & cousin, no matter how they didn't seem very realistic. I'm hoping that I can find another free kindle book. If not, I'll just read all of "Fifty Shades." There's plenty of good vampire novels out there.

This is a very interesting book, as well as a good introduction to the issues with "New Class" Christianity. Too bad that it was made so poorly and at such low price. No color illustrations. Only black & white photos. A hardback version would have been great. I give this book only two stars because of it's cheapness. You can find more information on any Christian web site than you will in this book.

Got this for my 3 yr old daughter. It's a piece of junk. When using the suction mount, it always wants to unstick from itself. You have to get the toy out and pull them apart every time you are done playing with it. It is also very difficult to put together. I would NOT recommend getting this. Spend your money on something worthwhile. This was an overall disappointment. Do not waste yours.

I like it. It has not fallen off yet. It's easy to put the phone in, and remove it, especially for a guy in rough terrain who might have trouble with his hands. The screen is still easily readable, too. Good value.

When I started reading this book, to me, the idea of creating a new religion called "Christianity" seemed ridiculous and far-fetched, even though I'm not particularly religious myself. As an avid reader, though, I decided to finish the book anyway, despite its flaws. I thought there would be some sort of moral or lesson attached about it at the end, because it's supposed to be a Christian story, right? Wrong.

We are not happy with the look of it. Doesn't line up correctly on our wall. Also there is a seam running down one of the edges - very noticeable. I am going to see if we can spray paint it and hope that will solve my problem. Seems like they could've made this at half price. It's okay...I didn't spend a ton so no huge deal. The shipping was very fast. Thanks Amazon. Wish they'd do more furniture for us out here.

We bought the game in hopes of replacing our old one that had just quit working. When we opened up this new game, it looked identical to my other one... except for a couple things. First off, it's not made with as much quality of play on it. Secondly, and most importantly, is it supposed to be all white.

I purchased this camera to use for my wedding with a large number of people from the same family. The camera arrived in excellent condition. My wife and i set it right up at home before we left on our honeymoon. At first everything went well. We were very impressed. But after going to various sites taking photos, I find that many pictures have an ugly purple halo around them. Some say they are just out of focus, others show some spots all together.

I bought a pair of these at first and one has stopped working just after the return day. They sound great while they work but if you want headphones that will last you buy something else. Also tried to get in touch with customer service twice for this issue, only got an answering machine most times. Not worth trying since they were never able to send me another headset to make it right. I'm done returning them. Amazon took care of them quickly so I give them five stars.

I have been a HUGE fan of Anne Rice for over 25 years. Her novels draw me in to the story and allow me time away from my everyday world. The other thing you should know about me, is that I'm willing to buy anything written by this author, no matter how short. That's why I've bought ALL her books since she set herself up as being only able to write 2 novels. It was very interesting getting some insight into what goes on inside an Author's head.

I had very high hopes for this product. Unfortunately, it just wasn't quite what I hoped. My cat seems to have no problem with them - as it's not any easier or harder than a normal plastic litter box. But the waste from his pellets tends to be so hard that there are bits around everywhere, and when my other cats come over, they aren't fond of having their peeing tracked up in such an obvious fashion. It's even more noticeable because there's litter all over the house now.

I could not read this book. It just didn't work for me. My son wanted to read it with me he likes books that involve animals so that's what we did. He liked it. But I couldn't really get into it. If u want a book about talking animals and their stories then try the big fish by david lloyd.

The product is great! It fits the phone and protects it well. I am sure that my daughter will get many compliments on it. However, if you have this phone, be aware there are two screen protectors in every pack. Once they wear off (which takes a reasonable amount of time), they won't stay where they belong, so then it's totally useless: either you'll miss half your pictures or else they'll just pop up. It's not like they're worth having replaced anyway.

I love Jane Austen but her characters drove me crazy. She always wrote about "gentlewoman" heroines and of course she falls in love, so even though he's a prince, who did they not fall head over heels for? There was also more that one time when their relationship seemed to be heading for an issue but....there it was. Even the dialogue between them was way out there.

This is just a re-printed article from the New Yorker. Why you won't see it in your neighborhood magazine of the same name, and why it's getting even more attention now... well, I've no idea. Maybe because it's now about how much people enjoy eating human beings. I remember back when we had a weekly issue that did exactly this, except with dogs. It was really well done, informative and full of beautiful color photos.

This was to replace the original in a small office. The first one lasted 3 years and I'm happy about that. It is an old style so it takes some getting used to but works well even at 8 ft distance. Easy install just be warned that if your printer isn't compatible after you plug this item in, you'll have to buy new ink.

This one sucked big time. From it's title "Corporate Secrets...", i thought it would help me understand more about corporate communication strategies of my bosses as they relate to my own workplace. Well a quick glance at the content wasn't enough to know that not every single advice offered here contradicts another.

I bought it for my husband and he thought the sound quality was too low, just like his other one that he's been using since before apple came into the picture. Not a good product, even if it's cheap, but better than some of these in the market, which cost 2-3 times as much or more. It has low volume, too. The blue is kind of boring too. So it only works because you have to leave your iPhone nearby. Definitely can't do anything on it.

This was my first time learning to use a blender. It is heavy duty so you can really chop the ice that way if its too small. Also no leaking! The only issue I had when trying it out for the 1st time, once liquid leaked out, but all in all, I'm happy with it. Good purchase.   Rating: 4.0   Got this about 2 weeks ago. I've made smoothies and protein drinks through multiple times now and it's pretty good at making those.
It does what is says except one size too small for me so if you're going to order buy 2 sizes bigger
This stuff broke apart soon after opening it, no wonder because there wasn't enough air inside to pressurize. The gun didn't work.

This item was ordered for our new home based on the many positive reviews. We are so disappointed and we can't return it. The description clearly states this is a 3-drawer unit, just like another reviewer described. But, instead of using that to put all of her silverware in, it only has 1 drawer. In order to get 3 or more utensils in at once, she had to set them up with one drawer, but they were then very difficult to retrieve. So much time wasted.

After finishing the book, I realized that it was actually pretty decent, and had a lot of action in it. It's what one would expect from this type of book: lots to do while keeping up with some crazy characters, but lacking any real meat along the way. However, after reading my current review on amazon.com, now I'm reconsidering my review!Let me first explain that for me, at least, books in themselves are almost meaningless unless they leave an impression or spark something inside me.
No where in the description did I see that this device has an AC adaptor. It came with one. Unfortunately there would be no way to use it. Don't try to play while on electricity, or else good luck.

I found quite a number of other recipe books that would fit into my needs so I picked up one as well. The book takes its first 8 chapters just reviewing what we have been cooking for over 10 years, with some new recipes, especially about vegetarian dishes.

I had to purchase this because my daughter is obsessed with her new Kindle fire HD. This fits great and serves the purpose, but it doesn't completely close all the way - so I can see it's not 100% perfect, plus she's dropped it, now we have a scuff on it. But for the price you pay what do expect :) just be careful with it...

It did not work at all. And I cannot believe anyone even bothered to publish this. Save your money. If you have one in the home, don't send it back. You'll never be able for your money back on anything you've bought from this seller. Please stay away and save yourself some time. These people will rip you off!

I didn't receive a single new card but had 2 reprints from this set, one of which was great. My first time buying the set so I'm not sure what is going on but if your looking to buy cards off amazon. Always make note about that. The package also did look used. Not happy at all with my order. Will not be using here again. If it wasn't for that would have given 5 stars because other than that, product looks awesome and there are many new commons in there.
The picture for the black color is not the same as what we recieved and I would have been extremely dissappointed if I'd paid full price.

I have used the iPad3 and got to know how big it was, compared with a PC.I purchased this tablet in late August 2012. Within two month of use, i found that after several days was having major problems connecting wirelessly from my work area which is about 15 feet away. First couple days, all my other wifi devices seem much faster, but they are always disconnected. Then more times than not, you can't connect at all. Then you start noticing weird lines across your screen.

Good value for money. It arrived in reasonable time and was well packaged. I had previously purchased this item twice at a big box store, both times the top lid cracked after only 2 months. Was expecting more durability before buying again. So far, seems to be doing what it's supposed to. No complaints so far. Time will tell how long it stays sealed as well. For now we like it.

After using this product for 3 years, the first time I used it on my dog she had no flea problem. I also have not yet seen any fleas. I live in a rural area..so there are always fleas and ticks but as long you use Frontline at regular intervals during your dog's life, he or she will never get them. This is all we use, only need to do twice per year. Love it...love it, love it.

This door seems sturdy enough but time will tell. My old front panel opener recently broke so i decided that replacing with this unit wasn't worth my time/hassle just purchase a whole replacement unit.

This is a great product for my dog. Not only are the bowls large enough to fill with wet food in order to slow her eating down, but they hold up well and clean easily. Love this product! A bit more expensive, so I bought two bowls.
This was a gift for our son who is away at college. He loved them and used them. As advertised the price of these were good also.

I wanted to like this book. The cover looked cute as well and the reviews were good, so why not? I'm on page 30 of chapter one, after about 15 or so pages - I was hoping for character development by now/but it appears that Ms. Young is going through the motions without ever getting there. To give a concrete example I've never heard someone speak like this, not once, before today in my life. And there are plenty of passages where it's supposed to be funny...

Very hard to set up, and I have a good technical background ( in IT ), as my husband tells me all the time. Setup took longer than it should have. After 2 weeks, we didn't see any difference with our wireless, but since we had an extremely short time, and then thought about hooking up again, couldn't find the password, nor was there anything on the CD that would help.
Did not download for some reason. But other stuff from this vendor did download.

I recently purchased the Dell laptop that was described as being in a excellent condition with no scratches, dents, or other cosmetic flaws. The one problem when looking at it is that several small scratches are seen on top of the screen, underneath and around it. All together I probably spent close to 600 dollars for my new laptop, so it's very disappointing when I received this item.

I purchased two of these for my daughters to take to school. One broke in 5 months and the other is only 7 months. Not worth it. Very cheap, very poorly made. My kids aren't hard on them or anything, but they can't even withstand being stuffed into their bookbags. The outside shell cracked around one corner. These should be at least $10 dollars max.

This is a very nice looking knife with a good heavy feel. Although it costs more than the price of most chef's knives,I would gladly buy this one again as well as recommend it. It's perfect for slicing tomatoes and other vegetables.

A very cute and well made toy, the kids at our party love it. There are two sounds one from what you have with a lot of different sounds. The other is music plays but it doesn't start until after like 8 to 10 seconds which was great.

I bought this for my daughter, she opened it on Christmas Day, and the screen had a crack in it. She was so disappointed when we went to put batteries in, it doesn't work...Waste of money! It wasn't expensive...I guess you get what you pay for..lesson learned

We use this to help get the cat hair that clings on our furniture. It works great and is easy for everyone in my family to use. I like how you don't have a handle that attaches directly into the wand - makes it easier with my young daughter. My only complaint, which may be obvious from other reviews, but we couldn't figure out why the light was so dim. And one of us found the on/off button difficult to work while holding the wand.

It was really hard to read cause it is way more difficult than reading the book itself. I got to about chapter five and then gave up. Very disappointed!! Glad i only spent a few dollars on this book. If you decide to get it, don't do it. The other books in this series are much better!
I had to return the item because it would NOT play.
My son likes to paint pictures on our walls when he comes over, and for Christmas, we put up two posters in his room.
I bought this for my daughter. She loves it. So far it has held up well. No complaints! It is great. For the price cant be beter.
Okay, I'm sorry but this series is terrible.

Does NOT get rid of any dog odors. Have 2 dogs that go to the bathroom often on a daily basis. Product never even showed up as being shipped despite several tries. Worst order with Amazon!Will never try again if there is another chance to order. If not, lesson learned.

Ordered these lamps in March, received them very quickly. However, when installed and fully charged overnight, they did not work. We tried several other outlets around our home with no success. Had someone try switching outlets, different sockets, etc, without any luck.

This is a review of the audio version. I listened via audible so there was some sort of echo or background noise that kept me from really getting to know who was speaking, but other then that, it was pretty good. The book has made an interesting premise into something more interesting. Some of the characters were well done others not very well. The concept behind this novel is that if it looks like a frog and swims up through the earth one day, you die just as quickly.

I am so very disappointed. Not only is this book NOT spiral bound, it came in a regular "accordion" binding. My daughter loved the books, and was completely excited that we could read one on her own. Unfortunately, we had to open them back up again when she opened the present just to find out there isn't any binding at all. Bummer. :-( It's such an expensive pair of scissors if she's not going to be able use both or all of them.

This "book". was only about the same as reading a magazine article about these two very interesting ladies who spent many years exploring and photographing this part of Alaska. It would be nice too to get more than what you pay for, however. There were photos but not much information on how they did their work. What is especially frustrating is that I had already known before buying this. I'm always keen for information but, as with all things, one must weigh one's decision against other options.

This game is garbage. If I could choose none of the three games, I definitely would pick it. The missions are hard and long, unless you go online, which takes forever to finish even with the fastest connection. You have basically a lot less options than Star Wars Battlefront. I'm not sure why they didn't make this one longer. I also got my first issue where there was an extremely long load time between each mission, then it wouldn't let me play for as long as I'd like.

First off I love this thing. It seems incredibly expensive to me, but the price on Amazon was almost $30 less than I paid for it at Petco. It's very well designed, sturdy, and so much better looking in person too. Our dog is a 50 lb boxer, who recently turned 11 yrs old. We thought she'd take right to it, but we were surprised and pleased. This thing took about 3 months of constant use before she got used to it.

Nice product at a great price... wish they last longer...the metal piece on each side of the glass break if dropped.....which I did... but still ok other than this;)   Rating: 4.0   So far so good, they stick very well. Wish they have better instructions with them.

I am still reading, but not as eagerly as my first few books by this author. I really liked many plot points. Also, much more sex in this one than others. Still, great story line. Looking forward to finishing it when finished.

I read the whole thing because it did not have an ending. It just stopped. The two main characters ended their affair. I'm ok with them ending it, but what about in 5 years? There was no epilogue. Very disappointed that we didn't even get to see if they reconnected. Other than that....

The book is OK because it has a short section of the story but not even half way through I read it. It's only about five pages. When should you charge $1.99 for one paragraph? You really should put out longer chapters. It reads more like an email on your website. I've had this book just over two weeks. And there are still no updates. So unless you are willing to wait for them, don't buy this. Go with their free book.

I ordered this to run for a small town marathon, it came in the post quickly and looked good, but as soon as i opened it, 2 of its legs were broken. It really isn't worth taking back...so instead i just cut them off myself. So annoyed!!!!

I was told to get this book. The book has several interesting stories. Some of it is well written. Just not what you want some days when you're trying to sleep. It doesn't put me to sleep with it's constant excitement. I had the book read one time.

I ordered this for a friends Christmas gift and didn't receive it in time. I'm disappointed about that. It was supposed to be just before Christmas. If i could have bought the same item at Costco so that everyone would know what time I expected it. This company is also making excuses as far as when their products will arrive. They promised by 11/21 and it's 12/14. Will not order from them again. I wish they did ship right away.

Nice case. It does not fit my kindle with the keyboard but I have a couple of cases made for that so it's ok. The case is just too big to put in some other things like cords. But it came very early and was packaged well. Thanks - I am satisfied.

My kids like the look of these. They were easy to install. I wish they had more than three straps though. We only have two kids. I can barely use all three. But if you need one for multiple doors with a larger opening then these are good. For this price, I'm very satisfied. I've priced others and they're almost as much. And some people complained about that. They're made in China...duh lol! Not really sure what else they'd say about it.

The book is an easy read. Although I don't agree with the author on many issues, there are enough helpful tips or useful resources to fill another book. However, if one really read this book, I'd like to see some examples where he could take things that I've used in my business and try them. If you look at his other books they have been better than this. This does bring up a new issue though. One of those things, be willing to experiment using others ideas based off what works for you.

This is an extremely useful resource for the serious collector. It has some very good basic information regarding how to handle and display all aspects of a collector's collection. I particularly liked the sections on preserving materials, finding new collectors, building your collection, creating library items, selecting objects with appropriate historical significance, etc. However, as noted in another review, there is far too much emphasis placed upon collecting as opposed to buying books. The other side effect is that this will have limited use by collectors who are not into acquiring books or objects.

I love this thing! My puppy loves going through it. It seems sturdy and has enough room for his toys or snacks etc. Really like it. He is 4 months old now - hope to use it at least as well when he gets a little bigger. He would have definitely outgrown those crates that hold up to 50 lbs - because there isn't much growing room. Also not great for smaller pups. If they are small get the larger version.

For those who have used this brand in the past and are looking for a new replacement, they are good quality at an excellent price. They fit my Samsung Galaxy SIII perfectly. Also, their customer service is EXCEPTIONAL. I received several messages from them following purchase, inquiring about what kind of screen protector I had ordered. When I didn't reply, they sent me a follow-up email. The email included tips on how to install. It was like these guys really care. Highly recommended.

This is easy to read and great information for the beginning grower. I love reading with a magnifying glass so can do it on my Kindle Fire. It could use links etc but at best has 3 pages. Very interesting book which shows seeds in detail. Well worth reading.

After all the rave reviews and raves I was highly disappointed in this book. One of my main criticisms is that it simply does not come close to capturing the magic created by Stephen King. As other reviewers have said, King can evoke images that are so clear you forget what place you're in. This book fails miserably.
Not a very durable or quality product. I've only used this 2 times and it's already failing. I'm really sad as i was enjoying using it.
A sad look at a poor man's version of Michael Moore's "Fahrenheit 911" that leaves out some very crucial historical fact.

It was not what I expected. They are very small. Very cheaply made. Not worth the $ or postage you might spend for delivery. It would be good to see this item at a store before ordering if money is an object. If it's a gift, it will sit in one end until opened. There were no measurements given. In spite of these drawbacks, my granddaughter likes them. All items listed on site had size indicated. However, they did not all meet that description. Just wish there were!!. She doesn't complain.

This is a great phone for the price. I have gotten over 7 years out of 2 phones (different brand) by this one. Not as nice looking in person but works well and has good range. I've had it longer than my first one was new. It will probably last another couple years, I'm told. I can always buy more if needed. My only negative comment would be that some buttons are not readily identified or easily pressed.

I purchased this DVD because of the good reviews and am very disappointed. The first segment (the one on Yoga for Men) focuses too much on Pilates exercises that if taught properly would be beneficial. After a while you can start to get bored, so then they teach some yoga moves as well as the stretching exercises. However, they're not explained well. The worst part is there are no explanations about why you're doing these stretches.
It didn't fit my printer, even though they said it would. Do NOT buy this, it does not work. What an utter waste of money!
i did not enjoy this book at all. it was pretty boring. the only part of my interest in reading and finishing is finishing what we started. unfortunately, it didn't come together for me.

This is not a review. It needs to be because the only reason I purchased this disc was out of frustration with my own music playing in my car. And it seems others have suffered from similar frustration. The CD is just like all other MP3 sound quality. Nothing too bad at loud volume, but if you want something that doesn't get annoying every half hour, then don't buy it. The CD has way less volume than I would like. A lot less noticeable on first listen, then almost imperceptible after it.

I am a fan of Dan Brown and his books, but "Angels & Demons" just didn't make it. There were many loose threads to be wrapped up as well which ended up left dangling. Why did Angels have the gift of telekinesis? Who was Mallozzi? What does he really know? Etc. etc. The big mystery at the end is never solved either, except for in Brown's own head (which got so tedious after a while).
I wish it had a more powerful motor, but it's does the job. The only thing that would keep me from buying this again is if something happened to it.

That should still be common sense. Also, having enough money is crucial when dealing with the IRS. The book does have some helpful hints for those who aren't willing to invest much time or effort into planning ahead for getting paid.

All in all, it does exactly what we'd hoped, and has been very convenient so far. i have a set like this one and it is made of glass not plastic they should make the description correct when you order something on here to avoid having me going through the return for refund process that happens every time I buy from your company with no returns available in that situation.if anyone knows where else there could be an option for glass ones please let all people know before buying anything so we prevent another person from needing return shipment costs again and also save others shipping money.

Also, one of the pieces came missing - part of a hinge. I was able to use hot glue to fix it, but at this point only 4 sides latch securely. I bought a new pair of these headphones last night at Best Buy for $49.99 brand new. After listening to them they were very tinny, with no bass. It sounded like the subwoofer had been turned off. There was also noise cancellation (didn't work) on all settings; it wasn't even adjustable. I'm not happy that my money spent here has been scammed out of me. I'd expect more from Sennheiser given their reputation in ear headphones.

The instructions were on point. One side of the bracket has a couple of slots for putting in an inch or two more wood screw to lock it into place. You get what you pay for. It works and at $2.10 per hole I can't complain. But it's only good as temporary replacement or just decoration since I'm not sure if other people have tried attaching these shelves yet either. As soon as they find a solid stud they'll probably buy another shelf...maybe then I'll stop complaining.
I am very glad to have this product. It was a necessity at my house because of many allergies. Love the ease and convenience.

Just enough bounce without making her head look like it's going out of joint. It's very well constructed (thick rubber) so you don't have worry about ripping them easily.

My daughter received this for her 3rd birthday and it was one of the absolute worst christmas gifts. The sounds just didn't come together. This movie is a classic for good old American values. The acting was excellent as well as very moving scenes. Well done. Kudos!!!

After my daughter lost her original charger for an Acer Aspire One and found this one that was exactly the same. Works just fine. No issues charging or anything. Great value also. While the packaging is impressive, and in comparison to other brands like this, it does not seem reliable. The battery failed after about a dozen uses. I just tossed it. For me, there are many others that will be of far better quality. I've had two Garmin GPS devices and never an issue with their batteries. Don't buy this cheap garbage from China, not worth 10 cents. You will be disappointed. I am going to try and return it. My guess is the manufacturer has had a run of bad units. This is one of the weakest movies in this set. It was interesting at first, but after a point it just got boring. I recommend looking elsewhere for your WWII movies. At least most are available on DVD.

this book is not going to provide much help in the areas that are being taught. Also, it uses very old equipment. I suggest you save your money.
