not very happy the cover I received is different than what was pictured. it doesn't have a magnet clasp on it. If this were sold separately I'd love it...but it's not. Very disappointed. Also had problems with another cover.

It's hard to find a novel of this type and I was very disappointed. The prose is too good when compared against other authors who deal so much more with what it means to love someone. What does she love? He loves her. Can the truth ever be revealed? That depends on someone else. Who do we need to believe? This reader lost track of most of them.

It takes a lot of strength to take my vitamins with all the pills and liquid. I just bought this at CVS in their vitamin section. It's more than twice the cost. The taste is pretty bad. I enjoyed the book. However, it was obvious that all of a sudden he wrote his last 3 years. He is not giving credit where its due. So I really wanted to give this book 5 stars for what it was. At first, this was a good product. I had to return it twice in 18 months, because the hard drive would not mount up. The last time they sent me a new case, and made sure my unit worked. It has gotten so bad I'm having serious thoughts of never buying any Seagate products again. They don't seem too concerned about quality anymore.

For the price, you can't beat this case. It is slim profile, lightweight. I wish they made one for my wife's mini. Great value and quality at a decent price. Highly recommended. Will buy another in black or green from this company. No worries here.
As the title of this review says, it is not as funny as I thought it would be, but good quality movie.

I have to agree with the majority of those who reviewed this book. It's a pretty bad book; if you are interested in reading about an extremely dysfunctional relationship between a mother and son read The Glass Castle. The storyline is just plain depressing, not romantic or sweet AT ALL. There's constant name-calling ("dirty old whore", "sick bitch", etc) and then we get some sort of happy ending which goes nowhere. This book really isn't well written at all.

A good book of this kind always has a few moments when you may wonder "what is the point?" This book certainly had those moments, but that's really to be expected. All in all, some interesting thoughts, as well as some very real examples presented with compelling prose. The downside for me was that it often didn't seem like Mr. Gladwell's point at all. Most often, what he wanted us to think about was either not a problem or just wasn't worth worrying about.
The book has lots of helpful tips.
Not sure why some reviewers were disappointed with this product.

I purchased this because of the price. It is okay, but not what I'm used to receiving for a premium price point. They don't cover the entire bottom half of my mattress, so it's annoying on one end. Very well written short story about two people trying not make each other fall for them. When you read it, you'll find out why.

This product fit my new oversized pillow perfectly. A wonderful invention makes it much easier when moving around in bed. It has protected the pillow well for me already. The material feels soft even after washing. However, I have not washed this item so cannot attest by hand as mentioned above.
It's a cheap book and it is nice for my kids to look through. It helps out with learning the states as well so that you can learn about them from reading it. The price was not too expensive either.

We purchased this battery for our daughters Asus Eee PC 1000HE. She is very happy with it so we're glad that we chose this vendor. You can't beat the price! Only issue encountered was shipping charge of almost $9 per battery.

THIS HAS NO BASS. the speakers produce too much treble. not worth it. would you buy these if they were free? i sure wouldnt as ihave no use for them. this is just junk of crap. waste and money. in my book JUNK.
Good movie if you're into depressing endings. The plot is weak. Very disappointing. Would recommend that u don't waste ur money.

This is my first fountain pen, and I am very pleased. It has a nice heft. The converter fits nicely. If you are going to write more than one page at once for school or other activities, make sure the pocket clip sits flush with your shirt. You may want to replace it if it's too thick. As many reviewers have said, writing upside down takes some getting use to. But after that, no problems. Definitely worth spending 15 dollars on this pen over an average Bic.
I've always loved reading all these stories in order and this anthology does that well.

Not one of his best. The plot is weak, he spends too much time on description for an action hero. I could not hold interest in this. Sorry. I'm used to the Camel Club series. This was a big disappointment. He will stick with those series and leave this genre alone. Sorry...

I bought this to replace the OEM filter in my Acura RSX's cabin. The factory one was worn out, but it came with a good set of filters. When i first replaced it, after about 3,000 miles, everything seemed OK. But now, at 6,000, it's making all kinds of noise... And not just idling noise, when there isn't anything on it. Turns out that there's a bad gas cap in the system. If you're interested in saving a few bucks, buy this. Otherwise, save your money. 
 Rating: 1.

So this is a good size and fit my dogs quite well, she didn't mind wearing it very much at all. The material seemed to be of high quality though, I loved that. After just two days the zipper pull came off. Now we have only one button for her harness now so she'll never zip up even if there's no pull. It was an obvious design flaw that shouldn't happen with the amount of money they charge to make these things.

I've found this a very easy to use product; however, the instructions are rather skimpy. The only way I could figure out how it is supposed to work was on their web site, which has excellent diagrams. However, my experience did not go exactly as they told me, so here is one example where it did NOT work:Once installed, your phone will indicate that there is some sort of "problem" with the battery. That's what makes you think it's charged at first.

They are not as firm on the sole but I think they would be okay for short distances or around an office desk. The leather is very nice and the insole appears well made. Not great in warm weather. Also, after walking all day my back was sore so perhaps this is good shoe if you have a weak back. My wife has had many pairs of Keen shoes throughout her life and seems pleased with them. This style just fell short.
Ok, I'll be honest. If I wanted a history book I'd go out and grab one.
Like some others...
THIS WAS REALLY DISAPPOINTING. I HATED THE PLOT AND JUST DID NOT CARE FOR IT. I'M GLAD I DIDN'T PAY TO SEE IT IN A THEATER!

I am a huge fan of Dr. Seuss who writes children's books. There has never been any book by this author that was not wonderful. This title for the first time, disappoints. It is definitely written more at an elementary level than one would expect from Dr. Seuss. My children did find it humorous. After using the reader in class as instructed with our second grade students to demonstrate how the text read, they only made a few minor eye contacts. The illustrations could have been better.

Did not like this one at all. Poor writing, bad choice of subjects but that doesn't make it a good story. I got half way and had to go on. Waste of time. A book from a more accomplished person might do much better. I'm giving it two stars because I've started reading it, maybe I'll be able to finish it.

As my husband loved this item so much, he is thinking about getting another one in a different color. This has been used daily for quite some time and it still holds its shape well. It isn't the most comfortable pillow case, but we were able to get use out of it. I recommend it, if you are willing to live with that for awhile. If not, you might give into your urge to have something new. :-)
I use two of these in my Synology DS1012+ NAS. One is used as the primary boot drive and works as expected.
My experience with product is same as others.

I bought the new version of this cd and was pleased to see that it had some tracks by artists from my favorite music group, The Beatles. However, when i got it, it would not play at all. It makes me wonder if the people who made it even bother trying out CD players before selling them. I've only ever gotten faulty items but i'm amazed it happened twice! For those folks looking for a Beatles cd, be very careful about buying this one.
It did not work with the laptop that i ordered it for. It broke down after only about 4 weeks.

This case looks exactly like it does in the picture. That is a good thing. It feels very light and cheap. The plastic screen has almost no resistance when you swipe. I would probably not use this on daily basis because of all this problems. Also, you have to take out your phone from cover every time, just for charging. No good. Definitely returned it. Hope mine was an exception!

My 3 yr old daughter LOVES this toy. So i gave it to her for xmas, and about 7 hrs after christmas we had no problem with it. After playing witht he train she was ready to take right away outter the bath tub. Well at 8am today (12pm) when we went in from leaving early I noticed water all over the bathtub!! And so what i did? Yup.

A great book about a fabulous story. And now you wonder why I give it only one star? Because if the story was told here instead of being written like this book, you'd get an entirely different story. If you've decided to write your own story, then please, go ahead, but stop with the literary devices. That's the thing in my opinion. It is not a bad idea for most writers now, when they do their first draft, just to try things. But that doesn't mean to ignore these things in writing.
This is only for students starting out with college who need examples that would help them get started. It will definitely make you realize what your professor has glossed over/missed or failed to.

The book is ok. Not the greatest writing but good general information. All in all a decent read. But what bothers me most about it (at least I think it's him) is he doesn't do any research to discover anything new. He simply states the facts and tries to spin them into an opinion. You are not really told of who or how many times some event was done this way or others were doing these things that way.

it works great, the remote is easy to find and push when you go from one device to another and back again. if my husband had not been so strong in his hands i probably would have lost it. this remote worked so well that i bought another. I just wish they made remotes with some sort of memory so the batteries could be stored for a long time. we used rechargable batteries, but they did wear out quickly, even thought we do use them all day long.

These are fairly average earrings. I bought mine for myself to wear at my wedding. It is a small necklace so they fit with no problems but if you have an even larger neck I would not recommend them. They do tarnish and therefore can be seen more than normal silver jewelry. But they looked nice in the picture.
I don't know why it would cost $7.00 to charge $2.99 for this item.....If you want my money I'd be glad to....
It was a good story that kept me flipping pages. The ending did surprise me. I would definitely recommend this book. Very enjoyable.

I ordered these bulbs and they put the wrong bulb in, now i have to return them. This is very unsanitary & a horrible experience. Do not place orders from this company if u dont want your package tampered with.

The book is short but interesting and I did read most of the book. It contains stories about various medical conditions and their possible causes that seem to point back at some physical conditions. All in all it's a pretty fun read. I'll probably use it as an occasional gift giving option for friends who might not be familar with this type of stuff. Just don't buy any more copies if you have cancer or anything else that's related to it.

We bought two of these and they work well. If they're turned upside down, they'll leak a bit but nothing terrible. They really hold up well to being put in the dishwasher on top rack as others have reported. The only reason we don't give it 5 stars is because they are made from plastic. I would expect steel to last just about forever. But the price was very reasonable compared with what other companies charge for plastic bottles. No complaints here!

I read everything this author has ever written, and it's all gone downhill since the beginning of her work at Harlequin. First it was Twilight, a bit dated today, but very enjoyable then. Now this. It feels like she's just not cutting it. It's obvious that Patterson put his name on it, thinking readers might be interested in what he had to say about women in fiction. But there's simply no new or deep insight. He seems obsessed with female writers - which is totally fine, for him, I'd think.
The best tool ever made. All my problems are now taken care of.
After waiting over three weeks, finally received 2 days ago. Neither side works, which means unless you use your fingers to remove back cover it's useless. Do NOT waste time or money as i did.

I use it primarily as a portable audio unit for my MP3 player and my cell phone.... very good speaker system sound great on both levels' usage...I'm happy with this.. the only reason I didn't given an 5 star is because of the volume control, which might be difficult to hold in your hand under heavy use... but still worth it! Thanks

I actually got a good laugh out of this book. I'm usually not into ghost & vampires stuff, but I enjoyed this! It really is creepy and makes you wanna have a drink & chill! Good summer time read!Can't wait to read more from this author! Very good!! Read it!

The only good thing about this book is the price. This collection of essays was published in 2005. Most likely we are already looking at a new edition that has been edited by Mr. Aldrete. After reading these essays, I can imagine why our President went to war,he can't bring himself not to. These articles were written while George W. Bush ran for president.

I had high hopes for this book but it's pretty much useless. There is a lot of talk and very little action. So if you are looking to learn advanced martial arts go elsewhere. It makes no sense what so ever as far as the storyline goes and that's even saying something. You have all these various characters who each come into contact with someone in their life that has died yet they don't really seem to care about them.

A little bit bigger than my phone not snug fit on the phone, just falls off in you hand. It did come from Hong Kong but that doesn't bother me. The company could have done better by including what is pictured, a clear protector film so your phone's screen would be free of finger prints.

This game is not what it claims to be. It is very difficult and also frustrating. I found that you constantly need the "help" manual when trying to play. Save your money. Its not worth even giving away in a garage sale. Try something likeRock Band - Bundleinstead. That one will give you hours of fun that will actually get you ready for work each day. Now that's entertainment!

My dog was trained with the gentle leader and now she feels very confident using her new harness, I would definetly recommend this harness to everyone who wants a secure leash for their dogs especially if they go on long walks in any weather or terrain. We even take our girl hiking! Love it! So much so, we just ordered another one from Amazon so my husband and I won't have to search out at store after store. Thank you!!!!

I loved his "The Secret Life of Bees" and wanted to continue on with the series. This is one book you will NOT want your child reading until they are older. After about a third through it, my 13 year old couldn't take it anymore either. My son has many friends that enjoy these books and said nothing could have stopped them from continuing forward till we saw all 4 books.

Nice little set for what we need. My husband and I use it a lot to watch movies on our flat screen with earphones. It's small but powerful. Only thing is, the headphone wire is just too short; not able to put back in after use. Overall it's nice enough that I'm ordering another set.

This is a basic unit that provides adequate capacity without any frills, and at very reasonable price. The only negative comment I have would be the lack of user replaceable battery. It can stay connected in an open situation, but not if you put it on a shelf for a few weeks, like mine did. It should either go with batteries, or make sure to mention this limitation from a beginning.

I had some issues with a set previously but these were easily exchanged/replaced. My only complaint is no other reviews for this. The sound in general was noticeably better on these. It might just be personal preference though.
Doesn't have N capabilities as claimed. Tried contacting the supplier for clarification of what it actually does and was told they haven't yet released such a firmware.
I've used several FM tuners in various vehicles over the years but they've never really worked well at all. And all except one brand died within months.

I'm amazed that such poor books are published from the university of Washington. The material presented reads as though it has been produced by some student project -- one that's obviously not up to academic standards. But worse, it's printed on poor quality paper, so it looks cheap.

This book was a bit disappointing in that the characters did not show true feelings towards one another. That just didn't ring true. The two leads went from bad to worse and I finally tired of reading about how much hot sex they had. It only makes you hope for something else - like real love.
If you're looking at just how cheap these were (and why anyone would do that, right?) then don't even hesitate. At $2.

While I like all the recipes and they are healthy (no fat!), my only criticism is that most ingredients have to be purchased at a very expensive grocery store. I've been trying many of these things out on our family since we received this book in August for Christmas. So far, two people really enjoy it, but I was hoping I'd find more inspiration after seeing so much effort put into it. It's not bad.
I bought this for my mom.... she loved it! And the price was pretty good as well! Its a nice case. She loves how it looks in black. It took her 5 min to put it on and take it off if needed.

This item was purchased for my mom and it does not do anything at all. It is so small that there is no chance of seeing anything. Not worth the money spent. I guess if you want a tiny camera to use with your phone, this would be fine but don't waste your money. My old samsung phone has better video camera resolution. DO NOT recommend this.

Very large and heavy in my purse when it's full of small items. It needs to be a little thicker. I like the color. It's OK. You get what you pay for... Don't put much stuff into it, it takes a good amount to fill it. Overall, I'm happy with mine. But for an expensive purse, mine doesn't last that long. And don't think that you'll be able just to shove some loose items under one side or else things will fall out before you're ready to use it..

For the price, what can you expect. In fact, I expected more due to all of the positive reviews. The plastic parts seem cheap. However, for my use (my child rides on it and drops stuffed plush animals in it), its fine. And like other reviewers have already noted, it's not at all high enough off ground (maybe two feet). It barely goes over a door threshold, so you'd better be sure your baby is safe if they put that toy away somewhere.
My husband was in the Navy and needed a pillow that would keep cool all night. His last one cracked so we bought this one. It does everything his old one did. He loves it. Thanks :)

Although it had a cute premise, this film just couldn't make up its mind, in terms of, what, or who. There's no real character development with any of these characters; there's so little there to begin with, that you start rooting for them. By midway through....well, by then you've seen every line of dialogue.
This book only talks about the very basic facts of photography. The rest is really just common sense. I should have read all of those reviews. Oh well. Maybe next time. I'm a certified Photographer.

I have been a fan of this product since seeing the infomercial. I've tried many other protein bars and these are my favorite. The taste is so much better than most. There are no after tastes in these, very refreshing. Great price for something organic that has great nutritional value. You only find it online! Give them a try! You'll be glad you did! :)

This cookbook is okay. Some of the recipes are really good, like the fried eggs, but a few seem to be rather weird. Nothing I would make again and none that even my husband or two kids might eat. My daughter doesn't eat seafood, so I'll probably try one of those recipes, maybe some of her own homemade meals. I've been cooking since before she was born, so many years ago it's nice to find cookbooks with good beginner recipes.

I picked this up as a freebie along with the book "The Book of Mormon: A New Translation", and you got me to click on three of these because they weren't yet available for sale. To my disappointment, none are actually in English, rather than French. All five have very similar words like 'like' or'my favorite' but many more words that look entirely different. How do translations like this get published?

If I had seen this novel in a bookstore, I'd probably have passed on it. The plot is thin, the characters are two-dimensional and the book was published almost 20 yrs ago. I've read several good detective stories since I first came up with Sherlock Holmes, but if you think it's time well spent, grab this one while it's still free. You don't want to miss out on that.
It arrived on time in its retail packaging. Great price, easy transaction.

The product seems like there is some variation that can cause it to not charge well with most power cords. However, this happens occasionally on all the batteries I have so far and works better than ones where you need another type of charging cord. I've charged the battery several times in my laptop now. Just make sure your charger says for iphone 4.

I really did not like this novel. The description had the potential to be good. However, it just doesn't deliver. Not sure what happened here. It starts out slow, and a little boring, but then takes off with some good action. Then you get to have fun in exotic locations (I hope....). But the ending is sooo predicatble, its almost insulting that no one else got it. Very unsatisfying! This author seems to be trying for something big on her next book.

We love this little gadget. I can't believe it took us so long to purchase one. This thing is just amazing. The sound could be better but the fidelity of what you get in the earbuds itself makes up for it. Also, even though we don't use it that often, we've had none of the issues with battery life or charging the device as others have mentioned. We've taken our mini speaker on walks & picnics. I've downloaded radio stations and podcasts from multiple websites.

Got this for a gift and it hasn't fallen off even after 2 months. It's kind of funny having the big suction cup dangling from your car. It almost makes you wanna pull over into traffic. Either way it's good quality. I have used lots other ones that lasted much longer. So far so good. Happy customer.

The price was right on this product. However, I found out that the one that has more wattage is better. This one, however, does work well in terms of heating. So there is not much to complain about - although a smaller unit would be preferrable for an under-cabinet location. But it heats just fine, and if my other under the shelf warming device dies within the year, or sooner, I'll definitely buy another of these! I've never had any issues with it, unlike some others have said.
Good for the price, you get what you pay for. This was a decent replacement in a very inexpensive case.

I was very excited about these but then upon putting them together, my excitement quickly faded (and even melted to some degree). Most of the wood came cracked in several places. It really does look nice once built, which might be why it's so easy. There are a few gaps here and there that aren't noticeable unless youre looking for it, like I was, or because im over compensating with all those little tiny pieces.
My cat loves these. The problem with them is that they are extremely hard plastic, making no amount of crunching sound like kitty toys should make.
This product does NOT work as advertised! Just bought one at Walmart for $9.80 on clearance.

I bought the first album after hearing a piece on NPR, and it quickly became my favorite. Now, this one is second to none. Her lyrics, her ability to sound more soulful as opposed to just plain, old country music. These songs are much better than any Nashville pop or manufactured artists putting out now. She had a rough childhood. A lot of people should hear some REAL country. That's what she does best. She's amazing. Buy it. You'll thank me.

I bought the book to try to have my dog use the potty. Although it has worked alright.. he still had accidents a few times and now it's two days. So not an exciting book... but I'm using it. P.S. This is coming from about five feet away with all of his potty books in front on him so that everyone else can see.... when they see him/her...It's ok for what you pay though (< $0.
This would cost $20 in Petco or Petsmart stores.
This will work for light to medium weight items. If you need something more sturdy, however, I suggest looking elsewhere. I'm a happy customer!

I've tried a few different flavors of Crystal Light water in various sizes and this is by far my favorite flavor. It tastes like water with carbonation added to it but without any weird or unpleasant aftertaste. Also, because the beverage is packaged in a bottle, you can take some on an airplane or leave them at your desk (without worrying about leakage).

First let me say I am a huge fan of the whole genre and think that this is probably one of my favorite books until now. There are so many things wrong with how Anita Blake became who she is. The first one being her inability to recognize where her own true power was. The second issue not to mention just about everything else in this final book but I'll get into that.

Very unhappy with this product. Product is described as new when I received it the screen cleaner was missing!! The battery would not charge at all and i had another brand on hand that was charged in minutes. Sent back to seller, got my money back. Not sure if it happened during shipping because I only purchased one but will consider buying from amazon directly next time unless this problem can be rectified promptly. If anyone has any information please let me know. Thank you...

Don't waste your money on this. I purchased and returned it within 3 days. It was bulky and didn't really work well. You couldn't find a good angle for the phone so the audio kept cutting out. My son tried it. He is using his iPad without earbuds. We will buy some quality wireless headphones, he said. I'm not buying another one. This one isn't worth wasting my time. The headphones cost about $30. So even if you don't need to be out running, these won't work. Do what I did.

I was not pleased with the product as the cover did not fit properly and when we contacted them they wanted to charge me $90 which is ridiculous. Never will order from you again. As a matter of fact after this experience i plan on writing reviews all over the internet. Shame
So far this one is the worst product that I've purchased from Amazon. It's too big and comes from China! They should put more detailed description on it! Just don't buy!!

This book is a series of short but very good articles. The subject itself could be explored for much longer. I was hoping to find more about his spiritual life and this is really too short. Also it's hard reading. It needs some organization or editing. Most people can't read like they can write.

I don't know why people were so excited about this book, since I've read them all...well, except for all the other books that had nothing to do with cats. This book was very boring. The only reason you would ever give it more than one star is because of your loyalty towards the characters. It took me two days (yes, 2 days) just to skim through a couple chapters. No offense Angela...but this story did not hold my interest. Thank god Amazon has return policies.

Really well made little gadget that has a few quirks, the USB is pretty wide which means your keys can't lie flat together. The cord itself seems thin but it works well. You can use multiple mice at once. It uses an AAA battery. My only complaint is its very hard to press the left mouse button (the first button, not like when you have 2 devices with 1 mouse)... I try holding down and trying several times before realizing one more push will do it.

I got this to plug into my wife's car's auxiliary outlet. She keeps her music player inside a small travel pouch at the rear of passenger seat for easy access if needed and it looks like when she plugs in her iPod nano this is exactly what she'll need. Now we can all play songs from our phone on long trips. Works just fine with no problems. No complaints. Very good quality item.

I bought the book because it was not one of my favorites, but for this price, who cares?! At some point there has to be an update due to new studies about the effects in kids as a result from using it. We are still on our first tablet and have been giving them tablets since they were 3 months old, with no adverse side effects. They do get slightly sick sometimes if we don't give enough or take it often enough.

I've been using the Tascam DR-05 for a couple of years and have not had any problems with it. I use it primarily as an audio interface but also occasionally switch to track recording. Once you find your recording settings on each device, this device provides excellent results. My only issue is that its external knobs are fragile. If they're handled roughly, they can easily get loose. The first one in about 3 years!Otherwise it's highly recommended.
My daughter was very happy when she opened her gift. It is warm with good pockets. Would recommend this product. A nice gift.
They would be great if the holes weren't so small. The smallest that is supposed to fit in the bottom has a ring on it about 2/3 inch from top of hole all around where water does not collect..

I received this as a gift at my baby shower and use it everyday. It is wonderful because the basket easily folds down into something really not too big for one person to carry, unlike some of those umbrella type. It works well when I'm out running errands.
The Contigo Travel Mug-18 Ounce does its job.

I got this and thought it was a waste of time because the book did not go very indepth on anything like what really has to be done in order for your dog get better. And why do you need so many words required - really? Just writing an essay or some crap that doesn't mean anything. A lot of useless information about diet and exercise. You will learn nothing.

So the price of this router is good, however, if you want to replace your old one - do as I did. Get a Netgear N300, you'll save yourself some time and money! It's been 7 months, i still can't get this router working right. It freezes every few hours or so, reboots and takes over 30 minutes before it works again.
Good product...

After using only 3 months, the right speaker stopped working. At first it sounded fine, then within a few minutes, no sound at all. Very disappointing and not worth what I paid for it. Would not recommend if you are looking to buy.

The unit itself is great - works wonderfully as long as it works. And since the battery life has also declined significantly, one must wonder whether this will continue. One thing at a time. I have not contacted Coby to see if they offer an alternative. At some point, even their own products need more than 20 cents worth of work in order for them to sell them. This should all be taken into account before putting out faulty products.

For me, this is one of those CD's that I must listen to several times before figuring out what it is. At first listen, there were many things about the piece that sounded familiar. But then I've come around to the notion that that's the point. The pieces are like little snapshots of something much larger - like a movie. This album feels more intimate than her first. As each song fades into its place on my ipod, there's an added element of surprise in what's heard over and over.

I ordered this for my husband's new tablet and it has a magnet that activates the sleep function. It was just like described in all respects. When he opens it, both of our dogs want to go there where we can rest their heads while they are laying on it. We keep ours stored under the chair since some said it's "sticky". We LOVE it!

I had to buy another power cord! This is the perfect replacement for my HP DV6000 laptop. The battery life on this cord was amazing! It took me over 5 hours to charge from 10% when it came out of its package. Very happy with the product!

The first two movies were great on a very small budget. They are still enjoyable even with its age now, but these final three films really show their age. Don't take it too seriously. Some of the humor is pretty lame. My favorite is how they use people like old school horror comics to move between scenes. It works well here. I bought all three movies at once so that was cheap. I would recommend this set for Halloween parties and if you have friends or family who enjoy campy horror.
Maybe you will enjoy it, my Kindle tells me I'm about 40% into it but it's not looking that good.

This book was very disappointing. Very predictable and way too many characters in it for me to follow. The first page started out fine with an exciting scene but then became a mishmash of uninteresting events that barely connected. After finishing it, I still don't know what happened to all the characters. It seems like just after reading one chapter everything gets wrapped up nicely. Overall it's pretty boring. Don't waste your time. It's not worth it.

This will be the third pair of these gloves I have purchased in a little over two years. They are great and always hold up. The only thing is that the rubber starts to degrade after some time. That can cause your fingertips start tearing up if there isn't enough care taken when cutting things.

In comparison to other zombie movies: this is by far a real piece of crap. The acting sucks...very very bad! If you want to see how bad an actor can be when under pressure: watch this. Just dont pay money for it.

I was very excited seeing the price and after having read reviews about this phone not lasting as long i took a chance. While it worked for a few months, my only problem was that all three units we purchased have been giving error after error. It also randomly goes to voicemail. This is our 3rd v-tech phone. They are always expensive but worth the money. All of them still work. These however seem unreliable. Too pricey when they aren't reliable. For what its worth, we're now looking at other options.

The only thing that would help is a larger size and more volume. The product works okay, I can feel the heat from one of my toes though. If you want to warm your feet, you'll be disappointed. It's better than nothing but not as good

While the overall story was quite predictable, I found that characters and dialogue were very amateurish at best. As an example, how many different ways can you have a man get into bed? What sort of fantasies are they all having?And what exactly is this big secret about one of the main female character's parents that she keeps from her father? That doesn't fit with his character.
I can't see it working out for the average person reading the book. Too much fluff and not enough in depth knowledge of anything. The pictures aren't as helpful but it's still interesting.

These pillows feel very hard. They are not soft for a body pillow, that is the only thing in common with a body pillow. We returned them and still have our original pillow made by down so we can return these. The first time my husband used his new one, he was waking up 3 times as many times each night before going to bed.

This is a good product if you have more than one pet that sheds all the time. My kitties are indoor only and needed something they weren't afraid to get into. Since I purchased this product, I haven't seen any shedding. A little noisy, but no bigger of deal than vacuuming my own.

The concept is great and there are some nice games on it but when I got the device, it froze with a black screen and then rebooted saying I had to install an update. Do NOT waste your money on this product. We bought two....one for our house and another in the garage. I am sending it back. The light is extremely dim even though they are both brand new. I bought this to use in the hospital nursery so that I can leave my phone or ipod on charge and turn off their music if I'm not there. It works great, but it takes a couple of days for them all to charge full unless you have one with two devices.
Well written and it kept my interest. I don't mind reading about abuse so I do recommend it. It left me hanging. Guess you have to buy the part 2.

First of all it will not play in my DVD player and as far as the CD I have to say this is the worst excuse for music that has been written maybe ever. Do i need a review for that? This album sucks big time don't waste your money you get about 3 good songs out of 16.

I was very disappointed that this came packaged like a bootleg. It looked and smelled terrible. Maybe the seller thinks people only care about looks, but I was looking for a quality product. It is a cheap imitation. Not happy. But now after reading negative reviews, it seems to be something with this seller. So buyer beware. I am returning it. I ordered a pack of six filters to replace the two that came with my Brita, which is about 10 years old. They looked just like those original ones and when they came, everything was fine, but within a week one of them had cracked in three places. In addition, the plastic coating on each filter has peeled. They don't look nearly so good as an actual Brita. What was really disappointing was their customer service at Sunpentown, who told me they are no longer carrying these filters.

This book is not worth reading. It should have been rated at no lower than a zero. I would never recommend it. That was probably true but there came along some people who claimed that courage as their strength. If you want more proof read this book. We need the courage for things like this.

At the beginning of this review, I'm going to try and be as brief as possible, mainly because I don't want to give away anything important about the plot. Not very comfortable or great for wearing all day. Could stand to be just a little thicker. Not sure it is worth the extra expense. I love everything else Ecco shoes.. they are wonderful. If you're looking for something that you can throw in the kibble bowl, I'd pass up on Wellness Core and use Taste of The Wild or Orijen. They work wonders together without them being as expensive.

it was so long and boring i skipped to the ending hoping for something other than a happy ending. It really dragged on too long. I don't like reading books where it's written from two different character's view point's.

Love these spatulas -- have been looking for quite some time. I am trying to get away from plastic so use mine regularly in non-stick pans. They don't scratch, and are dishwasher safe as well. This set comes at nice value - much cheaper than other companies that offer similar items. A good deal.

Like a lot of his music this was one where I like the album but did not end up enjoying it when given time. They weren't all negative, but sometimes seem overly dramatic or bragging. Still, there's wisdom out there. Not only from the "bad" life, you can pick up some good advice. It's worth reading.

Too many unnecessary twists in storyline. No way could I get into it and kept waiting for the story to wrap up. But this just left me feeling as if there were no conclusion. It seems like it dragged on forever with out any real story. Don't waste your time.
Did not do anything like that other than cause me some slight headache. Not sure of it's efficacy, will try something else next time.

My cats love this new litter box. I really like not having to scoop the clay daily. These bags are easy on their stomachs too. This system has been working well for me. They seem very happy with it. So glad I bought 2 or 3 at a time. Saves time and money.
the product was ok, but the package received in great condition and looked good. The quality of what I viewed could be better, since I have seen it on youtube. All in all, not a good product.

I have a 2011 VW Passat wagon, and this is the most incredible product for its price. It works perfectly with my Android smartphone's Bluetooth adapter, which allows connectivity from any Bluetooth-capable device, such as your car's audio system or through an aftermarket deck. The sound quality coming to my car speakers was amazing. I've used it numerous times, driving long distances in rural environments (70 miles/30 hours) without having the phone connected to it.
The product is well built and very durable. I have used it for many years without any problem. Its good stuff.

I bought this to keep my car nice and clear. Works well. I like the look of it better than white plastic ones. Easy enough for a novice person too. It comes with clear instructions which helps alot. This story portrays an uncaring Christian community that shows little concern towards those who have different ways of life. It reminds me in a very cynical way about this world we live in, with its lack of compassion toward other people.

This was not a good read for me. But I am glad so many others liked it. I gave it two stars because the book itself is good. Very well written, with an unusual storyline.

I was pleasantly surprised by this story. The characters were well developed, the plot has just enough complexity and interesting aspects to be interesting. This book really grabbed me emotionally without losing my interest in the story, so even though it's a short piece (about 150 pages), it doesn't feel rushed, but actually flows almost perfectly from beginning to end. The main characters, Michael and Erin, are both well-drawn and quite likable, which made them particularly accessible and easy for me to immerse myself in.

I love this product. It is nice to know that you can get a product of such high quality and good value. Very happy with purchase. The packaging was good, no damage. No leaks. Fast shipping from Amazon.

I bought this player at BB for about $100, it has performed ok, but the major problem is that it will not read many DVDs made a year or more ago. No one else seems to have similar problems with its DVD player, so obviously they just got lucky and there are fewer defective ones out there. It does play other movies though. Don't buy this player. If you do it, look around because if Amazon stops selling them (and that's a big if) then you'll never find another.

I ordered this bed to be used in our vacation trailer to rest on after an overnight trip for a dog to be treated there and the dogs have always loved sleeping on memory foam beds. When they wake up in my room, they're immediately all stretched out. This was not the case with the Invacare Memory Foam Bed we have...Our other bed, which looks identical to this, has both of these features as well but seems much firmer when you lay down or sleep at night.

This is so old school I don't understand it, if she didn't put this on the radio and make it a song, how could we have known about it. Then you try to listen closely because it's not anything really new or original...just recycled sounds heard before in one of her previous songs. There's very little originality, I think she's trying too hard to be different, but what she's actually doing here is, she's playing around with her sound, nothing new, that's all.

Very good quality, especially for these price! Used them before couple times, and no damage after using for two times. Nice grip too. My old brushes came from China in about 10 years, so cannot compare with these. But they certainly seem to be very high quality brush already. And not expensive.

One star is generous and it does not deserve to be. I bought this book at the bookstore in a hurry without reading any of the reviews. The characters are shallow stereotypes that come across as cliches. There was no plot - there was nothing good about it. It started out bad (and I mean bad). Then suddenly took an interesting twist so you wanted to find out what happened. Well except from when she did that. She was just annoying all throughout.

This book was so boring, I kept putting it down and coming back because there had to be some exciting things going on but nothing ever happened. It took me FOREVER just to decide if I liked the characters, or not. To finish this book, you don't want to waste anymore time with it. The ending made no sense - what happened? There were too many characters that weren't developed properly. One minute you're liking who they are then suddenly they're all gone. I'd give this a 1/2 star if I could.

This book is a fairly good and well researched discussion of the role of women in Christian thought. As an example though for what this book could have been like you take away from it that there has never been (and will never) be equality between men and women. The idea that female Christians should remain silent at public worship services, where they are not permitted to speak, is ludicrous. Likewise with regard to other matters.
i received this book very quickly it was in good condition however the cover is coming apart and has glue stuck to it. i would have paid more for a better edition had it been offered.

This is a very heavy duty pan and it has performed well since I purchased it. However, just like several other reviewers, the coating of this pot came off at the edges after two weeks or so. It must have gotten to me before they were made. They need a better finishing. We will use if when we think that our current one gets too scratched up, but cannot afford another set until either the finish is improved or the product becomes more robust. As a result, I give it 2 stars.
i gave it five stars because the service was quick which makes me feel safe when giving my feedback to the world thank you :)

I just love it my dogs sleep all night on it and they are so happy with it. Just the right size for a medium dog.

I think it could be better. The book needs to offer more ideas and strategies for overcoming the financial barriers. Also, people in their 40s and 50s who are at a stage of life that they would like to improve will not finish reading this as quickly. So if you don't have time for it, you'll probably move on. If you're already getting serious into managing money, then this book might give you some useful information. But overall, there isn't much content that's groundbreaking or helpful. Overall, though, a good read.

This is probably the most inexpensive GPS you can own at this point. It's also pretty basic, which means it's good for users that will mostly be using it to navigate home or travel to/from their destinations. However, I did some online research and found several people have been bothered by the short battery life in newer Garmins. For about $10 more, you're better off paying more attention to other options if a longer lasting battery pack concerns you.
As my dog says "It's as tough and durable as gold!" He has ripped up every toy or plastic thing we've given him, but he hasn't destroyed these yet.

This was a good introduction but, for some reason, it wasn't as riveting at the beginning and got boring towards the middle. But on a whole, it's an interesting read if you have little knowledge or interest in what happened before 9/11.

I purchased this for my brother in a nursing home. He loves it. For some reason, the top stays on with his old shower head. I was glad I ordered multiple because he will be needing to order more. I am disappointed in how this book was printed. The pages are completely out of order and it looks like a book that went to the printer with many more copies than there were books produced. It is printed sideways, but for some reason they chose not to put even ONE page facing you from the front cover. There are also places where letters have been torn out. In my copy the words "writing" or "who's" just seem random.

This book is a rip off of Bill Gothard's books but without the original author it doesn't really get you any better. I'm so disappointed with this product. I did the research, read up on various coffee makers, made them in different sizes, ordered one and it seemed really great.
