But without a cord there are no calls or texts!! Not very happy about that! Also when using navigation on app like google maps - my GPS constantly drops off. This happened with both the car charging port so now I'm just carrying around an extra one I guess.

Good quality product. Fits nicely on the iPhone 4s. The screen protector has this weird rainbow effect. But other than that it does what it's supposed to. I would buy a similar product from Tech Armor.

This little vacuum does a nice job. It's the perfect size for vacuuming in tight spaces. The only reason I don't give it all 5 stars is because you have to hold the button down on handle of vacuum while pushing any button. I'm not sure what other folks are doing that they really like so much, but it's annoyingly annoying every time just for getting around an electric cord (and my 3 year old son). We solved this problem by turning the machine off.

This Card was for Dell Dimension 4000 with Windows XP. I bought new to avoid a lot problems later on when upgrading XP or doing other hardware upgrades. There were two problems. First, it would not mount at all.

I was really pleased with the product. It didn't cost much and I received it quickly. The only problem is that you need a magnifying glass to see what you're looking at. But I've got great lighting so all they have left in there are black dots. But my boys loved it. I don't think it's going up any time soon because our weather wasn't favorable. :-(

I have used a George Foreman grill numerous times before, which I still love, but this one holds lots of burgers and, since the unit takes up so little vertical area, leaves plenty room to store extra veggies or whatever in our pantry. Highly recommended. We've used it several times.
My wife likes it. It looks like new even though it's over three years old. You don't want your iPad to get wet.

This was probably the first in a series of short stories about werewolves that I have read. It would take you only 30 mins. to read if you're not into things like that. The story is fairly predictable but enjoyable all the same. I've noticed some other reviewers are rating this poorly because they didn't actually finish it or don't believe in it. I'm unsure why this makes them so angry. Personally, I liked the book and am looking foreword to what happens next.
When my husband opened his package he was so excited...

I didn't have this very long, but it already developed a crack on the bottom. This is the first cover I've had that wore away like this....for no reason. The only reason I'm giving this one star instead of none is, well, it's in my car and does its job so far! Just wish it hadn't cracked. Too much hassle to send back, so I'll just toss it.

I don't know what to write here, this product didn't work at all for me. It was a complete waste of time and money. I tried it on one eye first, the light did not affect my eyeglass frame or any other part of my body whatsoever. To conclude just dont buy. I will probably never be able to find something else that works. Save your money - there are plenty others out there. I wouldn't suggest giving this little cheap thing even 1 star but you have to.

In a time when television sets are disappearing almost as fast as they were introduced, the Zenith model continues to be useful and an affordable alternative. I've tried other radios in this price range, but the sound quality is far better, with better reception. For me it was perfect for recording long news programs, like The Today Show. A minor quibble is that it's somewhat noisy. However, I purchased mine from Beach Audio and, believe me, there aren't many vendors who seem interested making anything of value anymore.

So far it's good. Only one problem it makes you go to the web site and log in. Not sure who they think I'm going to call. Hopefully this product works better. The product description should have said that if your internet port is blocked by a firewall or other software on your computer not for router.
This is a great coffee maker. The only negative is it doesn't have auto shut off. A very good pot at this price.

The sound is terrible and the connection breaks way too frequently. Mine lasted a year, until I plugged it in one day to find my PC speaker having died. :( I'm very disappointed with this. If you are looking for cheap, these speakers may work OK but if you're an Apple fan who wants something that's long lasting, definitely look elsewhere. Don't waste your money like me. My other complaint though would have been that this product requires 4 AA batteries while it's rated at 2 amps.
Really didn't finish reading it - so many typos, misspelled words etc.

This light came with little info and it was still a little confusing to find out. Finally figured out that the light only needed three D batteries in it. I'm not sure why I bought it. But it's so cool. It is now part of our outdoor decorations when we have some guests. They love it! Just like my son thought at first too. Thanks from me.

After reading several negative reviews of this product--mostly the fault of having a large fish tank but also due to its size and heaviness--I must point out that I have been working with aquariums for many years. The issue here is not weight, however, nor in fact size or weight. It can be made light, but it's heavy because it has no support structure. It's actually very durable and well-made but if you use anything larger than 1.5 gallons on it, I'm sure you're going to break it.
Lamp has now been installed one week and no issues. Much cheaper then other sources on web, but time will tell how long they last. So far no problems.

The set arrived quickly, well packed and without a single scratch. It is very pretty on our dining table but looks way better even in person! We like the fact that it allows us to use some of the plates from other dinnerware sets with this one. Very pleased especially for such an inexpensive set!!

In a nutshell, I couldn't finish this book. It was depressing. The writing is good, the plot, although contrived and lacking in depth, pulls one into the characters, but it felt to me like every page had been read through two times before publication for grammatical errors. It's written as if it's supposed be something that someone will think "yeah that's cool, I'll get this.

This was an interesting book, a nice read and definitely one that holds your attention. Although sometimes it got confusing in the story line, but thats what happens with time travel books. I don't think i could imagine living this life of hers, not without reading about it. Interesting book overall and worth taking a look.

It's ok. Just not as good or exciting compared to the other books. It is a pretty short book...you can probably finish it in one evening. A disappointment if you've read all of her books and enjoyed them.

I was so disappointed in this book because my 9 year old son asked me to read it over a weekend and said the same things that other reviewers have said. For instance, on pg 11 he quotes an anonymous girl as being "so pretty". Really? That sounds like someone who has no idea what "cool" or "in" are, but that's another issue. On p. 5 there is a picture of two girls with blue hair and blue eyes holding hands.

I would like to say that The book was good or even very good. But just imagine the author did not read his own book. They changed characters name and they were all in one place. What happened? It was almost exactly same story line as second book! If you are not in the mood of reading the same, don't do it. My suggestion is to make a 3rd book on this subject please. We need other points for comparison. And please stop editing it! Please let me proofread it at some point.

This would work great on someone with a short torso (I'm 5' 11"), but for many of us it's just too large and doesn't allow enough support where it belongs. A better choice might be the Wovelette product mentioned in one other review.

A simple and easy to read book that teaches you how to stay motivated in the process of starting your own business. I have used an online business before where I felt like I couldn't do it on my own. This author guides me through step by step. Good book. It wasn't too long either. The ending part was worth while too! I enjoyed this read. There are many books out there about growing a small business, but not all guide people through how they got started. Not everyone likes that.

This is a great concept, but the execution leaves something to be desired. I really enjoy using my old Braun with it's variable speed control and easy cup design, so I thought it would work as well on this new machine. It doesn't. You have to make 3 or more cups of coffee in order for enough hot water comes out (and who only wants their coffee warm?) to cover all your cups. That means making 4 cups, or more, if you want HOT coffee.

The reason I give one star is becasue it didn't work for me or another person i knew. It was a waste of money. So I really don't like that at all. If the price could be lowered then would get a better review on this. Thanks Amazon. And thank you. &# 128540;

These are probably the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned - very light and perfect for walking in a small airport. However, one of my heels fell off before we got back to base. This seems to be an issue with these shoes, as many reviews state they fall apart after just short periods of wear. The only way it would fail on me is if you walk around in them without the support system so often needed. Otherwise great shoe. Just wish they didn't pull out immediately.   Rating: 4.

It is really small. I did not know when I ordered it that it was so small and hard to find a good place for it. For the price of it, there are much better ones out there. If you have little space, then by all means, buy this table.

My wife needed a new one since her old one had a lot of scratches and looked disgusting. She just wanted to replace the black one. This was my favorite color when I found it. Great color, very durable. I have no issues with them. But this "New,New Red Cover" is now really pink.
Not exactly what's it takes to be an American. After losing his family, one man goes far from home.

I love the first 2 books, but this book just plain irritated me. It's like watching a movie you knew from the start wasn't going to be as good that your friend had wanted for weeks, and it gets better by the third installment. The way he made out with her was just so unrealistic (not even worth mentioning), and also how he always makes everyone seem so nice yet never gives anyone any money. He just seems very unloveable, like he's some sort of con man.
The original album is amazing and now this remaster puts it back to the top of it's game. If you like rock you'll love this album!

this was an ok book. i have read all of the books in the seris now but I had trouble with some things. But other than that, it went good. There were a few things that happened that werent believeable, like someone would just leave everything so easily. It sort if reminds me another serie im looking at and its called "The girl from Mars" by Sara Shepard. For what ever reason there are no more books.

It is a pretty good product I use in my kitchen. My only complaint and why it didn't go 5 stars was because the drawer doesn't seem to be very sturdy especially once you load so much stuff on it. Overall though, really nice for those who want easy storage without having clutter.

This is an interesting science fiction movie. It's been a while since I'd seen Alien Nation so I took some time figuring out what it was. There are lots of special effects and good acting, especially by Roy Scheider.

Good case, fits well, feels sturdy overall. It adds quite a lot of weight to the phone. The design gives me an easy grip. However, there are two things I dislike on this case. First, as others have mentioned, you can see some smudges and scratches with normal light contact. A larger version would be nice if it was clear. Second, because you're charging your device via USB, in order for the case properly sit flush against it, all edges must line up exactly.

The only thing I got from this was a headache and not even enough time to read it. Nothing like the book by Paul Theroux. Too much profanity too. This author needs therapy. Not good at all. Would have sent him back if I could. Very dissapointed.
First it is an okay book and I did finish it. It is not one of his best but the story line was ok, if you love to read bad sex novels then this is for you.

Well, it's nice that we have a new game system but the games are not compatible??? How come they can't sell it with all of us who don't live in Florida so this could work? Just make sure you do your homework first and then buy it. Or maybe I'm missing something because I am having trouble loading up my older games. Not happy.
i gave my old one to my sister in law who loved it,so now i'm back into using this product. thanks! great purchase.

Perfect device. Great sound quality, beautiful display. Good size. Easy to travel with - lightweight. Love that it came loaded already. The only negative is the battery life but overall a good buy. Amazon app allows me take pictures of web pages I want to share via email.

The screen protector is not clear. There are many bubbles after it went on. It may be me and when the directions mention wetting it down I was trying to apply more water than what they said. But my son tried putting this on without any luck. Too bad, because its suppose to help with glare too. He gave up in favor of some other type of screen. We would have gone through a couple more. These do stick well but thats about it.

I really wanted this to work for me. It looked like it should have been the perfect size for what we needed. We were making a little play yard and needed a barrier around it. First of all you cannot pull out the plastic sides that make up most of these fences. You would need two people and quite some strength to put them back in with the top on. But if your going to do that, why not just stick on double sided tape instead. This seems kind of pointless.
Great case. Durable! No problems with headphones getting cut off or being damaged. Good protection inside and out. Very durable product.

The battery does not hold a charge as long as the original. I don't know if this is an old product or if it was just poor quality. Either way not happy with it. It now holds for 7 hours and only gives me about 1 1/2 hours of screen time before having to be plugged in again. Really disappointed. Buyer beware! Read reviews on Amazon about this product, they will let you know that you get what you pay for. This thing cost almost $30.

The design of this is cute but the sound quality from such a tiny speaker leaves something to be desired. It's great for on the go use, though. I have been able to stream music with my iPhone while in meetings and still use it as an alarm. It easily fits back into its pouch so you can take anywhere. Great for the price. Good enough that I'm probably looking at what else they offer right now...

This is another one of those movies about the end times with religious overtones. If you can believe in a rapture and world destruction this movie's for you. What bothered me was that I really felt that if there had been more action scenes it might have helped. However, I have to agree with many other reviewers on how slow paced people were moving. Don't get me wrong, some things are hard to watch but at least they tried something different.

Started out ok, but the story lost interest and ended really bad. Could have used a different way for book 2 to unfold. The whole ending was anticlimactic after two books. Sorry! Did not find this series appealing at all! Maybe next book? Still love Sherrilyn Kenyon's writing.
Not as good as the others, and it was quite predictable. If you want a light beach read, get it, otherwise pick up one of her earlier books. Just don't read this in public or you'll regret it...
I just received all three novels by the same author (The Silver Scar, The Iron Duke, etc.

This is a really cool idea. You can set what you are doing, say time and date. That way, all your appointments will be automatically updated through the unit. So far I have not been able to use it. It doesn't work with Skype. All my friends talk over each other's phones, because they only Skype when it rains or snows. But if we all just send one video from my phone, that works, but I have trouble getting people online on other people's phones.
I used Listerene Advanced Whitening System twice daily before every meal or anytime you want your mouth whitened.

The book really didn't hold my interest. Not one of Grisham's best books. Hard going at times,and almost nothing on the death penalty. Too many things that did not make sense. Would have been better if he had concentrated on just ONE murder.

This was my first time using a handheld tool. I am really not impressed about this tool. It is not that much effort to clean the sink. Only after use you have to move it and then fill up some water from another container. No more hand washing. It takes too long for me.
The first time we washed these they fell apart! We never would have put the dogs in them if it were not for that! You get what you pay for!

For an item that should be a life saver, this is not. I really liked being able to take the cup with me when camping and having warm water anytime on my way home. After less than 5 days of use, no longer would turn on. It came back on, but never warmed up. Very frustrating!! Would not recommend at all :-(
Bought two one will work well and only takes up limited space on wall. The second is not working well. Had to tap inside base just right or sometimes does not work.

These don't work at all. When my computer tries to detect an audio device the product does nothing, which makes them completely useless as advertised. This is in no way due to their faults: both units malfunctioned in exactly the same way.

My family loves TMBG and this is one of their favorite songs, so it was a no-brainer to get. This CD did not disappoint, with music that we love being presented in classic style, as well as the new tracks. We especially like having the chance to hear songs we've never heard, and some others only heard on FM radio.

This is the same cable they sell at Best Buy or Radio Shack. The one I bought had a couple of rough edges, but it works. So if you need them this would be exactly what you need. Make sure its for your model. Works great.

this was a wonderful cd but i must admit the first track was very different from what you had heard from her other cds. it seemed more personal to me just as something about kristy sounded different. once again she has delivered another beautiful song.

I didn't buy this from Amazon, but you can bet I'm going to before it goes out of print. This is the second novel by Charles Higham that I've tried and they have both been disappointing. There are some interesting parts about Nazi Germany here, but overall these books don't offer much more than a rehash. In fact, it's downright boring, at least compared with previous books, which were lively as well written if somewhat less dramatic.

If you follow the suggested recipes, you'll be feeling really lousy hours after eating. That said, I'll most likely continue using some of these. For other people's health, it doesn't make sense but if you're concerned about your own diet, then it's worth knowing.

This book seems great for those who love to have a fantasy come true, but the plot is slow and the heroine becomes annoying. I read it in one day, so perhaps this was my fault, since I'm not usually inclined to finish a book. It's an easy read, though. The author sets her story against Christian fundamentalism that is represented strongly, including caricatures of George W. Bush and Paul Ryan. There were many stereotypes about Christians as well, something that bothered me.

I love the look and feel of this product, however it was not constructed as well as my other similar products. The top piece doesn't latch to hold together without help. It broke after only about a month of use. Not worth sending back. So disappointing. But the style is great if you don't carry very heavy items; which I don't. Really cheap construction!
The unit does NOT come with the HDMI cables, so if you need a cable for your playstation 3, this is not for you. I returned it.

Just bought my fourth unit of these filters. I've never had one leak, or give me problems, and all 4 units are working flawlessly. If you're looking for an efficient filter, spend your money on these. You won't regret it.

There are some nice ideas and the recipes sound good, but for my first attempt I'm still looking for an easy cake cookbook to cook without a mixer. I tried two recipes that turned out very well, so maybe it is me who needs help. Not worth what seems like quite an investment. Sorry.

It is an excellent film when one can take in all aspects that makes this character such a fascinating man to know. He was so interesting in his life with many facets of both the inside and outside world.
You get what you pay for. The product is cheap for sure. Don't buy this. Waste your money...............!...........................................

It is a beautiful set. And all the piecesthat I received in it are lovely too. But one problem issome of them don't fit together properly and just keep coming apartfor nothing. So I had to fix them. Other than that, itis okay. And now we have three different colors which makes it cooler. If only they could make thedoes better, I'd give a five star. :P

I got this for my 9 year old son. When he opened the product, there was not a picture of Darth Vader standing tall and proud. This thing is tiny. It could literally fit in one hand. If you thought that you were going to put these on your dashboard, think again. A waste all around. Do NOT buy. For $15 it would have been okay, but they are only worth $2 or less!!! Look elsewhere. Not recommended.

I bought this for my sister and her son who just had to have an iPad mini. It is so soft and they love them. If you want a great protective product then purchase this one. They say it does work with the new iOS5 but i can tell when we get that one and these come out in more colors. Great price as well. Highly recommended. So happy their made these. There still available at Target though - maybe even on Amazon too.

If you would like to read about one dimensional characters with very little depth, then this is the book for you. This story has promise but just never delivers. The author writes from the perspective of a twelve year old.
Not as complete as they claimed but adequate. A bit lacking in some features common among modern lexicons. Very handy.

This is a great book for the intermediate woodworker. It does need some tweaks and corrections however to make it easier than an encyclopedia. Its basically a huge coffee table book. I had hoped its contents would have been more concise or better organized. The drawings are beautiful but they don't really get you anywhere. With all of its large size, depth could have made this much simpler. Also, many steps in the projects aren't illustrated very well.
This item has exceeded my expectations. I can't believe how much space I've gotten out of this item. I'm really enjoying it! Very pleased!
Didn't work. Tried it with 3 different phones and same result. The mic worked only when held in front from ear canal, that's not how they were advertised.

This case has saved it from a LOT of damage. It survived drops and several times the belt clip came out. If you need something cheap but sturdy then this is not for you. But if you want to protect your phone without having to pay an arm & leg than keep looking, look no further.

We have used the TomTom one for a year now and loved it, but thought it was just perfect when we got married two years ago...well it took us over 10 minutes to drive from our home in Oklahoma City Oklahoma, to Kansas City, Ky, which is where my wife works. For us, and our first few travels around Texas were great. However, if you take an exit onto State Highway 6 before heading east, you'll be getting stuck on I-35E/Business US 75.

It's a great movie. I'm glad I own it. Not because the quality is great. But its one of my favorite books and I've always hoped they'd do it properly. They have been very disappointing. The movie follows nearly every other version out there. Almost no new footage. For me it's about what to expect after reading the book. The film only showed snippets from parts that were key story points. Most important events are skipped. Instead we saw a few scenes taken straight out of an episode or two.

These are really fun as a stocking stuffer. Very small - about 2 1/2" x 3". They arrived packed so well that the box was damaged. I think they get better with age or if kept in an airtight container, but only time will tell ;)When using them to bake cupcakes, you want something on top, however, depending upon what you're baking, this may not be ideal.

A truly awful waste of my time!Don't take this book seriously if you are even slightly religious. The story line is predictable and there were many plot holes - not worth even 99c, let alone 3 or 4! It was free, so I didn't mind too much but, don't bother. My time can't be wasted. :D

As a fan of the first book, I must say that I'm not sure what to think of this second installment. The story started out fine, and had me feeling like it might be something special. However, as soon as Charlotte turned 21, there was no more development there, nor is Charlotte given any kind of maturity whatsoever for wanting an adult relationship with David. Even after Charlotte's family becomes involved in her life again, it doesn't seem very mature.

I purchased it because the price was great, but once i got it the quality really sucked. The volume is so low that even right next to my computer you can't hear what your playing. They should rename this product "crappy headphones!"

We were able to get one channel to work using this antenna, only 2 stations and not very well, but the picture was clear when no weather is present. Once we turned on an outdoor antenna (different brand) in our attic, which also receives 8 channels all day long for free, more than 100 channels, including a couple from about 4 states away, crystal clear, even though there are trees in between us.

There is no way this movie was made by Steve Martin. Even his friends didn't think he had a good time making this. I don't care how many times you tell the same joke with different actors, it still doesn't have to be funny every time. Just show us some laughs. Nothing at all in my opinion. As far as I'm concerned, Stephen King should sue because there aren't enough laughs in it! Very disappointed. The one bright spot about this film were the actors and actresses. But beyond that, not worth it.

I received this book as a gift. It is a cute idea for kids, but don't buy it to play with if you're wanting something that isn't going to break. We got 2 of them and only one was usable by my son. The other broke almost immediately. My son did love the idea, but can't use both. I'd rather have just found some plain old magnetic tiles. He liked playing with those, so we'll be trying those next. Too bad because I do like it.
I bought this as a gift for my husband, but have already used it. Easy to use, easy clean up. Definitely recommend.

I ordered this item as a replacement and received one that would turn on the TV, but not charge it. It looked totally different from what was pictured. It's very cheaply made & did NOT work well at all for me. The plug end is too small so it won't stay plugged in to my TV. So if you need one, I'd suggest going directly through Apple which they are much more reputable than these people, who clearly took Apple's name without paying enough respect or asking any questions about the quality.

I've been running and rowing for about seven years now and, over the years, have tried several different ear buds - from a pair of cheapies to more expensive models. I had also read that these were one very comfortable set, so was looking forward to receiving them. What is not known by most, however, is how long they actually last, which wasn't listed in the item description.
My daughter needed some help blending her own drinks. With the mini mixer I know she will not spill or overfill. This works well also. Price was right, but even better. No complaints!

The first one I tried out of 2 was defective but company shipped another right away and didn't require return shipping. Second time working ok after changing to better ink. For a few pennies more you can save your printer in the long run vs. buying OEM ink, which usually dries up prematurely.
It made my teeth yellow. I went to the dentist and all of her work shows that the gum inflammation is not caused by bacteria as with this product.
I got this case for my son's iPod and it fit perfectly - he loves it! Very good deal. Thanks! It also arrived well ahead of time! We were so pleased with the product.
This product does what it is suppose to. Easy application.

I've used these kind of cases before and this one was not the best. The case slides open too easily - I have to tug it open. Other times my credit cards would slip out from under it. It's a cheap case, but you get what you pay for.

These are nice bowls but the description says they're made in America. My husband brought a pack of them and said it's made out of china. We were not happy. I would spend more money for USA products any day over China! Not happy about that part!
I bought this kit to go with one other item i purchased. So far.. Its great! My daughter is going crazy for them. Thank you!! The kids are begging me now...

I bought the book and dvd package on the strength of the reviews here and will be recommending this to everyone who asks. My only regret is that I didn't buy a copy for my father in law! He seems really touched by it. There were many comments from folks saying they felt it was too long, but I'm not sure if there's anything worthwhile cut out or what.
This product was a disappointment. It does not work. I have had other magnetic earrings and they are terrific. So this item has to be sent back. I'm disappointed.

The product works well but it is very cheaply made. However I suppose the price reflects this and if you plan on only using for a few months then its fine. Not as durable or rugged looking as an OEM one. It would have been nice to know that upfront. Hopefully they improve their quality control in the future. Overall for the price, it's worth getting when there are no other options like this! Will get at least two years out of them which was our goal so far with these.

I think it a bad product, because after several days is so cold and not work. And the quality of product was bad. If you buy at this store, try to check what do it very well as soon as possible. The quality control for this kind are too poor. I hope they improve before selling it. But Amazon customer service did send me new one in no time. So I'm happy with that now. Thank you.- Thanks Amazon. No more problems ordering from you.
This stuff is just awful.
Please note: The current price of this "planner" ($39.95) on Amazon.com is the same as it was just two years ago at $27.00! And before buying it, check the price.

I received this item in 2 days using Amazon Prime, and I'm sure it's great otherwise, but the box it came in, labeled with a picture of a black keyboard cover, is in Italian ONLY not English, French, Italian, or Russian. If you are looking for an English keyboard, this will not work, as evidenced by my poor rating. So if anyone can get me one that might have English... I'll change to five stars. :)

I bought this a week ago so i could use my kindle during travel or when on the go. Unfortunately it had two problems, First was that there is not power button, and second i tried to charge it, as usual, by using the usb cord from wall AC plug, however, no matter where you lay it down, the light turns off. It came with 3 different options (battery, rechargeable cable & computer plug adapter) but only 1 worked.

This is a cool little gadget! It just barely allows the iPod to fit, but it stays put no problem. The USB and SD cards are super handy, as well as, the belt clip. I would buy again. Also, shipped on time :)
Bought to help us get on Netflix, but also use for other things as well. Very quick and easy way to get onto any site. Love it! Will be ordering one soon.
Works well. But not enough power, you have to be very careful because it's powerful too.

This is a very poorly written book, it reads like someone's first effort. There are too many grammatical and spelling mistakes which causes one to wonder if English isn't the author's second language (which I doubt, as she writes in English). Not only that, but all of her "stories" start off by showing how bad your child is, then tell you that it's OK to yell at them for doing something they were "not supposed to" do.
This product shorted out on me after one week of use. We had to go buy another cord immediately. VERY disappointed!
The screen protectors are okay, but I could not get the bubbles out on my screen. They just don't seem to be right for this particular Galaxy Note. All other items came as promised.

This is one of the best purchases I ever made. It's a great all wood box with very good latches. Looks good. Works well. No metal to rust. Keeps your items safe. Love it. Very well packed and shipped nicely. Not expensive either. It was worth every penny spent as soon it's assembled. Highly recommend this product. Would be nice to find more like these in different sizes so that you can order individual cases for each size item. The case came on time also.

the price is excellent but this machine does not run as smooth as my old one even tho it has a much higher price. It bogs down on some pots and other pots. The lid handle gets pretty hot also. I would look at another brand next time. My previous pot had no lid lifter and was simple to lift open lid. Not sure hown that made this coffee makers design better. I'm not happy. :(

I ordered a Nikon SB-24 D90 battery but received a Canon camera. The product description is not clear since it does not say where exactly the products are located in Italy. So far this experience has been bad, since what would be the worst case of false advertising if you just sent me the correct product. This could have caused some problems, since I'd be using my camera for an international trip. It's worth buying local as long as you're sure you get the right item.
I'm a fan of everything about this show. It is entertaining and makes you want to see what will happen next.

I had to give my old one a new life, so it is back on its place and working. Now if only they would come up with this one again! I've been looking everywhere for the exact same one. This cable was way too thin. Not a quality cable. I ordered 4 HDMI cables and none of them are working. Don't waste your money. Go to Bestbuy or something else that you can see in person. Very cheaply made not real leather would NEVER buy again.
I have not yet finished the first bottle. It seems like it helped me get a little more energy while taking it. The taste is good. Will purchase more. No side effects. Love it!

I liked it.....but I wasn't blown away...it went a bit to slow for me. It was very sweet though. So if your looking for something that has HEA in it, this is not it. Did not fit my laptop as advertised. It's was too small... I would like something to fix this problem. There should be a way around this.

I bought this product in mid November. Worked fine when you put a flash drive on it, but the next day it is dead. No power,nothing, no light. Easy to put on for those worried about fit and function. Only a couple of areas where you can't move the covers around easily but they are minor. Great product over all.

I just received the unit and decided to install it. So far, I've tested only one port on it, but everything seems well designed, including having a power switch that is completely weatherproof. I intend to order several more of these units. Recommended. BTW, The shipping costs were considerably high, as they should have been with an item this heavy. That's why I'm deducting 1 star. However, for those who need heavy duty outdoor protection at fairly reasonable prices, this could be your answer.

The unit is nice, easy to use, and has a very loud whistle. I haven't used it enough or long enough yet to know whether it's just one of those gimmicks that people think they're going out for all the water at once. It's possible however, if I do, I'll be sure to take extra care of it. When I open it, we store them in a container - hopefully keeping this whistle from getting lost. Good price also.

This only made me think that it would have continued to become more and moreloose around that perimeter as time went on. As other reviewers noted, most of thestones fall out after just 1-2 weeks without using it. My old case, which iscovered in gems, has lasted at least 3 years with hardly any wear. Save your money on something else. If anyone knows, please let me.

This product was very cheap. The first time it fell on our tile floor while sitting still it broke. My son only uses his phone when running, so if you are constantly moving your arm it's not going to last long. It did have a nice design though.
I really like this item. Although the shipping took a little longer than it should, my wife still liked it. She loved how stylish it was.

This is not a novel - it is just page after page of dialogue in which the author states his opinions rather than painting scenes to make them interesting. This coffee bean is not only delicious but affordable,. A true value! I will continue to get this coffee. Great flavor and rich aroma. Thank you.

My daughter and I have been through two of these over the years, so you can imagine how excited we were to find a new one, especially since her first one got broken in half, after 2 years. Very pleased. Great for the price. I got this at a great price and it came quick too. Love this item.

You have two ways get started. Either keep the sticker stuck to itself or try to press out all air pockets before application.

Overall, these will be good for parties - so many sizes.

A nice easy read with a lot of common sense tips. I like how she wrote to keep the reader entertained. Definitely would recommend this book as a quick and informative read. It feels as if he has taken and old fairy tale character like Cinderella from the 50's or 60's put her on Facebook and in a post modern fantasy world for two hundred years. If you are going to be original at all, don't go over fifty years old with your story.

This is an ok book. It does have some good tips for getting a new home ready fast! There should be more recipes included with the book, though. I bought this book to see if it would do what she said. Great tool with lots of good tools. I highly recommend it. I have used a lot of different brands but this one is the best. It may not look fancy but then again it did cost 1/10 as much. I've been an admirer of Steve McQueen for a long time. I first saw The Sand Pebbles as part of the series on TV when it was broadcast in 1974. As soon as I knew he did not have anything to do with making this film or writing it, so much as directing and producing, it became all about me.

this would be a five star product except that it's one of those cases where you buy it based on what other reviewers say, instead of doing your own research and reading the reviews yourself....i can see why my friend has had trouble with his unit. we have to set our radios in direct sight so both units are being used, but for us at least there is considerable static from all three units..no matter if they're on, or off.

If an author wants my book money, they should tell me why something in this story made sense, rather than simply making up a plot line that makes absolutely no sense. As for the characters, even after spending some time with them, there were very few likable ones. The premise and sub-plots don't make sense and feel forced into place.

You get what you pay for. We listened to them once or twice and then stopped. It's just not for us at all. The one exception was a song written about an Irish pub called the Black Dog. If you have any Irish, Scots/English cousins they might enjoy this.
They were cute, but kind of thin. Some broke when you tried to put them on. Wish I could use them, since they cost so much.

There was very little here that we had not seen before, and in fact a handful of times before. That said, there were some new tidbits, but mostly the book is rehashed. While I won't be sharing this with friends who don't already like these people (or know them well), it served as a good reminder if you happen to have been on vacation in Italy during the '04 summer or wondered how they all survived at one time (I didn't visit Italy, for whatever reason).

They fit great as described and for a good price. The only downfall is the logo on back of boot rubbed off after first wear! My husband had to trim them because they were just too small. But overall quality was nice when looking at them. Hopefully they'll hold up over time. He's still wearing mine now, he says they're comfortable so far.
I ordered it in error, I'm sure it's okay though. Thank you very much anyway. It's just the right length and all.

This review isn't going to be a good one. After seeing the video for The Story of My Life on Youtube I thought that it was the best thing I had ever read. It is definitely NOT what you would consider "good". It really isn't. At first sight, the book appears very sweet and innocent. Its main concern is how God will see each person in their own light regardless if they are "beautiful" or "ugly" - yet even this gets quite perverted at times.
I bought mine for $50 at Best Buy.

I love how this stuff feels. Even on my feet, it's the best, not even a hint of burning. It's just right. I'm really pleased that it works for me and feels so natural. It also seems to last. It's pretty great stuff, too, since there's no nasty smell or residue after putting it on. Also, your feet will be super cool afterwards. This is an unbeatable product. There are many uses for this.

I got this for a friend and she hasn't used it since the day I gave it. She said that it does not keep things hot enough. I don't know how to tell if it's too small but you would think for $90 they could've made a bigger thermos.

Although the size and colors of these sheets are great, they have a very nasty chemical smell similar to gasoline smell. It has taken about 5 washings in my washer which takes several hours before clothes come out, even though I use nothing but cold water or no detergent when first drying. After laundering just once with them, there is still this unpleasant odor. They don't absorb well at all either. Do NOT buy these. I will be returning them. The packaging was also damaged. :( 
 Rating: 1.

This film was a waste of $10.00 and that is too cheap. I didn't expect to be thrilled or entertained, but rather a movie for my daughter about how God has given us special talents within us. She would not understand all this drivel, even if it were a movie. As many times as we watched the movie, she kept saying "Daddy, what's happening?" What am I? How do these things change over time? If someone can explain more on this, it will help me.

I can't believe you actually charge money for something like this. You can get a whole 4 oz of organic fruit in the store for 1.49 / 6 oz. or 2 cups of coffee beans from your local Trader Joe's with only 50 cents + tax per cup. For 20 dollars, you've got almost 1000 calories, sugar and oils to do some serious damage. At least they could have made this at an honest $1 / cup but as it is it's not worth it. They should be ashamed of themselves.

When I first received the case it fit like a glove and looked just as good in person than in picture. After two days of use only by my husband with minimal use, there is already scratches on the back. It may protect phone from minor scrapes but definitely not enough to warrant more then one star. Not sure if i will buy another case. If someone knows a case that isn't so bulky would you please let me know. Thanks for reading reviews.
Have you ever, while watching a movie, seen all those little tiny kernels that get all over your hands from popping as well? Well, here's your answer.

I bought the kindle version of this book and returned it. The graphics are so small on my 7 inch screen that it is nearly impossible to use when reading a book. Also, the maps included in one section, which was labeled "topology" didn't exist - for example "the map of the eastern seaboard.

I really like the convenience of these and they work perfectly on any hard surface, with no slipping. And while you may not notice much difference, it definitely feels good to have your shoes off more often. They also look pretty cute sitting out in my garage without looking too tacky. My only complaint is that they're a little pricey for what they are. I'd buy them again but probably wouldn't pay close retail price. As always, Amazon had the best price at the time.

Got tired of having to replace the batteries in the remote. This is what I get for trying a cheap universal remote. You can also find these on sale at Walmart and Targets. The thing about this unit that makes it completely useless with remote controls other than our TV is, you'll need two AAA batteries, one for the sensor that detects different levels of motion. You'll then run through 2 sets of batteries, which are very expensive each time.

These are comfy, but after 6 weeks there is little left to hold up. That aside, they provide excellent warmth - even if your toes get a touch warm at times. Would have preferred more wear with less money.
I'm glad it only cost me two bucks because it's definitely in the bottom half of most free books. It's very short for being so expensive. There are way more interesting books out there than this.
This is a poor recording. Very scratchy and very low on volume. I could not listen to this CD. The price reflects the quality. There are some other better recordings! One of my most disappointments!

I expected a lot more from the "Christian" publishers of this novel. While all stories are true, these books should not be sold with a warning label that they "may offend some". There is only one story where children go to war. In my opinion it was too gory for children, because parents who find such things repulsive have no business giving an allowance out and buying books. Just as there is violence against women, violence, rape, drugs, child abuse, etc.

Just like everyone else, my cord melted as I used it on the laptop. Would not recommend anyone buying this product. Waste of money for $20. Do yourself a favor and go to Best Buy or Office Depot and get one that costs $15 bucks. Your results should be better.

I recently purchased this product and was very disappointed. The video is not high definition but the audio isn't. It also did a bad job in cleaning up my VHS tapes. My husband went back to using his old VCR that does a very good job. I'm planning on sending it back. It really did nothing.

These are a little pricey but they seem comfortable on the feet after you have adjusted them to fit your foot. I don't believe that these will last very long under tough conditions. They might be good for short term hiking while wearing shoes but not through normal rugged use. That being said I'll spend another $ 20 if there is one more of these. I'm sure they'll fall apart in my backpack eventually. Hopefully that'll teach me to just sew an extra seam when it becomes necessary.

I purchased a similar unit some time ago but it was not made the same. This one looks much sturdier than my previous one. That said, however, when the package arrived and we put together this new unit, part of its base kept falling off as others had reported. Also, it's hard to tell what temperature range you have turned on because once the microwave is at either 2 or 4 (high) settings, nothing changes except for how high your food is.

What a disappointment. My mom bought this for me as soon as it came out in theaters over Thanksgiving. As I watched the movie my first question was "What's with all the screaming and cussing?" After seeing it, I could not believe what the kids were doing on that island. That being said, after watching the entire movie, there is no redeeming quality. The film drags until you just want to jump through your TV screen because of how annoying everything is. It's an insult to real Native Americans.

This toy is fun for older children because of the fact that it comes apart and assembles in multiple pieces. Some toys just get boring very quick when you have to continually put them back together. With this toy, my son loves seeing how long he can keep his trucks on one track. It's definitely a good price for such an entertaining toy. My child likes all types of Hot Wheels tracks. Cars go really fast along with other cars. I would recommend this track if your kids are looking for some extra fun.
The stories kept me up reading into the night. Good characters! If you're tired looking for something interesting pick one of these up. It won't disappoint.

These have lasted longer than most of my other pairs bought in the past 5 years or so. Very warm on these cold winters we've had. They are great too. The color works well to coordinate any pants or shorts.

This book was the absolute worst. I gave up on it about 15% in because I could not believe how ridiculous some of these situations were. It seems everyone is a liar or crazy and no one should ever be trusted. One thing that bugs me more than anything else though is there were so many characters with really odd names. Is this to show us people have changed throughout history? Because by all accounts if you change something even slightly over time you'll always sound like an English idiot.

i got this today and im shocked at the quality of it, it isnt that bad,but when you put a dvd in there is about to break before u open it....its almost unuseable...now all my other ones are much better!
My little poodle likes these treats and I feel good about giving her a treat. She has one everyday for snacks in the car. And she loves them.
It doesn't work. My kids tried it and they felt bad to be honest. I hope people won't have the same experience as me with this product.

This is a very cute idea, but poor execution. It only worked as intended for about half a week. When I tried to charge it the light never came on. As such, not even fully charged. I will be returning this product. If I was using this, then yes, I'd like it.. but... without that.....meh.... Not worth it!!

I think this is a great way to add protein but it does not mix easily with my shake mix. The ingredients are pretty expensive and when the top breaks its only like $6 per container. What do you want for $50?
This cord works great, seems to be strong enough for any use, but only time will tell if this actually holds up for a while.

This is definitely not for beginners. I bought this thinking that it was going to be a beginner's level, and it's probably more like advanced. It's well explained, but when you're done with the video you'll find yourself pretty lost. The reason being, she doesn't really break down each movement in advance before you actually do it. As much as she talks about posture, posture alignment/alignment, etc...if we didn't know her moves beforehand then it would take us awhile to figure them out.

When I installed and hooked up the adapter to an XP, WinXP or 7, it does not work. It says a computer with no network is present in order for my computers on each to connect, but since they don't, all of my USB devices will only connect to one computer. I think this adaptor was manufactured incorrectly, because if you look at other reviews here you'll see very many people had exactly the same problem that i did.

I absolutely love these shoes...bought them last year for the summer. Wore to work all day long, and they were comfortable even with a ton of walking around. Love them! The heel was not too high, but high enough to look good with boots/tights. Also have another pair, and I'm sure they're just as nice! These sandals are cute. Got lots of compliments on them. Just wish they made 1/2 sizes.

I bought this for my husband last Christmas as our local library had a special sale on it. He loves it! It uses AA batteries (which are available everywhere). This model is the new one with rechargable batteries. We have been having problems though with the book not turning. It's very cheap plastic, but still has lasted since mid-December, and that was using it daily.
This edition of "The Complete Works" does not contain any maps, footnotes, etc. as the description indicates.

I bought this cable to use on my MacBook Pro and when plugged into the DVI/HDMI Adaptor it did not work. It worked fine in a DVR/HDTV tuner but would NOT work with any video output that was hooked directly to it. When plugging into either one of mine or my friend's laptops, there were NO videos!
The case was extremely easy to put together, has been very durable since day one with 3 kids using it, love that it's all in one, does get really dirty but I'm glad they had screen covers included.

The first book I read by this author was 'Confessions of a Shopaholic', and whilst I found that quite delightful, the same cannot be said for 'A Proposal For Christmas'. It did not make me laugh out loud as much as her previous books did, although it is probably a sign that I'm no longer a complete shopaholic.

It is hard to complain about it for the price, but it will not hold a roll of duct tape. I like how simple and easy to install this is, but just can't see someone putting this up every day. So if you need something permanent - buy this. Otherwise spend more money or get one with multiple rolls.

This device doesn't work that great. My only complaint is the lack of a way to adjust for size. It just sort of goes around my head. I would not expect an item this expensive and complex with so many moving parts to have such simple and unadjustable headband. If you really want it do get it. Otherwise don't waist your money.. go buy something different

After reading the synopsis, I really wanted to love this book. But halfway through I found myself skimming over a lot of useless information and it just didn't connect with me enough to finish it. The whole paranormal aspect was so not what I've ever heard or read before. All in all, it wasn't great, there were things about it that really seemed far-fetched but if you like some interesting supernatural stories, give it a try. Just know it's pretty much a work of fiction, probably more for women than men.

I chose this book after reading the other reviews on Amazon. What a let down! It's not that great, maybe if there was less detail about each person's life and more of what happened to everyone at one time or another. All very boring and no thrills!

the light is just not as bright for me at this time of year. I have a good supply to last me all year so that leaves one less lamp to use, but it's still a better buy than buying batteries every three months. Great value and fast shipping too.
this was on my daughter-in-law's wish list so i bought her this. she really likes it.....
I ordered several of these pillows to decorate a birthday cake. The order came quickly & was packed well.

As with many others, mine lasted only one season. I am now faced with purchasing an electric weed eater and replacing it sooner than expected. It worked well at first, but the problem started after two months. The motor simply died. Very disappointing.

As other reviewers have mentioned, this is a very attractive set and includes so much to go with. It looks like you're getting more than your monies worth when you actually open the box. In my case I just bought it for everyday use because it's nice having so many pieces that are of decent quality! I also really love all that Oneida packaging - recycled materials or not, good work!The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars, is mainly due to how small each piece seems to be.
This really does add some flavor to your water. With that said, it doesn't seem as intense in flavor. Good flavor, though.

I am disappointed I cannot find these cartridges on the shelf at any of my other local stores. It shows a generic cartridge, so I can not judge what this one is, and how good it is. This review has no influence on whether someone will purchase it, but rather why they are showing the photo as shown. The cartridge seems to work, except for two things:1. Not all 3 colors worked. There were only 2 left in each color cartridge.2. Only black printed clearly.

I bought this bag thinking that it would fit my 17' Macbook Pro, which was its original size. However, the computer did not even come close to fitting in it, and you can barely zip it. It is way too small for a 17" computer. And when I tried returning it, Amazon's return policy wouldn't let me do that.

The battery never worked properly. My laptop still doesn't work. The connector from the original to this one is loose, and sometimes it doesn't connect. After that, It keeps making a buzzing sound when i connect it. Just got mad since I ordered it only two days ago. Maybe there was even an after sale return policy, but didn't apply or they don't cover it, because there's no reason that I've noticed so far. :( Don't waste your money. I'd like a refund.

It was not what I expected, there are only 12 stories in this collection, a lot like the book "Dark Horse" which has around 100 stories, but way too short and hard to get into. Some of them were fun but, overall, not worth $12.00, it would have been nice if they put an additional story into one larger volume. The first book, I enjoyed reading it. I am glad that I picked up both books together.

This phone is the worst I've ever had. I have a couple of other Panasonic phones and never had any problems, but this is just junk. We couldn't hear from people right when it rang; they either sounded muffled or we could barely hear them. Sometimes you would pick up on what someone was talking about long after everyone else on your call left that call. The sound quality for others was also bad. I'd give it ZERO stars, but one star will have to do it.

This book is so not my kind of thing. It's definitely a dark mystery but it seems to me like it's written in the voice of an old woman rather than of a young one. I've lost count how many times she gets pregnant with her first husband and then gets him back within seconds. Also, if all of this stuff had happened long ago, I'm sure I'd have stopped reading. It does get better. However, if you read the ending, you'll know exactly who was behind it.
This is a nice product IF you like your spaghetti "just so.

This book was okay if you don't have better alternatives. It just didn't come out to be as funny when I read it months ago. If your looking for a hilarious book, this isn't the one. On the other hand, if you're looking for another parenting memoir, this is definitely it. At least there's something in here that tells you all about how not everything goes well and it's ok too say so. Just like any good marriage book.

I bought it for the car because the cigarette lighter was taking up space on my center console. It works great and is plenty of power,just not long enough. My fault though, since there are more expensive ones out there.
Very happy with these so far....work great and the price was definitely great! I will buy them again. Thanks for a good product at an affordable price!!

When I first received this the cover appeared to be made of cheap plastic (the one pictured has a much more durable cover. The case is a lot thinner than expected). It was shipped in an envelope and therefore arrived with wrinkles on it. After trying it out for 2 days however, I found two problems. First, there are no slots or spaces along either side as shown - they all just line up flat and if you don't get your finger caught between them, then it won't stay.

This DVD is a big disappointment - I had high hopes for it being on sale and all. The material itself IS interesting, but the quality of it is......well. If you're looking at this item, chances are you are either already invested in his work, or just want to see one more film by him. And there was another version available, so maybe that's why mine is bad.

A huge waste of time, time I cannot get back. It is not as easy to use a manual pencil sharpener but it works. There are no instructions, just pictures. Not very useful or helpfull. Also the holes were too big for my pencils which leads into the issue with breaking leads. The shavings compartment on top of this device was also broken. It looked like it had been used several times since we bought it. The company and Amazon's return policy has never worked out well in my experience.
I am very impressed. It was easy to assemble and well put together. The material is durable and solid. Good size for a small space too....
A great product. Good price and works as expected.
I purchased these in September 2012. Last night it happened. The left ear piece broke.

This is a horrible toy. The toy doesn't work at all - turns only slowly but it barely moves forward. Then the motor goes out in about 10 minutes. I can't believe they can make such terrible toys, and that people would pay money to buy this cheap piece of garbage... DO NOT BUY THIS.

We did not like the flavor of this coffee, but that is true for both bold and flavored blends. The problem is it leaves horrible after taste in your mouth. It was very disappointing since we have tried at least a dozen different K Cups. I would NOT recommend Keurig. They don't hold up to their claims about keeping these type cups hot. Also, when you want more, there isn't any extra coffee left so then they just charge you more. You can find other brands on the market.
This was a very nice gift set - looked great, especially if you are one who has served hot liquids with their coffee. Highly recommended.
I love most books about mermen, but some were a little cheesy for me. This one seemed really well written though and I enjoyed it.
Nice case and good value for price. It doesn't hold well when set up on table because of it's tendency to slip too easily. It's easier than most cases but not perfect.

Great product, easy for my 90 yr old mother to use. Bought the extra long power cord. Have a few small spots in our house where only 1 outlet is available. This solves that problem. Unit heats up fairly quick and holds enough water for 2 people per night. The tank will be easy to empty when you have to. Very pleased overall. Will wait a month then update on its durability. My unit was shipped from Amazon.com. Fast shipping. Would purchase again if need. Would recommend it too. 
 Rating: 4.
I have not actually used anything in this pack, to rate it beyond that, but everything was as described. It came quick too.
The remote is much smaller then expected, and doesn't even work. Not worth returning so I'll keep it, thank you.

I received this item well packaged and without any issues. It took about 3 weeks to arrive and the packaging was quite good. The size of the pillow is similar to a regular sized sleeping bag. The material itself seems high quality as well. The only thing that wasn't great about this product, in my opinion, for me, was how it felt between my ears. Overall though, I'm satisfied with it. It's exactly what I'd want from an item.

If I could rate this as zero stars I would. Like many of the other reviewers, I'm very disappointed with my purchase. This CD didn't even have a good song on it. There were only 2 songs that i enjoyed. That is what you get for buying online. I went and bought myself an actual copy from somewhere to help offset it's loss in value. Hopefully someone will make some money off these guys through downloads etc.

These are great for my dog who is afraid of thunderstorms. He usually hides during a storm & comes right out when needed. I even like them myself and find it fun to put him in the house with these on his feet. Keeps him from getting stuck under furniture & furniture. We live in an area where we do have some thunder storms but they are so much quieter than I remember. Great product for your money. Highly recommend this product. Also recommended to friends as well.
Product didn't work long enough to know if I am doing something wrong.

The first few times after installing the batteries I was pleased with performance. After a full day of shooting, however, it went completely kaput. It no longer turns on even if you tap it. You have to wait 5-10 seconds before pushing another button for it to turn on. That's ridiculous. If I were going to purchase this item again I would look around for one that works better. Especially when other reviewers mention battery dying in less than 20 minutes.

i know the author is trying to write well but she just got stuck in the mud. this was one long, boring, boring rambling account of her life. all we get are memories from years and when someone dies, everyone comes on here for a year praising her life, including herself. what could have been an interesting read, about how someone's life changes, instead, becomes trash. my suggestion would be pass this book by, check it out at your library or something, don't waste your hard earned money.
A little bit smaller than I thought. So I was concerned about dropping it.

This book left me with a feeling of disappointment. I have seen many reviews before buying this book, saying exactly what these one people said. I bought it, read it and just thought, where are the insights? Where is love? The book leaves you thinking well I got my answer about four pages before. The book tries too hard to tie things up nicely at the end, or for that matter make them more real, but they don't really feel real. Overall there was no true romance in this book.

I bought this with the expectations that it might hold up. So far, so good. But now, a month later, its showing signs of wear. Where did it go?! It is still intact when placed on my desk and at all angles. Yet, every now an again, like the day after I purchased it: pieces fall off. And since everyone who writes to me compliments it, it's obvious where it's broken off. So, in summary:PRO: Looks goodCONs: Cracked on first day....

It works the way you expect it to. I use this for washing and waxing my truck on a regular basis. It's easy to clean using soap or even toothpaste with no mess like some other brands of soap/car wash products. This kit has everything to get started. I'm happy with it.

I love all of Grisham's legal novels. This one is too much like a bad television sitcom script: characters that are cartoonish - the good guys, the bad-guys etc. The story line does not engage as well because it lacks any real substance and becomes more preposterous as you learn about it's main characters. It is obvious that most if not all of this book is simply an excuse for Hollywood style entertainment. If you're looking to read John Gresham with political intrigue, look elsewhere.

I do a lot of home repair and found that this saw does pretty much what it advertises at half the price - no frills, but easy to use for the occasional job. The belt guide was very difficult though, as the locking plate just would not hold in place on my saw even though several times I put some grease on. No big deal. Overall still an excellent saw. I'm glad Milwaukee did away with the electronic light display over the past few years, unless someone has better suggestions.

The design of this book is not very good. This was a gift to our granddaughter. If I had seen the contents before purchasing it, then I would never have purchased it. When it arrived, we noticed that someone had written in and touched most of the pages. It looked as if they did not take good care of it on shipment. My granddaughter has asked us for another one like this, but without all those marks. She will be disappointed when she opens hers.

The sound is good. It does NOT seem to work well for me. When you go into the menu system it seems so complicated and all I have been trying is trying to figure out where things are located. For a child that cannot read, or who has trouble with small devices it's great. This would be perfect in my situation. Still looking for another player to replace it.

Too many words for describing any thing in the book. Don't waste your time on these books, just buy another book! The first one left me with too many questions. Maybe that is why it ends as the first chapter does.

This case is ok, but if your looking at it you need to keep in mind that its a hard outer shell. The soft silicone inner keeps everything inside snugly which protects the phone well. I would purchase another, maybe try another color as well, because all cases seem expensive.
Looks nice, accurate (consistently) scale, large enough area for two persons, doesn't go through expensive batteries. Definitely worth it! Very pleased!
My daughter loved these little jewelry...she was wearing three at least every day for the rest of summer. She wears a lot, always has something.

Like other reviewers, I am a total coffee snob and like it really hot, without being too hot to drink. I've had every single cup out there. Keurig is the most complete solution, by far. It has all of the advantages that everyone mentions, which includes convenience (without ever losing my sense for taste), taste (with its ability for more complex flavors), ease (you don't have much time in between cups after all), even temperature (I like hotter coffee, so cold would be strange).
I had tried several "gels" but this is perfect. It works as a sunscreen for skin and doesn't clog pores or leave the delicate area oily. Highly recommended product. Works well on my dog.

The first time that I plugged it in, it fried my iPad so badly. You would think the best thing to do is just return it, but after reviewing other products, and seeing how fast this product died, you really can't go without a backup. If yours breaks like mine did, get the one offered for sale on Amazon, rather than gamble with your IPad. In any case, I've got the same exact thing, with the added benefit of having 2 adapters - now I'll never look back.
My wife needed these for our new home we just built this summer but could only find 1 set at Lowe's,Home Depot & Wal Mart.
Too many bad words for my taste. Story was okay but language totally needs to be cleaned up. I probably won't buy anymore in this series if he keeps up this attitude.

This movie is one of the more disappointing movies that I watched in 2010. The storyline was predictable and boring. No action to it and a real let down. If you're reading this then you must not be into watching realistic or realistic movies...check out some other good ones, maybe something like Training Day with Keanu Reeves or...Fight Club. Watch those first, save yourself from wasting your time on this...I know it's cheap, but at least you'll get what money's worth.
Do not buy this item. It worked fine for 2 months, then you start loosing signal strength. In no time its down to one bar. A friend had one. Same thing.

I'm no stranger to reading books by the world's top climbers. I have tried for my whole life to do at least half that level of climbing and summiting many a mountain in this world. This book didn't help me gain an understanding as its primary use is simply to illustrate the difficulty involved with high-altitude climbing. It's also not up to date by much (it's written sometime around 2010) because it was first published in 1989.

I was so glad to see that the series of short mystery stories is finally coming out on a kindle edition too. There are 8 books and they each have 6 very short, fun mysteries. They're well worth the money even if it isn't free. Even though this book does nothing but read about 1 murder or missing person case in each book, it's still interesting how the detectives come up with different ways to solve these cases.
My first impression when getting this pillow was it's too small than expected. It turned out smaller than i thought. But after using in bed, my wife says she love this pillow. It's really soft.
If you are looking for something to put your hand under it is perfect. It takes half of second to dry hair, then just push down gently. It dries quickly too.

I would have to agree with the many reviews that state this product can not handle heavy loads. The quality is terrible. In less than a week both of my bags are already ripped and no longer useable. At first glance, there was also major damage on the side pockets from shipping, but when you open it up there, even though it's unattached, some parts still look pretty good. That didn't stop me giving one star to it. I guess that's what should happen though.

I recently completed the 100 questions quiz in preparation for a test. It was pretty easy as long as you make sure to get all of the math questions. As others have mentioned, not all subjects are covered in this book that you need on tests, which is frustrating. However with most tests it really just depends how fast you can find what they ask you for.
It is very poor quality. The blades get loose easily and they are difficult to open one handed. Don't waste your time. Spend a little bit more on some quality ones that aren't so cheap.

It seemed to work ok at first, had a large pool in the yard. The problem started when it got cold enough for me to put on my wet suit (it is not water proof but waterproof). When I take off from work, I am required by law to run back and forth 15 minutes while keeping up with chores. So as instructed, we waited until after work. We kept running around the pool. At times there would be 2-3 inches of standing water.

I have read the book before and it was interesting. However, you cant relate to this person like you can with some of others. That might just be me. You probably wont either. It may make good reading but its not for real. Just too over written. For what i paid, I wasnt totally disappointed because Im sure she has other books out there. Guess theres no way around it. She is not a bad author though. Its easy to read. Too descriptive on every detail. The story could use more suspense.

I bought this vacuum from Amazon about three years ago. It got a lot of use, but it finally fell apart. We called up Electrolux and they send us two new wheels along with an extra part which was easy to install. We've had the replacement for six months. One thing that is interesting is that I've noticed that when vacuuming my living room, it seems like there's hardly any dirt collected. The other parts seem fine. But, then, on the carpet in my dining room...

I have mixed opinions about the product. In order to get what is advertised, you must put in multiple charges before it will give your phone a full battery again. This means that you'll probably need to take off at least one charge and reset after each use. It actually came out on top for charging speed, but the lack of ability to turn off wifi while running may lead me back towards using my original charger. A good product when used with some common sense.
This has been an excellent scale. We are able to weigh different items - including mail packages.

I installed this on my Honda CRV back in 2009. The old sensor that needed replacing was a P0303 and there are more than likely other ones like it out there. It's only one position which would be nice if they were all programmed to the same location. It fits just as expected but then again it's been several years since I changed them anyway. This appears much better built so I'm expecting good service.
You can barely see these figures. I'm sure my grand kids will enjoy them, but they are simply hard to find. Especially since they've been around for 10 years.
Nice color for a dark green that will match almost anything. It just needs to be covered by another material because I've used it every day since I got it.

We got a bunch of these to put in our garden so that critters didn't come around and chew the flowers. They work great! They are super easy to set up. Just connect one or two together, but don't buy any of those ones you push up against each other, as they break very easily. These ones don't. The only thing I can even think of bad about them is how long it takes your hand to take them apart. I have tiny hands so it's no problem at all.
Very poor book if you want to know anything about how this man lived or why he did the things he did.

I have heard so many great things about these types of cookware. Now that I've had them a few months, I'm not completely sold on them. They are heavy which is wonderful for making scrambled eggs, but they don't seem to be well balanced, the handle is slightly wobbly while cooking, and one piece has started cracking. So far it still cooks well, but does fall out of my stove when moving it. In terms if how long will this last, I'll let you know.
An engaging story...

After watching a couple YouTube videos on how to program this thing I spent the rest of my Sunday morning with absolutely no results. There are at least 50 different programming options for what appears to be an exact replica but you can not do anything until it is programmed. What good is that if it does nothing after being programmed? So I took it back and got another one. Now when anyone tries entering their codes they cannot get it right unless your using a perfectly straight entry into code.

The plot is ok, but I think they had to fill up space by using "love" words like "it's," and other unnecessary words. That's a cop-out for me. Not sure I'll buy any more of these Kindle books, sorry. These are free and they should have been done already. And the use or misuse of those two words made reading this book difficult. So that's why it's down from 5 stars - because it distracts me too much. Otherwise I'd give 3.5 stars.

This book was too confusing in the beginning and it left me not knowing what that other woman really is. There were a lot of characters being thrown up on us throughout and I don't know if all 3 is supposed to be coming out next because it felt like there shouldn't have been any way they could fit them together except making 1 book. At least this one can stand alone... Not sure yet which one. I would recommend skipping reading it.
The movie was too cheesy for my tastes. Nothing new here and it kind of took the whole story to come out at the end. I enjoyed her acting though.
Awesome little speaker for a small price. The sound quality is pretty good considering its size. I wish this product had better battery life but definitely worth 10 dollars :)
Book is written in such convoluted writing style that I could not follow plot line, and most certainly wouldn't recommend this book. Boring!
