I was looking forward quite a bit for this, as it's been an exciting year, and with several bands coming up in their wake (i.e. Linkin Park on the one hand... and System Of A Down on another hand), I'm rather curious where they will head next.
We got this for our cat, she loves it. The thing is very strong, we had just the stairs and then added this.

I have not had this on my iPod or iPhone very long but it looks like it’ll take quite awhile. Since there are only 4 corners, it's hard to do all of them at once. And I've already dropped it once, so there's definitely some protection there.

This is not an informative book. It gives some information, but nothing you couldn't have learned from any number of sources. As far as the content itself, there are much better material out there. If you're serious and want something detailed, pay attention to how many pages, content, price, etc.

I'm still trying to decide if it's because I actually bought this book or not. Either way it was boring and even for being my fave band The Smiths seem like a very dull band- you may as well save your money on this.... I've enjoyed other books in the world of rock literature that aren't so "pop" just skip over it. Not worth it!
Not impressed. I was looking for something with more practical advice. It also needs to elaborate on the importance of sleep. I would send it back if there wasn't a fee involved.

I am disappointed in this product, but it wasn't much expensive so you get what pay for: cheap quality, not fit for purpose. If they are really meant to protect phones then the price should come from a different place than "insurance." What exactly IS "Insurance?"! How about giving me money AND phone cases? I like some protection and do appreciate that my device is well protected.

Although I love this genre, i have to say this was not my favorite work of the series. It lacked a true story line and felt rushed in comparison. If you enjoy reading sex scenes and don't mind waiting for the storyline to pick up pace, then get this. Otherwise, steer clear or be prepared that you'll want something more fleshed out.

Purchased this book months ago, opened it to find that the inside was folded completely in, like if a child printed out the pages of an art sketchbook. I'm not happy with my purchase. When I emailed the seller, he/she replied saying "sorry we dont provide those books" So it's been over 2 weeks and no answer. I've tried numerous times asking for a replacement or refund.....NO RESPONSE!!! This is unprofessional....

These things are awesome! they stay put even at high speed and don't get lost when you aren't looking or driving. I have them on my 2013 Silverado HD Laramie 1500 as well with an aftermarket bumper made by Bully Dog out of Stainless Steel to match the other components. They look great in combination and i think everyone who's seen these really likes how unique their custom look.

The picture of this product is misleading. It shows a larger bag, which the item received was more like a tiny bag! However, in my opinion it did smell very nice and worked okay on one bag. One bag at least had the scent to rub into dry feet. Not sure how long if will last though, so I'll probably look for something else as there are many other products out there. Will not purchase again from here though.... They don't have what I wanted.

The story was just too much "blah," so I had to skim ahead because it became a bit of an effort. I'm glad it ended the way she did and I think there could be great character growth. Perhaps that will show up later in her next book. Good luck to this budding author! :)
So far I am happy with them. Installation was easy. Price point excellent. Look great too. Time will tell just how well they wear.

This book begins with quite an interesting premise and ends leaving one feeling rather disappointed in the lack of answers at those gaping holes. The story takes you from New York to South Carolina and then back to Washington DC. Each chapter is somewhat different as it's written by several people which causes some confusion. I don't believe that it was necessary for one character or event at any time though.

We had bought another product that did not work with the new Kindle and were surprised at how helpful you were. You answered so many questions about our product it saved us from returning it. So we ordered this charger which works perfectly for what we wanted. No problems now to report on your products, we love them. Thanks all in advance. Carol B. Kleczka Oregon

I gave each of these to my daughter individually but the lids did not fit properly. In order for them to work, they had to be put in upside down, although that doesn't seem very practical when you have a toddler throwing things around and no way to fix them. The design itself is nice but the quality makes it extremely hard to use. I'm probably going to keep buying refills. For now at $6, I'll just buy refills from elsewhere. Don't waste your money.
For an old guy, this tool set has come quite handy. It's not fancy but just right.

Just received my order (Nov 6, 2011) of the Panasonic FZ200! It seems to have a problem with focus at f/16. The photos have heavy foreground blur, but it's so severe you can't fix by enlarging them any further. I've seen numerous comments about this problem on other message boards. For some people, it will never happen regardless if they paid extra or not. I tried everything and even downloaded two firmware updates--none helped. This is getting really irritating...

My son loved these "book" books when he was little so i decided to get him one for an Easter present since he's 4 now. We had ordered four different types hoping each would have a new story or maybe even pictures.

I bought this case after having some good luck with it. It does feel very solid, not sure how well it will hold up over time but as of now i love it!The stand function is awesome because it's easy to pick up, place in stand, grab phone, close cover.

I purchased this as my first attempt on drawing cities. The drawings were clear but not enough details. It seemed like it would be difficult for me, especially in areas outside NYC, since I'm so familiar with that place.

I bought this DVD based on the reviews - what a complete disappointment! All of their music videos from "1999" (are you listening to me MTV?) through "American Life" and they did not have anything that caught my eye. This is a totally boring DVD. They just play all versions so if one wants more footage there isn't any. The bonus material gives another perspective into these guys but doesn't contain enough new music (which were always important to me)...

As a Christian who also lives in the Middle East I have always searched for books to read and review on my trip there. This book did not fit right into that particular genre. I found it hard to relate with any characters since most of the action takes place in one location. The main character is a college student, living abroad studying Arabic literature. He ends up stranded in Dubai due to his mother's death. On his return he finds out what happened in Egypt.
These batteries last long. I use these for my Canon Power Shot ELPH 300 HS. The only negative is that they require more work to lock into place when the camera shuts down, but it's not a big deal.

This was not as great a read and I felt the ending left questions that were unanswered. It also seemed to be more of another book with another character added just for an ending. Kind of hard to feel this way. Would have liked it if it had been better done. The writer has talent, but could make her characters better. I don't understand all the reviews saying how great she is.

The product I received did not match the picture. It didn't have adjustable straps to fit my dog's arms (she's a small dog, about 10lbs). This caused it to bind at her front shoulder, and was difficult for me (I could barely pull both hands back behind me). If your pet is on a smaller size this should work better because of how it's built. Also, there must be some trick with putting it on. You really need two people to do this.
If this book had been written by anyone else, then maybe two stars. But because it's from Amy Tan, it gets one extra star.

This was my first review and I just want to say it is great, so easy to use you don't need a lot of strength or muscle power just the right amount for small jobs and very sturdy construction I'm pleased with it, would buy again.
There was very little that was useful and rather depressing on how bad government has become.
After putting all the parts together, my daughter plugged them in she said that one side didn't work. We are returning them. When we tried contacting seller about this, they were unavailable.

the case is not that bad, I have found out what kind of phone will fit in this case.............well when you put an extended battery....it won't fit. You gotta take off alot if your protective case. otherwise it's a good item. I'm just saying make sure your battery fits before buying it. other than that, looks awesome.
The story didn't grip me. Just my personal preference. Not so much steamy sex scenes or erotica. If that interest you.

I first tried this tea at a Chinese New Year's Eve party. Everyone loved it. It is very relaxing. The flavor reminds me somewhat of the apple that tastes like you just don't want to know where it came from or what it is. Definitely recommended.
This is the third installment of this movie. And I must say that it isn't my favorite, maybe because in some scenes i like to see Matt Damon getting punched or shot. But overall it's alright.

You know it's a good movie when it has the words "I feel dirty" scrawled in large block letters on its DVD cover so you'll know what to expect. How can I put this? When they first made this film, they had NO idea which kind of audience was watching. A very young pre-teen girl. The adults will be embarassed by their crude humor. If you need proof, go see it. As for me, I'm putting it back and don't plan to watch any more movies with Bruce Willis.

I am not pleased with this headset. The sound was clear and the mic worked fine. However after only about 30 minutes or less of use, it wouldn't power on, so now it's useless. I've bought a lot from Amazon in over 5 years but haven't had any trouble before. This is definitely the first time that I'm unhappy with my purchase from Amazon. It took two weeks to get it. Will be returned when I can. Guess I'll spend more money next time. Very annoying.

I had a hard time reading the whole book. It's written in very basic language and you can get much better information on internet about topics like this. The writing is just too elementary to learn much. If people were interested more it could make it.

I have an older dog that loves this bone. My smaller dogs try to steal it from him. We love it. It's not too hard and doesn't last long. It is the right amount of chew for our dogs. Worth every penny. Have bought others in a pet toy store but they were all chewed up fast especially if your large animals like ours. Would definitely buy again or recommend these. Thank you Amazon once again!!!

My 8 year old loves these! However, after only about 2 months, I had to get them taken off because they were scratching his feet. He's not the most gentle kid, but I'm not letting him wear these shoes any longer. If your child is young enough and you want these, I'd say go for it. But if they're older, don't buy them.

I bought these headphones based on brand name and the price of $80. Unfortunately they only lasted me 2 months to about a month in where wires are starting to fray away from earphone plugs. These have worked well most times, there is no tangle wire like with cheap ear buds. If it weren't for this cord fraying, would give 4 or 5 stars. At half the price, one can't beat it. Update: This pair stopped working after less than 1 years.

This is a nice product for the price. You can't beat it...UPDATE!!! Have had this item two days and it already broke where the iPad holder attaches to both sides. I have tried gluing it, no luck, now using velcro which holds but does not keep in place.

I bought this to replace a similar case in another brand that had begun to crack on the inside. Unfortunately, two weeks after purchase, all of these cracks formed and eventually leaked. I'm not happy with my purchase because it isn't holding up, but maybe it's time for me to shop at a store where they'll stand behind their stuff...UPDATE (10/23/13):My last email request was answered today by Otterbox, who said they are sending me a new one free of charge.

I'm very glad I bought this book. A friend loaned me her paperback copy so many years ago and never returned it. It was one of my favorite books to read as a child since then I've been hooked. The illustrations, by John Mosch, are outstanding. It's quite an enjoyable story that's based on the famous poem. You can even listen to it narrated in book form. If you don't expect too much out it, it's really worth taking a gander at this beautifully illustrated classic tale.

I recently received my order of these in the mail. They are very cute and super tiny, about 3 inches long. The only downside is that they break really easily. As soon as i opened them, one of them cracked right open. I don't know if this was caused by shipping or what but just beware. If you buy these, keep an eye on your shipment because it seems like sometimes a couple break, even though the box isn't damaged.

I just love the product as soon as i got it in the mail my son started playing it. He loves all types of music, from rap and dubstep to rock n roll so this is perfect for him. My older daughter even likes that he has his own speaker now :) I'm going out on a limb here though and say you may want more than 2 speakers because it's not loud enough by yourself. Also make sure you have your ipod turned up too full before any type of bass.

This is a great case. I chose this rating because it looks good. However I would like to give 4 star instead of 5. The screen protector only allows for the phone back light or bright room lights. If you need full sun light, then this may not be the case that works best. So overall good buy.
A fascinating story of how an old man and a young girl with the same heart come together. I really liked this book but was kind if bored by it. Overall good read!
I enjoyed it for what it's worth. It's only a few hours of fun though. So if you have the time and money to waste, go ahead. Otherwise keep looking.
I could tell from other reviews that when they shipped it, it didn't come sealed because one side was all ripped open. It really does look nice though.
This coffee was just ok didn't really have an after taste to it, I drink it before bed and don't like the taste.

Bought this product only to discover the camera didn't work. We returned it to amazon and tried another one with no luck. Finally got a refund from Amazon. Good price, but I guess you get what you pay for. Spend $20 more for an actual canon product.
I've been reading Mr.
I bought these for my husband, they are really nice. The wood base looks like real wood. And we have received many compliments. They work good.

The idea and the book are wonderful but it is an older style of writing so sometimes there aren't enough pictures to explain in detail. I felt that for me, personally, some of the questions were too complicated for me to grasp. Other than that, my kids liked it! There are, however, a lot of facts in this book, which will be very valuable as they start school!Thank you for reading..Please use Amazon's "Look Inside" feature before buying from them.

These filters are great for adding flavor to your water. They don't let out too much chlorine, and I know that because its where you should put it in the water meter. Good price on them too. I got a pack of 6 from amazon, which was cheaper than buying 3 at my local stores.
Had bought another brand which started making terrible hissing sounds after 3 months.

While the book was well written and a page turner, it contained too many graphic details. The content is not appropriate for middle school students. I feel we should be exposed to more historical facts like what happened during WWII, Pearl Harbor & that there were spies in the US. This would have been great if they had avoided some of the violent content. But as is, you can see where a parent might raise concerns about kids who read over 50 pages.

These boots were extremely comfortable and really warm... I had them for 9 months before the glue eventually gave out but they are otherwise great! The rubber sole never wore through either, not the best quality glue,though. Overall a good pair- warm winter boots! But don't expect these to last you several years!
Loved it! A bit sad on some of side trips but they were very detailed and interesting. Also enjoyed every minute or two about eating at restaurants or watching things happen around us.
The story is good but sometimes difficult reading. There were parts in particular where the main character had made an unwise decision regarding herself.

I must say that this product is really hard to install without getting bubbles. After applying it with the solution provided by Marware and installing a different protector on another ipad my boyfriend did it, thinking he was doing something wrong. Well we tried again and then decided he had wasted enough time - removed all three of them. Since there were still bubbles even after using up so much of the supplied solution, ended trying to remove them one tiny piece at time. So bad results, never going back again.

I find this to be a good product that performs as expected on all counts. The only downside for me is the price. A three pack, and at such high prices, really seems like overkill. If you plan to use this, I'd rather get something smaller. As for convenience, it's nice. It's small enough where it can fit into my purse or pocket. And since I'm diabetic, I need an insulin injector but am limited in carrying around too much.
The tools are light weight and pretty cheaply made. My husband said he wished they were metal. They do give you an extra drill bit though.

A long time ago I bought this and then a second one some years later in part to have them on hand for an upcoming trip. While the other was wonderful, being able to charge my camera battery inside of it from within provided greater convenience. This one, however, when received, had no power at all whatsoever. Even charging something directly into the wall socket gave you less output. Save your money and buy something better. You'll thank me later.
Just got mine today so don't want to say anything here but they came sealed on top of each other.

They have so many different flavor to choose from and I actually love the chocolate mint flavor! So glad they were on sale at Walmart. Even better when purchased by themselves for less than what it cost at stores.

Having read his other books ("The Other Side" series), this one was disappointing. While the descriptions of life on the island were interesting as part of a story, it did not provide sufficient material to actually move me through its contents.

I have been looking for a reasonably priced, small footprint, decent quality blender, especially since we just purchased the Ninja. This one works well, but has no low speed settings. The other bad feature is how the base comes off. It's only two pieces and they are not screwed together. It can come off all by itself. So it's also easy to accidentally pull it out of our cupboard if you grab it the wrong way. All in all, it's an OK product, but nothing special.

I'm an avid reader of all things pet related and I've worked in animal rescue for many years so it is nothing less than my duty to share these experiences which are similar to others that I've read. However this one falls far short from it's predecessors.

I ordered two bottles of this product in a different flavor. This flavor was so watered down tasting that I ended up giving one away to my neighbor for the same reason. I'm sticking with Red Bull. For me, at any price. Sorry Amazon Vine, but you lost on me.
This item should be called "Oil for my cat who loves it!She came back from her first flea infestation this year.

I was interested in a book about the early days of space travel and the idea that there could be advanced humans on another alien planet. This wasn't something as hard to get going than that. It just rambles from one uninteresting character after another, with no real plot! If anyone wants to read truly interesting sci-fi stories of this period without all the gore or gorey sex, check out Arthur C. Clarke, Robert Heinlein, H. Beam Piper, or other really good authors. Not even worth buying at half price.

If you do business with Amazon this is not the book for you. There should be some sort of disclaimer that it is strictly aimed at large commercial enterprises. The basic thesis - small companies have been getting lost in the maze of bureaucracy and tax havens over recent years and if they didn't get rid by now it's because there are no jobs to be found. That said, many ideas were interesting.
Perfect for our granddaughter who just started to sing like real adults. Great choice for her age group. Good price, too! Arrived in a timely manner also. Thank you Amazon.com!

When purchasing this game one would think you actually get the board from its package however they sent me a new version of game but no board!!! Very disappointed in Amazon on this item. Will never order again.
Don't get me wrong. It works like it's supposed to.

This is one of the worst examples of creative writing I have ever had to endure. All it was was, a lot of rambling and nothing at all resembling dialogue. At first there seemed promise with several stories being connected, but once you found out it wasn't so complicated, they fell apart. Nothing was believable in this book and certainly not well thought out. There are dozens of similar works on Amazon, buy them instead. Don't waste your money on this. It's junk.
This blanket was very thin compared to my current one. The print isn't as clear on it as the one that came with it. A waste of money. Just another example of getting what you paid for!
This works great on my Sony camera. The batteries are not as strong a battery life I would like but the price per function can't be beat. Great buy/value proposition. Thanks. :)

I thought this DVD might help me, I'm 65 and have high back pain. It didn't really offer me any relief. And the music was horrible! The instructions were not clear. I've used many pregnancy video tapes, but there is one very good one, by Yoga Zone that my mom has, She takes you down to your breathing space in 5 minutes with music. At least Yoga Zone's instructor moves like she has a life, and doesn't mumble all day long. So maybe if he did that, I'd try this.

The book could not be worse. Its content is weak and the English used is difficult to understand even for a native speaker. I would never recommend this book. It was actually painful on many different levels. If you bought it online, return it!

This was a very fast read. Although the subject matter - a teen trying to discover herself on her prom night after learning that she's being forced into an arranged marriage against her will - is interesting, all of the main characters are so shallow you don't care. One minute they're supposed to be fighting over who gets to walk down the aisle with the guy they didn't pick and next page, everything's fine.

I bought this as a replacement for the charger shipped with the Nikon S9200. The charging light blinks while connected. However, when you unplug it, the battery dies in less than 20 minutes. It doesn't seem like it's really a genuine Nikon.
This novel reminds me so much of an episode from Stargate SG-1. So many great possibilities with such an amazingly powerful plot.

I should have read the reviews before purchasing. This book has lots of cute illustrations, but as far as information provided it's not worth buying. Just a quick overview. Not really helpful to me. Good if you need help with your puppy or cat, though. Also, no advice for owners who own older pets, like my dog.
The battery works, but not as well of the one that came with my phone. Don't seem to last any longer.

We purchased this for our four year old's birthday party and he loved them! They are cute but the material is rather cheap. I expect something like these to last a week at the most. The fabric has already started coming off in about 3 spots. If you have money to burn, however, I'd buy them. Just don't expect them to stand up long term as your kids will tear it apart within an hour. These would be great for decorating table decorations, though!

The picture does not represent the book at all. It is only about the size of a paperback book! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS!! You get what you pay for I guess, and if I wasn't an insomniac this would be back in my garbage tomorrow.

After buying a refurbished HP dv6c8000 laptop, because the internal DVD drive was busted, I purchased this CD/DVD drive. It is supposed to be more compatible with Windows 7 but even though it installed and runs as promised, when trying to use any of my discs, including home copies made from iTunes, I'm told they are not compatible. This obviously indicates an issue within the disk itself. As you can clearly see in many other reviews, I've seen people receiving good quality product that has issues.

These are OK. I think for my purposes they're over-priced, but they should do and the rubber tip has survived 2 days of abuse. I'd have to see what else is available before considering them again. They're not like a nice pen, that's for sure. For light duty work, they work. Not that good as stylus pens though. They need some refinement in this respect. One thing I've noticed, just from looking at them and being told how well they write, isn't really their strong point.
Bought these pads over two years ago.
This is one of those books that had so many interesting elements but at some point, someone just lost interest or ran out of ideas. I wish I'd saved myself the hassle.

Love how light it is and that its adjustable. The bag fits a lot so you can travel with ease. I had one before but the metal frame broke for no reason and they were hard to replace, which I'm always scared of breaking. But this seems more sturdy! This is my 2nd one. My first lasted about 3 years until we moved cross country. I'll definitely replace when next time I move again. (:.
Love them. If they are in a perfect place, when driving you can't even tell what song I'm listening to!!! The cord could be just tad longer...

This has to be the biggest rip-off ever and I am so disgusted by this company! We had a problem when we first set it up. It could not print black ink at all! After several calls later they still kept asking for us our receipts from Amazon. They finally said they would send out a new printer. But then 2 days after receiving it, they called me again saying that their printer was broken, but did not work anyway, etc.
Not much to this one. I guess if it's free & offers challenge in one go, you're still interested. Otherwise pass.
Nice looking piece that sits flat in the kitchen. You need this for your countertop. Looks great and very sturdy.

The story was well written and interesting, I liked the development of character, how they all connected but did not fall in love. Too many characters being introduced for my taste, kept getting confused about who is who. The ending was a little drawn out, and some minor events could have been done differently. Overall it is well worth reading. It would be ideal as a movie at least. For me there were only 3 characters I didn't like enough to care about. I am definitely checking more by this author.

One of the great things about this book is that it attempts to weave a complex story from all those short stories. It's not perfect, but it's entertaining and worth reading. There's some good plot twists, particularly towards the end. The writing style isn't bad, there are few grammatical errors, only small continuity mistakes. Overall, at under $7, I consider this, more than likely, one of the better self-published ebooks on Amazon right now.

I had high hopes for this DVD and bought it after reading all of the good reviews. To my surprise, what arrived was actually quite boring. When the students sang these songs in concert - they were fantastic. After watching the performances on the DVD, you would think that the performers lacked chemistry or just weren't able to sing live. In a lot of cases (especially one song ) - there seemed no life left in their efforts. As far as singing skills go... yeah. Maybe it's me.
This product fits as expected, the only thing missing is there nothing under the lace which makes one looks just like other underwear.

I only just started using this product, and in the first few days my skin looked terrible. The dark marks underneath are already fading. This was a huge let down because so far it had a nice feel. But then as others have commented, there is oil coming out. I'm going back to Neutrogena products - their lines work great.
The product is great but the price we are paying was too high for a small box of 8 pens.

This is one of those stories that you just can't see coming, and it's really well written. I enjoyed the writing - it was tight prose, very clear, but not clunky at all. There are some minor things I would've tightened on here & there, so be aware when purchasing a paperback like this. Also, this won't work with Kindle apps or ereaders without an active web browser, since most pictures don't stay focused once in text. Overall nice story. I'd read more from this author. Definitely recommended.

In the first book of 'The Outsiders' series, Logan Blake and his adopted brother James come together to investigate their father's murder. As if all this is not enough, some very strange things are happening at the same time. The first book was a mystery but by the end it has turned into so much more, about demons living in Logan, witches, etc. It even includes hints that some members of the family have ties with those who killed their father when he still had life.

The book was well put together, and kept my attention. One of the characters got on my nerves a little bit, but that is just in this chapter as I go through all 3. All books are written for entertainment, so some people might not believe it. This one had me glued to every page right until near the end. If you have read any other James Patterson novels, then you will want this one. It has romance, mystery, suspense,intrigue, comedy, danger, & history.

This is a nice little book to use up some of the space on your coffee table. However, it doesn't have many recipes. Most are for things like "fruit salads" and I don't think that is anything but something you would make just out of seasoning. There may be one in there or maybe two with an American Indian flavor which might sound more interesting. The writing quality isn't good enough either. It reads very choppy. There's not much emotion here.

The book was really disappointing. I'm not sure what the hype is over it. It doesn't read like a novel, but more of a bunch pages with a few sentences thrown in. Very disconnected. Not very well written at all. Maybe I missed something, since it was required reading for school.

These are nice looking phones but after one month they started to show a "yellow" background. Called tech support only for the help center person who didn't know much about phonesturing. He told me there were no firmware changes in this product. If it says on your box there is updating, go there.

My dog loves squeaky toys and especially enjoys chewing on the fuzzy rope toy so I bought him one of these. He played with it for four days - five day max. Then he stopped playing with it. The squeaking stops at the first squeak but otherwise seems to be fine. I've taken his back off and have a regular old rubber frisbee. It's been over six months now and he still plays with, chews on, sleeps with. So not good if your dogs tend to go through squeakers.

I like both the old and new editions of this book by Dr. James Brown. It gives a good feel for what it was like, without too much drama. Brown is an interesting character whose writing has taken on more importance in recent years.

Love the product. Its strong and durable. Has some great features. I use it at my office where there is not a lot of room for an air purifier. Very satisfied with this purchase. The price beats all others that offer similar features because It does exactly what its supposed to do. No frills, just pure, high quality air!!! Thanks Honeywell - good job again!!

This is a good price for the high quality of this product, and it makes it very easy to find things in your bag. I used mine when going out hiking so that all my items where easily accessible. You definitely need two to wrap up most things. The material is pretty sturdy as well. Very happy customer! Definitely recommend them. Pros:Easy to get aroundStrong constructionMultiple colors. Good amount of stuff. Nice drawstringConsNone really

The stories are good, but the printing isn't all that high quality, so some of her photos don't come out clear enough. This would be my first choice for someone who wants to make a calendar from scratch on their computer, as well as do something with it. I just wish there were more pages in each calendar. Also, a lot of them have holidays that start or end during certain months.

The first time i received 2 of the bottles had leaked. After contacting Amazon they sent them to me right away! They arrived in perfect condition, but only 3 or 4 worked. So while I'm pleased with Amazon, I was disappointed with these bottles.

I gave this three stars because it does the job. The handle is sturdy and has a nice grip. But, as other reviewers have noted, the blade part of this thermometer doesn't stay in place very well. It will fall out if you bend it. So, while this thing seems like its well-designed, it's not working well for my needs. If you're looking to use your Crock-Pot crock pot with these, you'll be disappointed.

First off the product was very simple to install and program. I have a two story house with wood stove on one side of it that goes into my basement. It also has propane gas in every room including garage/utility room/bedroom which are all near end fireplaces. This device is only installed under 1 half hour out by myself. The second level down went faster but still took less than 15 minutes. Now I'm back home enjoying cold air blowing all through downstairs to take care of.

The product description gives a very good idea of this book's overall content, but I still feel the need to address it. First off, there are no detailed drawings of any kind, nor is it particularly well structured in that sense. It would probably have been better titled "The Art & Artifice Of Painting A Car With Laser". Second, most vehicles appear to be painted with black enamel paints which has absolutely nothing on their color depth.

This cover fits my Weber Performer perfectly. I was concerned that it wouldn't be big enough for it. After putting the last grill in my driveway to dry out, this covered everything and stayed on without a problem! Looks great!!!!! Would buy another one of these.

These pens run out much too quickly for the price. There are other pens that I have used and loved such as Cross or Parker, but I'm now a little bit disenchanted with this brand. They don't last very long. The quality of them isn't all bad. It could just be because they run out, which is really frustrating when you need more ink so badly. Also, I've had several come broken from shipping (not due to how they're packaged -- seems pretty solid), although none were leaking, not even a drop.
The case didn't fit for a 3g, and the design on it isn't very nice. Very poor quality. Donw waste your money.

I bought this hoping it would be more like the one my sister had. This is not a "snapon" at all! It takes several minutes to put on. The material of the cover itself seems very thin and cheap. Would not recommend. Look for the old one. My daughter was disappointed, so were we.

I had to buy an additional adapter because we never used it since then on our new computer, therefore the warranty ended and there is nothing the company could do. I wouldn't advise anyone not have any problems with this machine, but if you do you'll be stuck without a computer:-(-

I bought this camera when my kids were very young - well past their "baby years." All thought it was perfect for them because they could take pictures on the go! Within a short time, however, one lens stopped opening. It has not happened with any of our other cameras and we use these things day in and out, but only occasionally, and never dropped or damaged from any distance.
This is a great product. The colors look very natural and don't over power. If you have sensitive eyes like my husband you can wear whatever color eyeliner works on your eyes.
The case does fit but the material is very cheap and already has some scratches on it. I guess you get what you paid for!!!! :( : ( :(

I had to remove the upper fan cover of my computer just for me because it doesn't have a lot of room underneath it. And this product is not too well made. The metal has begun to bend and its beginning to make horrible noises. But at the price, what did I expect? :) Pro: CheapGreat priceComfortable fitCons: Its starting to break/bendNot so good quality or build

We had this toy many years ago when they first came out and my sons absolutely loved it. It is nice to share with future generations. Very easy to use. The only thing worth knocking off a star on was no on/off switch. You can turn it up side down but the batteries get cold fast. Not sure why, maybe the switch got loose or something? Either way, still works. He has always been obsessed with cars so it's great having him be able to play as he's getting older.

Item arrived timely but once installed wasn't able to use tablet at all due to a rainbow pattern when in use. Could see light thru shield from top or back viewing angle. Just can't give any stars. Will be returning item. 
 Rating: 1.

I wish someone had warned me before buying this. Not only did the author have no idea where to begin with basic cooking basics, she failed at every turn after even beginning to write. Instead of giving helpful advice or a recipe for any type of meat (chicken, pork etc) but rather throwing in some completely random information that may just as well be taken from an online dating site.

My wife and I love everything from the show but this soundtrack is just not what we expected. The one good song in it was "How to Save A Life." It wasn't bad. Other than that, nothing stands out as good. We will probably give this away unless we find a version with more of those beautiful songs. For $10, it's ok. If you want something that has all of their hit songs, buy them.
This little appliance was purchased with a gift card from My wife and Daughter. It arrived well packed by Amazon. All that happened when opening the box was one plug went bad.
The book was okay, but the story line kind of dragged and really didn't grab my attention. Glad it is free! :)

The characters are a little too silly but its okay for the intended audience. I would recommend this to people with that target audience as it is not terribly deep. It has an interesting story line if you allow yourself some good light humor. No more than that. Good price compared to buying at any store.
it is ok if we want just to talk but other then that too much of the same thing from our society today.
They work as advertised...at first. By week 2 or 3, not so much. Good concept but poor design. I'll switch back when these are finally garbage. My wife likes them though.
Very disapointed with what i received,no expiration date stated on product. Was not informed until after order was submitted,if this product has an expiration, how old.
At this price point these should be good earphones. These broke after only a couple months of use. Very disappointing.

The first time the unit was used, it worked well for approximately ten minutes, after which when trying to start it, nothing happened. We followed all instructions; unplugged the unit, tried changing plugs in various locations of the outlet, and finally called DeWalt's technical support line. All they said is that it's possible our outlet works too hot, or might not have a ground at all. I've never heard such blatant disregard from any company, even their warranty service.
The price is a lot less expensive to buy from Amazon than other sellers. I bought about 10 rolls to keep my small garden fresh and protected. It kept the plants nice until they died.

This is not high end furniture - but it's very nice for the price. If you have a small apartment it would be perfect. I just needed something inexpensive and to fit in my closet. Good for holding shoes or towels - anything else wouldn't work on this top. Its great when someone can't wait to get up all the way. My husband even thinks its pretty neat! I didn't give five stars because there's no solid wood support. A light piece of cardboard under each shelf would make it perfect.
My daughter received this as a gift, and it came in multiple pieces along with no instructions on how to put together. I am currently trying to find ways to fix the broken pieces.
Too many misspelled words.
I cannot fathom how such poor design can occur.
Did not work at all as advertised. My guppies got sick every single time.
The product is what he needed to combat foot fungus. It really works.
I ordered this product after the one that came with my phone broke. The length is perfect and works great. No complaints so far.
I bought one of these products about a month ago, and have already thrown away both bottles. The first day that we put it on my dog, she scratched her neck excessively.

This was my first Lisa Kleypas book, but I've recently purchased some of her previous novels (Axeem, Murder On The Minds). In addition, because she writes very light, easy reads, when you have time to read, you can get through quite quickly.

I love my iPad and have used it daily for over a year. It has been dropped, left out on the floor with liquids in it, tossed around from room to room, but overall not much wear, tear, or other damage. All because of this case. PROS:This case is very protective. My daughter loves putting her iPad through some kind of torture test before sending it off into harms way. Not a big fan of that one, though.
Not enough background on many topics and the book jumps around way too often. But it's good for light reading if you want something just for fun.

I just finished reading this book on my Kindle. It is a good mystery with historical elements but in that the plot starts to become confusing. The characters are somewhat likeable, though sometimes they seem a little unrealistic and over-confident. I found myself trying so hard to get into the story it was quite annoying! The main male who runs from his life all of her life suddenly falls back into it...for no reason I can fathom.

I found that while the story was not bad, it wasn't very exciting. It just didn't keep me interested. There is a lot of killing and torture in this book. If that's what you are looking for then go ahead to read this. But otherwise, look else where. I'd rather spend my time reading something like John Grisham or James Patterson or any other good authors. And don't get me started on Clive Cussler! Read about half through before throwing away.
This works great with 3 large cats....

I don't own this item and don't need it. I simply want to warn you. This product is listed with the Garmin StreetPilot 295WT which it does NOT work with. Not happy at all since they did list that product. I'm out $80. It cost me $15 shipping for a return so guess I'll keep it, but if this is how Amazon sellers are going about listing items, please take heed of this. It's totally false advertising.

This is one of the worst books I've ever looked at and read. It's just a waste of time. Save yourself 4 days with your friend (who isn't reading as well), read something, anything! You will actually learn more watching paint dry. In all seriousness.

I got mine yesterday, I'm giving it 3.5/5.0 stars. It does the job, which is to charge my phone.. The charger itself has several flaws that are not really related to charging an ipad, as mentioned below. BUT they are/were significant problems for me when I tried to put this in a Belkin Grip Case..And here comes another flaw.

My dog didn't have the interest to even get close enough to smell it. He did like how it smelled when he was a younger puppy, though I couldn't give him anything with that smell. But as you might expect, I've since been able to find something from another manufacturer. So, this one is sitting in my office being forgotten about and left open.
It was a struggle to finish and I didn't enjoy it for the price I paid nor did it hold my attention.

i bought this CD a month ago and only two songs have been used but the rest is garbage, it will not play in my cd player nor can I transfer it. if you want REAL dance music download any of the songs she did for her other cds. THIS IS NOT GOOD DANCE MUSIC, IT HAS NOTHING TO OFFER, DON'T waist your money. i'll be sending mine back just like everyone else.
This one started off ok, then got really slow as far as character development went.
Not sure if it's exactly as advertised, but works in charging Samsung products and comes with two USB cables.

i found it boring. i'm glad it was free, wouldn't have payed to buy it. there were a handful of useful words but not much more. the only reason I'm giving this two stars is because it's well written and has some helpful information. just not what I needed.
I am an experienced knitter, but bought this as a gift. The instructions are written poorly without adequate explanation.

I really wanted to enjoy this book, but the author's style just left me wanting a refund. It's not as well developed nor as interesting that some of her other books are. If it had been edited for clarity and flow, maybe it would have worked. As it was, she gave no clear instructions about anything at all. In fact, most chapters didn't seem to even relate to each other.

This product did not even fit my cell phone. I was very disappointed because I've never had a problem with Amazon before this. They must have gotten to many returns in the last few days. Never Again will i shop here. Just going into town. I could go on. But why should we all take our chances when ordering online? You can save yourself quite alot of money by buying it locally. We know what it is really supposed to be for, so no need to overcharge.

Got this because it was cheap. First of all, the cord is not long enough to even put my computer at an angle. On top if that, when I try and angle it, nothing makes contact, so only one side can work. Definately a waste of money.
It is a short story, no real insight into the subject. The only good thing about this book was how quickly it ended.
Not at all what I expected. This book is only 40 pages long. A very short book. Don't waste your money.

The material was pretty comfortable however after one washing it did not retain its original comfort and feel as the other reviews stated. I purchased another item in a different color at the same time so we will see how that goes. If both are as good or better then this purchase would be well worth it. Not too happy with Amazon on this one.

While the book does provide interesting tidbits, as many other reviewers do, I have to wonder if this was ever proof-read. There are some very awkward sentences and word choices. Some of it makes no sense. The same is true about the way that several phrases like "all they wanted to do were to get laid," or words with similar meaning but different meanings in a sentence. It doesn't sound good, even for fiction.

The light falls onto my keyboard, rather than lighting up each key. No wonder it's only $15. I have now thrown it away. In the box you see two small metal hooks to attach it to, but there are none in mine.

I ordered this game for my husband who is a fan of Jam. At first when he installed it we could not get it to work because he did everything according to the instructions and then would only get 3 out of 5 stars in rating. He called us and told me that one of his computers wasn't getting a good signal on their Internet connection/network. The computer was brand new with no external hard drives.

This book is a must have before you take your first step on learning the theory behind game theory. I found it lacking in depth - but then, I'm neither an astrophysicist nor mathematician. It was nonetheless very interesting to read and get some idea of what goes into making AI successful. Of course, playing games are required for this. After all, we don't expect robots controlling robotic drones to play chess either. Even so, it's a great reference work which should help anyone who wants to further their understanding beyond games.

I thought the book had been opened and ripped out. This should not happento an owner of a new book. And it was advertised as good. Very poor handling by Amazon. I wrote them about it. They are supposed to reimburse you for cost of purchase. We never got one word. We would have purchased other DVD'S at Amazon but now we know why they don't show you more than 3 or 4 at a time. This whole experience made this buyer VERY reluctant to EVER order from Amazon.

Its just not as durable as my orginal screen cover that came with this phone 3 years earlier. It broke off in less then two weeks so now need to replace it. Still using it. Not quite sure why these things happen.

I have had this coffee maker since September 2013. Within the last 60 days and less than 100 cups, it has begun to leak at the bottom. It only leaked a little when pouring but not enough for us to feel comfortable with our water supply. We tried leaving more coffee, we turned off and on multiple times. Finally got tired of mopping up so called customer service (who would never answer their phone).

this camera has two problems 1. the flash pops up and doesn't stay down, 2. i found this out by putting it into my purse with a credit card and when you pull it back out, there are batteries all over your hand 3. as well, it's too heavy to use comfortably in 1 hand. if you're going on vacation, just buy an insurance plan from costco for 2 years of coverage.

I had to do a bunch of research looking for the perfect ottoman cover for my sofa. After reading all kinds of reviews, this one in black is perfect. The quality seems sturdy and it looks great sitting on top of my couch. Would recommend that you give it close attention when assembling because it's somewhat difficult getting them on. There are NO instructions included. It's not impossible, just time consuming. It fits perfectly with our couch though. I'd definitely buy another if we ever get more furniture. 
 Rating: 4.

If youre tired of paying upwards of $10 for 1 screen protector, and dont wanna have to change them, than you might want to avoid this product. My first use left a few scratches. So its on now....will see how they last but so far so good. Definitely would recommend.
This freezer bowl seems great. The price and the size of the storage area. I wish they would have disclosed if it's dishwasher or not but I don't want to chance it.

Exactly what I needed. My new LG monitor fits on it easily & looks awesome in the bedroom. It's sturdy and a great price. The product itself was shipped fast, packaged nicely, instructions were easy to follow, good product! Thanks! :)

I have a German Shepard that loves to chew. This was the answer - after one chew he could not get enough. I've been giving these bones for about six months now and he still goes wild over them. Every time he's done chewing it I'll put some peanut butter or dry dog food with treats inside of them then let him rip into it, it's great! And my dogs always beg me when I'm in the kitchen. No more messy scraps sitting around in their bowls.

This is a good product. the reason I gave it 3 stars was that this cover doesn't fit tight enough to put on or take off. My husband had no issues with it. But if your looking for something more solid and durable, you'll have to look elsewhere though. Over all-good product so far. Only had it about 2 weeks now. It looks nice & it's better than other cheaper covers. Great price too! :) just wished I'd spent more. Love my Prime shipping options. Thanks Amazon!

I bought this thinking it'd be a better alternative to the more pricey brands. It lasted only about two weeks. Even when it worked, there's something wrong with it. There is constant static and popping. When it's on, you can see the light behind my TV from underneath. The volume doesn't turn up very high at all.
This was okay... it's not like the other books I've read by this author. She is definitely a new fan favorite. :o)
I'm very satisfied so far. It arrived on time as expected. I've had it for about 2 weeks now. It's working perfectly. Good value. I'd recommend it.

This was just what we wanted. We really like it. It looks nice sitting next to our tv and works well. There were no issues. Price is great. Very happy with this purchase. We will definitely use Amazon again. Thank you. Don

I like these but they are not very soft in the center as other reviewers mentioned. They have a little more support than others that I've tried but for people with sore necks this thing can ache after wearing it all day.

I have had this same type of unit for about 10 years and love them. I also own the small version and use it regularly. This larger model seems well built. Only has two heat settings but they are much more comfortable than all other similar products I've tried. The auto shut off works well, although is probably just as efficient to keep turning the grill on with a light turn if there isn't anything being grilled. Also be sure to follow instructions"
This movie was just plain awful. I found it boring and the acting not very good, in my opinion. Do not waste your time on this one.

Love this product. I do have to admit it takes a lot for me though. It seems like I have to use it about twice every day but it's so worth it! The first time putting in on my dogs back and he didn't even get all the way under one leg, just enough that made him uncomfortable then I was able to put another coat on. His legs were covered well in no time. You don't need to treat them with anything, they're really soft afterwards.

I purchased the Sony VCR SLV-RC18 for its price and ability to transfer digital content over coaxial cable directly to HDTV screens. It worked flawlessly but the picture quality was not very sharp. The tuner is better than on my Samsung Plasma TV, but still suffers from interference when scanning non-scrambled channels. Not really a big deal considering that there are fewer stations broadcast in HD. Setup of this unit went smoothly.

i would recommend this for anyone in a small space and want to get rid of that cable box clutter. the picture is clear and crisp. No more moving around an extra box. Easy set up as well! The remote control works really well too. I have only had mine about 3wks but so far no problems! :) I love it. Very nice product, very sleek too, great design & overall appearance.
They just aren't really made that well. It's not as bad if I can find them at Goodwill for 50 cents. There are several others sold by them.

The battery worked for one charge. By the morning it was dead. I did nothing but plug and unplug, so there isnt anything to keep in contact with while charging. There is no way of knowing if this will continue working. I'm a little disappointed because we loved our last headset. We are hoping that this product just has bad luck. Will update. But till then avoid it. It's not worth it... and you pay what you get.. it's an awful experience all around.

I use a wireless phone system for my home calls and have experienced problems with people breaking up when talking on the phone. Not good during work hours. This works fine but at this price it might be worth buying just to see. But they do charge $10 to test if it works.

I like this product. I'm not sure yet if the results are worth it or not. Will have to wait and see. It seems rather expensive but that's where most of these things are. I've had good skin for a number years so it's hard finding help now. The product does seem nice though. Leaves no greasy feel on your skin. Hopefully, I'll see more results. Only time will tell. My hands do get chapped in the winter. Since using it, my fingers haven't stopped getting dry. That's disappointing.
I read every single review. I'm not sure why people gave this "toy" five stars. My 4 year old daughter loves it.

My order from amazon.com was placed two weeks before Easter. When they arrived, I just didn't have time to wrap them and send them-so we ended up eating one piece as a special treat. We found several unchewed bits in the package - they had probably been eaten already. We ate them, but I'm not sure why there were pieces that weren't chewed-up. They looked like a really good candy when I bought them. The outside wrapper did seem very crunchy though, even without broken pieces.
We use this tray at our breakfast station all day long.

I enjoyed this book but thought it was extremely predicable. If you like romance books though that is not an issue. My favorite of her works so far however has been A Marriage Made in Texas which makes me feel compelled to read this author.

This book is very informative. I particularly enjoyed all the information concerning the different types of plants in the garden as well as their specific applications. The photos are also clear and helpful. This particular edition was first published back around 1980. It has lost its color pages, which makes it a little hard to make out some details such as which flowers or herbs were used. There seems to be a lot more written info than there used to be, but you cannot always tell how detailed certain entries are.
This unit never worked properly from day one.

Purchased this for a gift and my son loved it. Only complaint is that you have to put in the batteries but other than that, it works great right out of box. Great idea by KidDoh, we would definitely purchase again. Love these things! :)

This really works. I was concerned about using any product on my cat but decided to give it a try. It took no time at all and there were very little fleas. He is still having them though! The only drawback that we have had so far are the bugs in our home though. It's been awful and he's even eaten three or four now. We don't know yet how they will bite him now because he has never touched these things before.
They come apart very easily, however, they serve as a great teething toy and keep my cat busy. He uses them often whenever he gets one under his tongue! Very cute!!   Rating: 4.

In my experience, most digital audio interfaces simply don't sound good. Too quiet and no real high end in these things. I bought the E07K-USB so i could finally use a pre-amp, since my laptop came with only an optical out headphone jack. This thing sounds like it's eating my ear drums. Even with it turned all the way up, there is no bass. Not recommended. Look elsewhere. Spendy for nothing. Should have purchased something else.

The description says that there are 8 items included in the package! I only received 4. Very disapointed to say the least. Now have a couple of days without a product and cannot find a phone number for customer service anywhere on the internet!Buyer beware!!!
These were great. No one would ever know they don't come in an amazon's regular package like all other packaging does.

I got this for our first baby and it worked great until my husband accidentally dropped it. The plastic has cracked all around the camera lens but that's mostly because of one drop. It seems to me that they should make these cases sturdier. If your phone is dropped, you lose a corner or front cover will be cracked. In all, we have two different models with the same problem in each case. I guess we'll try making new ones when Otterbox gets their act together. 
 Rating: 2.
These came in broken pieces inside packaging.

I bought this based on positive Amazon reviews which made me feel much better about my purchase. And it was a bad decision. It is very difficult turning off the machine, and no matter what setting you set (and why do we need to turn down sound levels? This isn't for an orchestra). The noise level seems to increase each time you push any button. There may some way of lowering or increasing it, but again, not easy to find. I'm going back to using another machine.

I had a very similar item that lasted for over 8 years. These seem to be of great quality. The only issue is if the dog pulls on it and catches her nails in it, they still get caught. But she just gets another one after every time but so far so good. She doesn't have any accidents at all. Hopefully, this will make things move faster. I don't want to hurt her.
I love these pillows. The colors are very rich and the texture is great. They add a little life to my room while being fun at the same time. I highly recommend them.

My dog loves these bones. They are easy for her to chew and hold up very well. Great product, my little girl likes them. Very good value, much better than buying them at the pet store. Will buy again when we run out. I am giving this product five stars. It came on time as always from Amazon. You can't go wrong here.
Not quite what I was looking for but it looks great in my bathroom. The quality and price were better than other similar items. Would recommend.

I got the product by USPS but it was not very sturdy. The whole thing felt like something that could be damaged. Also, we had to take our tablet apart before putting this in or our screen kept popping off. This is a bad product. Do Not get it, just pay $5 and buy one yourself at a store if you're really looking for one. It's not worth it. It would have been more cost effective than this, however I'm glad I didn't spend much money on this.
It came new and worked right away. A little slow compared to USB 2.0 but, overall, worth the money if you're going USB. Recommend it. ( Don't forget a Thunderbolt cable too. I didn't know that.

I will be returning this product - it comes with the old style of the cover which does not lay flat. My first kindle fire and my last and definitely my last. I'll buy something else where things have been addressed. If they fix it, ill buy it. Otherwise I'm pretty sure i'll send mine back.

After using this charger for about a week I can say it has worked well. You really don't notice any difference in the charging speed from OEM to this charger. As someone said earlier, be careful not too touch your battery with one hand while you are reattaching it. It definitely feels like cheap plastic, but at $7 what do I want?For $10 or less it's great.

This is a well made product. I was very disappointed to find that the case does NOT fit my HP DV7 inch computer. The quality of this product however cannot be questioned. It has all the protection needed for your investment in your investment, including being water tight as well without leaving marks on it. If you have a specific model or size please check and double check. Because if not it will definitely not work out for you.

These batteries have a life and voltage that exceed standard alkaline batteries. The manufacturer does not acknowledge this. I used two of these in my flash unit and, yes, the battery has to be pulled out every time one is inserted. I'm sending mine back.

The quality is so cheap that it won't fit on my iPad mini. I am very disappointed with the case. I thought you pay too much for an Ipad mini case and then this one doesn't fit. It should have cost $5 not $24. I will definitely returning this.

Nice set. These were for my brother as a gift. I gave it 4 stars because of the fact that they have no lids. They look very beautiful on him. Great quality. Arrived quickly. Very happy. Would definitely order from Blendtec again.
Works great to keep the squirrels off our feeders. No problems at all. It is well made and should last for years of use. I highly recommend it. Great product. Thanks Amazon & Hirt's.

For me...Pass on this.

One of our pieces became all frayed and just looked awful after two weeks. But when worn casually, its amazing.   Rating: 4.0   My boyfriend works most mornings so he needs something to keep him warm which is why we got this, he does not love how much warmer his head sweats,although i still gave it 4 stars.

I bought this book because of the ratings it received so far. After reading half of it, I'm still not sure how I feel about it. It is very short and most chapters are only 1-2 pages long. Don't bother. You can get everything you need to know on youtube. They just won't make money off an ebook for sale. This goes a long way in explaining why we don't like Amazon's Kindle format, but that's another review.
The first camera we purchased was excellent but this one came to us defective in two ways.1. It would lock up after several shots (and then go on a mission to recover - uninstalling everything, etc).

The only things of value on this thing were the two different type of USB to mini-USB. It was missing my own adapter. I wasn't expecting it but I didn't purchase a refurbished product either. I'm not sure if all products purchased through Warehouse Deals are refurbished or used. It shipped quickly and arrived in good condition so that saved me from getting ripped off. However, when plugged into any system that has some sort of memory card, it's dead. Just like that.

This book was so horrible. The main character is a complete idiot. She kept screwing up at all the stupidest things that normal people wouldn't even do in any other situation, she constantly runs into situations where someone tells her something and doesn't bother to listen or read back before deciding what to do. It seems as though there are only 2 characters in this book, one that I could ever imagine not being friends with but somehow they have a crush on each other. The 2nd isn't explored enough.

When I bought it, was expecting a hard cover book. Turns out to be a "soft cover" book with paper back. Not worth the money. Should not have ordered it. If it says something about hard cover i would assumed that meant hard.

Not worth the money I spent on it in my humble opinion, was hoping for more details of the characters as well as having more recipes from scratch and a list with meal plans. As usual some of his books had great pictures in them!

This is by far the best coffee I've ever had. Not too rich, not too bitter, very smooth and rich. The price may be high for some, but I think it's well balanced between quality brewed, robust coffee. Definitely recommend.
This product provides a great height for feeding my dog. It wipes easily - much better than other pet food products that don't have a material cover

They don't hold a charge very long at all. If they used batteries in them would give us allot more power on our steps. But for what we want these don't seem to get close enough. My wife likes her "clickers" that click with each step from hers and mine are almost 3 years old.
It was good, not quite as good as the original. Still liked it more than some of what's out there these days.
The content is quite intriguing and informative. However, it left me feeling unfulfilled at its finish.

The first song I heard from this album was "Connection." That is when it all clicked! This is the most original rock sound I've ever heard. It reminds me of Led Zeppelin or a cross between Neil Young and Billy Squier (yum) with some Pink Floyd thrown in for good measure. Great songwriting & playing. As usual, lead singer Scott Gorham has an awesome voice that soars above every other part of his band.

I have two of these cameras and it took over six hours to get them online. If you intend on using the web interface, forget it. It's one hour drive from home, another is around an hour, so if you're in a pinch for time (like when I'm at my parents or working away from a computer), go with this. Otherwise, you might as well just hook up your camera directly (again, it's not hard wired in) to wherever and use their free app.
My main problem with the product is not actually regarding it's design. Rather, I've found something about which I am unsatisfied.
Best product that I have found to keep my fish from dying. They all swim and breathe well at levels much higher than with other products.

I was so disappointed. How disappointing. At first all the characters were great, then they turned into caricatures? The story jumped from one character to another without continuity. The setting went back and forth in time which would have been interesting, but only caused confusion more so. Characters are completely underdeveloped. I'm sorry about the other reviewers who thought this book was wonderful, but don't waste your time. If we can expect anything good out of a James Patterson novel it is his books for kids. They are absolutely delightful.

I was getting quite tired of taking out all the trash bags everytime we have company. Our dog eats so fast, you can easily run through 2 rolls of garbage bags. The bag saver worked like advertised the first day, no more bags, which means less trips back home with dirty hands.

I have been a big fan of Nora Roberts for many years. But this was not good. There wasn't enough humor or charm to make it readable. The characters were one dimensional and the dialog didn't ring true. It made me cringe, especially about half way through. A disappointment from someone that has produced so much. This is definitely her worst effort.

I'm a big HP fan. I've owned quite a number of laser printers. However, this is the first product that I will return before it's had its chance to work. The wifi function has quit on me. I tried everything - unplugged and restarted, downloading drivers. There are no instructions. This thing just doesn't work at all. Don't waste your time or money. Not worth half that.

The quality of the poster and paper is very poor - it shows every imperfection in even light color. I guess it does for the sake of a kids room, but not so great at showing off pictures. Just disappointed.
It was not like the picture. The cover came dirty an I tried to wash it but that did nothing.

Like the other reviewer, this adapter started out doing ok, but with no warning, it will now not recognize my laptop and I have to plug in another one or find a replacement at a local store where I'll be guaranteed to get a quality device.
I thought at first that it would be great because we could get 3 different vibrations but after only 5 uses they quit working on one and won't work on another one. We changed out brand new batteries.

Did not charge my iPhone 5s. Took over a week to get as I ordered on September 9th and they said it would go out by mid November. Finally got it today February 2nd with delivery estimate January 3rd or 4th. This is very disappointing for me since I'd been waiting patiently after watching the item until this day instead buying from elsewhere. I'm still upset that there was none available at local stores but Amazon did offer a refund. At least I'll have something when these two USB chargers quit working.

What a waste of time, this thing doesn't work and no one else can tell me what I am doing wrong! It is not possible to figure it out because it does not work! There are so many programs on the market if that helps. Not worth your time to buy it. Please do yourself a favor but something better. I will be shipping mine back! Do not, repeat, DO Not!! This may have been just good enough for the folks at NASA who was working with these kinds of things.

This is probably my one issue with this book (which was a real downer because I'd really wanted to love it). The recipes are great, and the concept of using all natural ingredients makes them seem more wholesome than many "healthy" cookbooks. I have done quite a few meals from here that turned out great. However there were several things which really bothered me:1. For example, I'm not fond of cooking rice in coconut milk, but that's what they do.

Not enough action and not very interesting. I do have to say that for some readers this book may hold more interest than it did on my part but really the title caught me off guard. The story starts with a beautiful wife being killed by a psychotic killer who then goes about trying to destroy those around him as he murders every man in sight, no exceptions. As if that's not bad enough, there is the woman of course who's husband has just been murdered and the son who would be dead soon.

The description says it's a complete package. That should have been my first warning sign. When I opened the box, and found just an ordinary plastic case that only had room for one of the discs inside, with no additional storage space, I'm not sure why anyone would pay extra to get anything extra. If you really want this movie, go ahead and order it. Just don't expect much in terms of how it will look.
There where some scratches upon receipt which wasn't too much of an issue or concern for me.

When I first received my Ipod, it would play songs and then stop for a few seconds. Sometimes while playing any songs, the ipod froze, and froze after several seconds. I'm very disappointed in this product, especially for its price. It was supposed to have been replaced by Apple, but no luck. Hopefully they will fix this, since at least one other review indicated that it didn't work. The company is great as far as customer service goes.
Not quite what i expected. The collar does work. It doesn't hurt or harm anything. Just needs to be a bit stronger.

I thought this would have been a fun read, but instead it was just about useless and so poorly written that I'm amazed it's still being read. As one person said in another review, "reading is an escape". How many more ways can you say that? The story isn't even good, what little there is. When trying to get into the characters, they are mentioned then never talked about. It reads as though the author had pages of plot he couldn't use because writing them would've ruined the plot.

This is good if you are working alone without other help. I bought it so i could easily set up a work in progress and get the pictures off my CF card. However with any image capture device there has to be some way of setting it up. In the manual or online setup instructions they say go into camera settings on your computer.. well you will need more than that..

Just a few minutes ago this review was titled as follows...I am only writing to say THIS IS NOT MY FIRST BOOK BY DONALD McLEAN.When i received the book and opened it, first thing that caught my eye is the front picture of Ronald Reagan in his White House office with the President's picture...That should tell you everything about how i feel about the man!Next i noticed many different quotes were taken out from other books in this book.
The product itself does what it's supposed to.
I love the original and love this one. Some songs are better than others but overall it has good songs. This one is awesome because it's new music. My husband likes it.
This is just what we wanted. It works really well on our bread machine.
Not exactly what i expected. There are 4 pieces you have pull out and place on your kindle fire. Two sides went over my kindle, leaving me with bubbles. When placed they did come right out.

I am not sure which is worse - the poor performance or poor design of Sony's product. My unit has been plagued with problems since day one: the DVD tray would repeatedly reject either brand new DVDs or even my old ones, when first put in. After hours on their customer service, Sony, they finally came up w/ a workaround for this issue, but required me to go through three more rounds of emails before Sony agreed to ship out one replacement unit.

I love the concept of this, but my dog seems to really dislike his bath. He can just keep trying to get away from me. But it's nice when it drys. Seems like it's still warm even 2 hours later. Maybe because all he wants is out of water! It was hard enough for him under water without having a bath, so this may work better in that case, I'm not sure. Not sure, we will see. But, it's nice, no more wet spots on furniture.

There is something to reading a well-done horror story, if at the same time, one wants it for its own merits - this doesn't quite make it. This wasn't an easy read in my opinion, but more of a chore. The premise was good and I had high hopes that it would have some meat on it. What started out as somewhat humorous grew tedious and, by about half, I couldn't put up with any more. It became ridiculous watching Jake do so many stupid things.

We purchased several different models for our young daughter in preparation for a vacation. The quality is ok and she has now learned how to put things back together without instructions. She also likes this kind of "stuffies.

This cd is horrible. Just as the review above says it should be titled "The End of..." Not just a bad cd, but an awfull one at that. I bought this because there were good reviews and I did not agree. They are either people who like korn or have no taste in music. Korn used to blow the other band away, now they suck ass really bad. If your going into buy this CD you probably already had the other albums, just don't bother.
This product performs as expected.

The price is excellent. I would never have guessed how nice they are and the great sound quality. Definitely a good buy! We did not think we needed to replace our older speakers for something less expensive... but once you try them, you'll be happy with them. My husband loves them so much, he can even listen while he's working out in his garage without disturbing me. It makes him happy which is what counts. :)

A bit disappointed in this album. In the early days of The Strokes, I loved their style on songs like Saturday Afternoon and Sunday Morning. This album just seems kinda weak to me. After all, it was only a few years ago that they were one of my favorite bands. What happened? Maybe there was too much pressure from the radio station executives at the time. As for all those reviewers who say they're still addicted to "The Scientist" or "Trainspotting," well, come on.

I'll only review what I've read, nothing that is spoiler. As far as fantasy goes, this is a pretty good read. The author does capture the essence of the "young love/infatuation" we all have at some points.

While this has some interesting information about how and why certain foods are put into different drinks etc, it becomes boring almost immediately with the endless listing off names from history that make up these drinks. To me, each drink is more confusing then helpful, as a beginner in many respects.
