A bit flimsy, however the plastic was heavy duty, thick and I never had any issues with leaks. I'd would buy this again.

This book was a disaster. It has to be the worst work I've ever had the privilege of reading by an accomplished author. It's so bad - there's really no good way I could describe it. The story line is ridiculous and the characters are laughable. If you like your stories with lots and lots and loads of sex, not much else going on, poor writing skills, and terrible story, then this one might interest you. There's nothing redeeming in it.

When the product does not work, I would like to know that it was a defective purchase. My granddaughter was very excited when she received this package. She charged up and turned on the keyboard. Unfortunately for her, as soon as you put your device in any dock or anything else where the power plug is located, the keyboard did nit work at all. Now I'm stuck with what appears have been wasted Christmas gifts. :( Please respond. Very disappointed Amazon customer!

I have two cats. One is a very playful and playful, but the other one hates toys to play with. This toy was perfect for both of them. He liked it too. When he first showed this out his eyes lit up. It held up pretty well. We went through it in about 10 minutes. But if your cat shows interest in toys, get one worth getting! It's well made, so that you can keep replacing parts as need be.

My cats hate this food. If they like it, others will love it, and you have to put it in a separate container. I am stuck with 10 pounds of food that is too expensive for the cat to eat! Save your money. There are much less expensive, healthier foods out there.
Good start to a series. Easy read with likable characters. Somewhat predictable, but it's always fun for escape fiction. Enjoyed reading it!
This is a great product when you can get it assembled. After taking nearly 2 1/2 hours with two people trying (and failing) to assemble it, we discovered that one side wouldn't "snap together.
Good fit for the Canon GX100 so far no complaints. Very good value and easy ordering thru Amazon. Would recomend this product without hesitation. Will order again in future if needed.

This is an incredible remote. I've never owned one before so this was my first experience of remote...WOW!! It's easy and simple but can get the job done. The wireless connection to camera didn't matter if you have direct lighting in your shot or want more distance away from camera.
Case didn't fit Kindle Fire 7.9. Don't know if anyone else has had similar problems with their case, but ours would pop up after a couple openings.

I like the style, and it does keep you dry, but it's not as soft or stretchy as a cotton T-Shirt. The color is nice, however because i ordered dark blue from another company (don't remember what brand) and when this arrived, it's much less dark. This one seems "lighter" than my normal t's. But overall, good purchase for its price!

Great product, it took a while to get here from China but well worth the wait. Very durable & super cool. The colors are just gorgeous and it's very durable. I'm so glad I ordered this case & when I run out of new phone cases I'll definitely order more. Thanks! (:

I bought this book thinking it would be a great resource for information on finding small businesses to support. This is more along the line of reading other people's lists and seeing what has worked or did not work in their business. Save your money. There's no new info here. Glad I only paid $0.00 for it. It's almost like they gave up before writing it! Don't waste your money!!!

I bought this book after reading many of the positive reviews, and thought that it would be better than what they said because everyone else kept saying how wonderful this story was. But while it's not a horrible book, it's really rather hard to put yourself into the character's heads. There is nothing interesting about her or anybody around her, just stories told from day to day. And at times, she feels exactly like any other person in our world.

I really don't know who the author of "Sins Of Our Own" was -- I've read several books on this subject and, as an anthropologist, have long studied African social customs. She has little grasp of anthropology, except perhaps for knowing that she attended college. ( Sidenote: A good anthropologist should be able to pick up a phrase or two, but not enough to write his own book.) For one example, he refers repeatedly to "oral traditions.

While this is advertised as a travel bag, it had too many compartments for my purposes. It has no internal support to the bottom of which you would attach your laptop to keep it elevated. I would have made use of that when going thru airport security. As others mentioned, the bag itself was very flimsy with an outer zippered compartment. The only storage available outside are elastic straps on top and one zipper pocket. Not much more room or depth overall.

The book is filled with mistakes and typos. It lacks clear pictures that could be used to test concepts. What kind of person publishes a textbook without the ability to proofread? I can't afford another text because this one makes me sick. There are also typos everywhere. Do not buy it. It's awful. Buy something else.

If you put this album on when you're at home and forget about everything else in the world, you'll probably get sucked right into a world of unhinged psychedelic weirdness. The only reason I give it less than five stars is so that hopefully it won't be taken as an attack piece by those who criticize it's existence.

I have a hard time telling that this thing is getting my dog to smell anything when he has it on. Maybe I'm wrong. But it's supposed to: The package says so on the front of it. It's not quite what I was looking for but it'll do. This one isn't made in America either, though. It feels like very cheap plastic, too. Not sure how long they'll last. And, at first, they sounded like they're going to... but then nothing after that, and now nothing. Pretty disappointed.
Bought this little fella for our bedroom since I got into bed late one night.

We have a 9 month old kitten who really enjoys this toy! He has torn the center out and chewed pieces off over 4 days!! But it didn't make any difference to him!I am ordering him another one today! Awesome toy!!! If your cat likes these, I'd highly recommend it. You are going to need to be sure you attach it to something because they don't stay on like all the other toys.
Works great, easy to install (directions clear), perfect size. Exactly what we needed.
These work for cleaning all sorts of appliances...

I bought this unit for my husband's birthday. We were very excited when it was delivered. Unfortunately, we are returning it. The first thing that attracted us to buy a Toshiba product is their quality. We have had many TVs over the years, but never a HDTV. This TV has terrible picture quality, though we understand this could be due to our location. I called Toshiba's service center because there seemed so much static. They said they couldn't reproduce the static on camera. Our local tv store didn't see anything.

This is my first experience with a purchase from amazon. I would like to return it. It seems there are people out therine that have had one that worked. What should i know? If you get one of the good ones, then it may be fine. There has been numerous complaints in several other reviews on how difficult this product was. They wanted some thing easy but that never came.

Just finished this book. It was entertaining if a little predictable. I thought the characters were believable. Good book to read on vacation or sitting around on vacation. Also would be great beach reading. Thanks for letting me enjoy it.
Good sandal, great arch support. Comfortable walking or standing up all day. Feels good when you put on thick socks which really help to cut down weight.

The only downside to this case is that it's so cute, it makes you want another color. I love the way my phone looks and fits without being bulky. It protects just like more expensive cases would. But in less than a week of getting it, there's already one chip on the corner by the camera lens. But that's nothing bad as long as you're careful with it. So I'll say "It's cute but cheap.
My phone survived me through several drops by this cover - I'm impressed! No damage at all! Love it. Great product. The picture of course reflects your actual color :)
A poorly made product. The top portion is not tight fitting. It doesn't lay flat in the holder. Very bad design. I would definitely purchase another brand.
So far I'm having problems with my first pair - while sitting at work, I just heard loud cracks.

Bought this to protect my Kindle Touch with no success. The film is too big and won't stay on the screen. Every time I press down or lift it off it's off. I'm constantly touching it then smoothing out air bubbles but all I've ever gotten are more air. Don't buy this unless you want frustration. It's a waste of money.

For less than 1/3 of the price at my local pet store, I got 5 more large containers and was able to share them with new animals. They love these things. I put dry kibble in one, peanut butter or cheese chips in another, they all eat theirs right out of this one. Very easy for the kitties to use! :)

The first book was great and I couldn't wait until the next one came out! And of course, no ending in that 2nd book!! Wow, what a disappointment. You are supposed to spend the last 5 bucks on something else. What is next? Are we going to have another movie based on this series? Hopefully someone takes these authors seriously now. A HUGE disappiontment! I'm soooooo disappointed :(

I love the looks of this bag, but unfortunately for me it's way to small an it is too shallow and narrow so when you put in what you want to take then you can't close it. Also if don't leave things open the smell will go away within a couple days. This bag should be bigger or made like something from Victoria's Secret. Other than that I'm sure it'll serve its purpose well at school since all my books come with me.

I bought this album thinking i would be getting something new. All it has are "cover tracks" or a bunch of songs done by artists not on the radio at all. The only one that isn't available is Michael Jackson's "Thriller", and it doesn't say where its from! Also don't get your hopes up if you buy this, because most of these tracks will never come out officially. This might have been his greatest album...there was nothing released previously even remotely like it.
This is too acidic, like many other brands of decaf coffee.

I bought this for a friend's daughter. She had it as part of her Easter basket and was very pleased with it. The only reason that it's rated "Not Recommended" is because the box art isn't really attractive. In fact, I can't believe what kind of person would pay $100 for a piece of plastic without an image. Amazon has many other items at less than $100.

The only complaint I have at this point is that the top of the container keeps popping open. Nothing you can't fix though because once closed, it's pretty sturdy. My last container was from a different brand and it literally fell apart in two weeks. So far so good with this. It did come damaged on one corner but nothing broken or scratched. Just needed a little tape to seal.
i think this book is good. just what you should expect. nothing more to say. it was ok and did it's job.

This is a good movie. I enjoyed it thoroughly. My favorite scene is toward the end. All in all, it's definitely worth watching. You won't walk away saying "Wow!" you will. But you'll leave with an intense desire to see more Mel Gibson. The man has that something else only few have and can have. His charm keeps him from being too goofy or annoying, too. He certainly earned his leading role in this film. So for that, we give 5 stars.

While not as soft or comfortable as other cotton duvet covers from Oriental that are similar in price range, this feels much softer and lighter than any other fabric I've found. And while it's not a heavy comforter, at most we will never sleep with our hair fully covered because its so light.

I recently upgraded my home theater setup. This is a must for anyone who wants easy and convenient connectivity, especially with multiple devices that are streaming media via the internet. Great product. Pros:+ Small footprint++ Easy to set up/ installCons: None yet (been using it almost 2 years)Highly recommend this product. My only minor complaint would be it's use of IR remote control.
Love these snacks.

Great value for the money, especially great if you have an iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch, with lots of music on it. A bit slow to sync, but I guess that's because it is so big and full of stuff. The manual could be a touch better written. It does exactly what it's supposed to. Good sound, not great. Very lightweight, has worked flawlessly at gym.
This item may be as advertised but is completely useless if your dog weighs 10 lbs over 4 kg. Mine only goes off once in a while when she starts barking.
As usual, one of his better stories though a bit too slow in developement. Not quite as exciting a typical thriller. I'm looking more for plot twist and turns.

They need to fix the smell. It's not terrible, but I can't get past it for my purposes. The odor is really strong. I've tried leaving them out in a hot room and letting them air out, as well as washing them, but nothing gets rid of it. Also, be aware that the edges are very sharp so don't cut your fingers. On top or bottom, each bag has four openings, one on either corner - great feature.
A pair can last only a few months before breaking down. As my children used these daily on long trips they wore out in less than six months.

My unit was broken upon arrival so i returned it. Had to get a new one. The replacement broke after 2 months and I used it less than 3 times. It doesn't show anything on the screen when you use it which makes using it useless. Very disappointed.
THIS IS A BOOK ABOUT THE SAME OLD THING ALMOST ALL OF US HAVE KNOWN.

My friend and I decided to rent this video for $10. The description on here makes it sound really scary. We just rented it. It was horrible. The actors were all bad. Some of them where in high school while others couldn't be more than 15 or 16 at the time they were doing this. After about 10 minutes, we almost shut it. About 5 minutes in, though, it started getting good. Then suddenly there were these long boring scenes. This is so not scary even though it's rated PG-13.

This book was very good but not as scary for my 2 year old grandson who loves Scooby and the gang. My daughter read it to him several times while he is at school and she said many times. You will have some questions before you get done reading this one. I could imagine a parent using these activities in his classroom too! It gives great suggestions on how all parents can connect with their child. One of those things we often forget is that children are never alone. They need friends too.

I was not happy with this product! It looks like some kind of a rip off... You can't fill it or even get your hand inside. It is plastic and there are no real holes in the bottom..... There should be a hole at least on each side so you can drain off excess water but for $5.99 it's basically a dollar store.. A major rip off! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!! The shipping cost more than both items combined.
This is horrible. It sounds terrible. The vocals are awful. And all that background noise makes hearing it unbearable. Listen to these clips, in which you can hear what I mean:[...][...

I have had the Otterbox Commuter Case for my iPhone 4 since April 2013 and it was wonderful! It looked great, felt nice, protected well with a protective screen on front if necessary, easy to use earphones/charger, etc... Then suddenly about 6 months ago one of those two small plastic tabs fell off in one corner of the case.
I used it for three days and could not tell a difference. It didn't even feel good on my lips.

I was looking for some light weight chairs to use on a deck deck. The legs are perfect even with the vinyl top and all my friends thought they looked good as well. A nice alternative to expensive outdoor furniture. Well worth it!
We were happy with our first unit for well over a year, then we needed to replace it.

This is an update to my review since I received the replacement battery from the vendor. It was supposed to take 2-3 work days but it arrived in a couple of days. Original review:One of these batteries came with the original purchase, which didn't work, so I'll just have to use this one until Amazon figures out what to do with it...

These work great, especially for our new smart phones. We use them every day, and keep extras with us, since several are charged at once from a USB port. They seem very durable, well worth the money. Highly recommend.
These were part of an effort against the elements during Christmas holidays. They worked really good in both warm weather and dry weather.
Nice looking, but ran a little tight by toe area. Should look at sizing chart, then get next size up. Otherwise, will work fine. Will shop online before heading to stores.

I bought this because it's a bit cheaper than my other brand and also less messy as well. This item does help keep the fleas away at best if you're having to bathe your pet. It wasn't much of an improvement over using the Frontline Plus that we had been using, but it didn't seem any worse either, so I'm still glad I used it. But don't use too much, especially on smaller animals. You need a strong dose for cats. If you do, be sure not to leave long in between.
Makes things so much easier! Works great on frozen meatloaf. Use on all kinds of things that need help with cooling.

I bought this card for my Canon T2i, as it stated on the box that is has "automatic lens cap protection" and can be operated with one hand. In reality I have to take out my Nikon grip after placing in into the pocket of some type of fabric (I've tested this) which holds up against normal handling, so I'm not using it. Also, the lens extends beyond the end of the lens, creating what looks like a huge black bubble at times when used indoors.
This was much nicer than another one i ordered, but the clip does not stick so hard and can easily fall off. Also there are other designs available. Overall I'm happy, just wished it stayed on.

Not very pleased with this product. The first one I received didn't turn on, so for the second one, it would not even power up. I'm returning them both...at least Amazon is easy to do this. It took only 2 days from ordering until they arrive....Thanks Amazon!! They don't even deserve a star!!!

Very heavy duty but it did not come in the same packaging as the ones at Homegoods. It was shipped and packed separately from all of my other Amazon packages. I could tell that something had happened since most of them were individually boxed with plenty of packing material around them. The box this came in seemed very beat up. When we opened it, several pieces of plastic broke off. It's still usable but you have to be careful how much pressure or leverage you're applying while holding it.
The top was way to big for my neck size so I had to give it away because of that but then you cannot adjust it.... not what I expected :(

The second time this camera is used, my 6 year old put the LCD screen on top of his head while playing. In less than two minutes he had scratched both LCD.Sony said these are very fragile and don't recommend them for young children or even adults that like electronic toys.

The product was shipped in a small envelope. When I opened it, there were no instructions on how much of the oil should be put into this oil. There seems to have been an error with manufacturing. My husband could not get it started running.

What a waste of time and money. Poor acting, lousy story line, bad directing. Save your money, save yourself some time. I can't express how much it sucks to be involved in this type movie or read. It was very unrealistic. I love scary movies & read books about the unknown. But come on. Not only could one never imagine being abducted by aliens, they hardly seemed like aliens at all. They talked and acted, well, alien. So do other movies. And this one did not help either.

I'm a very experienced cook. I live in a small apartment with no room for many different cooking pots. So my kitchen is limited to the pots and pans that I already have. While these are attractive and well-made, they're not made specifically for cookware! The handles have an odd curve on them, which forces you to hold them at just right angle while pouring. I've never used wooden or non-stick metal utensils, so it's obviously a quality problem with this pans.

This CD has some great songs, and it's worth buying any way, even though it does contain more covers than originals. Some people complain that there isn't enough original work on here, but for a greatest hits collection, there's plenty here. A couple reviewers here are complaining about the sound quality, which I don't find to be quite at all bad. The quality overall comes across nicely.

I saw this at a show years ago. It has good music. The video quality is not the best in my opinion. But it's the band. And there aren't any other bands like that. There was more of a rock band, or punk. Maybe even some reggae influence. Overall, they were quite good. It's worth having if you're thinking about checking them out. Don't get yourself into it too much. If you really hate it, send me back your dvds. For now I can live with it.

The case fits my Galaxy Tab 2 perfect with all necessary openings and access points. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good quality tablet case. For the price, you can't go wrong. This is top of the line product in it's price range.

I used the vacuum a few times in hopes that this would fix my problem with pet hair but so far without any success. The suction is just okay and I'm not sure what I'll do to get all of that hair out before having to replace it. All three attachments were fine for getting cat hair. Very lightweight. It did pick up some dirt around baseboards. Maybe it doesn't clean well on bare floors??! Will probably need the larger Hoover which seems like it's working better than this.

I thought this would make a great stocking stuffer for all the nerds in my life, but I guess it just doesnt appeal to everyone (im more of an indie music person, not really into music). Also its quite small with barely 3 hours battery life. That was about 20 bucks down the drain, and we cant even listen with headphones! Its actually pretty cool though. But still disappointing. If you can get your money back dont bother buying this.

We purchased a used DCR-SR41 camera hoping that we would get lucky and not be locked out of our computer access due to using some old version software. The manufacturer does tell you how difficult it is for security users but they do NOT warn people about what can happen when trying to work with this camera. We spent hours installing software on two machines in order to try and make use of the camera, only end up having to reset them twice during installation.

These things make you feel like crap. Nothing like the real thing. Don't waste your money. Go straight to the dollar store. If I wanted something that tasted bad I'd take candy. My friend bought these thinking they were as good, she only put them on her face. She said it tastes like licorice. Oh well.

I am amazed at the low ratings for this product. Although it may actually be a good product if you are interested in hearing voices, as others have suggested, or some way to modify your music, its capabilities have been well documented by people who tried this. The biggest problem is not so much that it's hard to get working, but instead of being intuitive there appears to be no easy method of getting from one mode to any other.

I am sure this would be a great printer IF IT WORKED. After owning it for less than 3 months, the printing functions stopped working and I've lost tons of work because I'm in school right now so i couldn't print anything. The quality is good but I'd rather spend the money on something that will last. DO NOT BUY.

It will do, but its hard enough to keep a grip on the handles with your bare hands that I may need some kind of holder too. Perhaps have something like a towel rack in there? Also, when we ordered it, one thing they didn't mention, although not explicitly stated anywhere, is what was supposed to be put inside it.

Bought this for my niece and she wanted a hard case, not rubber, would rather have gotten an otter box, this was advertised as hard, not rubber but the only reason I gave it one star is because there wasn't anything to choose from....

this unit fits really well on the headrests, only complaint is it pushes in too far and can scratch your heads when not looking at them, so i recommend pulling the straps a little to fit back into place. The seat belt lock system isn't great as with my previous Graco seats, but its better than nothing. My kids seem comfortable and they are very happy in their new seats. This was worth every bit of what I paid for them.

My title says it all. I just received this and have not even had time yet to do any test taking. I'm very disappointed. It looks used, all the page numbers are torn off. It arrived in terrible condition. You can tell its been used. And of course there is no receipt or invoice. They will need one if they expect Amazon to take my money back.

I cannot be more disappointed in the product. Upon receiving it one screw was missing from the base and could not use it. After installing it, found out 2 of the screws that hold the head to the post were also missing. Now I have a stand with several very noticeable holes but no screws. Not even worth returning for such a small purchase, would look at this in person before buying.
I'm really impressed. For the price you can hardly get better quality. It's made in China, but that's good for me as there are so many Chinese products out there.

It's very cheaply made. For a few dollars more you can get something much better. There's a reason many folks prefer vacuums over this piece junk. Very poor product. 
 Rating: 1.
Ok if you didn't know anything prior about this topic.
The product arrived in perfect condition (no bends).

In theory this is a great device. Unfortunately, what looks like the best and most useful option to turn on TV with remote has been severely crippled by Logitech in its current release. When I first set up and configured this, it was great. But as time progressed, it slowed down tremendously so that even clicking it once, or twice, often required several presses. This happened over time, but had me looking for an alternative. A couple more days went by, and I'm back looking - but found this.
A bit too heavy and bulky. Has everything you need except the charger with a USB cord. Well worth it for travel.

The light works fine and is really well made. You can adjust it to different positions or just leave it on "bright." It's bright. I also like that the bulb fits in another part of a light. Easy on/off switch. Good price. Works as advertised. No complaints. It does take some pressure before it turns on. Maybe they changed that.
It fits perfectly to our grill model which is what we needed it for. Keeps out rain from going into grills or burning house down if not covered.
Not a very good read. It was ok but I couldn't really get into it and it definitely wasn't one of her best.

This is one of the worst books I ever read! The writing was bad as it seemed to come from a 15 year old and there were many misused words. If you want to read trash that will make your eyes pop out like those movie stars do then go for it!

I purchased this bed for my dog when he was suffering from hip problems. It worked well at first. He's now recovered and we have continued using it even though his arthritis doesn't allow him to get much down. The cover still stays on just fine although it does loosen over time. My only regret is that we've had the mattress about a year and it's time to replace it.

I would not recommend this to anyone. The item came with a few scratches where the paint was scratched. Also one of the corners that holds up part of the cover is already broken off because it doesn't click into place. Not worth it.

Just got and installed this light. Installing took about 20 minutes. The lights seem better than the OEM which were broken off and cracked. I really could have repaired them by myself but in hindsight I'm glad it was just an assembly. Overall, a good buy if you need some replacements. The only down side (not sure what to expect on the color temperature range), there is no blue tint like my original factory lights. These replaced the yellow ones though.

A total waste of paper...even my Kindle can't fix that. It's no longer about the story, it's all just sex with people other than the characters you've spent so much time developing. Don't bother buying it! Seriously disappointed!!! If you liked this book, or have read some others, then don't bother, not worth wasting your time.
Poor quality.
This book was too short. Was looking for more information. Not really a book. Could have been just an article. A little misleading.
The protector went right on, fit perfect, has not come off or anything. If you need this, spend an extra $3.00 bucks instead of buying anywhere else :D it's worth it.

My LG G2 is only a couple of weeks old. I've not been rough with it, and yet already it's peeling off in pieces. Don't buy this case, spend your money somewhere else, like Otterbox. They are more expensive, but they last. I'm very unhappy. You get what you pay for. Lesson learned...
Bought to use as an emergency radio with solar panel. Didn't want my electronics running all night in case of short battery usage. It quit working after about 5 minutes, but you could hear radio.
This seemed like an interesting premise but just didn't go anywhere.
As mentioned by other customers on this page, these DVDs were originally released as single-disk sets.

I have owned one of these for a long time and finally got another one. They keep tea hot with no problem as well as, keeping milk cold in the fridge. This is my favorite travel mug ever! Highly recommend it. The only thing that could make it better would be if they made them for microwave use too! Very sturdy construction.
The unit broke in only 2 weeks. Would not buy another one. Very cheaply made. It's a shame.... I loved the idea of it but they didn't stand behind their product. Bummer!!!!!!!

I bought this for my daughter who has a huge music collection and loves to listen to the radio, play her MP3's and charge her phone. This product is exactly as described. It comes with all of you need cables for different phones (micro USB, standard usb, etc). The radio works really well. And you can use it plugged into AC or car. What makes it better would have been if this charger also came in black. It's not expensive so that's probably why its not. Overall great product.

The sound is better than with my iPhone speakers, but what good does that do me? If it only sounds good, why buy them? Because its a Bose product, right? After all, its not exactly cheap. Well, after less than six months of ownership, they broke down on me. On first use, no sound at all.
After having been disappointed with my local auto parts store for ordering OEM belts at first but then not receiving them, decided to see what I could find online.

The product shipped was received timely and exactly as described. So far no complaints, good product. It is a little snug to put in on, but you know it will be secure once its in. We are glad we got it.

Although not the cheapest, this coffee maker works great. It just needs more features. This makes a pot of hot water! That's great for the mornings. Also, you set your desired quantity and then press and push again. After that, it's supposed to be waiting on its own - wait 5-10 min.

I love my new case. It looks great and all of the buttons work well. The only thing that bothers me is when you are playing an app or taking a picture it makes noise as if your trying to take something with one finger too many times. Other then that, i am very happy. :)

I ordered this for my daughter's Ipod 4th generation because it is supposed to be the "right" size and make her happy. But right out of the package that was shipped from China there were scratches on it. It doesn't fit perfectly but does cover most of the screen. Also shipping took several weeks. If you want a case with some bling then you will like it, just not if you're wanting something functional which it clearly states.

I am trying to get more vegetables into my diet and decided to try this, mainly because of the low cost. Great taste! My 13 year old daughter who doesn't have a strong appetite even ate 2 or 3 spoonfuls. Very good in soups too as an added flavor.

It didn't work. It was missing the battery and all instructions that should have been with it. In fact it came apart as I tried to get batteries into it's compartment and ended up causing minor injury. If Amazon had not included instructions in its shipping package this item wouln't be working at all. We tried everything we could - even went out and bought another set of new batteries.

I bought this in January of 2013. Now, it is July the blue rubber band that keeps the battery cover closed fell off and no longer stays closed. The leather case has gotten very dirty on several places around the edges as well. I've also noticed a small piece coming lose from the inside but it's still intact. Overall, just OK. For $20 you get what you're paying for. I wouldn't recommend taking mine outside to throw it. With that said, I'd buy another one because if dropped, it'll protect your phone.
Good value and fast shipping, fits snug on queen sized mattress, however this is not waterproof. There are no waterproof zippers, which made me concerned in case there was leakage.

This is a decent case, but not nearly as good as my other hard case for the iPhone. It serves it's purpose although I like how it covers most of the face. Overall its an okay case. If you're looking to protect your phone, this will do that. However if you are trying to keep scratched, nicks, or water off your expensive iPhone look elsewhere.

I received this as a gift, after being warned by my family not to, because we have 4 cats including the one that chews through all his toys. We had tried multiple toys for him, but he still didn't care about them. But having him entertain himself with this, has been such an improvement! He LOVES it!!! Just make sure you hang it high enough so that he can't get to it.

I have to admit, I'm not very good at keeping track of my weight. Over the years I've had four different scales, but was never too happy with any one or two. In my search for a reliable, easy to read measuring device, this Ozeri product fit all requirements pretty well. It is well-made, well designed, and comes in attractive colors.

One of them doesn't work properly. The other works ok, but the connection is kind ofloose and it makes a weird noise when I plug my iPad in. It probably cost me enough to return. Not worth it. Get in a real apple store. You'll be much happierto get one that works. No more cheap ones from this company.

It smells good for the most part. Not sure how well it works on its intended purpose of soothing joints. Maybe this is just what my doctor ordered to help improve my knees after having two hip replacements. So far so good. Hope they don't raise their prices like some people think they will. At least the price wasn't crazy expensive.

I hate that I spent what was necessary of money. This book came into my mailbox today. I'm so disappointed. It has been listed at the top if many lists and this is not a good thing. It's an absolute rip off. There isn't any story in it whatsoever. All about nothing. No one is mentioned until page 100. Then only two sentences. A girl goes out with her mom to see some friends. One thing leads to another and she asks to go back home. Her dad says okay.

I wanted to use the camera with a Nikon D700 and was told that it would work but when i plugged in everything and put batterys into every thing and nothing worked no matter what settings my camera.....DONT BUY.... get an expensive one so u can watch your cam. And as far as quality from another review yes its not HD but good enough for the price of $20. So save up some more money...spend $40 extra on a better one.

This is the second one of these I've bought in this price range. It does it's job, just wish I could see into it with as much clarity as my prior model did. That's okay, because when I'm at home and I need it, I'll still find another use for it. It's not perfect, but if you don't mind having to adjust or zoom in/out, then get one. If your vision isn't that good and all you want are basic phone features, go ahead & spend a little more.
My 5 year old received this yesterday for her birthday.
Love it! it is what I want for my baby to sleep in. They last the whole week and they are very well made.

This is very heavy and takes a while to dry. Even though you put it in the dryer with high heat, as instructed (on low), it'll take more time than others I've used that are not so heavy. The size of this product was great but I had to return it, no fault on Amazon's part. It just wasn't what my husband wanted.

If you are having problems trying to get a reliable HDMI-to-DVI converter over digital audio connection--this is NOT the product for you. The picture and sound quality were so awful, that all adjustments made would result in garbled sound, or worse, completely distorted sound.

It's got great potential to be a great, new game. But as others have said, it ends way too soon. The game could probably do with some major revisions and a little more effort. When the main quest is done, there are other things you can do. And then when you've gotten past all of that, there's more. I'm sure that if there was an expansion pack it would work pretty well. The best part about this game, however, is that I feel like I've played something similar before.

I was looking for a book to help me with planning our upcoming trip. This is just an old man's rambling thoughts about the area. There's no real discussion of how tourists react or experience things. The travel website has more info on this subject. I'm glad it got published, but it's not all that good as guide book. It's nice though, to see other peoples opinions from time to time.

It is the perfect size for a small space, which is where ours is. The problem I have with it... right out of box it only worked once. When plugged in and turned on, there was not noise or light, just NO power to unit. After 3 days all lights come on so it's ok, but who cares when one has no power!

As I mentioned in earlier comments, this is not a "review" as per the usual rules governing these reviews. Please see my profile for more. My review would simply have been to report that if you decide to spend your $15 (and possibly more) on this, save yourself some pain and read anything but this.
The product I received was just as described and arrived earlier than promised. It worked great with my older Kindle Paperwhite. It's the correct replacement for a lost adapter. Very satisfied!
These work great for small areas. They are so much faster then the cheap ones. My family of 4 loves them. I love them too because no fumes and clean up is a breeze. So glad we bought these!

I have purchased items from this seller before and the description is accurate, BUT they are getting too difficult to trust. They stated it would be here in 2 - 3 days. Today was Monday, I got an E-Mail saying shipping will take over two weeks, which obviously means there won't even arrive until October! I ordered these as a surprise for my husband who works shifts so that when he gets home at night we both know exactly what it is.

I just finished reading James Frey's book The Devil We Don't Know. My first thought was, what a great read, and then when he got up to his real issues, about the UFO problem in our country, which really is much bigger than anything he's talking about, it seems that Frey was so far removed from these matters, but that's not my main issue. It's that most of Mr. Freys' material on space travel didn't seem factual at all.
This has been a great item for out new puppy and even works as an extra barrier from her running through bushes.

The quality is very bad. I was under the impression that this would be made more durable. No complaints about shipping but not even worth it if its all going to break in a couple of uses. Very disappoiinted with this. Maybe they should give these as wedding favors by now so you guys can make them yourself. LOL Seriously. Look at cheap ones first and maybe buy something better afterwards. Save up for an iPad! You will want it! For what it's worth.

Like all of the other customer reviewers, i was looking for a new kettle to replace my broken one and have no regrets. Its very sleek in design, it does not take up much room, its not noisy - which is good as I work late, but there are some things you should be aware of.1. You cannot pour boiling water without splashing out every little bit.

I had this for a few months now. It's not too bad but the design of it makes coffee spilling when you are pouring out your coffee. I've learned to pour slowly so as not to spill over on my stove top. Also, if I'm ready before all the water is boiling, then putting in coffee grounds seems like it's taking longer than waiting until everything's boiling. I'd say it gets hot enough though. All and all, good cheap kettle. Does what its supposed to.
Fits as good or better than other brands. Looks like a beautiful product. A little pricy but hopefully worth it. I'll see how they are after time washes etc. Great product!   Rating: 4.
I read all reviews from this product and chose it. It got here right away and I put it on after two days. No problems, installed easy. Thanks amazon!! You guys rock. :)

My dog hated these in the first week. I thought maybe they were making her hyper like she normally does, so i reapplied them. Her reactions got worse. She threw up and scratched herself all over! Its amazing how quickly this can cause a reaction. Im not sure if im going to keep using it. The only good part is that none of my stuff went into her mouth, it was actually nice :-) But its still too early for those type reactions.

We moved into our new house and used these as a replacement for the old ugly white lights. they don't get hot to warm the area around them, yet have an ambient light that helps during the night. They are very bright, which is great since I put 10 in my kitchen on 6 dimmer switches. so all you need one lamp on. The only complaint would be that, being made of metal it cannot take bumps or other harsh treatment. That said, I've had 2 out of 3 work fine.

Like many others, I've been playing with this thing for 2 days as I wanted something that looked cool, but offered the performance of a "real computer." At less than $200.00 there are few other options to consider. With some tweaking, I was able to get it running Windows 7 in about an hour. Boot to desktop takes only 30 seconds. The device is light and very portable. Most devices don't even include CD drives, so you cannot just install software...

This was an interesting story. I have never been to New Orleans, but this book has given me a better understanding of what makes the city tick. As for why it took so long to catch on to Mardi Kras. I think he needs to give those in charge of these festivals enough time. It may be hard now, but you won't lose money if your visitors don't see or understand what's going on.
This was a fun read, and some what of an interesting story line but not my favorite in this series, The author must have gotten tired and just ended it before the book should have.
Okay for the price a little on the light side - but that's what you get with inexpensive chairs. Nice looking.

i saw my friend trying to use it with her ipod and she told me the sound kept going in and out so I tried it too and its a pain when u listen 2 ur music then have ur ears go numb like a couple times when your wearing it so idk how they really work but thats wat she says because im using them now an still not happy at all

These were very expensive for 2 pens. They don't write as smoothly at the Zebra Mech Ball Grip Roller Ball, which is 1/2 of the price or more! If I am going to pay $2 per pen, the ballpoint version would be worth it. The only thing that makes these pens unique (other than their low price) are they have a cap on them. Don't waste your money like I did. It may work out for some folks, but it isn't working in ours or anyone else's household.

I bought this to replace the last one and so far it seems better, no problems with opening cans without using our hands anymore but we have only had ours for a few months. Good product would recommend if you don't like those electric can openers that always leave us holding them down when they open a can.
I'm very disappointed with this item.1. The pump doesn't work. You can only screw and unscrew, nothing more. The dispenser container just can't seal or turn correctly.2. Very messy product.3.

I was disappointed in this book. Like several other reviewers mentioned, the majority of it is a bunch of essays on how to be successful. I'm surprised that anyone would seriously recommend this, especially while there are much better alternatives available. The only useful items contained within the book (and even then just anecdotally) seem like they were written by teenagers and published for money (not scholarly) with little regard or analysis as to why being successful matters.

I was so very disappointed. The first book in the series did not make any difference to me. Having finished this story as if it didn't matter because i will never read another one. The whole thing came way too quickly, and after a few things were already figured out she seemed like she's still just getting into character development. You could see that there where only two or three people who really made an impact on how she felt about things. I'm sorry but this is no Fifty Shades.

Bought this cable to connect my Roku box and a new TV for the bedroom. It works great, is long enough (about 20 ft.) Good price compared with cables I had seen. Great picture quality. No problems. Highly recommend.

This book is a waste of time and money. I'm glad I didn't spend any money on it. The information in this is simply available for free from the internet or books. It contains no original thought other than, "If you do things that others don't find cool then good luck. You probably shouldn't bother trying to be so hip with your own stuff :-). How many times can one read about how much he hates? Get real man! Don't buy it!! 
 Rating: 1.

I just finished watching this movie and was shocked by so many things that were not realistic. It is a good action movie. If you like cars driven around in circles, car crashes. There are no body parts flying left right or right. For those of us who have never been to Chicago, we would know how much of these unrealistic qualities are. This is an urban city where cars do go fast, but there seems to always be somebody walking about with their arms out.

I really like this case. It is a fun color and fits great. One major drawback to the case which prevented me from giving it 5 stars was that it arrived with some discoloration on it. Not much but enough where you can tell in pictures exactly what kind of thing the background is. Also, after several uses over time it's slightly faded from use. This may just be specific to my case, though. Overall, good product. It's pretty durable so far, too. I'd buy from them again. :)   Rating: 4.

It doesn't matter how hard I try with using this adapter to my D700 the pictures have a white border and they start looking yellow by itself when it comes in focus. The reason is that either there are too many photons bouncing back from its surface or somehow there are too few of them. If you don't mind having bad images on your expensive lenses - don't waste money here. You get what you pay for. I'm going back to Amazon Basics USB cable.

This is a good way to get some nutrients added into my diet without making that big mess in the kitchen like other protein drinks. They taste so much better than most I've tried and they are filling. I'm excited about trying another flavor of these soon. My only problem with them being full of protein, though, is thatthere isn't enough actual protein.

If you have large hands buy the xlarge. These gloves run small for large hands. I use them when driving so no major complaint, just didn't think they were as nice as other gloves I've worn. The extra length makes gripping easy and is well worth paying for.

I guess this device is not compatable w/ my phone. The product details says it is: "Compatible with all Motorola phones as long as" and then there does NOT appear a link in the description that states compatible & which type of phone. Buyer beware.
These are awesome. You have to cut them small but that not a big deal. I put this in my little black bird cage and it looks adorable. The color is awesome too. I'm super happy with it.

My wife and I are not avid coffee drinkers but we tried this out with our kids as it made a large 12oz cup of coffee. Not impressed by the quality or flavor... It has almost no foam to it. You can see through the water when you pour it... Would not recommend. Wish i read these reviews before buying it.. Waste of 10 bucks. I'm back searching for another type of coffeemaker..

We bought two of these for our cats, and they have loved them ever since. I was initially concerned because the top isn't too high as most scratching posts are, but she has no problem. My cats are also old - one is 13 years old, his teeth started to wear away in front teeth, which made him afraid about going near other things that might hurt him. The perch itself seems well constructed, easy to get clean, and doesn't really smell bad (even after a long day).
The DVD would not play at all in my DVD player. Had to send back because I could hear the motor running while it played.
My sister bought my kindle fire hd for me as a birthday gift so I am using it in a few days. Today I woke up & found out that i only paid 8.99 for this with everything else she had purchased.
It did not work. It fell apart. I tried it on both of my tvs and nothing happened. Just got to return it. Never again. Waste time sending it back through ups from NJ.

They are cute. However, they were much smaller than my previous set! I can only fit three eggs in each pan. When making a larger pan for four, it becomes very difficult to get them out. Very disappointed! Also with the red on them, food sticks VERY SLOW. My son does love that they match, but he has learned not take out his cookies and such immediately after working at keeping everything together. I've had to put foil over it.

The book was very disappointing. It had way too much unnecessary filler. I got the idea of one character with Asperger's, but then there were numerous subplots that did nothing to advance this story. It could have been condensed a hundred percent and saved more paper than it wasted. I'm sorry i bought it. Just another "feel good novel" from Ms. James. If that's what you're searching for, go for it. Otherwise, don't bother. There is far better out there.

Love the color, but hard for a young child to use. It only fits 1 or 2 cupcakes at a time. Difficult to put in place. I wish it sat on top of each cake without being bent. The ends are bent so they won't lay down flat.

My wife and I gave up on the author early on. The writing reads like a high school student's creative project. Not enough character development and plot was just an excuse to go back in time while he describes what our heroine is feeling. And then there are some major editing issues. This will be my first "freebie...I shouldn't' buy it! Too much 'filler' material not developed well. It could've gone a lot better...

I needed to upgrade from a Dell Latitude D630 which was getting old. It just seems that more laptops are now using the Atom platform and it is much slower on processor intensive software than my last machine. Not sure if that's Windows 8 or whatever they have done but I'll keep trying. I'm not too excited about having multiple apps open. I will continue playing with it.   Rating: 2.

I love the idea of what this product could do. The technology is great. Just wish it did not stop working. Got about 4 uses before one day it would not even power on. Customer service said they didn't see any other reviews in the return portion either. When a device was defective and you cannot get to customer service, that tells me there are some bad apples out there. For a price like this, I'd expect better. This will be returned. I'll go with Apple next. I sure did. 
 Rating: 1.
Poor parents make poor food.
A must read for all YA fantasy fans. Even though most of this series isn't part of what you would consider "young adult," there are definitely some great messages in these books.

I had this on my wishlist for months and finally decided to buy it in September so that we could have some winter holiday music with us all of the time. My boyfriend bought me a Christmas tree, but not one album or DVD. So this will go perfectly along with it!. And now I've been able to get around the house listening to these amazing songs! :)

I'm an average sized adult, I was so afraid that this wasn't going to fit, but it did with some stretching. The straps are too small, and they don't really stay in place. They do the job though, look pretty nice.

The unit that you plug into a standard wall socket will be 110/220 in the USA and 120/240 with 220V in Europe but not all of these items are listed so do this before buying. We tried on several different appliances for countries we weren't even in or had power at all.
These are cute to look at, don't they? But that's about as far off as my opinion goes because they never worked well in my experience.

While this book was interesting, and a quick read. I agree that the title is misleading. A good portion of the book deals with his life story as an adult and how some of his stories in college turned out, which were very interesting to learn about. The rest has some information on him working at various restaurants for years, getting married, becoming homeless, etc. Overall, not super impressive, but interesting. For those just starting out in their careers or careers, its worth reading, if only for inspiration.

I read all the excellent reviews of this product and decided to give it a try. So far I've been very happy with it. It's simple to use so I'll just stick with 5 stars. After reading some other reviews, I was concerned because my cats can paw through our catdoor, but even when they do that it's not enough for them to open it. I had previously bought one where we could bolt something directly next door to block the cat door; but I got tired of that.

After the first 2 chapters or so I thought my kindle is not working right. The characters just don't grab me. So many books are coming out like this these days where there seems to be no care and concern for making great story lines. If you want good clean romance with some real depth then pass on this. There will probably only be 1 if ever may people reading this review. Read at your own risk, I am sure they have better reads than what I just got.

This heater looks great in our kitchen and works well so far. Easy to install although the instructions are a bit confusing about drilling into a brick or concrete--not an issue if you have experience with wood but there is no mention of where it could get scratched by screws that go through walls.

This is my first GPS device. It seemed to work well but the voice control failed from cold weather so it never told me I was at an exit. Tried multiple addresses and tried different locations while in warm weather. All failed. The problem may be as much with a poorly designed antenna or poor design. Once set up, worked great until the freezing started.   Rating: 2.0   Got this for Christmas last year.
The design was cool enough, but after the second use of this one became extremely warped so much that its unusable. Not too big a deal really, just annoying.

The product does absolutely nothing. Don't waste you money. It doesn't make my water crystal clear, or anything. Nothing at all. Absolutely not worth a penny. I went back to doing it myself. Only took me about half as long and was twice the price. It's all in your head. Spend your money on things that actually work. This is very expensive junk. I'm going to be throwing mine away. They are very small. So they should really list them. Mine don't lay flat either.
I had to reorder these again. They were out of stock and this time the quality did not meet my expectations. I will continue to look for earphones. Thanks for letting me know.
This product is advertised as working with Apple products.

This is my second one of these bottles. The first one I had for 8 years and it finally wore out (I dropped it, the tip got loose, so it leaked). My only complaint about this bottle compared to other bottles I've had, which have different functions, are that you really cannot take advantage of any kind or heat setting at all. So, if you're in a car with windows down, no heater on, put hot water in, then turn on your heater, you still don't get anywhere close to boiling enough.

My 2 girls had fun using this book. However, the stylus did not work right. They found another product on internet called "finger painting" much better but also expensive. As long a you don't plan to leave in house or put batteries in, it's worth it.
I used this only five times, then there wasn't any sound transmitted via it. Would be nice to have it replaced with one that works. I've emailed Amazon three times. Very disappointing.
My daughter loves this thing. Assembly was kind of tricky, but overall its pretty good quality for the price. We purchased two units.

How much is this going to cost for an e-book? Who knows!! Does anyone know if a paper version will ever come out? Any idea as yet on whether these things can still be downloaded and listened too? If someone has any information that would help me, please post. Thanks!

If you want something that works great for quick clean-ups, this is it. No muss no fuss, very convenient to work with!I like all of the different tools it comes with. The head on one can get into those difficult places. It also came with a brush which was pretty cool as well. Great tool, glad I have it! Well worth it. Can't wait until they make more designs in case we lose one. ( Just kidding!) ;)

As a longtime fan of Mr. Leone's films,it was disappointing in The Enforcer that the action moves at such an unbelievable pace. The storyline is thin and cliched and lacks depth. I can't say this film is so bad,but what did they do to James Coburn except add makeup after he became older?He's always had his faults. Maybe that's why I've always liked him better than George Kennedy (who played young Clint Eastwood on TV many years ago).

When I put in some time at the local library, I decided for something to fill my time. I didn't need it that much, but if you want an inexpensive book about this topic, I'd look with a microscope first. It's not very well-written. The writing is stiff and lacks charm. Also, there's no indication or discussion of "historical documents."

As a professional cook for 35 years, I have tried and used many spatulas. This is the first one that I really dislike. It has no rubber bottom to help hold it in place on my stainless steel pans. The handle does not seem heavy enough as well when you try flipping something with it. My old cheaper ones were much better than this new one. Sorry to see that they are now made out of cheap metal. Too bad because otherwise it's a very good kitchen tool.
Great music!!!!! Love Jason Wade

Nice and soft, warm but did not help my husbands arthritis either. Had to return it. Did work well on his neck. Just too stiff for me. Too expensive, I don't think. If you have high neck problems this may be great since there is no support in the middle where your head rests.
Nice product. Not as strong or heavy duty as expected but still is just fine. It's easy to use. Wish the handle were shorter.

As a member of my city's small business council, I am very surprised at the negative aspects shown by some critics about this book. One reviewer says that there is no mention of how many teachers he personally knows and so forth. You would think given his position on the council who could not be involved with teaching but have decided instead to invest in an investment opportunity...

As a long-time fan of the series, and considering that I have waited this long for it to come out, I found it hard to get through. The last 3 or 4 books made me think maybe Charlaine Harris might actually be writing about something worth reading. This just seems like filler with no plot line. No depth at all.

This is a good product that cleans and lubricates the inside of my AR-10 very well. I use some Hoppes synthetic oil as well for better performance with no need to clean. As other reviewers have mentioned this will NOT fit into most AR style magazines unless you take off the magazine. It seems they are sized differently. On mine it fits fine.

I found this product to be too expensive when you can buy the same amount for less money in any drugstore. You don't want a ton of capsules and these are way more than what was recommended. Do yourself a favor and save your money. Your health is worth it. And that's about it after all this. It didn't upset my stomach so it's all good there. So why one star? Well they really only taste like gummy.

I gave it 3 stars because of this product. The first one broke after about 6 months but the company was very nice and courteous and sent me a new one. Unfortunately that new one didn't work either. It just stopped working completely. So we exchanged it. But since they were so helpful, I'm giving them another try. I'll update my review if it's working. It's easy to put together, which is good. They could improve on the quality control for future models.

A great deal seemed to be made of the title role in La Bohème. However, I was never able to take it. Instead of playing a tortured and tormented young man, he seems more like a shallow cad who would rather have his money than his girlfriend. The music was outstanding, however. Unfortunately, this movie had zero direction. The singing was terrible, even at the opera.
My daughter has not had any problems with his at all. You can't beat the price! We are satisfied customers. I can recommend it.

The unit worked out of the box. My wife had no trouble installing it. This is our second and only time it has failed. I think a person should consider how many times they actually plug and/or unplug. With this device, plugging and un-plugging are often required. On both units, one port works for 1 hour or less at full brightness. So you have to be pretty aware when plugging and unplugging.
This is an excellent product. Much better than any other brand we've used. We bought a second one after the first one.

It scratches easily, has spots of glue on it, was pretty hard to get on, and overall cheaply made. Save your money and buy something else. Not worth it! Would return though as shipping would be more than it's worth.
Having owned most of the books in this line over the years, I'm always delighted with their new ideas - no matter how obvious they might be.

This is a quality product at an affordable price. It looks good and offers protection for your Kindle with its built in stand. The magnetic closure works great to secure the case. I will add that this case isn't quite perfect, as all cases like it are. As others have said, there are some minor manufacturing imperfections which detract from how well made it is.

I have used this case for two months now and i am happy with it.1. The keyboard connects by bluetooth very easily via a small dongle that is held on when the lid is closed using magnets at the edge.2. It looks sharp which some people may find attractive.3. Overall protection could be better4. As it feels cheap compared to other cases you might spend moreMy biggest complaint though and most concerning to me was not about durability but fit.

The story was entertaining, but a bit hard to follow. Many of the characters came and went without any clear reason or cause. But for such a short story, it did give me some entertainment. I read this book because my mother is from South Jersey in New Jersey. My parents had lived there for nearly 40 years, even though she has recently moved back into New York. She loved reading about how they lived, her mother's great sense of humor as well as how Southern Catholics were persecuted for their beliefs.
the product is extremely poor quality. i put it on...within 30 seconds one of the clips came off. don't waste your money. you are better off trying something else. im very unhappy with this purchase.

I found this book an interesting read, but not one of my favorites. This novel is about a woman who, after having been married, finds herself alone and pregnant. The mother whom she grew up with finally gives her baby up. She has no idea what to do. Her ex-lover takes the child, now known as Jess, away from her. As far back as the book goes it shows how selfish her ex-wife was. There are also other very serious issues in this novel.

This is truly a horrible game. Very similar to the NES version where you run and tap buttons. However, as stated in the previous reviews, your cursor shakes uncontrollably from time to time. To make matters worse, it freezes constantly, so if you are not running or tapping, then you will be forced into just tapping random buttons until your progress resumes. The only good news was that I purchased this game for my DS using Amazon.com's money-back guarantee.

I was expecting a book that had recipes and instructions for all the cooking supplies I would need. Instead there are some good ideas but no actual recipes. Not what I thought it was. I'm very disappointed - especially with how expensive this book is. It makes you think you're going to get lots of nice easy kitchen stuff when in reality, if someone can't create something from scratch, then nothing is new here. If you've been an avid home cook before, you can find these sorts of ideas yourself without buying another book.

It feels great, the only thing I'm not happy about is that you have to take the iPad out of it's holder when you're using a dock because sometimes there's interference. But other than that, a great product. Would buy again. :)

The case is strong and secure. I am still using this product on a Dell XPS 13 notebook after 2 years. I recently switched systems to i7 Macbook Air Retina. In order for this sleeve to fit properly, it must be positioned exactly correctly. However, the price you pay for the protection offered by these sleeves is well worth it. This one was priced very comparably with other products. I've checked prices online several times, from cheap imitations or knockoffs that offer more protection.
Like the "fashion" designer this book uses women as props instead of real life models. And these 'fashion models' are all extremely tall and thin.

They are pretty good grills but it takes quite awhile to heat up by yourself. But the food tastes good. Good product. We cooked chicken breasts over easy browning in these grills. Overall happy :) Would recommend. Just time consuming.
I bought 3 of these, and ALL FAILED! They say they work with an Apple laptop (doesn't support charging) in their description, though I've tried mine in 2 other laptops -- 1 has USB 1.0.

They seem nice enough. However, within two weeks one of them already cracked due to no rough handling. They would also be better if they were dishwasher safe like it claimed. When you hand wash them, food seems to stick up in there even more.
I have been on this brand for years it has caused lots of digestive issues and now will not purchase again, as is there are so many other good brands in the market.

The size was great and the quality of plastic used for its manufacture are good but because it is on a shelf over head length in my shower I don't feel it provides enough protection. It would be helpful if they provided an extension to fit vertically into any standard tub area. This could prevent damage when being dropped as well in order to allow water flow up through which it can cause injury.
The printer will only print using this cartridge every time without fail. It does not print.

This book was a gift from my husband who is an avid reader and reader. In the beginning of his reading, this had some interesting points like the theory behind how dyslexia developed in children compared to earlier forms when they were raised in families where reading was encouraged but parents or relatives didn't encourage them on it. But, he soon stopped into it as things became repetitive. I think people with serious health problems should read these books, if you have time for that kind things.
Not much to say about this case. I bought several different colors and got compliments on all. The case is not only functional it's beautiful. Highly recommended for any iPhone owner. Very stylish.

So far I think the scale is a fine product and worth getting. However, it did take about 8 business days to receive it. When tracking my order, there was no mention of shipping. This was disappointing as UPS came into town on Saturday. Maybe this should be indicated for those ordering over amazon. If not, don't expect much overnight delivery, if any. Another disappointment for Amazon at least, since when ordering, they stated that "shipping may take 3-7 days".

I was quite disappointed in this book, which made me curious to read the author's work before considering any other books by him. The book is written more like a journal than an actual novel, and while there are many interesting stories of life as a Jewish girl during Nazi Germany at the time - particularly with regard to anti-Semitism among Jews - much of it focuses on her relationships with others. Despite those issues there were some interesting insights into how people were living just prior to, during, and following WWII.
Protects your device, stands vertically or horizontally.

My wife ordered these for my 4 month old Cavalier King Charles Spaniels after seeing one of her friends' dogs. Unfortunately neither of our 2 dogs, who normally take an allergy pill as a treat will eat them. Even when they smell them, if not lick it off their paws, they won't touch any kind of treat.

Good idea bad quality. You have to take it off & put the Kindle in. You can't use while its still in a case. The only good thing about this is protection for your Kindle. I am not going to recommend it. It was inexpensive but don't wasted time or money with this. Also very tight fit, takes some elbow grease to get on.
There where scenes that were too long for no reason.
Purchased this after my original stopped working.

My son received this doll as a birthday present. He has been carrying it around the house and putting on his baby doll's outfit for several days. The legs have already snapped off. It is not worth the money...get something sturdier! It's cute--but really cheap! I know because my friend's son got one also. Just to clarify- these are all made of foam material. It doesn't look or feel like anything that will last very long.

I have used a similar scale for years but mine quit working. So naturally i went and purchased the one my sister had gotten me at Costco. This is terrible. There was no on/off switch on mine. When it worked if you touched the handle to turn it off like a car alarm when brakes are coming up or any of that, you could read it. It didn't mean that it turned off.

This is more of a pamphlet than a book. It took only 10 mins to read and I was disappointed as it had such great reviews. The book seems like most other books you might find on the topic, but very short and not worth paying $6 for. There was only 5 tips which basically boiled down to, "You don't know until you're tested!! Don't get in an accident if it's possible," so basically that sums up his entire opinion.

These were advertised as stainless steel and they aren't...good price though if you're looking for plastic hangers. Also, there are several different sizes so check well on what size fits into which space.
Ok when i got these it was hard finding the right size for my 5 mo old boy but once we did...he did like them.... now its too small.

We had a small yard and these worked fine in areas where they were needed. I haven't tried it in the big yard, however. The bags are a little on the thin side, but for our purposes that's OK. They do work pretty well over long distances. The instructions say you can put them near ground level so that the dirt doesn't blow away, etc. This is actually not true, as it isn't easy to find some of those high spots with the unit set at ground, especially early on.
Very beautiful and fun colors. I love the way it pops on my phone easy to put on. Will buy from again

I tried to do a little research on this camera before spending the $500 on one. This one seemed like it was the right choice. Unfortunately when it arrived and we plugged all three cameras into our home network none of them worked! So since there are 4 hours left in the return period I'm just going to have get stuck with another product that doesn't work.

I enjoyed this book at the beginning of my reading of it. A little confusing later and difficult to follow however worth going on. It had me guessing a few times which made it interesting. The main character is very likeable, but many characters seemed similar - just slightly different. An easy read. Would recommend
The product delivered was in new condition. It came with everything needed to install. Great quality and looks good. I would recommend this product.

I picked up this book because on one hand it was about a girl, and the other hand some of the reviews said that girls are drawn to books with female leads. Maybe you will be swayed too, but my husband did not find this as enjoyable as we did. He's used to reading more serious literature, so he thinks if it's written well, even teenage boys will love it.

It's not what I needed but that is my fault so if I ordered it again would be nice to get something with more options though. If you're trying to use one of the products listed then that's probably all you'll need out of this kit so it's a good buy.

This was pretty good. If you ever went to high school it would make u laugh, i guess. I mean sure not for EVERYBODY but at the end of each chapter there is a bunch of facts so that makes more sense. But some jokes didn't get as good reviews as others and are better than others.

You cannot use this with a standard apple cord. If you need the cord to actually work, go buy an iPhone and download its App, or just get a mini USB cable... I don't want another one of these though! Very disappointed Amazon. This is false advertizing.

This book is adorable to young children. It teaches them how important family is,and what they can accomplish even if someone isn't around. Great way for kids from toddlers through grades 4 to5 when trying not to grow up without parents or friends around on their own.
The battery fit perfectly in my laptop. My computer now runs like new. Excellent price. Very happy with this product

I got this for use in a car as well and it will be fine during these long cold winter months. It seems to be a bit thinner than an old one we had. We'll see what happens down the road with it. This was advertised as fitting all vehicles but only worked once at our home. We returned them promptly however. We bought another from this company that works great also so if you want one, go ahead and buy one.

This is a cute and unique case, but you get what you pay for. The case did not last long. In less than 6 months the paint started peeling from around it, along with my cell phone. It was quite disappointing. If you're willing to have this in one piece then go for it. But if you want something that will hold up on its own, don't waste your money. And make sure it stays closed! I tried gluing mine closed, which worked until all of those tiny chips became exposed.

Having owned this laptop for several months now, one has to say that it's an okay computer. When you're working with computers all day, you definitely want a machine that can handle some video editing, photo processing, and music playback. My Dell Inspiron 5330s was the first computer I ever had when it came out, nearly ten years ago, and my current Compaq Presario CQ60 is the second computer I've owned.
i wanted my daughters kindle fire hd 7 inch.

The product description does NOT mention what regions this DVD player works in. They don't advertise anywhere. I'm sorry I wasted money. I'll know more when I take it back and they refund the full price (including shipping).

This thing has it all and can fit anywhere. It is so great for travel. I used this when we were at Disney, had a toddler who needed extra comfort, kept baby cool in the hot sun and didn't have to worry too much about him getting scratched up while on my lap. Love it! Highly recommend it.
It did not work. I am sending it back. The product appears to be made of thin cheap plastic. There seems be about 50% chance that the plug will not go in all the way.

I love these and they are easy to use. The only thing bad is like most other ice trays that have ridges it does take some practice for your fingers not to be all mangled by the edges. But that's my fault and I'm guessing this applies to more popular products. Over all, a great set of iceder.
Very happy with this set. The knives aren't that sharp, but are easy to sharpen. We would reccomend it for anyone who wants something cheap and very affordable.

This is not only our dogs favorite treat but ours. Easy on his digestive tract with no fillers or sugar in its ingredients. Thank you Dogswell for making an product that we can feel good giving our fur baby.
Very soft, colors are cute, very easy care with regular washings. Love how much he loves them, however they did shrink after one washing. So now I'm back at square one.
This booklet should have been free. There's nothing earth shattering in here, it's so basic! It's more like what your grandma, mom or whoever has told you.

I found the movie extremely entertaining. I've read an earlier book and have heard that it was much better, so this one is definitely more enjoyable. The acting of all involved does not disappoint. I'd say to anyone looking for clean wholesome entertainment - you won't be disappointed.

This movie is a remake of the great classic that came out in 1962. It made it into every home along with a bunch of other horror movies.
