There were those who thought this film wasn't scary and there was also people who said they liked it. For me I like it, but it had too much violence. The scene at the diner that has Brad Pitt chasing after his wife got on my nerves. How could anybody do something so stupid.

There is an intense scene early in this movie that just blew my mind. That alone makes it worth a viewing. As for the rest of it, not bad. The sound quality could be better (why can they do anything but release on blu ray these days?), but overall it's good enough. If you like martial arts films, you'll probably enjoy this. But make sure you've got enough sense to avoid being grossed out by it. I wouldn't recommend watching if you're prone to motion sickness. It's very violent.

The first time, they did not charge my phone. It turns on but does not connect. The second and third time when I plug it into the wall, only works if you just gently tap at it. I am currently in the process of trying to get a refund, because this product is NOT WORTH ANYTHING :(
Not all that great
The product was not very easy to use, the pictures are hard and not so clear in low light situations. I would not buy this product. Not a good deal.

Exactly as described on the website. Was so excited to get this case and it didn't disapoint. It's a little slippery when you start using it, but with some practice it's great. You would think that they wouldnt sell these types of cases for phones anymore, especially at $40, however, that's exactly why they're going under $20!!

I was surprised this didn't come to mind. The audio and video are not even close to HD quality. It is a total rip off. I've seen better in grade school productions. I'm going back as soon as i get paid. All three videos had some sort of glitch in them. You can see the pixelation on the screen. They were all scrambled by random lines across them at one point. This also happened with part three.
While it looks nice on my fridge, I am concerned that the sticker could become detached if someone were careless with it.

I don't have a lot of cash to put into car speakers. Not very much money at all this time around. The first day was super simple. So incredibly easy that you may think it isn't worth the effort. This is where Amazon comes in. My speakers arrived in 2 days. All my friends can stop wondering what they are even spending hundreds of dollars on. After installation, which took no longer than 20 minutes, then powered up some songs from iTunes and played through the factory speaker.
I love this movie alot.

I was really expecting something different from these books. They were predictable and somewhat boring. I'd pass on buying any additional ones unless you want them too. But don't forget you have to wait awhile until each of those are released.

It was a little longer than I wanted, had an awkward fit. It's ok for the price you pay if you're making this on purpose, and not for your personal use. But to show someone "Don't let me down!" makes it that much better. :-)

I purchased these lights for the winter to help illuminate our property on cold days. The install was very easy. However when they come on, only the left light turns on. And yes, my wiring is correct. This has never happened with any other LED lights, and it is really annoying that you can't tell if your lights are working without turning them off. When this happens, you'll have a great view of what happens but won't know anything about it.

It looks really cool on your desk, but as far the sound quality goes it does not do what I thought it'd do. The base in this thing is terrible. You can barely ever hear most types of music. I've turned up my iPod's volume all the way with no luck. But then again, maybe I'm just being too picky here considering it was only around $20 bucks. In any case, overall a lot better than other radios and small speakers that have to be plugged in.

This is a decent product but the clip was not strong enough to hold my Kindle which fell out even with it being attached firmly in place. I had to wrap elastic at both bottom and top of the case around each little corner to make up for its poor design. Would only recommend this device if it were made better. It doesn't have any padding so you will need something more sturdy. The cover needs improvement by having a magnetic closure or snap as my husband tried stretching it.

I bought this a few weeks ago and so far am VERY HAPPY with it. I'm the type of person that likes to be able turn my phone on at night before bed. The reason for not giving it 5 stars is because the "night" light isn't bright enough (it could use maybe 1/3 more brightness in what it does as nightlight) but other than that, it's fantastic.
This is a great product...not only does it taste delicious, but my hair feels healthier, shinier. I will keep using this.
This phone set was terrible. Didn't work. The base wasn't even plugged in. I just purchased another brand that works great. You get what you pay for. Lesson learned!
i really like the plant it looks nice and healthfull its a good healthy plants this item would make a great gift for someone

I like these a lot. They work pretty well, are easy to clean (even get into the water for cleaning them). Be warned, they won't be as fine as some of your finer mesh screens, but they're good enough that we no longer worry about our kids getting bits in their mouths. We have gotten a few years out of one so far. Our first set was plastic and got moldy with time.

This album is complete and utter cash. Its the same formula as all his previous albums only that he seems to have gotten lazy. No substance here. I'm glad I bought this on sale for 6 or something because if not I'd feel like a sucker buying this. It wouldn't even stay in my player. Save your money people, stick with any of his old music you can find cause this isn't it.

We purchased this item to fit our kitchen island. Our counter space is limited and we wanted a nice product that works well with small kitchens and stainless appliances. This shelf looks great, feels good to the touch, doesn't tip over easily (it can tip if you grab it wrong but only slightly), fits nicely in the cupboard, stays clean (no rusting etc) no problems so far.

I am trying to get a replacement but when you purchase it the box is sealed at all times and in new condition- it was sent without any packing materials. so the product has been tampered with before they got it. Amazon needs better inventory controls that prevent things like this from happening.
These are great for cooking on top of an electric stove. They have a nice weight to them. Very glad I bought them, you will too.

This book did not have much helpful info. It was basically about getting a horse to do anything. She had way too many tips on how to train your horse. There are ways in which all three children can learn. I found myself skipping over those parts because the information was nothing new. Not worth buying.

First off, the title and book cover make it seem more like a YA fantasy novel, but it's actually a very dark psychological thriller. The premise behind this novel had such a strong possibility for me - a teenage girl who lost her dad at twelve years of age as she was attacked by aliens. Now, in 2012, she's now thirteen and has to live with an extremely overbearing mother whose sole interest is punishing her.

This book has very little usable information on starting a blog, and less guidance about how to create one in it's own right. The authors seem more infatuated with Tumblr as an example blog page than they do using WordPress for a new blog. Since I've been doing blogging myself since 2002, I really doubt that this post was written much over six years ago.

I use this in my business and at home. Love it for all over home use. Easy set up right out of box on both PCs. Batteries last quite long. Keyboard light indicator looks great at night. USB port works well with wired keyboard. Logitech's products seem to be made well. No regrets here. Well worth $100.

The problem with this machine is that when the water level is just right, it shoots up out of the bottom and through your coffee maker, creating a very messy. Also, you have to be careful how much grounds you put in because they pour over into the machine. A small mess at first but it's pretty worth it, especially for those who love strong coffee.

After reading the reviews this looked like a cute little book for my 3 month old. However I find that many songs are annoying and sometimes it starts very boring before moving to actual song. Not impressed with all of them at all. It may be good in terms of educational but I think there have been better books out there. I thought he would love it. I'm still looking. :)

My mom bought this printer for me when my old HP 932xl finally decided to burn out. I thought it was a great printer at the time, but after using my new Canon MP490 I've come to realize how horribly outdated its print heads are and why HP no longer makes inkjet printers. To say that these prints look "off" is probably an understatement. It takes several hours just to produce one print, in fact, before printing out anything. This thing also goes through tons of ink.

This was my first time ever using an oil burner and I love it. Heats fast enough to cook all kinds of meals. Easy to clean. The only reason that I've given it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the control panel had a chip on it, nothing major or anything, but still. Good product.

Do not buy this product. It literally falls apart like a piece of junk. I bought it in December 2009 and it's only been used maybe 5 times. Just yesterday the sound no longer worked when trying to turn on or change channels. This is horrible for anything besides show sound. Also some people who posted reviews said you couldn't use an ipod. You can't. Apple did screw up making that feature completely useless by adding this adapter instead of supporting it. When buying it, look at the price tag.

The book seems to be well put together and is great for quick reference. However, I need a book like this in order to plan my journey from the point of view of someone who travels constantly as an engineer or technical consultant. There are several things missing that would have improved this book, including:- More detailed information on the history of aviation (pre & post war)- Less focus on aircraft manufacturers- Inclusion of some maps detailing routes across country with specific stops along those routes.

I bought this to play movies on my laptop. My computer won't recognize it for some reason. I have a Lenovo ThinkPad, and sometimes will work with other devices, but this one won't. This was kind of an easy fix, though, so that's not too much of problem. The device gets pretty hot, even when just sitting there, which is probably why it's so inexpensive.
I don't know why but it doesn't seem to really work for me. A little pricey. Maybe someone else would benefit.

The screen protector works, however there is a small bump between the speaker and home keys. That means the buttons push against something. Once I'm used to it, no problems. Overall, it was good product for its price. I'd recommend it. It comes with 3 protectors. One of them has started peeling on one side. Only time will tell if that happens or not. That's not why I marked off 1 star. So, all in all, this was definitely worth it! You do get what you pay for.
Purchased one as well as several friends at x-mas. We all enjoyed our movie nights in style with popcorn which we now make ourselves...thank you.
Works fine in the car, I use it every week.

I was disappointed in the book. Although I gave it a rating of 2 stars, there is little substance about what makes the Amish so different. Most books on this subject include their daily way of life or how they live. However, while Mr. DeMoss does cover these topics, and that he clearly wants to make an impact with them, reading the book becomes more annoying as time passes because you keep thinking his comments are just not true. Also, the information seems incomplete.

This book tells of a boy who loses everything from his beloved mother to the things he loved in life. His father is killed by a drunk driver. He must keep up his family and himself together until money can be obtained for the funeral. The author has an interesting way with words that I will most likely reread. It was also very sad at times, but showed how important it is when you love someone. Good job! And yes, I'd read another one if there were one.

I'm not kidding - these things are terrible. I only needed one, because one of my dogs loves to chew on things. The other was chewed open for the entire length by a dog who does NOT love chewing. Not sure how this could be marketed as an interactive toy. She is very aggressive but did no damage while she bit into one. Definitely would recommend giving him something else if you can find it, but will never buy again.
This product work great for my laptop.

As I said in my review, this is not an album that deserves 4 stars. It needs work. Maybe it's time to rethink your sales strategy, and make the kind of music you put out, more like what people want you to make. With the right direction from you, these guys could have a fantastic career. Hopefully it won't be too long. I still admire their talent, but please don't take yourself out on us with "filler." This CD would get 0 stars if I'd been able to.
This is one of those books where you have different opinions on war and people then me.

These are great for small areas of your garden. The flowers fit on a post or stake easily. They look nice as well but you need to buy some more adhesive since its only been on there about 3 weeks. Overall, good product, especially if it is just decoration. Just something else not directly affecting our health - so who cares. :)
The premise of this little story was quite clever - a small town girl with an imagination and talent meets up with the charming prince. But the execution left much to be desired.

It's a little to flimsy. But it works. And the price is ok so I can just purchase another one. But I'll have an extra one at home. Good price. Shipping ok. Not as fast shipping but that's okay. Will deal with them again.

Got this book to teach my daughter how to write her own story. However, I found it so boring that she was not interested in writing with crayons. She preferred me to take pictures of what we wrote. So there was no point for any art work. The book has a lot of interesting information, but only if you are reading about the history behind these creatures. Not much else at all here. My husband is even bored by it. He loves science and really thinks everything should be explained well.

Bought new in a sealed box from Best Buy. Works well, the suction doesn't hurt my carpets and it cleans up real well too. I wouldn't have spent this much money for something that works better than others I've seen. But it's very cheaply made for a $350 vacuum. The hose is coming off. The plastic handle popped out when adjusting it, and there's dust all over it. Just bought another brand (which I'm happy with). This one's back at Walmart... :( Oh well.   Rating: 2.

This book is excellent for my needs, but I need the hard copy to reference back to in class. But this one works great! It comes with a USB cord so you can plug it into your computer and share worksheets from home or work, which saves me all that time. You should already have an internet connection, no cable needed as long as you are connected via WPA/security. Once connected, simply search online videos, etc. There isn't much programming on it, just do what they say.

I just got my case in the mail and it matches perfectly with white Ipod. It's a very good protective case- great protection around ipod. Easy to take off, clean (comes with plastic screen cover that isn't needed but is nice access), access ports easily. Very pleased. Would definitely recommend!

Great idea.... But way too overpriced for a tiny book. It should be no more than 10 dollars not 16. My kids (3 & 4) LOVED the idea and were excited to get it, but so far (2 months) haven't really finished it because its just one picture. The only thing my oldest has done with this is go online and search how do i apply stickers. Other reviews have mentiond that after awhile they come off. Not so.
This is really nice product for our little pool. The price was reasonable also. It has been used for over a year, we are still happy with product.

There are some great songs on this CD, but the remastering job was poor! The clarity is excellent, but I could barely hear any of Mark Knopfler's bass guitar and lead guitar. If you really want to enjoy Dire Strait's songs, buy a studio album. Don't waste your money buying this. I've had it for years now, hoping that one day they'll do a good clean up job. When someone does it, please let me know!

I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my wife, whose hands need more comfort than gloves. She loves them. They were worth the money and I recommend them to anyone who wants some gloves but can't afford a full glove set.

Really pretty. Does not fit perfectly over top fingers and does slip around quite easily. Do they add extra holes to create this? I'd like that. Otherwise, love them. And also love how quickly shipping. Ordered Monday, got here Wednesday. Good quality for price. Would buy from seller again, just maybe in different styles.

My experience is that this charger does NOT work at all. It was recommended by the Apple store where I purchased both my MacBook Pro and iPad 4 (not sure about iPhone 4S).Don't spend your money on an apple product. This one has not worked for me in any way! The plug doesn't fit snug against either port. Not pleased AT ALL.
It doesn't come close to holding charge longer than 15 minutes. After all that time on battery, it's still not charged. So disappointing. No quality control. Would expect better.
They sent me a regular one instead of the correct one. So I did not get to use it. The picture here is very misleading.
this product only lasts 1 year, it just dies out.i am not a happy costumer at all. i had to throw em out before they started leaking water. now its time for me 2 order new ones.

This is a good book on preparing a young person for college. I think it's written very well and fairly easy to read. However, there are typos all throught the book. Just something that needs to be fixed. The information doesn't appear to lie in depth, just enough to get you started but not sure how helpful it's really going to be. Good read, though.

Don't waste your time or money! The characters are shallow, the plot is predictable, and there really isn't anything redeemable about this book. A good book doesn't have to be filled with cuss words (lots of them in this book). This one is definitely not worth reading. I hope readers don't fall for this. It was just awful. I'm very disappointed. It's a shame too, because it has an intriguing subject matter. Just wish they would've stayed on topic.

I purchased these because of the nice design so that you don't have to take them out after each use. However, when using them, they tend to fold up and go in very tight making it difficult to insert into your ear! As for sound quality, they're better than a lot of other headphones I used. Not sure if that's worth the effort though... They might be able to last longer with some breaking in...
This story gave me some information about John Paul Stevens that I didn't previously know. The first chapter or two may seem slow, but stick with it. What follows will surprise you.

I really enjoyed the book. Well written, keeps you going. Easy read. A little predictable though. You have to get through chapters that seem like just filler. That being said, it's hard not to be engrossed in this story. I'm anxious for book two. Can't wait.

This book is an entertaining read, but it takes the story way too much time. I've enjoyed series books that I could read in a day or two, just something quick to pass some time - this one took me two full days to read. All of these characters are pretty interesting, and yet by their own admission they haven't formed any true bond so far. It appears as though there will very little development through book two. It's going to be rather boring until more happens.
We are using these as treat baggies. They keep perfect little bites of fruit on the bag. The seal works fine but not too tight or difficult to use. Great price too!

this book was good. it showed us how people can be the very thing they are trying to get away from. I could read more just to find out what happens.we like that in a book. This is worth your time but not as much as her others. You need others if you want to move on from that. Read them first though!
Really not worth even reading. Glad it was a free purchase. The writer should have saved his time if he had done any research on this subject. Very poorly written. And a very unconvincing story.

I really hoped that this book would have helped my little baby girl. Unfortunately, it fell seriously short in giving any guidance and help. My daughter is only 21 pounds at the moment, and she has had a pretty smooth first 6 weeks. The information provided was helpful, but no one told me what to expect. I've kept reading though hoping there were good suggestions on how long for breast feeding. There was. They suggested not to breastfeed as early or all day - just until the milk comes up.

The CD was purchased with some excitement because of my great admiration and respect for the composer Richard Strauss. This piece will only be added to his huge catalog as a musical disaster. It is utterly devoid of drama or passion. No passion at all. I would say more about this but Amazon just won't allow me to. One can only presume that Strauss's music did not inspire these performers who should be ashamed of themselves. This really shows poor judgment on behalf of Amazon.
The songs on these cd's are wonderful.
Although it is not the quality that our original one was, this new item works perfectly and was very reasonably priced. Quick service and a great value! Thank you!

These are good basic filters and work well with my vacuum cleaner. I used to be able to get these at Wal-Mart, but those places have closed, so I'm pleased that Amazon carries the filters. They were a very reasonable price. The shipping was quick too. My only complaint is in how they came packaged. There wasn't any sort of packing around them on their arrival or when we received them. We didn't have anything broken or damaged as far as damage, though. That's why no five stars.

My daughter used this book for a class and so we have it at home. I was amazed he really wanted it. I know my son read other books now but not in english. The colors are pretty but hard to read. Maybe if it were bigger type would be better. Overall good price. No scratches on the inside of book. Good seller too. Shipped quickly. Thanks

I have loved this book since it first came out, but the new translation and style don't reflect what is actually written in The Lord of the Rings. It reads more like fantasy than story with some odd word choices thrown in. At first, even though reading them one after another was difficult, they were a fun escape read, which the author did well by giving each character their own voice in his writing.

The whole movie has been one big joke from the beginning. Why do I give it 5 stars? Because its one of those movies that is not as stupid as some other so-called comedies. Its got laughs and a plot. If you want to see something fun with funny situations, then go for it. Otherwise, just sit back and turn off your brain. It's so well written that it's hard get it out of your mind. Great lines like "He really had me fooled" in this movie. You cannot miss it.

The product did not work in our Panasonic TV or computer at all. So much for the "smart" features. I returned it and bought a Sony instead. It works! My wife wanted a smaller TV, but the screen on that one was too big from edge to edge. We have an old 42" Sharp Aquos which works great, with minimal glare. The sound isn't great, but you can add external speakers if needed. The Samsung is fine as long as your monitor supports HDMI.

My husband used to have his razor handle on the side which made for awkward placement & it always gave him trouble shaving. Now he has it right down where it's handy instead of having an unsightly razor. I love it. It even shipped sooner then expected.

I have had it for just over one year. It didn't last very long before the display gave out. The numbers were still visible, and after turning off the radio to save power, you could not see them. Not happy. My second garmin was a 765t and that one started showing signs of having issues around 1 year in. I'm trying not to buy another garmin, my first 760 lasted me 3 years. Maybe this new 750 will actually last? I'll let ya know.
What a rip off, don't waste the money! This one is cheaply made and hardly works. Not worth it! There are so many better ones than this!
the unit that I purchased only last 1 month and 2 days...never will be able to order another one from this dealer..very disappointed..
This was definitely not what we expected. Its made out of cheap plastic unlike other reviews that i read about how sturdy this was.

I purchased 2 of these - one for myself and my husband, who has Parkinson's. As the picture indicates, they are more black than white or "espresso" colored. It wasn't a deal breaker, as we just wanted them to use in our guest bathroom. They look nice but have not held up. One leaked upon receipt. A few have rust spots, including on handles after only 1 bath. Very lightweight. Not sure how long they'll last. We won't purchase again.
I bought these protectors when they were listed as "used.

This book should be called "The New York Times and the rest of Hollywood vs. Silicon Valley." The stories covered are either too complex or just don't apply to business or technology. I would much prefer more analysis from a former newspaper reporter than an author who isn't particularly good at presenting stories. The only real value is in having some hard numbers on the power of big companies without paying attention to what kinds of people run them.

The product was defective right out of the box. It wouldn't take a charge. I plugged it into my computer to try charging but got "Not charging" flashing on it. I ordered another battery from this company and that one arrived quickly after ordering which has been fine. I've had no problems with any other Anker products so I'm hoping the replacement they send works for me. For now just getting by until Amazon finds me a new replacement is fine though.

i used half of the amount called for. after 6 days, my eyes itch alot and burning. not sure what product to use. if you have oily eye then this is for you. I also use contact solution which help a lot. maybe it needs more oil in ingredients. i will add oil.

Very well made, my dog loves them and I know he is getting a great nutrition…He eats everything on these treat pockets. Great Product! Fast Delivery. Highly Recommend to others who want their dogs eating healthier. We love the taste of our sweet potato treats too!

I agree with other reviewers who state that this book could have been so much better. The plot was rather thin and, though the characters were well drawn, it wasn't very entertaining. But what did save this books for me from a 1 star review is McNaughton's writing style. She has such an interesting and creative world building style where she's able to show you quite clearly what's going on without ever speaking to you, which makes her a truly unique voice in fantasy writing.
A real disappointment.

The book looked like the one in my old library. I just was very excited to read it. When did they take it out from libraries. It's a sad state of affairs when we cannot find older books anymore. Why don't people start reading them anymore--then maybe they'd care. This is not a novel. It has no plot, no interesting characters. Just lots and lots of sex - nothing more. If you're bored with your life you may enjoy this book, but that's about all it's good for.

My son wanted this hat for his birthday. We ordered it 2 days early and when we opened up one package - there was only 1 hat. So they sent us another one. We got that in less than 48 hours. On top of that, it doesn't fit right. It's really small. He can't see out of it....looks pretty bad. Don't waste your money.

I've been buying this tea in bags for years and love the smooth mellow flavor. This last box was really bad. It tasted sour and there were brown specs floating around when I opened it. Not sure what happened to it? Either I got a bad batch, or they changed their formula, because before it had no problem. Just seems like such cheap production quality these days for things as simple as tea. It's time to move on, even though I'll try making another cup now.
Love it! Only thing i wish this had though is for my boyfriend he likes how its all pink with out being to girly lol.

While it looks like a great concept, and the price is right, it's simply not worth it. The ink bleeds through to the other side of your print -- thus making every single letter look like crap. I put them in for printing job #5, which had several hundred pages, and by page 6 90% were smudged or faded.

I purchased this to hold my iPad 2, which is still in its original box. After reading a few of the reviews and learning that the box was really designed for small tablets like iPod Touch (mini), Kindle, etc. ( the package says it only fits Kindle sizes), and it works great with those. However, as I have an iPad, I ended up using two parts from one part of the order just by chance so now I'm left with half and the other doesn't need it.

I really like the writing style of this author, but what about proofreading?? Spelling mistakes, missing words, extra words from sentences where you didn't even think it should be there, etc. It was very distracting... The characters weren't too bad, not great, and nothing great. A pretty thin plot, a little on the unbelievable side. Not that it's written in any way poorly, just had my attention drawn somewhere else. And now to see if there are more from her...
Not only the battery that comes with it sucks.. It didn't last very long. I charged for like 8 hours and still took about 2 hrs. to get my laptop fully charged. Don't waste your money.. Save it! :(

I really like the story but was a bit disappointed in how it was translated to kindle. Not sure if they converted it from print to ebook or what. There were many words that did not come as obvious and had me going back over my read twice.

I have two dogs. This bag is perfect for my needs. It hangs down and makes them feel like more of an individual. It's large enough to carry all the tools plus food treats, litter, poop bags etc. In addition it has pockets that are great for holding any other supplies you may need. Perfect for walking your dog on a leash or having her hold in place. No worries about accidentally dropping their supplies. I purchased 3 so 4 when she's ready. :)
It is rare when I've been totally disappointed in any book from Dean Koonz.

I bought this item for my husband. He had another on a larger scale. It broke and he could not find another. So when we were at our local mall his was stolen so this is just what he needed. Great service and great product. We are very happy with it :) Thank you! Happy husband! :-)

I really enjoyed reading the series. It had a mystery and romance. The only problem was that it left me hanging. What happens to these characters after you read part 2? You don't get answers. That's disappointing. I'm hoping for more of an ending than that. Other then that, very enjoyable. Thank you.

I've never given a book as much of my time reading material from Amazon. This is the first review that I have ever written on here and this was because I could not finish it. Maybe it would get better, but I just couldn't stomach how long it's taking to read. First off, let me try to sum up what you want out there for those considering reading:To be sure, the overall story line is rather unique.
At first glance, this seems like just another fluffy romance, with all cliché plotlines that remind you of every other 'chick' book, right down to the fact that she's an only child.

The movie is great! I enjoyed every bit, from the plot, to the settings, to the music and choreography. However, when you watch this movie, know that all of these elements are in fact only part of what make it!What makes it not as great as others have made it? My main problem with it, for me was its lack of plot. In fact, if a plot had been included, even subtly, then everything else would be perfect.

The only thing I had wrong was the packaging as when it came in you can tell someone else is going to come off and try to make something out of them but none happened yet. A great find for this Christmas season. And it does look exactly like how they are shown!!! It will be much appreciated! :) THANKS! A+++ for fast shipping. Thanks again! :D You can't beat that with a bat!! :D Thanks!
A difficult book if one wants deep meaning with a story line involving loss.

Not a great book, but there was something about it that kept me reading and wishing to see where the story would go. I wish for more development of relationship between Michael and his girlfriend. I think they were just meant to be together.

We were so disappointed by these cups. They are not microwaveable and they smell musty after you wash them. I even tried putting them under running water to get rid of the smell. There is still a strong smell, but we don't drink out of them. We have washed ours several times, dried them, boiled them. Nothing works. These cups will go in the trash since it's more trouble than it's worth. I had also decided on ordering two sets of tumblers as well, hoping for some good news with those.

Just to give you an idea, I am in my early 20s and have had no previous experience with this kind of thing. I've watched plenty on the subject but never read anything from either side before. I'm not sure how anyone like some reviewers here can claim that what she writes is "well-researched. '" This book was simply written by someone who does know the history of women's rights issues, just a lot more watered down than one would expect.
This story has potential however the character development and details needed development. The characters themselves were well developed.
No complaints! Just give them a treat. All six of my kitties enjoy these treats. Great value for three packages! Arrived on time, well packed - not broken. Good product.

I tried to contact you regarding the status of my order and you didn't return any messages. I'm out 50 bucks. 
 Rating: 1.0 
 After reading reviews on this product that suggested it would charge a battery while computer was off, I purchased one. It does not work at all. If I plug in either battery, then try plugging in when machine is turned on, there isn't enough juice. In contrast, using an AC adapter, which I have always used, still works. Not happy with product.

I ordered this product in November and I'm still waiting for it to arrive. You can only track the package through USPS which will take you about 3 weeks, but not 1 month. It's very frustrating. Do NOT order, just get it from a store close by. The actual product is of high quality though. Hope this helps! :(
We purchased two Asus ME502T-LA 10.1-inch tablets on 12/3/2013 and are very happy.

The item that I purchased was a gift for my brother. He is very happy with it. So far the product looks durable. We will see if it lasts through our next power outage. :) Thanks so much! I'm very pleased. :)

Fits and works great. Keeps it protected from scratches. Wish there were additional colors though (mint green, navy blue, teal) to enhance readability outside. When you have light on in room, sometimes words are hard to read. Would definitely recommend for any Kindle owner.

This battery is NOT genuine Motorola and it will only charge when you hold down on it. If you're using your phone, plan on holding it all day. I've spent more time than I'll ever spend being able to make a call.
The product was sent fast. Although I have not tried this yet i am confident it will work well with my camcorder. The price and quality are both very good. Thanks for the service!

Not easy to use and I found the results not very accurate! You need a good eye for such details when you are taking your blood pressure. Also in order to get accurate readings one needs to watch one's pulse. If you take this type of device with an expensive equipment than it is wise that you go there first if you're new at using it. A great gadget!This unit was probably a bit older or something, which is why it had problems.
it was the wrong size. I didn't try to return them because they weren't worth my time and energy. Don't care for them. Maybe someone else will have better luck with them, but not me.. oh well. :-(
This book was not well written. It left me wanting more. I did enjoy the ending though. That's about all there is good to say about this book.

I expected this to be more interesting rather than a review of basic ideas. The writing was not all that good, in addition, the ideas are just common sense. In short, I guess if this is what you want it does provide some good information on how to use different social media tools, however, there must be better books out there. I also thought the price was way too high. It only cost me two dollars, but with free shipping (Prime), it's worth at least five dollars!   Rating: 2.

I have had multiple of these for several years and they seem to do the job. For many items it is very easy to turn them in a circle instead of the more expensive type that you must turn. That being said however, if you're doing just one or two pieces of cake all day I would pick up longer ones. This comes with eight but honestly who needs 12 when you have one.

It looks and acts like the original, but after about two weeks, it started to malfunction by dropping my connection. I would not recommend buying this cable. Buy something from a reputable brand instead. This is just what you pay for with cheap quality. Spend your money elsewhere.
This is just not music to spend time with. The beat does little to set the mood.

This case is good as long as your not too rough with it. Just get a sleeve or something else. It has had no problems so far. And shipping was fast. I'm a college student. It's easy enough to clean but doesn't wipe right off if u drop it on something.
Awesome quality, especially for the price! This is our second one that we bought in a year! I highly recommend!

I needed an inexpensive tripod to shoot at events and this one did the job. The only complaint that I've had is not with the tripod, but more so due to my own expectations for a low-price item. It does tend to shake pretty easily. Even after tightening it, it moves very easily when the wind blows against it. Overall, I'm satisfied enough with it. For less than $30, you can't really expect much.

This DVD is so much fun for all ages! It's great to hear the old and modern versions. I had a problem with my DVD's one of which was defective. Amazon replaced it right away. You can't beat their customer service! Love this collection. The new movies are just as wonderful. One can never go wrong on any of these movies!!! Thank you Amazon.com!! Keep up your good work. Thanks again for having such a wonderful selection of films! God Bless you!!Barbara from Texas.

This is almost the only movie I've seen with a black cast...but it had an excellent story line. I thought all the actors were great....especially the kids! They certainly stole some scenes from those little kids they dressed up. What else can you say???? It was good, very well done. Very well done!
The picture looks exactly as described, however once i opened it there were many pieces missing (like 20 total) so that in total no instructions or anything came with it.
Great price but it seems there are better products out there.
This movie was released at a time when there were great efforts underway in films that challenged popular American values to express their opinions through film.

I love this author. This book was a very slow read. Too many characters to remember who is married who. Lots of boring history about all the other characters. Not enough plot for my liking. It needs more action! Maybe the author will write another. But don't waste your time. If you are looking for action pick something else!

I have owned a Krups espresso machine in the past that worked great, but this one, although it looks great and works wonderfully, makes terrible coffee. It doesn't get hot enough to burn my hand after brewing 4 cups of coffee or if you let it sit on top for 3 hours. And we are only drinking two cups.

The story was very basic and not at all believable. It kept my attention. However, the main character fell far too fast in love. It seemed like there should have been more buildup before things started to develop. I also didn't care for her mother being a real bitch. Who does that?

I was a little weary at first when purchasing this product, however, decided to try it out and couldn't be happier! I've heard so many good things about the product but I'm usually too cheap for an impulse buy without doing my home work, which is why now that i have some of these in my house i'm glad i checked them out! For the price, you can't beat it!The delivery service with PRIME made me very happy.
As soon as my first pair broke off due to being pulled out after one run, I saw all these bad reviews. For 10 bucks at Target, those were awesome.

The product is a staple for my home bar. Easy to use easy clean. This will last me much longer than what the manufacturer estimated. It should but you may want your own way of dispensing at least once as it has little round holes in it. However I find that very easy to hold and pour while still pouring - maybe because I'm not used them yet, however I would recommend this purchase over any others. I have been using these since Christmas 2012 and they work great.

Bought two sets of these tea sets for my granddaughter who is in love w/Tinker Bell. They're beautiful, bright colors & sturdy, well-made products. Very pleased especially since it's a hard item to find on sale like this.

This is a great product! The product has all the ingredients described in the ingredients. I love it, and would recommend it to any one who wants to maintain healthy. It's also very easy on your budget. Thanks for allowing this to be sold. Thanks!
It broke before i even got it! :( i am VERY unhappy with this product.dont do it. Dont buy it. & lt;3 NOT A GOOD PRODUCT AT ALL!!!
These are my absolute favorite little candies. Hard to find. Love these and will keep coming back for this delicious treat. Thankyou so much Amazon. Love it.

This is my first experience with a Roku so I have nothing to compare what the others are supposed to do and how they work like other boxes. After having it about 2 weeks we set up a family of five. It was relatively easy installing it. However the picture quality for streaming Netflix movies is pretty good, but not great.

the unit was dead & not worth attempting to replace with it. I have had 2 replacements and these were just as bad.

These look very slick with red accents, so if that's what you care about go for it. But they're absolutely useless - terrible sound quality and an extremely poor design. There's one major problem though: the wiring has been rendered useless.

I received this book to read while commuting on my Bike. To start the story is written in first person from one of two main characters who both live or work in Ireland. The other character is an American (yes, I'm American!) and she works as a freelance journalist, doing "interviews" ( her words) for foreign countries. However, it appears that there are three main countries they must report on.

I received this as a gift to replace my old Dell which is about 10 years old but still works great for the price. It worked fine first 2 months or so until we discovered that it was just slow and needed some major system upgrade. We figured out from Dell support what might be causing this:1. This Asus motherboard has 4 MB of DDR RAM instead of 5 MHz like most other netbooks in same price range. My guess - probably not enough heat.2.

I gave this a star in order to post this, however it has nothing to do with the quality, but the fact that they sent me 2 different sets. Not very happy about that. Also, if you are using them for your dog and want something sturdier, these wont last long, because even though my dogs aren't overly rough on them, they will not stay on. I am not the most experienced espresso drinker but this machine takes my coffee making to a level of excellence that I never thought was possible. The quality is perfect from first pull of the water through your cup. It takes about 3 minutes start to finish and you are ready for coffee. This model replaces an older Saeco model that produced incredible crema. My next purchase will be more machines as I have finally found them all at Amazon. Highly recommend this machine.

I'm a professional audio editor, and I've owned the HM-50 for about 5 months now. At first I was very impressed with these headphones. The sound clarity and noise canceling ability made my music much more enjoyable. While listening to an NPR news show, with their powerful broadcast of traffic around Boston in 2009, it became clear that this was my favorite headphones on the market. For those unfamiliar with FM, Boston's Traffic Radio is free over our wireless system because they can go all day long without interruption.

This product works like a charm and is exactly as advertised. Very good sound reproduction quality, long battery life, light weight which makes this little machine super easy to carry. The seller was quick with the shipping also. A perfect fit for my needs. Thanks again. Bob

First off, let me start by saying that I am an extremely huge and devoted fan of Steven King - particularly his horror masterpieces, Pet Semetary, Christine, Dark Tower, The Stand, IT, etc. Having said that, if you have read these classics (and they are classic, folks), don't bother with this DVD. It is, in my opinion, a cheap attempt at capitalizing on Stephen's popularity. Don't buy it unless you're prepared to be disappointed, then go right ahead & watch it.

I just read this for the first time and while it was enjoyable, there were quite a few glaring issues/problems. Secondly, I'm not entirely sure if we're told what era but they seem more like Victorian times. When reading other reviews about the language, etc., I can't help but thinking how much we might improve with modern techniques.

This book is about a little girl named Anna who can hear spirits. Her sister Violet has died of the measles and her father left home to come live with them. I got this battery for my wife's Compaq laptop and she has had it in her computer since January 2013. As per the standard specs, its capacity should be at least close to 3 hours. The actual usage on our model is approximately 1 hour an hour, so it feels like less than that.

This is one of the best little products for your car that I have ever encountered. It works exactly as advertised and I've had no issues with it. Not a good read. I can only read about 10% of one book and sometimes it is hard to go back in time. If you are going into this series for the first time then try not to. The product description does not make this clear. The concept is not what I expected. Instead of a book that teaches the language you get "notes" how it should be learnt. So if your looking for something that's going to help teach this particular language. Or maybe it's just a good book but like reading notes. Either way don't waste your money. There are MUCH better books out there. As one reviewer pointed out..there IS also Pimsleur which I learned from.
my wife and i thought she would want some something else but then they arrived that gave her such pride we love them..they were easy to put on. thanks! :D now the kids have some. :)

I really wanted my son to love this. He is a huge Thomas fan. After purchasing the battery pack only to find out it doesn't provide enough power so that there will be an annoying hiss whenever he plays with it, we discovered other problems. One, his wooden tracks won't fit onto this and two, even after putting pieces on from various sets, all of them don't fit securely or stay together. You can get two trains running in opposite directions but that's not very fun.

We bought this to replace a battery powered blower and weed eater. What did we find? An inferior piece of equipment. It does not run continuously as the ad says. The speed controls are so poorly designed that you will likely need two people at times just to keep it running. After only about 50 continuous minutes, all batteries were toast. On average for five minutes or so, I can get 3 hours use out of 2 batteries. A real pain in the butt when you're working far from an electrical outlet.

The product showed up in a damaged box with the cord missing from one side. I was able to use it for 2 days before returning it since everything that seemed loose or defective when i got it. It only worked ok on my xbox, but could not even connect properly with ps3/wii. Even had difficulty connecting them through a single wire as mentioned by other people. My advice, spend your $60 at best buy and get something of better quality. I've contacted amazons seller, no answer.
We bought two of these cameras from BB.

I've had this product a little over 30 days and it no longer works. The charger doesn't work. I really wish the quality of these chargers were up to par. Waste of money. Buy somewhere else so that you can try them before buying.

I'm so glad I went with the 8 GB and 64 bit version. It runs super fast. It's great that you can still use up to a 32G microSD card after putting Windows 8.1 on it. The only thing bad about it is the speakers aren't really great. But it's fine for using as an HTPC when all your other peripherals are in use.

Don't waste your time or money on this movie. If you're reading this, you know how it ends, so no need for me to try and convince you. But I don't think I've ever seen a movie worse than this. From the first shot, it's clear there was no budget, just amateurish special effects, poorly executed acting, bad script and poor directing. Not even remotely believable, in any way shape or form (and that usually doesn't happen).
It looks great with the rest of my kitchen appliances. It's functional and attractive at a good price. Buy it - buy it. You won't regret it! A very nice product.

I don't know what the last review is talking about when they compare this book to "The Great Gatsby." That's just a bunch of crap! They have both read similar books like "Moby Dick," but unlike most fiction that consists chiefly of dialogue between two characters, it actually happens in our own history.
Just like having the original to enjoy over and over. I watch it every Christmas season. My mom loves them too!

The item itself is great - really nice quality of construction. But when I received it in the mail it was not fully packed so the handle was already "floppy" but it's still usable. It didn't fall apart or anything. A bit disappointed though. :(

If you want to learn the basics of web design then this book is for you. But that doesn't mean it's a quick read. It takes more time. I personally found my head filled with bits and pieces all at once while struggling through this. A good part of me was left waiting in pain (yes, pain) but it ended up being worth it. I had so much fun reading about these great people behind Dreamweaver.

I thought the book was great until the end. It wasn't a satisfying finish. The author did a wonderful job with all of the characters, but the climax seemed rushed in this novel. I'd recommend this book to anyone. Read it, enjoy it...just don't skip any pages. In my opinion, it would really be better if they had stuck w/ the story up till now.

The first few pages of your book, I just couldn't stop laughing. After reading the whole thing, it felt like someone else had written it. My favorite part was when you mentioned that a certain character is named Joanne. Good God, why didn't we get to see that? It seemed so out there and almost laughable. Don't waste my time, but if you're really interested in this memoir, read a copy at the library.

I tried to install the battery correctly and it just wasn't that intuitive. On top of it, there is no light indicator, so you don't know if it's charging. If there's a charging symbol, then the battery shouldn't be dead. The only indicator here are LEDS at night time which change colors. It appears that, in this application, they put much less effort into creating an easier user experience for consumer.
These lights are not that good. The price seems to come down quite a bit and now I don't trust them. If the light is actually working as intended, you will be better off buying something else.

I wanted to like this book. The idea behind it just sounded so interesting. Unfortunately, the poor writing and lack of character development put a bad taste in my mouth. For me, the biggest problem was all the little details that did not add anything to or advance the story. It felt as though something important had been left on a very lazy editor's desk, waiting for another writer to get their act together. To make it worse, there is no real progression in character.

I really like these gloves. The only issue is after wearing them for a few months they stretch out or something. Then you get wrinkles on them. But overall, they work great. You can take the hood off if need be. If I had to buy again I'd purchase just for riding purposes only, but otherwise love them! Would recommend this product. :-)

I am not a religious person so this is my review. It sounded okay, read the back about it being based on facts from true history and what not. But after reading several chapters,I wanted to scream. The first few chapters were quite interesting with new information regarding these particular women who did such horrible things but then they seem like just another fairytale story. This book might appeal to someone that was in 8th grade or something but, for me, the story is very weak.   Rating: 2.

I've been watching it ever since I was little, because it really brings back memories..................great show to watch with the one you love. Thanks again Amazon for making it possible to download and enjoy all of your products.
This product had me up an running as it was extremely easy to install and started right away.....Highly Recommended..... A+ rating in my book.

I bought this and an Otter box for my S4 phone - this case was easier to apply on the phone, seems like it is more durable than otter box, a little difficult in removing but that's what you get with silicone. Also protects better, although that isn't important too me. Just looking to protect your phone. The screen protector also has less problems smudging. For those who prefer Otterbox's rugged protection, maybe not worth it, if you want extra protection then you should consider this.
This does nothing to make an old Panasonic DVD-VCR obsolete - this seems more like a "scam". Don't buy it, spend some money and get something that works.

The music is wonderful. Really brings back warm memories for anyone who lived through that period. Even though it's from 1973, there really wasn't any profanity or other material like you see on some DVD's.

The movie was well worth watching but I thought it strayed too far from the book. It's a great addition to any book lovers collection. You can't help yourself and enjoy this movie. It is like having chocolate cake mixed with vanilla ice cream. It's good, it's just not exactly what I thought for some reason. Good buy for sure! Definitely going to add one to my Kindle list.

The cord is a complete waste of money. There were many negative reviews on here about it and I was not impressed. My suggestion to you is, "Don't buy it!" It is cheap but that will tell you something right off the bat. At least Amazon allows returns.
The only problem with these hooks is they break easily when trying to adjust them. One broke. Otherwise, I love these.

This does work but I couldn't get my dog to use it. I tried training him and now he just sits with it on his head staring at me while he's in his food bowl. It's a cute toy for the price.....nothing fancy. But that's about all it's good for. So be careful what you buy especially as pets can chew through anything. My dogs have chewed this thing up pretty well already! All that said I'm thinking of trying again since we're so happy with some other Kong toys.
This story is based around the three main characters, Sam, Emily, & Dan. It's a sweet romance novel.

This is one of my many favorite books since I was a child, over 50 years ago. A great and timely story. The story makes you realize your own life in this modern age, what can go wrong at any moment. Not well played on TV or Movies. Get it. Amazon got it here the night before Christmas because only 3 ships where available. It arrived much later, but worth waiting for. They will have better shipping next time around. Thanks, Amazon. Thanks to all involved. You made everyone happy. Thank you.

I love the story and plot of this book, however for my taste the romance portions were too much to handle. Just because you are a great writer, don't add so many sexual scenes that take away from the story's plot.

It was okay. I'm a sucker for thrillers and the like but you know what really bugs me? I always feel bad doing it when someone says that they enjoy this movie. All in all it's not horrible, there are some decent scenes, its just kind of mediocre. If you're sick to death to see something that's called "Taken" then by all means check out this movie, although i'm sure you'll be disappointed.

I have to admit that the first 2 books were not all that terrible. The fourth had me hooked. But here comes an ending where a series is given up. You can only do so much, it seems. This was a huge slap in my face and left me feeling really cheated. It was just too bad. And even though i like this genre, this was poorly done. As much as you read the series, its one of those "you gotta finish it" kind of books.

I like a little romance in my books. Not as much sex. This book is not it. It was to graphic for me. Also at that point it felt more of an old fashioned romantic love story. When two people fell totally in each other. He even helped her run into the bathroom because she came out when he got her?! Seriously!? That guy really needed some therapy. No no no! Just no. You don't just give your heart away.

The book is written as a series of vignettes. I was looking to read about the life and development of an individual who overcame adversity as it relates to her family. This seemed like an interview from one person with just that personal experience to base the rest off of. Not enough meat to really make me interested in finding out what happenend or why. If not for lack of time I'd have given up very early on when this first story ended.

While the material was comfortable, these sheets are too big for our 13" waterbed, so we really could not utilize them. I would recommend this product only if you have a huge mattress in a king bed. The elastic is great and they seem well made. They came from China so it took about three weeks to arrive, but worth it. I believe that most people looking at this product, even though they claim on their site, that there are other versions of them, will be disappointed.

I bought this book because of price and the excellent reviews on it...and even paid for next day shipping.....but what a letdown....there is nothing in the book, you could find online with much more detail to help guide in actually using an iPod touch to the fullest... I'm sure if you're already looking at this, it will be just fine......just don't think it's going to help me out of my comfort zone when coming up new stuff or getting things done.

I can't wait to finish this book. I'm not ready for the second half. This series started off so well, but, after reading other books by Ms. Brown, and seeing she hasn't improved much, it reminds me why I used to enjoy her previous series. These are getting old..nothing happens, everyone is just there...

As a fan of the original, I found 'The Last Crusade' to be as bad (and just silly) as so many other action films on DVD released over recent years. The whole plot is ridiculous (how could the aliens come back at you when they're supposed to get knocked out by an explosion and then magically recover?), along with the acting -- which reminded me of watching 'Die Hard.
I enjoy reading this book. It gives a lot of practical information. I would recommend to friends and family.
Not my type of book. I don't like to read about murder and murder. Will think twice/ look for another author.
Not sure what all these 5 star reviews are about.

The first thing I noticed about this album when it came out, was how much the lyrics were based in sexual imagery and fantasy. This is nothing new. What a few reviewers here claim to find exciting or intriguing about songs like "Sweet Child O' Mine" by Guns n' Roses and "Dirty Sticky Floors" by Led Zeppelin did exactly that. Then again, not everybody liked those tunes. You just can't make everyone happy.

I have read many books that deal with this topic. This book in no way does that. It doesn't even touch on a couple of the subjects it was supposed to cover. If all you want is an overview about how we live and die as Christians then go for it. Otherwise, pick another book.
This is a Great CD for any age. The songs are all original and fun. Kids will like singing these songs! A must buy for music lovers of all ages.

Not what i thought it would be, the plot was so slow going, I found myself speed reading to finish it. The main character is suppose to be this big strong man but he came off as weak and unable to take care of himself. That alone made me hate him throughout the book. All in all, not a good read. Just boring. Waste of time.
The audio on this device is pretty bad. It's also kind hard get adjusted in a comfortable position so that I hear most things. Sound quality just isn't there.

Like the reviewer before me, I received this charger on 3/18/2013. It is not quite as "solid" in appearance as my original Samsung charger. The cord that attaches to the plug at top of charger, which connects into phone seems a little more flimsy and less secure. Since I had been searching for an additional charger because one of mine broke while driving when the cord flew off the plug; so, I'll keep it but I'm afraid it might only work 2 years. Would still like it, though.

It is a book about the battle of the Alamo and how difficult it was for Texas to defeat 250 men in 12 days. Very interesting as far as I am concerned, particularly what he wrote of Andrew Jackson's march on San Antonio with his little army. But there are better books out there. It seems that when writing history, Mr. O'Reilly goes by what's been written before - whether it's historically accurate or not.
At first these headphones were great.
The story was very predictable but I still enjoyed it. A good light read if you don't have to think too much.

The quality of these goggles are very poor. Poor fit, poor eye seals, no real protection. They leak from around your eyes on every run. Do yourself a favor save up for good goggles, or at least invest in some decent masks before throwing money away.
The book has no plot and is entirely boring. A complete waste of time. Do not buy until it becomes available. Waste your money or read the free sample.

This is a pretty good book overall. The writing style was fun and the characters were likable. However I found it rather short at 210 pages with many blank pages. Also there were quite a few errors in spelling or word choice. For example, one character went to the store as soon they came home when normally you would ask first thing before going out of your house. Not really a big deal but could easily be corrected by an editor. The story itself is quite good.

I don't know what happened to this author, but it appears she is no longer putting out good clean mysteries. The characters are caricatures and the dialogue insipid. Her previous efforts were much more enjoyable. Not recommended. She seems to have put some of her old fans off. I'm one also.

The author is very knowledgeable, but she tries to pass herself off as a great storyteller. Not true. What I read was her attempts at being funny. I'm sure I'll give more books by this person the oppurtunity since, like me, they were free. However, anyone who sells their work for any price obviously doesn't believe that we are going to. So save your $3.00 and visit another website.

It was just as cute in person and I thought it sounded cool having a frog theme on my car... BUT...two times the front left side plastic cover has snapped off leaving that little clear ring exposed. I've always loved Zoobles products but this one fell short, especially given how much price they are usually asking. I'm now looking for something new.. But if you like it, be careful or you'll get into my cars seat covers too! ;)

I ordered the product for my Nikon D7100 and it fits but not snug enough!!!! It slides out of place easily. I purchased a different brand and am much more satisfied with it...! Not worth returning the item. Don't buy this product, look at another manufacturer. I'm disappointed in Amazon. They don't let you contact them about this. Very disappointed.
It does exactly what it's supposed to, I guess I have not had any issues yet.

These work well. No leaks in the past. The only problem they have with them are that the tips start falling off from time to time. They should make a different type of cap so it will not fall apart. It must be really loose somewhere for this to happen. Other than that, very nice bottles. We keep a bottle on each bed side every night, and leave one closed overnight. I could probably do it 3 nights out of 5, but sometimes it's easier. My boyfriend doesn't have trouble drinking water now.
First I'd like to say - this item is an absolute must if you are shopping in Amazon.com.

I was so happy to get back my favorite tea. I use it every morning. Then I used 2 bags and the tea came out almost clear. They were old, stale or something. Very disappointing that we can not recommend this particular brand. :( On top of that, it's a hassle if you have kids who drink milk from their cups. The only choice is one brand that's cheaper at the grocery store.

My grandson was looking forward to it. He played a very short time and had it sitting in his room. Then he let go of it, when I found him with the cover on my bedroom door, so glad no one was sleeping there. It has been put away for now until we can convince him not to. Maybe he will use it more if it doesn't have the cover. If I would buy this again, I wouldn't pay as much.

Just got it out of the box and put to use first try. Very happy with results. I had been searching for a good tool for this job but could not find one. This is easy to use, quick and clean. Great product at an unbelievable price. Thanks Porter Cable. As always, great prices Amazon. Always satisfied service from Amazon too. Keep on Truckin. David F / Dallas, TX

The book arrived fast and in good shape. But it doesn't go into enough detail. I would say the general ideas are good. My biggest problem is that as a beginner, he jumps from one topic to another quickly. He spends too much time on each one, then moves on. This isn't helpful with those who want to learn to do more than just look at pictures. This guy gives excellent info for selling old books though. Good tips.
If someone wanted me interested, they could write about my life for me, but first let me know why people are interested.....
Just a little bit of honey with my oatmeal every morning, makes things taste like home with out them being too sweet. It's very expensive but at least now when we run out, Walmart has it...

I'm happy I borrowed this from a friend who didn't have to fork out the $35 for it. If it had been an $25, or maybe $25 as some of these other reviewers are, then yeah...it's well worth it, but that's not how you sell things. The entire book is just another sales pitch with no real substance. And if he does say something original about being happy, I'd like my $5 back and stop wasting it on this. A very average self-help book.

I bought it for my husband, and even though he's been known to get out of shape, he likes it. He uses it, but only 2 times a week and that's all he needs. It's pretty noisy on the low setting, which is fine. He's never slept through another one in his life. The higher setting sounds fine, so that keeps him awake. We use the fan portion every evening on 'low'. It helps us breathe better when we have nasal problems from allergies.

These are just fine as long you don't have anyone in the house with super short arms. A small man could wear these but I'm 5'10''. The material feels kind of cheap, so they'll probably outlast most of any other set out there.

I got this for my son who is learning how to ride but I'm not sure it would hold him up safely. You sit on the handle which isn't terribly comfortable as well. The seat looks super flimsy and like he could snap off when we take a good turn either. Also, be aware that it's way too wide so you look very awkward taking turns with it. My other kids all have 2 wheel scooters which they prefer over this one.

My 10 1/2 month old grandson was excited to try this toy out on our kitchen floor, he especially liked the little wheels. Unfortunately after 30 minutes of play he became bored with it and started playing more exciting games or toys around it. He did like pushing around, but as a "driving" toy, not so good. I would recommend for younger children, only 3 years old. Not recommended in my book! A waste of $27.99 bucks!

Bought this to use primarily for bread making in my kitchen. Worked well until recently when it has begun squeaking quite loudly. The squeaky noises have stopped working and we've tried different lubricants with no success. I wonder if there is a quality control issue as we've heard this complaint before. So disappointed. Hopefully there's some type of warranty. It won't break the bank though. Just an annoyance - but I guess its better than nothing.

I was tired of trying to scoop up litter that just rolled away from my cats. This mat does a great job. No more scooping and no messy cat litter! It is easy but not too easy. The cats use it even when we aren't in the room. We have it outside on our porch with lots of sun. Even after 2 weeks, there are some dirt spots coming back. But so far, this has been good for us. If you buy it, you'll love it!
This case is exactly as shown online. And this price on Amazon beats everyone! Would definitely recommend and may even buy again if needed. Great product!!

This is basically what you were probably expecting after seeing that many of these books are coming out at once. And it's great in lots of ways. If you're looking for some fun reading with nice illustrations (which are fantastic) - this is great.
This movie is not in english. Not at all. I'm confused and sad about it. I really need a refund. Why doesn't amazon?

I bought this to help me organize my garage and it was a really cute idea. But its just cheaply made compared to the other brands I've had as well such as Stanley or Oxo. The metal in this unit is more flimsy so I'm afraid that if i'm pulling on it, it'll give out. It's good for what it's supposed to, but don't plan on doing anything over 20 feet. If they can improve the construction of this, i will be purchasing another one soon.

I've had this camera for some years now and I couldn't wait to throw out the old one. The problems that come from cheap materials is glaring. It takes lousy pictures outdoors in even good sunlight. But when you try using it inside with flash, or in low light areas without flash.... you'll just want more than one flash unit. Even in bright sunlight...... it's blurry. If your goal was picture quality then forget it.

This book reads more like a series of magazine articles rather than an actual book. The story lines weren't well focused, and some paragraphs were very wordy. I'm glad I read the whole thing over two evenings but not sure if I'll buy anything else by this author. Also, her characters didn't always say what they meant to, i.e. "I...."

As I wrote before, if all a person cares for is the sound quality from this product then you can definitely feel satisfied with spending $60 on it. However, it does not matter what type of earphones or headphones one uses, even though these are supposedly'studio'. I'm just glad that Amazon will refund me my money because although these do look cool but do absolutely nothing in comparison to other headsets out there. Stay away from them unless you're only listening for looks alone.

I used to have a black version of this phone which lasted me 5 years. Then it was stolen from my car. I replaced it with a red version. It worked ok for about 2 or 3 years, then the microphone went out. So now what I'm getting is pretty much like talking into your phone... and no, people won't hear you well on it. It's really irritating. Maybe these phones were discontinued by now (?). But definitely not the case here.

This thing worked great the first time out on my deck. After reading other reviews, we were a little afraid that we'd have a problem but no need for worries. It's super sturdy. When it's all folded up, you'll probably never put it back in its bag.

I have had my HP P2011 i3 laptop for almost three years now and it has worked great. As a secondary computer to keep up with work tasks, school, etc.. It was fast enough. I'm still going through the recovery portion of HP's Windows 7 installers but as of today, 8/1/12.... this machine would not boot up. The first thing it does is reboot itself back into Windows 7. So obviously the drivers from Dell will not work. That's ok.
I enjoyed reading this, however had some problems with it.

I tried this and it works really well. The design is great for small areas. It may be too heavy when full for larger areas of furniture. But overall a good product if you have pets. Don't use on carpets because they wouldn't want to leave the cover on. For furniture it's great. Really love it!!! Would recommend. Worth it in my book. :)

Love this stuff and I use it on my puppy as well. He is a 12 pound Yorkie Poodle mix that has been having issues with tearing up his fur because he always had too many parasites in it. Since we've added Cosequin, he's already stopped scratching so much. It also seems to clear up any infections or ear infections. Great stuff! Highly recommend. My dog looks amazing.
So happy w it. Works so well.

I have a 2 pound teacup cat. The only problem on this product was that my cat refused to wear it. He did not like it's form or its feel. But the biggest issue is my cats weight. My little guy weighs 7 pounds. He's 14 years old. This is an okay product. There are much better products out there. One of them costs $30. You just need to get your cat's size info. and measure. It will help you choose properly.
Our cat goes nuts from watching my dog play tug of war so we bought her a set as a Christmas gift. Her tail was wagging in no time at all when she saw these toys come out of the box.

I returned the TV because it did not have a VGA connection. My son told me to check out my other purchase and the page was down. How disappointing when looking at this on Amazon. Had there been some indication of this. He has his own set now. Thanks for making another customer unhappy!!! I had ordered two TV's from you the same day so hopefully they will be available soon, but he is having a really hard time with this set.
Great way to learn more about what it takes to create an effective email marketing strategy. Easy reading yet contains important information.
The product seems OK for now. There are no instructions, even though it's clearly labeled for assembly, nor have any on line. If you don't already know how to do it, pay close attention.

The cable from my laptop to the TV works fine. I have also tried with a new computer that has optical output and it worked fine too. This adapter did not work for me, at all. It should clearly be stated in the details when buying an adapter. And there was no indication of this on either page as far as i could see. It is worth paying another $4 or $5 bucks so you can use your regular stereo speakers instead of those awful ones this company makes.

Perfect for what I needed. It's easy to install. I'm using this in my garage so that I don't have too much of a cable running from the unit back and forth. It has lots of connectors on it which is really nice. Would recommend without hesitation.
the product is just as expected...the color matches perfectly, easy to set up and use.....would not hesitate getting another if needed!!!thanks again!!! :)
Very simple to install. Used this on a boat and so far it's worked well. I will need some more for other equipment. Great price too.
I have a very large dog. This is the only way to go. He eats every day. It has slowed it down alot for him. Great product.

This book was good reading for what its worth. There wasn't much to it. It also had some of her usual witty banter, but overall a little disappointing. I'd recommend it, if you want something light.

Ok - I had to check the title because I don't think any of these are on this CD. A better CD is The best Christmas music from around 1930 or so. That was the source for many of these songs. For what it is made of, it's ok, and the price was decent, I just wish that they would have put a higher quality cover on this, as with all decors things will happen to it. This is an awful game. Not even remotely interesting or fun. Don't waste your money. Buy the app from App Store for free. Then use that to play with a friend.
