I ordered this to replace the old one which had broken and was easy to install. So far so good it is working well. Hopefully it'll be fine.

Used to carry my cell phone around without needing cords attached to it. Now you don't have to. The product fits right into place so if you want to listen to music, just push on top of holder. No adjustments needed.

Excellent product for the price - perfect addition to my kitchen. I use it every day and have not had any problems out of it. The design is a bit unusual but you won't confuse this with something you'd buy at Macy's, Pottery Barn, or Home goods. For around $50 it's an incredible value on amazon. If you are debating buying this, rest assured that it's going be top drawer. Great quality, very happy customer. Would recommend.

It was good for a quick read during my lunch break. Pretty typical and predictable. Didn't even realize it was a short story until after I ordered it. But not really worth paying that much for. If you can find this on sale pick it up because its free :) but I wouldn't pay anything more than $1. Not going to spoil the ending, however, you'll see when u get there. It was a good value but the item had to be replaced as it did not last very long then completely broke down and cannot used any more...... I have loved these headphones for the past few years, and was happy to find them available at such a low price. However, my first pair broke within 2 months. A cable developed a short from one side. It works for a good price. I got 3 of them and they took about 40 minutes to install on the 2004 Hyundai Tucson Hatchback. Good product with no problems. Installed myself in less than 30 min.

This is a powerful handheld sprayer for removing stains in stainless. But don't expect to clean any deep dark spots with it. It takes many passes because it's made from plastic, therefore water stays behind which makes spot cleaning. And if you get streaks or other stains, use another spray bottle for that.
These batteries arrived quickly and are good - better than most 3rd party batteries, and they last a long time. So far... no complaints.

I used this product on a couple of different computers and it is not recognized by any computers. I've wasted two hours trying to reinstall software from the manufacturer website; I'm giving up. Even if I was successful, my computer wouldn't be able get internet access as it does with other network adapters. This seems like an excellent product, but, unless you got lucky in receiving one, chances are, there aren't many reviews for it...and, unfortunately, mine will have to go back.
It tastes awful, no flavor. Had it before but couldn't find it.

I recently purchased an eVo mini, and it appeared to connect flawlessly with my existing cable system which provides both cablecard & standard definition broadcasts. Using the DVR provided by TIVO - The TiVo, however, will not receive a signal using their broadcast guide. It appears that Tivo's box is just supposed to provide the live channels offered through their satellite service without any effort from one's part. It's definitely too easy.

I have owned this product for over a year. It is still one of my favorite purchases. The only thing that could make it perfect would be if you can just plug in headphones and don't need to carry the cord with your computer. That being said, it's not really an inconvenience. Definitely something others would buy because they see how amazing it is. Great Product! I'd recommend

Easy to carry and sturdy. A little small for a couple of sandwiches, but will fit the average adult lunch box. Does not hold up well if put in my locker though. But works great in school backpacks. I plan on buying bigger sizes so that can keep everything cold between lunches. This is one case though, where you do get what you pay for. My daughter likes having them because they are cute, but then again she tends to lose things-- I think it's because of this.

It's an attractive case, provides decent protection. I have not yet dropped it and hope never to do so for what it's worth. But there have been only four drops (not from that height, just two feet high) but the phone is safe. The case adds a touch of bulk to it. And you might wish that more space was provided on both sides (where your headphones cable would fit in).

I have had this item for a while now and it is by far the better screen protector that I have ever used. The plastic they use can be hard to bend properly but still does not seem nearly as bad when you are using it. Once applied it looks great with no bubbles. No problems whatsoever! You do even get two sheets so there should be room if needed in case of something happening before the first one, which seems unlikely. And the price can't be beat! Great purchase.

I have purchased about 2 dozen of these drives over the past two years. They are fast, they don't make noise, but that's it. I've also had more failures than just plain fails. The drive failed to boot, or a program stopped working. Sometimes it took hours for my computer (brand new in Windows 7 x64) to recognize ANY drive. Most recently after installing Linux on it, it kept telling me there was no disk and it would not boot up. So it was dead out of the box.

Really easy install. Works well and is fairly cheap. I would recommend for a small shop with minimal maintenance requirements. The lights are nice but not too bright, they do get hot. My only complaint was the color codes in the instructions that indicate which circuit or circuit breaker goes to each light didn't make much sense to me once set up. It seems silly not being told when setting up your new lights.

This was an okay story. I had to force myself through it. However, the story itself could have been better. The main character, Maggie, is a bit too whiny. She really comes across as very weak in my opinion. Also, the author needs better proofreading and editing. There were many instances of grammatical errors (homophones where they shouldn't be, misused words that don't make sense from one sentence to another) which also took away from the enjoyment level. I'd rate this at 3.
If someone is going to give me their favorite Christmas movie, this would be it... but it's not my favorite. It's a funny movie with some good music and of course, the Bing Crosby. Enjoyable!!!

This book has very little helpful information. Its a poorly written pamphlet and was not even proofread. Nothing new or useful in this book. Don't waste your time reading it. There must be better books available. You won't gain much by downloading something that is so out of date. Very disappointed. Also found the comments on one review to another reviewer from a different seller disappointing. They all shared an identical comment. Buyer be aware. I learned nothing about any type and model of camera using this publication.

We purchased this product as part our business needs. It worked well initially, although it took two tries before we got both units working. That didn't last too long either.

Bought it to control my garage door opener. My wife is trying to do some home repair so she will be doing most of the driving around with it. Easy install, but does not read signal outside car. It may have been weather related. I had a hard time finding all the wiring which can easily get confused if you don't know what your doing.

My original order arrived broken in half, the metal hooks were cracked and broken. I sent it back for a replacement, hoping that was just an isolated incident. It came packed well with no signs of being mishandled. The replacement one came out of the box already damaged. Just from normal handling during unpacking I discovered that about half the bars had cracked. It's not hard to see when things are made out of plastic like this unless you first cut them up before putting the glass together.
The description says these 'notes' are "perfect" size, which is false... at least for me.

I ordered this product, it was delivered with 2 plastic lids that were open to the bottle as most bottles of shampoo are shipped with. The package seemed a little damp from contact with water, thus I cannot use it. It is not leaking but if you think about it, when someone fills up a gallon jug and hands them your bottle, they normally turn over the top until its empty.

I am not too fond of the smell. It reminds me of cat urine. And if that doesn't bother you then it does what it's supposed to. But there are a lot cheaper sprays on amazon, so this one is way to expence. Like 4 dollars and some change. That's why only 2 stars. Other than the smell, everything else works great! And with prime i got them at my front door. Very fast shipping. :D Will buy again from them. Just wish they had other kinds.

This is a beautiful lamp but the bulb has gone bad after about 8 months of light use. I cannot find any local lamps to replace it with, and this one requires you remove both front pieces from the wall each time that it's removed. The base also seems very unstable when holding it. A lot of little clips are needed on every part of it, even if only slightly touching anything. I hope I can get another in order for me to not be without reading light.

I've never been a regular reader of science fiction and when this book came up as part of the Vine program I was so excited to jump in. However, after finishing it, which took me two days over my break because it just felt like such an endless slog, is that there's really no point to it. First up, I'm only half-way through at this point, but there are dozens if not hundreds or more stories within the first few hundred pages.
The premise is interesting, but these short stories come across as unedited messes.
I got this for my 10 year old. It fits him pretty well. The chest is adjustable. It's easy to zip and unzip. All in all, a good buy. Good price.

I recently had the privilege of seeing John Lennon perform in concert at The O2 Arena and this CD was released before that. It does sound very 'beatles' like which is interesting as their album didn't sound that great from start to finish, not sure if it's just me or not.

Don't waste your time. I read the 2 reviews below and I'm going to get my own review posted in the near future. Got into this as the reviews looked pretty good. Was a huge disappointment. The book and authors seem to be more interested in making money than writing a true mystery. I received this product today and after connecting the usb cable the light would not work no matter what i tried. After trying several things including inserting fresh batteries into device still didn't work.

 Great book. A few surprises in there. Love these kind of books. Kept me riveted to my kindle. Highly recommended for those who like mystery. Would also recommend The Maze Runner as well. Great author! Recommend both books highly.

 A really good, engaging story. Interesting twist on a post apocalyptic theme.

I have read all 50 Grisham novels to date, and believe me, the books are well written. The majority of his main characters are well developed, realistic, interesting. But this book...well, I'm about 3/4 through it and so far no character is even slightly interesting or understandable, or likeable. Maybe it's due to the writing style he was forced to use, but not only is every word "telling" (as in, "you know what happens next"), but none of them ever actually happen.

i received a black color keyboard not the silver as shown in pic. this is a waste of time and energy to purchase online when product does not arrive correctly or you have no time. otherwise good for price just wrong color. i wish id check item before accepting on line order. thanks amazon!

This item is a must in every home, that has pets. It kills fleas with out messing up your home and clothes but they are not toxic either. I was so intrigued with this book and how excited it made me about my new Kindle Fire. Upon looking inside the package of all four books in which to download on a Sunday night, there is something wrong there.

I received this book as a gift from my mother to add the music for our choir. I've loved the series up till this point. I found that the first volume was a bit rough, but then they got better. And that's where it ends unfortunately. Volume 2 is really not worth reading. I was so excited to receive this machine and start making homemade pizza. Unfortunately there is a design flaw that prevents the top from lowering on all three units. Even with proper care and maintenance, these units are not very well made.

After years of trying to trim my hedges and shrubs around our house, with limited success, I decided that the power head trimmers would have more than enough power. The saw also did a great job. At first, like some other reviewers, it seemed rather hard to get the hang of: pull back on the handles, push forward from below and hold it. After using this product for several months, though, I've mastered it, so it's no problem anymore. You can buy replacement blades too. All in all, worth every penny.

I was excited to get an mp3 player like my friends have... but mine started having problems within a couple of weeks so i returned it and got a refund. Otherwise it's not worth spending money on. :(

This is my 2nd one in 3 years. The first lasted for a little over 2 years then the volume knob failed. I don't put this pressure on it at all but it's just not built right. Also if any of you have trouble understanding me or emailing me, I'm here if anyone wants information or help dealing with these things.
These were so cheap when compared with buying at the chain or sporting goods stores. I was concerned about what type these would be made of, but i have had no problems.
I did not know this book was about "gays" and would like to delete it. It is no use ordering unless you want that.
It's ok only because I've had worse. This one fits fairly nicely, looks good....
The product is very well built, as others have said, but it does not work properly with a Mac system. I will return it.
I love this product. My hair is not only shiny and healthy but my allergies have cleared up since started using it. A friend recommended it to me. It has worked wonders for me!
Love this case. Super thin, fits in pocket fine.
Great product! Just what I wanted at the best price! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a new screen protector for their tablet.

Battery did not last. I charged and used the battery twice. After recharging again my machine is dead so now have 4 batteries. Should have purchased more original HP product. Maybe that's why Dell wants these companies shut out. Will no longer purchase anything but Genuine HP products.
If you've grown up with this product, then you'll know why my review of 8 oz. for only $1.29 makes perfect sense. I'll be back to buy more! Great price and great product.

The first one I purchased worked for 5 months before it died. They were nice enough to send me a new one. Unfortunately the replacement only seemed to work intermittently. It would then stop working, or so we'd think. By coincidence we had another storm in NYC which killed my main power supply--now these units don't have AC inputs--even though they appear with an internal fan. So, even though they're pretty expensive, it's cheaper than replacing that whole thing.

Was not at all what I expected, would never buy again from this brand. Product was poor quality. Do yourself a favor do some research and don't be fooled by the great reviews these products have received. Don't fall for it. Go to your local Best Buy or another store like that with better quality items. Then shop Amazon. Your always safe, just pay more money and get it done right the first time. I love the concept and design of these bowls. When they first arrived my cat was very curious about them, but a month later she has hardly touched them. They are heavy duty, however, that is where their good points end. The bowls don't retain heat nearly as well as ceramic bowls do. On several occasions when we were away from home for longer periods of time our pet would throw food or water down onto her bed because it felt colder than room temperature.

Well, maybe two stars is too much.

i don't have this book anymore, as my mom recently passed away and her son gave it to me :( because she died before I could really understand or appreciate the stories in there. So sad. Very good item, my grandson can't wait until christmas day to get this item out of its box & into play. Shipping was fast and on time.

There is no way to screw this into our ceiling without a separate adapter. Don't waste your money on this. Get something that just plugs and unplugs. This will don'thing but cause problems. DO NOT BUY.

Product seems to be good, however the packaging was pretty poor and when it arrived one of my tubes had busted open. This caused me some trouble since I'm out about $17 on shipping in addition to having to run back up stairs to return what looked like just another tube with broken glass.

Not the best read, especially for someone who has not worked with these types of people before. Seemed like there wasn't much to it. Very repetitive. What a great read. I finished it in one sitting and then bought the next two books that went with it. This was my daughters favorite when we were little girls (it's how she learned to walk). Now that we're grown, she finds these songs just as fun now (she said "it's a bit slow but at least they're singing!" We sang them along with her every day for months afterwards.
