The bulb went out within 45 days with minimal viewing.

I would have enjoyed reading this much more if the book was less self indulgent and a little longer. Too many details of how to do things that I don't need, though some people may find it enjoyable. It's not a particularly useful book. It is mostly just rambling about something else every week. Perhaps I'll read several chapters. Not enough in an entire chapter for me.

I ordered the set of two twin bed rails for my daughter's new bedroom. The description says "with included drawing" What show is this? If you don't have a dresser or headboard to put it on, then what are we supposed to say? All they did was make the frame without any kind of instructions. Then we got home and found out that no instructions came with the bed, there were none on their website.

I tried the first and last story in this volume while out on a bus ride. My opinion is that it just wasn't my kind of book. The author has written quite an impressive amount of, well, interesting short stories about her time spent traveling with her husband to different parts of South America - especially if you have been there. But they all center around love between some characters. It was not at all what I expected from what felt like she couldn't write for herself without anyone else.
These bottles are too small if you want to mix anything with powder.
Did not work out of the package. Poor quality as to quality. Looks ok in picture, actually looks like junk. Do not waste your money on this cheap item.
Another great rendition of God Gave Me You. It's well sung by an accomplished singer. A very nice arrangement too. Thanks.!

This CD is excellent and I am thrilled to have it on my iPod so that when working out or doing chores, I can listen for myself without blasting into earbuds. It has a good mix of classics as well as some great new songs. If you don't speak Japanese, which most people don't, then buy the book "Learn Japanese Words in 20 Minutes Using Animals" (works with either Japanese/English or both). You'll be happier too.   Rating: 4.

I used for two years until the unit died. Worked well while it was working, but you do get what you pay for. When it's functioning properly, it'll charge my Galaxy S2 when I'm on plane trips without running out of battery. Not too happy that the charger no longer works after 2 years. That's a pretty short life expectancy. We'll see how long this replacement one lasts. If your going to upgrade from USB charger, I'd recommend buying this brand and try this before you buy other brands.

I ordered this item twice and both times it was defective within a few uses on my Sony HX-100V. The first time, the power switch stopped functioning after some use but it still took pictures. After calling Canon customer service for support, they insisted that all of their current flashes were not compatible with these older cameras. When we bought the camera in November 2006, it did include a manual switch. This is very disappointing because our old flash would work just fine while its battery runs down.

Doesn't taste even close to coconut. And there are ingredients as well. No way it could be remotely healthy. I threw away the first bottle because my dog would eat it. Won't buy again. My own fault, should've read better...

This is a book by a guy who spent years trying to live life his way. Its message for anybody with any sense of humor is simple: Stop worrying. Accept that money sucks, and get over it. It's what I did. The advice in this book has been summarized many times over. There's much useful information here if you can be bothered digesting the writing style. It reads like it came straight out of someone's dissertation. If you're into getting up early on Saturday mornings, go ahead and read this.

Just like with their other album, I was slightly surprised by how little of the songs on this one resembled any old Slipknot songs, except for "WTF" and a few others from Year Zero. This is easily my least favorite album (next to New American Gospel). My complaint about past albums had been that they were heavy metal, but when you listen to the music there would be some pretty serious guitar solos or whatever.

I have enjoyed using this knife so far. Works well on small fish as well as larger ones. Great cutting edge, feels very comfortable in the hand. It is a bit hard to get clean, and not really worth putting it back together, but you should be gentle with it. Good for boning fish. One side of the blade has been chipped, though that part seems sturdy. Overall I would recommend at these prices even if they had some design flaws. This thing rocks. Buy one now.
i got this item because its small, compact, very simple and..well easy enough for anyone who wants it...

I have used this product before very helpful if you need a new filter and are using these filters or don't want to spend all the money buying them from Sears which will go on forever. This helps keep my furnace clean at half price what it would cost without it.

The only good thing I can say is it's really cute and would make a great gift for any little girl. Unfortunately mine arrived broken so my review might not be accurate on the item. It did come in its own package though.
I have used Nexxus products before with good results so when i saw a suggestion on one of my online email accounts I thought i'd try it.
This piece fits perfectly into our living room! It came right out of the box looking gorgeous - very easy assembly.

This was a huge disappointment. My son loves dinosaurs and read the previous books to me, but didn't like this one. He says it's "just not very interesting." Maybe he would have liked it better if he'd finished it. The story had some good points, of course, about living in primitive times, etc. However, as an adult, I found that many parts were quite boring ("eat a few bugs!") or unnecessary (don't make fire with dried leaves, don't bother searching for things under your bed -- etc.).
For the price, this can't be beat, as I've paid twice for similar quality lights. The lights are a perfect medium between bright and dim.
Works well in conjunction with Dr.

I am a fan of Jack Reacher books, but this is the worst one. Usually he doesn't bore me as much with long winded dialog that takes up pages, and this time not even close. The last 20 pages or so were pretty good when it got to actual action. Not recommended.

I've been using the same set for years and love these mugs. They truly hold 16oz. However, even with new lids, they often drip on you. The handles are just not that comfortable, but it keeps them hot if I have cold stuff in them. But overall they've held up so far. And they're really cute designs! ( Though the old style has a bit of more class to it.)On another note, many people say their lids break.

One of those movies that I rented from Netflix because everyone was discussing its quality. The writing was terrible, there were so many grammatical errors, but most importantly, it doesn't have any story or character development. If you liked the first, don't even waste your time watching this movie.

I was very disappointed with the design of this phone. Not only it did not look like a vintage phone but most importantly, none of my friends could hear me. After all the time spent on research and review, we thought that the Nokia 2070 would fulfill our need for an old fashion phone - especially since it's made by Nokia. Unfortunately when we tried to use it, we found out its real flaws. We ended up returning it. It really is useless.

I ordered this book for a class and was not very pleased that my favorite poem was, by far the least, in it. The poems were great but there is only so many of them. For students who want the poetry as well buy this, because that's what they need. If you need everything don't order!

I had the previous model for over 6 years that finally died and found this one to be a big improvement. The older model was slow moving, not up to date on new products they were releasing. This version is much easier with all of its many options which makes working in your garage such a breeze!!!! There are allot more features like remote start,, check engine light,( do it often ), defrost etc.
It serves the purpose for my coffee and is not expensive either. You get what you pay for. I would buy this product again.

This book is a collection of two books, so you basically get the first half for free and have to buy the second one because they are not in order. This makes me quite angry. It should be stated immediately that this isn't just an inconvenience. For example, if I want to know some information about how to implement data encryption with Mailvelope, I'll look it up online using [...] first, then try again by finding the URL with mailvelope.com/learn? And that's it.

The item arrived quickly and was what it said online. I've been using this type of shaver on all types of beard from back to head for a long time. I ordered the item as part of my father's Father's Day gift, which he did not open due to some kind of illness. He didn't care about how well the product worked just that IT WAS HIS FAVORITE KIND SO HE COULD FIND IT IN A TIME OF NEED.

I loved this story until the ending. What a waste of great characters. I'm glad it was only 99 cents so even better. This book is too short, ends abruptly and feels extremely rushed. Definitely an author who should take one more week to finish writing it. The main male character's love for his fiance comes across as childish, yet very shallow.

This product is so bad, it didn't work for my dog! I am very dissapointed. The shampoo smelled awfull and he broke out with bumps all over his body. He started scratching the worst of that product. And this was not a new product, because we had to have gotten a defective batch. Don't buy it. If you want your dog happy, use anything but this. We are never buying products by Pet Armor again,. It's too bad they dont give refunds.

This looks okay in our living room, but its materials are a bit cheap and it feels very cheaply made...We found others cheaper that just look as good or even better than this, for MUCH less. My husband had this installed by the local handyman guy, who was working on installing some decorative stuff to his house, so while he was putting down screws with a magnetic screwdriver set, all we saw were pieces of metal, not wood. If you need something nice, get one made well.

I am still trying to get out the last bottle full of this stuff after I've bought it from Amazon for ~$13. It's been about five weeks- it's supposed to expire in 6 months, but even if you wait six months to use the product, I'll never buy it again.
We own all three of their albums so far... and they keep getting better each time.

This was one of the most boring movies I have seen in a long time. Don't waste your money unless you like watching cars roll down streets and buildings collapse. Even if all doors open at once, no matter close or far, it is boring, repetitious. The acting was bad, the lighting could be better, cinematography terrible when we are supposed to see planes gliding from tree tops...etc, etc.

One of the best books for beginners to get your life started with. No matter what age you are. You will be shocked that in some circumstances things can happen before they happen. Like my sister did. She was sitting on her porch reading with her boyfriend. Her dog attacked and ran into a neighbor's yard. So she called the cops. Instead of trying to figure out who did it she waited over an hour until her neighbor finally came out. My friend is still traumatized by it.

Did not fit my computer very well did not snap in well. The back cover would come off which could be a good thing as it might help prevent the cracks that were developing on mine from moving around. I also bought a hard case with keyboard for this computer. Which works much better. And cost less too. But if you have an older laptop than mine.. You probably need one of those cases to protect it.

I bought this for my daughter and she has been using it but the keyboard falls off very easily. The other part you set your ipad in is nice, its all that keeps it together. It would probably be good if you were just going out to dinner or waiting at a doctor. My advice was to spend more money on something better, like buying one from Apple! Or buy one from Target since Target sells them cheaper than Apple products. This case isn't worth it.

You can only take so much of the same thing over and over. And to end with this ending, it really was just pointless. I would have liked if the ending did not leave us wondering. Also there were times when i realized i had nothing interesting on my mind, but reading these pages made me feel like someone else wrote it. So sad.
Good price and works just fine. Bought another one to leave at the office. Will buy these as long as I need it.

The plastic is so cheap that even with the adjustable legs, it does not stand up straight. And mine arrived broken. When I called them about it, they offered to send a replacement if I'd return this one. That just pisses me off. They're ripping off customers. It was pretty bad quality. Not what you see on tv or in stores. Plus since there are no directions and it's very hard because of the size, you'll definitely need someone who can help assemble it. There were tons of parts as well.
This did not work as it was intended to. Don't waste your time or money on this item. I don't know why the cable doesn't seem to even fit properly into my Kindle. What a joke.

Bought for my 3 yr old, and she's not too sure of how to use it yet. The only thing that would make this 5 star is if the light could be turned off so I can keep her happy in bed reading at night. No idea why the manufacturer couldn't just put a switch on the bottom of it. All other LED's do have one. Overall, it's cute & works well. Great idea.

Not to be too harsh but this movie was awful. I had a hard time understanding what everyone was saying and the actors were all over the place. Save your money and watch some of those other Chinese martial arts dramas instead or find an American production instead. The fighting scenes may appear authentic compared with movies like Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon, The Forbidden Kingdom, or even Gladiator but they are no where near realistic. If you want high quality look at Jackie Chan as Bruce Lee.
The shower head works well and doesn't drip when taking down shower.
The characters are weak and boring. When they first begin their relationship it's just sex, no emotion.
Very cheap quality. Poor design. Should be removed form Amazon. Only suitable for display as it's useless. There ought to be mandatory language warning before purchase.

This book was too technical for me. I'm still seeking a better introductory text that gives the average person something to get started on. It seemed to me this wasn't it. The author tends toward academic sounding writing. That does not mean it's bad, mind you - just didn't keep my attention because of what it looked like. I also wanted more hands-on information and tips. Maybe if I'd read the entire book, I'll have different thoughts. As is, I found little help or new ideas in this book. 
 Rating: 2.

The sound quality was terrible. It really didn't have any bass, and the treble wasn't that sharp either. I am normally a cheap girl, so my friends told me to go for it since there are such big prices on these headphones. But i guess you get what you pay for.
The material is cheaply made, not even worth $12. I could of made something better myself using scraps. Don't buy this junk

The sound was horrible. Like the other reviewer said the vocals are really low. When they speak then it just sounds like noise. They also have to change your speakers when this game is on because most controllers aren't compatible. If I would of know that before buying this game, i wouldn't have. Maybe it's not my TV or something? But I thought hey I'll buy one and see. Same with me for those saying you can talk through TV.

I bought these cups to store my homemade tea bags, and the first time they were full, a couple of them leaked around their handles. The double wall keeps coffee hot...at least warm enough for me when I'm commuting. Unfortunately, one had already popped open on my flight from California, which prompted me to buy two more cups...after reading reviews concerning leakage in airline overhead bins. These seem like high quality cups, but they're not going anywhere. I'll just be careful that they won't pop back open.

We received a new Sony TV from our son on December 24th and the remote worked for about 5 minutes then just gave up. I looked it up online and there were numerous complaints. It was returned 3 days later with no explanation. A local seller replaced my defective remote, but unfortunately that did not fix it. Now 2 weeks after we took back the old replacement, this one is doing exactly the same thing! If you hold down a key for about 20 seconds, like suggested by others, it works fine.

This was ok but in my opinion I wish the book would have gone deeper. What happened to him when he grew up and where her people were living from his mother's point of view. The ending left me with too many questions.

We love this toy, but, the paint scratches off very easily,as do most of the accessories. So we are looking to replace it now. It also gets stuck alot, when they try and play on carpet. But, overall its great. I wish you could find new ones, but they dont seem available. Very difficult for a two or four-year old.

I bought the "original" which seems no better, it is difficult to move and very unstable when standing up. Don't waste your money. It might be better on an older model tv. Not sure why they would even bother with this one. You have had a tv for years so you know how good these should work. Waste of money!
I bought this book because we have made dozens of recipes from her website (the other one with a different author has been removed now.

When I recieved the package it was not what I ordered. But they refunded 100% of my money and made sure to send me another one for free. However after just a little over a month with this case its starting to turn black in spots like I'm using it. Don't get me started on shipping from Hong Kong which took all these extra days that were supposed to have been saved. Overall good case, but bad shipping. Oh well :p
This is one of the best series I have ever seen. It portrays very true to life experiences which makes it even more interesting.

I found this book disappointing. Not well written, not that many insights. Would only recommend to friends who want gossip for friends. Do not expect insights from an experienced detective. What you have here is pure fantasy. Sorry, but the truth hurts even if we are just having fun. If you're looking for a light read, go ahead and try it, you'll end up depressed. But in terms of a serious insight into how serial killers think, plan, act, etc. then pass it by.

I recently went to the local mall and picked this dvd up for 19.99 thinking it was a good deal but once i finished watching it, it's pretty darn stupid. Even though Jackie Chan is in this, he's not very good. He's just going through some routine and you can't really care about him. There's more talking than fighting. It's like every fight scene consists of Jet Li fighting people. Then after awhile its actually funny because there's all these guys running around with their faces covered from various diseases.
Love this. Easy to hold for my two pups. And because of their different sized mouths, they don't bite into it! Perfect!

The story of the rise and fall of an amazing man who loved to sing, dance and play. I especially like that Billy was able to come out looking great after his surgery. This guy had a tremendous gift that unfortunately would be passed on only with many health problems. I'm sure he will touch your life in some way. He is missed. God Bless you Rick!

I bought this because it was cheap, but its quality is so poor that I'm afraid to put anything on it. It says it's a binder, which means you can easily find out there's no binder in there. That's kind of false advertising. There isn't really any way around it, really. I'll upload pictures. It's quite sturdy, though. Update: The rings are coming apart. They also look like they're going to fall off completely. Buyer beware! Very disappointing. Update #2: I've uploaded some pictures for reference.
This product came in handy after we broke our tripod. The price made me think that this would be cheap stuff. Its not. Very durable, very sturdy. Great quality product.
Bought this collar to use on a German Shep. First time using it, she reacted by shaking her head or back tail as if she'd been shocked.

I purchased this book in order to use it with my classroom students, but was disappointed at some of the language used, many times a kid is called "that", and sometimes he isn't. Also not very well written, even for an individual homeschooling. It's more about how a child interacts with others, rather than being able to communicate your personal thoughts on specific topics.
I've been a fan of Coheed and Cambria for many years, so it was only natural that I like some of there songs better than others, but this album is definitely something new. Definitely worth buying.
The movie was good but I didn't like the ending it could've ended diffrent in my opionon. But still a pretty decent movie. Not at all what I'd expected from Nicholas Sparks.

this was very interesting, had lots of good insight and information on how the two men became so friends..some parts were hard for me because i don't remember their names...as well there wasn't much background detail on them...the author is obviously quite open about that fact though..

My dogs love these treats and it is the best price I found anywhere on Amazon. These are not available to purchase where we live anymore, so if you have a small dog that isn't bothered by large dry treats, this may be the thing for you. They smell almost like dried apples, which makes me wonder about any type of preservatives, but they do taste great. I keep them in a plastic container with ice packs, in case I need them, until I'm ready to give them.

I have been using an older version of this product for years and love it. This new model is poorly designed, the blades don't reach far enough apart to thoroughly clean. It requires a lot more cleaning than my old model. Definitely not worth the price! Find something else. You won't be able to clean with it very well.
Very cheaply made doesn't close all the way. Not even sure if it's water proof.

I didn't receive the item shown in this picture. The item pictured is a black holder for the headset. The one delivered to me has the silver hook that hooks into my ear. No way am I keeping that. Disappointed. :(

I couldn't tell a difference from the first try at using this on my 2012 Ram 1500. This was an easy and cheap upgrade to replace that old rusted out exhaust system. If you have never changed one of these before do yourself this favor and buy some grease with it. It will make putting together your new system much easier.

I really don't care for this at all! If you have any sort of a back problem- look elsewhere, if not. It heats up only half way then cools down so much my backaches almost hurt!The massage feature isn't very good, either.

I love the way my Kindle looks now and how light it is. I was excited about having two colors but one of them fell apart after a month. It still protects as it's mostly in the cracks when not being used for protection.

It's got a lot of great reviews but I wasn't quite prepared for it. It was so loud it ruined everything in the room that I have no clue what happened. Needless to say my wife called me and took care of that. We can't return this item because it's flammable material! So unless you like hearing explosions, please stay away!

The product arrived missing its main feature of a cover and with the plastic broken leaving me to believe it was used. That being said, after a week the screen cracked, which caused a few problems in playing games (had I opened it, maybe this wouldn't have happened). But you know-- my computer is too new for problems. I've decided I'm going to try again but now will not order from them online anymore. If I get one that works properly I'll be very happy though.

This is the first time I have been left completely unsatisfied with an ebook from Amazon. It was a very short story, and most of it has nothing to do with any characters in her other books. Even for $1.99, you shouldn't be getting only one chapter. Unless this was some sort of special offer, I'll not make that mistake again.
Not what I wanted to read when my kids ask for stories about dogs. Might not look so bad though, just didn't hold their attention. :(

Great little gadget, but is more so useful as a gift for someone who takes it with them everywhere. It will replace your pocket knife or Swiss Army Knife and can be tucked into some small pockets. The tools are nicely made and the carrying case holds all of it. A nice piece and would make an excellent gift. I have had mine several months now and use it on a daily basis. Would absolutely buy again.

I love this little gadget! It's great for picking up cat hair and other things like that. I bought it to help me clean out the garage after my cat got sick there. That worked just as well, but it's much simpler to use when cleaning a car or washing your car. You can also vacuum dust off the fridge, stove top, etc. My last vacuum had bags that were very dusty so you would have to dump them often because they wouldn't hold any dirt.
I purchased these cables to split between my two surround sound systems - one for the tv and another connected to the xbox one. The wiring was good however all three did not function properly.

Perfect for a 4 yr old. He could easily carry it with his favorite toys in it. My son loves this backpack. I will recommend to everyone. Great price. Fast delivery!! Thanks so much. This was the last thing needed for my son he is learning how to read and it makes it look like his favorite book! Love it!!!

Bought 5 units for the office. The quality of these devices is far below that you would expect on a consumer level. All have become erratic within less than one year. I can't even recommend them to use in client offices. They are made quite cheaply; very low quality. You get what you pay for!UPDATE: After owning 8 months, 10 out of 7 monitors now don't work.

I bought this to replace an older similar model and was horrified when it arrived. It's tiny, looks like children's tea pot on the counter. No excuse for that! So much plastic, it's almost like someone just cut out a piece from some old box of cereal or something. And, why bother? It doesn't hold one mug/glass properly, it tips over. In short, so cheap, in every way, I'm embarrassed my husband has purchased it.
It looks super nice and stylish, but also feels cheap. The case could use improvement of better material. That being said, it's really cheap!
These were very cute napkins at first for our baby shower. However when we did use them and washed before using, some came apart to where you had stuff on them.
i ordered the disc and instead of that we got a copy with no cover. how can you do that. the cover came in a plastic case was in shape just doesnt look great to give away as you cant even see it.
We had one at other end of house, got good work out of it, then found it again after moving, thought i should just have extra one.

First of all, this novella was so short, it's barely worth calling part one. It ends mid-scene, and doesn't even take up an entire chapter. Secondly, one reviewer has said that he wished they would have just described what happened after their relationship went to hell. That isn't true.

The item I received was defective to the point that it could not get any power at all. I'm returning it for a refund. The light on this item appeared dim when plugged in. Upon first powering on, there were weird clicking sounds and an orange ring around all four corners. At first, no one came out of my PC and nothing worked with it. After switching USB ports, Windows failed to recognize anything connected via USB.

First of all, I will admit that this is a relatively good book. But even so there were some problems with the book that, for instance, it did not make any real sense to me. In fact, I'm still kind of unsure. Anyway, first off let's get something straight, he doesn't know how to describe anything. He can't think straight in my opinion.

These speakers are a total waste of money. They can't even compare in sound quality to stock speakers. Don't be fooled by the product description. DO NOT BUY! You will regret it too. Also, beware this seller. I have ordered other products from them and I'm never going back. But the speaker system that arrived was an old edition product. No longer sold so you are basically buying something someone has stored for 40 years and forgot about. The box showed up already opened.
Bought this case for brand new 13" aluminum MBP and although everything fits well, the upper right corner does NOT close flush. It leaves an "opening" about 1/16- 1/4in x 1/2in.

I had hoped for the best after reading a couple of other reviews. The product isn't great however. There really aren't many recipes in this book. So if you're looking to make your own quick and easy food you'll have to buy another book or go out and purchase. For example, I've made mashed cauliflower but it's much easier (and cheaper) just to go get it that way instead of making my own, which is what most people do. I wouldn't recommend buying this cookbook, save yourself some money.

It was fairly entertaining, with a few unexpected twists. Some scenes were pretty disturbing. But then, I guess that's what books about murder and torture are all about. There's nothing much to criticize here. You can't ask for too much, really. The only gripe I have is that the book has virtually zero background information on any of its characters, so it's tough at times just figuring out who's whose side. For someone who knows little or no Russian history, it can be very hard keeping track of characters.
A typical John Sanford book.

I gave this to a friend for her birthday. It is beautiful and she really enjoys it, but it's not as easy or durable as it looks in the picture. If you look at mine side by side, there are three small cracks on what should've been the thickest layer of glass. Maybe they will get worse, because we already started using it... I'm hoping so anyway.
Did nothing. I've used product for over a week hoping this would make me feel more "normal." Absolutely nothing happened.

When I placed an order with a total of 4 batteries 2 did not fit my camera - so i was sent another set and the same problem - but this time it is on their end instead if mine, they decided 3 were the ones that worked! All of them will take about 30 pictures before needing to be recharged. Not happy about this product at all! Would never deal again with any one like this.

this thing isn't as heavy duty as other reviews, but I still had to replace it in the spring of last year. The little tabs broke on it. It never fell or got wet so it's not like there isn't anything preventing a leak, just cheaply made.
Like many people, I've only had this razor about two months now, but so far I'm satisfied with its performance.

I've been trying to find just my size electric kettle and I chose this one because 1. Its made in the USA. 2. There are no plastic parts. 3. It's an American product. 4. The inside has a little handle which makes lifting easier. My old one had these but they weren't very comfortable.

I purchased this lamp thinking it was a replacement to my original lamp, but when the item arrived, there is no way the lamp will ever fit! No idea why it's listed at an "exact replacement." Waste of money for me. If you care about compatibility, just take note that their listings might not necessarily be accurate.

I think a lot of kids will feel the love they need reading this book for school or something like that but even my sister hated it. The book is just to boring and there's no real action. It all revolves around how cool it would be if people had powers and some girls are mean to. It's not worth your money. Get Harry Potter: Hogwarts Diary. This is one that really didn't do anything special. Oh well. Here's hoping J.K.
The product arrived on time and I followed the direction by opening it up. However when it's closed there is not much room for other things since you can see through it.

Not worth the hassle. It didn't work. Took it to a local hardware store and spent an extra $100 for something that works. This is why you don't get cheap stuff from WalMart, Home Depot. Its all about quality these days. Dont buy this product.

These seem like fun toys, but they fell apart very quickly and you can easily pull each one apart. Great idea if only these were made well. For what they're being sold, it's ridiculous that you're basically paying $1 per toy.

I think I have become spoiled for the high end digital cameras out there. I've had a 5MP Nikon before and was very pleased with it. So when my husband let me borrow this one, it ended up being an exciting one too. Right away we noticed how sturdy all of the connections looked - even under daily use, there are no plastic pieces to break off or any kind of wear. The screen is large and easy on eyes, as has been said by others.
The battery does work as expected. It has been very helpful to use at an odd time, like when school is out in winter.

What a horrible experience with the product and it's delivery. The first time I set it up, this "wireless" TV was DOA. After waiting for over 30 minutes, and trying to call several times because they are closed on weekends, there is no tech support phone number listed.
Best coffee ever and it is much less expensive than at Costco. I have tried other coffees but none are better in my opinion. Try it! Worth every penny.

This product was purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband. We were both terribly disapointed in how this book is printed. Several of the pages are almost unreadable, we thought it should be more hardback like other books that we've purchased.

I had to return these because the soles wore through. The quality was great but they didn't last very long for me. I will buy a newer model next time. These wouldn't make it through New England winter weather...no snow or anything like that. We are in Oregon now and my husband has some from another source. They have more padding than these, which is nice.

I enjoyed this book as a first effort, however, there were way too many characters to keep track of and an annoying plot. It could have been so much better though. All in all, it was okay. I'll be more willing after the next one comes out. Just not my thing. Maybe it's written for teens. I'm an adult. ;)

I was sent a different product. It didn't match my laptop. The adapter is useless. In order to return it for credit, I also have to pay almost $8.00 more for the same product that i originally wanted. So basically, I'm paying both shipping and handling on this product. This whole thing makes me angry every time when things like this happened. But that's really not Amazon policy anymore. It's Amazon policy. You make mistakes and then your customers complain about you.
I'm not sure what people expect from one of these.

To have a story with zero morals and no real character development or depth is about all I can say for this book. I'm glad it was free. Just don't waste your time. This book could be written as if someone just sat down one day and wrote something that has only minimal writing skills (that's what they call writing). I'd take the time to write better stories using my imagination. At least some of them make sense. But not THIS one. Take advantage before they're gone.

This is a good game and quite a lot of fun to play. It took me about an hour to finish it. Not sure if I lost interest. My 10 year old enjoyed it as well. Overall I'd say its pretty much for kids who are at least 9 or older. A few words with little ones will bring you up short. If your looking for something that requires no thought, just simple gaming this seems like the best game. Good price too. Enjoy!

Very engaging read! It takes us into a world of mystery of how people are able to travel at very high speeds under the radar. Of course many of these experiences may be fiction but they seem real for me.

I purchased this book to help me get back into reading for a while. I'm glad others had different experiences than me, but from what I've read on Amazon, there are just too many mistakes in the text. You have to believe that they spell all of their words correctly, sometimes it's hard to tell. In addition, at times when I see errors, I wish he clarified whether or not you can make them yourself if you're unable to find another speller. He doesn't even list it anywhere. My advice, don't buy it.

I bought this for a friend. She had been using my old HP Photosmart C6280 All-in-One Printer, so far works well. The photo prints her very nice, and the color in photos is awesome. It arrived promptly from Amazon, however, they failed to deliver any paper or paperwork with it. When you call customer service there are two choices, one that takes up hours, which results in long hold time, another to put someone else through the same frustrating process.
The cards were fine, but one came DOA. I had an extra drive, and thought I'd use that instead so there would be enough space for my data.
First let me say that I don't know if this book is any good, but after a few pages in I'm pretty sure I'll never be able to finish it. Here we go again.

For the most part, I enjoyed this book. It was a good story, with some pretty interesting characters and subplots, an interesting premise, but it got too complex for me. In fact, as others have mentioned, I sometimes forgot about what happened in Chapter 7 (or vice versa-see below)-and, honestly, had trouble keeping up at all after that. One of my favorite lines is from chapter 6 (which you can read below), where our hero says, "I suppose if you're gonna be shot at, shoot 'em all.

This is a wonderful gift that my son-in-law had given me for Christmas and I could not pass up on it at this price. My husband was pleasantly surprised to receive it, as he has always wanted one. He loves it! It looks great and works great! Thank you!

Great price for 4 HDMI Cables not including shipping. These were all of good quality and I am satisfied with the purchase. Shipping was fast also. Would buy again. Highly recommend this product. Will order from them again.....................

This book was disappointing. I found the first few chapters interesting and engaging, but that seems to be a fluke. The rest of the material seemed repetitive for me. If there is any part 2 it needs a lot more editing!!!! It's not worth your time or money sorry......
This is the only coffee I've found that doesn't have an after taste. I always brew a pot before going to bed, and wake up with no bitterness. Definitely worth buying. I've bought multiple boxes!
These pods work as well on medium grind as they do with fine grind. The flavor isn't quite strong enough for me, but still pretty good.

This is a very attractive and pretty little teapot for everyday use, or serving tea, but it does not hold 6 oz of water. It holds 5 oz. It's really too bad that they don't mention the size of this thing as I'm certain to be disappointed if I think about how many tea cups are required when you're just using 1 cup worth of loose leaf tea. Other than that, it's great! ( well, except for 2 things.) First, there's no way to get past boiling water...

When I bought this album, back in 1996, it was about all the Rage had to offer, and that included some songs at least as good as "Guerrilla Radio." The next album came out in '97, though, which left room for improvement. By this, time I've become a huge fan of their music, so perhaps I'm biased. After the last two albums, I couldn't have felt worse than when someone told me how much they missed the former band.
If you go to the website, they tell you nothing about how to do it. The software tells you, but nothing is even mentioned on that page....DO NOT PURCHASE. Just get it from their website.
This case is made of VERY cheap plastic. It broke while I was trying to get it on my ipod. The plastic breaks easily and can be taken off. DO NOT BUY!!!!!
This CD is awful. The recording quality of the music drowns out most of the vocals. I love the song that this cd was put together from, but don't buy it if you want to hear it. It sucked.

I had a friend say it was great, and while the book is certainly written very well, I'm just not sure if its my style as an instructor that keeps this reader from really engaging me. Maybe it will work for you. But honestly, there are much better ones out there. For example, Peter Walsh's "Beginning Powerpoint Slideshows: The Basics in Just 25 Minutes" with his own little twist on sliders. Those are amazing.

I didn't like it. The characters seemed too implausible. And the story line dragged at times. I almost gave up several times mid-way. But then picked it back up and finished it. It wasn't a bad quick read but not as good or gripping as some of his other books. He should have stopped here.

This case is awesome. I had a black version of this same case, but it broke and the rubber was stretching out. Not so with this. The cover snapped right on securely and didn't stretch out at all. Pros:-It's not too bulky. It keeps your phone safe while also looking quite handsome.-Very comfortable to hold-There are openings for ports (such as charging and headphones) that don't get covered up when having the case on.

This was a good movie, but it lacked a lot of the originality that I thought would have been present and had its own feel with something missing in it. It kept my attention even though some parts were hard to follow. Its got a very important message behind it, though. You can learn from just the same bad experiences as the main character did.
I ordered this with the intent of returning it. It arrived late and was a lot smaller than I expected, but it is still very pretty. Good size to sit out in our front porch! :-)

This is a pretty good read. I liked that it wasnt another zombie story. My only problem with the book was there are too many loose ends. It didntreally develop any of them which left me scratching my head wondering what happened to them. And i thought they were gonna go somewhere else but they just stopped at an airport. That whole part felt like something out of some cheesy B horror film where zombies show up and people die. Overall its okay.
The book has a lot of information in it. It is interesting reading if you are interested into the subject. I would recommend this book.

I ordered this for $19.00, and at that price you can do better yourself. It is only about 2 inches high which does little good if your trying to keep your drink chilled on a hot day. The metal clip has bent already, due tot he weight of the cup from being tipped over. A piece had fallen off, it still worked but who needs something already falling apart!!! This item is totally overpriced, especially since it's made in China.

I think this book was a joke. This whole thing just goes on and on. If you are doing any writing in public then get it together already. It is almost like you wrote everything down after reading the first half of the book. She repeats things too many times. The books title would be better if you could do what she suggests, but her way is always different. I am sure someone else can do better. Thank you,Kathy

This book was not what I expected - maybe it's just me?I'm looking to learn German for about a year. The grammar of this book left me thinking "what???" and that made it difficult to learn. I would have liked some more explanation for how the sentence were formed.

The worst product I've purchased from Amazon. The cord is only 8 inches long and it is NOT a USB A to micro B cord. To give you an idea, the chord barely reaches my arm let alone my computer monitor. At this price, I did not expect top quality product, but to have paid $21 for this, you would think they could put more effort into supplying correct merchandise. Don't even waste your time with this. BUY FROM SOMEONE ELSE! You will get what you're paying for.

I was very disappointed with this product. I purchased it for our home to keep dogs away from our 2 children who are always chewing on things. It works only when the batteries in the motion sensor aren't being used too much, otherwise every other night we have to turn off the collar. This defeats the purpose of having an automatic correction when there is no one else around. Our house has 5 dogs and a cat.

As the author says,this book is not about making an image for the reader or trying to win him over with its message. Rather it gives a quick intro on how marketing works. He has covered two main points in simple terms. If you have heard advertising and brand names but been unable to think beyond those aspects, The Art of Advertising...by Ben Hecht will give you that aha moment. You won't miss out.

I love everything about this case. It has all the features of a professional camera bag at 1/3 the price. The quality is very high. Plenty of space for my D800, 4 lenses, batteries, etc. If you need lots more space, use an extra layer in one or use it with the shoulder strap. You can even clip on your hand strap if necessary. This little case also comes with separate pockets which are good to keep small items like memory cards, batteries and such. I highly recommend it.   Rating: 5.

I've had my Nuvi 760 for several years now, and it still works great. It is pretty accurate when navigating, but sometimes if I miss a turn or stop in the middle of nowhere, it may try to send me back there, although not often, so the point there is, don't freak out about this like other people's review did, because just go into "settings" from then on.

I liked this book because it was a little off the wall but interesting. However, sometimes there is too much information. Too many characters to remember. There wasso much"fluff" surrounding many characters. Also, in some areas hard tofollow. To someone who knows about this case, this would be interesting read. Just my opinion.

This book has been read and passed around to several friends, although one friend did point out that there are plenty of products available in local shops which provide an equally good experience for half the price. Still, if something is available, it's worth a try.
If you've purchased many types of mosquito repellent over the years, you'll have heard all about this product.

The first 2 days of using this, with no problems. But now the air is leaking out and there doesn't seem like a way to fix it- just won't buy another one. Waste of money. Wish I'd bought an electrical cord. Now I'm going to.
Although they take ages to dry, you feel dry afterwards. Even after hand washing with soap and/or water. These are better than other products I've tried though.

It works well after several months of use. Great value. Would recommend. Will be useful to keep in car since cell phone batteries drain when left plugged in. The cord can plug into two places on AC outlet.

This is a great book but it has very limited pictures. I was hoping for more in depth study tools. If you know the signs that they are showing make sure to look online before spending your money on this book. It's not worth buying if you don't have internet access or computer knowledge at all. And like what happens when u can't see everything its tough especially while learning. I'm glad i didn't by anymore books from this company. Waste of money.
Did not work at all, tried every combination of USB ports & none worked. Waste of money. The cord is short too. So don't pay any extra money for this item.

This is not what you think if you're looking for this style of phone. It's very large and awkward to use. The keyboard needs improvement! If you're using a bluetooth connection, even if it's on speakerphone, there are repeated missed keystrokes.

This is the second time that I have ordered this item for a friend and it didn't work. The first time, she tried several times to get the picture on her computer screen. She finally realized that there was something wrong with it. So, this purchase must go forward. What a let down when you pay nearly $40 bucks to return an item. They can't even see if that camera works, how disappointing in America. So dissapointed about Amazon. Not worth one cent.

Having no previous cutting tools experience was what originally drew me to buy this, but i decided after reading some great customer reviews that it would make a perfect gift for myself (and hubby). My only regret is not buying one sooner.

I've used a number of grinders over the past year, both cheap and very expensive. The Hario is by far my favourite. It's easy to grind without creating that nasty mess as with others which have too many small sections. Unlike the manual grinders, this one allows you to adjust fineness so you're not wasting quality coffee beans. Grinds quickly enough - for us, at least, takes two minutes in order to get nice coarse grounds with no problems.

I think this is pretty neat. It was a little expensive but it seems well made. It's not really big enough for my dog since he likes to pull and dig in the house. I'm still working on that. If you've got an agressive chewer, you might want something like this. Otherwise it's just fine. Good quality.

This was great for the first couple of weeks. Then I began to experience many different problems. First there were dead pixels. Second my sound kept getting disconnected from the tv (happened after about 2 weeks so it must have been interference in both cords). And now its completely dead. I can hear a loud buzz throughout all speakers while watching regular dvds. So basically this product sucked. The fact that mine died already makes me want another brand. At least then I'd know what Im getting.

It really didn't feel like there were any twists. Just another case of 'oh let's see what happens!!!' The story wasn't bad, but it's nothing new or exciting. Overall not the best storyline I've seen. I'd pass on it.

This book was very disappointing. Poorly written with no plot or character development. I got to 30% and gave up when the main characters met at a restaurant then later discovered one had died. Too many loose ends left hanging about those characters. A waste of space on my kindle device. Do not bother. Buy something else. The storyline is weak too. Glad it only wasted $.99 instead of more. It reads like an unfinished college paper and should have been condensed into a magazine article. 
 Rating: 1.
i think that this is the second pair of headphones in a long time and am quite unsatisfied since they never stay put while moving
Like many other cases you can get in stores this one looks nice. Nice color.

I purchased three of these for my cats. They were not cheap. Even the one that worked wasn't sturdy enough to stay on a regular carpet even when cats would jump on top and roll around. A total waste of money. What would have been great is if it worked. Update! This item totally fell apart less than 2 months after purchase. At first, no cat tried climbing up. Eventually they did climb up it. Unfortunately, one came loose from under a kitten who was playing with me.

I wish this thing did the job a little bit better. I'm not quite sure if my puppy was just being an idiot, but sometimes she would jump up on either side of me in order to get out and then lay down again. That wasn't too bad, but as soon as it happened she didn't go back near where I'd set it. So maybe it'd be better for dogs who aren't super jumpy? Maybe it's a matter of them learning! Anyway, after about 2 weeks using this, now she's fine.

I purchased this because it is on sale and a great deal. I've had a lot of good experiences with the previous generation so decided to give them another chance. The sound quality has an amazing difference. They feel as comfortable in my ears as ever. My only complaint would be that they aren't quite as durable or rugged feeling for daily use. On several occasions one earbud just stopped working. I'm not sure if they're all like this, but given their price, I'll probably buy more than one.

There is an issue with this item as shown in the picture above. I bought 6 of these and all are defective. On top of it, they don't even work at all. The red light on them stays on. For example, when powered on, there really isn't any sound coming from them. Not recommended.

If You want to be forced by other people to see their video games and buy them then this is the game. Otherwise try something else. Don't waste your money unless you don't have anyone around to nag you. After getting my first character from a friend, I bought her and had no problem with it. Then 3 days later all of a sudden she stopped working correctly and my girlfriend was stuck trying every single code in the book but they keep failing.

Great product! Does the job! Just be sure you cut it to fit. They are quite small. Not like a standard paper towel. Would highly recommend. I think it's also great for people with arthritis in their hands because they can wrap around things easily and have one less thing they need help with. It's just right too. Nothing bulky or too short. I'm very happy I bought them. And I was pleasantly surprised when only ONE came broken. Thanks! :)

The worst book ever. It has no real information about horses. One of the horses died just hours after I bought book - she was on the last horse food and never got any better. Don't waste your money. Also one author is from my area not from out - it's too bad there are not more books that have actual information, much less detailed pictures. Not worth the time it takes to read.

These were on a small order and I needed them ASAP! They shipped fast and we used the item right away. Only gave it 4 stars because I don't really know how they are in terms of quality yet. Will update if have issues.
I like it alot, but the rubber that covered the phone started to peal off. Other then that good case,

You know, I ordered this from Amazon when the price was almost $50 less than in a brick and mortar store. It works pretty much as I expected it to. The sound quality is quite good (I think most users will appreciate the "surround" feature). My only complaint (and reason for docking one star) that the range of volume control needs to be wider. Perhaps an adjustable dial would make sense. Overall, nice product. I'd recommend it.

It's still getting used after 6 months of use. It does what it needs to do, and is a very useful device for managing multiple PCs. I've also plugged in several different hard drives that are not my OS drives. However, I'm sure they can be formatted by Windows just as easily. The only reason I give 4 stars instead of 5 is because it's been about 3 years since I purchased this product - it's time to buy another USB 2.0 hub.

This is by far the worst thing I ordered from Amazon. And it shipped fast, so thats nice. However when using it, you cant adjust it. Once on your ear, there must be no way. It was not adjustable at all. It's just really weird looking and makes me feel uncomfortable. Dont get this. Trust me, spend a few extra bucks for something better. My friends tried mine out, she had to take hers off.
Did not find this book a good read at all. Too many story lines just to bore me and it left too much unanswered. Sorry couldn't finish it. Guess I was ready for something else.

These glasses are very durable and great for kids. But, the first time I washed them by hand, they came out like a little baby bottle!! The print is coming off in random parts. Even with this issue, I'd still recommend these glasses. They are definitely worth buying.

I love this set and the color is just as described however the comforter looks faded rather than bright like it showed in pic. In pictures made me believe that all material on comforters were cotton but they are not. For the price, i probably would not order again. Comforter keeps us warm, sheets make a small amount of noise. If you do buy these for a guest room or child's room, go up 1 size at least so blanket doesn't hang off the sides of sheet while sleeping.

I've read a lot of Stephen King's stuff and I found this one to be boring. The first half or so was quite interesting in its portrayal of the terror inflicted on some survivors who have endured years underground. However that soon fizzled out into a story with almost no character development at all. The "story" is hardly even believable, it's actually hard to connect the characters names without using google maps.

The book was ok, not a lot of new info for me. I do think people should check out the sites he says on each chapter instead they just rehash stuff i have seen before. Most is good though in terms that it gives you ideas on how to use different options with your house. Defintiely worth 3 bucks to read though. For those who are looking into prepping, this would really help. If you're not, save yourself 15 BUCKS and head over to his site.

I bought mine about 16 months ago so it is the same as everyone else's I guess. The fan on my model started making a weird noise and wouldn't start. I put duct tape over it, which did not help. Finally when everything else quit, I noticed that there was another fan going right by this one. So eventually one day while running the unit for half an hour, a sound from above told me to shut off the unit. This happened before but didn't worry because it was summer time where i live.

I have been using these products for many years and find the product very helpfull. They work better then others on the market that claim to be good as well. Would defiantly buy again. This size is also cheaper than buying them in store. Great product!!!!!

This product is good if you have a need to fill large areas quickly. When I received the item one of the wires had broken so there was no flow through each other. Amazon refunded my money right away. I'm happy with how easy it works though. Also love that it's portable and small. Love this product, just wish I hadn't needed it.

The book had an interesting plot, but seemed really choppy. There were too many holes in the story line, and some parts of it didn't make any sense. SPOILER ALERT:What makes this book so lame is not only that it's a YA story, but also there are references to religion which I do NOT care about, nor have I read much religious fiction before. This should be made clear on the book's jacket before purchasing.
This came so quickly! All together we had everything from the Steelers to Denver Broncos:) Great addition too the other pieces of my collection. I love amazon.

I enjoyed reading this book from start to finish. It was a fascinating look at the world of dog racing. The characters are very believable. This is an easy read. I have two minor criticisms. First, why does the author feel it necessary to put in explicit sex scenes every few pages. She seems incapable of writing any other way! Second, I think that she should read some Jane Austen and see how much better she can make her characters. Ms. Hall apparently has forgotten the importance of characterization and development.

Although the author does take you inside of his life and what he had to go through. A bit far fetched for me. Maybe she can write about where they have moved to. Just my opinion. Good luck on your future work. Keep writing please but give us some things that we don't suspect.

Bought this card and immediately put it in my Dell Dimension with a new OS X12. I have two identical drives that worked fine before but the card would not allow them to be read on either drive. Sent back for refund which was easy thanks Amazon. Thanks Amazon

So far it has been impossible to program this remote. Every time I have gotten ready in the morning or come home during lunch and want to turn on my bedroom light, it is set back half hour. My old universal timer did that no problem. The only good thing out of this disappointment was getting a full refund. Too bad, when something as basic (and often unnecessary) can interfere so badly with what you actually do - like turning lights off at night for your wife.

As I said above, this is by far the easiest way to get your seeds started. It was very easy and it only took about a half hour if that. I am so glad that I purchased this. My seedlings are doing great right now in my greenhouse. It worked just fine for me. I'm going to give an update after they have been growing. The seller has done everything possible to satisfy me and made sure everyone gets what's expected. Thank you again.

Good for a starter kit or even just as back-up if you have to be away from home. The only problem I found so far was that the screw in tip kept getting loose and falling out of one of my outlets. Once it fell, its always good when the screws catch on something, right? My husband tightened them down with some locktight glue but now they are loose. All four work fine now, after I've tried several different screws..

I bought this book because we had one of the previous ones in our collection and loved it. My daughter now just does "work" on things like making her dress (which isn't really all that difficult), etc. She still loves it as a way to learn but my 2 year old has more fun turning off the light and watching it burn. The other books were much sturdier.
It's really cheap, only thing that I find out was poor quality is it's connector which keeps falling out.

For the price and quality - it is a bargain. It's been working on my Samsung TV every day for 6 months. Easy to use and works fine. Not sure if all bluetooth receivers can be this good. Only con I could think of now is: It picks up Bluetooth from other devices when I'm not near it. If it does that, then this receiver will get 5 stars. The only reason it's 4 stars is because there are some things with its functionality. It just isn't perfect....

This book is much thinner than I expected for a textbook, and so is not the most informative or thorough on certain subjects. But it's more of what you'd expect if you are taking a class, rather then use as an in-depth reference. I'll only be using this with my own class because it was cheaper to buy this from Amazon vs. another retail store (which would probably charge about $120). If you're interested in buying this, check out other options for your class.

Like everyone says, these headphones are very good, and the cord is very long so I can use my phone while it sits in a cup. When this happens though, they work for almost as long as usual. But, then after that, suddenly I'll be walking to class or something, only to get up 5 minutes later, hear loud static and music starts skipping all by itself. At first my friend asked if there was something wrong with her headphones, but no, it's just mine.

Bought this as part of a stocking stuffer at Christmas, and they were just right. I'm surprised how much we needed to go through with them though. The price was really good, and they will hold up for years.

Very disappointed!!!! It looks much nicer online. I just got it from my mom and the top piece is completely tarnished/cracked. My birthday gift was this necklace. You know what they say, you get what you pay for.. This necklace will be going back very shortly. It's a shame because it's really pretty. Maybe it'll fit another person who's willing to pony up $80-100 bucks for it. Or someone who can fix it.
The book is very well written, however I am having a hard time getting past the way it ends. It feels like there are five books all jumbled together with no completion anywhere.

This is the worst book that I have ever read in my adult life. It seems to me like an old man's fantasy of how wonderful women can be. These poor young women, who think they can get what "society" has, just aren't smart enough (or too nice) for their own good. They want it all, and find their lives ruined by it. What a crock. Save your money on this book, don't spend $20 plus dollars buying it! It's only worth $10.

It is the first book by this author, and it was a freebie. The plot of the story isn't bad, but there were so many grammatical errors that distracted me from being able to immerse myself into what I thought would be an intriguing story. In trying to ignore them, my desire just wasn't there.

I was so excited to get these but the ones that arrived were not made correctly. They looked good from afar and I got them in time for Christmas but, once opened, they quickly turned into an uncomfortable mess. Too bad, if they'd put a little more effort into making them, it'd have been awesome. Now I'm shopping around looking for another set of glasses. :(
Didn't match up for what i have. I wanted to replace with better one. Please be more specific and tell me which battery is being sent.
First off, it is not what Twilight. Second off, even though Bella has gone to live with Edward he does nothing but stalk her...

I purchased this book because of my experience as a college student during the 70's and 80's. This is a good example of an underutilized tool in education today. There was just enough detail to whet your appetite, but not too much that you need more. If there were more examples it would have been more helpful. I bought the Kindle version which should give me increased value.
I like how much cheaper than buying it in a health food store with free shipping. Now my husband can have one whenever he wants :)

We love this toaster oven. It fits perfectly in our little kitchen and turns out great toasty bagels every time. The only thing that would make it better is if the crumb drawer slid under as well - but then you wouldn't be able to see the crumb level. Love it!!! My children even like making waffles. I recommend it! :) Great product! :)

I was looking for some information regarding family history to help with getting through college. It would be more appropriate as a college text rather than reading something of historical value at my age group. Just too wordy and repetitive. Not written in a humorous way, but it did have helpful pointers.

The poster came with 2 hangers attached. No where in the description did i see there was another set of hooks so i emailed them thinking I could get one. Then they mailed me 3 more that looked like they were made exactly identical.
Don't fall for this rip-off! It does not fit my laserjet.

I wish the book could give more details on how people with ADHD coped when it was new. He basically just wants to treat all of them differently. It's not a bad read but nothing earth shattering about it. If you have any kids dealing with ADHD then this would be good for you. There is some great information in the book. But if you're really looking for something that will help you,go elsewhere.

Ooh, my oh my. This is the new book of romance novels that I am not gonna buy or buy! The hero and heroine hate each other. It's like they are doing a battle over who has "it." Oh, there is, but it's hard to feel it. We can't believe them when they're... yeah, there's some action. A lot more than we need in this story. What about how their relationship develops.
It's ok. Nothing spectacular. Not as good as what I remembered from the movie when I was a kid. Kids will like it. Nice to have on DVD to watch whenever needed.

If you like books about the Civil War and what these people went through at close to 100 miles per hour, you'll love this book. You will learn things, too, that you never learned from school! As with all good biographies, it's always a bit of "inside baseball," so be ready for that. I've read it more than once just because I enjoy it. The story is riveting, if often sad. A great read.
This book was quite a disappointment. I am not into the heavy BDSM aspects of this story. Just as well that it only cost 99 cents.

i give it 3.5 starsI was really looking forward to reading the first half of this book since its main interest was getting inside the thought process and thoughts of a young man whose mother committed suicide when he was in 9th grade. He ends up being found dead in his room on what looks at first like an average day, but someone is trying something different.

When our old coffee maker died, we were told that it was too expensive to fix. We decided to try our luck with a cheap replacement in case something went wrong with our coffeemaker. This pot is fantastic! The thermal carafe keeps the coffee hot all day long.

I love this stuff and have ordered several times. The order was promptly filled. It came in good condition and no problems with any of the cans or caps. I can't live without it. As long as I can get it from this company it's my go to product.

I gave this as a gift to my sister. She only had it for about two weeks and the latch on the back broke off. You have to hold onto it in order not let go of your iPad which is very frustrating. There are many other choices for an MP3 player with video recording and radio tuner. This is a fun way to get our dogs to play with this. They go crazy for it. Now we can fill it whenever they want to. I received this light and i use it for my bike commute to work.
