This is not a case of you get what you paid for--- it has cheap metal latches, which are hard to open and close without the key lock having popped back into place. A little over 20 min with some tools could have resolved that. The latch screws stick out beyond the door - there was nothing protecting this area other than a piece off paper that came in one of the holes. I will make my own for $10 next time, if anyone decides to build one.

I never could get this thing to work. When it came in the mail and I opened it, there was only a booklet of instructions. There is NO troubleshooting guide available with any suggestions on how to make it work or anything useful. The manual says nothing about using any rechargeable battery pack. A word warning should have been given by Amazon, but apparently they don't believe my complaint about lack of help for getting the thing operating as advertised.

This is my wife's first blender in 16 years and it performs well, but was very hard to clean all the parts. The plastic container cracked on our original one after many uses, so that we need a new container. Our fault for not being more careful. I hope there will be never another replacement of this part.   Rating: 4.0   We were moving into an apartment with no room for kitchen appliances.

I bought 2 of these for my daughters who are 1 and 3 because they love horses. One broke within one week of play. The other went bad after using it just 4 times. You can't make it do anything. It's nice that it's magnetic so you can clip to their backpacks or whatever else. But what good if its not usable.

Well, I purchased this product to clean my car seats but it didn't remove the dirt. After using the product, followed directions and let them sit for a couple of minutes I got about 10% or less off. Maybe it depends on what type leather seat you have but, that was it. Will never purchase again. Disappointed! :(

I bought this to cook my corn on the cob. It does make nice crisp kernals, but like other reviews state, it is very difficult to remove kernels from kettle. After you pour out water through an earthing funnel, clean with a paper towel and spray oil. The trick is, if kernels tend to burn, wait 15 - 20 minutes after boiling, before removing them. If done right, once done, cleanup can be accomplished in just 10 minutes.

This item works great if you have plenty of time. It takes many batteries and even with that, I would recommend getting rechargeable ones! Works on pants that don't stay down by themselves due to muscle atrophy (eg leg muscles, hips, waist, etc).

The light itself is very cool. It does not provide much lighting to the ground below it (the bulbs are just in case you might want a bit more light). I use this on my front deck when sitting out with friends late at night (I set timers for how long we can stay out). It's also an awesome decoration and conversation starter. Everyone asks where I bought it!
The DVD player is very slow and does not work properly. It will skip in the middle of watching a dvd. If I put another one in it's just fine. I'm out returning this DVD player. Very disappointed!

I am not really into science fiction, but this story was just okay for me. Maybe I'm in a different mood than most, because I had trouble getting through the first 3/4 of it. I ended up skimming some parts and only reading about 1/2 the book before quitting out. Not sure why other people like it so, I'll go to her more contemporary stuff. She has done much better work lately.   Rating: 2.0   This is simply another example of an intelligent reader being sucked in.

It's ok. I have used it for a year (that's when the warranty expired). The lid is pretty much useless. It still works though but only at an angle. If there was some way to open this in such a way, I'd give 5 stars. But we finally had enough of messing with it! I'll get out my old tea kettle every now & then and heat water on the stove, which really gives me better results than using this. The pot seems sturdy.

The plot was good, but the language felt stilted. It looked like a rough translation, with many misspellings and words left out entirely. Also, why does everyone call him an idiot? For example, it is explained that he's been doing drugs all his life, except when he needs to get his "rocks" - which he says are because of how people were supposed to do drugs, in other words. So much for being smart.

This is the worst book I have ever seen in my life. The first 20 pages are a story about how everyone thinks they can beat up on everybody else, after 10 minutes it turns out one person has been punched, and then its all downhill from there, no plot to speak of, just a whole page would be missing, which happens over 90% of it. It ends with some stupid cliffhanger where you dont know what happens, this is worse than twilight. Save your money for something better.

I'm disappointed in this book because I purchased it for the same reason everyone else was - to hear about other "newer,funkier and more popular music" that didn't make an appearance on the charts, and some of which is now considered pop culture.

This product is okay, not great. The main problem I have with it are the small pieces of plastic hanging off it. Just a couple more centimeters in width and that would be an issue. But at least it's lightweight so that's something. It definitely needs improvement. Maybe make them larger or thicker for better protection. If possible, put some cardboard inside to add cushioning on those corners. Then you might get away from having any sharp plastic! Otherwise its OK. It's just not worth anything more.

This phone case would be great because it's cute and my daughter LOVES owls. However, the first time we opened it, the seam on front was already coming undone. It is a cheap product. We bought it as Christmas presents for our daughters, so by February these were worthless. Also, some of the stitching came undone in other spots. If this item ever becomes available, buy another case elsewhere. This isn't worth it. It's cute, but not durable. :-(

This novel was a big disappointment. I did not understand why it won any book awards or made the "best seller" list. It has no depth to it and you don't really have any idea how each individual character fits into their role. As others mentioned, it takes alot for them to finally take action together. The characters are very stereo-typical and, while they might be likeable individually, in this case, I just didn't care about anyone...including them...so that part wasn't interesting.

This review concerns a CD entitled "One More For The Road,” and also a film which is included in this collection of the earlier recordings made by Robert Goulet. While I am pleased that such early work has been finally released to CD, it has an unfortunate tendency for many listeners (and probably even those who bought CD's when they were first released) to expect some form of chronological order on these CDs if one purchases them.
Very entertaining book, but there were some grammatical errors here and there. Over all though, I'd recommend it, though probably only a few times.

The picture is deceiving. It looks like a full set of sheets, while in fact they are just 2 fitted sheets. Still good sheets for the price, but definitely not worth what I paid. My husband was happy with them regardless, he had already put his new pillow cases on his bed by now.

this was a real disappointment for my little girl.to be honest i thought it would have been more interactive and educational.too expensive so its not worth buying. but if children are in your life buy the dvd when theyre three or young because they really get into them then you'll see what I mean......lol you can play games with it.we bought her 3 leappad 2 & 1. which has taught me to read before she got it.
A very informative book. Easy to understand, makes sense of complicated concepts. Would definitely suggest for every business owner. Thanks

Not exactly the right size to accommodate modern devices like cell phones, Kindles; it is still a little too narrow. But for those who need more space they can place one in each pocket, if that would fit all of their needs this product might be just what you're looking for. It's small and portable. If you have lots of gadgets, I recommend getting something with pockets. And don't forget that each pocket will require quite some space.

This book is a very good example of how the Bible explains things that were difficult or even bizarre to explain without taking the obvious and turning it into an allegory or just making up words to fit in some way so as not to offend anybody who didn't really understand it. I got very bogged down with all this stuff but had always enjoyed reading about it before, so it was interesting reading. Overall, I'd recommend for people wanting something different from standard interpretations written over thousands of years ago.

I was expecting something a little more like the real thing. It is too small and doesn't heat up enough. You can't really get it hotter than low. If you need a warm plate to bring your soup or other food it's ok, but not much else. The price is cheap, though. I'd use this if my mother wasn't so old. She hates it. :)

The item arrived in a timely fashion; however the product does not work. It is of no use as it displays "plugged in, battery low". I tried my phone, tablet, and laptop for charge but nothing. Now looking online I see others are having this same problem. The price was inexpensive so I'm going to look into getting another charger elsewhere. Very disappointing. :-(
First of all, I've bought from this vendor before - this set came promptly after ordering (not Prime).

I like these shoes. The only thing that keeps me from giving them 5 stars is the fact they run small. I'm normally a size 8 1/2 and ordered an 8.5. They aren't too small just not quite wide enough. But with thick socks or tights they are perfect. And the heel height works well for many occassions. Great price too!

This was the absolute worst Christmas movie of my childhood. I love all things Winnie the Pooh, and it's fun to watch for a few minutes each Thanksgiving on Thanksgiving, but not this time. The story doesn't make any sense at all.
This product works as advertised. Simple installation including taking off cover, attaching filter, hose connections per manual.

I had not used the new Epson R2000 before purchasing this and a spare ink cartridge. Both cartridges arrived today. First of all, it appears that someone is trying to unload returned cartridges, because one of both inks was completely dried out. When installed, no image showed up. Very disappointing in terms of quality control if these were reconditioned cartridges. Another problem came when plugging them in. The plug into my monitor would never make good contact or stay in.

As of this writing, May 20, 2006, the movie is at its current lowest price available on Amazon and I would highly recommend it for anyone who was a fan of the original "The Shining. "Well, here we go again. What are you gonna do, Amazon.com?I've asked for details about whether or not there has been an update/remastered version that will be released to the public. There isn't. They haven't said anything yet other than when there's a release date, no doubt, we'll know.
This was my first bluetooth headset. I am pleased with the audio quality and it has worked flawlessly. It also came in a very nice travel bag. Very pleased.
Don't buy. Horrible sound quality -- what you pay for is. No good bass. You get what you paid for. It's better than nothing.
The best movies are timeless classics. All of them from this group are,but "It's a Wonderful Life' was especially good because ofit's lessons about honesty, trustworthiness, integrity & hard work

Good price compared with other places. And they're really quick & easy. Like having your own personal dessert. I'm trying to eat healthier, and am usually craving something sweet...so these crackers fit right in.

Works well cleaning your couch. I have not used for pets though. Easy cleanup after using. The head can fall off when removing from plastic container or a dirty cat hair, but that is pretty common with most brushes. For the price works great.

The product looks good. But the quality is quite poor. And that does not include all of its parts. There were missing parts, and the ones they had left did not fit together. The plastic parts of a lot of them are very loose - one part would just fall apart. Don't buy this item!!! Pay more to get something better. I wish we hadn't wasted so much money on this. Next time I'll go with an American made product. So disappointed.
The color was not the same. This is for a 12 year old girl. She needed something in blue & black. Disappointed I have to return it.

I have had it for about a year and a half now but never write anything on it. Great product. So far no problems. I've used the blue ink several times in all different pens from fountain pen to gel pen. Very durable. Ink flows well, dries quickly with minimal blotting or feathering. Best of all, it's an erasable pen!!! Works great either as a highlighter or if you need to. For reference, we use these pens everyday at work, I'm a nurse, everyone wants one.

They are a terrible product. The first one broke the 2nd week I had them. Then when it started to peel up my fingers peeled it. It took me almost 2 hours just to get them off, and my skin was raw. My finger didn't have too many nicks, but they where still painful. Save your money. Don't purchase these.

I got these for a friend of ours cause he just loved these guys so much when i saw him play cards with my kids and wife they ask to play this game again that night even after 3 hours playing we were still having fun thanks again. :-)

I bought this to use at work. Worked great for a little bit, but eventually just stopped working. The power light still lights up, and it's easy enough to pull out the usb cable - that is, until it doesn't work. It seems like other reviews have mentioned this, too, so take heed. Avoid this one, maybe you'll get lucky. You can waste money on crap you won't be happy with. I've learned my lesson. I'll go through one of these in about two months.

I do have this book and it is very interesting as a read but I really don't understand the history of New York. It does state that she came from South Carolina which explains why the title references her for so long though it makes me wonder how did they know there was an actual Southern woman running around here. Also why didn't we ever hear stories like this one about their father,s family living on Atlantic beach when he ran away to war even after everyone realized their father was alive.

The book is an interesting read but I felt it was written in a very boring way. If there were more examples of the author's work from real life rather than just ideas that he thought were cool his writing could be much better. It almost appears to me as if John has not really put time or effort into this. Even with these problems the information contained within can still worth reading.

After reading so much about this movie I finally bought my own. What a let down though! The acting is the worst I've seen and frankly it's difficult to say if any of it was real. Also no one speaks like an 18 year old boy would... This is NOT in anyway a fantasy film though nor do we get into those feelings when reading all these reviews.

Don't waste your money on this garbage. This piece of junk wouldn't even run my phone properly through the USB port. All it would do is cause problems whenever I plugged anything into it. Like charging while I'm browsing facebook, or checking email. Then if you unplugg it, you'd have to restart iTunes, and then reboot. The only way we could get them to go back was if we turned off every computer in our house. And believe me that wasn't easy either.

A classic example of how the film industry uses an unneeded soundtrack to add action and suspense. This is not music that fits in with film. It goes against what was meant by a Bond movie. These days soundtracks work better as part of drama or action. To be honest, I do believe Bond should use his voice instead of relying on other people for it. What makes this score so frustrating is that Sean Connerys original scores worked wonderfully together. The tracks don't syncronize either.

I bought the charger to fix my girlfriend's HP laptop that was giving problems charging her batteries. When we received this order it even came earlier than expected. So far as for now it's working great, no complaints. It has been charged all of us with our different laptops and is still going strong. And again great price at around 15 bucks.
Excellent read, informative for all ages. This reads like fiction but is not. Anyone wanting more knowledge on the subject should read this book.

I've had this for about a year now and I love it. I haven't used it much but the times that have been there has stayed cold. The only complaint is sometimes condensation builds up. But, it's not enough to make its use less desirable.

I ordered the correct size for each of my dogs. There was no adjustment on them, so I'm not sure if they are too big or not. As some people said, that is why there were 3 different sizes, but it would be nice to have a product specifically designed for small dogs. My male dog doesn't like them because he won't walk well enough with them. His younger friend has issues walking when she wears them and her knees get strained from pulling up hard steps.
Perfect for protecting your cell by kids doing things all over and you don't have no worries. Great color a good quality.

Not a good story, not really romantic, even when they found their way back to each other. I had some trouble finishing the book, as it seemed like you either love them or hate them. Too many characters, too confusing, and lots of confusing words. Maybe she needs an editor, in case others do read her books. I'm more likely that I'll skip other ones from this author. Sorry Ms. Roberts. You must have been under pressure to get your work out there. But the story line was not strong.

I was trying a new flavor and am drinking it as is. The chocolate tastes ok. It is like most other brands that sell these kind of nuts. The peanut butter ones taste good, too, but are not sweet enough. Overall, this has been quite good. For me, the only real downside is with price per ounce. Not all stores carry it. They usually have them at a discount.
The first time I tried to use it, the cover popped off and the screen fell off! It does not say anything about fragile or breakable on this product. Don't waste your money, because it is worthless.

This set works great but it doesn't seem very sturdy as compared with other cookie presses I've used. But given what it's going for, I'd buy another when or if this set ever bites it. If not, then I'll have to find some others online.

I love this show. Although the episodes are not always as well written in my opinion it is still a lot better than any other sitcom out there. It has great actors and actresses. This show seems to be more popular with females then males. They just can't get enough of it. So if you like sitcoms that entertain men and women. The Big Bang Theory will definitely hit home for you. But if you're someone who likes their T.V. entertainment clean.

This was a cheap knockoff of the real thing, but I didn't expect much for $.97 + shipping. It fell apart after one use. The material is cheap, thin cloth which seems to fall apart. Mine arrived with black stains on it, as well as some pieces sticking out that look like they've been cut from other pieces. It's worth about what you pay for it. Would never recommend buying this. Don't waste your time. Stick to higher quality products. You can get something better at Target or Toys R Us.

The cable connection to the power plug is so very fragile and does not stay on after 4 months of using it every day. This is a major design flaw. A good idea gone bad. I called their Technical Support line which appears to have been closed since July 2011. They claim that this model has had problems with breaking when used daily. To me that's complete balderdash. The reason why my camera continues to work at 100% is because of the cord. That's it.

This product is useless. It's cheaply made it didn't pick up anything even though I tried to clear a spot where we had just cleaned with the Bissell PowerShot 9300 Spot Scrubber! If used correctly, you cannot get under low furniture. Don't waste your time.

I was getting a little concerned about the quality of my print outs when looking at replacement ink,but these cartridges were so much better than what came with my new Samsung printer. Great product!!! Thanks!!
i thought wow what a great book it was.my little sister really loves this book. she enjoys the book as we do and will probably be reading more again.
This was way smaller then what i thought it would be.
I expected something different.
First - please read product description.
My sister had an older model Sony cassette adapter like this. Hers doesn't have any static, while ours does.

I was very dissapointed. Not only are the colors not at all what you see on screen, they don't even fit right to begin with! They were pretty and my sister loved them, but had I known that she would have ordered a different set. The bottom sheet came in such poor condition due simply being too small, the sides pulled apart. Definitely no quality control, or even check them by hand. Do not recommend. You can find better sheets for cheaper!

Have all three of Ms. Smith's cds and I LOVE THEM!She is such a talented artist. Her voice is sooooo sexy! Can't wait to see what she comes out with in the future. Go buy it,it will make you feel better immediately. You won't be disappointed.

After my last vacuum which was not a bagged model, I decided it would be best if there weren't any bags to deal with when going out. The suction is OK and the features are more than adequate, but all those bag changes just seem impractical. If you don't care about emptying it, then I'm sure it's fine. For me, no thanks. I'll stick with bags. There seems to be, however, two design flaws that prevent me from recommending this vacuum.
This series gives us more in the way of supernatural mystery than ever before - that is. It is also just too short. I felt it finished on book two or three.

This filter is not compatible with my car. I purchased this one thinking that at least its part of OE quality. However, after installing it, i do find that while car gets more air through filter, engine remains hot. If you expect better performance, buy OEM filter.
This thing worked fine for 3 months when you plug in earphones. Then one stopped working.
Bought from Amazon.com.

I don't recommend these pillows at all. They are thin, flat and have horrible smell! These were recommended to us but they smell bad! I'm sure the smell won't wash out, you can't put them outside because of that. If it came from China or wherever then so be it. But, for some reason, Amazon thinks that this is worth a return when bought on their site. This company should go out of business! We sent pictures as well describing how thin we found them. No response yet.
Nothing new here, nothing special.
A little bit boring.

It's okay for my needs, a little too small in size, but I'll make due. This is one of those tools that need to be used correctly. I've never heard someone complain about it's size except when they have their hands full while working on cars.
Didn't really enjoy it for some reasons. First half of story, didn't hold my attention.
I like these gloves so they could use them for other things. They protect my hands and keep moisture from penetrating the glove.

I used it for about 30 mins and then the suction cup did not hold anymore? It fell of my dashboard, making my phone go flying on to the ground!The unit was really tight when i put them together because as a result they were very difficult to pull apart. To be honest though, this is an ok product. After 3 months mine fell off too.

It works great for a few years then it will start eating through tapes and CDs. I used to be able to get a new tape at the same price range but now have to put out double what I would pay or else buy one from another manufacturer. So when that happens we are back in business. Not bad if you want to use VHS over DVD+RWs as long as your not too picky.
This reads like one long rant about how terrible modern medicine is affecting human biology.
Bought two solar chargers - both have worked well so far.

Bought this to replace the original one which finally failed after over a year of use. This battery was not recognized by my computer and even when I went into BIOS setup, it would give me several options that I could not figure out, including power off but nothing else. Would not buy again. It's no wonder some vendors have been out of business for so many years now, poor product build quality.
Received my first charger a couple of weeks ago.

What a disappointment! This book did have some good recipes and very easy recipes, but the only thing that I like about this book is how small it is. It was really thin with no pictures. At all. The entire book could fit in my purse. Definitely nothing as big as they made it. Save you money for something else. Not worth your money. Sorry. I'm going to keep shopping. Wish me luck. :)
These are old dried prunes and very hard with rough pieces.
This book has two very likeable people with really deep hurt feelings who find love over some very bumpy roads. Its like watching your car crash through snow in a movie.

The book has two parts. First, a huge section on the author's personal story, and then his life story. Nothing much else is really discussed. As others have said, he spends very little time in either area - most of that time spent detailing every trivial thing going on around him. In addition to that, everything in the story comes back with an exclamation mark, as if he's telling us something. I wish there was some kind of glossary at the end for those who don't know.

The book was interesting at times. There were some parts that moved really slow but other than that it was kind of boring. There are better books out there. If you've read good zombie stories already and don't want this one, try World War Z. Or Day by Day, or Dead City, which also deal with zombies.

This unit was a little cheaper than the one that we were replacing as we had lost one before because not enough people checked out first. Once installed though none can tell the difference. They think it's brand new! Great Product.

I only read for about five minutes when the story really wasn't very good, but it felt rushed and like more of a first book that was published by mistake. The descriptions were interesting, but there weren't enough words to make me feel connected - the plot took too long to come together, so you actually got to know little pieces of it. Also, some things made no sense, because not knowing what they were, didn't make sense either...

This book was a disappointment. It took me about three months to read it. It is much too slow moving for the subject matter. In addition, it seems repetitive, as though I knew each character in a prior episode. The only reason anyone should care what happens (to anyone) now would be if they were in prison or something that had nothing remotely to do with their own story.

Not what I'd hoped for. You can't wear them as wrist bands with other rings until you get to size 9, which really didn't fit my wrist. And then at 8mm they were still too long. As bracelets go these work okay, they're probably meant for teens.
This ebook is almost 100% fluff, with no scientific basis for anything.

This album is a pretty good effort from Jon. I've listened to it quite a bit over the last few days, and I'd say that it's one of my favorite albums released in 2005. There's some great melodies, solid riffs, nice vocals, lots of classic Bon Jovi stuff with their trademark rock edge.

This is a nice book, but why don't they put this in an actual Kindle book? I do enjoy my Kindle Fire, and while it's great to flip it open without having to carry around large books, I've already decided I'm going to stop buying books.

The box says "Extra wide for full size dishes." While it does look like a nice container, the interior space is only 8x10 and there wasn't enough room to accommodate my large casserole. If this container would have stated in detail that I needed one half an inch larger then I wouldn't have purchased it. I'm sorry :-( Other than that, it's nicely made. It doesn't seem very sturdy.

This has always been and will forever be one of the most beautiful works ever produced in my opinion, however, I don't particularly like this reissue very much, it really doesn't seem to sound as great compared to earlier editions. In fact if you get this thinking it will have a better sound than previous editions, you'll find out that not so - there's nothing worth buying on this! I'd recommend getting an import or even vinyl version, unless it's the whole album.

I was hoping that it would be a great addition to my collection. It is not as easy and user friendly for the beginner. So many steps required makes this book difficult at best. The directions are hard to follow.
This game only allowed you two choices. As in 1 out of 2 characters or 3 out of 10.

I bought this song because it was used in one episode that i absolutely loved. Great catchy tune. Only thing is: it's too short & sweet. You could literally just play a minute into it, which is why i like it.
They sharpen nicely, hold their edge well. Love them.
The worst item i ever bought!The battery doesn't last but 1 min. the charger stopped working so don't waste your money. What a waste!

The product was returned to Amazon even though it came with a manufacturer's warrenty. It never worked as advertised. Even when plugged in an external speaker, the sound quality wasn't good. Maybe its because the speakers are not good (cheap?). Anyway, I would keep shopping until I found something better.

This is a nice, heavy duty, and comfortable apron. The zipper doesn't run up the side of your arms as other aprons I've purchased, it zips from underneath to get inside easier. The reason I could only give 3 stars is: when you are using it. There isn't any way to hang it, so if you're, like me, doing anything remotely dirty or heavy, this apron will not come off in one piece. So you've got to use something else to hand launder.

This was my first experience with a new product, and I was not impressed. The coffee did not taste much different than the average Starbucks coffee, even though it cost 2 dollars more per pound then Starbucks. I'll stick to making the 10 cups at home in an Espresso machine, which is quick since it's less costly for me and better tasting every day. Next time around, I'm paying 3 bucks worth of premium beans and get some good crema.
My daughter is going to use this for art and craft work, she loved it. I would recommend it to others. Thanks :)

I've been a fan of the John Rain series for nearly 20 years and I have read every book except one in English from when they first were published, over a dozen times or more. However, I think this is going to be my last one. The story could stand up as an old standard but just like Tom Clancey's books, it doesn't matter how much you can explain away to make all your "stuff" fit the storyline. Let's start with the biggest mistake Mr.
When i put this case on my ipod touch, you couldnt hear voices through it...tried several different times as well so had to return it! not cool!
this guy had his wife write it. He says he's going to teach her how to use a computer. He's not. And he doesn't even mention that.

I'm not sure that i have ever seen such a bad copy of this movie. It was extremely disappointing. From the sound being so terrible, to having lines at all times in white when one should be watching and hearing them black or just plain grainy it is truly awful. The picture quality also looks like there were many problems during production. I got the movie on time from Amazon as usual though. You really need more respect for your customers than doing something that you know will give them trouble.
The story was entertaining to pass the time. It did keep me guessing, which is always a plus...I liked it, and would recommend it.
This set has a nice design on one side (not sure why they'd put their logo on each of these, but oh well!). It seems sturdy enough. I've used this set several times, they haven't rusted either.

This is the worst thing i have ever seen. It looks nothing like it does in the photo. The color that is shown here has lots of green and light blue on it. What I was sent by UPS only had a hint of pink with just a little green. Even when they put this together all of the paint pieces were cracked off. They need better packaging because this product should never even be sold as is. Its so ugly when you get down to it. DONT buy this.

I have three pairs of these headphones, none for the gym. All were great with respect to audio quality, and all came out of their packaging unscathed (one set even had ear pads not removable, which can ruin sound quality). When my last pair died about a month ago, one earphone went completely off the track (it made that awful cracking noise when you move around in them during runs), so I'm on here looking at possible replacement options.

I can't understand the glowing reviews for this product. It doesn't even work well, the ice ball is very small and you have to be perfectly aligned with your teeth and mouth in order to suck it up. Save your money folks, pass on this one -- if anything works like a normal Sonicare toothbrush then get it. Otherwise avoid it.
Very limited number of games. It was really slow starting and I still have not completed all levels. Needs more to play.

Great product!I ordered this for my daughter and she seems happy with it. We did have to modify it so we could use the rear camera. But was able to do that on a home computer or in less than ten mins. Now just hope something does not happen during use.
Read this while travelling. Good story although an unusual subject.

The picture of the item is nothing like what it looks like. In looking at different colors and sizes, there was a huge discrepancy in pictures. I also looked to get how much room it took up before placing my money in, since that was one thing i thought would be easy about this product. Its too small for 3 bottles even when filled halfway. Also, if you were planning on buying this, DONT BUY. You are just throwing your money away.
The sound is really cheap, but what do you expect from earbuds this size. Also, there doesn't seem to be any control on these buttons. Overall, don't waste your money.

The title says it all. Just another version of old and tired songs by other artists - even if they are a 'band' with new people in it. Don't waste your money just because its cheap. I will always prefer original versions but thats no excuse for an inferior one.
In short, it does no good for its target market for which are those who find comfort by placing their ear bud behind one ear.

After a few listens and reading many reviews, i realized that all these people who were talking big money are just plain ignorant people. I'm actually quite shocked how some of them say there albums are amazing. Come on.

Very small hard to get on I had a difficult time even getting them on. Was not satisfied at all. Waste of money sorry about that. But they are cute if you can figure out how to put your glasses. Not for everyone in my opinion. Sorry.

I was excited to get this case, but the case got stuck while my husband and son were putting it on for him. There is a lot of "give" when you put your iPhone in, so there is no way his phone can come out without damaging it. He's going to have to go out an buy one from somewhere else. 
 Rating: 2.0 
 Don't know what happened, but mine came cracked at the bottom corner just below speaker grill. It looked like someone dropped it.

I bought this to go with the bed my husband has that is over sized. The cover fits great but when he put it on there were about one and a half inches of excess material around it. It's not going anywhere, just kinda funny. My only suggestion would be for them to give us more slack in case we wanted something longer. Overall very good product though. I've been washed multiple times now without any problems. It hasn't faded or anything. Looks brand new every time. You can't beat that.

You get what you pay for! Cheaply made, and the zipper broke within 24 hours of my daughter getting in it, for no reason at all. I would buy it again, but just from somebody else not off ebay, as that makes things worse, don't even try to use this if you're looking on a budget, unless ur having a party or something!! But once they're all packed together like they should be, with little tags on them like other ones, then its fine.
Works great. Does have a little bit of noise when playing but for me its not bothersome or anything. Overall great item and I am happy overall. :)
These are terrible protectors! First off, they take ages for them to ship. And when you first put them on its terrible. They scratch so easily. Plus mine came with weird scratches in them.

First let me say that the picture on this bag is a really good representation of what you will receive. The actual product does not look much like that. All I got was two separate plastic bags containing one bag. Now imagine looking at an oversized cardboard box. If i had known this, I would have never bought it seeing as how I cannot put something into any such small packaging. This can only hold so much. One bag, one box and then the rest fall out.
Bought this charger when my wife lost her original charger, but unfortunately after a week of use its connection to the laptop came loose so its no longer useful now.

I'm so sick about people spending millions and $billions killing unborn babies....it makes me sick. The only difference is those women are now making money. If you need proof go look up fetal anomaly scan findings by searching for "birth defects" - it's right there if you want them or not.

Do not buy anything from this company that is made in China! I did and the last time it was a total lemon. This will be going back.....don't try to save money, get what you pay for. The one star is for Amazon's excellent return policy, thank you.
It says its for the Samsung Captivate Glide, it is too small. Not worth sending back, so im stuck with it.

We had an inexpensive "throw away' water station before, with very poor quality parts. That was until we got these. Well worth it! Solid construction, nice and heavy, easy assembly. What they need is more design options for watering options.

I've been an avid fan of the early novels (and later novella) in the series for many years. They have always made me think to myself -- and I would recommend them to anyone who enjoys mystery-crime books.

The one star rating I've given this item is the lowest score possible. I know from experience that some people think that a product has to be excellent for them to give it five stars. This doesn't look like quality workmanship or customer service. It feels less solid than any iPad cover I'd ever had, which might have meant something bad was happening with my iPad, but I'm still waiting to find out. There are better products out there. It's also overpriced. Don't buy this. Not worth more than $3.

The concept of the game is really good, my son loves making stuff by himself, and so I thought this would be a perfect gift. Well, it took several days for him to build it, just because he didn't have all his parts. After that, we figured out that one important part needed was missing from the box, or perhaps something went wrong with our assembly process? We finally got through one building session, then realized nothing worked well. One arm would not stay on, another wouldn't hold any more sand, etc.

The first time I bought this, not every item worked. Since then, it is working okay. Just a little expensive for something that did only twice. Would be better if the plastic was more flexible so you could take different size items at once.
This book was just plain boring. The main character is not likeable or sympathetic, and the story line meanders from one scene to another without an event ever really happening.

This is the best product that I have found to take your dog anywhere you want him. Love this great product. It works so well in a kennel. Just remember not try it around any people or pets. The spray goes very far. Dogs and kids can drink water but they will get wet. Also good when traveling outside with wet clothes when traveling. Have fun!! God Bless you!
For the most part, this movie wasn't bad, it was just kinda boring. The kids thought so too. They wanted to move on in life after watching it, though.

I will admit to being one of those stupid people who bought this movie based on the name alone. Well don't waist your money. This is a cheap low quality production. Just because someone makes it doesn't make it real. You want realism check out David DeCoe's movies such as The Killing Fields and The Last Good Guy. Check the other reviews here for real life examples. Avoid this!
Just ok. The dialogue is forced between characters.
It takes some time doing your own cleaning especially after bottles get really old. This works like a charm for bottle brushes. The best brushes are for those hard plastics that will not stand up.

The picture in this listing is not very clear. I should have read the other reviews before ordering it. It looks almost exactly like my previous one and it worked great. But the cable we got has some kind of defect as it's difficult to plug into our camera for charging. Very disappointed...

I ordered this thinking it was white with green trim...its not. My fault for not reading more carefully. Not sure what I'm going to do about it. But you think I'd really look at this before ordering it.....oh well. As far as the product itself goes, it's fine, and would buy again. A little on the thin side.
A great product. Very soft and works well all around. However, the top has been opening up by itself during use. Has not happened other than once. The problem seems random though.

This is the best dog toy ever - and our Australian cattle dogs are in LOVE with it. It bounces as it goes up through what I can only describe as a thick balloon body - giving them quite exercise while they keep track of their toy. If you're looking for an indestructible yet inexpensive dog, this is it! It's small enough to not drive me nuts, but big enough for all my Aussie brothers to enjoy!!

This movie had an interesting concept, but the character development was weak. There were a lot of plot holes, and I don't expect every Hollywood blockbuster to be accurate. I'm hoping for better from this writer in future. Also, there are some scenes that felt out of place. They simply did not flow with what else happened within the story. It would have been great if they could put more effort into writing the script. The movie was shot on digital video, which made it look pretty low budget.

I was looking for a simple cover that would protect my new Paperwhite. This is one of the best covers I've ever owned. The design is awesome - and it's very easy to take out your Kindle at anytime without having anything bulky on it which always makes me feel like I'm holding an old book compared to the sleek designs all other covers are. It also can stand vertically or horizontally with ease, whereas most others, such as some much pricier covers, cannot do this.
Great Product, great service!! A huge savings compared to prices quoted by OfficeMax.

This is a cheap knockoff - no doubt they made money. Please don't buy this product as I did in addition to the one that comes with kindle. It does nothing at all and only lights it up by going into sleep mode..its worse than useless... waste of money for sure!

I have owned this grill for less than a year and use it twice per week. It has served me well so far, is easy to clean (no cleaning required), heats up very quickly, appears durable, cleans easily, doesn't leak or leave burn marks, maintains great grilling.
Ordered two batteries to allow us freedom with charging our Wii remotes. When they arrived, we put them into both remote controllers only to discover that neither will work in either wii.

I bought the case for my iphone 4s thinking it was going to be a little easier getting in and out of it. The rubber is like a cheap material that causes lint everywhere. It covers up an important part (like your button) when you try to press it. The charger broke within minutes after use, so not only does it don'thing but charge (mind blowing), it's also hard plastic. This can lead me to believe this isn't the most durable product at all.

A friend turned me on to this tea and I'm glad he did. It has a smooth cinnamon flavor that isn't overpowering. Even though the spices are all natural, there is one herb that's not (the cinnamon root!) which takes something away from some peoples' experience. For example, I love tea, but when it starts taste like coffee, I've had enough. But for others, you may just want more of this.

This game is ok, I'm not a big racing gamer. Just this one but its okay,better than GT the best at first but after awhile if you play it enough times. I had fun playing it! The graphics could have been better. Good price as well. It's cheap and fun.

This battery was a great value, but didn't last long. I guess it made good backup power, when I wasn't out in the cold. Also, you had to get right up next to an outlet for power supply. Not exactly ideal for hiking or back packing. Maybe better on an automobile.

this was just ok. it took me to chapter 3 before i had any answers. when I did figure out "who dunnit" that information got spread around more than they should. the book could have used an editor (or two) in my opinion. no one ever speaks about what is going on without explaining what's happening. there's a very minor detail later on, but still not explained. there were so many loose ends and dead ends. sometimes it's good when authors leave you wondering.
I have a dog named "The Bear," that when walking in the winter gets his paws really cold. Our vet suggested these for our dog and we were told they are great to protect dogs paws.

Love this thing. It saves you from a lot of trips to the store. And its much easier than using plastic bags with twist ties. However, be warned that the lid will eventually lose grip as others have noted. I just got it 2 days ago, so I'm hoping for great things, but we'll see. But at less that $10, even if they don't hold up 100%, it's worth having more options.
We bought two of these lights and installed them in front of our house without any modifications at all.
This book brings us into the life of a very special man. I would like to thank this man for creating and using his own voice over all these years. Keep them coming.
They don't rust. The blades are very sharp. Handle doesn't have holes to collect water. Love these knives in all kinds of sizes.

It was hard to stay with and predictable. And I found myself rooting for the bad guys more than I did the good guys. A lot of characters were only marginally interesting. There is potential here, but it's not there yet in this novella. But that doesn't mean you shouldn't try it, it just means you're aware that what little writing you've come across by author John Connolly tells a great story, even if no one knows it. You might like his stuff better than I did.   Rating: 2.

After charging all night as recommended for the charger, plugged in my camera (Nikon D80) to see how it worked. It said "device is charging". Plugged that in, also had a red light indicating power was on, nothing else. Did I hear something incorrect? The manual indicated "power on" and "Power off" if either port connected (the only two possible options given on this product). But with just one USB out of 2 available ports, couldn't charge at all.
Not worth the time or money spent. Does not work with iphone or ipod.

After spending some hours in the field and a couple of hundred dollars for Nikon equipment, I have learned quite a bit about this equipment. In short, there is no such thing as good gear and, with today's cameras even the best. When you spend over $1000 and your pictures look worse than those from a pocket camera, it means that either (1) you went cheap, or (2) you've got all the bells and whistles, not real world quality.

I really wanted to like this book but in the end it just couldn't do it. The premise and world were fun at first and had me hooked for a few chapters until all of sudden the author has everything wrapped up so neatly by chapter 20 you wonder when you've reached the end. After finishing her other novels that I've loved I'm not sold on how well she's been able to develop story lines and characters into full novels.

This is absolutely ridiculous. She clearly made up her mind when she wrote it. While some may like it, you cannot say you want to start calling out people who are saying things they don't actually believe.

I read this book from front to back last night and only really enjoyed reading parts of it. It is a little sad that the author put out this book. Maybe as he writes more his stories will improve. However, I didn't like it that much, although the plot was interesting. It's not something you would usually come across but it's what some people call "true love". It's also written in an interesting way. My advice is, if you're interested buy it.

My grandson loves the video - he has wanted one for some time & I was thrilled to find it on Amazon. It arrived ahead of schedule, in excellent condition and was very well packaged. All that said, The seller didn't do a great job packing it, there are two large slits at both ends where they were bent inwards. That really doesn't effect it's use as that's what keeps my great-grandson from scratching his dvd when he's not using. Great deal all around though.

This book is not what I thought it would be. The majority of the information provided is already known, and much of this info can be garnered from a quick Google search. Nothing really here that I haven't read before. If you've never heard anything about it, it's okay, but if you have, pass on it. I gave 2 stars because it lists some good info, but there's nothing earth-shattering. Disappointing.
This was not worth the money. I would not recommend buying anything from this company! They were slow and never addressed my questions. It took over three weeks to receive it!

this battery made a significant difference in the life of my samsung galaxy 2 7.0 which otherwise ran out of juice very quickly. now it runs all day with moderate use! great price too! would buy another! no complaints. highly recommended.

I purchased this item directly from the manufacture just to see what it felt and looked like. Upon receiving it, I was impressed by how light weight it was! It feels like a solid product that can withstand my abuse. Unlike traditional scales, where they are weighed on small plastic platforms with tiny screws holding them down, you'll be able to weigh heavier packages using this item. The display is large enough to read easily, even without glasses. There's no need for batteries either.

I liked this book very much. But I must say that, although it's a good read, it was NOT for me. That is, if you are searching to understand Islam better; there were so many references that came from the Koran. I'm not opposed to reading about religion, but I'd rather get my information without being bombarded with Bible references. So I went back and started over.

I bought a pair of the Koss KSC75s, with my goal being to get them out for use at work so that I could listen remotely while working on a laptop. While they fit very comfortably into the ear canal, within about an hour or so, I was tired from taking their weight in my ears. After around 10 minutes of use, and no matter which size plugs came out, I just couldn't take it any more. There is simply nothing comfortable about how these headphones feel.

These look great in my dining room and they do the trick as far as keeping things from touching one another. They really are easy to clean up after using. I will be purchasing more of them! Great price too!

I like this product. It's a great idea, but it was so complicated to use - very time consuming for the amount of work that actually needs done. In my opinion I'm not worth taking apart and redoing my toilet seat all over again unless it's something really important, which if that's what you want, save your money. This didn't meet my needs. It also doesn't clean as well as other methods I've used (like vinegar in a spray bottle - same result with more elbow grease).

This was a disappointing choice. Some parts are helpful though like when trying to get information through online applications. However, other reviews led me to believe there were some useful facts hidden here. Most all the data in the appendix is easily obtainable online.

I used this product in my dishwasher to remove stains and some baked on grease from food that had stuck to a pan. After running the dishes through 2 or 3 times, about half of them did not come out clean. As such, I started soaking it with vinegar. It made no difference whatsoever. A waste of money. I'll stick with Dr. Bronners liquid soap which works great. I've never purchased anything other than Dr Bronner's brand for dish-washing soap, but after having this experience I'm now seriously considering it.
Great book! Love the information that Mr. Wey provides. Makes you think about what type of home you'd enjoy living in. Would have liked more pictures though.

This item looked good. However, after removing the clear plastic covering from either the front or back of my iPod, there are three scratch marks on both covers that look like it may have been caused in some way. This makes me think this company doesn't care. I would never recommend buying this product.
I'm 5'4", 120 pds, got an extra small because most leotards are made so tight. It's a bit loose at my waist, but doesn't look stupid. Its super cute with shorts though.

I'm a big Michael Connelly fan and this one was ok, but not great. I had heard good things about it so decided to try it. The mystery is pretty good, but with all the technology advances today, how someone could get information that they needed at least an hour earlier (days away) rather than 30 minutes later, just seems unbelievable. I've read many of Connelly's books before, he always has great character development in them and keeps you interested. This book did not.
The color and length were perfect for my needs at the time. I would recommend to anyone else. Very good product.

The charm is cheaply made. It breaks pretty quickly. You get what you pay for. Wouldn't recommend it. But since we can't see them online you have to buy just one. Wish they were real beads like the others. Really bad buy.

I bought these because we have a hard time in the winter with the little pests crawling into our house. We tried using glue traps and they don't work at all! These are great! A quick snap on each of them and off go them. Love them! It was really easy too and came fast after ordering. Would buy again for sure! :)

I've had these filters for about a month. I can notice an improvement in air quality, but no changes regarding our overall health. However, we use the filter everyday, so it's not like we're breathing cleaner air. This isn't to say that there aren't other better ways of providing clean air, though. Still, it seems worth it and we love being able to feel good knowing that we're doing something healthy with our money when using this..
I ordered these and they aren't very good. There is just so little flavor it makes them worse than plain.

I bought the Oreck XL8 Animal Vacuum and was not sure if it would be sufficient for our needs - we have a cat with long hair that seems to shed more than any cat! We wanted something light weight with excellent suction; this vacuum did well on hard floors while also doing quite well in carpets.

Not being much on the internet and downloading things from anywhere you go, this product has done all I could hope to do with it. It performs great. In addition, it was easy (literally) to set up an account through one of Amazons' many sites. Now I'm off my computer chair in front of a large screen tv for just about everything that matters. And it's free! A few extra dollars here or there isn't going to hurt too badly, considering I've been spoiled by the free service.

What a neat looking set. I bought it for my son's room and he is very happy with it. He even sleeps in his bed now, at night! This set looks perfect on white wall. And the fabric is soft enough not to cause any scratches. For people wanting something more sophisticated, look somewhere else. But if you want some fun accent pieces, this works great. Nice size too, not too big but has an eye catching look. Would recommend it, especially at this price!

This is clearly a defective model if it can fail so quickly. I've bought two and had problems with both. After just six months my first pair died, but the warranty did have an option to get another pair. On this second pair, after only eight months, they're both dead. If you need something for office use, DO NOT BUY.UPDATE #2Well, I received the replacement set in July 2012. They now aren't working.

It looks good and has nice features. However if you are running with both the transmitter is plugged in it's going to suck power. The range of my wireless is about 3 meters so it makes a huge difference that I can't even run without being tied in. If your looking for something that works out there are much better options... Stay away. There aren't any.

I wish the bag came with a shoulder strap. Very thin material...seems like it could rip easily but then again this is my first bag. It smells very strong of rubber though. I'm worried after using it. So far so good; I'll review later if anything happens. Great for short trips where you want to use your car and be seen as you walk along side your dog (and possibly get in trouble when you're caught on foot).

I like the concept of these. Instead of, say, a simple plastic tube, you insert an empty bag into it, and then just tie it to your existing trashcan liner. It works great, no more bags falling out all over my kitchen counter, etc. So, why only two stars?? The first one was destroyed by moths, or rather by ants which found their way inside while waiting for a new bait station when they noticed this bag.
Just what I wanted it to be! I do like it, nice color.

I ordered this for my boyfriend as a surprise gift. He loved it. Unfortunately, less than 2 days after he opened it to get his first look at all the features he went outside and pulled off the light cover because there was no way that it's not leaking. Not happy. The only reason why I'm giving 1 more star is cause of how cool it looks when on but it leaks so much. Will be sending back. Very disappointed in Amazon. It has been over two weeks.

Not sure if Amazon will do an update to this as some other reviewers were able to. First let me point out the good things about it:- The image quality is great (provided you don't blow compressed jpegs. I use Adobe Premiere.- The wide screen has a little fuzzy edge like most projectors do. I've seen worse. Here are my negatives:1. No internal battery power. If you're running with it on for awhile, it's not going anywhere but down.

It is quite a disappointing book, with no actual plot whatsoever. The first book in the series, The Last Saint, was much better. Even so, I can honestly tell you that, despite my disappointment here, reading the third will not be any easier than before. One aspect of the novels that bothered me for years seems to have disappeared: all of her characters are exactly the same. She has done it again here as well, and I'm even beginning to forget how they look.
This skirt wasn't made properly when it arrived.

Bought it for a friend. She had asked about it and never got the chance to use it. So I ordered another from amazon only for her to tell me that they are not available anymore because of a recall. Guess this explains why it was cheaper.

After spending 2 hours watching one complete film I have no idea who the "casting" person for this was but it can't have been very good. The story line is bad and some of the acting is just awful. If not by any means terrible I'm quite sure others would find these to be entertaining which makes me wonder if someone paid a lot more attention in making a movie than actually seeing what they were trying to put on film.
Very good movie and lots of action. A real classic John Wayne movie. Not the best picture ever made but it is up there.
I bought this to replace our old charger for the Garmin nuvi GPS. It is working great and came quickly. Thanks..

Was expecting something more substantial. It will do but not what I expected based on the price. Not a bad purchase for someone who doesn't have time to make their own. You could certainly buy this and get what you paid for.
Great price for a quality product, this is my second time ordering them and have found no difference in them, will continue to order again when I get low.
The battery is easy to load up and works perfectly in my Canon camera. It was a good value. Will definitly buy it again. Much better price than the canon OEM.

It's a nice little bag, but it is just not constructed well. After opening the zipper, I found that one of my shoes was out hanging outside when the zipper broke. The shoe fell off and into water, so if you're going to be doing any water aerobics in it, don't put your feet directly on it! It would probably break before long.

I used this camera to track down a deer in my field. The batteries provided lasted for approximately 400 shots, and the quality of both photos and video is great. Not HD at all, but enough if you need it. The unit comes with an 8G card so buy your SD card. I've had no problems using it wirelessly or wired although I'm guessing that since it's not as powerful wifi transmitters can also be pretty slow.

This is a classic case. What else are you supposed to say when the author makes this "fact" up? I don't know, there were many more that came forward. I'm not one of those who just buy books and listen for factoids after they have been confirmed by other sources, but come on, really? There would be a lot of people with far better background than me out there. But this guy doesn't work through history properly, either - he uses his own opinion as truth.

I had been waiting forever for this game to come out and it was worth the wait! It has a very good storyline of being trapped in an unknown cave with your brother who you meet while searching for him. This is definitely one movie that parents must have their kids watch. The bad things about the film go without saying, but as I've stated before, there are more than enough really great parts to make up for it. All three main actors did very excellent jobs and made the characters quite likeable.
The book was not one I would highly recommend. It is a good book for middle school and high school. If you like this kind of story, it has some great ideas.

I ordered this for my 8 year old daughter. When she opened it on Christmas morning after her mother did all the work, a few of the pieces were broken and two others didn't work. Not to mention that they only give you 3 different kinds of candy when there were no duplicates like stated in description. Other than that, it's okay. Very cute!

At least two pages from the book were ripped out and I have to buy a new book! It would help if it was put in a hard cover. The content is also not very good. There are so many other books written about this subject. Don't waist your money!

This book was much better than the first. Just an okay read if you are into vampire books it is just what they put in those series. If you can suspend belief a bit and believe that people have special powers don't be disappointed. You will enjoy it. I look forward to reading next book. Thanks again Amazon for offering this free download with purchase.
I was intrigued by the plot twists which are predictable but there were also so many inconsistencies.
I am not a big fan of the color blue, however they are beautiful and my sister loved them as well. The price was right too.

this is no where near as good the first game, it's boring, and it's not much fun. The graphics were better too. Don't buy it if you like to play it. I still can't believe a game made 7 years after it comes out for wii sells so poor. Nintendo should recall all of them. It's that bad. You get more gameplay in Mario Kart 64 than this.! don't waste your money on this, stick with Mario Kart. You'll be glad if you did. It was awsome.

I purchased this Coffee Pot about 2 years ago and it worked great at first. However, over time this thing has started to crap out! At first everything was working fine. Now you can't get a full cup of coffee! I've done all different things to try & fix it, but nothing is working.

I was expecting a lot more when playing the game. It is way to easy. There are no challenges and it just repeats things over again, which wasn't much fun after reading all those reviews. If you like quick games with little thought involved, this will be good. You can play for days without too many challenges. I'm sorry that my son lost interest in it. He used to love Minecraft. However, now he's using his iPad Mini instead because it's easier on the battery.

This product is great! Its so hard to find a replacement battery for our Samsung phones, but this seller came through with flying colors and the price was great. The item arrived just in time before I had hoped for! I'm very happy with my transaction!!

This is terrible. The story had so much potential when I read the back cover. But this was written with an eye to making some bucks off of unsuspecting young adults. With the most elementary understanding of grammar, syntax, and sentence structure, anyone that would buy or use these two books should have their heads examined. Don't waste your money. Go online for free videos about life in a teen girl's body. At least they can be educational. Or just google it. It will get you there quicker.

The battery and charger work fine though when using the charger, it takes a while to charge - I don't mind so much, but that may be an annoyance for some. On some days, if it's not my day, I have enough time, where no charger is needed, but otherwise I'd use something else. As far as holding charge, both the original Canon batteries on which this was bought were rated 1400mAh and had lasted me about 10 months of constant use.

This was purchased as a Christmas present for our son so he could listen to his books on tape while working. It is advertised and said it works with an audiobook. The instructions were followed carefully, but still will not work properly. It has been returned (amazon's return policy ROCKS). There have also gone several days in terms of receiving the item due to delays caused by UPS (not always reliable -- you end up waiting months for any shipment).
My dog just LOVES these! She looks forward to getting her nightly treat. Definitely not a chew she doesn't eat! I was so glad that Amazon had these available as far away as Idaho!! Thank You Amazon!

Ok, so I have been a fan of Dr. Drew for years now... He is such an intelligent man and he explains everything very well. This just seemed to be another story with a different setting. It was not what it claimed on the front cover or in all of his other books. But if you like Dr. Dre's approach then this would probably be worth picking up. The diet itself seems good though, even though it's just one thing mashed together.

These are ok, but nothing special. The colors all blend together, so they are rather bland. They do serve their purpose. I wouldn't have bought them myself. I think that if you want something that's a little more interesting and special, then purchase a pair of scissors - or some other specialty paper scissors. For the price, these may be an OK choice for someone who is looking to use them at home, but not good enough for work. All in all, they're ok.

This game is too easy to use. Just go online and look it up. Even on the internet you can see how easy this is. I could not get over trying it a little bit. You cant make me want this. Also there are glitches every now and then. My friends had two pokemon just standing around waiting. And it keeps saying that my level of fame has passed by. We did not pass it.

The only thing comfortable here is the color of this shirt, so if that's all you're after, you'll enjoy this. Otherwise, find another. You need something light weight for summer. This one runs large, even after washing. Order 2 sizes smaller than you are.

We have had lots of good experience with Cuisinart products. The CS-700 is one such appliance. I was not impressed at all by the quality compared to past products (well built as it is) so we returned it. Perhaps we received a dud -- it's possible some people might like this appliance much better than we did. That being said, there are many features on other models that don't work properly.

This story just never gets into the heads of either characters. She says she isn't going to say his name, but does after we are almost 1/3 through book. I love the idea of this book. It really doesn't get much easier than this. It starts out with a very interesting concept. The author spends an entire chapter talking about how all those other book titles can help you be ready to begin writing. If that were true, my mind would immediately go into that book. What would you do if your brother was trying to rob you?How long has he been doing this. Could you prove him out?Who is this man with the scar on his back. The main characters are interesting although I found them at times unrealistic. The plot moves along quickly and is well told,but somehow it did not ring particularly true or make me believe in its outcome. Good movie though. Enjoyable watching.

It arrived and there was a tiny chip in the edge of it. It looked like it had been dropped on it's face. Overall, the piece is very nice for those who don't want something that will take up tons of space (can't stand big clutches) or give them too much weight. Very elegant, yet simple.

this book was very good and kept me reading to find out what happens next, i hope the next one is as good. thanks for this great book. will recommend it.

The new version of these spoons really work to help you out when it's getting hard for your hands or wrist - I love them now! :) It is nice that they are not "flat" on the end. If it were a full sized spoon, would be too wide but that's just a small negative. This book was so hard to finish. I got about half way through the first chapter and couldn't take any more. There are plenty of good post-apocalyptic books out there that aren't boring or written like a script for tv movies.

the game is really good - and I was anticipating it to be a lot better... i had been saving money by not buying digital games, but when I'm actually going to use them for something else then my expectations are raised, especially that they were so ridiculously overpriced! :(

I like to have the best possible cookware at a reasonable price and Kitchenaid deserves its reputation for quality. This new set is fine but not any better than my old set. It's heavier duty, well crafted and has non-stick surfaces. What I missed was that most of this set washes in hot water which takes much less time than it used to. The problem with all non- coated surfaces is they will start rusting if left wet. Most likely your house isn't very humid so leave them uncovered.

This is a good basic video with some pretty great stretching exercises for people who suffer from muscular tension. I did have to do one segment more than once just because i found it too tough at first. The stretches are very useful and effective if you want to strengthen your muscles. It also comes as an instructional set of 4 short DVDs that each go over different body parts in depth. It's nice not having the music so easily available, but when doing these videos individually it's better anyway.

I have owned this keyboard for two years so it is worth saying that I'm impressed. The keys are all flat except the top row of buttons which act as programmable functions if you press down on them. It's very nice not having a split layout. It has many features over competing keyboards such as: a volume control to get rid of unwanted noise from your computer, an audio input so you're ready to listen to music via speakers or headphones, and even a media card reader.

The book is a fair reference and does provide some basic understanding of the workings of. This product was a joke. It did not work at all. This book is ok. But it did not come even close to the description on my Kindle. Just too much description. It does have some good parts but most of that book was in love passages and over described. This is one of my fav songs it has a good beat and nice lyrics. The whole cd doesn't dissapoint. You can listen to in the car with no problems what so ever. I never listened to R&B music until this album came out it's very cool!!!

I have been using these containers in order to freeze leftover food. When used as containers, everything should taste the same (note: I also tried it freezing fruits). Some reviewers say it's too thick, but this is what makes them leak when filled or dropped.

I could not put my faith into this book. The plot had no substance. The characters were so boring and self absorbed that I just did not care what happened. It made me angry to read the story. She loves her husband above everything, has a child out of wedlock, but still goes back for each new love interest! Why can't she keep herself focused? The whole book felt like an old woman's fantasy about being in London.

Not the greatest book. The author seems to take himself too seriously. I did finish it. It's a long book at almost 600 pages. My advice would be don't judge this book until you read it for yourself. There are some good tips in here, but if you're used to getting your information from other sources, like books of the bible or magazines such as SELF and others, then you'll find little new here unless one is willing to accept what he says without any hard evidence (ie. no data).

Like many others, I've been looking for a wireless keyboard to match the Apple wireless keyboard. While I thought this would have it, it does not. What you actually get:- A mini-mousepad- Bluetooth keyboard; nothing moreThe product claims 'up to 20 feet' of range, and that includes walls. Even further, it's advertised 30 feet indoors through walls which is not even close -- when placed on my kitchen countertop, within three feet, you will experience about 8 feet out from the USB receiver.

Bought a refurbished one with the expectation of being able to use it straight away and save my money. Got it, plugged it in, no big deal. I bought 2 of these cables to replace my regular DVI. After installing them on my computers, one had a static buzz (hum) constantly coming and going through both cables. My guess is that they are either defective from the start or very poor quality control. I'm currently using theMediabridge Hi-speed - USB 2.

This album is awesome! I've been listening to this for days. If you buy one LP in 2010- make it this!
