This is the 2nd set or this brand I bought, they are great, durable, great for travel and a really good price.

I like these for keeping my feet warm on long hikes in cold weather. They are made of a soft but sturdy canvas and not as cheap feeling as some other boots. The downsides are: 1. When out hiking, they're constantly snagging small sticks when they don't need to; 2. They're bulkier than it seems from the picture -- making them stick off your leg all day. I'd say that this shoe is mostly designed to keep you toasty warm.

It is perfect size for our small kitchen. Easy to assemble and works well with both toast or bagels. Really like the timer function because it shuts offn when done. The only problem we had was that within 24 hours of use, a black plastic coating around one side of the upper element melted. We returned this item immediately on being alerted by my husband who put the toaster in water before washing.

I bought two of these chargers, one for work and the other in my car. The first charger worked perfectly out of the box. However when we tried charging our phones, both seemed to have problems on one port that would turn off completely. Now I'm not sure what happened, but if this issue occurs with all three, there may be a problem here also. It's unfortunate because it was fun while they lasted. Also, neither are marked "A" and "B" so it's hard to tell which is which.

The stories were pretty good, not as good as her other books. This one seems to drag on a bit,I would read something else by this author. It was ok, but nothing like the rest that she wrote. She is my favorite writer.

I would never buy this product until the software that is supposed comes with it work properly because you can't delete anything to save your file. You have be good very slow but if you are looking for something fast and don't plan on deleting or messing them up then it's perfect get it.

A quick read. No depth or complexity beyond what is offered by any travel guide I've ever used. Just my opinions. Don't waste your money. If it's free on Kindle just borrow it... don't spend money for it.
Our favorite cups. Very heavy duty with a nice wide rim.

I can easily tell you that this stuff makes my dishes look great. That said, it doesn't leave a lot of residue and the dishwasher is noticeably cleaner after using this. If you're looking for something with extreme levels or harsh chemicals then don't buy this, but if your dishwashers are fine just rinse everything away rather than having to use this, I'd go ahead any time.

My son has had his booster since he was five months old (he is two now using the infant side up). We have had no problems with it. Pros: Super durable, comfy seat, stays secureCon: None yet. He falls asleep in it frequently and sleeps through the night. The latch straps that tighten keep popping off. 
 Rating: 5.

The instructions were not clear. After an hour, I still could only see 10% of the picture. As soon as my wife saw it in person she thought this must be a defective camera right off the bat. I'm sure that with more work we can get good results. Overall it's easy to use once you read the directions. For me it was not worth all the work and time for such poor results.*Also - I had bought two cameras at the same time.
It's junk, no good but also no good. My advice when you get this one it's send it back first thing in the morning so you can find another one. Don"t buy it.

This was exactly what it should be: a sturdy, easy to use and clean steamer. It steams veggies without much muss or fuss. I would definitely recommend for anyone who wants good healthy steamed vegetables.

I had trouble with these and was told it would be sent to me when the problem is fixed. But after talking w/ someone in customer service they said this issue will never get solved so why bother sending a product that has no sound.

this is a great item. I used it on my bike and its easy to install. The best part of the design is that there are two hooks rather than one in line with your seat post but that doesn't matter though since you can use either for right or left side. This rack does not interfere at all while attached to a bike. Highly recommended product. It will last long.

At times this novel can be frustrating, especially as a first time reader. It's like being in college for which we have no idea whatsoever what we're getting ourselves into. However, there are good parts to the book, so if you stick with it, it turns into quite an interesting journey through adolescence.
i think this will help you. this books explain how to control your dreams. I thought everyone would have fun using that part.it's funny,scary, but fun at the same time!

This book is really all there was. The characters don't develop at all, or they're just not very likable people. I found myself skipping through the last part because it was so boring. You won't like this book. In fact you probably won't. It's a long boring read, with nothing to draw you in. If you hate books that are boring, then you'll love it. I think the author needs better writing and story. Skip this one. Don't recommend it!

Don't buy this junk. I've tried using it as just a "stick" and on my iPad to help me grip the touch screen. I used on several phones since then. None of them worked. It's cheap because it's cheap. For me at least, stick with an old school foam pad or something. I'd rather slide my fingers over it than use this. Very disappointing for something called "Gun Gel Pads". They should be ashamed that they could get away with such low quality product.

This book will put you to sleep, its really just a bunch of stuff your already aware of, you don't need the book, read it yourself. If something in this book changes how people think about certain things then thats one thing and I may buy it. Otherwise Im not interested at all with this..it only encourages negativity on my part. :(

While this is definitely a beautiful set that looks wonderful on the table and has all of my daughter's items already assembled (which was great), after two days it fell apart. The top edge bent from placing a drink down onto it. It also looked so cheap, I had to replace it. I'm very disappointed.
This thing does not work right from day 1. Got 2 different ones. 1 will turn on and stay on. Not sure what is wrong w/ it.

I was happy with the product. It is what it is. The only thing, as noted by other people is, although there are 8 screws, it still wobbles when used on carpeting. However, if you tighten enough to secure your iPod, that would be a pretty significant problem. Otherwise, seems great. I'm sure my daughter will enjoy using it. Arrived sooner than stated. Overall satisfied, for an iPod Touch holder. We had one at home already. This will also help keep your charger handy.

These are great pants. The sizing is right on par & they seem to hold up very well considering my hard working jobs around our water plants all day long. They also look better (and better) then jeans. Only wish we had them back in the 40s...lol
Not really too much to say here, other than I haven't used them on a daily bases. They seem high quality. I've seen reviews saying that they don't give you enough power.

I read all the reviews about this product and bought one for work on Dec. 28. I've had two other electric shavers before but none with cleaning stations which is why there were so many complaints here that it left little or no whiskers. This razor works very well.....just as advertised. No more having to use my manual shaving cream nor do I get a close shave when using it.
I'm still reading this book but can't get into it. It's just boring. You really have no life outside what's in these pages. Just doesn't hold my interest.
The movie is great! but the download sucks! It goes way too fast & then pauses for a minute or two & stops mid stream. Horrible experience. Would love to have access directly on my kindle...

The book was more of a history than i needed. It wasn't really applicable to the business world. Probably would've been better if it didn't have so much detail. Good read in general. But not for me....

This book started out as an interesting take on the subject matter, and seemed well written in terms of writing style and narrative. Then it just felt like a rush job. As a person with several personality traits, I am able to separate one from another, but after reading this book, I'd say that the author probably can't do it. It's too convenient for him to find these people and present them in such an unrealistic way. Too bad it's really not worth my time finishing this book.
The Kindle sample shows up fine, but in the search bar on my kindle fire HD, there are no results.

It is to short. I don't think this should be required reading in school. Kids need to skip around or read other things. Not a good choice. This has bad writing too. Too many words that have no meaning. Why use four letters for something like this. Bad writing?

This book can be difficult to read because it's so technical. I feel like there was a lot of scientific information and the details for specific medications at times made it hard to understand. My husband says that once you get into it, it's well worth reading but he would never say that. Still, if you're interested in learning about drugs through the medical side, this is an informative book. If your goal is to learn something technical on how certain drugs work or what they're good for, then just skip it.
The only thing this reminds me of is something one might say on the radio during tornado season. It's not even worth.99 cents. Save you money for better reads.

This product was too bulky for me, because of that, but unfortunately it's also supposed to be waterproof. Unfortunately, this isn't true. After about 30 minutes in water, both rubber caps fell off exposing wires.

I received this book for a gift, and I'm not sure how much of an impact it can have on the average person, but I didn't care about anybody involved in writing it. First off all it's poorly written with numerous grammar errors throughout. It reads more like some high school English class or creative writing course than what I'd expect from "professional authors.

I bought this for my husband, who has a hard time keeping track of his phone number and number. He is constantly being asked to put it on the new cell he got - but doesn't actually care to. The design seems cool - as some other reviewers have noted, it's very thin at first (it looks like there's no cover AT ALL when you get it), which would look great with leather cases.
These aren't what I'd call "cotton.
I thought there would be a little more color on the pages, but overall not too bad. Good size too.

I'm a fan of the books on learning German, but this book is only so-so. It's much too basic. After I learned to speak and read German before attending university in Germany it was really interesting reading his story about traveling everywhere with absolutely nothing in my pocket. So it's hard not to, like some other reviewers here, feel let down.

This product did NOT come with two USB's. The seller claims its supposed to... However, it does not. Also, once plugged into your USB port nothing happens...just sits there like it's connected but no connection.
I did not enjoy this read as much as a lot of the other books in this series. A little short on character development and length. Good mystery but could be developed so much more.
If I remember correctly, this is a pretty old model, but works great. Easy to use and does what it's supposed to!Would recommend... Just make sure you clean & wipe before using. ( duh, right?) :)
I bought this product to replace the one that broke. It fit perfectly and was almost half price. This product is made out of a cheaper plastic but it works great. I would buy more from them.
Not exactly what i expected or even hoped for.

The story line itself is somewhat interesting. There wasn't much character development other than that of main character's family. I'm looking forward to the sequel. I feel like I might have missed pieces from this book. But hopefully it will be better since it sounds more exciting.
My hubby loves this! Well worth it compared to those expensive covers at bestbuy.

This book is for people who haven't been out of the home or are not married already...the stories aren't so funny and it doesn't seem too organized. It really isn't an all inclusive book. I felt as if it was written in a rush. If you have read other self help books on getting organized this might be worth purchasing...but not something that I would use again after reading it. Not bad though...a quick read. Also there seems to be more grammatical errors than normal...

We got these glasses for out office and we love them. They are very nice for having around our offices. Great price too! Only complaint it that they could have been better quality! But over all good glasses.
Don't waste your money they don't last long at all. The price I paid for this item with shipping was almost what i had spent on a new pair of sneakers

The author could have left out the descriptions of sexual acts, for it would just bring another aspect into to this story. It seems a lot more work and money went in producing the pictures they used. I wouldn't recommend buying it.

The first novel was excellent, but the follow-up left a bit less to one's imagination, if that is possible. There were more interesting sub-plots introduced in this one which made me care about them more. That said, I still enjoyed it tremendously; and the second book continues on where the original leaves off. The reason for only four stars would be that the reader has no easy way of knowing if there are some people whose true motives or actions aren't yet clear.

There have been many books on diet and how to lose weight in the past but I am a little confused by this one. In fact, with its over emphasis on sugar rather than healthy eating, it is somewhat misleading for someone that has recently lost weight. The foods she recommends (and eats), are not even considered good choices. One of the first rules is, "Limit yourself.

This is a good product, but the design didn't make it into production due to cost & availability. I believe they would be sold better if they'd been made with a more modern design. These really don't hold up well in my car which has metal cup holders that are easily broken off. Just remember they aren't very durable. Buy some other brand and plan on replacing all of your pieces over time. If you like them, buy plenty because you'll want them. You'll need these at some point! 
 Rating: 3.

We have enjoyed the book and recommend it to other readers as well as our church group which has begun a discussion using this book. The presentation can be dry, however we find that repetition of material from chapter to chapter or section does lead us back out into prayer at the end. I encourage anyone who wants a little more depth in God's Word,but doesn't want an overly theological treatment, to read this. Perhaps this would help others see what we see when reading it.

I bought this book hoping to get my head through the exam as well and that is something of a problem. If you are not familiar with the material then this book will help you, but if not I would recommend a different book. The authors make many assumptions about specific information in other sections which just isn't the case. This leads me to believe they don't read any of their own material. At times it appears some topics were simply skimmed off instead of thoroughly researched.

This case is really nice, I have a blue Acer Iconia Tab, which in general has an expensive look, but this cover makes it look nicer than the average tablet. It feels great to hold, looks stylish, and fits well. The magnetic closure works perfectly unlike those that have velcro. All of these were selling for $40 or more. At less than $10 it's definitely worth buying. Highly recommended so far. A good bang for your buck.

Although I don't believe this set to be the gold standard among all sets, it is an excellent option for most people -- a great value and good value. I've tried several of these kinds of sets in hopes I'd like them better than my previous one (a more expensive) but wasn't impressed. If you're looking at any of these, pay attention to what you are expecting.
Very bad quality. It did not fit the keyboard it was advertised with and ended up going in the trash. I threw out this product.
My children love this show. Its fun for them and entertaining too. Thank you so much the service was great thanks!!! Keep up with quality product.

Bad acting, poor script, terrible plot, bad everything. I'd rather eat a banana. You will learn absolutely nothing new. A sad waste of talent by the actors. 
 Rating: 1.

This is actually a nice product. It does have that "warming" smell however but it doesn't bother me. My only complaint was I paid the $19.99 and they changed the price with in 6 months. Don't get me wrong my money well worth it. Just wish they would stick with the original price. I'll buy again when its back to $9.99. Thanks Amazon for your quick shipping too! That works great! 5 stars all around.
I've been looking for an LED flashlight that provides brightness at a reasonable price and, after searching extensively online for awhile, decided upon this.

This toy is very cheap. You can't really turn on the music unless you put a lot of pressure and hold it down with your finger. My daughter doesn't even use this much. I bought an expensive one to replace it...don't waste your money!

A good replacement cable for our old Canon 5D MkII. Our first experience with this brand and it lived up to the standard I have come to expect from Canon. The only downside I see about Canon's cords is they cost a bit more than off-brands. At the end of the day, I've learned that you get what you pay for, so after paying for premium price cables, why not give them an extra buck or two to build quality?

I'm sorry, all that I can say is when you try and be clever in your writing it doesn't work. It's as if you're trying to impress the readers with your word processing skill by not using proper nouns. The characters are paper thin & just because they are rich does not mean we should care about them. I usually LOVE Susan Mallery but this book was a huge disappointment. Please Ms. Mallory put some work into it, it's her fans who pay for it.

The second I hit the first of five or so pages that took my money out on this product they were all falling out. They should be thrown away/refunded. My guess is this was packaged by someone using a stapler and returned with only part # off it. I don't feel like going through return shipping to send it back since it wasn't worth losing my money. Don't buy this junk; it's a total waste of money. It's not even worth 2 bucks.
This book was very disappointing. From beginning to end the hero and heroine seemed completely implausible.

Not enough padding in the mattress and does not support his hips well like I hoped. He tends to roll onto side of him at night which he will get out of. Good for a young person when traveling though and need something temporary until they are ready for an actual bed. We have bought 2 other beds from American Baby, we love them and were disappointed that this doesn't do the same thing as the first two. However it is very comfortable if you sleep on your sides.

I was really disappointed with this set of cookware, after reading the rave reviews. There are a lot of very superficial features lacking in these pans. The pans have not been seasoned well, and require far too much work to clean compared to my previous set, even before using anything but plastic utensils. Most important, is that any food cooked on these cooks through like crazy - it looks like it came off immediately, leaving burned bits behind.

Bought it and used for a few days to watch TV....nothing too fancy or anything......until one day the screen started making this 'buzzing' noise, which is like you getting sick when using your computer.....if u turn off all the peripherals from ur computer then shut down ur pc. Then what do ya know???? It never turns on again!!!!!!! I checked my power supply and..... nope, not working. What else can happen during powerup?....

We read books in order to enjoy a story and I found it hard getting thru this one because of the way Ms Anderson writes. She writes about the sexual desire of various people without any thought how they might feel at it. If you have that kind o mind maybe it will be enjoyable.. It just wasn't. The characters were shallow. A friend who finished book 1 said she wanted me not to. After she was through I did too.
This case is alright.

I thought it was so wonderful until I tried to remove and clean the filter under the sink from another water cooler. That's when I knew that this system is completely inadequate for my needs. There are no moving parts, nothing to keep crud out, nor a way (aside form dumping it into your garbage disposal ) to get any of those little white pellets back in contact with water. It would be much better just using distilled vinegar or other bottled vinegars if you want something non-toxic.

I have two cats. One is about the same age as the other. Both are declawed and both seem to enjoy this food a lot. The older cat took only five days to eat through it. She seems happy with it. UPDATE: At my current place of residence, cats can be kept indoor year-round. For the past week, there has been no indication that she ate it all in one day. Maybe she's too young or something. I'm not sure.
I didn't care for this movie. It was rather slow and boring. The plot left you wondering about the characters, their past, etc. Too much dialogue. Not really a mystery!
Easy to use and clean. Does exactly it says. Much easier than having a big pot of rice on the stove. Love it.
This does NOT support Windows 8.

This product is a piece of junk. I bought it for use with my new Canon 60D. The first time I used it, the connection stopped working properly. Then, after about 30 shots, or so, nothing but static. Nothing at all. Complete waste of money. Don't be suckered by the low price, because you get what you pay for. I'd give this thing negative stars if I could.

I wish the company would return my money because there is no one left to send it back to. The unit worked for a week, then started dropping signals. When internet traffic increased, so did dropped signal. All devices were plugged into the same surge protector. One wall and several wires from router all over the room where this thing sat. No matter what configuration options, or how high power my computers were, this thing just had trouble even being on when we weren't home.

The movie had its moments, but overall we knew what was going to happen even though the trailer made us think otherwise. We just weren't shocked or surprised by anything. And so many parts were left unsaid, that there should HAVE been some sort of "twist" to it.

I enjoyed the first book in this series, so figured I'd read them all. I bought it for Kindle and downloaded most of it. I've just recently started a new project, "Making Books." The first four were on my shelf. Just got through #4 today. These books are getting shorter (really short books), shorter, shorter. It's too bad how things have been dumbed down from what they used to be.

This is a really handy product. Easy to use.. i use it when i'm walking. I can set the timer and leave or just come back later if need be. Would recommend this product! The only problem are these days..battery life seems very short. But then again, for some reason they have never had replaceable batteries..

I ordered this product twice and both times it was not the correct model to my phone. It appears that the product has changed so do your homework before purchasing this item. Now it makes me rethink returning it. Thank you for listening.

I've been using these batteries for years and never had to replace them. The original are good also. We have a lot of wireless devices in our home so we go through lots of batteries. These are far more durable than any other brands. They're just as described. Great price too. I would certainly purchase again when needed. Thank you.

These are really terrible. At best, I suppose they might be okay for one day where you don't have a choice--and after that only if the weather is bad. And that's not something that should get your attention or even keep up with you. If you're planning to use them once in awhile and want some cheap headphones to travel with, maybe these would make sense - but at nearly $20 as of 1/7/12, I've got better options from less reputable brands.

A friend of mine said all along that this would be the last Clancy book I read for a while but I'm sorry to say it just wasn't. When i was reading The Hunt One Day my only thought was, What is next? Is there more? This felt like an episode in Tom Clancy's next tv show or movie. After awhile your mind starts racing with possibilities.

Don't buy this product! I have owned these for less than a year and the left channel has completely died. Just like another reviewer mentioned, if you wiggle wire between them they will come back but then again... after just under 1 year?! Stay away from anything that sounds as good at Kmart. Also don't even consider JVCs. Buy cheap Sony or Panasonics; they'll last way longer (you'll still be looking in a year, probably) AND won't break.
This wasn't exactly my cup o' tea, not that it's bad, it just...

I purchased the book after reading other reviews. If you're expecting more than a list of places you'll hear about then DON'T buy this book. It's really not that impressive. It seems like they are listing things such as, "In order for everyone who wants to know what you need to know, here is what I have found out". That doesn't seem very helpful. Maybe it would be ok if your in another country, but from Australia or New Zealand etc. it's useless.
The print on this edition leaves something to be desired. If you want only pictures, then maybe get one..

These were the worst glasses ever. I purchased two pairs with my wife and they both broke on their first use. The ear pieces are made of flimsy plastic that literally came apart in our hands. Needless to say we returned them immediately. Do not waste your time. Don't buy these garbage. They also only come with a one year warranty after which you have to spend another $29.95 to replace them. Very disappointed customer :(

I got these for my 6 year old to wear in the back yard, they fit well and are comfortable too. They seem to be made of quality material. You can't beat them at this low price either. Very good value. Love them! Go Redskins!
Some of my friends have this book, they said it was really good.

I purchased two sets of these to be used as replacement earbuds. The first package stopped working after about three months, and the second set developed a problem with one side not playing any sound. Very disappointing. You get what you pay for.

This product works great. It doesn't slide around on your counter top, it cleans easily. And there aren't any metal parts which could potentially break off if you're not careful when washing, etc. The reason i gave this 4 instead of 5 stars though because some of my eggs will still leak onto their white surface.

Not a particularly good movie. It is predictable and not that exciting. I would have stopped it after 20 minutes. But for an extra couple of bucks on Amazon, what the heck. Oh well... live & learn. I won't be adding this to my collection anyway!
I have enjoyed reading this series. Now that its been on in rotation and with the ending way to abrupt, Ive now started over again.
It works, kind of.

No wonder the title is misleading. This CD and DVD only covers a short period of time in their lives. They don't talk about what happened to them after leaving this cult. One reviewer stated that she had become depressed while she was going through it. I am sorry, but anyone who has depression knows first hand how painful it can be. It takes years for many people even to get over mental illness and/or substance abuse.
This does not work at all for a Samsung Galaxy S4 phone, I tried on two different phones, with the same result, no audio output. Spend your money elsewhere.

This product was delivered in a timely way. The problem I have with it is that if you push on the screen to unlock it, you are not able open up your touch screen. You need to use both hands for that. Other then tht no problems, very nice color as described. It's easy to hold. For 8 dollars it's ok. Would definetly recommend buying. Just remember when using this case do some pushing and pulling while unlocking so you can get used to it.

These are some of the worst I've ever tried. The adhesive just doesn't stick to anything, even when using a hair dryer. We bought them for my kids' party loot bags, but there were no instructions or idea as how much extra tape was needed so I ended up throwing away 1/3 the bags! Not worth it at all in our book. I'll see if they sell those separately! Yuck! Buyer beware!!! It would have been nice too be able know what each number meant...
So many uses. This handy bench comes with two different height levels including a level and cup holder. It can be carried easily. Love it.
If anyone can get in on track with this band, I will be your best friend. One word: BRILLIANT. You are not going wrong purchasing this.

I bought the book with some interest because of my past experience in a number of other cases from the same company. While I agree that it's interesting to read how and why someone gets into an abusive relationship there is very little practical advice about getting out (leaving or trying to). It almost seemed like, well, abuse isn't good enough for this person so we'll see if they kill you next, but there's nothing like what works before they leave.

This book was just too cheesy to be enjoyable. Most of the characters were not even believable, the story line was so bad I couldn't finish it. I'm in disbelief that this would ever become a best seller. It is about the only piece of garbage I've read recently. If you want good stories with realistic characters, stick withThe Secret History; or, even better, readingAmerican Psycho - Criterion Collection (Two-Disc Collector's Edition)orThe Adventures of Huckleberry Finn.

I was dissapointed with this; it's made in China - cheap plastic parts. Don't purchase it if you're expecting a quality product. You might be interested to know that I've owned this product for at least 3 years, so that's about 7 years experience with it. I'm sorry but there's something seriously wrong here.

The plot seems to be very generic at best. An average romance that's not bad. But like many novels I've picked up, there was nothing especially memorable about it. And there's not really any character development.

My review is the same as most of the others who have given their review. This product was bought for my grandson and I don't understand why it does Not play on his computer but has to be played off a CD or DVD he gave me. Do some research with this company before buying. You take your chances that you will get them correct in order to have what your looking for. When you read other reviews you may run into problems.

i think the price is too high for this item. if you buy it from a company that sells it in bulk to your home. This may not be worth it. If using over internet, then its ok but otherwise id rather use a blender. other than the initial cost and storage hassle, it does provide great quality smoothies. Just wish they would come out with some smaller sizes/variations. It is true what many have said about the lid being impossible off as long as u keep trying.

I got this mouse to replace my Microsoft Wheel Mouse Optical Optical. My old one was pretty good, but it had a small button on the top that required you press down hard until your finger went in, which eventually led me to accidentally pressing buttons without realizing it. It also didn't work well because it's so small, and as any touch surface tends to.
i got three of this to give christmas gifts.it's perfect item if you need to have more than one pair.thanks. :) ^_^ very good!

If I wanted to get old and stupid, I'd read the news. This book is pretty boring. The only reason I finished it was out of a morbid curiosity - if someone actually wrote this, it'd be worth reading. But this has no redeeming qualities. It's not so much that it's poorly written, but what does one do with an eBook in their pocket? Throw it away, don't finish it? Can't you just delete the file, that's what they say.

the phone was just what my husband wanted, however there were several issues which where not resolved. It kept ringing at random times,or only 2 would be able to hear a call, and it also kept asking for the password twice. We had problems with getting out messages from some numbers, in that if you received one, even though we have deleted them, they would pop up again. When we called to get this resolved, I think customer service handled our queries well but nothing got resolved as far as working right.

This product should be marketed to mothers with multiple children. The only way she would understand this is if it came in the mail and was a big box of diapers. For those that thought she'd like this..... Well you're right, because it's not for moms at all. If your expecting something that's going to get you back on track, put some money into an app that can actually help you out instead of buying more products and hoping they'll help.

Not the cheapest but good quality. I love it. It is large enough for a queen and lots of blankets or pillows. My daughter loves it because she can get in bed with us to snuggle up on it! It's well made an we have not had any issues with feathers poking through fabric.

I bought this book based on the many good reviews. This is simply one woman's opinion without any references or research. If you are looking for a more objective account of her journey across Africa, read "African Women" by Barbara Olshansky instead. A much better read. For those that want to share her experience and see how others have overcome obstacles, try reading "A Walk in My Shoes", written by an author from West Africa. She lived there as well.

I purchased this book at a book/music store for the sole purpose of learning about different stringed instruments. Since I've had limited experience with fiddling, guitar, and piano, I'm not sure why it has so many "tricks" to fiddle as well, or how to teach someone who wasn't already familiar with these instruments in the first place. This is far from an instructional book. The CD that is supposed to accompany the book isn't even available on Amazon.

I tried to contact you regarding the status of my order and you didn't return any messages. I'm out 50 bucks.   Rating: 1.0   After reading reviews on this product that suggested it would charge a battery while computer was off, I purchased one. It does not work at all. If I plug in either battery, then try plugging in when machine is turned on, there isn't enough juice. In contrast, using an AC adapter, which I have always used, still works. Not happy with product.

This book is supposed to be based on a true story. The author says that he does not know what really happened but just went along with whatever was told him by the cops. However, when you buy this book, the main character, Jack, doesn't talk much. He tells his own story through flashbacks and flashbacks. In many chapters, Jack has no voice at all in these chapters. Finally, there are three more characters added (who don't have any voices). To me they seemed completely unnecessary.

There are really no redeeming qualities in this book. The first 1/3 of the book is basically a story about three people trying to survive after an asteroid causes their world to become uninhabitable. However, as mentioned, there aren't any good characters. It was interesting because I love books with post apocalyptic settings. But it quickly became too predictable, and if you can see ahead even halfway through this, chances are you know how it's going to end. I don't recommend this.

I would have returned this for a refund but was too lazy. All it does is add weight to my Kindle without improving the ease of handling. It also has an odd odor. My husband thinks he can use it. Oh well... :(

i have tried to listen all 6 cd's but cannot get into it. I thought after 2 CD's it would become interesting. I love stories about life before the era we are being sent to. This book sounds like some guy in his bedroom who has a big idea trying to write down what he heard.

This book is a complete misrepresentation of what the actual text in Revelation is. It takes out some words that are actually there and distorts it to suit its own agenda. Please read the real passage at Revelation 1:1 - 3:6. The author was dishonest enough writing his story based on the interpretation as best he can, but unfortunately this doesn't stand up well against a better translation. It's sad because it's basically an amazing story. I wish I hadn't wasted my money and time reading it.

The first and most important reason I won't buy a Sony product again is this ridiculous headphone cable design. Like all of Sony's latest designs for headphones you have to deal with the proprietary cable, which apparently isn't long enough so that it can't be easily replaced by manufacturers or suppliers.

This is the one DVD I've purchased I feel completely ripped off. To say that you get four workouts in a bundle with three of them being short is very deceptive. A great many workout DVDs on other sites sell these three for about $5.00. The third and fourth are identical if not duplicates as they show only one exercise every couple minutes. Very unethical.

This cover was a perfect fit for my grill. Only issue would be material doesn't hold up well like some other covers in this price range. However I'm pleased with it - especially at twice the price. It's pretty and functional. My husband isn't happy about me buying this product, he wanted something less expensive.
It took three times to get the parts that are needed to assemble this furniture. This is a good idea bad design. The chair I received was defective and does not hold its position. Buyer beware!

Although these were advertised as being able to connect up to, but not be used with my new HD Tv, they did not, which was a disappointment. They will do, since I didn't need them right away, and I'm sure eventually I'll make good use of them. Just wanted people aware before ordering. Also, the audio jack in each set is very tiny. Make sure you have some mini jacks lying around for all your connections. Other than that, they're fine. They're comfortable to wear. Not too bulky.
No real plot and it didn't get better as time went on, it read like a first draft when all those little things could have been fleshed out.

After about half of the book was read, I had to force myself to keep plowing on. The storyline seemed interesting but the writing style and character development left a lot to be desired. It's not even worth it if it's free.

I had read the book and thought that it was very well written but couldn't put my finger on just how bad the book was. So many grammatical errors… words missing, grammar issues everywhere,too predictable, not enough mystery or suspense. It reads like a first draft. The ending was horrible.... it just ended. This author really needs to get someone over there who knows English.

I loved this book. I love a good romance, and this fit the bill for me. It gave me exactly what i wanted out of this type if read. Its written in two different character's point views. It was easy to read it, however you find yourself getting emotionally involved with them. My only complaint is that it got slow towards the end where we go back and forth between these characters. Overall, worth reading.

My computer never really worked, it didn't recognize the memory stick and when I tried installing my own program on it, Windows 98 wouldn't load because of the malware. It was quite possibly a scam but I've got no way to prove that. It's been several months since I'd installed this junk and still using it. In all fairness to Amazon.

This is the 2nd one of these that I have bought in less than a year, it stopped working after about 2 months. The first time this happened i returned it, and got another hoping the unit was more durable. I've had good success with WD drives until now, not sure what's changed but they seem to be cheap Chinese units. If you don't get too many use out of your drive then its worth it.

The concept of creating a novel that interwove historical facts with contemporary fiction is probably one that's never entirely impossible. Unfortunately, the execution in this book was so bad you couldn't help but wish it were longer. There are plenty of plot twists and turns, but they're few and far between. I found myself reading every page with breathless interest, wondering what kind of an ending will follow - except not before I would have liked to have read more about how those things played out.

These are not for your average 10 year old. My daughter uses a larger size and these were too small to fit comfortably around her nose. Very cute, and just about right size, I would say. But they dont work on my 7 years old... :-) Cute, but don't be fooled by the pictures.
After reading the first one, enjoyed the others quite a bit. Thought I'd buy this. But after three pages, I was disappointed. There wasn't one. Could 't finish it.

My 2 year old grandson just loves the "Big Bird." It's big enough for him to play around and still take a walk without hurting his fingers. Great toy! Would buy again in an instant. Thank You Amazon & Melissa And Doug! Can't beat quality.......
Very bright. Does not feel like cheap plastic. The different settings are perfect. The light is really focused down on something. Love it. Highly recommend for any outdoors activity at night.

In our household it is a real treat to watch this video as there are several things that we just have not grown tired of. My 5 year old grandson loves the music and especially enjoys watching all of his action heroes from Disney channel move around, fight and fly. Even the little girl in my son's life seems captivated by it. The only downside (for us) is having to keep turning down other TV programs on DVD so she can see it, then back up again.

There is no book written on the history of this group who played a major role in providing many of America's founding ideals. I remember reading The American Revolution and then going back to read more about some of these guys. How much have people missed because we focus so heavily on...well, nothing?So why does it matter? It matters that there are books being given away as long ago as 2007 entitled, "Washington's Secret Spy Cell".

Do not waste your time or money. If you only want to be left in a dark room without illumination this will do fine. It is also too expensive for what you get. I would rather spend more money on a better quality product. This light really does nothing for my plants. I ended up putting it away and bought an old fashioned lamp for the tank. Don't make me laugh now. Oh well, learned lesson.

As with many people I am a collector of the classic Disney movies. When this game first came out there was no reason to not buy it. After all it brings back some great memories. The only problem is that it's really lacking. A lot will have already been mentioned but here are just my personal gripes: 1. There's way too much walking. Not being able to pause and walk around saves you some time, however that's also where your progress becomes annoying. 2.
Its beautiful but to hard to put on,just have my sister do it. She said u better go buy your self one from apple cause u can tell its been used because there are scratches all over some of them.

I've had 2 of these now. First the display stopped working. Then I lost everything but pictures. Now I'm out $160 and can't believe a device should stop working at less than 4 months old (and this one is not that cheap, either). It was supposed to be reliable for years. Too bad it didn't last. I'd avoid it.

I find it very convenient that Amazon sold this product since its original manufacturer has stopped production and I'm having a hard time finding replacements elsewhere. The only complaint is the fact that these are not as pictured. When in fact, they look identical to them. They work great, but just don't match what was shown here. That being said, for $2.85 - you can't really complain much... Just keep them in mind if you're ordering this. All four of my lamps seem bright enough while running.

This was the only set I bought of this type when making home decor. While they have a cool futuristic design, they're not practical because as we all know, you can never fill an 8+ oz. container without overflowing it. We also found at least one unit that had poor quality. Some were cracked or chipped. Other units leaked. So many other people recommended these to us and it seemed like just what we needed.

The product itself was fine. I ordered two of them to replace a battery that died while charging in the phone overnight. But they charge well just not long enough for my situation. Next time I will try one like Sony OEM. Not as expensive and work much better. Very disappointed as it is almost needed at this point where we live with out electricity. And there are no other batteries from Amazon or local stores but another vendor on Amazon.

I purchased this product but it didn't work. After reading the instructions from both online and manually, there is no way to know if your light bulbs are working or not before trying them. The picture shows an orange light, maybe that would be great for some people. Ours was blue. But you have to go buy a blue bulb at local hardware store. Not worth returning.
Great little heater for running a sewing machine. Very easy to use and small enough to keep on the counter. I would recommend it. It will also heat up any room you have in your house quickly.

One of the best cd's ever written. I was introduced to this cd by one of my friends. And let me tell you-we were both surprised at how incredibly awesome it is. This will become a classic. If anyone likes real music, you'll love this. You gotta get it! The vocals are powerful and beautiful. I hope that more bands like these comes out next. Check them out! They rock! =)

This product is horrible. First of all, you must wait at least an hour to be able charge your iPhone or iPod, which adds much more time than you're looking for. Additionally, the battery pack doesn't hold a full charge. Even when fully charged, it can't provide enough power for two consecutive iPod charges. We purchased this item in April and by July (the last month we've been using it), it's pretty dead. It only charged my phone once or twice before we had to throw it away. Complete waste of money.

My 2 year-old son has been a big fan of these stories since he was about 9 months old. We listen to them quite often in the car. I did notice that, while this book is cute, it does not contain many words that are commonly seen as "learning". It's pretty much just pictures with some short sentences attached. So, if that's what you want, you'll be disappointed. For my son, however, it's just right. We're learning simple words, but he's also learning new words. There's nothing complicated here.

All this book does is give you more ways not to tell them apart and make it harder for them to figure out. No information on how they use words or even how different words get used in different contexts. Just common sense stuff. Don't expect any help in using words. This was my first kindle book, so I can't speak much of that.
This one is more of a comic book story that I would have expected from the time of it's release. Nothing to do with the book, as it just reads like an average Joe comics story.

This did not work from the get go:1. The CD needed to be formatted with FAT 32 format; this took 8 hours.2. It would hang for several minutes sometimes when installing Windows 7...3. If you can even install and run it then it's useless. There's no support available after purchase. It's basically a paperweight. Don't waist your time. I bought an HP that works flawlessly as soon I returned this piece of junk. The only thing it really does is connect wirelessly.

This case is a cheap piece of crap. It came with my Samsung Galaxy SII and does not fit the phone, especially around all corners. I would absolutely never recommend this product to anyone who has an S3 Mini. Do not waste your money unless you want something that won't stay together.
Just what I wanted, very fast shipment and perfect fit. Great price! It is much easier to replace the filter than take them all apart which can be quite a pain!

The author gets in way over her head with all of the details she goes into, trying to make a complete story. I found myself skipping pages and even several chapters. While some may find that entertaining, it wasn't my cup of tea. Too many characters to try and keep track of. My advice: Find something else on "how to's"
After about 6 months the screen protector just stopped being usable. I could see the difference when looking at it with my phone naked.

If you are a fan of the show, and this is what they play on tv at least half the time, well, it's all here. There's several songs I've heard before though. Definitely worth downloading. I downloaded an extra for my ipod. But I will wait until the whole album comes out.

What a horrible piece of junk. It lasted literally 3 months before the screen stopped working, now all you see is blank static. I was told by Sony that it would cost at least $130 to repair. My advice spend another couple hundred dollars and get what u need because you'll be throwing this hunk of junk in trash soon after trying it. It's not worth keeping. Don't waste time or money on this. You'll regret it. This thing should have been recalled long ago.
After only one washing one of the seams on the corner ripped but they are comfortable enough for our guest bathroom.
I have used these for years and am thrilled with them. It is easy to store in a drawer, saves counter space too.

Color shown is not what actually received. This one was more yellow than gold colored. The shoe has an air of newness though. My wife loves them although because they are too narrow she cannot walk in them. Probably will have her try inserts if this does not work out.

If you like to watch the end of your movie then buy these movies, they are really not worth buying, as is usually how many of them come together. I don't want a whole bunch that will take five minutes or so too load. All in all it was just bad. Save yourself. Do yourself a favor, don't waste time here. Just go out and rent it. No need purchasing movies this crappy when there are other better options available. Go ahead get all three.
This is the best stuff for my dog that i have tried, love the way it gets them clean and keeps him comfortable after he leaves. Would never use anything else!

I don't know why everyone thinks this is an awesome game because it's absolutely horrific. Just not in my opinion. It's just too easy. To many puzzles for a video game. Also, after playing it and getting halfway through it you find out that your avatar doesn't even have any limbs and the camera angle changes constantly while playing. For those of us who actually enjoy having to think like an animal, we can't help it.
My father got this with his wife.
I really do like this cutter. The first time we used it, we found that our homemade Italian Pasta with Shrimp Sauce did not work out but tried again just in case something else came up.

I bought this for my 4 yr old who plays with a toy drum set but the pads are very hard to adjust, if you can call them drums. It was easy enough until they break. It's pretty flimsy. But as long as it wasn't expensive she didn't mind. If we go out and have guests over we'll just take her real drums or play on these. The sound is really nice - not too loud like some others. Also doesn't require batteries which makes it much easier in our opinion.

I expected it to hold many CDs but after two months, the center part of one side fell off. So, now everything falls on its own. In fact some CD slots only open 90 degrees, so you can't put a jewel or anything else in them. The other things are OK and it's nice that you can stack them up. It's also very nice. But not sure how long it'll last. There is lots worth buying right now, that's why I bought this. Now I'm going shopping. My recommendation - look elsewhere.
I've been doing some online work in Firefox for awhile and noticed that my internet use was going up.
I thought it was easy reading good story line. The writer also kept you wanting to read the whole book.

the item looks a whole lot better. but as far for functionality its not so great. it will work if your just trying to keep all of those small parts together, and what not in one place. however don't let this review put you off. take my word on this item. if your even remotely thinking about purchasing this, get it. I bet it'll work. it dose feel more durable than others i have seen out there, although it's not 100% solid metal.
I read Steve Berry's first book, "The Girl With All The Gifts," quite awhile ago. It had all the things this story does not: action, romance, mystery, etc. But it also lacked much else.

The story line was interesting enough to hold interest. I'm guessing it probably would only appeal to an upper level high school student as well though the descriptions and historical background make this seem more like a college or middle school class.

After purchasing the Sony NS-LXH150VPN Hi-MD Voice & Video Recorder, I also purchased the external mic and carrying case. This recorder is a piece of junk. The unit itself works fine but I needed to tape two interviews with an assistant. The first was on August 28, 2008. When recording both me and my assistant were talking at roughly the same time.
First, let me say that I have always enjoyed Mr. Brooks books, but was horribly disappointed by Crossroads of Twlight.

This device works fine on the first USB connection, but won't reliably connect to my network from another computer. I should have read all of the bad reviews. Do not buy this. Mine is going back. At least it didn't cost much. It isn't worth your time or frustration. Buy a better device. I've been trying for over an hour, and still can't get this thing working reliably. Very poor product quality.

This is one of my favorite authors so I was excited to buy this book when it came out. But the ending really made me angry especially after trying to slog thru a long and arduous journey through all kinds of characters that didn't seem like people at all. None seemed real - not even anyone who had ever talked with the main character. As for her description on how she lived while writing this, it doesn't ring true. She probably lives in an old rundown basement somewhere which makes sense.

After a long history of listening to every single disc from this band that was released since I met them in 1997 or 1998, my biggest hope after they had been around for 5 years would be another great CD, but now it's pretty safe to say the best thing that's going on with their career over the past few albums has been what seems like self-promotion. They are so overrated, and the media is just loving it.

This product is made very CHEAPLY,the sides will fall apart,its very small. not worth the money. I would never buy another one like it. A child can rip it. It has been sitting on my back porch for 2 days now. My yorkie will eat whatever comes across her..

The book is very interesting but my complaint about it is the translation. I am from Sweden and have lived in South America for a number of years. In contrast to reading books translated into spanish, almost all translations are bad. This one is not so bad because the translation was done by a translator who has lived longer than me. But as an introduction with a lot of details about the subject, you would find more information online since there probably isn't much in print at all.

When the camera arrived, we placed it on a tripod to check out all the features. A few days later (a week after our son was born), both my sons went back outside wearing helmets and protective clothing. They started playing in an indoor pool. Camera became full of water, shut off, no pictures, still works, but now won't turn back. We are unable to get under water or into that part to try it again. Don't waste your money! Even taking just pictures for fun, this was not worth the hassle.

This thing is a huge piece of crap! It's not even funny. Not only is this product made in China, that's where its made, but you have to pay postage on both ways. Don't waste your $ and don't just buy one, take the other review to heart it really stinks.

I bought this for my son and husband to watch movies on. They like it. The stand does not swivel, but so far has worked as it should. Shipping was fast. Would buy from seller again. All in all a good buy. No complaints after 3 months. Thanks for another quality product. Amazon is the BEST, just wish there were more on Amazon.

These pads are the perfect size and hold up well through multiple washings. There is a seam in one of them which I just need to sew because they leak. As long as you wash according to directions, there will be no problems with these. My dog likes these much better than others we've tried. Highly recommend them. I've been buying my own for years. :)
Too short. This book left me wanting more from it. It did not give enough detail on how to fix your car.

This book offers a very thorough analysis of the history and functioning of the Office for Personnel Management, focusing on current leadership positions within OPM itself. The author is critical of most managers who are responsible for establishing new programs in this sector, but also presents numerous suggestions to reorganize what needs changing. For those interested in government agencies, it appears that these agencies have essentially two main types of employees.

I only read half the book because it wasn't what i was looking for.. But if you interested in this era, i think you'll enjoy it. The author did seem to have pretty good research and her style is good. This isn't my type of read, but i'm sure many will like it. I do have a couple books on my reading list that involve the Great Depression so it'll be interesting for me too. Thanks Amazon.

I love it! I purchased this lamp about a month ago and it took me 5 minutes to install. It looks like expensive furniture, the only difference with price is that they don't have a dimmer switch on it. There are some very nice features with it. There is one large bulb in both bulbs, which doesn't take up much space, but gives off plenty of light. One light goes out, so you still have enough time for another light, as long as you're standing far away from it when it's out.
This item did not work properly when plugged in. I was very frustrated with this. If it doesn't work, its worthless. Please save yourself the hassle of wasting time and money by NOT BUYING THIS ITEM.
When reading this book i had an unreal hope of finding out what happened after they gave him all those years for his crimes. To have this person turn around at the last minute like she did.

I had high expectations but it was still hard to get sucked into this book. The main character is interesting with a great personality and she has potential as an author. This will be one of those books where the sequel better do something special. A little more angst would have been nice so that you actually cared what happened next. As for my review title, it's right on. Save yourself. Just reading other reviews on here seems like they weren't very well reviewed. It does not leave a feeling good at all.

I was disappointed this wasn't the version narrated with Robert DeNiro and Jane Fonda. If you have one of those audio books where you can follow along, you'll be fine. It's a lovely story, just not narrated well, or so it seems to me. I'll probably try another version.

I was really excited about this book being as it is geared toward a young adult audience. This book reminded me of the "Twilight Zone" for adults. The character development could have been better and there should not be so many similarities to vampires. All in all it's an interesting story with good premise. But, you need some things worked out.

These headphones worked for about 3 days. I was running with my Zune and the right headphone quit working which made me so sad. The sound is very good, but if there's a bad design it's not going to last long. They were comfortable when they work though. Maybe I'll return them. I'm really afraid they'll stop working. I just got it in January. Can't do anything right now. =( Please help me. Thanks.

I'm quite dissappointed with this book. When I first picked up the book, it seemed like what every fantasy reader had been waiting for -- a new world, interesting and diverse characters, lots of humor, and fantastic worldbuilding. But after finishing it, not so much. It's written from the perspective as if it were only ever meant to be read once, then discarded. After reading books 1 through 6 in this series, I felt that all three books could stand on their own without feeling rushed.

No matter what I did it wouldn't charge my ipod when it's plugged up to the wall. It would just stay on and never change anything. Didn't help much in the car either... Not worth it. Buy a different brand.

I bought this for a friend who was having difficulty with a different unit. It is very sturdy and easy to operate, making it much easier than the one that they had. The only flaw in my view of this type system would be the water tank size capacity needs to be made larger so you can refill it. There has been an almost constant need to put plastic bags into each unit after use. A simple solution would, perhaps, include a fill port on top. That aside, these units are great.

I bought these, and received them. They are too large in size.. The fit is okay. The length comes to just above the middle part of my calf at it's widest point. So, my calves get very hot during these workouts. Not sure how they would do with larger ones. They feel like walking on sandpaper. If you have normal size calves, then this review wouldn't apply. But as it is, after wearing them once only for a 15 minute bike ride, i had blister lines. Also, no cushion whatsoever.

This review is for the Sony HDR-PJ700 camcorder, which I also purchased. The recorder was working fine at first, but then it seemed to get slower and slower. It finally went completely DEAD and will no longer record. At first we thought that maybe there were some tapes in it, so when we'd have a tape, we'd watch it. After that, nothing works. We tried all kinds of things (including new tapes), still nothing. So, this camera definitely has issues. Very very disappointed.

In the last 3 years I have gone through all of Ken Follett's books. They have been excellent and this one doesn't even compare to some of his recent best. It is predictable from very early on. Not only are we told about every character, but how their lives connect with or influence each other. From a young boy who seems not too bright, it becomes obvious that he has an incredibly powerful life force. He has learned many things in infancy and before age 18 has become almost invincible.

I have looked for replacement filters for over a yearand just can't find any. I am glad to learn thatit was available at Amazon in the first place. Just what we needed. Thank you, thank you. And you saved me time, money andaggravation. Thanks again for having them. Sue Schrieffer

The only good thing about this book was the cover and cover. It is no more than a list of common sense, useful tips for making money. I find it impossible to believe that anyone who wrote it actually ever read it!! Don't buy it. Even if you are considering giving birth naturally, there are much better sources on this topic out there. I'm sure they couldn't even write a chapter as worthless & superficial as what it's selling.
If You Ever Made It Through To Here You'll Know What The Joke Is.

This product was shipped as promised. I received it very quickand no dents. It did not cure the issue of moisture in my car due to having a heater that just does not keep up with how hot summer days. The cooler weather days are much milder than normal. Overall I'm satisfied with this product. If you have problems with your A/C then by all means try using this stuff. My only wish would be for more of such an easy fix. I'll add to review when winter rolls around again.

This is a good book. As any other I would recommend to someone that wants help with making money. It wasn't my style of book, but it gave me some ideas. For the most part though you can find many more ways in this book and just Google it. You wouldn't need two books about becoming more money when one says everything you want or need. Most ideas have been done already, however they are presented so you don't feel as if you wasted your precious time. All in all not an awful read.
Our dog/puppy loves this, very easy to give, her breath smells better when she eats it, it's also soft enough for her.

I know this is a tough pill to swallow but if you are in pain don't hesitate to purchase it. It will work wonders. I have tried other products and nothing has worked. My sister had similar results so we were hoping we'd feel the same. We purchased these based on her experiences after giving it at least 30 days. When they arrived about five days later she said that although there would be lots of small pebbles that was expected. After about one week no signs or side effects.

Ok,here's a review of this CD. It starts out with some fine work by the young John Williams (aka "Y") who has done much music scoring films. His score here is very good, and is especially pleasing to me, as I am still fond on hearing his themes in films. The CD then gets into the usual fare for computer scores that have been seen before - there are several pieces from other movies.
This product came on time and looks exactly like the picture but it doesn't work.

If you are using this mainly as a keyboard and mouse, it works fine. The build of the keyboard is excellent but the performance on both mice leaves much to be desired. They often work intermittently; sometimes they don't even turn on. I have tried everything and am running Windows xp. As has been mentioned, all these issues came out within the first month with light usage. I was able to return it, so that makes me happy. There must be something wrong in design.

This is not a true novella but more of an introduction to what I think will be the next full length novel. Spoiler-It has great potential but fails in almost every possible way. For example when we meet Zarek he says that his wife just gave birth and that her body needs rest it had been working on this since she was pregnant. Then about halfway through the book you find out she's already pregnant...

My girlfriend and I made the mistake of buying this book. It seems that all these guys had so much trouble making it to adulthood that they tried some bizarre treatments on themselves using a variety of herbs, vitamins, vitamins again, herbs - even acupuncture points. This is not uncommon for those who try alternative medicine, in my experience. The book reads like one man's ramblings about his journey from childhood abuse by parents and peers and how he eventually came back around.

Don't waste your money on this piece of junk! I'm still trying to get the thing to connect in my house after spending a night trying. It wants you to call for technical support and that is something I don't have time for. The one good thing, my DSL will not be changed until they send me new hardware or we just give up and go through all those steps again as I didn't want anything but problems with Comcast!! And forget about their online chat - it is worthless.
This product came highly recommended by our vet. Our little terrier mix was running back from every thing including thunder. He couldn't relax.
I've enjoyed her music in the past with John Martyn of Mott The Hoople.

Good quality, however the metal ring for your ear is a bit too large and bulky. Not very flexible. I prefer my older bluetooth headsets, where it was more streamlined. The sound quality of this device works great. It even connects to other Samsung devices, which made me happy because when I'm outside working out, that's not always an option. Also, there are several buttons on each earpiece, so it's easy (and less time consuming) to switch between songs, calls, etc.
The only thing missing here is an adjustable temp control. You need to hold this pan in your hand high so it doesn't fry or burn you.
Not as much "suction'', even though there are ridges on the bottom where suction should occur.

This is the third book and I like it better than 'Dead of Night'. The story line was interesting - not exactly what we expected, but still a good read. It also had two more "surprises" in it: (1) The main villain was revealed to be really not evil. ( 2) As others have said, there are always at least one or two characters who end up living happily ever after just because of happenstance (like all good stories).
This power inverter plugs right into standard 120v outlets. The unit itself takes up minimal room relative to others. Its design prevents tangling.
They were smaller than thought and have already scratched. Otherwise beautiful quality. Very comfortable in bed.
As with others here, many people have found this game entertaining and easy to play. My experience isn't as good, in regards to enjoying it.

I have to give this one 4.5 stars for some of the reviews that say it has no bass, but if you read my review of their previous release (THE MOISES OF DESTINY) they used different studio techniques. There is less processing in this recording also, which makes it more "live" sounding.

I ordered this battery after my original battery finally wouldn't hold a charge longer than 30 minutes anymore... at about 2 years old. The only thing different is that the color of this replacement isn't quite right and I'm not sure if it's truly OEM.I'll see how long it lasts. For now, it works really well but won't last until it gets really low.
This cover is excellent since in my country people don't get that many privacy covers as with Samsung Galaxy Nexus or iPhone.

These are great for those not so talented and clumsy types who want to have fun on their phone. It gives your phone a clean finish while protecting with ease from scratches. The only minor con is that I wish it were easier to get all the bubbles out when you first apply them but that's true of most screen protectors. Good job Zagg!
There was not any depth to the story and it ended as if the author ran out of ideas or she just didn't care enough about this book or her readers. Not sure I'll read a sequel.

This is my third case and I love it. It fits all four of our electronic toys in one place. A must have. The colors are very bright. Very pretty. Easy to spot on a carousel. Great price! Excellent quality!
This is our favorite of many items we've bought from Anker. We love having the wall charger, retractable cable, light weight, and small size.

This is my first review for Amazon. I have always gotten products without any kind of rating or feedback. In this case, however, I'm glad to give an honest review. The packaging and shipping was just fine, the product itself does exactly as it's claimed to! My husband used this before going on vacation with his friends last week. When he came home, it took him less than half a day to recharge both phones 3 times.

The product came in a bag that appeared to have been used, though Amazon said the order was 'new'. The contents were not even packed well. Most of them had come out without any packaging at all. I didn't send back, though. Not worth it... if you don't mind having used items that aren't as new. This was just a really cheaply sold bag. If they still sell it like this, it'd be great, but for now. Pass.
This is a very good choice for a long time owner of the Dell Laptop. I'm very happy with it, and would recommend it.
Not the product i was looking for, although it is sturdy on my wall, had to buy 1 inch screws and go from there. Will be returning it. :(

this is the only one we buy - it stays put for a long time. I don't think you can get any better. It keeps my child dry, and comfortable in his swim suit, it doesn't ride up & comes off easily. There are some other styles too if he wanted different styles, but we'd purchase these again!

I bought this for my husband since he uses it at work and always carries lunch. We both like to put an ice pack in each section, so it's easy on the stomach. This is by far his favorite lunch because we don't have plastic sandwich bags. And I've found with other LunchBOB, even though they are plastic, they're not insulated enough - especially when it's hot out. So if he's going into a restaurant or something where there's heat, this definitely helps.

We needed a new vacuum based on the reviews and what seemed like reasonable price. My wife used it after assembly but we had problems as soon as you start pulling it. The wand is just too narrow. It also pulls to one side or another when vacuuming. Also, if there is any obstruction that moves up under it, it jams up. Then you have to take every bit of dirt out. I can do this by hand without much trouble now.

I love the way that book is set up. Its pretty good for the price. My only complaint would be that, when you are reading it on your e-ink reader, after a while, pages appear to stick together and its hard (and time consuming) getting them apart. Still worth it!
This was ok, nothing that wowed me. However by the end of the book I've had enough info regarding what type of marriage I'll be marrying - which will cause my daughter problems when she grows up.
Bought this for my daughter and it has held up well through many washings. I would recommend. Keeps her warm.

After two months use, I'm still impressed by my investment in these bulbs. Not only does it do away with that long dark tube light fixture we used before, but its color temperature (which you can read about at [...]) matches our old incandescent and fluorescents. My husband even likes it...

The cover met expectations. Has great support with hard edges on front so that you don't scratch the Kindle screen. Nice pocket if want to, carry your reading list along with. Very happy using this Amazon product. Looks professional.
it was way to big not a good fit for me I will give this case away thank you anyway

I was expecting to be able to read in the car for my 6 year old but it's too hard if there is even a slight amount of light coming from any angle. The screen is also not very responsive and you can only get half your screenshots because it takes a while before the shutter clicks when you're pressing the button. It seems that some people aren't having problems with this camera being difficult at all since there's already good reviews here, mine happens though.

As the book explains, a large portion of it is devoted to the story behind why people don't eat fruit. The message may have been appropriate back then, but today I'm not sure it's really needed. I think there's plenty who would be more interested in that than reading about it. This version also contains a lot of editing issues, one or two words missing. I've read many Kindle books without this, and they usually seem well formed. All in all, if you are looking for something on diet ideas, this will do.

I did not watch it in the movie theaters - and probably wont now. The beginning is slow & could have been a lot better. Also for anyone else wondering, when she finds out he will be returning home they kiss but does NOT go back to her parents house. It's actually kinda hot there because of how unerotic some things can get. But if you like to see that this guy was really into his work then you'll love it...

I am in desperate need of a new adapter. This product was purchased March 15, 2011 and it broke today. The plastic housing around the wire has broken at both ends near the metal connectors. It is now past Amazon's return period. So I'm stuck with one that doesn't work and won't last long enough to get replacement. I've had the same adapter for over two years now. No problems so I guess Amazon went cheap this time if they know they've run into problems.

it didn`t play on my dvd player so im pretty mad at that i think everyone needs too know its region specific or have a working one, im returning mine for this reason sorry but if you`re buying anything online be careful because i dont care what you say i buy alot off amazon.

The reason that I didn't give this five stars was because all three books are out in paperback and hard cover so they're basically double the price. There aren't many differences between the hardcover editions besides it's easier on your back.
I own the older Version and bought 2 of these.

My wife got this as a cheap way to have an alarm clock built in and it does what it's supposed to. When we first received it, It turned on automatically at the time I went out of town for 3 weeks. Once I returned, however they had been turned off by me. Now all that is possible with these type electronics is the ability to reset them! So I just changed my review from 1 star down to 2. 
 Rating: 2.0 
 The radio works fine.

I own and use a variety of different headsets for work in the real world but this particular device just does not cut it. It's uncomfortable, doesn't have enough power, is very difficult to hear, makes voice recognition really weird & it feels cheap as heck. The best thing about it, aside from its size, are it's battery life. I'd pass on this, get one that actually meets your needs or buy something more expensive so you don't feel like you've thrown away money.

We have 3 children ranging from ages 10 - 2. Our oldest has an ipod which her brothers play with occasionally. She recently received this OtterBox as well so we were able to watch my youngest daughter try it.

In an effort to get a bigger screen and better contrast rate for general text or video viewing on our TV, we bought this unit. Very disappointed with overall quality of performance even on a high end Samsung TV.

Although they claim to put out more volume, this headset is awful. The mic worked for about a month, then no more, and I'm not sure why. I was really disappointed because the price of these seemed great. I've had many Turtle Beach in similar style so it isn't me doing something wrong. Now it's too late to return them or exchange them, but still disappointed. Good luck trying to make calls with these.
This adapter seems to be working well so far. I've only had it a month, but I'm quite pleased that it didn't melt my laptop or ruin anything else about it.
