This little baby seems to be well built, it is attractive enough that my husband can hang the phone on a hook from the kitchen counter or take off his belt with it, too. If you are putting this in your purse, I might think carefully before doing that. But I've never lost one of these when working outside.

I was very disappointed in the quality of this book. Many of them had writing on which side of the pages they printed. Not one page would turn easily or easily. Some pages were hard to turn. I'm giving each a 1-star rating. My students are excited about doing their reading but now it's time for me and others who bought these books as 'good' to find another vendor so that we can use them. Do not waste your money - buy used at least until you know what's going on.

This is great. Our son would come home every single night and complain that he had no blankets. He was always cold. We got this blanket on a lightning deal for just over $10. It worked out great. You can also add a cotton cover under it too. Keeps your child warm & toasty. I love how soft the material is. Definitely one of our best buys off Amazon. Very worth it.
The item I ordered was supposed to be a new item, but it looked like someone had tried cleaning it. When the package arrived at my door step, one of the items inside was in pieces. One more time.

A very solid read that is full of interesting historical info while giving the reader plenty (if not too much) to think about as well. Recommended for both history and mystery. Looking forward to Part II.

I'm pretty sure this was fake so I'll know for next time. But yeah. Pretty sure it's fake. The other reviews are mostly good. It seems like some people got their lotions from the same batch as me. It's a common con with these bottles....
A light but entertaining story with good character development and a nice story. This was more enjoyable than some of Mr. Turtledove's other work. Well worth reading.

the first one is not working. I was really disappointed for my son and he could not get excited enough to play. The second has a problem with light that is supposed to be on all day in green but it don't show up. My kid ask me why did i put 2 so many hours into this and now cant play because of it. So we are going through warranty process as well
This book was interesting and a very quick read. There were lots of grammatical errors, but that's to be expected when buying e-books. I would certainly recommend it, though.

I got this to read my SD cards in the computer but it didn't work there either just not compatible. There were no return label or receipt with product. It was a great disappointment. The merchant refunded all my money though. Thank you very much for your customer service. Sincerely yours, Nancy K. Moore
I bought this for my son to watch his home movies on. He loves it! It's also very easy on the eyes! Great product! This is a must have and great price! Very pleased. Would highly recomend.

This is the worst album I have every bought. So sorry that this happened when it was released and even more unhappy over what appears to be complete lack of care from whomever distributed it. The copy protection means my computer crashes after just a couple songs. It's an MP3 so you can't burn copies or rip them. It makes me wonder if most modern albums are also copy-protected. If that's true then the whole industry should stop. These guys need some new tricks with technology.
Had this battery for two months and it is already dead without having been misused or anything like that. Not a durable battery...

Not sure what the deal is with this product except maybe there are different versions of it. It seems to be a very weak and thin material. The top layer tore as soon as I removed it from the package. As in, barely enough to keep my mattress on (have had for 3 months). Maybe you can go by other reviews on this, but if you're looking for something more durable, look elsewhere. In any case, it's going in the trash.
Didn't lose that extra pound or 2. But no negative side effects. Still eating less foods though.so I guess it's ok. Won't pay more to order again.

I bought this product in May of 2005 and have used it every day. It is a nice size, the handle folds compactly away, making it easy to fit even in my car's cup holder. The carafe keeps coffee hot for hours. Even after leaving the machine on the burner at work, which typically heats water several minutes before we show up, there was always still piping hot. About 3 months ago (maybe because we were using regular filtered water), though, it suddenly began leaking.

The case makes the phone look even better. I was a little skeptical of this case being so inexpensive for how well it looks. But it's sturdy, and feels good in your hand. Plus I've had several people compliment my new phone. It's only been a couple weeks now, but I'm really loving this case!

This item arrived within 2-3 days after ordering! It is extremely easy to install (hardest step of the whole job) plus it looks great on my pool. When the summer finally comes back its going to be nice not having that pesky hole in our pool! :)

This movie is horrible, the CGI is horrible and to top it off the guy who does the voices on this thing needs his head examined. I've never seen worse acting in my life. If you want bad special effects see Transformers 3 which has great scenes such as the bridge scene where Optimus Prime flips over into a pool of oil. That sequence may have been made so cheesy by computer graphics back then people didn't notice or care at all.

This book is based more on the authors own theories as opposed to true science. I don't know what the author has that makes all Muslims bad but anyone with the slightest amount of logic will see through this book.

I cannot imagine why Amazon would suggest buying this volume on kindle. They are offering a version of some type that is much larger and heavier than necessary for home reading. This Kindle copy weighs half what my older paperback did.

This review is not based on the product itself, it seems to have a good quality. The reason why I'm only giving 3 stars is because of how difficult this transaction was. My husband had ordered this for my daughters 16th birthday. Upon opening her present (the cake topper) we found that there were 4 large gouges in the front side and three small ones from where someone tried breaking into this thing before wrapping it. So disappointed.

I have been a fan of Robin Cook ever since his appearance on the radio show called "The Late Show." I've bought and read all the early books with him. This was awful. He is obviously very intelligent because he understands human nature better than any other writer today except perhaps John Grisham.
this is awesome!! i used one on my yorkie and loved it! then got another..for our lab puppy..

I gave it 2 stars because the concept was good. The design failed miserably. If this item had been made like most other products it's not an issue I would have seen and used it. The product has two sides that don't stick together well.
Not much content or substance. No meat here. Just a collection of quotes. There wasn't anything substantial from his perspective. Pretty basic if you ask me.

This is the perfect size for a 2 cup French Presses,even though it doesn't keep hot as long it's worth it, I also put in ice cubes along with lemon and sugar to make yummy iced tea? The thermos keeps your drinks hot or cold all day???
As long as you place these decals over glass doors or anything else that is relatively smooth, they're fantastic.

After buying and reading this book, it became clear that the author is more interested in getting attention than providing information about her subject. In short, she offers up some pretty weak opinions with no supporting material whatsoever.

I was just reading a book on the same theme and found myself asking "so are you saying this is why that guy got killed"? Yes, we are talking about a particular point of his career but let's not make it seem like HE had something to do with it. It's really all too common these days for "writers" (the title says quite eloquently) to use whatever they want to say in their works.

I just finished viewing "The Long Way Home." It was truly horrid. At first it looks so promising. Then the movie turns into some kind of horror film with little to no plot and characters. There are people falling down a hole in the ground, but then there is this guy, who keeps popping up out of nowhere with that strange smile on his face. That's about it. Nothing even happens. I've seen scarier movies at my local theater.

I love the taste of this coffee/tea to begin with. It's got a sweet flavor and good for you, but it's not as strong as I'm used to. It doesn't compare in strength or flavor like some teas I've had before - that's my only complaint. Otherwise, it tastes great. My favorite part is that with regular tea bags, you need more than one bag at a time.
This was a great story. Very well put together. Good morals about not allowing our emotions take over while trying to accomplish things. Enjoyed it.

I have been a very loyal Amazon shopper for years. Recently I bought an HP laptop, with the hope of saving on ink, but boy I ended up having to spend much more!!! This is by far the worst printer that has every gone in my home!!!What makes matters worst? After three phone calls and hours on the phone, which had me hanging up, they finally sent out replacement toner. They said it would arrive June 21st.

The only thing worse then the writing is this book. I'm a fan of zombie novels, but was turned off before I even started it. The storyline bored me and made no sense. It jumped around too much to hold my attention. Maybe if you could have read it in one sitting. But what should be interesting reading, felt like filler. This is probably because most authors are not comfortable putting their own story through. As far as books by Stephen King, I'll try one more.
I have the same problem. After about 8 months of light office use, it died on me. Power goes out and no computer sees it. They won't replace it, just offer to repair for $125. Ridiculous. Stay away!

I am very curious if someone else has used this product in a similar way, as for me, the process seemed to work great. It also did not burn any of my hair, though it took quite some time. And I've been coloring and/or dying my hair semi-permanent since 2006. So when and if anybody is reading this, good luck with your project. My first time using it, so it's hard to compare.
As is usual when using any device, don't listen first before you try it out on your pet.

I was expecting a lot more quality from the Belkin MiniSurge for my IPad2. When it arrived and put in on, I thought to myself that this is not going to last too long with being pushed back into place repeatedly. To their credit though, they did have an instant return policy so kudos on that. But after one week of use, we noticed that there were lines or indentations forming all over the case where plugs fit into. Within two weeks all 4 ports failed.

I have to admit that there is nothing like the fresh summer air, so when my old filter started falling apart it wasn't an easy decision as to where to go and what kind of filter would replace it. After looking at hundreds of options for filters, this was definitely one of the few that met all my needs. Not only does the pool bottom seem cleaner, but with 5 years service life I'll be doing a lot less maintenance - not something I'm likely to remember by any means.

This does everything that a bluetooth mic for the iphone 4 does, just doesn't do it well. It picks up background sounds when in use and people on the other end say they can't hear me well with all of their sound turned off.
Arrived in less than 2 days.

This printer is so slow that after two weeks I've given up on it. I spent a significant portion of the weekend trying to get it working for various reasons. The printer won't communicate with my laptop by USB. It's frustrating because when you turn it on, and then walk away from it, nothing happens until you reboot it. I'm still not sure why. It has been back twice already. And every time it's back, within an hour or so, its problems have returned.
These are the best for your money! Super sturdy. Works with the new iPad as well if needed. Not expensive but a must have. Worth every penny.
My sons IPhone 5 did not receive any protection from this case.

I started reading books on the Kindle for a year or so until my mom read my first book and then gave this one to me. I have found it very easy & convenient way of reading. It gets hot pretty fast, but otherwise is as described. I really like how compact it is, does not get in the way. Would recommend if you want something easy without all the bells &whistles.

I was hoping that when reading this story of a man who falls deep in love with a woman, he wouldn't take all his "stuff" and make her, essentially, be the mistress as she is too good for him. It's just not realistic.

I am not even sure why this item is being sold. It was in a sealed package and looks like it's just from the shipping process. Not worth it at all! It would be better if you had someone to put into a plain brown envelop so people know what you're getting! DO NOT ORDER THIS ITEM FROM AMAZON!The cover appears fine, but again, don't buy it, it'll only cost 3 dollars. If that's all it's going for, then maybe go for it.

I recently had to switch my dog off of a more expensive food. One thing that really bothered me was all the meat and other processed products in her food, but most importantly my vet recommended Cosequin. She has become very active again, is sleeping better and, when she does eat with the rest of her family, eats it without prompting like they do.

This is a fantastic product. It cooks meat like it's suppose to. I have not used the skewers for anything else yet that has to do with grilling. The only thing is, you will need an extension cord if you're grilling by yourself. You'll always burn out your electric before any food does. For anyone thinking of buying it, don't worry. It's well made, and works well. I'm sure it could also be good on stoves.

I bought these cables because I'm a fan with Belkin products. They are well built, but they do need some sort of strain relief around each connection. At first it's fine, however after awhile your devices aren't charging as fast or the charge itself isn't working.
Nice book, my daughter used it during her first class she felt like we are there with some kind person explaining everything. Good price too

I think this stuff is ok. It doesn't do much so why should someone pay $20+ a can for it. It's not as expensive to buy it at the store because you don't have to wait hours in lines for it, even if a person buys several cans. In addition, I just recently heard there was an initiative that went into effect (maybe) called " Save Food & Clean Up Our Towns! " They are supposed to encourage supermarkets and big box stores such as Walmart etc.

I bought these for my Canon Rebel T1i. They arrived in great shape, looked pretty good. The instructions were not even the same as a set of instructions on another camera brand. But after installing them, they kept falling off. Had to super glue them on. And one came with a scratch that obviously scratched through it. Very poor quality. Pay more and get actual real nikons. Will never buy from this seller again.
Poorly written book. It gives very little description about what is happening in their marriage, but more on how their marriage had turned sour.

This case is too big for the new Fire HD. It was not compatible with mine, it did not have a cut out on the bottom to charge it. This is advertised as an accessory made specifically for this model, and does NOT apply to my model. I returned it.

If you want your printer to waste the ink it uses, this is a good buy. Not worth my time returning it. The print quality isn't even worth trying to send something in as it's just not there. You get what you pay for, and there's no saving some bucks over buying OEM. And who would complain if these cartridges don't work?

The plot was good but it did not flow the characters were very annoying you can only imagine how horrible things would have been if they could just ignore each other! Also why are there so many grammar mistakes I dont know who edited this book at all maybe a 14 year old in seventh grade needs to learn a little about writing or better yet use a spell check. Other than that pretty decent read overall for 99 cents.
I did not care for this, one size fits all did not work. But at least Amazon makes returns easy….thanks! Love Amazon.

The picture is not what i got. They are all about 10 inches long - and they're really small. No good for me so I haven't put them, nor will, on my wall. If you don't care too much you'll probably be okay. Otherwise, these would make a nice Christmas decoration or something. They're super fragile though.

I had high hopes for this book after seeing the 5 star reviews. However, as another reviewer said, it is an incredibly frustrating read. The author repeats information from previous chapters when describing each step in a recipe. It's very difficult to know what he means, and there are no page numbers that can help find it. Moreover, some recipes require ingredients not usually found at most grocery stores. For example, his apple pie has apples instead of apples. If you have never made apples, go buy organic ones.

I must have missed something, but this book was an average addition to the entire series, which is sad for anyone who read all three books and loved them. It really did feel like someone else wrote it, because there were many grammar errors, missing words, etc. I enjoyed most of the characters, especially the heroine, so I plowed through it. Just wanted it finished before moving on to another series. Would not recommend if you are a die-hard fan! This one seemed rushed and didn't keep my attention.

What a let down this thing is. It looks great, feels solid, has awesome features. And then it only works the first time that you turn it on. I've owned many Logitech products over my life, so I know they have quality products, I'm not sure what changed in this one, but it's terrible. The battery lasts forever. No need to recharge it. But if you're ever trying to log into your network, or look at any files on it, forget about getting anything done.

I am an intermediate knitter but have been trying different things lately, looking for new skills. This seemed like one of them and sounded easy. Well there are some ideas that seem ok and lots written with humor which kind of turned me off...my head was going all over while reading it. Sorry, sorry :(
They charge fast and have worked great in my camera thus far. Not having to change every day is a definate plus! Thanks! :D : (   Rating: 5.

I received my book in good time but had a couple of days that it was never received,so i got mad because of that,anyway when they finally came about it,the price is great and the shipping fast.. But with in 2 weeks some black spots started on them,so after 4 weeks,some parts where torn apart... They are ok for what you pay for.

As the title suggests I used this kit to fill in some gaps in my knowledge of a popular television show. However, after filling in these gaps, the questions and answers on each section felt like they were just slapped together. If you haven't done the research yet, you aren't going to get any meaningful insight or even learn enough about your favorite show. The website looks great but it's really cluttered. It feels more user-friendly.
The Gloves did protect my hands from heat well, but when putting any pressure (pulling out hot, hard to clean items) it caused the fabric layer over your thumb ripped.
Very cheap looking. Was too big for my face so didn't fit properly. Can't return them because it's coming from over seas. Wouldn't recommend it.

To be honest, I'm a little surprised at all the positive reviews.. I would call this something of an exercise in futility. It only works part of the time and you have to reset it. What if your dog barked like crazy but it was raining, or what should I say he got stuck on his hind leg trying to put one paw down before stepping off the pedal? Why doesn't it work right when he's been outside for quite some time.

This book is great for people who like a fairy tale. But if you are looking to learn something about the Civil War or understand any of these men, you'll be disappointed. Even tho I am not from southern states, reading this book just confused me because it makes NO sense at all. It seems almost as though they were talking in some sort of code. The author wrote what he saw and thought was true but how would anyone know that anyway. To use Southern culture throughout the entire story isn't helpful either.

I am happy to get a good quality version of the original radio show, but the audio was not recorded well. Lots and lots if static. It would often sound like the audience kept going into another room. After only 20 minutes or so it just went dead again. There is no attempt at any kind of fade out, you start where there was. However, being able to hear both sides again for 2 cents worth of material makes this worthy purchase.

Good for the money.. Bought them to replace a more expensive pair. These work just as well and you can hear much clearer... I would buy again, if needed...Just wished there were ear covers included though..Other then that, no complaints..

The item was as described and arrived in record time. We have had our house for a long time now... I remember getting these when we moved in. I've got several of the bigger ones from that same line on display inside my home. Everyone loves them. If you love something then it's worth it. This is one item people will find they use more than other items like this with some people preferring to sit at their desk or coffee table doing work vs sitting here in front of their computer.
Very easy application. Really enhances the look of your phone like no other. Just as described,this item is very much recommended. The shipping was super fast. Highly reccomended. A+ product

I bought this for a friend who's computer would no longer run with Windows XP and we had to load it on her new computer. It works fine. It does seem a little slow at times. But when you're using two programs that need the RAM, it's not a problem. Works as if she has another operating system. And it's cheap. Worth it. Just don't rely upon it. It's designed only to work in one environment, so you shouldn't expect too much.

I've tried several different headphones but none of them give me the sound quality and bass that you would get from a good set at an equivalent price range. I wouldn't recommend these to anyone. Pros:PriceGreat soundEasy pairCons:Poor build qualityThe mic is not very good. People had trouble hearing me. For people who just need something basic (earbuds are fine) then they will probably work fine. But for music, you'll end up replacing one or both with better ones.

I can see this as a life learning experience. It makes me aware that while we may not know everything before us, God does. So many people are afraid to talk about the truth and then they hear someone say something that doesn't reflect God's word or have enough faith in God! And what do parents do? Not only don't they answer but they try to correct their children! But God is good! He knows us better than anyone else. If you need encouragement through difficult times give it this.
My new Kindle Fire HD7 case arrived earlier than advertised by Amazon. Pros:- Nice feel / weight--nice design.- Great PriceCons:None yet.

Easy to use and makes excellent coffee. Very easy to clean. I am not very fond of the permanent filter design, but otherwise it is fine. This machine brews coffee exactly in the amount of time you select which saves a lot of time. Update: The plastic gear that is on top (pour spout) broke off. But this thing still works. Not sure if they make them with metal gears. Just want others to be aware of that. We may buy another one.

There isn't a lot that can be said about an external drive--the only thing important to think of is reliability. I have had this drive for over two years now, and everything has been operating as expected. It's hard drive, while not very fast, will serve me well enough so long as it remains unplugged between uses. I'd like to take away half star just because there are several things people complain about--namely the extremely limited available capacity.
Good book. Worth reading, which must count for something, right? The plot twists are somewhat contrived. But I do think it's interesting reading.

This is exactly what I ordered when it arrived but I'm giving three stars instead of five because there were no directions on how to use this thing. If someone ever comes out with a good instructional manual - I'll be the first in line for it. And another annoying thing: you can't see if your microwave has any open vents unless you take the thing apart and look at it. My guess is that most microwaves have something called an "open vent" button, which shuts off the whole microwave.

For a "heavy duty" item (read: not cheap) this is just plain junky. It broke within minutes after installing it. The plastic connector that mounts the metal pole in order to bend it back into the hole snapped in half. Now I have no way of fixing it, and am left with an expensive piece of...junk. Don't waste your money.

As a long time fan of his music, I didn't make it through this book. It's almost as if one never got to read about the creative process--and why did he have to do all this?? No great insight, just an unfinished biography that might be interesting in a magazine article or on television. But there's so MUCH material here. He had many, many different genres and periods mixed together. For example, you couldn't enjoy music from 50s thru 70s. There's no mention there.

The story was ok, the characters were interesting, but I think it would be helpful if there had been more detail on what happened when people died, or to whom they went, etc. in other parts of the book. I am not a huge fan of the 'thrilling' series. Most novels have something exciting happening on every page. Not this one. The title says it all. Did these people think that Americans would read about or care very much what the British considered important in their literature? This is especially true since Churchill was from England. It seems to me as if this book tried too hard. Too often I had lost interest because of how many British titles are written while having nothing at all to do with WWII.

This product was extremely inexpensive. The quality is sub-standard. It lasted less than a year. Not at all durable. I've never had something break as quick from this type of product. i had to return it. the case was too thick and not protective enough. it would be good if you have a thin phone or no case.

This book is well written and fairly comprehensive. The only fault that I found with the text was when it came to the use of Chinese names (such as Nian or Zhukov) in conjunction with modern language. For example, instead of writing "Ch" for Chen which he uses today all over China, Yu would write "zh", or vice versa. Other than this error, the rest of the information presented is very good.

This was the most boring and stupid show I'd ever watched. If you were looking for some reality TV with actual people who try to be cool then this was not it.

This was bought as a gift for my daughter, who has the Iphone 4. She loves it! The colors are bright and fun. I would recommend this product to anyone. This product is as described. It stays where you're putting it. However, if it isn't placed on completely straight the first time around, then there will be some ripples that aren't flat. Otherwise, seems like a quality product. It's been through 2 washing cycles so far, no problems so far.

This is not a serious piece of home theater audio equipment, but it does more than enough for our needs to make watching movies and listening to music much easier. That said, don't expect miracles with this system. The sound from the speakers, in general, are pretty good. However, because they sit so close together (and you need all four speakers on at the same time), I really had hoped that they'd produce the full, dynamic sounds of surround sound.

This book is written by a woman who likes to have her way with everything. These bags are great! They fit great over a vacuum that only takes small bags!! Perfect for picking up leaves around your house or on our deck when using our outdoor hose to clean up.

I just got mine yesterday so this is a early review. It was super easy to put together. The shelves on it are extremely strong. Only took me about and hour, including unpacking it. This book is like reading a text book. I did not find it useful. A lot of the information in this book can be found on the internet. After seeing some other reviews about how helpful other's have been, it's obvious I'm too opinionated. But even if you need it, don't waste $39.95....

Bought one of these for my wife and the mic didn't work. I returned it and amazon sent me another since our first one had failed. Same problem with this one. I'll buy a real microphone, not these. For that reason alone, they are probably going back. The sound is fine but I've moved on.

 Rating: 2.

The first story is pretty good but the rest are just stories about crazy people and bad people. I've read a lot of erotica in my day, this one isn't worth reading. Save your money; I wish I'd saved mine. Now I'll have to spend time finding another book from different authors.

I had a great little vacuum for about 10 years but it finally died. This is one of the least powerful ones I've ever used; even with all three settings, it's hardly enough suction power. My old, much weaker hand held vac from Wal-Mart did just as well cleaning tile floors (and there was no battery to recharge -- only cord).

I bought 2 of these for my dogs. It's not so bad if you don't put them out in direct sun. My dogs have scratched very badly on their back paws but no longer scratch. Great product, easy to use. This is something I always keep in my house. Good for use with a lot of different meats especially. Very satisfied customer. It makes it fast and simple!

I really like the idea of a wireless keyboard but this one just doesn't work well. Very difficult to type fast and if you are doing anything in Microsoft Word where there is not space for your fingers than forget it - they don't line up. This results in lots of mistakes. It seems pretty ergonomic in general so it's hard to justify the trade-offs, especially since my touch screen does seem more accurate. There had better be something else out there. I'm glad I finally decided on this.

I really don't care for the fact that it doesn't have an option to play with a remote. It only has one button and that's it. But besides that, I'm satisfied. This CD was well worth the money. Thanks again Amazon...
I did not read much of this series. Seemed like it would be an interesting read, but didn't keep my interest very well.

The movie is great but the disk won't play. I am a little dissapointed. Is there anything to do about it? You have been warned.

I have to say that this movie is pretty terrible. The acting wasn't all bad and the action scenes aren't too bad. What ruined it for me was its attempt at a psychological thriller with an obvious "twist" involving the protagonist. If you want to see how far you can push a plot point, then by all means, go ahead - that's what I've done so far, having watched about half of it. But if you, say, want a good movie, you'll hate this.

I loved the colors in this set, but there was a little chip on one of my plates and since that plate is glass i had to send it back for a refund. The set could definitely do with some improvement. Not sure what ill do, maybe just go for plastic bowls. But still pretty. If only these chips didn't happen.

I have really liked this coffee machine and the way it tastes. I've tried a few different kinds of K-cups with both hot cocoa (in my tea bag) & coffee, and love them both. The water reservoir is large enough to fill our 8-cup mugs, too. My only wish for improvement would be if they made an iced latte. But since that doesn't come in Keurig packs, that's probably not going to happen.

Love my old model that has lasted for years, replaced by this one. The only good thing is the "green" feature. Otherwise, I prefer to use an old-fashioned manual opener. It takes about 20-25 seconds more than using this. Not sure why. Also wish there was a battery option as well so when it does need replacing I'd have one handy. Also, it's not as simple or easy on the pocket book vs. buying a basic electric unit and having those batteries replaced.

The title of my review pretty much sums it up... I just recently got this book and there were several pages missing from it. It was extremely obvious that someone had run the books through an OCR software program before sending them to a publisher. Some areas in this edition were more than readable, other parts not so much. I've ordered many textbooks online for less money and have gotten better quality with them.

I must say, it would be easy to get stuck with a book that doesn't work properly, but this is not one of them. For the price, you don't expect perfection, right? Well, I'm sorry to say there's something seriously wrong here. As other viewers noted, there appears to have been little care put into it. There are numerous typographical errors, spelling mistakes, and grammatical errors as well. This may just be how it was "scanned", and at $17.95, there should have been no reason for this.

For an actual book, there is a total of 8 pages in this "book." It's just over a 100 PAGES long! I didn't expect much at $3.00 but thought the story line would not be so bad. After all, it's written by a famous author! NOT!The book ends abruptly. No epilogue. Just like that. You don't learn what happened to any characters. It was as if the author stopped mid sentence then realized she couldn't continue. She simply got tired and stopped.

The glasses seem extremely fragile.

This book sounded like it could be a fun read. There is some interesting history here that had nothing to do with the main storyline. It was also rather repetitive. Also, too many people died in one book. For such an advanced society, there wasn't much technology at hand when the aliens arrived.

The instructions indicate the base of this feeder will not fall over but ours did exactly that. We are sending it back to Amazon. Do NOT buy it and please don't waste your money on it. This is a horrible design that falls apart in no time.

These are pretty good. I don't use them often as the small ones aren't really big enough for large muffin cups; and some of the larger cups are more difficult to get out than would be expected, but not a deal breaker. The color shows up nicely. They could have been better. But given I can find these again at Costco (they used to stock them) and because my little ones can't break them, I'm happy.

This product is definitely cheaply made. The sound quality was not good and the mic only worked one time on me. I ended up sending it back. Don't Waste your money like me if you want a decent mic. Spend a few more dollars for quality...get something that will stand up.

I don't normally leave bad reviews but this really deserves it. It's a great price and has great features as far as audio plays go, however mine was broken when we got it (literally)! You have to fiddle with the cord of the jack in order for any music to play through it. It also makes an annoying humming sound that goes away quickly even if you turn down the volume. The shipping box wasn't damaged, so I guess it's just defective on our part.
It definitely makes your PS3 controller look great. The price could be cheaper than what you can get it for.
Good coffe. Not as dark as Kona but excellent tasting. The best in my opinion. It is pricy but for what it is, well worth it!

This was a very long book and it really wasn't anything special. The ending sucked. I thought the middle could have been cut off completely as well since there were just some pages left out. In my opinion don't waste your time. Read something else.
Was definitely a page turner. I had an immediate connection with both characters. Very well written, would recommend for teens too. Looking forward to reading other books in this series.

Don't even bother. It took all of a minute for me to realize this was a waste of money. I won't be trying any more products by these authors. This 'book' is about as long or longer than one page with some blank space at either end. If you want information, just go find it on the web.

While it looked cute on my car I noticed after driving up a hill that the top left corner was cracked and falling off. I didn't send them back because they were only about 2 dollars(or would have cost me more to ship then what the case cost), but wouldn't recommend them. :( :( I love how fast these came in though, so just know you're going to get something that's probably not great quality.

These are fantastic earmuffs for the price. They don't have any padding, so it leaves my ears quite raw. The headphones aren't that great, but that's understandable. I bought these to use when doing construction work. Even after putting them in at a very loud volume and banging on heavy equipment, they're still holding up just fine. I've had mine for about a month, they get knocked around frequently, but you can't expect anything more from $10 muffs.

I was skeptical, considering some of the reviews, but with a young kitten in tow, I'm so glad we purchased this to keep our pup away from an area that she wasn't supposed go in. It is absolutely amazing. We are having guests over soon, and have them check it out. They will not be disappointed. This product was delivered super fast, as always, and easy to install. Can't be happier with it. You won't regret it! And it's cheaper than buying one at PetsMart.
This is not for me. I was hoping to have the fun and entertainment of this DVD, but I could hardly find any that remotely compared with the two other DVDs in the series. What a disappointment...

I hate this product and have been using it from the start not very long after purchasing it. This is definitely something for a younger person. My son likes playing with it, but he has to be within 5-6 feet of what game playing. It says that it's easy in the instructions which tells me there are better games on our kindle fire, you just need patience as most others do. Would rather find him some fun games.
Not easy to use even as an adult, because only one side of each page has to be used for each word.

I will admit that I finished the book, but it was mostly due to my compulsive desire to continue reading. However, despite all of this, there were not enough laughs in this novel and so much more could have been done with it. The premise is good, as are some elements of the plot, particularly a possible solution for our hero's problem when he discovers his brother is gay. But I found that most of it is just predictable trash. It's really not very realistic or even interesting. I'd recommend something else instead.

I just don't understand why anyone would rate this book better than 1 or 2 stars? It's nothing new, and there are so many great books out on the subject of "how-to-be" with little to no substance. My favorite title I've read recently is "The Magic Touch by Dr. David Wilcocks", which explains clearly what it means for you to be your magical.

This book is very poorly written and organized. The author should go back to graduate school for creative writing, or else get a new job. While there are some gems in this book, all that good stuff happens off stage.
Don't even consider buying or renting this book.

I had a lot of trouble with the other ones which always kept falling off...these are great they hold on like superglue! Also really fast delivery. Would def recommend for anyone who enjoys taking their dog out. Very pleased w item. :) : ) :))

After using it multiple times there is definitely a definite chemical odor and I can barely stand to have that sitting nearby. It doesn't leave the room smelling like anything though so if you don't mind an extra touch of smell this product may be for you.

This book came highly recommended, but it did give me some food for thought. However, if you are looking for a scientific treatment of life in space, this is probably not going to provide it. It also gives brief excerpts from other sources that were available at the time of writing. There was little new information, so there wasn't an exciting crescendo.

Our dog eats it as a treat. I also use this when my husband is sick and he needs to avoid eating much of anything. He can add this, water or yogurt and/or whatever else he may need in his food and we are able to enjoy some real comfort food. The container came with the expiration date that was two months from now. Very happy so far. If you have concerns about using probiotics, please read up on how they work. Some are good and others aren't.

This movie is by no means for the kiddies. The special Effects are pretty poor and there is nudity. Not recommended to children under 14 years, even then I think it's a bad show since there's too many nudity scenes. They should have left out most of it and cut down on the violence. If anyone would want a good action movie let them buy Total Recall or Ghost Protocol. For those who like horror movies...try House Of Wax instead. That one was really good.
These "cutesy" bunny ears are just plain ugly - there is no comparison to how pretty pink rabbit ears actually look on me.

I had read another book by this author, which was good, but not great. This one is nothing like his other works...just plain stupid and unexciting. Sorry, John Grisham you are a one-trick pony now...go back to what made your name in the first place (legal thrillers), instead of churning out these poorly written, amateurish novels. To top it off, there seems to be no substance on any of the characters at all.

It's hard to find a case for the Galaxy Note 10.1... Finally I purchased this one based on reviews. It has worked well. The tablet fits tightly and securely. Access is provided for all ports including MicroSD. The only suggestion - a strap or elastic loop across where you'd attach it would make traveling with it, very easy. And yes, there's a pen holder in back. But it's not really needed. Most likely, you'll want something more protective such as another case.
These are great to have around. They clean my GPS quickly and prevent some scratches. Worth having extras around just in case.
I've had this item before when they were made and loved it. I ordered two. They arrived today & unfortunately are NOT what I'm looking for. It appears to me now they've changed the product.
I'm really glad I decided to give this trilogy a try.

This battery was the right replacement to fit a Toshiba laptop. Great price, great product, but unfortunately it did not solve our problems. In the future if your computer requires these types of batteries, we suggest ordering them separately.

This is not even a book. I finished it simply because I've been invested more than reading anything else. The book does provide good insight to the current legal climate regarding this particular topic, but as far as quality goes, it's quite lacking. This should have sold as a pamphlet or booklet.

I'm sorry. I don't want to write too many bad reviews, but this book is totally and utterly unenjoyable. To have these characters so poorly drawn, it's hard enough to imagine them as two people. There's little effort put into them, which makes the whole plot seem all wrong. They're not likeable even for teenagers. It seems they were written by somebody else, because it looks like there wasn't a lot of effort.

For an "official authorization," this one is not very good. My college instructor required it for a research course, as did my fellow students and I who took it. There were errors in the book even before we had studied most of it; there was, for example, a question that stated "How many pieces can be shown to lie at an angle between 45 and 60?". Um, the only piece you have right angles 60 apart was supposed to look like half a square.

The story was okay. I liked that the main character had faith in her ability to survive and have a new life for herself. She overcame hardships with perseverance unlike some women who never make it through their trials to where they land. It is good to read another inspirational love story. With all of those books being out there nowadays maybe something should be done along this line.
After reading the other reviews, here in Amazon's listings section, I decided that I'd like my second try at an Elizabeth Lennox novel.

I've tried other products from this company before and they were pretty good. This one came very quickly. I was happy with it, but not great for the price. There are times when I'm in a hurry to grab that morning coffee cup only to find out it has lost its seal. The coffee still tastes good, but since there's about an inch gap at the top of the vacuum container, most time you have half cups because I don't want to go through all my scoops after just having brewed one.
Unfortunately within hours of opening it the wires that hold each side together had broken making it totally useless, waste or time sending them back. Very disappointing.

Nice size, easy to handle, and makes great hot water. I was hesitant at first because the price seems high, but well worth it! Now my mother can brew her favorite tea by herself. I gave it a 4/5 only because its difficult to determine how much water is needed. Also, you have to open one part of this pot each time after brewing (not very convenient) which does not make me love it any less. Overall, though, really nice product.

Bought it for my wife -- had no experience using one before. This is a good quality product but just couldn't get it to work with her iMac. It would be nice if the instructions were better detailed. So we called tech support, they suggested uninstalling and starting over. That did not work, then she put in more information about her computer, tried that, still could find little or nothing helpful on this one.
Not my favorite book...

I have had two of these things for about a year!! Every time the power button is depressed, it switches to sleep mode, and that means after 5 mins you have 2 hours or more waiting on it.........if anyone has any solutions let me know! Other than that, its great because thats all i use.....and this thing is SUPER HOT! so much so, i don't really even need my case with it.

I got this for my cat who is a fan of catnip. He loves it. When it arrived, the first thing he did was try it. First off, you have to make sure that it's screwed well because one little bit leaks out. Then, if your hands are slippery (mine aren't and I'm still not 100% at it) there might be some residue in between his toes. But all things considered, he just loved this, went crazy over it, so that's good.
I love this pot.

I wanted to like this, but it just didn't do much for me. Maybe if you were living in a different country or have no other way to get a lot of fresh air, might help you relax. If you're trying to sleep on planes, the small size could work nicely and I'm sure they are really cheap. Just not what I'd call effective. Also, the "pillowcase versions" aren't particularly comfortable or easy fitting either. This is kind of an odd design.

The first case I received was not for the phone. It didn't cost me a lot to return it and have been happy with everything else I've purchased from them, so I'll leave it at that. This one seems sturdy enough though. Great value

this isn't a book it is not an account of her life at all. there are stories and facts but all i got out of it was the author did do some things that you can find on youtube if your interested. I don't usually rate books so harshly because it's possible my fault for getting what i read to be more than just another autobiography.

I have ordered this many times thinking it would be good quality and great as the other ones I have. Unfortunately they just don't make them like they used to. You can see from some of these ratings that is a common problem with them. They use to work fine after about 3 months then the heating mechanism got really noisy or something started messing up between when you change water levels and how long it's taking for your coffee to get hot.
These are great. My cat goes crazy over them...she'll do just about anything. Sometimes she doesn't even want any, but she's totally hooked now.

It is a great case for the price, I have no complain. I only wished there were more color choices to choose from. The white gets dirty easily though. If you want a simple case, it's worth it. Plus it has screen cover and pen. Can't go wrong with this case. :D

While the book is well written and certainly provides an interesting twist on his story, it just doesn't have enough substance.. I had assumed that as this was written by him that there would be some insight into why he chose to go against what everyone told him. It's like if you were a celebrity in Hollywood who said "You can't sing, but everyone else thinks so". So much for your credibility. If they really want credibility perhaps those other celebrities should write books too.

I am very disappointed in this product. Not only did the price tag run way above what I saw anywhere else with prime shipping but it doesn't work. I'm not talking about a quick fix, as you have to go out and buy an adapter if your power supply has three usb slots or more. They need to make adapters like we used to see 20 years ago. This will be going back to Amazon right away. It is too bad because my laptop looks so cute sitting on it.

You can take the case off but it is REALLY difficult!! Otherwise, I love how lightweight this unit is. And of course its red! It fits my iPod perfectly! Would definitely recommend for others looking to purchase a great product. Also, with all that you get in terms of different color styles; what more do need? Great product at an awesome price.
the battery is not holding a charge and would be better if I had bought another battery...save your time find your old one now you can return this

I have a German shepherd and this food is very good for her health! She actually loves it. No stomach problems from eating it, no coat or skin issues! This product has been the only one of many brands we tried, so far that my girl enjoys eating.

I think this was the first one I've bought which doesn't have a belt loop. It's just too long when attached to you belt, and it's heavy. If you're going to carry it on your hip or back pack, be prepared for that much weight. On my job, where I spend about 6 days straight, I'll leave it there and use only the clip, so it'll keep me nice & safe. The clip opens all kinds of ways though, so if that's not comfortable for you, try using either as a wrist strap instead.
My kids love this! I really liked that it came in its own pouch. They can't wait to use it! Great deal!

The description said these where authentic Sennheiser, which I knew. However, when the package arrived in less than five days, it was actually a cheap knock-off. It had an absolutely different sound and fit to my original headphones. Also, they were all dirty (and scratched, and dirty, etc). Very disappointed with this purchase, as you would expect high quality headphones from Sennheiser.

I can't see how or why anyone could find this book to be funny, especially when it's packed with so many grammatical and vocabulary errors. On almost every page there's a run-on sentence which makes it difficult for the reader to understand what's being said. Even worse is the fact that a lot of them can (and do!) make absolutely no sense whatsoever.
The product arrived without instructions. There is no way i will ever use this. If you are used to reading directions, then this may not seem difficult for you.

I was very disappointed with this set. The picture looks like you receive 24 different stickers to add on. There is a photo of 25 stickers, in reality there are only about 10. And the sticker sheet that they give you for sticking them onto your fingers does not work! You end up having some huge mess and finger prints on almost every finger. This is total BS. Do yourself a favor by buying real ones if possible. My daughter loved the idea but it didn't work out for us.

This product did not come with a set instruction for install which I had to get on Google. It also seemed to be more cheaply made then original factory ones from Honda or Nissan. The power lines used are too close together and the wires themselves appear like they may break easily if you don't hold them. Be care when installing because those lights aren't meant to take much pressure at all. If these were installed in your old vehicle they'd all fall apart after about 1 year.

Like all books of a similar nature the only way to tell whether it's good is to read it - then go back and see what you missed. This work had me saying "yeah, right" but I know now that there are two more in this particular genre. Not a bad author at all, just not my cup of tea.

I loved the design of this bag but it wasn't durable at all. Within 2 months the stitching on the handles had started to break and within three months, there was a giant hole in one side. It's super cute looking out side though, just be aware if you buy it, you'll probably have to replace it. It wouldn't last long outside either, with any wind, snow or rain coming inside or even being carried around while closed. If i were you, i'd go for something that is more sturdy before buying this.

I love this book but not so much the whole series. I loved it(minus the end) because it was about these two people( Sam and Dylan) and their lives. Loved each character. But how can anyone like the main character?? She is annoying!! Not going to tell everything but.1. In the last installment of the series you think that Dylan is falling for Sam.2.
The necklace itself is absolutely gorgeous.

The picture looked awesome, the price was unbelievable, however I got what I paid for. It seemed that as soon as some kind of light hits it for a longer period of time or if there is any bright room behind it, it's quality goes downhill quick. A few days after ordering my lamp, and plugging my computer in, the screen went black. No warning light. So now I'm stuck with it. Don't waste your money on this one! Spend at least $25 more or get something of better quality.

This book is very disappointing...I expected so much more...there are many interesting things here but none of them seem to be the result of an honest investigation...The author may have some valid points and this book might help someone who really has no clue what he is talking about.... But as a scientist I would never recommend it for anything other than my curiosity and perhaps that could come later....The title just should not carry such large weight on most people...
I've only had it for a month, but so far the printer head is good. The scanner works like it's supposed to. It was easy to set up on my WXP machine.

I cannot recommend these for what they are. If you can wear them without any support whatsoever, then your ears will be irritated after about 2 to 3 hours. That is pretty poor quality at this price point. Don't plan on wearing them more than an hour or two before having discomfort. I'm glad a co-worker told me he bought the same pair and said his had different problems (sound issues). These are no better that any other ear bud in their price range.

Good product, reasonable price! If your looking at cheaper units, consider buying this one, its all you need from a remote. Only concern would be that the back button might eventually wear down on other buttons, but thats no big deal.

Well, I got this knife sharpener to sharpen serrated knives, and was disappointed with it as well (I use a hone). The first thing you noticed is that the blades only sharpened up half way - they didn't really touch each other. After about 2-3 tries, however, I started getting some cutting edges where they touch. That said, my biggest disappointment came when our cat scratched one of my wife's old knives into a sharp point.
Good product, it met my expectations.

I was excited to get this book as a gift. The first few chapters were funny and enjoyable. My son didn't seem so enthused with the book. Too cute. There must be better books out there that parents can teach kids about how to behave more properly than I am willing to pay for. Maybe this one is going in our "library?" if it ever gets returned.
As someone who loved the first two versions, I'm not sure what it's like to enjoy this one as much - but that seems a shame, because both aspects can come together...

It came with all of the necessary parts including some tools and instructions. Installing the screen protector was easy enough. However, the plastic face cover had so many scratches that nothing would work. The holes didn't line up but could figure them out later to fit right.

These are some great headphones, well built and with the inline volume control, they produce a much deeper full sound compared to earbuds or small speakers. My only issue is one side didn't work upon delivery, but I sent them back for an exchange through Amazon, quick replacement no question asked. Amazon rocks as usual.

No need for a review of the movie itself as everyone already knows what it is or needs to be said but I did want to inform people one thing: The DVD copy was made from an original print and not remastered so quality isn't great at all. There are several glitches throughout including audio breaks that happen in every 25 - 50 minute segment. Very annoying.

I like this product a lot, but it is small and takes up hardly any space. The main complaint would be the price. If you can afford it, then buy it. However, that being said, It does cut well and has good blade sharpner on its side. I'm not super picky about what is actually in my product. But if an honest person is paying $20 for a product, there should have to at least one other tool included. Overall - happy w/ product, no regrets.

I have a Kindle fire HD 7". When playing this on the kindle through my laptop, it just shows up as an unknown device. Will not play. Not happy about this. Would appreciate some advise or instructions. Have purchased from Amazon before with no trouble, but really annoyed that they won't play something that's supposed to be compatible. I'm sure their other products are fantastic though! The one star is for Amazon's customer service.

I was very excited to get this and started taking 2 tablets per day as directed. My appetite is way down. A little side effect of mine at first where my left foot got really tingly, but after a few days it stopped again. It took only 1 pill for me to notice that. This did not have any negative effects on my sleep or sugar levels so I'm sticking with it.

This book started off interesting, however, about halfway through there were very disturbing occurrences involving young children. There are many better zombie books out there, including THE HUNGER GAMES...

Did not do what I expected or needed. No different than plain water and just as much to use up. Should have bought regular shampoo on the boat trips this season when there was always too little clean water. It does take away your red eyes and doesn't bother my sinuses like other products. Good price, though but better for something else. This is probably best used where you don't mind a lot of suds.

This cartridge only works 1 out of 2 times now. Have to open up unit over and over again just to get paper through, then sometimes have trouble when inserting back into printer. Would like more support.
i like the story ok although it does go on quite bit but once you start the book is was pretty good...

This is the last of three albums in one package that was released by The Beach Boys. On all but the first song, Mike Love, Michael Love and Al Jardine sing background vocals; on this song,they are joined by bassist Bruce Johnston, who took what was left out of the group. I really like this album -- it's a pretty close listen to an actual concert. Of course, there were more things going on for the audience besides just music and sound effects.

I've been reading the series since before it was available as a Kindle, and have liked them. I don't know why, though. This is perhaps a good book but not an enjoyable one in my opinion. There's just so much bad poetry here. It wasn't that I'm particularly fond of it, or with the book. But it gets to be annoying. The worst thing about this is that while most everything has at least basic rhymes, few rhymes---if any--- make sense. They're just.....words.

I purchased this product and it came with no instruction on how to use it. When I tried for a return they wouldn't refund my money because it was opened, although that wasn't indicated in the description. Not all the chargers are bad but I'm rating them so low only cause some of mine didn't work

I ordered this for my 6 year old, who has a small collection. When we finally got it, it looked as if the eyes were not actually painted. Not really thrilled with this. I think most would have returned it. Disappointed!!! :(

This book is awful. The author doesn't know where the story goes or even if it does. She just keeps jumping from chapter to chapter. So when you finally do read that this baby was stillborn and her father died when she was a little girl, your heart will break. It does not take long for her love interest figure in but by then you're so sick of him as well. They are best friends at first but he pushes off their relationship on her. A bit too much like Twilight.
This music is alright i guess. It's about average. It has no real beats to it. If you want heavy metal, don't buy this.

I was excited to read this book. Although the story is really not good and not at all true to what happens, it does have an interesting plot line, which could make for a very enjoyable read. Their personalities are pretty inconsistent (although many reviewers like their different personalities) and, frankly, boring; one has literally no personality whatsoever...

this stuff does make me feel full. but all the other protein drinks that i used (optimum nutrition one meal shake and powerbomb) gave me similar or worse results. this is worth about 2 bucks an ounce if that. so im disappointed. my search for the perfect drink continues...

The book is a pretty poor piece of work. Lots of typos and the author uses incorrect English words several times. He does not write that you should clean or polish your nails BEFORE applying polish, but instead says to let them dry completely then apply 2 coats of polish. And there's nothing wrong with using nail polish before it has been thoroughly cured. In fact, he recommends it.
This was an ok story with a predictable outcome. The characters were well developed & I would read another book by the author.

I love this blender. It's easy to use and clean. It blends everything with ease. The only downfall is it's a little loud if you are blending anything. That being said, it does blend very well for the price. Would buy another one! Good Buy!

I thought this would be a good toy to go with the dog toy of similar type. It turned out to be very hard plastic. Excellent product at great price. Fits perfect. Very difficult to clean smudges off before applying, would highly recommend.
This is our third JW Pet product.
This track sucks.

But, it does keep them inside it, so there isn't much of an odor. And if you're buying this just for scoop, it's great. Otherwise, probably look elsewhere.

I wanted it to be more than a bunch of short stories about the adventures of characters. Did not read what appeared to be. More like an ad which was boring enough for me that I quit reading it. It was free, why pay when you can get something good at free?

No where on this product does it list any ingredients. This is a very cute book. The stories are interesting and fun for children, although there isn't much substance to them - just silly stories. There are also many errors in the text. For example, on page 11 where talking about "The Night Of The Little Zombie" or "How I Met Our Mother", we're promised we will find out how he found the baby alive with no dead skin. But, no, there's not even one sentence describing that. And since we're only hearing about him finding his little sister alive, that's impossible.

I received this machine very quickly in the mail from Amazon. It was easy to set up but then right off a hook snapped off. After doing some more research on how to deal with it and trying different parts of the mixer, it still won't turn on. Not only am I disappointed because its defective out of the box but...

This is the worst movie I ever seen. It was made by a guy who has nothing to do in films these days and his name is John Carpenter. I'm not sure if you guys believe me, but it looks like we are all going insane. And so many movies start off with pretty much useless action sequences. But with this one they just kill people. It's hard for me to even review that. Just watch it. You don't have to. But then maybe you'll be less depressed.
I love Earl Grey.

I bought two of these units as a Christmas gift for my daughter, who had asked extensively if a new one would be available. We liked the fact that there were 4 different size brew sizes and many other useful features. This unit has worked perfectly each time we have visited to make it brewable. My daughter just loves it. Great features include easy clean-up, temperature control, programmable timing etc. Would buy again (and have).

The case is nice and seems like it's of good quality. Unfortunately my phone does not fit in the sleeve with the protective film on it. If it fit, I wouldn't have any problems but since this one barely fits around it, I'm returning it. But if your only intent for buying a carrying pouch isn't to carry extra battery packs I'd give it4 or 5 stars.

This book is very poorly written. If you are interested in writing a good story this isn't for you. The flow of the narrative was all over the place and it seemed like some chapters were cut short even though I have never read any other similar books. A few examples would be describing the main character's house she lives in. It goes on in one sentence why did he decide not to build something where her children play, then three paragraphs later explaining what has been done about his decision.
the product does not work, in spite of changing cables, turning it on, etc... to no avail.i will return it. not worth the effort for a simple device like this.
Good price good quality I love it works great when you just want a quick cup of coffee. The glass is very nice and not too heavy or bulky to have on the counter.

Had bought 3 replacement cords to be given as Christmas gifts. Very disappointed with 1st cord purchased. Cord came apart at tip after less than 2 weeks ( had used approx. 5 times.). Second cord worked ok.

These bowls are smaller than I'd expected. The larger ones are good for my dog who likes treats or snacks every so often. They get knocked around in the dishwasher. I can't think of any real disadvantages to them. I've washed them many times. So far no rust spots. If they did start rusting out now and then, that's not a huge deal. They aren't expensive, but since Amazon sells these same exact Bowls at Target, Walmart, etc. cheaper for less money, it's worth it.

I bought this battery because of the very competitive price and had two day shipping! The product that arrived was a generic brand, made by Sony which is just fine for normal use but not much good in an emergency. The unit will hold charge as long as my stock battery. But if your power goes out, don't count on coming home to see it fully charged. If you leave your camera running all day, I would think that this wouldn't be too big a deal.

this product is no good it only works if you put the cable in with a straight across shape of cable. otherwise its garbage. i bought one at costco but they sold out so there are now less than one. thats when I knew to get on amazon. bad buy. buy better quality!!

I purchased this book hoping to discover some new ways in which one can start a business. The author talks about doing business the way it was done when he does no background research before publishing his book. Most of that content is available for free on various Internet sites like myspace.com and ehow.com. Even if all you need are web addresses and email addresses; Google already has those information at their fingertips.

This is by far the worst product I've purchased from Amazon. It's absolutely impossible to apply bubble free using any of these products: > Bubbles, dust particles and fingerprints. The plastic tabs leave behind adhesive residue so there are tons that you can't remove. It took me 3 tries before I got one on with minimal bubbles to try peeling off because of its adhesive. Finally, after trying for 15 minutes, the rest had air bubbles. So it left my hands covered in dust. I'm going back tomorrow.
This was supposed to be brand new, but it's not. It had some marks on it. It could have been used as an old CD or cassette tape, not new.

It was good for a quick read during my lunch break. Pretty typical and predictable. Didn't even realize it was a short story until after I ordered it. But not really worth paying that much for. If you can find this on sale pick it up because its free :) but I wouldn't pay anything more than $1. Not going to spoil the ending, however, you'll see when u get there. The only reason it's getting three stars instead of one is bc the writing itself wasn't that bad.   Rating: 3.

The author did a wonderful job setting up the story and bringing in some interesting people to help along the way. He is one of those authors that really makes you feel like you're right there on a journey with him throughout his journey! I was hooked from start to- pretty soon I'm trying to figure out where he will take me next. I'll be waiting for Book 2! Just wish it hadn't taken forever to get here, but that's my fault for not paying close attention.

The book covers a vast area of topics, but it does not make as good on this subject matter as previous books. It is too academic for anyone who wants to become involved in business development. In general, I did not enjoy the book.

This is perfect for your home office or cubicle. I use it at my desk to keep work out of sight and have yet to be able to find it. As long as you are planning on carrying only a few things inside, this bag works perfect. A small binder fits inside. It keeps all those tiny loose items that might just make a trip across the bay impossible. The top section also has elastic bands to hold pens, tape, extra staples, etc.

This game provides just what I've been looking for: enough challenges (easy or hard) for my daughter who plays on her own every now and then. It's hard & boring after awhile, but when it's over no complaints from us.

This book is completely worthless. Its about a guy who was born with autism and learned how to communicate by copying others. He doesn't have autism. There are some helpful parts of the book, but all in all, it was garbage! Do NOT recommend! I wish people would quit writing negative reviews for books that actually can help people, like this one can. But hey, at least I'll get more money from amazon.
it didn't work!!! i never got it!! don't buy it.

This film is really bad! It looks like it was just made on a $25.00 budget, although some parts look good and the sets are cool. I love horror movies even though they lack budget in today's times. The plot of this one actually scared me for about 10 minutes, then I realized that all these scenes were there to show off the new CGI. All in all, I'd skip it.. or better yet leave it.
This is not really music. It sounds like elevator music made by an elementary school child. It's definitely garbage.
I have a little Shih-tzu and these are great for her. They hold her weight pretty well with no issues at all!

The colors in this set were not what we expected. They looked much better online than in person. The fitted sheet was cut pretty short so it did not really cover all sides around our regular mattress pad. Overall still satisfied. Very fast delivery.

This product worked as soon out of box but would not operate to take a single photo. On and off switch does nothing even when removed from camera. It makes a loud clicking sound if plugged in directly via USB connector. Will be returning it. Thanks amazon for hassle free returns.

My kids love this story and now I wish that it came out on VHS but then they don't like the cartoon anymore. Maybe when we are adults we'll watch it. But for a 5 yr old and up of course, it's way over priced in price not to mention.
This review isn't for someone who regularly sweeps their home with one of those handheld vacuums, but I just use mine to vacuum all my hardwood and tile floors on a typical day-to-day basis.

This book was just okay. I didn't connect with Katelyn at all and felt as if she didn't really know what's up most of the time even when she has new information. On top of that there weren't many hot scenes. The story wasn't very believable, in my opinion. What girl goes to a strip club knowing her dad is also running it? And why doesn't anyone mention this before? Then there's the whole pregnancy thing. It never seemed believable or realistic. That part kind of bothered me.
this is one if those books that tries very hard (not too bad though in fact)to be funny and then comes across as boring (and even painful to slog through)
The product does not disappoint. It gives off plenty of light.

I have had the battery for 9 months. The product was shipped timely and looked like new as described. Unfortunately, it failed within a month. After several attempts at disconnecting various cables from different computers, changing battery, everything else, to no avail, nothing worked. No matter what port on my netbook (the computer has 2 ports) powered or off, this replacement batter will not charge. When plugged in with power cord, laptop recognizes its getting power, but when fully charged, battery refuses to charge above 60%. 
 Rating: 1.

This author is very new and for the most part I enjoy her writings but in this instance she did not pull it off. She was all over the place with her characters as people seemed to be a little too convenient always coming along when needed or even showing up. At my age it's hard enough without having to figure out who has been sleeping around if I'm already wondering that about myself. There are definitely some wonderful aspects of this book especially the relationships between the two characters.

I was just looking into a product that had great reviews from consumer reports about no sugar, calories,fats, sodium, etc... And thought of these. I am in my 60's and suffer with osteoporosis as well, trying to be healthy. A woman recommended them.
The book was in very good condition. My son's teacher loved it! Definitely great buy over the stores around! Great Bu. Thanks again Amazon! :)
I love the colors and feel of these coasters. They match perfectly with my bamboo bar set. The price is great too. Very happy customer.

I bought the Kindle version of this book thinking it would be much easier than trying with a paperback. It is not. You have take an active part just like in real life, which makes you feel that you are really there.
This item works well. There were no instructions for how much water you need per time interval.
Exactly as expected! My husband loved this!!! He uses everyday and works perfectly. The color of black matches perfectly. It's perfect. Thanks! Great service! Thanks! :-) :-D :D

As other reviewers have noted, the only thing I can say for this DVD is that it's a shame so much excellent work wasn't released. The worst sound I've ever heard on any home video, not even by VHS. What sounds like some old radio plays was in fact re-recorded tracks. If you're interested in these films then check out theUltimate Collectionor theseWarner Brothers Movie Legends Collection. These are superior DVD's and don't look half bad either! Don't waste your money here.

This heater looks beautiful and has been doing a very nice job heating the room for two months now. I have noticed one thing to be aware of which is that because it's made out of glass it can get scratched fairly easily. If you're ordering it, you should keep this in mind. It's not enough to make me return it. It really doesn't bother me, but just something worth knowing. Great purchase!! The price was great, but even more impressive about how quickly it shipped after being ordered.

This unit is the one to buy ONLY for those that don't mind only getting half of what is advertised. When I bought it from Amazon (thank you) they said there are 7 different versions and mine was supposed to be a 7400. It wasn't. Instead we got an unbranded version with the following problems...1) If you place more than 1 video on your computer, it will not play them, rather just freezes up trying to download them.
Not as heavy as some but if you have to move this, be careful. Otherwise great size and color of the wood grain:)

My sister bought an Etrex Legend before I did and said she had no issues with hers, so when i upgraded mine, it was the same thing... No Problems...easy to use, works great right out of it...I just wish you could upload stuff on my computer.. Not sure there's a way. But I am very happy with it. Great product, but if mine broke today like hers did, that would be bad!!
Well, I read through this entire collection in about an hour.
Very enjoyable book that has been well written. It is fun and entertaining without being too long or overly complicated. Good reading whether you like action stories, crime fiction, etc.

Just got my disc set a couple of days ago. It looks awesome! But, as many others have reported, several of these discs don't work. If you try to watch one, it stops in the middle, saying "region error". So I'm returning it. Amazon is great though.

I am a fan of the series for years. This is another weak entry in that long line of movies with little to no story line. As usual, Johnny Depp was excellent as ever, but the poor story, bad script, even worse acting, made every scene boring. If this wasn't on my video shelf, it would be out from under me!! My advice: Don't waste your money unless you are dying for an addiction and need something, anything. Otherwise, check online or wait for it at Blockbuster.

This product was a real dissapointment. I guess I'm one those who expected the movie to have great sound effects and graphics.
