Instead, it is just another DVD in an ever expanding array of movies on DVD.When Disney tried its hand at having this film, they were simply not able to keep up with some very good movies........I would suggest you get Star Wars The Clone Wars, or Return Of The Jedi instead, from Disney movies.

I got this case to fit my Macbook Air since it's much lighter than the iPad mini. What does it do? It keeps your MBair safe in a slim case. You can put any type of laptop inside and still have space. It's not meant for anything thicker then that or any other laptops with optical drives. The only thing you might want if looking to purchase is some sort of carrying bag as there are no external handles for this case, at least what I'm used to.
Got this for grandkids. They enjoy it and I like that their is a chance they will be playing games instead of watching tv.

This is good if you don't need so much power. Just not as loud and powerful as I would like it. If it didn't cost such a great deal I wouldn't recommend them. The speakers are good. Would probably get them again but next time I'll have to spend more money to get more power for the sound. They were fairly cheap but there just isn't that difference when comparing them.

This is quite handy at home. And it looks very nice. It serves two purposes:1 - Keeps your phone on the night stand where you can find it quickly when need it. But its light so may fall from this nightstand.2-Makes sure that you're not sleeping with a dead battery. I had to put a note of this into my Samsung S4. :(

One star is too low!The lamp itself is fine the issue are with the metal shade that wraps around the light bar! They leave a thick seam at the front which leaves dark black marks all over my walls no matter how much rubbing alcohol you use...we had to buy another lamp...

This battery works as it should, but one big downside. It was advertised to fit the Nokia 521, and it is not even close (and I've tried a zillion batteries from every vendor on Amazon), so I had to go through the hassle of returning it. Don't know if my phone model required extra thickness or what (maybe not), but that's really disappointing.
I really wanted these to work, they fit nicely in my ears as others describe.

This does the job, and it works well. The only problem is that if you use your phone after it's fully charged, which takes quite a while, it'll kill this power supply pretty quick. There was also an internal short in my unit after several months, leading me to believe I got a lemon. As others have noted, their customer service is excellent, but they will not honor warranty. What we ended up doing at our local electronics store for a replacement charger wasn't bad either.

I got this because of the price and brand name. After using it for a few times now however, I'm disappointed with it and how cheaply it's made.1.) It takes me quite some time to get my hair totally dry after curling it. Not only does every strand stick together, but even when dry, there's still that big wad in back. The first couple washes, by hand, is better than any iron I've ever used.2.) Also, there are no temperature settings.

The story was interesting, but too many "spoiler" words kept being used to add something of interest or significance just in time for the end (I do this all the time with Stephen King books). This should be about 1/3 as long and would still include enough detail that a reader wouldn't figure out everything. I think someone else should attempt a book like this; it actually has some things going on. A couple months later, I'm on Amazon.com to buy another Deaver book.
For what it's worth, most of these kinds of mattress pads seem like crap. Too thin, not long enough, etc.

Did not work. I was very disappointed! Tried it on many TVs with the same result. The other cables worked and so did a computer monitor. But my TV couldn't see them. Not sure why but I'm returning these. Too big of hassle for something I've only spent around $20. A real shame. It's probably just my particular TV, which is disappointing. I'll try again. Might have got two bad ones out of 100. Or maybe not.

This is the second of these, I have several and love them! Only issue has to do with shipping. They are heavy glass even though they look like plastic. Had them shipped three times but first was broken on delivery. Second time not broken, so hopefully this will last longer than some other brands do. Good value if you need a tall glass! Like the clear glass.

Bought 2 of these for my 3 year old and 4 year-old twins. They enjoy them but I was hoping it would help teach colors in a different way. The blue ones don't even go together very well. My twins do know their colors though. So not that great on learning with this. If you already had the first set, buy one then combine them. It ends up being like having extra magnets or something.
The toothpaste is fine but it smells terrible. I'm going back to Colgate for no sugar toothpaste. It's much better. Wish amazon would sell it.
This book needs an editor. It really needed some serious proof reading and/or proofing. It's not hard work but putting out something that isn't free would have been nice.

This product works as advertised. The adhesive is really strong and sticks pretty well, but it leaves gaps all over. Also, this stuff gets kinda messy, so its not the best for people with kids. I made a big mess on my desk, too. However, because of how small our hands become after typing up many documents, sometimes its worth wiping down the screen instead if I'm leaving it in one place. Overall satisfied though. It came with two pieces too.
We set up this as home network. Our daughter has one at her house which she loves so when i got mine, we loaded it with photos on usb drives and had our son setup it.

I purchased this kit to go with my Epson WF-M10720 Color Photo printer. It is a great value. The scanner works perfectly and produces excellent results. And it did not cost me an arm or leg like buying one of those expensive scanners. Overall, good value for the price, but if you want professional quality images, buy something higher quality. But then, these type products aren't made in Germany. Also, you don't have to use that bulky power source.

Well this book is a great story, although it was badly written in my opinion. The author used too many commas and he often skipped from one character to the other with no warning. And some of his words were just plain wrong! He told us about Jack telling him they are brothers but at that point I know what it means. So where he jumped into saying these characters were brothers when they weren't it made me wonder if English wasn't his native language or something.

As I was taking my last round of antibiotics, every time another would come on the next day, I would have to take them again. The side effects were horrible in about two weeks, until we came across our dog with some severe infections. Her eyes looked awful, she had massive sores all over and the little pounces that kept getting stuck in her throat just became too painful.

I loved this book until the end. It was so unbelievably unrealistic that it took away from how awesome all the other parts of the story were. The ending makes no sense and leaves you with many unanswered questions. Why is his dad such a jerk? What do they have in common!?! This had just about every element of a great book. However, when we are left hanging like this, there really isn't any hope for the rest of it.

I'm sorry I bought this. The sound is great but the earpiece falls out of your ear constantly. It doesn't seem to have anything that securely attached it in place so they fall out. You spend so much time adjusting them you lose all feeling and quality due to that. If you're just looking for a phone then this will do fine. But if you're really into music go with one without head phones. You'll feel so lost when trying something new. Also, it's not compatible w/ Itunes.
The case works great and we are extremely happy with the quality of the product.it fits like a glove without compromising protection.

It never came to DVD in Australia, did not see it anywhere. The sound has been switched from DTS 5.1 to PCM 2.0. I don't know what happen here. This would be OK if you are a die hard fan, But as usual most things that people want us buy comes with no warning about this.
It works ok but the light on it went out and i have not been able to use it.

As other reviewers mentioned, only sound worked. This is definitely not worth $10 let alone $20. Do Not Buy, even though they don't say it. I'm very disappointed... I've thrown away shipping cartons, etc.

I love a good mystery but this one just didn't really keep me interested. Perhaps it was because there were so many other characters with their own plots and problems to deal with. The main two couples in the book barely even interwove as they tried or failed at every scheme that came up. Just too much unoriginal going on. I'm not sure why anyone would think this is great literature. As mentioned by others, there's no real depth of any characters. They are pretty much cardboard cutouts.
It can not read the memory card when we first used it and there has something wrong with it, I am going to replace it!

The first one I got stopped working after a week. Amazon replaced it. It also quit working within a couple of weeks. I'm replacing again and just hope this time it works out. For now, I'll buy something that is sturdier with better reviews. Even if the 2nd version doesn't last more than two weeks, my money would have been well spent. If you value your money, don't waste yours. Update 6/3/12. Replacement worked great right out the box. Hope #2 lasts longer before I replace again.

I had bought this and one other book at the same time to try out on my 2 1/2 year old. She is in preschool right now but she will have the first lesson of these books read by another person then repeated back to her. The instructions are fine for her but it does not seem practical that only a few times can be done with two people, or else they would say several things without saying anything!! So we never do it.

I recently watched this movie and i cant believe that amazon wants to sell such horrible movie. This is a total waste of money which should be deleted from the website. Dont let anyone show you this. Its torture for your senses. The worst part was when u find out what really happened. That just pissed me off!!!
This product was very cheap and flimsy, it did the job but not what i expected, will probably be replacing it soon with an actual cover from a local store or wal-mart!

Very disappointed as the instructions were minimal and useless. Tried several of them to make sure I got it right without looking like a moron. No luck. Now have this piece of junk sitting on my desk unused, but I've just wasted money ordering it.
These things have a piece that slides on to keep your glassware from scratching. When we first saw them, we thought it would be fun to store our fancy looking glasses.

I have tried 2 of these now and they are both too small to even be useful. The plastic is so thin that it tears if a dog chews in them at all. As far as the construction, the one we received was just thrown into some bubble wrap, when it arrived there were only 4 of 12 on all sides, not enough for me or my dogs (3 each).

This is the second book I have read by Mary Alice Monroe and if this one was indicative of her other works, than she would be my pick for "worst author." There has got to be a better way to write than what Marilyn has managed here. The entire plot line - that the father of an 8 year old girl must hide evidence about why he didn't find out until now - is contrived, unbelievable and unbelievably stupid.

This is my first coffee maker and it has been amazing. I love how the water can be removed from the carafe without having to pull out a cup. It brews very quickly. My husband usually gets up 20 minutes before me for our morning drink so we don't make anything in the morning. All you have do is open the top of this one push some handle then take your time drinking what comes out. Great design too. Love it.

While the product itself is great. I just wish it was listed where and when a person would need to buy it. It should be easy for people who don't know anything about this product. It's more expensive than if you could get some of your medications in one bottle, but I'm not sure how much extra work that's going to add considering it's really no different from buying pills. Maybe having them mixed in would help though. Either way, I'd still love it! The price alone makes the whole thing worth it.

Just as others have written. It's a wonderful show with an excellent message that would be lost in such poor editing. What good editing does? For this to even get released, it needs someone who knows the craft of filmmaking and gets on top of things before releasing it. If I hadn't seen part one, I'd never know this. It ruined what could otherwise easily been one of the greatest shows ever made. To fix it, means giving it time - but it's not worth it.

I have a large black husky that is the absolute worst dog owner/tenant ever! She does not eat any dry food or give ANY of her treats wet and she has never had skin problems, which was why my vet wanted me to spend all this $$ on pet meds. So we decided to try this. We've been giving it to both our girls for about 2 weeks now (with their kibble in morning & after eating) and we haven't seen any changes.
I have loved all of Grisham's novels. However this was one that left me cold. I found the story to be boring. A bit slow in comparison to his other fast paced thrillers.

My 10 year old who loves everything Harry Potter loved this book. She was so excited to get it but the first chapter of book 2 is missing. The pages that are missing have been taken out and pasted on in another place. Do NOT buy this!!!!! VERY disappointed! Amazon should seriously think about fixing this! It makes me very suspicious if there isn't a better quality version available. I would rate this as zero stars if possible.

After listening to the other 2 discs in this box for over a month now i have come up with only one thing that is good about it. First and foremost, it does contain an incredible amount of music. If you enjoy hearing new classical or symphonic music then look no further. However, after buying all 3 cds i noticed some real flaws here. From beginning to end there are numerous instances where the sound quality just isn't there.
I purchased this to help with my sinus issues...it isn't really as good a product for me so will give it away and try another brand. This price is much better than the local vets.

They look good but when they are on, the glasses pop out of my head because where they clip holds down on your ears with friction. When I wear these, I'm constantly adjusting them, putting them back in place, tightening them...etc. Not practical for me. If you put these over eyeglasses, then there is a definite pressure that presses against you, and if you're wearing eyeglasses...ouch!

These have been the best headphones I have purchased. Good sound quality and they stay in your ear without any problem. So comfortable you forget there even on. And it has a nice feature for when people call because with this technology now you can talk to them without taking the buds out of your ears. Plus they work on anything that's bluetooth compatible. Great product.

The price was excellent. I received this very quickly and am absolutely thrilled with the product. It works perfectly on my 2007 Pontiac Vibe. No problems so far after a short period of time use. Much cheaper than OEM at other online auto parts stores for sure. And since it doesn't use an aftermarket connector like some others, it's much cleaner when compared to OEM. I'd highly recommend if you need one.

I love how this book starts out. When it first started reading, but then the story got boring, there was just to much detail about nothing that had happen in a few days of reading it! Some parts were not believable, because if they werent true on any part in this book, it would be boring.

I have read the reviews about this product and most of them are negative with almost nothing positive. This is what makes me buy from amazon. The price was low but it is a good quality product. Most of all it works as advertized. Thank you to manufacturer for making such excellent product. My only comment here is that when assembling the product, make sure they give two screws inside each piece. For some reason mine came loose around both screws..

This book and its accompanying CD is of little help, especially if you are attempting to learn how to perform the actual practice test. The CD does not contain all information needed for an accurate performance. There may be exceptions but this seems to have been a poor effort by Pearson with regards to producing anything other than self-study, poorly illustrated material that would mislead even the most novice piano student. They must hope so because they charge almost $100 dollars as opposed to free.
A bit of trouble getting into it, but after that, good product. Still figuring out how best use it. Recommend.

This is a good product. I just wish that the company would give you two screws to attach it to, instead of one. All in all pretty good. But maybe if they gave us two. We screwed ours into wood studs with no problem. My husband did say that sometimes he feels like he's going too hard because its difficult for him getting his fingers in, but I think it will get easier after time and we'll need less force. It's nice not having our hands right on either of my nipples.

I bought this to replace a cheaper one that I'd purchased years and it's been better but not as good or long lasting as the old one. This new one is still fine for now, though. If it goes out I'll probably buy another. It's got great reach, seems much stronger than my last one, easy to manuever, pretty quiet, comes with its own dust bag. It works very well in corners. The hose extends all around, unlike my previous one. Good product. Would recommend.   Rating: 4.

These were no good. I received them only to find there are missing parts and the connectors don't fit. They say you get what u pay for - cheap products but expensive if they break! Save your money, buy better quality. This will end up in the trash :{
Was excited about getting my new tablet so i ordered this for it because it was cheap.

At first I was quite excited about this vacuum. It has incredible suction and is easy to use on pet hair (pet that gets into carpet well). However, the motor starting making noises after just a few months of light use. After several phone calls with customer service (and more than 15 hours over two days) they claimed it wasn't covered under warranty. This vacuum only had 5 years warranty from Electrolux. Customer Service refused any reimbursement for repair/replacement parts or shipping fee.
This seems to be almost too many recipes that use ingredients like ground up dried beans, canned peas, etc.
This is okay, but not very high quailty! The colors are pretty and it works well as a small desk lamp. I would buy again.
Works great as expected. Came quickly and just what we were looking for. Will definitely order again when needed. Thanks.

This is a very nice looking and well made item that I would buy with confidence again! I especially like the fact that it has it's own little drawer inside which stores all of my spices. The price was better than you will find in an appliance store too! :) Great product, great service. Highly recommend! A++ rating from me.
While this can be informative, there are many typos as well as misinformation.

Very convenient and easy to clean, doesn't take up too much counter space. When you first use it the tea leaves have a horrible plasticky taste but after using twice it's gone! It does brew very slowly, I am usually making two cups at once, one of which is only for myself, so that was just perfect. The down side with this machine, however, is if you're looking to make more than one cup in your day (obviously can't beat that) then you'll probably need a bigger machine.
The title makes it sound like an actual science book, but it's just some guy ranting against evolution. As a Christian, I felt cheated by the title.

We were not able to use this for what we needed. I should have read more about it prior purchase. You need software with this which will cost $75. Will never buy from these people again. They misrepresented item when describing features.

When I first read the reviews about how good this heater was, i thought they were exaggerating. How good can a little space heater make?! Well let me tell you, it made everything hotter. Its like my room was more comfortable! Now, it's all because of the heater, nothing to do with me. I'm so happy...oh yeah and no burning smell. A must buy if you need something that makes your place warm.
I LOVE this. It has been perfect for the windy weather here lately. We play all around our neck of oak country. Our dog even prefers to play outside with us now instead of inside.

The book started out okay and seemed promising. I thought to myself that this will be a good read, however, the plot of the story made absolutely no sense. It was almost laughable how everyone in town lived like it never happened. It's as if they had all read the same soap opera novel. This is obviously not realistic or it's something an unexperienced author would attempt with no preparation. Please, save your money for another book. I'd say it's really poorly written.
This phone has limited useful applications; however, it's pretty cheap.
The first time I ordered this item it came in a couple days later which surprised me since it's not shipped on time.

This is such a nice case for the price. The only thing that I don't like about it is how tight you have to make the velcro straps so it isn't flopping around your neck. My old one had some pretty short straps and would slide down my shoulder when jogging or walking. That was much better but after 5 years of use, it just wore out. Still going strong though even bought another one.

This is the first time i have gotten a bad item from Amazon. So far, all I had to go through was the return process. However, I am returning this product for a refund. The CD arrived cracked, but there are two tracks that are ok. One has skips throughout them. The cover looked very used. I'm sure it wasn't used previously. If you purchase this, make sure you test it. Mine doesn't deserve one star. It might be OK when played in an LP player, which usually does not skip.
It's okay but not as good as it could have been. I don't think I'll buy more of the same in this series.

To my suprise, these cartridges are not actually for the Brother MFC 7840. They do NOT have the correct markings on them. I found this out when attempting to install them onto my printer. They fit, but there is no ink in them at all. The real problem is, and even more disappointing, how ridiculous it would be to send two packs of these back, only to then find that they didn't work either.

My daughter loves it because of its Hello Kitty design. It is very sturdy with no parts to fail after many trips through a dishwasher in between. There are only 2 small spots on top that can be punctured by objects or utensils, but otherwise she has had no problems with it. Great product! Thank you!

This movie was really cool. It had everything I look for in a movie!!! Great characters all with great personalities. Awesome action scene. A good balance between comedy and drama. An awesome ending that just left you speechless. If your looking for an incredible movie to watch then this is the one I'd recomend.

This little jewel is a joy to use, and cleans up just as easy - I am very impressed with the ease of cleaning it. Now on my second one, this one was so cheap that I gave it for Christmas... but not before making sure I would use all parts of it. Then after about three weeks, using every day or two, something happened inside. The white part (that covers where you put food in & take it out) kept coming out. So, now it's useless.

The author has many other books which are better. This one was too long, way to much description of the places they were at. It seemed like she copied her book out of a library and scanned it into Word then wrote it. I don't know why it got so many good ratings. Maybe people need something really light and easy going when trying to go back from a tragedy. But if you want to read about real life tragedies read some of Jodi Picoult's books.

This printer may be very cheap but when you make it do one thing, which is print a document and then put the thing back in front of your computer to print, it's not worth it. The software doesn't tell you how much ink there will be, or anything else about it, yet somehow if I were on a wireless network that automatically printed so many pages for me, this would end up costing me more than just buying cartridges with an estimated full page capacity each day.

I know I'm in the minority here, but even though this is a good game, it has one major flaw. The first "act" takes anywhere from 15-20 minutes. To play the entire game for me needs to take an hour at least. If you wait over 20 minutes, you can never beat everything on your list. And once you've finished all 25 acts, there ARE no bonus levels that are available unless you pay more than five dollars per game.
There are two sets of settings to decide how long you'll have heated water...

The book was in good condition. But the audio portion of this product is useless to say the least. I would not recommend purchasing it if you can't read what part of a lecture is. My son had difficulty keeping up with certain sections because he couldn't tell where you were supposed to be talking and thus wasn't getting the full lecture. This item needs some work before selling. It sounds great but fails miserably at delivering it. Buyer beware. You'll have no choice.

This camera was not very user-friendly at all. The first time I went to use it the shutter button got stuck. We could hear and see things flash on screen, but no picture. After spending almost a half hour trying everything, we finally gave up because this is too big of a headache for me. Now I'm just going to get a point-and-shoot type without all the complicated settings. My advice, do what everyone else does.
The case is too tight and causes some apps to force close, not worth the buy. I won't recommend. Its cheap as in price, would do any good at all in a drop test.

Great for a quick read when you need to relax and unwind after work. Good job Mrs. Evanovich - I enjoyed the twists in this one. As with any story by an author she writes one book that is slightly different than all her other books or at least as varied within the same storyline.
Great way to charge my phone. When it's not plugged in I use my phone charger as it's supposed to do when powered off. The little indicator light does come through though from time to time.
In the beginning of each level, you are asked to press two different buttons, in order - "Pass" or "No pass.
Everything looks sturdy and good. It does what it says. If you're looking at this, then you know there are cheaper options out there.

This is actually my second purchase of these cases. The first one was purchased through Amazon at about half price (about $10) last year. It has been great. After almost two years, we bought another because they work so well and are so affordable.

this is great for a little quick work on items around the house. i have used other power grinders but none quite as powerful. it does hold more than enough beans to grind enough spices or nuts in half an hour. it's very easy and fast too use (keep you coffee hot without scorching it).only complaint was one of the buttons fell off right away, had no clue how that happened though - never got into the guts of anything.
I wanted this to connect my projector in a room that doesn't have much light but the signal is too weak. Very disapointed.

If you have a real bad case, like me in which one of the sides cracked after a year, then avoid this product, my case was under warranty until October when I saw that they were no longer covering the cracks. DO NOT by from Acase.

My girlfriend was looking for a fun way to play cards at home. Not having any previous experience with this game I wasn't sure exactly what level of difficulty would be appropriate but decided that either the card dealer or other members of one team had a significant competitive advantage so perhaps they were using the rules in their favor. After three games it is obvious there are serious flaws and these can only get worse before getting better. If you're interested you should look elsewhere.
The stories were very touching. Sad but heartwarming all in one :) well worth reading! would recommend. Good book.

I like the price and it's light weight but I'm unhappy with it because there's a seam in it. Like the one that runs from chin to shoulders but on the right side. Not sure if this is normal or not. It just has me worried as it's new so don't know. My other hats have no seams except in the crown. The color (red) was nice. Very lightweight, almost unbreakable for such a lightweight hat.

After a long search looking for some decent looking, quality shoes I purchased these based on the reviews here and elsewhere, mostly concerning size. These sizes seem very small. I'm typically an 8.5 in all brands of sandals as well as, flip flops for that matter. In this case we go by the EU size chart. For my 9.5 feet, this shoe fits pretty tightly around with just enough room to wiggle my toes but not be uncomfortable. If you have larger feet they may work better.

I did not have any of the problems with this product that other reviewers mentioned. My problem was how to charge it. It seems as if it will work, but after about a half hour, your ipod is dead. If you let this recharge for three hours, then nothing happens. What good is that? To me it doesn't make sense. For those who may think its just my unit and others are ok, read on.
I ordered these because in stores they were almost $15 each. The same product is twice as expensive at the pet store. No problems with shipping. Fast service good product, I'm very happy.
Too short of information. I should of known by the price tag. Not worth the price. If you know nothing at all about home improvements and renovations this is not for you.

I was quite pleased with the purchase once again from Amazon. It arrived ahead of schedule and in excellent condition. My only concern is that it does not work well. The suction cups seem to have little effect on it, however it stands firmly and looks wonderful around my living room table. This product definitely has a unique look. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase, for what we paid ($32.00) its still cheaper than some others I've seen.

This does work well when you have room for a unit with an unusual shape. However, if space isn't available, then go without. It barely fits my Garmin Nuvi 255w. My husband and nephew each bought their own units so they each got about $20 worth of product which seems pretty good.
I'm glad I picked up one of these books. It's a quick read, though it's always hard for me to get comfortable with short stories.

I have read all of Clancy's books. This one was not up to par for me though. It just didn't seem as tight and believable even though it had the typical elements of a Clancy novel. If you are looking for an easy read, this would be good but otherwise I'd go elsewhere next time.

I loved this item from the beginning. No problems at all. I like how you just insert a memory card into it and let it go. Easy to set up no problem. The video was high quality when the camera worked. That is until about 4 months of use. It now constantly turns off by itself while in use for only 20 minutes. This makes me have to turn it back on again as fast as possible every few minutes if not more, so my son can see what he made happen.

Like the look of this item, but it leaks when closed. I don't know if that is a flaw in my particular mug, or maybe all mugs like this, but I'm glad my new mug has not yet leaked. I'll keep it, however, just to show off as much red as possible on each side of the lid.

I bought the whole pack of 12 as i had a very nice piece for my living room but one year later and a lot more abuse it has become badly scratched up. In spite of its age (I've owned it over 15 years) I'm sure most people would not expect something like these from so expensive an item. The other thing that really bothered me is that the metal bars are exposed - which means if you were to drop anything on them they'd scratch your floor.
I received this product, installed it, and in 30 seconds it broke. It was a huge waste of money. Don't be like me. Get your products from someone else.
Works great. Good value comparing to buying from Samsung.

I was reading reviews regarding the color of what you see from viewing screen. This is what they have to say about this picture: "It appears blue due to too many lighting." In other words for someone who enjoys bright lights, this picture has them in a cloud all over it. Other than that it is an okay picture, so far. Still trying to figure out how to use it, but hope with time, it will become easier.

These were nice for the price. I am a larger cup size but still very small. You can see how good they will look in my pictures so I'm going to order again. The color is not deep and looks black. They do seem like regular jegging.. Not super high priced looking. Good price though.

I bought several of these cards expecting to use them in several situations with different lenses. This case is not good for camera protection as it does not fit well enough and when the lens needs cleaning it's a mess because you have no other means at your disposal, plus this foam pad was never glued very well at all on any side which leaves an impression so that removing it requires taking care or tearing it.

I found my favorite part of the book were the sections where they traveled back and forth in time through all kinds of places together. Very interesting to see what happened. When you go on that trip, it sounds like such a good idea when your having trouble with getting into bed. I was excited to get this but couldn't finish because there are just too many characters and times travel is necessary. I'd pass until next summer or maybe I'll reread it then.

We took it on vacation and used it to watch movies, use the web camera, upload pics from our phone, connect with Facebook etc. It worked perfectly at keeping us connected. As long as you have your own wifi signal, it's no bother. This was only really a problem when we were able to reach out to friends and they couldn't connect. They would come over for movies but then can't stay connected or just say no because I don't get my signal strong.

I was looking for a little spice in my kitchen and thought this, would be the perfect thing. I have to admit that some of the recipes are good, but, they just don't appeal to me very much. The first time I made anything from this book, it turned out ok, but I've had better luck with cooking on my own, or finding cookbooks elsewhere. This time, I'm not feeling particularly adventurous when it comes to cooking, so its going back to Amazon! It's great if you like fancy desserts.

Great product when it's working, but it quits working after a while. My last one stopped right before my warranty expired and only lasted 2 years. When that first stopped, I tried to contact the company (the main source for the watch) about repair and/or replacement. After sending them all of my info (which they responded back), I was told by email "We have received your complaint and we will return this item within 1 month.
This book has been out for years and yet I have the nerve to offer a positive review?! It's full of grammatical errors. It also doesn't describe what you're expected to learn from it.
The product that you will receive is definitely NOT a "2 pack, 1 syringe" item.

My daughter had been looking for this type of case and couldn't find it. She uses it everyday to carry her iPad. It is cute but durable. She has received many compliments on how cool the cover looks. I would definatley buy more. The only thing that sucks about it, it's a couple bucks.. lol But, you know.. with children they need all of this. This product did what was said in description as far as quality. Very happy customer.

This is our second juicer. We had the one that was similar to this for at least three years but it finally bit it. Based on reviews and seeing how much better a masticating juice machine costs we decided to go with this. It looks super cool in my kitchen sitting about 8 feet from where I'm working.
Very nice little knife. It fits perfectly in my keychain pouch of my purses. Nice edge on it as well.

I've been very pleased with this purchase. The pillow cases have held up perfectly - no pilling, snags, etc. I was worried that the set would be somewhat sheer, as many other reviews mentioned, however it's not too much. It's more just enough to show off color in your bedding. Overall happy so far.

The case fit perfect however we had our back facing camera on and was causing problems for pics with flash lighting. It also has an opening where you can take pictures/videos which some people find annoying, that's what I'm using it for. Nice case otherwise.

These headphones stopped working within a week. The left ear started producing static then wouldn't work at all. I contacted Amazon and they immediately sent me another pair. Unfortunately, the replacement pair also quit after two days. If your head is large or you have extremely sensitive ears like my wife, these might be okay with regular listening but if you plan on using them while moving about or even just sitting still don't waste your money. Even for thirty something bucks, these are not worth it. You get what you pay for.

It's a great concept, but the material is cheap / uncomfortable. The plastic stitching at wrist area has come apart after about 3 uses. Just feels cheap, flimsy fabric: will never purchase again or recommend.
Product as described, easy installation, works great, what can one say about a plug? There were some videos where instructions were lacking, this was not the case here.
I bought this product for my Samsung DLP TV. It was supposed to fit and it doesn't! Very upset. Don't waste your money.
When I saw that it went on sale, I took advantage of it. I'm really liking what she's been cooking up.

I was looking for another type of travel book on Thailand. After reading the book, my wife and I had changed our minds regarding buying a second home. I have no interest in owning anything Thai since we could not afford to buy everything necessary. The book is written like it isn't really about Thailand, but more about how you can get rich doing this trip. In conclusion, if one needs some money as an investment, they should focus primarily and solely on that direction.
Toby"d best cd since the last one. Saw him in concert in Memphis just 3 weeks before with this cd. It was awesome. Great buy!!!!

It's a great little machine except for the fact that it's very easily to spill. The water tanks are all over the place so when you try and move it the counter is on top of them. Also mine just died after four months. Very disappointed - don't waste your money. There's plenty out there that's more reliable.

this book is great for people whove no clue what it is...too hard to use as i thought. you have some words but not much. i wanted something easy and simple like when i was a kid..but the way its worded makes u think that its easier than that. so if yknow any ways on HOW TO USE!?! plz help me out please.

I bought this for my 4 year olds birthday party. It was a great hit at the party, but after one use, I can not get them off of me! They have all fallen to the floor with the batteries in place, and none ever turned on anymore. The seller is great, so I had no problem getting replacements.
This book is too superficial in describing what life might be like living off grid away from a major city.
I was able to use these on my car tires about one time before the black rubber hose had a hole in it and began leaking water. Do not waste your money.

This product did not show much of a "scents" when using it. It smelled like regular soap! I would never buy this again! In addition, the package was completely destroyed. But I'm sure it would've made my bath water nice. Unfortunately, that wasn't what I used it for. And shipping costs more than the product. Not worth returning. Too expensive to return so it's already trash.

The camera is okay and the software sucks for Windows Vista. I would prefer to install a standard driver. The driver that came on CD installed but did not work. So even though it seems OK it isn't really very good,just like any other inexpensive webcam. You are talking about blurry video. Not impressed with this product. But Amazon made things simple as always. If you want to take long shots of people it's good enough... if not.... don't bother.

I've used several different flavors of Friskies wet food over my cats' 30 years with us. This one is a miss. It seems to bother all three cats who refuse at first try. The ingredients are not as fresh or natural tasting as others.

I did not order this. I'm sure there is something that does the job but you must get rid of your black plastic trash bags. Now every time when company comes over it's a total disaster. Don't just throw them away!!! Also bags don't fit perfect and they are difficult to open everytime. They rip apart too easily. The bag doesn't hold anything inside either.
I can't wait until this thing shows up! It's going on our daughters ipad mini for her birthday. She'll be so excited! :)
Good case no complaints what so ever. Great fit and feel.

The product is not the same as you would receive in a restaurant, but it works and you can't beat that price. Just don't try to fill them too much. It made my son very happy! Would recommend. We purchased two! Great gift for your favorite sports fan!
Charger is great.
Not what was expected, didn't read enough but might be good for others to know about my views of this.
As we had hoped, this pillow is perfect for our bedroom. It appears just a little larger than what it really size, but still works great for keeping my husband comfortable.
I found 3 pieces of junk which would never stay together..don't botherIt makes sounds when you try to move it. A piece already came loose from inside but they haven't replaced it..

I have the newer models of this vacuum, and as other reviews state it does not work well on carpet. When i run this through my room the brushes don't glide in tight places at all. You can tell that its a powerful unit but if you want to use it for carpet then buy all new bags!!! A big pain when you're cleaning 4 kitties worth out there. I'll probably be buying yet another vacuum soon just so I never waste money on this. :( 
 Rating: 3.
This is my favorite hat that I have purchased from Amazon. It's comfortable enough to be worn around the house during winter weather, but it's not too warm or heavy, either.
Very light weight which means it will fall easily.
One of those old movies from my young days but still worth seeing if you are interested in French history.

The battery never really worked from day one. At first it would even last a couple of days without me having to plug my laptop in or charge it... I thought i was dealing with an older notebook but over time the problems have gotten worse, and the only way for it not to drain completely is when its placed on charger. In short dont waste your money. Even if you just want a charger as this wasnt intended for.... its too good to be true. Look elsewhere.

This book is about some college boys (good guys?) who take a road trip from LA to New Jersey, where they stop at numerous points around the state for random high school and amateur wrestling matches. The characters are somewhat bland but reasonably well-developed. And there ARE wrestling matches, which seems pretty standard fare these days, albeit with a whole lot of violence.

I am not happy with this camera. It stopped working right away, never had it more than a year and half before the battery door latch broke. The camera still worked without the latch, but that wasn't very convenient, especially for traveling. Once the little piece just fell off, you are stuck with no way to close it. So now my entire vacation is completely ruined because there won't be photos from our snorkeling trip. Don't buy this camera, it's horrible.

The one I received was really nice. They fit my hand well. It is just a little hard to sharpen the serrated edge so it will cut as good or better than the straight edge. No problems with shipping and would give them thumbs up.
If you like the first movie you'll want to have this one. The first movie can stand on it's own without watching this. It is a lot different since it isn't very realistic.

I have a 6 week old Shih Tzu & we were looking for something to give her some relief from ear infections. We started out with little tubes in my dogs ears everyday but our vet advised against that until she was older as their immune system would suffer. He said the infection probably wasn't going away soon so maybe an occasional application of this solution may help. Well I received it, got down on one knee and asked my wife if it worked well.
I love my Roomba and I'm so happy to be able to buy an extra battery pack for such a low price. The shipping was quick too!
This was an item that came with a baby shower gift. The quality so far has been horrible. It looks like something you would get out of ebay, very cheapy looking.
This review will be short. There is too much bad blood between Thomas Cleary and Dorothy Sayers.

Ok, if you want to read and have a little fun trying out some of this stuff in your car, get it. I don't think many people buying that car do so because they care about what it sounds like other than the engine noise. So most reviews on here give away too much information or show pictures taken from different angles and make judgements based on that. Also, for those reviewers who mention being loud, you're right as well.

If you want an inexpensive way to charge your phone while driving than this is the item for you. It worked really good when it arrived and that was about a week after I bought it. The second time i plugged in my device and set it aside to recharge it, when I went back today everything seemed fine, so I just left it there. However now on day 3 of using it has stop charging all together.
As an artist, I purchased all of their products from paper crafting to oil pastels. Love everything about them. No regrets there. But with this product, The glue they use doesn't hold at all.

My daughter loved this game, and it is a great idea for teaching the basics in math to older kids (who can't do subtraction yet). But she was unable to find where one answer would get her the right answer, at least not when there were two possible answers. And even after going through all of the trouble shooting suggestions you can, they still aren't always helpful (they're often only partially successful; I think there's an error associated with some suggestions).
Batteries did not last past first week. A waste of money. Not sure whether I received old or used batteries. Don't buy.

I bought this product because it said that all the tracks are in stereo and some aren't...the picture showed both formats which gave me good confidence but when we got it, there only one format on disc one...and the second of three music videos was only Dolby Surround...NOT 5.1. How disappointing. It's not a returnable item due to time restrictions so I've kept it....what a waste and I'm disappointed overall. At least they should warn you how many songs contain ONLY ONE format.

I found that this book was well worth a second read. It is an easy read for anyone interested in the subject of reincarnation as it provides several new perspectives on it. While there may be different opinions about reincarnation, everyone will find one or two ideas that he would not have seen otherwise. Even though my view of reincarnation differs slightly, most people could get something out of the book.

This thing worked great for the first year, then started to just randomly make popping noises while attempting to play. My main gripe is it would play a CD one day, and not another until I did some unplugging reseting back in the CD. The second year was slightly less crappy but still very spotty performance, especially with using MP3 discs. In total though, this player lasted only 10 months. I'm so disappointed because it's been such an expensive investment.
This tv had been well reviewed so we bought it, mostly because Amazon has such good returns policy if it doesn't work.

This book should be taken off Amazon as something that could lead to future attacks on our country and Constitution. There is nothing new here for those who have been reading the news. It talks about where we are now, what needs to happen in America, but not one word of how America must go forward. How can you believe this? Who wrote it? The people in Washington want everything their way. Why would anyone even talk up such a book, considering all that's going on.

This book is like most other self help books. The author takes what everyone believes that you need to do and redefines it. For example, one of the tips in this book, say you want your children to have better relationships, instead of having them not talk for more than 5 minutes, it recommends talking every day. That sounds a lot more reasonable, so much better! Well we all know that's impossible, right? It would be unrealistic anyway, just because I agree with that! You don't have to be happy about it.

I originally went to the salon when i had my hair cut. While waiting for me and her assistant they let me take home a sample packet. The scent was great so i thought id see about searching online - came across this product and after reading the ingredients noticed that it works really well as an anti-dandruff shampoo, conditioner & detangler.

This is my first review ever. It's not even worth one star. I hate it so much when people try to pass off garbage like this. A poor copy of the real book, poorly written, no depth and way worse for being in modern times. Who was this written for?? If you are an educated person or a Christian (don't care what faith you have), there are many more better novels out there. Save your money.
Good story, but somewhat repetitive. It's entertaining for awhile. You could skip chapter four and not miss any plot lines. Enjoy reading!

I really think that you can only watch this once and forget it. If you're like me who loves movies with an intelligent plot, twists in the storyline, or a truly emotional ending, you won't find it after just seeing The House of Sand and Fog. Sure, it's predictable, has absolutely no point, bad acting, bad script, terrible effects - they could put today's computer generated imagery into any other movie now instead and I'm sure it'd be worth watching. But to see everything on screen, then for nothing is just...
The pens are a great idea, but some were completely dried out. It is hard to get ink flowing when your hands shake throughout reading a note.

The product did make a good cup of coffee, but it cost $16.95 for the entire unit, including shipping. I was shocked and disappointed. Don't waste your money. If you want to have hot coffee anytime during any day without wasting all that gas then don't buy it. My wife will get mad when she sees me brewing on this device. We do like good cappuccino's in the morning. However, at $8.00 per shot that's over twice what my average latte costs.
I have had a cuisinart food processor before but got tired having to clean all parts every time after using.
At first I loved it. But, it broke after 3 uses. The handle broke. It just did not hold up.
I use them to dry fruit and veggies. Love how easily they get rid of the moisture. The best thing for drying fruit!

I have read this book several times but it just does not grab me. It probably is the author's intent. And in saying that you cannot put him into a category. He writes about some things that, like religion, are quite universal and so can be discussed more widely. The reason I did not get swept away was to much time spent on trivial conversations with his friends. There is too little written about himself for someone who is making an actual life change such as this book.

Best tasting coffee I've had so far - great flavor. I am not a huge coffer drinker. This is now my favorite brand. No bitter after taste which surprised me. Very happy with this purchase. The price you cannot beat. It's cheaper in the store than on Amazon..

The characters in this book are so incredibly dumb. They say idiotic things, like when the girl is trying to get into the library she's on her phone and someone comes out of their room knocking at the house who they think it is, then proceeds to tell her not to. Just dumb stuff. I couldn't finish reading this...

I read this because it is from an Amish author. There were too many errors and the plot was not very strong. It appears Ms. Jones wants to write more about her background - maybe in a sequel there will be some closure. Too much religion added nothing to character development but rather gave the book a preachy feel.
This phone works like it's meant to. The Bluetooth setup was extremely easy to set up. You just slide in your contact list and sync with my Blackberry Bold.

I'm an avid reader, and while I've occasionally gone in the direction of a paranormal book, this has to be one of my all-time worsts. The plot was very thin -- it should not have taken me only 5 pages to find out who did it or why. It felt like I had read it before, many times before. I just could not get into it. For those reviewers that enjoyed it, give it another try.
The characters are not fully developed. Some of them speak too much. But still it's entertaining enough for such a short story.

I ordered this product so that my husband and i could talk on the cell phone hands free. Unfortunately it does not work in our car. It is too large to put anywhere close enough for you to hear. He now has a bluetooth by motorola. Hope this helps. Amazon seems like they always have good products. Maybe I'll try getting them for me sometime soon.

This series is just plain entertaining. Great acting by an ensemble cast. Interesting storyline which keeps it interesting and suspenseful. I would recommend this to anyone over 40. Give yourself a break from the daily news for once. Enjoy!

This book is short with only 26 pages. If your looking for a very basic overview then this would be fine but i think people wanting to understand economics will most likely get just as much from reading my blog.
I have used this product in the past and is great!I use it when i go camping, great to clean house,car, etc..It cleans better than other sprays....Very happy with purchase...

The case arrived damaged. On one side it was not on straight and the other side had gaps around some of the edges. It wasn't that big but enough to notice. There were also scratches in two places where they could have removed plastic from a cheaper product. It is usable if you just have time to fiddle with it. I would look for something else otherwise. Good company though, fast shipping too. You get what u pay for. A bit pricey though. Oh well.
The product is exactly what I needed to protect the screen. Easy to set up instructions and very easy directions.

Not much new or exciting in this book, which is a disappointment for me considering so many books were included as examples. However, that being said, it does provide examples of various kinds of web sites and services, including the ones I would consider more 'important. 'Overall, worth reading to refresh your memory on what you already know about building websites.
Good price and service on all items. Hose appears just like original. Now we don't have as much frustration when using our compressor for quick jobs.
Really love this thing.

We recently had a dog die of kidney failure and have noticed lots of loose stool in general. One thing I know is that the dogs are not always hungry. The first day we gave them these they came running with crazy look to their faces. They also wouldn't eat them, but we thought it was just because it was new. After two days feeding them more, they'd lick around on the plate until one of us would try again before stopping.

Was looking for inexpensive bed and found these. My two cats did play on it, but was so thin it ripped through in a week of having it. It's okay to order something that is very inexpensive, however if you expect things to last, I don't recommend these beds. You can find much better deals than this one online.

I'm actually quite disappointed with this product since I thought it was bigger but it's actually extremely tiny. It seems kinda delicate to me! But I'll keep until it breaks. The design is nice and there are all things in there.

The cover of the book states that it is a comprehensive review of all aspects involving basic skills for the practical application of Tai Chi. It includes many illustrations, diagrams, and general diagrams. However, I was disappointed by how little explanation there really was. For example, does not explain the differences between Western Wing Tzu & Tang Style Tai Chi: they are both just simplified movements based on four basic principles.

I ordered these for my new MacBookPro Retina. The trackpad was not working. My order stated that it would work for the 13 inch but they were too small. It cost me $9 to return them. Don't waste your time ordering these- you get what you pay for. Lesson learned!
This thermo keeps all my beverages nice & cold! Good buy if you're looking to keep drinks cold and/or hot. Definitely worth it! Love the color choices :)
I've used this switch as an extension with three external hard drives. It gives me four additional USB slots instead of one.
Good oil filter. Works like OEM. Not a whole lot. Filters are hard enough to get these days. This was a good deal. I'd buy again.

I bought this book for my daughter, who reads to her two year old son. He seems to enjoy using his little fingers. The only complaint is that the rhymes are not always consistent. There may be some simple things happening but they don't rhyme and it's difficult to understand what he meant by it. The first few books were fine. This is why we ordered another set. It's a good book.
This is my third Dan Brown book, and hopefully won't be the last. His previous writing was entertaining while still being true enough in some aspects that you could accept them.

This is an excellent piece of equipment. Very good quality construction. The only downside is, if you use the large pot, and are cooking for 2 or more, I really cant imagine using a smaller pot with this dutch oven on it as they would likely be touching in the middle. It fits a standard 6 qt.

Don't waste time in buying this...it's a piece of junk. I bought my first one and after the second use, it fell apart. The design is so bad, they didn't even thread all the way through once. And then, not only did both sides come apart, but about an inch from their junction, the material separated. It was also pretty much impossible to reassemble properly. I'm still keeping it, as long as no one messes with it. But don't waste your money, go buy something else. 
 Rating: 2.

I have a white Maltese and he seems to like the flavor of these, not just for the treats. They aren't too hard or soft either. These are my favorites over any other brand. Great price too. A little bag normally keeps him busy chewing on these treats for days.
One worked for a day, battery compartment did not fit right and could easily break off. Don't waste your money

This is not a book I would read again. It was so boring and poorly written. The story did not have an ending. Most of the time when you reach a point in most romance novels it does say they live happily ever after but this one didn't. You never hear about what happened on their honeymoon. So much for romantic stories. They just ended. What a joke. Will think twice before buying another novel by these authors. Very disappointed. Read at your own risk.

I'm glad that this book has some positive messages in it: don't let negative people rule your life. This is good advice for someone else, as it seems a bit condescending on my part. But the illustrations are cute, and there are, indeed, pictures of many animals throughout it.
I am not in a position to do this justice. This camera came so fast and works great. The instructions were very easy for my husband and myself. The price is perfect. Love it. Thanks Amazon. Diane C

As with the other series, I loved these books and could hardly believe they were coming to an end. This book, however, wasn't great but not terrible either. It did pick up towards the end when the focus shift from her family life (I actually found myself skimming through some paragraphs) to what might have been a more believable storyline.
One of my all time favourite series. Although I'm writing about it again after three years I've forgotten some details so a little revision in memory wasn't necessary...

I was very disappointed with this purchase. When the product arrived it looked as though someone had returned it. The box itself was missing all markings. Not only that, but there is no manual that comes in the box. You can find a similar looking one on eBay for under $20. Please do NOT waste your money or time buying this. Go to eBay and purchase one there.
These are great bags. No bad smell at all. The price is good too. Great for keeping your poop in good shape when traveling a lot. Just throw them away anyways. Would recommend this.

I can now vacuum my carpeted and hardwood stairs without carrying out the heavy canister vac every time. Love it! Have a Hoover Wind Tunnel that is great too. But I don't like lugging it up all those steps. This thing seems pretty powerful, but so far haven't needed to use it. My husband did for many jobs. He had to empty both tanks several times. It's kind of big, but not really difficult or awkward. I'm going through about 12 bags a year, with two dogs (and 2 cats).

I bought this on the advice of a friend to use at work when listening to music with my iPhone 4s. After getting it all set up, nothing worked, so tried using a different iPod. same result. I'm returning it. Not sure what will happen if there is an exchange, but would have hoped Amazon would've stood by it's sale. No such luck. Good luck with that.

This book is good if you're just starting to learn about the human body. I am a medical professional so this was not what i had in mind. As far as content, I'm very happy with it, but didn't get more from it than i already knew. It did include some tips that you wouldn't think about, or would be new too most people.

I have never been one to get into novels with explicit sex scenes. But, as an avid reader, it is just not my cup-of-tea, that's what the other reviewers wrote here. So, all of you others who enjoyed this novel, then by God be my friend--I beg you--and don't read anything else.

The product arrived in a timely manner but was not as expected. This didn't work properly and the company couldn't explain why it wasn't working so they refused to replace it. Would have been nice to know that before I bought one. Will think long & hard about buying anything from this company. Their customer service is poor. Save your money. Buy something of better quality. A waste of time for me getting the speaker out & returning it over 6 weeks ago. Wish they sent one with correct product.

I'm sure I will get a lot of crap but if you love this song then obviously buy it! The CD came in great looking condition and was shipped very fast!As for the song, to me is not as good or even as good maybe like three stars. Some people say it's one of her best songs so I hope you guys don't listen with my points about it being average. If you're a Britney fan or not...

This CD is not worth one star. There are no good songs on the cd, they all sound like it was copied and pasted. The only thing keeping me from ripping this off my computer to burn a copy for myself would be that I paid a couple bucks...
The sound is not so bad. It serves its purpose. But I only paid $19.99 for it, and it sounds that cheap. Would shop around next time.

I bought a 3 piece set of these sheets and have thrown them away the colors on all three are so faded with white showing through you see red thru pink and green in some cases don't buy not worth buying get real cotton for now on

I read this book after it was published in the UK, and for a moment thought I'd have missed something but on reading it, found that I hadn't. As someone who finds fantasy pretty entertaining, especially when it's well written, I've always considered Terry Bisson to be one of my very favourite authors, right up there with Peter Straub & Robin Hobb, because he's written so many books - short stories, novels, etc.

It's awful. I tried one of them and it did nothing. Another time, there was even less than nothing on the brush. I'm gonna give up trying. These brushes were just too expensive. Not worth it. This brush doesn't seem cheap at all. I don't recommend people to buy these.

When it arrived and unwrapped the cable, I realized how well built this was. It is rugged with thick insulation on each side of the cable which makes all other cables that come in contact easily slip off. This wire has an internal strain relief to prevent stripping or breaking, just make sure you keep some heat shrink tape handy. The jacket feels like quality rubber molded into a sheath over copper wire. A great product for home users.

The idea is to bring together a family that lives in the Boston area from various points of view. From the viewpoint of those who worked at the time (there's an awful lot of names, including people from New York City) it's more like historical fiction. This part reads much faster than your average novel and you get absorbed into it very quickly as you're not used to that.

Don't by if you are trying to go cheap. The product shipped quickly. It worked for about 30 minutes then it started taking longer and longer...until I had to unplug it. That was it, my USB drive would not read anymore!!!! No more products from this seller.

This does what its supposed to. Fast. Easy install. Great speed. Looks clean. Seems like a nice unit. Worth the money. Only reason to knock off 1 star was price. Its much higher than other SSD's out there.

After reading the other bad review of this book, I am not sure that it was quite true for all. When you consider there is limited information out there, and especially when you think about all the things that can get done through science, engineering, and math, it's an interesting thought. Perhaps there are better books available, but if we took nothing else into account, this seems to fit in with a good part of our past knowledge.
Don't recommend this product. The software works by plugging in a USB key into the computer but not connecting it directly through USB.

It's not a bad product, just doesn't fit the tablet I have. The seller was good to deal with so at least that's one positive. If you have an Acer A500 - this will NOT fit. Be careful when ordering. Maybe they should change it on their website and/or put "Not recommended for A500s" in big bold letters! At any rate, it's going back and we haven't decided if we're going to get the exact same case in another color.

I was a bit sceptical about purchasing this item. Its reviews were not that great and i did have reservations regarding the quality of sound. However after all that,once it arrived I knew exactly what to expect from its performance. This product is excellent for any price range when considering price,features,and performance aspects...BUY IT! YOU'LL LIKE IT AS WELL

Did not care for this one at all. There were so many pieces and what a mess! Don't know of any other uses for it after receiving it. Maybe using in garden when tomatoes are ripe. Will be looking with more detail next time.

The product arrived quickly and was easy to install but the instructions were a bad joke. There are two ways to install- go slow as they say or be sure you have someone help you. Once installed, it appears this is going strong. It would hold up under a car washing machine without sagging but I don't intend using that much. For occasional use, the price cannot be beat. In fact, one person could do this, for more moderate use get 2 people if possible.

The quality of the book is good. I am not happy with the cover art, it should be an illustration from a movie, or another image that depicts what you are buying - not just black and white drawings. It's okay to buy a children's book, but this one left me feeling like I was tricked into thinking it must teach some valuable lesson. Not worth your money! Do yourself a favor if it's for sale at any bookstore. This version sells for $4.50 in stores.

The cover doesn't fit right, too big, I won't be able to use it. My wife also tried it on but the front piece did not fit, it was just a bunch of loose strings,no snap. Returned and got her something else. Don't waste your time with this one.
My dogs love these. They are great treats for them. So far I have had no problems, and they arrived before the time stated on my purchase.
Interesting concept but poor execution.
After reading all the positive reviews on this product, i decided to go with it.
This thing looks so real! It does have teeth marks though. My dogs loved it. Easy to attach too. They still play with this.

I should have listened to the other review of this story. The hero is a complete twit. He goes from one extreme to another and his supposed love for the heroine after only knowing her for several years was unbelievable given all he had been through. My advice, save your time reading it because by book 6 you probably won't really be interested enough in continuing with any more. Skip 6. You will lose yourself much faster than going through page upon page of silly conversations between these two pathetic men.

It's a great coffee for breakfast or an afternoon drink that is satisfying with your favorite flavor. So easy to carry around just fill glass and the mug it goes in. I'm getting ready now to order more. I don't want run out.

I am not sure why the reviews for this item are so low. After just one month, it's already getting really loud. It may be that it is too small and doesn't fit all of my needs. The bottom tray does go down very low, if you need that. Also, most people probably don't want to put anything in such a shallow tray. Overall, though, good price. Doesn't make as much noise or have enough storage capacity for me. If these problems were fixed, I'd give 4 stars easily. Good product thus far though.

I was reading the other reviews, and there seems to be an issue of sound quality with these. The reviews for all the headphones were great, so it caught my attention. Then when i got them, they had some sort of odd odor that lasted through several uses. You know, like when you wash your hands? And also there's what sounds about like static noises from time to time. I've tried them without music just in case it would go away, but didn't help.

I purchased this for my new Kindle and it is a nice product. It seems to hold the kindle securely, but like others have mentioned, there are problems with some of the magnets catching in certain spots which causes the cover not closing properly or puts pressure on both parts and makes them close unevenly. For now, after about 2 months, I am still using it, because it has been so cheap.

This product was not the greatest. It worked but very intermittently. I also had a difficult time getting it on my phone. Once installed and set to take pictures, it would work. But eventually stopped working for no reason at all. Maybe mine just malfunctioned or maybe someone else has better luck. Would really advise you look elsewhere than this product.

Really easy to use. Good sound quality. Easy installation. I was really surprised, not having read any of the other reviews. The instructions were a little complicated, but my husband had it set up in 5 minutes. It also has an answering machine which we have used and are very pleased with. It has many nice features. It is great that you can turn off all or some features depending on what mode your calling in. We think it's much better than our old digital unit with no external antenna.

I received this item after the expected delivery date, when it was not, and they wanted to know where my tracking number was, which is an inconvenience. Then, they told me that their system would not accept a tracking number. It took them 2 days to tell me, with no apologies. They could have contacted Amazon or UPS or whomever. Their customer service sucks.

You get what you pay for. This clamp did not fit my iPhone 4, it was about 2 mm too wide along all edges. It does make a loud buzzing sound at full extension. The spring has no strength at all. Don't bother buying this, spend more. Spend $20. Get a more reliable one.

The cover itself seems very durable, but the clear plastic screen protector was not put together all of properly. There were some air bubbles where you normally would just have a single or 2 mm long bubbles. I wasn't too upset about this because it's easy enough to install one piece at a time, which really makes it easier.

The description of the book sounded interesting. What I discovered was that it had a very poor plot. Only read to 60% then skipped ahead and saw nothing but pages and pages of descriptive writing. Nothing about a plot at all really. You might want to take notes as you keep reading, it's not a story. Read the last few pages, its pretty decent. Then skip ahead. It's no better for you. Sorry. But I am glad this one got cheap. That's why I've bought over 1000 books from Amazon.
I love this cover. It makes it easy to get the Kindle in and out of my purse. This is a wonderful cover for your kindle! No more trying different covers!

This does what it's supposed to. Holds my laptop perfectly and I even have room for a few files in the pockets. The zipper seems to be fine, though I doubt it will stand up forever. Great product, though! Very convenient. I'd recommend.
This is not what I was expecting to get. It looks very cheap, almost more for decoration than anything. However, my wife liked it, so we kept them both.

I have only had the case for about a week now but so far it seems to be fine. One feature that I was looking for, something like what is described in another review, there are two separate pockets which hold memory cards and an extra battery. The pocket on one side holds the batteries while it's open. In addition if you remove flash cards, there is no need to remove them because this cover opens by itself. The magnetic closure works well as does the magnet locking mechanism.

I can't wait for the next book. The character was very believable. She is a "realness." A great author and love story too. Thank you so much. Hope that there will be more of them soon. I'm looking forward to it!!!

Great product, good for a small dog that isn't really into getting to the food. Very sturdy, only issue with it is I wish my cat wasn't as curious. I'd recommend putting your pet on hold until they're off their feeders. Cats are much more intelligent than dogs when it comes to trying and figuring out ways around them. This means you're likely not going to want them running all over the place. They also get mad if you go outside without food in it.
Great product. Exactly what I needed to protect my new phone. The only drawback is the plastic cover. It makes a slippery feel. It's hard just getting used to, but once you get over it, it's fine.

The stories held my interest despite the errors in grammar. It was kind of entertaining reading about how one bad decision can affect a family. I would use it for light reading. As far as being a book you can't put down, not likely. If you like to get away from reality and have a good laugh, then this is good book. Don't expect anything great. Not your best if you are wanting an outstanding novel.

If you like to be taken on a wild journey into the mind of characters in this book, read it. But if you're looking for an inspirational story with solid Christian principles and character development, skip it! It is shallow at best and preachy. It's not even well written. The author would have done better to research some real stories instead. This book reads like it was written by a very poor romance writer. There are too many unbelievable aspects to make me recommend anything about this book.
Very cute but when I saw it in person, the plastic didn't look as nice. It did come fast and was exactly what my friend wanted which made her happy. So that's all that matter to me :) Thanks!

I bought this for a trip and it did not have enough power to recharge my iPod. On the drive home we tried several different outlets in our car with no luck. Luckily there is always an outlet close by or there would be problems. It's definitely NOT worth the price.

This was not a waste of time or money. The story kept me interested page after page, and in this economy, as I'm aware, it's important to read well if you want to succeed. I found the book engaging enough that when it ended last night, on day 4, I felt like having just had a coffee. Well done..
I'm really unhappy with this product. I bought one for myself last year.

They really have ruined it. I'm glad I got this book when it was free. What a disappointment. All the main characters, even John Carter, seem shallow and unlikable. The story line is too predictable. If you want good sci-fi, try Gene Wolfe, but don't be fooled by Michael Swanwick's reputation.
The cable worked great, just what I needed and for the price! Definitely recommend this if you need a longer cable.

This thing is nothing but a huge waste of money. For the first 30 seconds it'll flash the LED, then stop. And then, after the 2nd or 3rd second, just get up and go back to sleep. Useless. I returned it right away. They shouldn't take people's money like this. Get something else. Like their older one, though. That one works. It's an ugly light. But it's what they all look like. So if you don't care about looks, this will do. Otherwise save your money.
I have another book that shows the same pictures so maybe this one uses different pictures. But the descriptions were too specific for my needs, and it was a big disappointment!
This is the perfect size & weight for making soup or gravies. It heats evenly, has a good grip handle, looks beautiful in my kitchen :) Love it.

You know a book is good when it manages to make you keep turning the pages well into the night. Well this one did that quite well.
