I really liked reading about all of the characters even if there were many different types presented. The story was interesting and flowed easily. There wasn't enough action though for me. Maybe we should read more on them next time instead of going back so far in time. But over all I enjoyed reading. It felt fresh. Something new has been added to the vampire genre.

It was well written with many humorous moments. I thought the book could have used a lot more suspense. Too easy to guess. Loved his style of writing. His use of.....almost not using contractions. Was he Canadian for Pete's sake. Made it very hard to imagine being there. Other than that a good book. I'll be looking forward to more. Hopefully he'll come up with something better next time.
Item does NOT work if used without power. The green light is very dim even after hours charging.
Great little item. Gets deep into and around muscles. Worth every penny.
My cat loves it. I've added it to his wet food, which is nice because cats can have their own vitamin supplement sometimes. It really helps keep his joints healthy.

I have three of these so far. None are great. The first one I gave away because it leaked, the next two still work, and this one, which has been hanging in for months, no longer works. One side is completely clogged with air (I was hoping not to take a chance with the 2nd one.) It gets all of 5 stars. I'll use them until they leak, then probably throw em out.
The screen protector gives my phone a unique appearance. I can not count the number of compliments have been received.

I love the feel of a good pen, and have used Cross pens as part of my daily routine. When it comes to writing instruments, my favorite one is a Parker Jotter. But since the Cross M50 doesn't come in black, I'm stuck with this pen. The ink flow was smooth when using it, but after about 2 weeks, started skipping. Now, it's got more skips than other ballpoints, which usually don't happen so quickly.
Great camera, easy set up especially with IP. Have not played much around in it yet but, so far love it!
Great product! It does everything advertised and more. I do believe it will be good to have on hand at home also.
Sorry to say but after about 10 pages in, this piece falls apart without ever even meeting on a page.
This is my favorite perfume for spring and summer. It smells so feminine with no overpowering floral tones. Perfect for young people too as well. Smells like real flowers but fresh. Just perfect.
The fit is perfect if it weren't for one thing.

This book, by all accounts, is an absolutely wonderful resource on the art and history of American women's clothing. It contains a wealth to information, including both text descriptions and visual examples as well as photographs, illustrations, sidebars, etc. However, this book lacks photographs with captions detailing the garments being discussed, in contrast to many other well-known books like this that I've found. I'm guessing because there are numerous drawings accompanying some of the textual descriptions, but none for these visual examples.

I have a couple of large dogs so it's hard for me to find something that doesn't get my dog very hot on walks. After trying several different types of harnesses and looking at the results from those I've found these are by far the best. They work wonders as they absorb most of his energy. It was great being able to order them online because the stores charge way more than Amazon.
It is not the best and really has no new info as all information on various web sites. I would definitely NOT recommend this book.

At first I was surprised to find that my camera did not come with a case, but after using it on an 8 week trip (400miles roundtrip) and packing extra batteries, cables etc in this case I'm convinced for the price ($16.95) you can't go wrong. The bottom of the case fits tightly enough on some cameras (I used mine with Nikon D60) and is fairly waterproof. It's definitely not water tight. The pocket holds batteries well, no lens protector though due to its design.
There is no support in this backpack. They may seem like good quality, but you are basically taking a laptop with you when the zippers won't work and only minimal padding support.

i was a bit skeptical with this device, we have been using it for 2 months now and it's still working just like the first day I got it. If you are thinking about buying one.... DO IT!!! Its perfect! You can't beat it. We take water everywhere. In our camper,in our SUV, on vacation.. The thing is super easy to use ( don't even need instructions ) AND CHEAP!!!! Totally worth the price.
After ordering their organic treats several times, we decided something was not right.

This is the best filter for my air purifiers, filters like this are hard to find in a local store, so I bought it here. Shipping was super quick and they packaged these filters very securely. Will buy from this company again as soon as possible. Thank you!

We got this for our 2 1/2 year old son's birthday. All the kids including my husband and I were thrilled with it. My son is so into pretend play. And having someone to listen in now has been great. He knows when it's his turn because of all thoses sounds. It's nice how it talks about what kind of food he should be eating after being on the "potty".

My kids wanted to try the book out and read through it before I tried it. From what i can tell they liked it! But from what my son tells me his mom did not like seeing that on your face so it could get gross fast. He said there is a way for you to avoid those parts of it... Overall he thought this was pretty good. It does have some really gross parts, but I think if the picture had been more innocent with no part sticking out.....
Very few recipes to choose from. There are a lot of ingredients I probably won't try. This is not one I'm going to cook anytime soon.

After researching many types of vacuum cleaners online (looking at Consumer Reports, Best Buy, and others)I decided that the Hoover Tempo was what I wanted to have for both my hardwood floors (hardwood, tile, linoleum, throw rugs, etc.) as well as carpets. It looked very substantial when it arrived, which is a rarity in this day and age. The box is heavy though, but once you get the handle on, lifting up on the handles gets easier each time until it feels easier.

I ordered a pair of shoes from Nordstrom Rack in the past,but these are not the quality i had expected,especially for an almost new looking pair. The toe box is quite narrow and rubs on my big toe. My toes barely touch each other;it has always bothered me that no manufacturer seems to take into account that. Also I don't like much about wearing heels - sometimes they hurt so you can see them. But this time there was none.
Very cute and nice to give for Mother's day. Perfect size in every way. Great price too. You are getting a great deal. Thank you very much! I will definitely be shopping with them again.

The product arrived well packed and in good shape even though shipped by UPS. I followed the directions for installation that came with it. It was very easy to install. They work great and are so bright. We ordered 3 more packs as we were planning on adding them to all of our lights throughout the house. These lights light up a small area nicely at night. Very happy with them!
This product has exceeded my expectations, especially given the inexpensive price. The one problem I had was that both magnets were not properly glued shut by the manufacturer.

I have been very pleased with this steamer. In fact, the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because our floors are a little hard to clean. Our old Bissell was difficult but not impossible. We have had no problems putting in the water and running it. The steam comes out quickly when you press the handle. It heats up fast. You can clean without burning your hand. Very easy if some parts get stuck from time to time. Overall, I'm happy we bought this.

I'm still very mad that they would try sell this thing for $49.99. As much as the video game itself is awesome...This one isn't worth it. I love all of the Metal Gear games and how the stories really tie into each other. And when you finally get to play a character it plays through only 1 part of that character's story. The main game took about 2 hours by itself. The cut scenes after that.

This mouse is worthless. It does not track on my glass table and will randomly change position for no apparent reason. Also, it constantly looses battery. The cord needs to be at least 3 feet from the mouse. I would never recommend this product again or purchase from Anker. Please don't, repeat don't buy. Horrible item. Save yourself your time and money. Buy a Logitech. That was a good purchase. I hope you find this review helpful.
Not as terrifying or interesting as most people described. It wasn't particularly well written, but I enjoyed seeing these classic horror creatures through fresh eyes, so to speak.

I read all the reviews here, and although most people seemed to really like this machine, they were probably swayed by the overwhelmingly positive ones. I'm sorry. It's junk. There is no way we could have used it without a lot of very loud grinding sounds. The plastic grinder chamber was so tightly packed, though, that you would actually be unable to open it, except with a hacksaw or similar tool.
Good popcorn movie for Friday Night,But with today's technology that would never ever happen.
The Movie was great, however I wish the digital copy came on disk. It didn't come that is my only issue.

Purchased this for my son. He was happy with it and has continued to use it, but the top of one side cracked when he moved his laptop on. We were able to return it. It's exactly what i was looking for. Not too heavy not too light, easy on / off, nice finish. What more could you asked for, perfect score because really nothing negative.

The book is good, however it's hard to get your hands into the book. I bought all of her books at once. However, they have great ideas and techniques. For people who love flowers, this book has some good information. It's definitely a better read then the other books in my line that I've read. Enjoy! Happy Holidays!

This is a great little product for anyone who likes to stay organized, and it was easy clean off when necessary. You need only apply water or baby wipes (alcohol) which are included with the product. I have no trouble recommending this purchase over other products as it's easier to use, less mess, works great, and can be cleaned easily. The sticky surface will not ruin your desk, unlike those tape style pads that eventually fall off. So far my item has lasted without any signs of weakness so far.

Our little girl lost her beloved guinea pig, and having gone through a phase where she would only want things from me when it came time in the morning, we found this at Target and bought it. At first our pet didn't seem interested either, but after the two or three times of nudging he started peeing all over herself.

Although I like most about this case, it doesn't have much room for filters, which are why we bought it. Also it fits more loose than I'd hoped. On the plus side, my camera feels secure and there isn't any extra movement when I go to access either the lens or shutter buttons.

I received my case on time and in great condition. It fit snugly around the phone with very little effort needed to pull it off. I'm an extremely hard person when it comes too cases for phones, but this one was great. Love the color also! Very sleek looking too. You can still show off your phone, even during a day or night out. Doesn't make it bulky at all. Also like that there are holes available through which you can see Apple's logo. Would recommend purchasing from this seller.

It was a fun read but I would liked more cat stories instead of just mentioning several times that some animal loves them. The last paragraph seemed kinda rushed and disjointed. I'm sure all good breeders know their animals better than that. That's what happens with any kind of pet.

The story was enjoyable. It left you with a good feeling and happy about the outcome. I also liked how it told of what happen to friends in other states after they left for college. Not easy but possible. I'm hoping there is more stories on these characters but would like to see if we get their stories. If not maybe some kind of epilogue. A few things bothered me or made me want them to be different. What happened to her daughter at the end. She didn't even tell him that.

the plastic looks very cheap you can tell. It is easy to install an works well. Will recommend this if u are looking for a remote starter from ur own car.   Rating: 4.0   I love this product. The only problem that i had with it was the battery does not last too long but overall i would highly recommend.   Rating: 4.0   This thing worked exactly as described. Good sound, adjustable volume, really liked being able to adjust treble and bass levels.
Great case with a great magnetic closure and pocket to keep my business card in. This is all I can say at this time. Hope it holds! The price was low compared to others that carry the same item.
This mattress protector is quite comfy and soft, however the material around my cheeks gets warm pretty fast, so it's kind of difficult for me sleep with it.

The picture and sound quality are great. My only complaint is the lack of a zoom feature. I know it cost about $500, but this would have been nice to have. Also sometimes movies skip when playing them back. It's very light weight. Great for my daughter. No complaints at all. I'm happy. She still wears headphones all day because you can't hear anything from them. This is good news since she has Autism. :-) :) Thank you. Shipping was fast too.
This was purchased as an accessory gift for a 7-year-old friend.

I have a small backyard, but the dog is still afraid of getting too close. Now he can run & play out and feel safe & secure! He runs up to come get me when I start barking, then back down again after he's let off. It took him about 10 minutes before it was completely trained, but that's probably more than enough. He also barked once while using it, so it's sensitive enough that even without the sound being on, he'll know that something bothers him or comes in.
It's a hard product to find but worth the effort. We put in some peanut butter and it works. So much more economical than all that "fillers". Now it's time for me to go do something... :)

My 2 cats love their new scratcher lounge, they have taken up all the room in my living room. Its big enough for them to sit on all day long. I would definitely buy again. Plus you can't beat the price of $20.00 each. Can't go wrong.

My boys and I have been waiting for this album to drop ever since their last release - which was an incredible success both sales wise & lyrically & musically. I can only imagine how great the followup will be going forward. The only downfall is the length of each album...I personally would have like a few MORE tracks on each one. Great job guys! This music just keeps getting better every year :)Cheers From North Jersey!!
Interesting book because is was well written, kept my interest, and wasn't what i expected at all. Looking forward to reading another by Richard Laymon

This is a great little tool. I only use the small grinder setting and it does so well. However the big grinder one works well but grinds at too high an RPM so it's hard on your wrists because of this vibration. It's a bit loud as well, not just quieter than what I'm used to, like some other grinders.

I am disappointed in these sheets as they are more of a satin finish rather than smooth linen. The pockets don't fit around the corners well, but since this doesn't show it is ok with me. They would work well if you want to keep them soft and cool.
As long as you know how to use it you will be very happy with this product. I've really enjoyed mine.
We all have them in our kitchen/dining areas and they are always ready to cut food. They are comfortable and look good, too. Great product! I highly recommend. :)

I like the way it works as far as my feet go, but not because of having to wait 30 to 60 minutes for the hair to grow. It really does take much longer than this. Also, while I had absolutely no problem at all getting them off, they were incredibly difficult and messy putting back in - you can't wash your hands afterward. Be careful!! And be careful around bedding. Don't lay down if you've smeared your feet. Once you're finished with it, toss it. Wash your hands.
Good song... sounds ok, not great. And even though its a free, get if you can. If your paying money to download something else they want u to.... DONT pay then cause they'll try and stop you.
I've tried so many low carb flour blends. Nothing taste as good as this.
For some reason this did not fit as well as i expected.
My wife bought me a keurig as a gift. She wanted us to take advantage of our local convenience-store prices.
This is a great product!! It works just as good if not better than the more expensive ones out there. I would definitely but products from this company again! :)

My dogs love these and I can just leave one packet by the door. They like them so much that they eat a lot of them. The only problem is that, since its chicken jerky they're not going to last very long. Will keep buying more. Recommend you try this if your dog loves dry treats. I have tried it myself with my two dogs, once after their bath (they are big dogs), and again. No complaints there. You have to feed your dogs something all the time.
After hearing Dr Oz promote healthy living and diet, in addition to weight loss, i was eager to know more about all aspects covered by his advice.

I would recommend this item to friends and family. Very sturdy but light weight for portability. Have not used the storage yet. Only had it a month. Pros: Light weight, Easy carry handle, Comfortable padding, easy open storage, secure bungee, adjustable straps. Works well in all positions. Has shoulder strap which is always helpful when you are carrying extra weightCons: None so far, will need time to see how long they last. Price on Amazon was reasonable compared with other places.
Really like these sheets. They arrived very quickly. There were a lot of loose threads. Not sure if I can unravel them. Overall good deal. Would buy again for sure. Great price.

This one makes my wife extremely happy. I've been using it daily for the last two weeks without a problem. It's very easy to use. I have no complaints. It is small and light enough that if you lose it, it'll be just as easy. I'm not sure what else reviewers would want in an mp3 player. And at $24, compared with other brands selling for $40+, this unit provides pretty good value too.

I bought this for my wife. She has a few cases and wanted something slimmer than the Otterbox Defender Case so she could slip it into her purse. It works well. It's not as thick as some cases, meaning no more protection to your phone if it's dropped, but it keeps all ports from getting blocked. You have access to all of the buttons except that one on top, or at least none are hard wired in by design.

I love these pots because they are such quality items that don't burn down under you. They just take less heat. What other item can you say that? Easy to clean, too. I've bought a few of them.   Rating: 5.

I purchased this to use in an RV travel trailer. It worked great for the first 2 months. Since then not only have some batteries developed a short, but they seem to lose their charge rather abruptly. Not nearly as good as my old Duracell, which is going bad. This was less money than what one would pay at Walmart so if you want something that will work OK until it fails after 1 year and you're willing to put up with poor performance, it's worth it.

We are into our own homeschool family history project. This DVD gives us a lot of inspiration about what has happened on this farm in general. I found it very touching and thought provoking. The way they explain how the settlers came to be there is wonderful. They have been farming here for hundreds of years. Very enjoyable.
I bought some of these in 2007 and still use 4 years later at the local farmer's market. The first one is cracked from wear but no fault to them. Great product for a really good price.

I love this book, though it did leave me wishing he had more space to talk about what he really experienced. And then to find out, he's still up in the mountains! I've tried for almost 20 years now - first on a long hike that lasted several years, and next as part of my own research for a nonfiction book "High Steppa Mountain: An American Saga" (a few weeks before writing this, actually, but don't get mad at me).
I've been needing them as I am always fighting some kind of allergy here in Arizona.

I'm a big fan of these types of novels. And while I think the story has potential that could have been told many different ways, this seemed more like a teaser for the sequel than an actual book. There is some plot twists, but not much actually happens. Just read it to finish off what you started, right? If you want to get caught up in a good story, don't waste your money. You can start with one and complete both books on one day.
I've been searching for just as long for "good enough" kitty litter boxes.
I don't own one myself, but my sister owns one.

I like the fit of this product and they keep me warm. However, my hands get really cold if i wear these to go into a building all day. My husband tried them at night and his hands were freezing. Its too expensive for not being able to use it during outdoor work.

For a quick read, this book was entertaining but the ending felt rushed and incomplete. This is one of those books where it's all in your head whether the main character is right or wrong so it isn't hard to guess what will happen next until half way through the book. I think a good editor could have trimmed down some of this. I'm curious as to how much truth there really is though. Read for yourself, see if you notice anything different about me.

This product is amazing! I have a 4 month old Golden Retriever puppy. She was trained with treats but the puppy kept licking her face until she started to lick holes in one of these. So we switched her over and now she's very calm when we're around her. The treats last for about 2 weeks at full strength. It takes her quite some time to eat 1 package though. We usually freeze them overnight before putting into treats. Great product! I will definitely buy more.
Good follow up in this series.

First off I must say that I'm a huge fan of the TV show Star Trek... which you can clearly tell, as soon as you lay eyes on this product. It's beautiful, and very cool to have some of it in your office at work. That being said, if you're planning to actually put it into use, look elsewhere. The case is not heavy duty, so once it's opened up, all that's holding that plastic together are 4 small metal tabs, placed one by one.
Purchased this and it works great. You can cook the eggs with no problem at all. It takes just a few minutes to boil which helps speed up cooking. I would recommend it.

It's very well made especially considering you can't beat it by it's price tag. My favorite thing about this was that I can actually see myself eating popcorn now. :) Can't wait until Thanksgiving rolls round, when I'll get to have my guests try it.

This battery is not quite as long lasting than the one that came with my phone. But it does allow me to have a backup if I forget and need it. No complaints. My only other complaint would be that you can't charge more than 2 phone at once, so the 2nd phone gets charged while I'm still on the first. However, they say this item is for a car only, so perhaps it's not meant to work in hot climates like mine? The charging unit snaps into place, so it's pretty secure.

It is exactly what it says it is, just don't try to use this light for anything other than a night light. In terms of a flashlight, I would give it 4-5 stars. It's compact and nice looking, but not too fancy. So many lights these days make big flashy displays that you can barely see, much less hold any kind of candle or lamp.

So this album was worth the wait! I have read alot of reviews that said it wasen't as good as their last. Yeah that may be true. But what other band puts out a greatest hits cd twice so they could make more money? Yes on some it is better. However all in all, its still good.
I've had this item just under two years, never used it....then on June 7, 2006 we lost power at about 10 pm....
The first time my dog gets a hold of this toy with the bell on it she goes nuts getting all excited. She really loves shaking toys so when I get out the tennis ball you cannot help but be impressed.

I have a very high arched foot and my toes were rubbing the end of the slipper which made them hurt really bad. Had to send them back after 2 nights wearing them. Gave one to friend who said they fit great on her little toe. If you don't need it for that use, they are pretty comfy. I'd give this particular style 3 stars due to the fact they rub your toes. Was going with 4 or 5 at least but since they never fit, i had to settle.

This book provides some insight to the life of an English butler by providing stories from his time in a number and types of workplaces. The text is filled with anecdotes that give you glimpses into daily activities as well other activities. Overall it was entertaining for someone who likes books about England. It seems rather odd they chose to focus on working class Englishmen though considering other countries would likely have different work cultures. If you're looking for humor or are seeking something with more character development, then this isn't it.

This is a decent product but it gets hot too easily. If you touch the plug in with your left hand or have it charging for any length of time - and it does get warm- don't even try to set an item on this thing because you'll burn yourself. It's pretty annoying when you're trying something out then put down food like scrambled eggs etc. But it's better than running cables all around my kitchen counter! I keep mine right next to my microwave so everything matches up nicely.

This is a good looking watch with clean clear face but it would not hold water. I swam in my pool for an hour and the water still did not have any color. If you buy this watch be sure to test it! A nice watch if you're going out on your beach vacation. Very comfortable and lightweight. It has a velcro wrist band. Amazon shipped quickly so that was good. Buy one size bigger than what you think will fit. The only reason I'm giving 3 stars vs.

I haven't tried it yet but will soon. It appears to be a very well made tool however the weight has me concerned that my husband may lose it. It seems like more of a piece of jewelry than just for yard work. And as far I know he is never without one on him. He does have one. But then again who doesn't. So don't hesitate if you love to garden. Just make certain that you can afford it! Then again, with all things green that might come in handy.

A well written story that seems to be trying to tell an important message but I found it annoying at times because so many facts seemed unverified as well. The author's writing is good though. I'd probably recommend this if you want a short easy read. Just don't put too much stock in the story.
It seems hard enough going in search of a product replacement, let alone buying online.

I would recommend this product to anyone. Very easy assembly and the price is reasonable. The chair is so comfortable it has become my everyday furniture. Perfect for a smaller person. Nice recline position as well. I am 5'8". This chairs seems perfect length wise. It fits nicely in a standard size coffee table. Only reason not 5 stars because of price. But you get what you pay for. So worth it. Shipping was great.

Not only did it help me to clean my keyboard, even after I spilled a cup of tea all over it, it took the smell out completely! I've tried every thing for years and it's so nice that I'm no longer scrubbing this stuff with soap. Love it.

This item needs a smaller container for the used litter. It takes several bags to clean one room of cat waste. It's also hard not having little clips on each end. But that's okay, because I just put it in my laundry room. Also, you don't really get any good scooping by hand with this. With this type item, there's usually too much litter stuck everywhere, so you're left using your hands (dirty or not) to pick it up.
great case!!!! Great price. Received in 4 days.

I enjoy watching this little black and white detective flick. It's a light show by someone who was in no way suited for starring roles. But it is not entirely terrible, with an interesting plot line. Worth watching, but not the best. My least favorite on Amazon.

I read the reviews on this product. The best one was that it did not leak in heavy rains. This is really true. Even filled with ice and still worked fine during a couple of torrential rain storms. My only complaint would be how long it takes to pump up with batteries. But, I'm happy we are going solar for power now.

This TV has pretty good picture and it is a great value. Amazon delivered with this product as promised. The only drawback I experienced was that the stand came without all of its parts, so we have to find some hardware at Lowe's for about $40. Fortunately, our other television is compatible but there are no speaker options on this model. All in all, though, very happy with it.

i saw this movie when it originally came out and wanted to see again as I enjoyed it so much. Very entertaining, the end kinda leaves you hanging though?? It is a must see-movie!!! Highly Recommended!!:)

This case is super sturdy, and the rubber has an excellent feel to it. Its not as hard as you think so it does give a little when holding in your hand, but at least with this one that doesn't happen all of the time. I will definitely get another for every phone i own. Highly recommended.
This was very informative about growing up around the country of Israel. I enjoyed reading it, with many facts and helpful insights shared in a story that is worth reading. Thank you.

I love how this organizer looks and feels. It's easy to find my pens with the bright orange color (hard as heck not to use it in a busy workspace like mine).The colors are muted enough that you could even wear it out to dinner or something. My only complaint is it's really pricey. If they had made those little pocket holders, then it would be perfect.
Overall i was disappointed in this item. The fit for my Note III isn't that good.

I got this for use with my ipad air, and works great!!!! Also like that if you get a new device from Amazon, they will send you one free! Can't beat that!!! Well worth the money it cost to buy. Especially compared to others where you'll probably have to buy two or three at same time. Love it!

First time I have ever bought a vacuum online. It was everything advertised. The Dyson works great. Very easy to assemble and use. Just put the little bag on in front of the filter, turn it on, fill with dirt, pull out waste cannister, push button, run through another pass or two. You will not regret it. A bit heavy, but if you need something lightweight that will do what these guys do, this is perfect. Also, got my new vaccum at Costco. I saved $100.

This is an OK product. It definitely does work if you follow the directions, but be ready to mop up a mess after your little darlin' gets done playing. Our 5 year old boy also got sticky hands and did have some on our floor. So far it has held for one week. If we don'tice anymore stickiness I would think maybe it's time to go back into business with those Swiffer pads. But until then we'll just keep trying it. I'll update again in 3 weeks.

I have had many air mattresses until now. After reading the reviews of this mattress on amazon, I wanted to make sure that it was what they advertised and reviewed before buying. This is an excellent mattress. The price at Amazon, while somewhat higher than others online, was a major savings for Amazon as well. My order arrived in two days (free super saver shipping) with free shipping. Very easy set up took 10 minutes.

This is a great little flash drive. A very handy size, especially for travel. Only gripe is...why did they put a loop to tie the pen drive to? If it were attached magnetically, I'd never lose my Flash Drive or pens. It makes an adorable gift! It's got plenty of room as well. It also came with a tiny microfiber cleaning cloth. I didn't expect it. :-0

The color description was not correct. It says it came on time. If you can get over the fact that it's not a bright red, at least as pictured here, by all means, buy it! I wanted pink. It's pretty and does what its needs too! Not sure how long it will last though.
i used these pills and my dogs were symptom free after taking them several times over a few weeks.

My son loves this. It's a perfect size for his room. He calls it the "monster." It comes with a small pillow and blanket, so you can attach those if you'd like. For me, they are decorative but not really practical. But, like I said, my son loves it. So does his sister who isn't big into Monster High. The duvet cover makes this an all season comforter. We haven't washed it yet, but hopefully that will help.

I am so impressed with what I've seen this product do when making homemade hummus and sauces. It is very simple to use although takes some time for a first timer. The motor seems plenty powerful on my counter top as I can really crank the handle. I'd highly recommend it, but just need more patience!! :) Enjoy! ;) Good luck! :o)

This is a great way to protect your ipod by only adding about half an ounce of weight per device. Plus it's more stylish than those cheap leather cases. I highly recommend it for anyone who wants to take on the protection and fashion quotients of their ipod. It can be folded in half which makes taking photos much easier.

I don't leave reviews unless the product performs as is written about. This little gadget works exactly how it should. The sound quality coming from this speaker compares well to any small portable speaker I've seen. It also fits easily on my night stand. I'm very pleased with it. Great job Amazon! :)
Love love love!

In The Land Of Oz the Scarecrow and his friend friends find themselves unable to escape from a horde of moving ants. Then they meet Dorothy who offers them advice regarding their quest. She tells them that it will take several days for all the ants to reach Emerald City as the way tunnels are built allows for movement in all directions. Also she says that once the last ant leaves then there is no turning back.
Great buy at a very fair price. I love this product. Works perfectly, and looks great on my phone. Recommend it highly.

i am having so much fun decorating the house with them, the colors are great,. The look just like they do in picture. They are made out of cardboard. I bought them for my grandkids to play with, hopefully it will be great help on christmas eve. There are lots and lots & lots of patterns that you can use for all kinds of occasions. For me anyway; I'm sure I'll save allot more for gifts later.
When used in conjunction with a new water filter i no longer have to replace my Brita when we change filters. Very easy and fast to get the water flowing. You can switch them out more then once.
This is an awesome product that gives your hair body and shine without the frizz or stickiness. It adds shine’s to my short messy locks. And it smells yummy!
Very yummy! My fish gobble this up, and it's good quality! Will order again. The price is more than fair. No fillers, but real seafood!

I have a lot of toys all over the house that light up when you touch something. So this was not as exciting for my 4 year old grandson but still fun enough to keep his interest. He was also amused by how some were more colorful than others. It does take 3 AAA batteries so do need to find where they are kept. All in all, it's much easier and less expensive then putting out candles at every night end. This is just another great invention from Brookstone.

This is great for the office or if you like hot soup. It's easy to open and close it has a seal top. Has an auto shutoff! It's also microwaveable so it's perfect in fridge as well! Love this product. :) Great price too and was here pretty quickly. I definitely recommend this!!

I should have paid attention to the fact that this is written from a German perspective which explains how much more difficult reading material it is. To be fair, this isn't uncommon in these types of studies. The first half is well written. There are numerous examples and stories to share. By itself, I would give 5 stars. However, when you start taking in the entire work, you have pretty poor insight into many parts of American history. Maybe other cultures don't view Americans as "bad".

this is a great product at a reasonable price. You can really tell they're quality. The sound is very crisp and clear. I put them on high volume but I've seen others say you don't want to. They need it. Great item to have for your iPod. It's worth every penny. My son likes it because of the way they fit my ears. He doesn't like too much in ear headphones cause he feels uncomfortable while wearing them. These are great. Good price good product.
Our 3 year old daughter enjoyed the illustrations, but she wasn't crazy about all of the rhyming - it felt like her voice got out of sync while reading. She liked the pictures, though.

Bought as a Christmas present for my husband, who is an avid hunter. It looks great on our gun safe and the price made it perfect to order. Shipping was very fast, too. Would highly recommend this product.

I have a small yorkie mix who LOVES her dog food. One thing we didn't like about it was the smell. It took me many months to find one that worked well, but this is it. She likes being out in public all day, and with this bowl, you can leave your door unlocked at work knowing she has extra water while you're gone. Also, there are no seams or places for food particles to get in.

I thought this book was interesting and had a good storyline to it. However it needs work. It needed more of an ending with the characters and that is what made me like it. There need be more. The story should also continue from here as well.

It's okay. I've seen better. A few really good actors and actresses in it. The storyline seems interesting until I find out it's not that good...just "OKAY." Not horrible, but no great movie or anything like that. Don't get me wrong, some people will, however, enjoy this movie...especially if you are a fan of British actors. Just don't expect too much. You won't be disappointed with the price.

I love this thing. It makes shaving a quick and enjoyable event. The shaver runs for about 1.5 to 2 hours on one charge. I'm going to buy another unit of the same brand, but that means I'll be using it daily. Great product. It's not noisy, it's powerful enough, cleans easily, nice battery life, light weight easy glide action. My only complaint is that when you pick up an item, some hair will get caught underneath it.

I would recommend this movie as a good one night entertainment. Most of the story seems familiar, but it still has plenty to keep me entertained until the end. The DVD quality was good. Overall happy with my purchase.
This cable has an excellent build quality and works as specified. The price was well under what BestBuy wanted. Very satisfied with this purchase.

It has everything I need if needed. My husband used the screwdriver to open up our IPad and it came with all of them he needed to take apart his Ipad. He just had to use that bit on the tool included in the package. A great little kit. I am sure we will have no problems using it. Thanks for this item! :D

I purchased this for my husband's birthday. As he is an electrician/welder the tool can get hot and a mitt was needed to pull out of hot oil. The mittens have large fingers so it works perfect for him!

Have tried other brushes out there but this one seems to be holding up better than all others. Don't have any issues with it scratching dog fur or carpet as has been stated on some posts. Would definitely recommend this item.

I had bought other brand in stores before - this didn't measure up nearly as much but was still acceptable. Some things are more important to me than money. The price here though was ridiculous. 
 Rating: 3.
This is truly an awesome product. You get two great massagers in one unit. My wife really loves it.

Got both the orange and pink case in 1 day with Amazon prime. Love these. The material feels durable yet has a rubber/plastic finish that gives you enough friction. Fit is perfect. Have only used for 3 days, but I love them. So far they seem very durable. Can't wait to break them in. Definitely recommend. Haven't tried any others or brands because these are my favorites. Price wasn't out of line either which was nice.

It's a good product for the price. We have one in my office at work and like it so much that I purchased this version to use on home network with our Mac laptops. It works well. The setup was easy. Just followed directions step by step. So far, we find it just as reliable if not faster than it's slightly larger counterpart running at full speed. After having had both of them for quite some time, we are finally getting reports from our Apple laptops when they start up.

The item was a lot smaller than what it appeared to be in the pictures. Not quite worth the price. I gave it as a gift so i couldn't give feedback on actual quality. Shipping and packaging were great.
These are really a must have......they last over twice as long and the recharge doesn't wear out your batteries like so many others do! Great Product! Thanks Amazon!!!
Well written, easy to read. Interesting book on an interesting subject. This is my only review, so I'll let you know that this will be my last one.

I am an electrical engineer and can easily understand all the instructions. It is worth every penny that we paid for it. The only bad thing was that this was not a Christmas present, it had to arrive by Thanksgiving Day, but thanks goodness our grandson opened on Thanksgiving! Merry Christmas!!!
Good value for the price. The case fits well and seems to provide adequate protection. Very happy with it's performance. Only drawback? Hard time taking photos in direct sunlight or bright sunlight.
I was looking for an inexpensive book with nice pictures. There were some good and useful things in this book, as well as many not so helpful ideas.

I recently bought this book on the strength of another reviewer's review and thought I'd better see what Mr. Moore had to say for myself. For a short story (or novella, if you will), this was far longer than most other stories that I've read. That's okay, I guess, given its setting in medieval Europe, but then it's not really clear why he chose this subject.

If you're looking for the book with "All About The Money & Secrets that Fled Away" this isn't it. However, it is a beautiful photo of some gorgeous paintings. I was hoping to find something new here and I'm not even sure what else they did in their book. A good buy if you really don't care about all that, but as an introduction or history - no. Not my cup of tea. It also made me feel kinda bad for them.
I would recommend anyone trying garcinia Cambogia use these.

I bought these to use with my tablet so that when i go somewhere like a hotel room where the wifes not in bed and its too cold for me to use, i can put them on myself very comfortably. I keep one at work since I'm often cold. Love them. A friend told me about them; then decided she wanted some. She loves hers too. They really do help get things warm or cool.
We expected more from this shower curtain set than we received. It looks okay, just not what I expected. Probably wouldn't buy another.

I really liked the idea of this. We are remodeling our home and going to put a pool on one side with an adjoining hot tub behind it. This is supposed to be used in this area. It does seem effective for deterring spiders at night. However, after installing them we noticed that there was something not quite right in how they work. The picture looked almost like it had been installed wrong.

To many characters to follow. Interesting but also difficult as well not really much use in seeing what the next piece comes up with. I would not recommend this book for anyone who is over 30 yet. It was very slow getting started. But once you get thru the first few chapters it gets more interesting. Will most likely read #2 & 3 when they come available.
So excited about this! When it's full I can carry it around by the handle.
Product is as stated. This product allows me to charge my iphone with no problem. Love the way it works and doesn't get too hot when in use. Great product. Will buy again if needed!
This grill works pretty good. Very well made in terms of what could be expected from an American company, with high quality.

My only problem with this kit is that they provide absolutely no directions on how to put things together! There are lots of pieces which makes sense but most people don't know what one part does or where it's supposed to go.
Great product for the money. Would definitely buy again. Bought these to replace a set I had that rusted out. Just what Iwas looking for.
Very pleased with how fast shipping was. The Anker Astro Mini 3000mAh Portable Charger does everything advertised.
This was a great purchase, very high quality product compared with other sets on Amazon or at a much lower price.
The quality seems a lot less than what we had before but still good. For being in another country there is no problem getting them. It's like they don't want you to.

I have a small dog and it's hard to keep it trim in the winter. This does an awesome job of keeping her hair out of my neighbors yard and making brushing much easier. It's easy to use as well - just clip some leash on one end, tie both ends together so they don't slip off, and snap it onto your hand or take hold while you're running around with it. My only complaint is that there are no instructions included about how often you should stop using this.

I can understand why more people would get out of this than others; if you're into a very deep type spiritual meditation, then go ahead and check it out. But there is one thing that makes me sad about this: all the great reviews are from customers like me, who buy something based on them writing them, but in reality, have never had an experience with the meditation. It seems to be marketed as such, yet still has no content for someone interested in getting any deeper meditative experience.

I loved the whole set. Great picture and nice sound. As usual with Samsung products all of them functioned properly. Would have been 5 stars but as others mentioned, for some reason it's difficult to adjust the volume. I'm giving 4 starts because of that. But overall, a great tv set - excellent price ($500), you can't get anything better at this price. Very good value. Amazon also shipped it out very fast.

I haven't used it yet, but the light is very good, and for this price, nothing can beat it. However, when I received it, there were black spots all over its face. Not really a big deal, just thought I'd warn you.

I had the opportunity to use this on another vehicle. It's great for finding a leak. I've saved probably hundreds of dollars in labor from these guys alone. They have some very useful video and info about how things work...and if your going to spend that money you might as well take them with you. Buy their products before they sell out! :)

This item worked out well for me. My only recommendation is to ensure you have all the screws lined up after mounting the shelves. Otherwise, I did some of my own pre-assembly (put shelf arms on first as shown in instructional picture). Other than that, it seems sturdy enough. The shelves are a good fit and easy enough to place books on. For those who complained they could not get the shelves level, that must be because their TV or device isn't sitting close enough...
Very cute, fast paced, clean family movie to watch together.

This cd is amazing... it totally fits the bill for a great mood piece. The tracks are pretty diverse, ranging from light lounge and pop to pure lounge-inspired tracks. A real joy to have available when you just want some new music. I love it! I've purchased several other cds featuring this group -- all of them were equally enjoyable and as fresh sounding. My one complaint about these others was that they did not contain songs with a Latin flare.

This is the best thing since sliced bread. We make a lot of homemade pizzas for family holiday parties. Pizza sauce just doesn't work with this product. The pan can be tricky to put back together. You don't want it falling apart!! So far its been over 5 years in use and still going strong. The only down side seems it's not dishwasher friendly. I wash it by hand. Easy clean with Barkeepers friend. If you like pizza crusts get it. Well worth it.   Rating: 5.

I purchased this item and got it in 2 days. First off, when i received it, the product was not as pictured. It said 'white with green'. However, like it stated in description, it is actually 'clear purple' and black on a light background color. The screen protector doesn't seem to be a great quality. All of my friends tell me it looks good but i don't think so. But for $2, what do u expect. Overall, its ok.
this is my second set for these replacements. They last about 6 mos. if not washed or dryed by time you notice problems.
This product works well enough. It doesn't trap nearly enough water, so be sure to fill every half an hour. I've used other brands with much lower quality products, this one is just average.

This review will be written in a more detailed format than the other reviews, because I'm not finished with it and don't want to spoil anything. The book is very good, especially for someone who's studying the works of this author. It offers different interpretations and perspectives on both what the author intended as well as how others interpreted it. This helps explain his writing style which would otherwise only seem obvious. That said, I have a couple problems. First, there are no illustrations anywhere.
